eng_prompt: After implementing several strategic changes and improving operational efficiency, the organization was optimistic about its financial performance. As a result, stakeholders eagerly awaited the season's financial results.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okussa mu nkola enkyukakyuka ez'enjawulo n'okutumbula enkola y'emirimu, ekitongole kyalina essuubi ku nkola yaakyo ey'ebyensimbi. N'ekyavaamu, abakwatibwako balindirira n'obwagazi ebyava mu byenfuna bya sizoni.
ach_prompt: Inge keto aloka-loka mapol I tic ki medo rwom me tic, dul ne obedo ki gen I kom ticgi me lim. Macalo adwogi ne, joo ma timo tic ne gubedo kakuru adwoki me lim me kare ne.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka aitegear aijulanakineta nuipu ka aitojokar eswamae loajokan, ajaasi atukot ngin keda aomisio nuikamunitos eswamae loka ikapun. Kanuka ngun, apotu itunga idaritoto akiro nuka ikapun luka apak kangin.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ojata 'yezu 'bori ma vutia azini geri azi ngazu 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu 'bori ma vutia, amuti 'da ndra asi 'baza be e'yo robia ni 'diyi ma dria. E'yo 'disi, 'ba ambo ndundu eyi te e'yo robia esuzu ayi ti 'da ma alea 'diyi avasi.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okutaho empindahinduka nyingi n'okutunguura omutindo gw'emirimo, ekitongore kikaba kiine amatsiko aha nkora yaakyo y'esente. N'ekyarugiremu, abu kirikukwataho bategyereize n'ekihika ebyarugire omu by'empiiha omu siizoni egi.

eng_prompt: After analyzing our recent product developments and customer feedback, it's clear that we have a strong value proposition. With our innovative features and competitive pricing, we should be able to compete very well in the market.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okwekenneenya enkulaakulana y'ebyamaguzi byaffe gye buvuddeko n'ebiteeso bya bakasitoma, kyeyoleka bulungi nti tulina ekiteeso ky'omugaso eky'amaanyi. Olw'okuba tulina ebintu ebipya era nga n'emiwendo gyaffe si gya bbeeyi, tujja kusobola okuvuganya obulungi mu katale.
ach_prompt: Ingee ngiyo kit ma jami wa tye ka time kwede ki tam pa luwil, nen atyer kamaleng ni watye ki miti matek tutwal. Ki jami manyen ma watye kwede ki wel ma beco, omyero wabed ki kero me pyem maber tutwal I cuk.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka airereonor iboro luitolomunitai ka aomisio nuka agwelak, ecai cut ebe ijaasi sio keda epone loajokan noi loka aitolomun iboro. Keda iboro luitetiak ka itiaisinei lu epatana, ibusakinit oni apedor abolobol kosokoni.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ama vile afa edele o'diru 'diyi ma ale andrizu azini egata aje'ba yini 'diyi ma dria 'bori ma vutia, eri e'da kililiru kini ama ma egata orodriruni okporu. Afa amani edele o'diru 'diyi pie tualu aje abala ni 'diyi pie, ama eco abala 'ye cuu ma alia kililiru ra.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okushwijuma entunguuka y'ebintu byaitu hamwe n'ebiteiso by'abaguzi, nikyoreka butunu ngu twine ekiteiso ky'omugasho ky'amaani. N'ebintu byaitu ebisya hamwe n'emihendo y'ahaiguru, tushemereire kuba nitubaasa kuhakahakana kurungi omu katare.

eng_prompt: As we reminisce about our childhood, it's hard not to think about the experiences that shaped us. Looking back, I often find myself reflecting on the moments that made school truly special.
lug_prompt: Bwe tulowooza ku buto bwaffe, kizibu obutalowooza ku bye twayitamu mu bulamu. Bwe ntunula emabega, ntera okwesanga nga nfumiitiriza ku biseera eby'enjawulo essomero bye lyanfuula.
ach_prompt: Ka watye ka tamo I kom kare ma watino, tek tutwal pe me tamo I kom jami ma otimme I kwo wa. Ka atamo I kom jami ma okato angec, pol kare anongo atamo I kom jami ma oweko gang kwan obedo gin ma pire tek adada.
teo_prompt: Kwape iwomomomo oni nuikamunitos apolowok, etiono mam aomoom nuikamunitos akiro nuapotu kiswamautu oni. Aomoom ngaren, etapit eong aomoom nuikamunitos apakio nuapotu ijaikisi esomero loitegelikina.
lgg_prompt: Aka e'yo ama vile mvaari ma e'yo ega, eri ewaru ama ma ega e'yo e'yo ama ni 'diyi ma dria ku. Mani angu ndrezu vile, ma ma esu sawa driasi ma e'yo ega e'yo fepi sukulu ni aa'zu wura ndusi 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Ku turikwijuka eby'obuto bwaitu,nikigumire obutateekateeka ahabintu ebyatureeteire kukora gye. Ku ndikureeba enyima,ninkira kweshanga ninteekateeka aha bwire obwareteire eishomero kuba ery'omutaano.

eng_prompt: As we reflect on your leadership journey, I'm curious to learn more about how you approach team dynamics. Can you share some insights into your management style?
lug_prompt: Nga bwe tufumiitiriza ku lugendo lwo olw'obukulembeze, njagala okumanya ebisingawo ku ngeri gy'okwatamu enkola ya ttiimu.
ach_prompt: Ka watye ka tam I kom wot me tela ni, atye ki miti me pwonyo jami mapol I kom kit ma I timo kwede tic pa dul.
teo_prompt: Kwape sio aomoom nuikamunitos erot kon loka eingarenone, akoto eong ajenun nuipu nuikamunitos epone loiswamai jo keda etimu.
lgg_prompt: Amani e'yo egazu e'yo mi vile aci dricezaniri ma dria, ma ava be e'yo onizu drile geri mini e'yo amuti ni 'diyi 'yezu ri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Ku turikuguma nituteekateeka aha rugyendo rwawe rw'obwebembezi, nyine ekihika ky'okwega ebirikukiraho aha muringo ogu orikukoresa amaani ga tiimu yaawe.

eng_prompt: Building a strong team is essential for our success, so I've prioritized finding the right talent. To achieve this, I have invested a lot of energy and money to make sure that we have good employees.
lug_prompt: Okuzimba ttiimu ey'amaanyi kya nkizo mu buwanguzi bwaffe, n'olw'ekyo nkulembezza okunoonya ebitone ebituufu. Okutuukiriza kino, ntaddemu amaanyi mangi ne ssente okukakasa nti tulina abakozi abalungi.
ach_prompt: Gedo dul tuku matek obedo gin ma pire tek tutwal pi cobo miti wa, pi meno aketo yenyo dano matye ki talanta maber bedo gin ma pire tek. Me cobo man, aketo kero ki cente madwong me neno ni watye ki lutic mabeco.
teo_prompt: Aiduk etimu loegogong erai ibore yenepol noi kanu akerianut wok, aso eyangarit eong noi adumun atalantan nuajokak. Kanu aitodolikin ngun, abu eong ibwaik agogongu keda ikapun luipu kanu awanyun ebe ijaasi sio keda eswamak luajokak.
lgg_prompt: Amuti okporu sizu ri eri orodriru drile suza amavileri ni, ka'dini ma 'ba e'yo okporu 'ba talanta kililiru 'diyi esuzu ri ma dria. E'yo 'di 'yezu, a'ba okpo angiri tualu sende be nezu ra kini ama vu azi'ba muke 'diyi ci.
nyn_prompt: Okwombeka tiimu y'amaani n'eky'omugasho aha businguzi bwaitu, n'ahabw'ekyo ntandikire kuronda etaraanta nungi. Okuhikiiriza eki, ntairemu amaani n'esente nyingi okureeba ngu twine abakozi barungi.

eng_prompt: As the competition approaches, I start organizing my plans for the event. I know that having the right support is crucial for our success.
lug_prompt: Ng'empaka zisemberera, ntandika okutegeka enteekateeka zange ez'omukolo. Nkimanyi nti okubeera n'obuyambi obutuufu kikulu nnyo eri obuwanguzi bwaffe.
ach_prompt: I kare ma pyem ne cok, acako yube pi yub ne. Angeo ni bedo ki kony matir pire tek tutwal pi cobo miti wa.
teo_prompt: Neyapiete abolobol, ageu eong aitemonokin ainapeta nuka epucit. Ajeni eong ebe ajaut keda agangat najokan ejok kanu akerianut wok.
lgg_prompt: A'bala 'da ni ecazu ogogo risi, ma e'do otuta mavile 'diyi otu omu 'da ni. Anii kini ovuzu atita kililiru be ri be ri eri orodriru ama drile suza ni.
nyn_prompt: Empaka ku zirikuhika haihi,ntandika kutebeekanisa enteekateeka zangye z'omukoro. Nimanya ngu okugira obuhwezi obuhikire n'eky'omugasho aha businguzi bwaitu.

eng_prompt: To achieve our goals effectively, it's crucial that we collaborate and support one another. Teamwork will enhance our productivity and foster a positive work environment.
lug_prompt: Okusobola okutuukiriza ebiruubirirwa byaffe obulungi, kikulu nnyo okukolera awamu n'okuwagiragana. Okukolera awamu kijja kutumbula ebikolebwa byaffe n'embeera y'emirimu ennungi.
ach_prompt: Me cobo miti wa maber, pire tek tutwal ni watii kacelo dok wakonyre. Tic kacelo obi medo rwom me tic wa ki bene kelo ber bedo ikin lutic.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitodolikin alosikinetekosi ejok, ibusakinit oni aiswamanar ka aigangakin yenice. Aswam nepepe itojokari aswam wok ido ijaikini oni aswam ejok.
lgg_prompt: Asisile amavile 'diyi esuzu kililiru, eri orodriru amani ti ecizu azini ama atizu ama eselea. Azi ngazu tualu ri ni nga azi ngaza amavile ri ma omgbo otu dika eri nga angu azi ngazu muke ri ma omgbo otu.
nyn_prompt: Okuhikiiriza kurungi ebigyendererwa byaitu, n'eky'omugasho kukwatanisa n'okuhagana. Okukorera hamwe nikiija kutunguura emikorere yaitu kandi kireeteho embeera nungi y'okukoreramu.

eng_prompt: Staying healthy has always been a priority for me, so I make it a point to incorporate physical activity into my daily routine. Whether it's hitting the gym or going for a run, I believe that consistency is key to maintaining my fitness.
lug_prompt: Okusigala nga ndi mulamu bulungi kye kintu kye nkulembeza mu bulamu bwange, n'olw'ekyo nfuba okukola dduyiro buli lunaku. Ka kibeere kugenda mu jjiimu oba ku misinde, nzikiriza nti obutagwa butaka kye kisumuluzo ky'okusigala nga ndi mulamu bulungi.
ach_prompt: Bedo ma komwa yot obedo gin ma pire tek tutwal ki bota, pi meno amoko tamma me timo jami mapat-pat me kom nino ducu. Kadi bed ni atye ka ngwec I ot yat onyo I ngwec, atye ki niyee ni bedo ka ngwec kare ki kare obedo gin ma pire tek me gwoko yotkom mega.
teo_prompt: Ajaut keda angaleu arai duc ibore yenepol noi kaneejai eong, aso aswam eong iboro luiswamaete eong kanginipaaran. Arai ejai eong toma aiboisit naejok arai bo alosit akerit, eyuunit eong ebe ainapakina nes elacet loka aidar angaleuka.
lgg_prompt: Aa'ta rua ala be ri ebi ovu e'yo okporu ma driari'i, ka 'dini ma 'ba e'yo avita ni 'diyi ma alia o'du driasi. Ka tro mu pari rua 'bazuri ma alia kaniku mu ongu onzuzuria, ma a'i ra kini e'yo 'yezu sawa driasi ri eri e'yo okporu ma ma rua ma ta mbazuri'i.
nyn_prompt: Okuguma nyine amagara marungi nikyo kintu kikuru munonga ahariinye, n'ahabw'ekyo ninkora enteekateeka y'okukora emirimo y'omubiri buriizooba. Yaaba n'okwejumba omu by'emizaano nainga okwiruka, ninyikiriza ngu okugumizamu nikikuru omu kuguma nyine amagara marungi.

eng_prompt: I heard you mention your plans for the future, and it got me curious. Is there a specific reason youâ€™ve decided to step away from your position?
lug_prompt: Nkuwulidde ng'oyogera ku nteekateeka zo ez'ebiseera eby'omu maaso era kyandeetera okwagala okumanya ebisingawo.
ach_prompt: Awinyo ka iloko i kom yub ma itye kwede pi anyim, man omiyo abedo ki miti me ngeyo jami mapol.
teo_prompt: Abu eong apupun jo inera nuikamunitos ainapeta kon nuka oingaren, ido abu eong akoto aijen.
lgg_prompt: Ma eri mi e'yo nze otita mini ewu drialeri ni 'diyi ma dria, azini eri fe ma dri ava ra.
nyn_prompt: Nkahurira nogamba aha nteekateeka zaawe ez'omubiro bya nyensya, kandi kikandeetera kwenda kumanya.

eng_prompt: After months of declining performance and employee dissatisfaction, the board of directors convened to discuss the future direction of the organization. They concluded that a new approach was necessary to revitalize the company.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'emyezi gy'okukendeera kw'omutindo gw'emirimu n'obutali bumativu bw'abakozi, akakiiko ka badayirekita kaatuula okukubaganya ebirowoozo ku ngeri ekibiina gye kiddukanyizibwamu mu biseera eby'omu maaso. Baamaliriza nti enkola empya yeetaagibwa okuzzaawo kampuni.
ach_prompt: Ingee dwe mapol me poto pa rwom me tic ki cwer cwiny pa lutic, dul pa ludor dul enoni gubedo kacoke me nywako tam i kom kit ma dul enoni omyero otii kwede ikare me anyim. Gumoko ni yoo manyen mite me roco dul ne.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ilapio luka aibiror naka eswamae loajokan keda amamut aiyalama naka eswamak, apotu lukapolok luapolok iriamunos kanu aitemitem epone loebeitor atukot ngin aswam koingaren. Apotu kesi ongetakisi ebe ibusakinit aitodolikin iponesio luitetiak kanu aisiteteun ekampuni.
lgg_prompt: Mba 'bani azi ngazu muke ku azini azi'ba eyini aa'zu ayikosi ku 'diyi ma vutia, board of directors ru 'diyi tra eyi agbatara gbazu driceza amuti 'da ni ewu drialeri ma alea ri ma dria. Eyi esu e'yo kini geri azi o'diru ni eri orodriru amuti 'da ma edri engazu o'diru.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'ameezi g'okukyendeera kw'emirimo hamwe n'obutetegyerezibwa bw'abakozi, akakiiko k'abebembezi kakateerana kuhanuura aha nkora y'ekitongore omu biro by'omumaisho. Bakahendera ngu enkora ensya ekaba neeyetengwa kugarura busya kampuni.

eng_prompt: After years of contemplation and exploration, I finally feel a sense of clarity about my future. It's as if the pieces of my aspirations are starting to come together.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okufumiitiriza n'okunoonyereza okumala emyaka, kati nnina kye mmanyi ku biseera byange eby'omu maaso. Kiringa ebitundu by'ebigendererwa byange bitandise okukwatagana.
ach_prompt: Ingee mwaki mapol me lwodo lok ki kwedo jami, dong atye ki ngec matut I kom anyim mega. Obedo calo jami weng ma onongo amito tye ka cobo miti na.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ikar luipu luka aomoom keda aingic, apotu eong apuputu aijen nuikamunitos oingaren ka. Esubit bala egeunete aiboisio nuka apeleikinata ka aimorikikin nepepe.
lgg_prompt: Eli 'bani e'yo egazu azini e'yo ondazu 'bori ma vutia, ma asizu e'yo ega ewu ma vile drialeri ma dria ra. Eri ekile e'yo mani leleri ni e'do yi ecizu tualu le.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'emyaka mingi y'okuteekateeka n'okucondooza, mperize kwetegyereza gye ebiro byangye by'omumaisho. Nikireebeka nk'ebicweka by'ebigyendererwa byangye biriyo nibitandika kukwatanisa.

eng_prompt: As individuals approach the later stages of their careers, they often begin to reflect on their future and what it means to step away from work. This contemplation leads to various misconceptions about the true essence of retirement.
lug_prompt: Abantu bwebasemberera entandikwa y'emirimu gyabwe, batandika okulowooza ku biseera byabwe ebyomumaaso n'ekitegeeza okuva ku mirimu. Okufumiitiriza kuno kuleeta endowooza ez'enjawulo enkyamu ku nsonga entuufu ey'okuwummula.
ach_prompt: Ka dano tye ka oo I rwom ma lamal me ticgi, pol kare gi cako tam I kom anyimgi ki ngo ma obedo me weko tic. Lwodo lok man kelo tam ma pe atir I kom tyen lok ma pire tek me weko tic.
teo_prompt: Neyapiete itunga aiboisio nuapolok nuka aswamukec, egeunete kesi aomoom nuikamunitos ngaren kec keda apolou na ajalakin aswam. Aomoom ngun eyangauni aomisio nuarokok nuikamunitos ajokis naka aiyengun kotoma aswam.
lgg_prompt: Ba alu alu ka mu drile e'yo eyini 'ye 'diyi ma alea, eyi e'do e'yo ega ewu eyivile drialeri ma dria azini e'yo 'bani azi kuzu ja ri ma dria. E'yo 'di ni fe 'ba eyini egata onzi eyi ma dria e'yo 'bani azi kuzu ri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Abantu ku barikuhika aha muheru gw'emirimo yaabo, nibatandika kuteekateeka aha biro byabo eby'omumaisho n'eki kirikumanyisa kuruga aha mirimo. Okuteekateeka nikureetaho ebiteekateeko ebitahikire ebikwatiraine n'omugasho gw'okuhuumura aha mirimo.

eng_prompt: Many individuals chase after material possessions, convinced that financial success will lead to fulfillment. However, I find it hard to accept that true happiness can be measured by the size of one's bank account.
lug_prompt: Abantu bangi baluubirira eby'obugagga nga balowooza nti obuwanguzi mu by'ensimbi bujja kubasobozesa okuba abamativu. Kyokka, nkisanga nga kizibu okukkiriza nti essanyu erya nnamaddala liyinza okupimibwa ku bunene bwa akawunta y'omuntu mu bbanka.
ach_prompt: Dano mapol giyenyo jami me kom, kun gi tamo ni cente ma dano tye kwede kelo yengo. Kadi bed kumeno, anongo tek tutwal me ye ni yomcwiny me ada kipimo ki wel cente ma ngat moni tye kwede I beng.
teo_prompt: Itunga luipu ekotosi adumun iboro luipu, eomitos ebe akerianut naka ikapun eyauni aiyalama. Konye, etionikinit eong acamun ebe epedorio ajenun aiyalama naka itunganan kotoma aingadis naka ikapun.
lgg_prompt: Ba karakara eyi afa lonyiru 'diyi ma vuti obi asi'baza be kini drile suza robia ma alea ri ni nga eyi ma idri 'bazu ayikosi. Kani si, ma isu eri mbazaru a'izu kini 'ba eco ayiko a'da ri ma omgbo o'bi robia 'ba alu ma dria ero robia ta mbazuri ma ongmbo si ra.
nyn_prompt: Abantu baingi nibaronda eby'obutungi, barikwikiriza ngu obusinguzi omu by'empiiha nibwija kubareetera okumarwa. Kwonka, nikingumira kwikiriza ngu okushemererwa okwabuzima nikubaasa kupimibwa kurugirira aha ntatsya ya akawunti yaawe omu banka.

eng_prompt: After years of hard work and dedication, I have come to a realization about what truly matters in life. My focus has shifted away from financial success and towards personal fulfillment and happiness.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'emyaka mingi nga nkola n'obunyiikivu, nkitegedde ekikulu mu bulamu. Essira lyange likyuse okuva ku buwanguzi mu by'ensimbi ne ligenda ku kwematiza n'essanyu.
ach_prompt: Ingee mwaki mapol me tic matek ki keto cwiny, dong aniang I kom ngo ma pire tek I kwo. Aketo cwinya tutwalle I kom nongo yomcwiny ki nongo cente.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ikar luipu luka aswam kagogong keda ainakina, abu eong ajen nuepolok noi kotoma aijar. Ajalakinit eong aomisio nuka akerianut kotoma ikapun kosodi aitodolikin eong aiyalama keda aiyalama.
lgg_prompt: Eli 'bani azi ngazu avasi azini asi feza be 'bori ma vutia, ma esu e'yo e'yo orodriru idri ma alia 'diyi ma dria ra. Asi 'baza mavileri oja i engazu drile suza e'yo robianisi ri ma dria ri ma dria dika asi 'baza ma ngulupi niri ma dria azini ayiko ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'emyaka mingi y'okukora n'amaani n'okwehayo, mperize kumanya ekikuru omu magara. Ekigyendererwa kyangye kihindukire okuruga aha businguzi omu by'empiiha nkaza aha kumarwa n'okushemererwa.

eng_prompt: In an effort to combat climate change and promote sustainability, I decided to take action. One of the initiatives I chose to support was focused on reforestation efforts.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'okulwanyisa enkyukakyuka y'obudde n'okutumbula obuwangaazi, nasalawo okubaako kye nkolawo. Ekimu ku bintu bye nnasalawo okuwagira kwe kusimba ebibira.
ach_prompt: I tute me lweny i kom alokaloka pa piny ki dongo lobo, amoko tamma me timo gin mo. Yub acel ma ayero me cwako obedo yub me gwoko bunga.
teo_prompt: Kotoma aswam na aitiji aijulujuleta nuka ekuse ka etepe ka aitopoloria aijar naka itunga, abu eong aseun aswam ngun. Adiopet koboro luakoto eong aigang ngesi nuikamunitos aira ikito.
lgg_prompt: Okpo 'bazu a'di 'dizu e'yo angu mile ni ojazu ri be azini e'yo angu ma ta mbazu ri ma omgbo otuzu, asi 'du e'yo 'yezu ra. E'yo azi alu mani le atita fezu ri ndra okpo 'bazu pati eyi ma ta mbazu ri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Omu kaweefube w'okurwanisa empindahinduka y'obwire n'okutunguura eby'obuhangwa, nkacwamu kugira eki naakora. Kimwe aha bintu ebi nashemereire kushagika, n'okushara emiti.

eng_prompt: The investigation has revealed several suspicious activities surrounding your business dealings. Authorities are now questioning your methods and motives in the industry.
lug_prompt: Okunoonyereza kuzudde ebikolwa bingi ebiteeberezebwa okwetoloola bizinensi yo. Ab'obuyinza kati babuusabuusa enkola yo n'ebigendererwa byo mu mulimu.
ach_prompt: Kwed ne onyutu jami mapol ma byek tye I komgi I kom biacara meggi. Lutela kombedi gitye ki akala-kala I kom yoo ki miti ma itye kwede I tenge enoni.
teo_prompt: Abu aingic kitodu iboro luipu lu eomitai ebe iswamaete kesi kotoma obiasarakec. Eutasi kwana apedorosio abuonokin iwaitin ka apeleikinata kon kotoma okampuni kalo.
lgg_prompt: E'yo eti ondaza 'da e'da e'yo onzi eyi 'yepi tujari mini 'diyi ma alea 'diyi karakara. Okpo e'ipi eyi curu'do e'yo zi geri mini eyi 'yezu 'diyi ma dria tualu egata mini okalamvu 'di ma alea 'diyi pie.
nyn_prompt: Okucondooza kworeka emirimo mingi etarikwetegyerezibwa omu bizinesi yaawe. Ab'obushoborozi hati nibabangaanisa emiringo yaawe n'ebigyendererwa byawe omu by'obushubuzi.

eng_prompt: Given the current market conditions and the challenges we've observed, it's clear that many companies are struggling to keep up. I believe we have a significant advantage over them.
lug_prompt: Okusinziira ku mbeera y'akatale eriwo kati n'okusoomoozebwa kwe tulabye, kyeyoleka bulungi nti kkampuni nnyingi zirwana okukwatagana. Nzikiriza nti tulina enkizo ya maanyi ku bo.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki jami matye katime kombedi I cuk ki peko ma waneno, nen atyer kamaleng ni kamponi mapol tye ka tute matek me medde anyim. Atye ki niyee ni watye ki gum madit tutwal I komgi.
teo_prompt: Kowai kalo ejautene lo esokoni keda atiokisio nu iwanyunit sio, ecai cut ebe eutasi ikampunin luipu ainingosit aidar. Iyuunit eong ebe ija oni keda arerengu naepol adepar kesi.
lgg_prompt: E'yo curu'do e'yo cuu ni 'diyi ma dria azini e'yo ewaru amani ndre 'diyi ma dria, eri e'da kililiru kini amuti karakara eyi dri ci e'yo 'yezu. Ma a'i ra kini ama ma drileba angiri ndeni aga yi ra.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'embeera y'akatare eriho hati hamwe n'oburemeezi obu twareebire, nikyoreka butunu ngu kampuni nyingi niziteganisibwa kugumaho. Ninyikiriza ngu twine obusinguzi bw'amaani aharibo.

eng_prompt: The management team has failed to implement any incentive programs. As a result, employee engagement and productivity have significantly declined.
lug_prompt: Ttiimu y'abakulembeze eremereddwa okussa mu nkola pulogulaamu zonna ezisikiriza. N'ekivuddemu, obunyiikivu bw'abakozi n'ebikolebwa bikendedde nnyo.
ach_prompt: Dul ma doro tic ne pe guketo yub mo keken me cuku cwiny I tic. Macalo adwogi ne, miti pa lutic ki tic gi ojwik tutwal.
teo_prompt: Epiko etimu loka eyaitene aitegear ainapeta nu isinyikokinete itunga. Kanuka ngun, ekidiokoto aswam naka eswamak keda aswam kec.
lgg_prompt: Amuti driceza ni 'diyi o'bi otita e'yo otuza ni 'diyi 'ba ti. E'yo 'disi, azi'ba eyi ma ava tualu e'yo eyini 'ye 'diyi pie esi ra.
nyn_prompt: Tiimu y'abebembezi eremirwe kuta omu nkora enteekateeka yoona y'okushemeza abantu. N'ekyarugiremu, abakozi okukora n'okukora gye bikyendeire munonga.

eng_prompt: The company has been facing significant challenges in recent months, including budget cuts and a lack of clear direction. As a result, many of their employees have left the organization.
lug_prompt: Kampuni ebadde eyolekaganye n'okusoomoozebwa okw'amaanyi mu myezi egiyise, omuli okusala ku mbalirira n'obutaba na ndagiriro ntegerekeka. N'ekyavaamu, bangi ku bakozi baabwe bavudde mu kitongole.
ach_prompt: Dul ne obedo kanongo peko mapol I dwe ma okato ni, I kingi obedo ngolo byek me lim ki bedo peke pa yoo matir. Macalo adwogi ne, luticgi mapol guweko dul ne.
teo_prompt: Etereikina ekampuni keda atiokisio nuepolok noi kotoma ilapio lu atuboros, aimoriarit aitub ebajet keda amamus na aingarenikinio. Kanuka ngun, apotu eswamakakec luipu kojalakisi atukot.
lgg_prompt: Amuti nderi ebi dri fu e'yo ewaru amboru be mba agapi 'diyi ma alia, ekile bajeti ma omgbo esizu azini driceza kililiru ma ako be. E'yo 'disi, azi'ba yini 'diyi ma karakara ku amuti nde ra.
nyn_prompt: Kampuni etwire neetunga oburemeezi bw'amaani omu myezi ehingwireho, otwariiremu okukyendeeza aha mbaririra hamwe n'okuburwa obuhabuzi burungi. Ekyarugiremu, abakozi baabo abaingi barugire omu kitongore.

eng_prompt: We need to remain vigilant and assess the market trends carefully. Overconfidence can lead to complacency, and we must not underestimate our rivals.
lug_prompt: Twetaaga okusigala nga tuli bulindaala era ne twekenneenya enkulaakulana y'akatale n'obwegendereza. Okwekkiririzaamu ekisukkiridde kusobola okutuviirako okwetamwa, era tetulina kunyooma bavuganya baffe.
ach_prompt: Omyero wabed ma wangwa twolo dok watam matut I kom jami matye katime I cuk. Bedo ki tek cwiny tutwal twero weko wabedo ma cwiny wa opye mot, dok omyero pe waca jo ma pyem kwedwa kwedgi.
teo_prompt: Ibusakinit oni asalakin acoikina ka airereonor akiro nuka esokoni ejok. Amuno naepol eyangauni aiyalama, ido mam ibusakinit oni aitidisiar lueboloboloete keda oni.
lgg_prompt: Le ama ma aa mile be azini ama ma one e'yo cuu ni 'diyi geri kililiru si. Asi'baza angiri ri eco fe 'ba eyini aa'zu asi'baza ru, dika le ama ma 'du 'ba a'bala 'bapi ama be 'diyi ma omgbo ele ku.
nyn_prompt: Twine kuguma tutegyendesereize kandi twetegyereze gye eby'obushuubuzi. Okwetegyeka munonga nikubaasa kurugwamu okwetomboita, kandi titushemereire kutwara abarikuhakana naitwe nk'abataine mugasho.

eng_prompt: After carefully reviewing their financial options, they decided it was time to invest in something more secure. With a plan in mind, they headed to the local bank to explore their choices.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okwekenneenya n'obwegendereza enkola zaabwe ez'ensimbi, baasalawo nti kye kiseera okusiga ensimbi mu kintu ekisinga okuba eky'obukuumi. Nga balina enteekateeka mu birowoozo, baayolekera bbanka y'omu kitundu okunoonyereza ku ngeri gye bayinza okusalawo.
ach_prompt: Ingee ngiyo kit ma gitwero tic kwede ki limgi, gumoko ni kare dong oromo me keto limgi I gin mo matye ki ber bedo. Ki yub I wigi, gucito I beng me tedero me niang ngo ma omyero gutim.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka airereonor ejok iwaitin kec luka ikapun, apotu kesi koseutu ebe erai apak naka aipikakin ikapunukec toma ibore yen eyuara. Keda aitemonokineta, apotu kesi koloto aingadis naka ikapun kanu airereor aseununeta kec.
lgg_prompt: Yi vile geri robia esuzu 'diyi ma ale andrizu kililiru 'bori ma vutia, eyi 'du e'yo kini sa'wa ca 'bo 'bani robia ayuzu afa azi muke ndeni 'diyi ma alea. Otita eyi ma dria, eyi mu erojo eyivile angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ma alea e'yo eyi 'yepi 'diyi ma ale andrizu.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okushwijuma n'obwegyendesereza eshonga zaabo z'esente, bakasharamu ngu n'obwire bw'okuta esente zaabo omu bintu ebindi. Baine enteekateeka omu biteekateeko, bakaza omu banka y'omukyanga okucondooza aha nshonga zaabo.

eng_prompt: In response to the growing demand for investment opportunities, the financial institution is exploring various strategies to bolster its capital. As part of this initiative, the bank has plans to issue another eighty billion shillings for bonds.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula obwetaavu obweyongera obw'emikisa gy'okusiga ensimbi, ekitongole ky'ebyensimbi kinoonyereza ku ngeri ez'enjawulo ez'okutumbula entandikwa yaakyo. Ng'omu ku kaweefube ono, bbanka erina enteekateeka okufulumya obuwumbi bwa siringi obulala kinaana ku bbondi.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me mede pa miti me keto lim I biyacara, dul ma loyo lok kom lim tye ka yenyo yoo mapat-pat me medo limgi. Macalo but yub man, beng tye ki yub me kelo ciling bilyon pyer aboro mukene me wilo bondi.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin eipuda lo eyatakinet loka aipikakin ikapun, euta erionget loka ikapun aingic iwaitin luegelegela kanu aitogogong ikapunukec. Kwape ediopet koboro kalu, ejai aingadis naka ikapun aitemonokin aitolomun ibilionin akaisakanyauni luka ikapun.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'bani lezu drileba lonyi vuti aleza ni 'diyi ma omgbo tuzu ri ma e'yosi, amuti robiani 'diyi geri ndundu eyi onda eyini ecozu eyi ma robia ayuzu ri ma omgbo otuzu. E'yo 'di ma azi ru, ero robia ta mbazuri ma otuta silingi bilioni kali aro 'diyi fezu 'ba yi dri.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okweyongyera kw'abantu abarikwenda kutamu sente omu by'obushubuzi, ekitongore ky'esente kiriyo nikicondooza emiringo etari emwe n'emwe y'okwongyera aha ntatsya yakyo. Nk'emwe aha nteekateeka egi, banka eine enteekateeka y'okushohoza obuhumbi bwa siringi makumi munaana.

eng_prompt: Recent advancements in telecommunications have led to significant improvements in network infrastructure. As a result, users can now experience enhanced connectivity on their devices.
lug_prompt: Enkulaakulana mu by'empuliziganya eyaliwo gye buvuddeko yaleetedde enkulaakulana ey'amaanyi mu nkola y'ebyempuliziganya. N'ekivuddemu, abakozesa kati basobola okufuna okuyungibwa okulongooseddwa ku byuma byabwe.
ach_prompt: Dongo lobo ma otime cokcok-ki I lok angeya okelo dongo lobo madit tutwal I kabedo me kubu lok angeya. Macalo adwogi ne, lutic kombedi twero nongo kubbe maber I kom nyonyo gi.
teo_prompt: Apol naka akiro nuka isimun nes ayangau aitojokaario naepol noi naka iponesio luka elago. Kanuka ngun, epedorete kwana etosomak adumun arucokina naejok noi kolago kec.
lgg_prompt: Zota o'diru e'yo o'dukoti edrizu 'diyi ma alia 'diyi fe otuta angiri e'yo o'dukoti edrizu 'diyi ma alia. E'yo 'disi, 'ba ayupi 'diyi eco curu'do e'yo yi ecizu yi ma afa ayuzaru 'diyi ma dria 'diyi esu ra.
nyn_prompt: Entunguuka omu by'empurizagana eherize kubaho, ereesireho entunguuka omu by'empurizagana. N'ekyarugiremu, abarikukoresa obwahati nibabaasa kuhikwaho empurizana nungi aha byoma byabo.

eng_prompt: Collaboration is key to maximizing our investment potential and making informed decisions. By pooling our knowledge and resources, we can achieve greater success as a team.
lug_prompt: Okukwatagana kye kisumuluzo ky'okutumbula obusobozi bwaffe obw'okusiga ensimbi n'okukola okusalawo okulungi. Bwe tukolera awamu amagezi gaffe n'ebikozesebwa byaffe, tusobola okutuuka ku buwanguzi obw'amaanyi nga ttiimu.
ach_prompt: Winye obedo gin ma pire tek tutwal me medo kerowa me keto lim I biyacara ki moko tam matye ki ngec matut. Ka waribo ngecwa ki jami ma watye kwede, watwero nongo loc madit macalo dul acel.
teo_prompt: Erai aiswamanara ibore yenepol noi kanu aitodolikin apedorosiowok nuka aipikakin ikapun toma akwap keda aitolomun aseununeta nuajokak. Kowai lo aimorikikin acoa wok keda iboro, ipedori oni aitodolikin akerianut kwape etimu.
lgg_prompt: Ti ecita eri okpo e'yo ama vile lonyi vuti alezani 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu azini e'yo 'duza kililiru 'diyi 'yezu. E'yo amani nile azini afa amani 'diyi 'bazu tualurisi, ama eco drile suza amboru isu amuti ru ra.
nyn_prompt: Okukwatanisa nikikuru munonga omu kutunguura eby'obushubuzi n'okukora encwamu nungi. Twagaita obwengye bwaitu n'ebintu byaitu, nitubaasa kuhika aha businguzi bw'amaani nka tiimu.

eng_prompt: The bank had been striving for excellence in its operations and customer service for several years. As part of the evaluation process, industry experts assessed various metrics to determine the top contenders.
lug_prompt: Bbanka ebadde efubutuka okutumbula enkola yaayo n'obuweereza eri bakasitoma okumala emyaka egiwerako. Ng'ekitundu ku nkola y'okukebera, abakugu mu makolero beekenneenyezza ebipimo eby'enjawulo okuzuula abavuganya ab'oku ntikko.
ach_prompt: Bang eni obedo ka yele me timo ticgi maber tutwal ki miyo kony bot luwil pi mwaki mapol. Macalo but yub me ngiyo kit ma jami tye kwede, ludiro me biacara gutimo kwed mapat-pat me niang anga ma tye ka pyem matek loyo weng.
teo_prompt: Auta aingadis naka ikapun aswam kagogong kotoma aswamuke keda aijanakin ikasitomas ke adaun ikar luipu. Kwape ediope kotoma ainwakio, apotu ipiriotin luka ekampuni owanyutu iponesio luegelegela kanu ajenun lueboloboloete noi.
lgg_prompt: Ero robia ta mbazu 'da ebi okpo 'ba e'yo erini 'ye 'diyi ma alea azini azakoma fezu aje'ba eyini ri ma alea eli karakara. E'yo eti ondaza ma azi ru, 'ba onita angiri be okalamvu 'da ma alea 'diyi andri geri ndundu eyini ecozu 'ba a'bala 'yepi okporu ndeni 'diyi esuzu.
nyn_prompt: Banka etwire negyezaho kukora kurungi omu mirimo yaayo hamwe n'okuheereza abaguzi baayo okumara emyaka mingi. Nk'emwe aha nkora y'okushwijuma, abakugu omu by'obushubuzi bakashwijuma ebintu bitari bimwe na bimwe kumanya abarikukirayo.

eng_prompt: Before making any financial decisions, one must carefully consider the various factors that can influence market trends. Having reliable information sources is crucial for informed investment choices.
lug_prompt: Nga tonnaba kukola kusalawo kwonna mu by'ensimbi, omuntu alina okulowooza n'obwegendereza ku nsonga ez'enjawulo eziyinza okukosa entambula y'akatale. Okubeera n'ensibuko y'amawulire eyeesigika kya mugaso nnyo mu kusalawo kw'okusiga ensimbi.
ach_prompt: Mapwod pe imoko tam mo keken malube ki lok me lim, omyero kong itam matut I kom jami mapat-pat matwero kelo alokaloka I cuk. Bedo ki kabedo me nongo ngec ma gene pire tek tutwal pi moko tam mabeco me keto lim I biyacara.
teo_prompt: Erongo itolomuna aseununeta nuka ikapun, ekot itunganan airereor akiro nuegelegela nuepedorete aitodolikin epone loka esokoni. Ajaut keda aiboisio nu itigogongoritai ejok kanu aipikakin ikapun toma akwap.
lgg_prompt: De nga po'di 'ba azi 'duni e'yo robia ni 'diyi ma dria ku, le 'ba ma ega e'yo ndundu ecopi e'yo cuu ni 'diyi ojapi 'diyi ma dria. Ovuzu geri 'bani ecozu e'yo nzezu kililiru 'diyi be ri eri orodriru e'yo lonyi vuti aleza ni 'diyi 'duzu kililiru.
nyn_prompt: Omuntu atakacwiremu ahaby'empiiha, ashemereire kubanza yaamanya enshonga nyingi ezirikubaasa kureetaho entunguuka omu by'obushuubuzi. Okugira oburugo bw'amakuru oburikwesigwa n'obw'omugasho omu by'obushubuzi.

eng_prompt: The organization qualifies for certain tax exemptions under Ugandan law. As a result, it is not liable to pay stamp duty in Uganda.
lug_prompt: Ekitongole kirina ebisaanyizo okusonyiyibwa emisolo egimu mu mateeka ga Uganda. N'ekivuddemu, tekirina buvunaanyizibwa kusasula musolo gwa sitampu mu Uganda.
ach_prompt: Dul ne tye ki twero me gamo mucoro mogo malube ki cik me lobo Uganda. Macalo adwogi ne, pe tye ki twero me culu mucoro I lobo Uganda.
teo_prompt: Ibusakinit atukot ngin alacakin isolosinei ice kotoma okisila luko Uganda. Kanuka ngun, mam ibusakinit aitac esolo koUganda.
lgg_prompt: Amuti 'da ma kokobi 'bani ecozu musoro ofezu 'diyi ma azi eyi ma dria ci azita kari Uganda niri ma alea. E'yo 'disi, eri ma dria e'yo 'bani eri ma musoro ofezu kari Uganda niri ma alea ri yo.
nyn_prompt: Ekitongore kiine ebirikwetengyesa kusharwamu emishoro omu biragiro bya Uganda. N'ekyarugiremu, tikishemereire kushashura omushoro omu Uganda.

eng_prompt: To foster a more collaborative work environment, it's essential for him to clarify the team's goals and expectations. Miscommunication has led to confusion among employees, impacting overall productivity.
lug_prompt: Okutumbula embeera y'emirimu ey'okukwatagana, kyamugaso nnyo gy'ali okutangaaza ebigendererwa bya ttiimu n'ebisuubirwa. Obuzibu mu mpuliziganya buviiriddeko okutabulwa mu bakozi, ekikosa emirimu okutwalira awamu.
ach_prompt: Pi yubu kabedo me tic ma winye tye iye, pire tek tutwal ni en omyero otit miti ki miti pa luticce. Nywako lok marac okelo anywena-nywena ikin lutic ma balo tic gi.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitopolor eswamae loimorikikina, ejokuna ngesi aitijenar alosikineta keda aomisio nuka etimu. Amamus na einer eyangauni aitolitol kanejaas eswamak, ido itolitoli aswam kec.
lgg_prompt: Azi ngaza tualu ri ma omgbo otuzu, eri orodriru eri dri asisile amuti nde ni 'diyi azini e'yo erini ega 'diyi ecezu. E'yo nzeza onzi ri fe 'ba azi ngapi 'diyi ma eselea e'yo eyi erezu ku, dika e'yo 'yepi 'diyi eza ra.
nyn_prompt: Okureetaho embeera y'okukorera hamwe, nikikuru ngu ashoboorore ebi tiimu erikwenda n'ebi erikwetenga. Okuhurizagana kubi kureesireho okubuzabuzibwa omu bakozi, ekirikuteganisa emirimo yaabo.

eng_prompt: In a rapidly changing market, effective leadership requires a deep awareness of both internal dynamics and external challenges. A successful leader must navigate the complexities of competition while fostering a resilient team.
lug_prompt: Mu katale akakyuka amangu, obukulembeze obulungi bwetaaga okumanya okw'amaanyi ku nkyukakyuka ez'omunda n'okusoomoozebwa okw'ebweru. Omukulembeze omuwanguzi alina okuyita mu buzibu bw'okuvuganya ng'ate akuza ttiimu ey'amaanyi.
ach_prompt: I cuk matye ka loke oyot-oyot tutwal, tela maber mito ngec matut tutwal I kom jami matye katimme I lobo kacel ki peko mapat-pat matye I lobo ma woko. Latela ma olony omyero okat I pyem matek tutwal I kare ma tye ka dongo dul pa lutic matye ki kero.
teo_prompt: Kotoma ojautene loepol noi loka esokoni, ekoto engarenone loajokan aijen nuikamunitos aijulanakineta nuka akwapuwok keda nuka akwapin nukokinga. Ibusakinit engarenon loekerianara aitodolikin akiro nuka abolobol kosodi aitolomun etimu loepedori aswam ejok.
lgg_prompt: Cu ojapi mbeleru ri ma alea, driceza kililiru ri le 'ba ma ni e'yo angu ma alia 'diyi tualu e'yo ewaru amveleru 'diyi pie. Le drice'ba drile suzaru ri ma nga mu e'yo ewaru baka seza ni 'diyi ma alea ra erini tro amuti okporu 'diyi ezozu.
nyn_prompt: Omu by'obushuubuzi ebirikuhinduka juba, obwebembezi burungi nibwetaga okwetegyereza ebirikugyenda omu maisho hamwe n'oburemeezi oburi aheeru. Omwebembezi orikusingura ashemereire kurwanisa oburemeezi bw'okuhayahayana yaaba naakora tiimu y'amaani.

eng_prompt: In today's competitive business landscape, understanding consumer needs is crucial for success. Therefore, effective managers must develop strategies to identify and target potential customers.
lug_prompt: Mu by'obusuubuzi by'ennaku zino eby'okuvuganya, okutegeera ebyetaago by'abaguzi kikulu nnyo eri obuwanguzi. N'olw'ekyo, ba maneja abalungi bateekeddwa okukola enkola okuzuula n'okunoonya abaguzi abayinza.
ach_prompt: I kare me pyem me biacara me kareni, niang miti pa luwil pire tek tutwal pi cobo miti ne. Pi meno, ludito tic mabeco omyero gubed ki yoo me niang ki yenyo luwil.
teo_prompt: Kotoma ojautene loka ebiasara loka lolo loepol abolobol, amisiikin ipudesia luka agwelak erai ibore yenepol noi kanu akerianut. Kanuka ngun, ekot engarenok lu iswamaete ejok aitolomun iwaitin lu ajenun ka aimo agwelak.
lgg_prompt: E'yo tujari ni ewu andruri ma alea baka seza ru, vata afa 'ba afa je'baa 'diyi ma dria ri eri orodriru drile suza ni. Ka'dini, le drice'ba azi ngapi muke 'diyi ma e'do geri eyini ecozu aje'ba eyini 'diyi esuzu ra.
nyn_prompt: Omu by'obushubuzi by'erizooba, okwetegyereza ebyetengo by'abaguzi n'eky'omugasho munonga aha businguzi. N'ahabw'ekyo, ba maneja barungi, bashemereire kukora oburyo bw'okumanya n'okuronda abaguzi.

eng_prompt: In a dynamic market, companies are constantly striving to improve their products and services. This drive for excellence often stems from the presence of competitors.
lug_prompt: Mu katale akatambula, amakampuni buli kaseera gagezaako okulongoosa ebyamaguzi n'obuweereza bwago. Okwagala okukola obulungi emirundi egisinga kuva ku kubeerawo kw'abavuganya.
ach_prompt: I cuk matye ka lokke oyot-oyot tutwal, dul mapat-pat tye ka yele me yubu jami gi ki tic gi. Miti man me timo jami maber tutwal pole aa ki bot joo ma pyem kwedgi.
teo_prompt: Kotoma osokoni loegogong noi, eutasi ikampunin aswam kagogong kanu aitojokar iborokec keda aijaanakinikec. Alosikinet naka aitodolikin iboro ejok elomunit kotoma ajaut naka abolobol.
lgg_prompt: Cu 'di ma alea, amuti eyi okpo 'ba sa'wa driasi afa eyini ede 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu azini azakoma eyini fe 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu. E'yo 'bani lezu e'yo onyiru 'yezu ri ni tutuni enga 'ba baka sepi 'diyi ma e'yosi.
nyn_prompt: Omu katare akarikugyenda omu maisho, kampuni niziguma nizigyezaho kutunguura ebintu byazo n'obuheereza bwazo. Ekigyendererwa ky'okutunguuka nikireetwa abarikuhakana.

eng_prompt: Fostering a collaborative work environment is essential for enhancing productivity and creativity. Encouraging open communication can lead to innovative solutions and a stronger team dynamic.
lug_prompt: Okutumbula embeera y'emirimu ey'okukwatagana kya mugaso nnyo mu kutumbula obuyiiya n'obuyiiya. Okukubiriza okuwuliziganya mu bwesimbu kisobola okuleetawo okuyiiya n'okukolagana okw'amaanyi mu ttiimu.
ach_prompt: Yubu kabedo me tic ma winye tye iye pire tek tutwal pi medo rwom me tic ki diro me tic. Cuku cwiny dano me lok labongo lageng twero kelo yoo manyen me cobo peko mapat-pat kacel ki kero me tic kacel.
teo_prompt: Aitopolor ewai lo aiswamanara nes ejok kanu aitopolor aswam keda acoa. Aisinyikokit einer kopone kaloejok epedori ayangaun aitemonokineta nuitetiak ka aiswamanara.
lgg_prompt: Azi ngaza tualu ri ma omgbo otuzu ri eri orodriru azi ngaza ma omgbo otuzu. E'yo nzeza ngmboru ri ma ava fezu ri eco fe e'yo ndundu eyi ma aza kozu tualu e'yo ti icita ni okporu 'diyi pie.
nyn_prompt: Okureetaho embeera y'okukorera hamwe, n'eky'omugasho omu kutunguura eby'okukora n'okujumbura. Okureetaho empurizagana y'amazima, nikibaasa kureetaho okujumbura n'okukwatanisa kw'amaani omu tiimu.

eng_prompt: Despite the vast diversity in products and services offered, the underlying motivation for businesses remains consistent. Regardless of the sector, companies strive to maximize their profits and ensure sustainability.
lug_prompt: Newankubadde waliwo ebyamaguzi n'obuweereza obw'enjawulo, ekigendererwa kya bizinensi kye kimu. Ka kibeere kitongole ki, amakampuni gakola butaweera okulaba nga gafuna amagoba mangi n'okuwangaala.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni jami ki tic mapat-pat tye mapol tutwal, miti pa lutim biacara pud tye marom. Labongo tamo I kom tenge mo keken, dul mapat-pat tute matek me nongo magoba madit dok bene me bedo ki kwo maber.
teo_prompt: Karaida egelegela iboro keda ejanakine lo ijaikitai, epone ediope lo isinyikokit itunga aswam ebiasara. Karaida ejaasi kesi toma orionget adio, ekot ikampunin aswam kagogongu kanu adumun ameda naepol noi.
lgg_prompt: Afa edeza azini azakoma fele 'diyi ma esele cozu ra ti, e'yo tujari 'yepi 'diyi ma ava fepi 'diyi awi alu. Esele ciri ma talasi, amuti eyi okpo 'ba orodri eyini esu 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu eyini ani aa'zu ewu drialeri ma alea.
nyn_prompt: N'obu haraabe hariho ebintu bingi n'obuheereza butarikushushana, ekirikureetera bizinesi kukora nikyo kimwe. Oihiremu eby'obushubuzi, kampuni nizigyezaho kwongyera amagoba gaazo n'okureeba ngu nizigumaho.

eng_prompt: Understanding how organizations function is crucial for effective management. One key aspect that influences their success is the way they are structured.
lug_prompt: Okutegeera engeri ebitongole gye bitambulamu kya mugaso nnyo eri enzirukanya ennungi. Ekimu ku bintu ebikulu ebiviirako obuwanguzi bwabwe y'engeri gye bategekeddwamu.
ach_prompt: Niang kit ma dul mapat-pat tiyo kwede pire tek tutwal pi tela maber. Gin acel ma pire tek ma weko tic gi woto maber obedo kit ma kiyubu gi kwede.
teo_prompt: Amisiikin epone loiswamata iriongeta ejok kanu eyaitene loajokan. Adiopebore naepol noi naepedori aitodolikin akerianut kec ngesi epone loitemokinitai kesi.
lgg_prompt: E'yo amuti eyini azi ngazu ri ma vata eri orodriru driceza kililiru niri ni. E'yo azi okporu drile suza yini ma driari geri 'bani yi sizu ri'I.
nyn_prompt: Okwetegyereza oku ebitongore birikukoragye n'eky'omugasho ahabw'obwebembezi burungi. Ekintu kimwe ekikuru ekirikureetaho obusinguzi n'omuringo ogu batebekanisiibwemu.

eng_prompt: In order to sustain their operations and invest in future growth, businesses must prioritize financial health. Achieving a positive bottom line is essential for long-term success and stability.
lug_prompt: Okusobola okuyimirizaawo emirimu gyabwe n'okusiga ensimbi mu kukula mu biseera eby'omu maaso, bizinensi zirina okukulembeza obulamu obulungi mu by'ensimbi. Okutuuka ku bigendererwa ebirungi kya mugaso mu buwanguzi obw'ekiseera ekiwanvu n'obutebenkevu.
ach_prompt: Me gwoko tic gi ki keto lim I dongo lobo me anyim, biacara omyero guket cente gi obed gin ma pire tek. Nongo adwogi maber pire tek tutwal pi loc ki ber bedo matye pi kare malac.
teo_prompt: Kanu aigang aswamukec ka aipikakin ikapunukec toma apol naka oingaren, ekot ebiasara aisingarenit angaleu naka ikapun. Adumunun ibore yen ejok erai ibore yenepol noi kanu akerianut na apak naepol ka ainapakina.
lgg_prompt: Azi yini 'diyi ma ta mbazu azini sende 'bazu zota ewu drialeri ma alia, le tujari eyi ma 'ba okpo e'yo robia ni 'diyi ma dria okori ma dria. E'yo orodriru 'diyi esuzu ri eri orodriru drile suza azini asianzu ewu ezu ri ni.
nyn_prompt: Eby'obushubuzi okubaasa kugumizamu n'emirimo yaabo n'okubiika esente omu kutunguuka omu biro by'omumaisho, bishemereire kwebembeza eby'esente. Okuhikiiriza ekigyendererwa kirungi n'eky'omugasho ahabw'obusinguzi n'obutebekana obwire buraingwa.

eng_prompt: In today's digital age, the demand for innovative technology solutions continues to grow exponentially. As a result, many software companies have found themselves in a lucrative position within the market.
lug_prompt: Mu mulembe gwa digito ogw'ennaku zino, obwetaavu bwa tekinologiya ow'obuyiiya bweyongedde nnyo. N'ekivuddemu, kampuni za pulogulaamu z'omutimbagano nnyingi zeesanga mu bifo eby'amagoba mu katale.
ach_prompt: I kare man me tic ki intanet, miti me nongo diro manyen me tic ki intanet tye ka mede tutwal. Macalo adwogi ne, dul mapat-pat ma yubu purugram me kompiuta gunongo ni gitye I rwom me nongo cente madit tutwal I cuk.
teo_prompt: Kotoma apakio nu nuka elago, ejai eipuda lo aitolomunun iboro luitetiak. Kanuka ngun, adumutu ikampunin luipu luka iboro luejaasi keda iboro luepedorete ayangaun ikapun luipu noi kosokoni.
lgg_prompt: E'yo tekenologiani andruri ma alia, leta afa ndundu eyi edezu 'diyi ma dria ri ni mu drile tu. E'yo 'disi, amuti software ni karakara 'diyi isu yi ma ngulupi pari orodriruni ma alia cuu ma alia.
nyn_prompt: Omu bwire bwa digito obwa hati, ekyetengo ky'okukoresa tekinorogye ey'omutaano kigumizemu kweyongyera munonga. N'ekyarugiremu, kampuni nyingi ezirikukora zaa sofutiweya zeshangire ziri omu mwanya murungi omu katare.

eng_prompt: Understanding the dynamics of market forces is essential for businesses aiming to succeed. Analyzing how various factors influence industry behavior can reveal key insights into competitive strategies.
lug_prompt: Okutegeera engeri akatale gye kakwatamu ebintu kya mugaso nnyo eri bizinensi ezigenderera okutuuka ku buwanguzi. Okwekenenya engeri ensonga ez'enjawulo gye zikosaamu enneeyisa y'amakolero kisobola okulaga amagezi amakulu ku bukodyo bw'okuvuganya.
ach_prompt: Niang kit ma biacara tye kawot kwede pire tek tutwal pi biacara matye ki miti me cobo miti gi. Ngiyo kit ma jami mapat-pat kelo kwede tim pa dul mapat-pat twero nyutu niang matut I kom yoo mapat-pat me pyem I kin dul mapat-pat.
teo_prompt: Amisiikin eipone lo iswamaere esokoni erai ibore yenepol noi kanu ibiasaran lu ekotosi akerianar. Aingic epone loepedoriata akiro nuegelegela iponesio luka ikampunin aitodun acoasinei nuepolok nuikamunitos abolobol.
lgg_prompt: E'yo cuu ma e'yo vazu ri eri orodriru tujari lepi drile suzaru 'diyini. E'yo ndundu eyi ma eti ondazu geri okalamvu eyini aa'zu ri ma dria ri eco e'yo okporu 'bani ecozu e'yo 'yezu abala eyi ma dria 'diyi ma dria ri e'da ra.
nyn_prompt: Okwetegyereza entunguuka y'obushuubuzi n'eky'omugasho omu bizinesi ezirikugyenderera obusinguzi. Okwetegyereza oku enshonga nyingi zirikukwata aha mitwarize y'amakorero nikibaasa kworeka oburyo bw'okuhayahayana.

eng_prompt: The textile industry is a complex sector influenced by various economic and environmental conditions. Understanding these influences is crucial for businesses aiming to enhance their financial performance.
lug_prompt: Ekkolero ly'eby'okwambala kitongole kizibu ekyekuusa ku mbeera z'ebyenfuna n'obutonde bw'ensi ez'enjawulo. Okutegeera ebintu bino kikulu nnyo eri bizineesi ezigenderera okutumbula enkola yaago ey'ebyensimbi.
ach_prompt: Tenge me yubo bongi obedo gin ma tek tutwal ma lok me lim ki cwec ma orumuwa aye kelo. Niang jami magi pire tek tutwal pi biacara matye ki miti me medo rwom me timo biacara gi.
teo_prompt: Ewai lo igoen erai lo etiono noi ido ejaasi keda ikapun luegelegela keda ejautene lo akwap. Amisiikin iboro lu epol ajokis kanu ibiasaran lu ekotosi aitojokar eswamae kec loka ikapun.
lgg_prompt: Okalamvu bongo niri eri esele azi kongolokoru e'yo robia ni azini angu amani aa'zu alenia 'diyi pie. E'yo 'diyi ma vata eri orodriru tujari lepi geri yini robia esuzu 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu 'diyi dri.
nyn_prompt: Amakorero g'emyenda n'ekitongore kigumire, ekirikuteganisibwa embeera y'eby'entaasya hamwe n'obuhangwa bw'ensi. Okwetegyereza ebintu ebi n'eky'omugasho munonga omu bizinesi ezirikugyenderera kutunguura emikorere yaazo omu by'empiiha.

eng_prompt: In recent months, the company's financial reports have shown alarming trends, raising concerns among investors and stakeholders. As the situation unfolded, it became clear that multiple issues were at play, contributing to its downfall.
lug_prompt: Mu myezi egiyise, alipoota z'ebyensimbi za kampuni ziraga enkola eyeeraliikiriza, ekireeseewo okweraliikirira mu bamusigansimbi n'abakwatibwako. Embeera bwe yagenda mu maaso, kyalabika bulungi nti ensonga nnyingi zaaliwo, ekyaviirako okugwa kwayo.
ach_prompt: I dwe ma okato ni, adwoki me kwed me lim pa dul ne onyuto jami mapol ma kelo lworo ikin luket lim I biyacara kacel ki joo mukene. Ikare ma jami tye ka time, nen atyer kamaleng ni jami mapol tye katime, ma okelo poto pa dul enoni.
teo_prompt: Kolapio lu atuboros, itodunitos iripotan luka ikapun luka ekampuni iboro luitukurianete, eyangaunete aiyalongong kanejaas agwelanarak keda itunga. Kwape abu ejautene itopoloor, apotu kojenutu ebe ipu akiro nuapotu koyangautu aibiror ke.
lgg_prompt: Mba agapi 'bo 'diyi ma alea, o'duko siza robia ni amuti 'da niri e'da e'yo asi otiza ejipi 'ba lonyi vuti ale'ba 'diyi ma eselea 'diyi pie. E'yo 'da ni mu drile, eri eca e'da kini e'yo karakara eyi 'ye e'yo 'da ma dria, dika eyi fe e'yo 'da ni e'dezu ra.
nyn_prompt: Omu myezi ehingwireho, ripoota z'eby'empiiha za kampuni nizooreka emicwe y'omutaano, ekirikureetaho okwerarikirira omu ba invesita hamwe n'abu kirikukwataho. Embeera kuyabaire neegyenda omu maisho, kikarebeka butunu ngu enshonga nyingi zikaba ziriho, ekyaretsireho okugwa kwayo.

eng_prompt: As the number of patients with respiratory issues continues to rise, healthcare facilities are struggling to keep up with the increasing needs. Many hospitals are facing critical shortages of essential supplies, particularly oxygen.
lug_prompt: Ng'omuwendo gw'abalwadde abalina obuzibu mu kussa bweyongera okulinnya, amalwaliro galwana okutuukana n'obwetaavu obweyongera. Amalwaliro mangi goolekaganye n'ebbula ly'ebintu ebikulu naddala omukka gwa oxygen.
ach_prompt: Kit ma wel lutwo matye ki peko me yweyo tye ka medde, odi yadi tye ka tute matek me timo jami weng ma mite. Odi yadi mapol tye ki peko me nok pa jami ma mite tutwalle yamo ayweya.
teo_prompt: Kwape iyata enaaba loka adekak lu ejaas keda ationis naka eiyengane, eutasi adekisia ainingosit aitodolikin ipudesia luka adekak. Ejaasi adekisia nuipu keda ekadakada loka iboro lu itwasamao kacut ekwam.
lgg_prompt: Kalafe 'ba azoru oli seza ma e'yo be 'diyi ni tuzu drile, pari arojo ni 'diyi dri ci e'yo 'ba eyini le 'diyi ma aza kozu. Arojo karakara eyi e'yo afa orodriru 'diyi ma ako ni esu tualu oli seza oxygen niri be.
nyn_prompt: Omuhendo gw'abarwaire abaine oburemeezi bw'okwitsya nigugumizamu nigweyongyera, amarwariro nigakora n'amaani okukuratira ebyetengo ebirikweyongyera. Amarwariro maingi nigatunga eibura ry'ebintu by'omugasho, okukira munonga omwoya gw'okwisya.

eng_prompt: To effectively lead and make informed decisions, a manager must have a comprehensive grasp of the organization's hierarchy and functions. This knowledge is crucial for fostering collaboration and ensuring that all departments work towards common goals.
lug_prompt: Okukulembera obulungi n'okusalawo obulungi, maneja ateekeddwa okuba n'okutegeera okujjuvu ku mitendera n'emirimu gy'ekitongole. Okumanya kuno kwa mugaso nnyo mu kutumbula enkolagana n'okukakasa nti ebitongole byonna bikola ku biruubirirwa eby'awamu.
ach_prompt: Me telo ki moko tam maber, ladit tic omyero obed ki niang matut I kom tela ki tic pa dul ne. Ngec man pire tek tutwal me dongo winye ki neno ni dul mapat-pat weng tye katimo ticgi me cobo miti gi.
teo_prompt: Kanu aingarenikin ejok ka aitolomun aseununeta nuajokak, ibusakinit eyaiton ajenun nuikamunitos eswamae loka atukot. Erai acoa na naepol noi kanu aitopolor aiswamanara ka awanyun ebe iswamaete iriongeta kere kanu apeleikinata.
lgg_prompt: Driceza kililiru fezu azini e'yo 'duza kililiru 'diyi 'yezu, le 'ba drice'ba ru 'diyi ma va e'yo dria amuti 'da ma driceza ma dria azini azi 'diyi ma dria ra. Ondua 'diri orodriru ti ecita ma omgbo otuzu azini nezu ra kini enyati dria yi azi nga e'yo aluri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Okubaasa kwebembera kurungi n'okucwamu kurungi, manegya ashemereire kwetegyereza gye enteekateeka n'emirimo y'ekitongore. Obwengye obu n'obw'omugasho munonga omukureetaho okukwatanisa n'okureeba ngu ebitongore byona bikora aha bigyendererwa byabyo.

eng_prompt: When analyzing various companies, one quickly realizes that each has its own unique structure. This diversity in design reflects their individual goals and operational strategies.
lug_prompt: Bw'oba weekenneenya kampuni ez'enjawulo, omuntu amangu ddala ategeera nti buli emu erina enkola yaayo ey'enjawulo. Enkulaakulana eno ey'enjawulo eraga ebigendererwa byabwe n'engeri gye bakolamu emirimu gyabwe.
ach_prompt: Ka itye ka ngiyo dul mapat-pat mapat-pat, ngat moni niang oyotoyot ni dul acel-acel tye ki kit ma kiyubu kwede. Yub mapat-pat man nyutu miti gi ki yoo me tic gi.
teo_prompt: Karai iwanyun ikampunin luegelegela, epedori itunganan ajenun ebe kangin idiope ejaasi keda epone loegelegela. Atiaketait na kotoma aitemonokineta itodunit apeleikinata kec keda iwaitin lu iswamaete kesi.
lgg_prompt: Amuti ndundu eyi ma eti ondaria, 'ba azi ni e'yo ega mbeleru kini eyi ma esele ndu ndu eyi ci. E'yo ndundu 'diyi e'da e'yo eyini lele 'diyi ma dria azini geri eyini azi ngazu 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Omuntu ku arikushwijuma kampuni nyingi, nahonaaho naayetegyereza ngu buri kampuni eine entekateka yaayo ey'omutaano. Enkora y'emiringo etarikushushana neeyoreka ebigyendererwa byabo hamwe n'enkora yaabo.

eng_prompt: In light of the recent events, it is crucial for us to address the underlying issues that led to the violence. We must come together as a community to ensure that such incidents are prevented in the future.
lug_prompt: Okusinziira ku bibaddewo gye buvuddeko, kikulu nnyo ffe okukola ku nsonga ezaaviirako obutabanguko. Tulina okwegatta wamu ng'ekitundu okukakasa nti ebikolwa ng'ebyo biziyizibwa mu biseera eby'omu maaso.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki jami ma otimme cokcok-ki, pire tek tutwal ni omyero walok i kom peko ma okelo tim gero. Omyero waribbe kacel macalo lwak me neno ni peko ma kumeno pe otimme I kare me anyim.
teo_prompt: Katupitos nuapotu kotakanutu pac, ejokuna noi oni aitemokin atiokisio nuapotu koyangautu amumu. Ekot oni aimorikikin kwape itunga kanu awanyun ebe mam iboro kwa ngun epedorete atakanun koingaren.
lgg_prompt: E'yo i 'yepi o'diru 'diyi ma e'yosi, eri orodriru amani e'yo ewaru e'yo ngiringiri ni 'diyi fepi 'diyi ma aza kozu. Le ama ma emu tualu ongulumu eyi ru nezu ra kini 'ba atri e'yo 'dile 'diyi ewu drialeri ma alea ci.
nyn_prompt: Kurugirira ahabintu ebyabaireho juba, nikikuru munonga ahariitwe kukora aha nshonga ezaareesireho obwimukiriro. Tushemereire kukorera hamwe nk'ekicweka kureeba ngu ebikorwa nk'ebyo nibizibirwa omu biro by'omumaisho.

eng_prompt: In times of uncertainty and change, having a strong support system is essential. The bond we share brings us comfort and strength.
lug_prompt: Mu biseera by'obutali bukakafu n'enkyukakyuka, okubeera n'obuyambi obw'amaanyi kya mugaso. Omukwano gwe tugabana gutuleetera okubudaabudibwa n'amaanyi.
ach_prompt: Ikare me peko ki aloka-loka, bedo ki lutic matek obedo gin ma pire tek tutwal. Winye ma watye kwede ikin wa weko wabedo ki kwe cwiny ki kero.
teo_prompt: Kotoma apakio nuetioko ka aijulanakineta, ejokuna noi ajaut keda egangitok luegogong. Eidicane lo aimor oni einakini oni agangat keda agogongu.
lgg_prompt: Sa'wa e'yo ewaru azini ojata ni 'diyi ma alea, aa'ta 'ba atita fepi okporu 'diyi pie ri eri orodriru. Aa'ta amani aa'zu tualuri ni ama dri asi anzuru azini okpo fe.
nyn_prompt: Omu bwire bw'obutegyendesereza n'empinduka, okuba n'obuhwezi bw'amaani n'eky'omugasho. Enkoragana ei twine neetureetera okuhuumuriza n'amaani.

eng_prompt: Our perspectives are shaped by our unique experiences and backgrounds. This diversity influences not only our opinions but also our problem-solving approaches.
lug_prompt: Endowooza zaffe zisinziira ku bye tuyiseemu n'ensibuko zaffe ez'enjawulo. Okwawukana kuno tekukosa ndowooza zaffe zokka wabula n'engeri gye tugonjoolamu ebizibu.
ach_prompt: Tam ma watye kwede tye malube ki jami ma wakato ki iye ki kit ma wadongo kwede. Apoka-poka man pe tye ki adwoki ne I kom tamwa keken ento bene I kom kit ma watye ka tyeko kwede peko.
teo_prompt: Ejaas aomisio wok keda iboro luitegelikina luiswamauna kotoma aijar wok. Mam atiakatiaka ngin itopoloori aomisio wok bon konye epone loitemonokini oni atiokisio.
lgg_prompt: Ama vile egata 'diyi e'da e'yo amani esu 'diyi ma dria tualu angu amani engazu 'diyi pie. Esele coza 'diri ovuni lu egata amani 'diyi ma dria ku te geri amani e'yo otuzu 'diyi ma dria indi.
nyn_prompt: Ebiteekateeko byaitu nibiteebwaho oburemeezi bwaitu n'oburugo bwaitu. Okutashushana oku tikurikukwata aha biteekateeko byaitu byonka, kureka n'omuringo ogu turikukozesa omu kugonjoora oburemeezi.

eng_prompt: It is crucial to ensure that justice is served fairly and accurately. Misguided decisions in the legal system can lead to innocent individuals facing severe consequences.
lug_prompt: Kikulu nnyo okukakasa nti obwenkanya buweebwa mu bwenkanya era mu butuufu. Okusalawo okukyamu mu nkola y'amateeka kusobola okuviirako abantu abatalina musango okwolekagana n'ebizibu eby'amaanyi.
ach_prompt: Pire tek tutwal me neno ni ngol matir ki ngolo kop tye kakare. Moko tam marac I tenge me cik twero weko dano ma balgi peke nongo adwogi marac.
teo_prompt: Erai ibore yenepol noi aanyun ebe ijaikitai etube loajokan ido kojokuna. Aseununeta nuarokok kotoma okisila epedorete ayangaun itunga lumam ediakarit adumun atiokisio nuarokok.
lgg_prompt: Eri orodriru nezu ra kini 'ba e'yo li kililiru azini kililiru. E'yo liza onzi 'diyi eco fe 'ba e'yo kokoru 'diyi dri fu dri e'yo onzi 'diyi be ra.
nyn_prompt: N'eky'omugasho kureeba ngu oburingaaniza buheebwa abantu omu muringo oguhikire. Okusharaho kubi omu biragiro nikibaasa kureetera abantu abataine rubanja kubonabona munonga.

eng_prompt: In a community like Nansana, where traditions and values run deep, it's important to acknowledge the significance of local customs. Understanding the cultural context can foster greater appreciation for the events that shape the lives of its residents.
lug_prompt: Mu kitundu nga Nansana, eby'obuwangwa n'empisa gye byasimba amakanda, kya mugaso okutegeera obukulu bw'obulombolombo bw'ekitundu. Okutegeera embeera y'ebyobuwangwa kisobola okutumbula okusiima okw'amaanyi ku bibaddewo ebikulaakulanya obulamu bw'abatuuze baayo.
ach_prompt: I kabedo macalo Nansana, kama tekwaro ki ber bedo tye iye tutwal, pire tek me niang ber pa tekwaro me tedero. Niang kit ma tekwaro tye kwede twero kelo pwoc madit tutwal I kom jami matye katime I kwo pa lutedero.
teo_prompt: Kotoma atutubet kwape nat Nansana, naejaasi keda inonosio keda iponesio lukajokak, ejokuna ajenun ajokis naka inonosio luka atutubet. Amisiikin akiro nuka einono epedori aitopolor aiyalama naepol noi kanuka akiro nuiswamaete kotoma aijar naka itunga.
lgg_prompt: Ongulumu ekile Nansana le 'diyi ma alea, e'yo a'bini azini e'yo orodriru 'diyi pie, eri orodriru a'izu orodri e'yo a'bini 'diyi niri ra. E'yo suruni 'diyi vazu ri eco fe 'ba eyini aa'zu ayikosi e'yo eyi 'yepi 'ba aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ma edri 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Omu kyanga nka Nansana, ahu eby'obuhangwa n'emigyenzo birimu oburemeezi, n'eky'omugasho kumanya omugasho gw'emigyenzo y'ekyaro. Okwetegyereza eby'obuhangwa, nikibaasa kureetaho okusiima ahabw'emikoro erikukora aha magara g'abatuuze baayo.

eng_prompt: After a long day filled with stress and distractions, it's essential to prioritize our well-being. A good night's sleep is crucial for mental clarity and overall health.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'olunaku oluwanvu olujjudde obunkenke n'ebiwugulaza, kya mugaso okukulembeza obulungi bwaffe. Okwebaka ekiro kirungi kya mugaso nnyo eri ebirowoozo ebitangaavu n'obulamu okutwalira awamu.
ach_prompt: Ingee nino malac ma opong ki lyeto ki jami ma dwoyo tam pa dano, pire tek tutwal me keto ber bedo wa obed mukwongo. Nino maber I dyewor pire tek tutwal pi bedo ki adam maber ki yot kom.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka apaaran naepol noi naejaasi keda aiyalongong keda atiokisio nuipu, ejokuna noi aisingarenit aijar wok. Ajoto naka akware ejok kanu aomisio ka angaleu.
lgg_prompt: O'du ezu 'bori ma vutia e'yo asi omiza ni 'diyi pie, eri orodriru e'yo amani aa'zu muke ri 'duzu okori'i. O'du koza kililiru ri eri orodriru omi 'bazu kililiru azini aa'zu rua ala be dria.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'eizooba riringwa eririmu okwerarikirira n'ebirikuturemesa, ni kikuru kwebembeza eby'amagara gaitu. Okubyama kurungi nyekiro n'eky'omugasho ahabw'okugira ebiteekateeko birungi n'amagara marungi.

eng_prompt: Every life holds intrinsic value, and taking it away should never be justified. We must seek peaceful resolutions to conflicts rather than resorting to violence.
lug_prompt: Buli bulamu bulina omugaso era okubuggyawo tekulina kubaawo. Tulina okugonjoola obukuubagano mu mirembe mu kifo ky'okuddukira mu butabanguko.
ach_prompt: Kwo acel-acel pire tek tutwal, dok kwanyo kwo ne pe omyero obed gin ma atir. Omyero wayeny yoo me cobo peko me kuc me kaka tic ki gero.
teo_prompt: Kangin aijar erai ibore yenepol noi, ido mam ibusakinit aitodun ebe ejokuna. Ibusakinit oni aitemokin ingungeta kopone loka ainapakina itia aitwasam amumu.
lgg_prompt: Idri dria ma orodri ci, dika le 'ba ma 'du eri ku. Le ama ma esu geri asianzu si e'yo ngiringiri ni 'diyi ma aza kozu aga e'yo ngiringiri ni 'diyi 'yezu ri ra.
nyn_prompt: Buri magara gaine omugasho, kandi okugaihamu tikushemereire kubaho. Tushemereire kusherura oburyo bw'okutereeza entaro omu busingye, omu mwanya gw'okwejumba omu butabanguko.

eng_prompt: After completing his degree in finance, he sought opportunities to apply his knowledge in a professional setting. Over the years, he has built a solid career in various financial institutions.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okumaliriza ddiguli ye mu by'ensimbi, yanoonya emikisa okukozesa amagezi ge mu mbeera y'ekikugu. Emyaka bwe gizze giyitawo, azimbye omulimu ogw'amaanyi mu bitongole by'ensimbi eby'enjawulo.
ach_prompt: Ingee tyeko kwane me digiri I lok kom lim, en ocako yenyo gum me tic ki ngec ma en onongo. Pi mwaki ma okato angec, en otiyo matek tutwal I dul mapat-pat makemme ki lok kom lim.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka angetakin edigurike loka ikapun, abu ngesi komo arerengesio nuka aitwasam acoake kotoma aswam. Kokaru lu atuboros, adukunit ngesi aswam na egogong noi kotoma iriongeta lu ikapun luegelegela.
lgg_prompt: Erini degree ivileri dezu e'yo robia niri ma alia 'bori ma vutia, eri nda drileba erini ecozu ondua erini 'diyi ayuzu pari azi ngazuri ma alia. Eli agapi 'bo 'diyi ma alea, eri si azi okporu amuti robia ta mbazani ndundu 'diyi ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okuhendera diguri ye omu by'esente, akasherura emigisha y'okukoresa obwengye bwe omu mirimo ye. Kumara emyaka mingi, akoreire emirimo y'amaani omu bitongore by'esente bitari bimwe na bimwe.

eng_prompt: Effective collaboration among team members is essential for achieving organizational goals. To facilitate this, clear and concise communication is crucial.
lug_prompt: Enkolagana ennungi wakati w'abantu ba ttiimu ya mugaso mu kutuukiriza ebigendererwa by'ekitongole. Okusobozesa kino, empuliziganya ennambulukufu era ennyangu ya mugaso nnyo.
ach_prompt: Winye ikin lumemba me dul enoni pire tek tutwal me cobo miti pa dul enoni. Pi tyelo kor man, lok ma niange maber dok macek obedo gin ma pire tek tutwal.
teo_prompt: Aiswamanara najokan kanejaas itunga luka etimu erai ibore yenepol noi kanu aitodolikin alosikineta nuka atukot. Kanu aitapatan ngun, erai einer lo ecai ido lo epatana.
lgg_prompt: Ti ecita kililiru 'ba amuti ma alia 'diyi ma eselea ri eri orodriru otita amuti ni 'diyi 'yezu. E'yo 'di ma aza kozu, e'yo nzeza kililiru azini okporu ri eri orodriru.
nyn_prompt: Okukwatanisa kurungi omu ba memba ba tiimu n'eky'omugasho omu kuhikiiriza ebigyendererwa by'ekitongore. Okuhwera eki,okugamba kurungi n'okwanguhi n'eky'omugasho.

eng_prompt: Ensuring a stable and democratic society relies heavily on the integrity of the electoral process. When citizens can cast their votes without fear or intimidation, it fosters trust in governance.
lug_prompt: Okuteekawo emirembe ne demokulasiya mu bantu kisinziira nnyo ku bulungibwansi bw'enkola y'okulonda. Bannansi bwe basobola okukuba akalulu awatali kutya oba okutiisibwatiisibwa, kireetawo obwesige mu bukulembeze.
ach_prompt: Bedo ki kuc ki tela pa lwak jenge tutwalle I kom yoo me yer matir. Ka anywali twero bolo kwir labongo lworo onyo lworo, man kelo gen i kom tela.
teo_prompt: Aanyun ebe ejai ainapakina keda aseo najokan kotupitete ainapakina naka ainapeta nuka aseo. Arai epedorete itunga aicak abootin kec komam ekuriaka arai aitukurian, eyangauni amuno naka apugan.
lgg_prompt: O'bi eyi ma aa'ta kililiru azini e'yo democracia ni 'diyi ma ta mbazu ri le e'yo opetaa ni 'diyi ma aa'ta kililiru ri ma dria. Kari anzi ka eco voti 'be ori kokoru kani ori feza kokoru, eri asi'baza eji driceza ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Okureeba ngu hariho obusingye n'obugabe bw'obutegyeki omu bantu, nikyesigama munonga aha buringaaniza bw'eby'oburuuru. Abatuuragye ku barikubaasa kuteera akaruuru bataine kutiina, nikireetaho obwesigye omu bwebembezi.

eng_prompt: In a controversial move, lawmakers gathered to discuss the future of presidential power and the implications of extending leadership tenures. After intense debates and public outcry, a decision was made that would alter the political landscape.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube ow'okusika omuguwa, ababaka ba palamenti baakuÅ‹Å‹aana okukubaganya ebirowoozo ku biseera by'omukulembeze w'eggwanga eby'omu maaso n'ebiva mu kwongezaayo ebisanja by'obukulembeze. Oluvannyuma lw'okukubaganya ebirowoozo okw'amaanyi n'okukaaba kw'abantu, okusalawo kwakolebwa okwali kujja okukyusa embeera y'ebyobufuzi.
ach_prompt: I lok ma kelo apoka-poka, luwang lwak I ot moko cik gugure me nywako lok I kom anyim pa tela pa ladit lobo ki adwoki me medo kare me tela. Ingee laro lok matek tutwal ki koko pa lwak, kimoko tam ma obi kelo aloka loka I lok me cungu iwi bye.
teo_prompt: Kotoma aswamisioit naepol noi, apotu imeeban luka airabet kimorikikinos kanu aitemitem nuikamunitos oingaren naka lokapolon akwap keda nuepedorete aswam kanu aisukunyar apak naka engarenok. Akaulo naka epeget loepol noi keda aimony naka itunga, aponi kitolomunai aseunet naepedori aijulakin ejautene loka epolitikis.
lgg_prompt: E'yo azi ewaru ni ma alea, 'ba azita si'ba 'diyi tra eyi agbatara gbazu opi drile kari ni ri ma ewu drialeri ma alea ri ma dria tualu e'yo driceza ma sa'wa idrizu ri ma dria. Agbatara okporu azini o'duko o'bi yini 'diyi ma vutia, 'ba 'du e'yo azi ngapi e'yo politiki ni 'diyi ojapi ra ni.
nyn_prompt: Abajwekyerwa b'eishengyero baketeerana okuhanuura aha nyensya y'obwebembezi bw'omwebembezi weihanga hamwe n'oburemeezi bw'okwongyerayo obwire bw'obwebembezi. Bwanyima y'okuhanuura kw'amaani hamwe n'okwetomboita kw'abantu, hakabaho okusharamu okwabaire nikwija kuhindura embeera y'eby'obutegyeki.

eng_prompt: Many citizens feel disillusioned with the political process, believing their votes do not lead to meaningful change. As a result, voter turnout has declined significantly in recent years.
lug_prompt: Bannansi bangi baggwaamu essuubi olw'enkola y'ebyobufuzi, nga balowooza nti obululu bwabwe tebuleeta nkyukakyuka ya makulu. N'ekivuddemu, omuwendo gw'abalonzi gukendedde nnyo mu myaka egiyise.
ach_prompt: Anywali mapol cwinygi pe yom ki yub me cung iwibye, gitye ki niyee ni kwir gi pe kelo aloka loka maber. Macalo adwogi ne, wel lubol kwir odok piny tutwal I mwaki ma okato ni.
teo_prompt: Apotu itunga luipu itakadikisi nuikamunitos ainapeta nuka epolitikis, aomitos ebe mam aseeta kec eyangaunete aijulakinet naejok. Kanuka ngun, adisiar noi enaaba loka aseak kokaru luatuboros.
lgg_prompt: Kari anzi karakara eyi ma asi eza e'yo politiki ni 'diyisi eyini egazu kini voti eyini 'be 'diyi feni ojata kililiru ku. E'yo 'disi, 'ba emu'ba voti 'be'baa 'diyi ma kalafe esi eli agapi 'diyi ma alea ra.
nyn_prompt: Abatuuragye baingi tibarikushemererwa n'enkora y'eby'obutegyeki, barikwikiriza ngu oburuuru bwabo tiburikureetaho empinduka y'omugasho. N'ekyarugiremu, omuhendo gw'abateezi b'akaruuru gukyendeire munonga omu myaka egi.

eng_prompt: Recent surveys indicate a significant decline in public confidence regarding the integrity of electoral processes. As a result, many citizens are questioning the credibility of the Electoral Commission.
lug_prompt: Okunoonyereza okwakakolebwa kulaga okukendeera kw'obwesige bw'abantu mu nkola y'okulonda. N'ekivuddemu, bannansi bangi babuusabuusa obwesige bw'akakiiko k'ebyokulonda.
ach_prompt: Kwed ma otime cokcok-ki nyutu ni dano pe tye ki gen I kom yub me bolo kwir. Macalo adwogi ne, anywali mapol tye ki akala-kala I kom twero pa dul ma doro yer.
teo_prompt: Aingic napac itodunit aibiror naka amunokina naka itunga kanuikamunitos ainapakina naka aseo. Kanuka ngun, mam itunga luipu ejenete abeit naka ekomision loka aseo.
lgg_prompt: E'yo eti ondaza o'diru 'diyi ece kini asi'baza o'bi eyini e'yo opetaa ni 'diyi ma dria ri ma omgbo esi ra. E'yo 'disi, kari anzi karakara eyi e'yo ega amuti e'yo opetaa ni 'diyi ondrepi ri ma dria ku.
nyn_prompt: Okucondooza okwakozirwe obwahati nikworeka okweyongyera kw'obwesigye omu by'oburuuru. N'ekyarugiremu, abatuuragye baingi nibabangaanisa obwesigwa bw'ekitongore ky'eby'oburuuru.

eng_prompt: In order to effectively represent the interests of the people, a political party must prioritize the selection of capable individuals. Strong leadership is essential for gaining public trust and achieving meaningful change.
lug_prompt: Okusobola okukiikirira obulungi ebyetaago by'abantu, ekibiina ky'ebyobufuzi kirina okukulembeza okulonda abantu abalina obusobozi. Obukulembeze obw'amaanyi bwetaagisa okufuna obwesige bw'abantu n'okutuuka ku nkyukakyuka ey'amakulu.
ach_prompt: Me cung pi miti pa lwak maber, dul me cungu iwi bye omyero oket cwinygi me yero dano matye ki kero. Tela matek pire tek tutwal me nongo gen pa lwak ki kelo aloka loka maber.
teo_prompt: Kanu abwoikin ejok ipudesia luka itunga, ekot epate aisingarenit aseun itunga lu iswamaete ejok. Engarenone loegogong erai ibore yenepol noi kanu adumun amunokina naka itunga ka aitodolikin aijulakineta nuajokak.
lgg_prompt: O'bi ma paria kililiru, le amuti politiki ni 'diyi ma 'du 'ba ecopi ra 'diyi oko. Driceza okporu ri eri orodriru 'ba eyini asi 'bazu eyi ma dria azini ojata orodriru 'diyi ejizu.
nyn_prompt: Okujwekyera kurungi ebyetengo by'abantu,ekibiina ky'obutegyeki kishemereire kwebembeza okuronda abantu abarikubaasa. Obwebembezi bw'amaani n'obw'omugasho ahabw'okutunga obwesigye bw'abantu n'okutunga empinduka y'omugasho.

eng_prompt: In a society where leadership greatly influences the well-being of its citizens, it is essential for those in authority to prioritize compassion and empathy. When decision-makers genuinely care for the needs of the people, they foster a more harmonious and just community.
lug_prompt: Mu kitundu ng'obukulembeze bulina kinene kye bukola ku mbeera y'abantu baayo, kikulu nnyo abo abali mu buyinza okukulembeza okusaasira n'okusaasira. Abakola okusalawo bwe bafa ku byetaago by'abantu mu bwesimbu, batumbula ekitundu ekirimu obumu n'obwenkanya.
ach_prompt: I kabedo ma tela tye ki adwoki madit tutwal I kom kwo pa anywali ne, pire tek tutwal ki joo matye ki twero me keto cwiny me kica ki kica obed gin ma pire tek. Ka joo ma moko tam gi paro pi miti pa lwak gi, gi kelo ber bedo ikin lwak.
teo_prompt: Kotoma atutubet naejaatar engarenok aijar naka itungakec, ejokuna noi ngul luejaasi keda apedorosio aisingarenit aitim keda aitim. Arai epodokinit itunga lu iswamaete aseununeta ipudesia luka itunga, epedorete kesi aitopolor aijar naka itunga.
lgg_prompt: Ongulumu driceza ni e'yo 'yepi kari anzi eyini 'diyi ma edri ma dria ri ma alea, eri orodriru 'ba okpo e'ipiru 'diyi ni asi ndriza azini asi ndriza 'ba eyi ma eselea ri 'bazu okporu. Ba e'yo 'dupi 'diyi ka asi 'ba e'yo 'ba eyini le 'diyi ma dria, eyi ongulumu aa'pi tualu azini kililiru 'diyi ezo.
nyn_prompt: Omu bantu ahu obwebembezi burikureetaho entunguuka y'abantu, n'eky'omugasho abo abaine obushoborozi kwebembeza okusaasira n'okusaasira. Abarikukora ebiteiso kubarikufayo ahabyetaago by'abantu, nibareetaho obusingye n'oburinganiza omu bantu.

eng_prompt: In an effort to maintain order and prevent undue influence, local governments have implemented various regulations regarding political engagement. These measures often limit the ability of certain groups to actively participate in the electoral process.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'okukuuma emirembe n'okutangira okukyusakyusa, gavumenti z'ebitundu ziteekeddewo amateeka ag'enjawulo agakwata ku kwenyigira mu byobufuzi. Ebintu bino bitera okukugira ebibinja ebimu okwetaba mu kulonda.
ach_prompt: I tute matek me gwoko ber bedo ki gengo tela ma pe oporre, gamente me tedero guketo cik mapat-pat malube ki donyo I lok me cungu iwi-bye. Yub magi pol kare gengo gurup mogo me bedo tye ikare me yer.
teo_prompt: Kotoma agogongu na aidar ainapakina ka aitikitik aipuga itunga, etolomutu apuganisinei nuikamunitos alomar toma akiro nuka politikis. Etapit nu aitikitik apedor naka igurupun ice ajaut toma aseo.
lgg_prompt: Okpo 'bazu e'yo otuzu azini e'yo onzi 'yezu ri atrizu, gamete angu ndundu eyi ma alea 'diyi 'ba azita ndundu eyi e'yo politiki ni 'diyi ma dria. E'yo 'dile 'diyi tutuni okpo ongulumu azi eyini aa'zu e'yo opetaa ni 'diyi ma alea ri ma omgbo esi.
nyn_prompt: Omu kaweefube w'okurinda obusingye n'okuzibira okukyendeeza omu by'obutegyeki, gavumenti z'ebyanga ziteire omu nkora ebiragiro bitari bimwe na bimwe ebirikukwata aha kwejumba omu by'obutegyeki. Ebiragiro ebi, nibikira kuremesa guruupu ezimwe kwejumba omu by'oburuuru.

eng_prompt: In times of conflict, the military often finds itself in a constant state of vigilance. As nations vie for power and resources, the army must prepare for threats from various fronts.
lug_prompt: Mu biseera by'obukuubagano, amagye gatera okwesanga mu mbeera ey'obwegendereza buli kaseera. Ng'ensi zivuganya ku buyinza n'eby'obugagga, amagye galina okwetegekera okutiisibwatiisibwa okuva mu bitundu eby'enjawulo.
ach_prompt: Ikare me lweny, lumony ipol kare gibedo ma wanggi twolo. I kare ma lobo mapat-pat tye ka pyem pi loc ki lonyo, mony omyero oyubbe pi bura ma aa ki I kabedo mapat-pat.
teo_prompt: Kapakio nuka ingungeta, etapit ajore ajaut keda acobeu naepol noi. Kwape eutasi akwapin abolobol kanu apugan keda iboro, ekot ajore akapanakin kanu aitukurianeta nuegelegela.
lgg_prompt: Sa'wa ngiringiri nirisi, asikari eyi eyi esu eyini aa'zu mile be sa'wa driasi. Kari yini baka sezu okpo azini afa lonyiru 'diyi ma dria, le asikari eyi ma otu eyi e'yo ori gbaza engapi angu ndundu eyi ma alea 'diyisi.
nyn_prompt: Omu bwire bw'obutabanguko,amahe nigakira kushangwa gari omumbeera y'okwetegyereza. Obu amahanga garikwetenga amaani n'ebintu, amahe gashemereire kweteekateekyera okutiinatiinisa okurikuruga omu mahanga gatari gamwe na gamwe.

eng_prompt: In the quiet corners of bustling cities and the shadows of forgotten places, countless individuals wander aimlessly. Each person carries their own burdens, searching for meaning and connection in a chaotic world.
lug_prompt: Mu nsonda ezisirifu ez'ebibuga ebirimu abantu abangi n'ebisiikirize by'ebifo ebyerabirwa, abantu bangi batambulatambula nga tebalina kigendererwa. Buli muntu yeetikka emigugu gye, anoonya amakulu n'okukwatagana mu nsi eno erimu akavuyo.
ach_prompt: I gul matye mot pa citi ma dano dwong iye ki tipo pa kabedo ma wigi owil I komgi, dano mapol woto labongo tyen lok. Dano acel-acel tingo peko gi, yenyo tyen lok ki kubbe I lobo man ma opong ki kuku kuku.
teo_prompt: Kotoma aiboisio nuililingi nuka isitei luejaasi keda itunga luipu ka aiboisio nu imurokitai, itunga luipu elosete komam ejaasi keda apeleikinet. Nginitunganan eyangari ationisike, aimo apolou keda arucokina kotoma akwap kana.
lgg_prompt: Ba kalafe angiri 'diyi aci angu 'bani avi 'bo 'diyi ma alia asi anzuru aku ambu city ru 'diyi ma alia azini angu 'bani avi 'bo 'diyi ma dria. Ba alu alu ni e'yo yi ma ngulupi ni 'diyi 'du, e'yo ndazu azini yi ecizu wudrikuru ngiringiri ru 'di ma alia.
nyn_prompt: Omu nshonda z'endembo ezirimu abantu baingi, abantu baingi nibatambura bataine kigyendererwa. Buri muntu nayetwara oburemeezi bwe, arikuronda amakuru n'okukwatanisa omu nsi erimu akavuyo.

eng_prompt: The consequences of neglecting this issue could be dire for everyone involved. We must take immediate action to address the underlying problems before they escalate further.
lug_prompt: Ebiva mu kulagajjalira ensonga eno biyinza okuba eby'akabi eri buli muntu akwatibwako. Tulina okubaako kye tukolawo mu bwangu okugonjoola ebizibu ebikulu nga tebinnayonooneka.
ach_prompt: Adwogi me cayo lok man twero bedo rac tutwal pi dano weng matye iye. Omyero watim gin mo oyot oyot me tyeko peko matye mapud pe gudoko rac tutwal.
teo_prompt: Akiro nuepedorete alomun kanu apalunit akiro nu epedorete araun nuarokok nejaas itunga kere. Ibusakinit oni aswam katipet kanu aitemokin atiokisio nuepolok eringa iyata noi.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'bani e'yo 'di adizu 'diyi eco ovu onzi 'ba dria e'yo nde ma alia 'diyi dri ra. Le ama ma 'ye e'yo mbeleru e'yo ewaru 'diyi ma aza kozu de nga po'di eyi ma omgbo esi ku.
nyn_prompt: Ebyarugyemu okunagaijura enshonga egi nibibaasa kuba eby'akabi ahari buri omwe orikukwatwaho. Tushemereire kukora ahonaaho, okutereeza oburemeezi butakongyeire.

eng_prompt: Recognizing the potential of the younger generation, community leaders have decided to empower them with leadership roles. This initiative aims to harness their energy and innovative ideas for the betterment of the county.
lug_prompt: Olw'okumanya obusobozi bw'omulembe omuto, abakulembeze b'ekitundu basazeewo okubawa obuyinza n'emirimu gy'obukulembeze. Enteekateeka eno egendereddwamu okukozesa amaanyi gaabwe n'ebirowoozo eby'obuyiiya ku lw'obulungi bw'eggwanga.
ach_prompt: Pien guniang kero pa jo matino, lutela me kabedo gi gumoko tam gi me minigi twero me tic macalo lutela. Yub man tye ki miti me tic ki kero gi ki tam gi me dongo lobo.
teo_prompt: Kanu ajenun apedor naka atumunak, aseutu engarenok luka atutubet aigang kes keda aiboisio nu engarenok. Alosikinet naka aswam ngun erai aitwasam agogong kec keda aomisiokec kanu ajokis na akwap.
lgg_prompt: Drice'ba ongulumu eyini 'diyi esu e'yo 'ba oderu 'diyi ma okpo ni 'diyi ra eyini ani eyi ma okpo fezu azi driceza ni 'diyisi. E'yo 'di ma asisile lezu okpo yini azini egata o'diru 'diyi ayuzu kari ma e'yo otuzu.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okumanya obushoboorozi bw'eminyeeto, abebembezi b'ebyanga bashaziremu kubaheereza emirimo y'obwebembezi. Ekigyendererwa kyabo n'okukoresa amaani gaabo n'ebiteekateeko byabo, okutunguura eihanga.

eng_prompt: As we embark on this journey of renewal and growth, every citizen must contribute to the collective effort. The challenges ahead will require dedication and resilience from all of us.
lug_prompt: Nga tutandika olugendo luno olw'okuzza obuggya n'okukulaakulana, buli munnansi alina okuwaayo mu kaweefube ow'awamu. Okusoomoozebwa okuli mu maaso kujja kwetaaga okwewaayo n'obugumu okuva gye tuli ffenna.
ach_prompt: Ka watye ka cako wot man me roco ki dongo lobo, anywali acel-acel omyero okel gin mo I yub man. Peko matye anyim bimito keto cwiny ki tek cwiny ki bot wan weng.
teo_prompt: Kwape itereikina sio toma orot lo lo aijulakin keda apol, ekot ngin itunganan aijaikin agangat. Atiokisio nu oingaren ekotosi oni kere ainakina keda agogongu.
lgg_prompt: Amani acita 'di e'doria, le 'ba dria kari ma alia 'diyi ma fe atita e'yo 'di 'yezu tualu. E'yo ewaru ewu drilia 'diyi le ava feza azini asi mba engazu ama dria vu.
nyn_prompt: Obu turikutandika orugyendo rw'okugaruka busya n'okutunguuka, buri mutuuragye ashemereire kugira eki yaakora. Oburemeezi oburi omu maisho nibwetenga okwehayo n'okugumisiriza kuruga ahariitwe twena.

eng_prompt: As we gather our resources and strategize, it's clear that we need to focus our efforts. The challenges we face will require teamwork and dedication.
lug_prompt: Nga tukungaanya ebyetaago byaffe n'okukola enteekateeka, kyeyoleka bulungi nti twetaaga okussa amaanyi gaffe. Okusoomoozebwa kwe twolekaganye nakwo kujja kwetaagisa okukolera awamu n'okwewaayo.
