ach_prompt: Ka watye ka coko jami ma watye kwede ki yubu yoo me tic, nen atyer kamaleng ni omyero waket cwiny wa i kom tic. Peko ma watye ka kato ki iye omyero watii kacelo dok watii matek.
teo_prompt: Neautar sio atukun iboro wok kosodete aitemonokin iwaitin, ecai cut ebe ibusakinit oni aibwaikin agogongu wok. Atiokisio nu itereikina oni ekotosi aswam nepepe ka ainakina.
lgg_prompt: Amani afa amani 'diyi trazu azini otuta 'yeria, eri e'da kililiru kini le ama ma 'ba asi okpo amani 'diyi ma dria. E'yo ewaru amani esu 'diyi le azi ngaza tualu asi 'baza be.
nyn_prompt: Twaba niturundaana ebintu byaitu kandi tukakora enteekateeka, nikyoreka butunu ngu twine kuta amaani gaitu. Oburemeezi obu turikushanga nibwetenga okukorera hamwe n'okwehayo.

eng_prompt: Despite our shared goals and values, internal conflicts have begun to surface. Tensions have escalated as differing opinions clash, leading to a divide among the members.

eng_prompt: After hours of searching through the dense forest, the search team finally received a tip about her whereabouts. Exhausted and frightened, she had been waiting for help, hoping someone would find her soon.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okumala essaawa eziwera nga banoonya mu kibira, abanoonya baatuuka n'okufuna obubaka obukwata ku kifo we yali. Olw'okuba yali akooye era ng'atidde, abadde alindirira obuyambi ng'asuubira nti wajja kubaawo amunoonya.

eng_prompt: In times of uncertainty and despair, the community often looks to their leader for guidance. The minister always has a story of hope to tell the people.
lug_prompt: Mu biseera by'obutali bukakafu n'okuggwaamu essuubi, abantu batera okutunuulira abakulembeze baabwe okubawa obulagirizi. Bulijjo minisita abeera n'emboozi ey'essuubi gy'abuulira abantu.

eng_prompt: Recent public health initiatives and increased access to healthcare services have significantly improved the health outcomes in the country. As a result, Uganda's overall disease prevalence rate has been reduced.

ach_prompt: Yub me yot kom ma otime cokcok-ki ki medo yoo me nongo kony me yot kom I lobo man okelo dongo pa rwom me yot kom I lobo man. Macalo adwogi ne, wel two matye I lobo Uganda ojwik tutwal.
teo_prompt: Aitemonokineta nuitetiak nuka angaleu naka itunga keda aiyatakinio naka adumunun amukian ejokuna noi kotoma akwapuwok. Kanuka ngun, ekidiokoto adekasinei ko Uganda.
lgg_prompt: Otita o'diru e'yo alata ni o'bi eyini 'diyi ma dria azini geri 'bani azakoma fele e'yo rua alanisi 'diyi esuzu ri otu e'yo alata ni kari 'di ma alea ri ra. E'yo 'disi, ongmbo azo eyi ma ereta kari Uganda niri ma alea ri esi ra.
nyn_prompt: Enteekateeka y'eby'amagara eyabaireho obwahati hamwe n'okwongyera aha buheereza bw'eby'amagara, bitunguurize munonga eby'amagara omu ihanga. N'ekyarugiremu, omuhendo gw'abarwaire omu Uganda gukyendeire.

eng_prompt: Recent advancements in medical research and public health initiatives have significantly reduced the incidence of various diseases. This progress highlights the importance of collaboration among healthcare professionals and the community.
lug_prompt: Enkulaakulana gye buvuddeko mu kunoonyereza kw'ebyobujjanjabi n'enteekateeka z'ebyobulamu mu bantu zikendeezezza nnyo okubalukawo kw'endwadde ez'enjawulo. Enkulaakulana eno eraga obukulu bw'okukolagana wakati w'abasawo n'abantu.
ach_prompt: Alokaloka ma otimme cokcok-ki I kwed me yot-kom ki yub me yot-kom pa lwak odwoko piny rwom me two mapat-pat. Yub eni nyutu ber pa winye ikin lutic yoto kom ki lwak.
teo_prompt: Apol naka aingic naka adekisia keda nuka angaleu naka itunga itidisiari noi adekasinei nuegelegela. Itodunit apolou na ajokis naka aiswamanara kiding eswamak luka angaleu keda itunga.
lgg_prompt: E'yo angu ezoma o'diru e'yo vuti ondaza arojo ni 'diyi ma alia azini otuta e'yo alata o'bi eyini 'diyi ma dria 'diyi esi e'yo azo ndundu eyini eyi 'yezu 'diyi ma omgbo ra. Zota 'di ece orodri ti ecita ni 'ba azi ngapi arojoa 'diyi ma eselea ongulumu eyi pie ri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Entunguuka omu kucondooza ahaby'amarwariro hamwe n'enteekateeka y'eby'amagara, bikyendeezeire munonga okujanjaara kw'endwara nyingi. Entunguuka egi neeyoreka omugasho gw'okukwatanisa ahagati y'abakugu omu by'amagara hamwe n'abantu.

eng_prompt: Recent studies have highlighted a troubling rise in gender-based violence in various regions. Community leaders are urging victims to come forward and seek help from law enforcement.
lug_prompt: Okunoonyereza okwakakolebwa kulaga nti okutulugunyizibwa mu kikula ky'abantu kweyongedde mu bitundu eby'enjawulo. Abakulembeze b'ekitundu bakubiriza abakoseddwa okujja okunoonya obuyambi okuva mu bakuumaddembe.
ach_prompt: Kwed ma otime cokcok-ki onyuto ni tim gero ikin mon ki coo tye ka medde tutwal I but lobo mapat-pat. Lutela me kabedo gitye ka lego dano ma bal otimme I komgi me bino ka nongo kony ki bot abili.
teo_prompt: Aingic napac itodunit ebe iyata noi amumu na okalia kotoma aiboisio nuegelegela. Isinyikokitos engarenok luka atutubet itunga luejaasi keda ationis alomun kosodete adumun aingarakinio kama ejaasi ipolisin.
lgg_prompt: E'yo eti ondaza o'diru 'diyi ece kini ngiringiri oku eyi ma eselea agupi eyi pie ri ma omgbo ni tu angu ndundu eyi ma alea ra. Drice'ba ongulumu eyini 'diyi ai 'ba e'yo eyi 'yepi ra 'diyi emuzu azakoma ndazu engazu 'ba azita eyi ma ta mbapi 'diyi vu.
nyn_prompt: Okucondooza okuhweireho kworeka okweyongyera kw'okunyangaraza abantu kurugirira ahakikura kyabo omu byanga bitari bimwe na bimwe. Abeebembezi b'ebyaro, nibashaba abo abateganisiibwe kwija aheeru, basherure obuhwezi kuruga omu b'ebiragiro.

eng_prompt: Despite significant progress in controlling outbreaks, public health officials remain concerned about lingering hotspots. Recent reports indicate that certain areas are struggling to manage ongoing health challenges.
lug_prompt: Newankubadde wabaddewo enkulaakulana mu kutangira okubalukawo kw'ekirwadde, abakungu b'ebyobulamu beeraliikirivu olw'ebifo ebirimu obulwadde. Lipoota ezifulumizibwa gye buvuddeko ziraga nti ebitundu ebimu birwana nnyo okuvvuunuka okusoomoozebwa kw'ebyobulamu okugenda mu maaso.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni alokaloka madit otime I gengo poto pa two, lutic me yot kom pud tye ki lworo I kom kabedo ma two tye iye. Adwogi tic manyen nyutu ni kabedo mukene tye ka tute matek me lweny i kom peko me yot kom matye kawot anyim.
teo_prompt: Karaida ejai apol naepol noi kotoma aitikitik abwangun na adekasinei, eringa eswamak luka angaleu epodokitos nuikamunitos aiboisio nueroko noi. Itodunitos iripotan luitetiak ebe eutasi aiboisio ace ainingosit aitikitik atiokisio nuka angaleu.
lgg_prompt: E'yo drile suzaru e'yo azo efupi 'diyi ma aza kozu ra ti, azi'ba e'yo rua alanisi 'diyi asi otiza be e'yo angu ewaru 'diyi ma ta mbazu 'diyi ma dria. O'duko efupi o'diru 'diyi ece kini angu azi 'diyi dri ci e'yo ewaru e'yo rua alanisi 'diyi ma aza kozu.
nyn_prompt: N'obu haraabe hariho entunguuka y'amaani omu kurwanisa okubarukaho kw'endwara, abakuru omu by'amagara bakyerarikiriire ebirikukwata aha myanya y'oburwaire. Ripoota eziherize kukorwa nizooreka ngu ebicweka ebimwe nibirwana kurwanisa oburemeezi bw'eby'amagara oburikugyenda omu maisho.

eng_prompt: In Northern Uganda, agriculture plays a crucial role in the economy and the livelihoods of many families. Despite the challenges they face, a significant portion of the female population is engaged in farming activities.
lug_prompt: Mu bukiikakkono bwa Uganda, ebyobulimi n'obulunzi bikola kinene nnyo mu by'enfuna ne mu kweyimirizaawo kw'amaka mangi. Wadde nga basanga okusoomoozebwa, ekitundu ky'abakyala ekinene beenyigira mu byobulimi.
ach_prompt: I kumalo me Uganda, pur tye gin ma pire tek tutwal I tenge me lim ki kwo pa gangi mapol. Kadi bed ni gitye ki peko mapol, pol pa mon tye ka pur.
teo_prompt: Ko Nyakoi nako Uganda, ejaasi akoru keda aswam naepol noi kotoma ikapun keda aijar naka ikalia luipu. Karaida ejaas kesi keda atiokisio, ejaasi angor nuipu toma akoru.
lgg_prompt: Kari Uganda niri ma woko oruleru ri ma alea, agirikica ni azi okporu nga e'yo robiani azini geri familia karakara eyini aa'zu ri ma alea. E'yo ewaru eyini esu 'diyi ma talasi, oku karakara eyi 'yeta agirikica ni 'diyi 'ye.
nyn_prompt: Omu matemba ga Uganda, eby'obuhingi n'oburiisa nibikora omurimo gw'amaani omu by'entaasya hamwe n'entuura y'amaka maingi. Oihireho oburemeezi obu abakazi barikurabamu, ekicweka kihango ky'abakazi nikikora emirimo y'obuhingi n'oburiisa.

eng_prompt: In many rural communities, agricultural labor is a vital part of daily life, with families relying on every member to contribute. This dedication to farming is evident in the way that girls as young as three years old and women of all ages always work very hard on the farms.
lug_prompt: Mu bitundu by'ebyalo bingi, okulima n'okulunda kintu kikulu mu bulamu obwa bulijjo, nga amaka geesigama ku buli muntu okuwaayo. Okwewaayo kuno eri ebyobulimi kweyolekera mu ngeri abawala abato ab'emyaka esatu n'abakyala ab'emyaka gyonna gye bakola ennyo ku faamu.
ach_prompt: I kabedo mapol me caro, tic me pur obedo gin ma pire tek tutwal I kwo me nino ducu, ki gangi jenge I kom dano weng me miyo kony. Keto cwiny eni I kom pur nen I yoo ma anyira matino ma mwaka gi tye adek ki mon ma mwaka gi pat pat I kare weng gitiyo matek tutwal I poto.
teo_prompt: Kocaaloi luipu, aswam na akoru erai ibore yenepol noi kotoma aijar naka nginiparan. Apodokinit na akoru itodunit ebe apesur nudidika kwape ikar iuni keda angor nuka ikar luegelegela iswamaete kagogong kotoma amisirin.
lgg_prompt: Angu calua karakara 'diyi ma alea, azi ngaza agirikica ma alea ri eri e'yo azi orodriru ni idri o'du driasi, familia eyini asi 'bazu 'ba dria eyini afa fezu ri ma dria. Asi feza 'diri e'da geri ezoanzi eli be na azini oku eli ndundu 'diyi ni azi ngazu okposi angu amvu 'yazu 'diyi ma alia.
nyn_prompt: Omu byaro ebingi, abakozi b'eby'obuhingi n'oburiisa n'ab'omugasho munonga omu magara gaabo. Okwehayo aha buhingi n'oburiisa nikyerekwa omu muringo ogu abaishiki ab'emyaka eshatu hamwe n'abakazi b'emyaka yoona barikukoresa amaani omu faamu.

eng_prompt: For years, she lived in the shadows, her experiences hidden from the world. Despite the extraordinary events that shaped her life, she chose to keep them a secret.
lug_prompt: Okumala emyaka mingi, yali abeera mu kisiikirize, ng'ebyo bye yayitamu abikwese ensi. Wadde nga waliwo ebintu eby'enjawulo ebyaliwo mu bulamu bwe, yasalawo okubikuuma nga bya kyama.
ach_prompt: Pi mwaki mapol, en obedo I tipo, jami ma en okato I iye okanne ki bot lobo. Kadi bed ni jami mapol otimme I kwone, en omoko tamme me gwokogi I mung.
teo_prompt: Kanu ikar luipu, abu ngesi iboyete kotoma aingadisia nuka aiyeyea, kosodi aingop akiroke kama ejai akwap. Karaida ejaas iboro luitegelikina luapotu ijulakisi aijarake, abu ngesi koseu aingada ngun kwape aiyeyea.
lgg_prompt: Eli karakara eyi ma alea, eri aa angu aliru 'diyi ma alea, e'yo erini esu 'diyi ozizu engazu wudrikuru vurisi. E'yo onzi i 'yepi idri erini 'diyi ojapi ra 'diyi ma talasi, eri pe yi 'bazu ndiaru.
nyn_prompt: Kumara emyaka mingi, akatuura omu bicuucu, ebyamuhikireho bikasherekyerwa ensi. Oihireho ebintu by'omutaano ebyabaireho omu magara gye, akacwamu kubibiika nk'ekihama.

eng_prompt: As the conflict escalated, she watched helplessly as her family was torn apart. The constant fear and uncertainty weighed heavily on her heart, leaving scars that would never heal.
lug_prompt: Obukuubagano bwe bwagenda bweyongera, yatunuulira nga talina ky'asobola kukola ng'amaka ge gatemagana. Okutya n'obutali bukakafu ebya buli kaseera byazitowa nnyo ku mutima gwe, ne bisigaza enkovu ezaali tezisobola kuwona.
ach_prompt: I kare ma lweny ne omedde, en oneno ki cwinye ducu kit ma gang mege tye ka bale kwede. Lworo ki lworo ma obedo tye I kome I kare weng oketo lyeto I cwinye, oweko arem ma pe twero cang.
teo_prompt: Neapolor ingungeta, abu ngesi koany komam epedori aswam iboro luetiakara ekaleke. Abu akuriau keda amamus ajenun apol noi kotoma etau ke, kojalakisi ngesi ariebo nu mam epedorete angaleun.
lgg_prompt: Erita ako ni tuzu drile, eri ndre e'yo kokoru familia eriniri ni i erezurisi. Uri azini e'yo 'bani ega kokoru sawa driasi 'diyi e'bi eri ma asi ma dria nzizaru, erini ani e'yo onzi 'bani eco ati ku 'diyi kuzu.
nyn_prompt: Obutabanguko ku bwayeyongyeire, akareeba ataine ky'okukora, eka ye erikushatukana. Okwerarikirira n'okutiina ebyabaire nibimuremera aha mutima, kikamureka n'ebironda ebyabaire bitarikubaasa kukira.

eng_prompt: After experiencing persistent cough and fatigue for several days, she decided to get tested for the virus. The results came back, confirming her worst fears.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okusiiyibwa n'obukoowu okumala ennaku eziwera, yasalawo okwekebeza akawuka. Ebyava mu kukebera byazzeeyo, ne bikakasa okutya kwe okubi ennyo.

teo_prompt: Akaulo naka aimusung keda apasit adaun aparasia nuipu, abu ngesi koseu ainwakio kanuka adeka. Apotu akiro ngun obongutu, kitogogongitos akuriau ke.

nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okuburwa orwezo n'oburuhe kumara ebiro bingi, akasharamu kukyeberwa akakooko. Ebyarugiremu bikagaruka, byayoreka okwerarikirira kwe.

eng_prompt: For years, I had suspected that my husband was hiding something from me. The weight of his silence grew heavier as I uncovered the truth piece by piece.
lug_prompt: Okumala emyaka, nnali ndowooza nti omwami wange alina ky'ankweka. Obuzito bw'okusirika kwe bweyongera bwe nneeyongera okuzuula amazima.
ach_prompt: Pi mwaki mapol, abedo ki byek ni cwara tye ka kano gin mo ki bota. Peko me ling mege omedde matek tutwal I kare ma acako niang lok ada acel-acel.
teo_prompt: Kanu ikar luipu, aomit eong ebe euta okilenika aingop eong ibore. Apolor noi aililingike naarai apotu eong ajenutu akiro nukabeit.
lgg_prompt: Eli karakara, ma ega andra kini ma vile agupiri ni afa azi ozi ma tia ci. E'yo erini ovuzu ciri ma nziza ni tu uru mani e'yo ada e'dazu kalaa kalaa.
nyn_prompt: Kumara emyaka mingi, nkaba ninteekateeka ngu omushaija wangye aine eki arikunkwekyera. Oburemeezi bw'okuhunama kwe bukaguma nibweyongyera ku naabaire ninyetegyereza amazima kakye kakye.

eng_prompt: After hearing about the outbreak in the nearby village, we knew we had to act quickly. With no supplies left, our only option was to journey to the distant town for the essential medicine.
lug_prompt: Bwe twawulira ku kubalukawo kw'ekirwadde mu kyalo ekituliraanye, twakimanya nti tulina okubaako kye tukolawo mu bwangu. Olw'okuba ebikozesebwa byali biweddewo, ekintu kyokka kye twalina okukola kwe kugenda mu kabuga akali ewala okufuna eddagala ery'omugaso.
ach_prompt: Inge winyo lok I kom poto pa two I caro matye cok, wangeyo ni omyero watim gin mo oyot oyot. Pien jami me acama onongo dong odong peke, gin acel keken ma onongo watye kwede obedo cito i boma mabor ka wilo yat ma mitte pi kwowa.
teo_prompt: Akaulo na apupun nuikamunitos abwangun naka ekorona kocalo loeyapiei, ajeni sio ebe ibusakinit sio aswam katipet. Kwape amamete iboro luibusakinit oni aswam, apedori sio alosit otaun loelwana kanu adumun ikee lu epol ajokis.
lgg_prompt: Erini e'yo erizu e'yo azo 'da ni e'dozu calo jo ejele ru 'diyi ma alea ri ma dria 'bori ma vutia, ama nii ra kini le ama ma 'ye e'yo mbeleru. Afa ayuzaru 'diyi ma ako si, e'yo lu amani eco 'ye ri acizu tawuni aliaruni ma alia aro orodriru 'diyi esuzu.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okuhurira okubarukaho kw'endwara omu kyaro ekiri haihi, tukamanya ngu twine kukora juba. Ahabw'okugira ngu tukaba tutakiine bintu by'okukoresa, ekintu kyonka eki twabaire nitubaasa kukora n'okuza omu tauni y'ahare kutunga emibazi y'omugasho.

eng_prompt: I was surprised to see her playing in the yard instead of sitting in class. The school called this morning to inform me that she hadn't shown up today.
lug_prompt: Kyanneewuunyisa okumulaba ng'azannyira mu luggya mu kifo ky'okutuula mu kibiina. Essomero lyankubidde essimu enkya ya leero okumbuulira nti teyalabiseeko leero.
ach_prompt: Abedo ki ngeng tutwal me neno nyakoni tye ka tuko I dyekal me kaka bedo I ot kwan. Gang kwan ogona cim odiko matin me tita ni en pe obino tin.
teo_prompt: Abu eong aumokin noi asesen ngesi ebolia kotoma alaro aiboisit naka aiboikin atukot. Abu esomero inomak eong esimu atupuruc na kanu aitijenikin eong ebe mam ngesi abu kobu lolo.
lgg_prompt: Ma eca osutasi eri ndrezu aviria aku dria ri ma paria rizu kilasia ri ma paria. Sukulu 'da omve ma o'biti 'dosi luzu ma dri kini eri awini emu andru ku.
nyn_prompt: Nkatangaara kumureeba nazaanira omu mbuga omu mwanya gw'okushutama omu kiraasi. Ab'eishomero bakateera esimu omu kasheeshe k'erizooba kumanyisa ngu erizooba taraizire.

eng_prompt: Despite their desperate situation, the family has exhausted all their savings and options for financial assistance. Now, they find themselves in a heartbreaking dilemma.
lug_prompt: Ng'oggyeko embeera yaabwe embi, ab'omu maka ago bakozesezza ssente zaabwe zonna ze baatereka n'engeri endala ez'okufuna obuyambi mu by'ensimbi. Kati, beesanga mu buzibu obw'amaanyi.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni gitye I peko matek tutwal, lugang ne gutiyo ki cente weng ma gubedo kwede me nongo kony me lim. Kombedi gitye I peko madit tutwal.
teo_prompt: Karaida ejaas kesi toma ojautene loaronon, adau ekale ngol aitosom ikapun kere luimonoete kesi keda lu epedorete kesi adumun agangat na ikapun. Kwana, ewanyunitos kesi ebe ejaas kesi toma ationis naetiono noi.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru yini ovuzu 'diyi ma talasi, familia 'da eza robia eyini tra dria azini geri eyini ecozu robia esuzu 'diyi dria 'bo. Sawa 'disi, eyi esu eyi e'yo ewaru ma alea.
nyn_prompt: N'obu haraabe hariho oburemeezi bw'amaani, eka ekaba eshaziremu esente zaayo zoona n'obuhwezi bw'esente. Hati, nibeshanga bari omu buremeezi bw'amaani.

eng_prompt: Despite the increasing awareness of gender-based violence in conflict zones, many issues affecting women remain overlooked. This neglect often leads to a lack of support and resources for those who have suffered the most.
lug_prompt: Wadde nga waliwo okumanyisibwa ku butabanguko obwesigamiziddwa ku kikula mu bitundu ebirimu entalo, ensonga nnyingi eziruma abakyala zisuuliddwa amaaso. Okulagajjalirwa kuno kutera okuviirako obutaba na buyambi n'ebikozesebwa eri abo abasinga okubonaabona.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni rwom me ngec i kom tim gero ikin mon ki coo tye kamede i kabedo ma lweny tye iye, lok mapol ma balo kwo pa mon pud ki cayo gi. Cayo man ipol kare kelo peko me nok pa kony ki jami ma mite pi jo ma gunongo peko madwong loyo.
teo_prompt: Karaida iyata aijen naka amumu na okalia kotoma aiboisio nu ejie, akiro nuipu nuetiroritos angor mam epalunit. Apalunite na duc eyangauni amamus na agangat keda iboro lu itunga lu icanasi noi.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'bani 'ba eyi ma mile ozizu e'yo ngiringiri agupi eyi ma eselea oku eyi pie ri ma dria ri ma omgbo ni tuzu ra ti, e'yo karakara oku eyini candi fepi 'diyi ma dria 'diyi ma dria ri ma dria ku. Adi 'di ni tutuni fe atita azini afa ayuzaru 'diyi ma ako 'ba dri ci 'diyi dri.
nyn_prompt: N'obu haraabe hariho okweyongyera kw'okumanya ebirikukwata aha butabaguko bw'ekikura ky'abantu omu myanya y'entaro, enshonga nyingi ezirikuteganisa abakazi nizibaasa kwehuzya. Okunagaijura oku, nikureetera abo ababonabonesiibwe munonga obuhwezi n'ebintu ebitarikwetengwa.

eng_prompt: As the election approaches, public discussions are increasingly focused on the candidates' promises and their potential impact on the community. Voter engagement is at an all-time high, with many expressing hope for a transformative outcome.
lug_prompt: Ng'okulonda kusembera, okukubaganya ebirowoozo mu lujjudde kweyongera okussa essira ku bisuubizo by'abeesimbyewo n'engeri gye biyinza okukwatamu ekitundu. Okwenyigira kw'abalonzi kuli ku mutindo gwa waggulu nnyo, era bangi balaze essuubi nti wajja kubaawo enkyukakyuka.
ach_prompt: I kare ma yer tye cok, lwak tye ka lok i kom cikke pa lucungu ki adwogi ma twero bedo I kom lwak. Bedo tye pa lubol kwir tye I rwom ma lamal tutwal, ki dano mapol tye ki gen me aloka loka.
teo_prompt: Neyapiete aseo, eutasi itunga einer nuikamunitos aisumuneta nuka abwoak keda epone loepedoriata kesi aitodolikin itunga. Alosikinet naka aseak erai naepol noi, itunga luipu itodunitos amuno naka aijulakin akiro.
lgg_prompt: Opeta eyini ecazu ogogo risi, o'bi eyi e'yo nze e'yo 'ba pa tupi 'diyini owizu 'diyi ma dria tualu e'yo eyini eco 'ye ongulumu eyi ma dria ra 'diyi pie. E'yo 'ba voti 'be'baa 'diyi ma eselea ri ma omgbo angiri, 'ba karakara eyi asi'baza e'yo ojata ni 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Oburuuru ku burikuhika haihi, abantu nibaganiira aha biraganiso by'abeesimbireho hamwe n'oburemeezi obu barikubaasa kukora aha bantu. Abateezi b'akaruuru bari aha rurengo rw'ahaiguru, kandi baingi baine amatsiko ngu nihaija kubaho empinduka.

eng_prompt: In recent years, there has been growing concern about the concentration of power in the executive branch. Many believe that reinstating restrictions on presidential terms would promote a healthier democratic process.
lug_prompt: Mu myaka egiyise, wabaddewo okweraliikirira okweyongera ku kukungaanya kw'obuyinza mu kitongole ky'obukulembeze. Bangi balowooza nti okuzzaawo ekkomo ku bisanja by'obwapulezidenti kyanditumbudde enkola ya demokulasiya ennungi.
ach_prompt: I mwaki ma okato cokcok-ki, lworo tye ka mede I kom bedo pa tela I tenge me tela. Dano mapol gitye ki niyee ni dwoko lageng I kom tyen me loc pa ladit lobo obi kelo loc alwak maber.
teo_prompt: Kokaru lu atuboros, ejai aiyalongong naepol noi kanu aipikakin apugan toma atukot naka apugan. Iyuunitos itunga luipu ebe ainyakun ikisila luka aiboisio nuka lokapolon akwap epedori aitopolor aseo naka itunga.
lgg_prompt: Eli agapi 'bo 'diyi ma alea, asi otiza e'bi tu e'yo opi nyaza ni 'diyi ma dria okalamvu executive niri ma alea ri ma dria. Ba karakara eyi ai ra kini e'yo 'bani drile kari ni 'diyi ma termi eyi atrizu ri ni nga e'yo democracia ni 'diyi ma omgbo otu ra.
nyn_prompt: Omu myaka egi, hatwireho okwerarikirira aha bikwatiraine n'obwebembezi oburi omu kitongore ekirikureeberera eihanga. Baingi nibaikiriza ngu okugaruraho ebiragiro by'ebisanja by'omwebembezi w'eihanga nikiija kureetaho enkora nungi omu by'obutegyeki.

eng_prompt: Despite the increasing engagement and enthusiasm among citizens regarding the electoral process, many are expressing frustration with the effectiveness of government services. This disconnect between voter awareness and public sector performance raises significant concerns about accountability and governance.
lug_prompt: Wadde nga bannansi beeyongedde okwenyigira n'obunyiikivu mu by'okulonda, bangi balaze obwennyamivu olw'obuweereza bwa gavumenti obulungi. Okwawukana kuno wakati w'okumanyisa abalonzi n'enkola y'ekitongole kya gavumenti kuleetawo okweraliikirira okw'amaanyi ku buvunaanyizibwa n'obukulembeze.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni miti ki miti pa lwak tye kamede i kom yub me bolo kwir, polgi tye ka nyutu cwer cwiny gi i kom tic pa gamente. Apoka poka man ikin miyo ngec bot lubol kwir ki kit ma tic pa gamente tye kawot kwede kelo lworo madit tutwal I kom kor tic ki tela.
teo_prompt: Karaida iyata eipud lo itunga kanu aseo, itunga luipu itodunitos amamut aiyalama kanu ejanakine lo apugan. Amamus na aisisianakino naka aseak keda eswamae lo apugan eyangauni aiyalongong naepol noi kanuikamunitos eipone lo itwasamatere ikapun keda apugan.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'ba kari ni 'diyi ni e'yo 'yezu tualu ava be e'yo opetaa ni 'diyi ma dria ra ti, 'ba karakara eyi asi nyoza e'da geri gamete ni azi ngazu kililiru ri si. Erita ako 'di 'ba voti 'bepi 'diyi ma mile oziza ma eselea azini azi ngaza esele o'bi yini 'diyi ma eselea ri ni asi otiza okporu eji e'yo 'bani e'yo 'yezu 'diyi ma dria azini driceza ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Oihireho okwongyera kwejumba n'okushemererwa omu by'okuteera akaruuru, abantu baingi tibarikushemererwa ahabw'obuheereza bwa gavumenti. Okuremwa kukwatanisa ahagati y'okumanyisa abateezi b'akaruuru n'okukoragye omu bitongore bya gavumenti, nikireetaho okwerarikirira kw'amaani aha nshonga y'embaririra n'obwebembezi.

eng_prompt: In an effort to stimulate economic growth and attract new businesses, the city officials implemented a series of policy changes. As a result, the mayors generally extracted fewer rental fees in the city.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'okutumbula enkulaakulana mu byenfuna n'okusikiriza bizinensi empya, abakungu b'ekibuga baateekawo enkyukakyuka mu nkola. N'ekyavaamu, bameeya baasasulanga ssente ntono ez'obupangisa mu kibuga.
ach_prompt: I tute me kelo dongo lobo ki biacara manyen, lutic me boma madit gukelo aloka-loka mapol I cik. Macalo adwogi ne, meya onongo cente me pango ot manok I boma madit.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitopolor apol naka ikapun ka ayangaun ibiasaran luitetiak, apotu eswamak luka esite kiswamata aijulanakineta nuipu. Kanuka ngun, apotu imeyan odumutu ikapun idis luka aipagis kotoma oibuga.
lgg_prompt: Okpo 'bazu zota e'yo robiani 'diyi ma alia azini tujara o'diru 'diyi ejizu, azi'ba aku ambu cityniri ma alia 'diyi 'ye ojata e'yo azita ni 'diyi ma alia karakara. E'yo 'disi, 'ba meya ru 'diyi 'du aje jo ofeza ni aku ambu cityniri ma alia 'diyi ma ongmbo ele.
nyn_prompt: Omu kaweefube w'okureetaho entunguuka omu by'entaasya hamwe n'okureetaho bizinesi nsya, abakuru b'orurembo bakakora empindahinduka nyingi omu biragiro. N'ekyarugiremu, ba meeya bakashashura ebishare bikye by'obupangisa omu rurembo.

eng_prompt: In response to growing concerns about the economic impact of the pandemic, local officials have been exploring ways to assist small businesses. As part of this initiative, the mayors have recognized the importance of street vendors in revitalizing the community.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula okweraliikirira okweyongera ku ngeri ebyenfuna gye bikosaamu ekirwadde bbunansi, abakungu b'ebyalo babadde banoonya engeri y'okuyambamu bizinensi entonotono. Ng'omu ku kaweefube ono, bameeya bakitegedde obukulu bw'abasuubuzi b'oku nguudo mu kuzzaawo ekitundu.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me lworo ma tye kamede I kom adwoki pa two korona I kom lim, lutic me tedero gubedo ka yenyo yoo me konyo biacara matino-tino. Macalo but yub man, meya guniang ber pa lucat iteng gudi me roco kwo pa lwak.
teo_prompt: Kanuka aiyalongongo naepol noi naikamunit atiokisio nuka ikapun kanuka adeka naka ekorona, eutasi eswamak luka atutubet aingic iwaitin lu ingarakinere ibiasaran ludidik. Kwape ediopet koboro kalu, ejenete imeyan ajokis naka agwelanarak lu orotin kanu aisiteteun itunga.

nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okweyongyera kw'okwerarikirira aha bikwatiraine n'oburemeezi bw'eby'entaasya bw'endwara ruranda nsi, abakuru omu byaro batwire nibaronda oburyo bw'okuhwera bizinesi nkye. Nk'emwe aha nteekateeka egi, ba meeya bamanyire omugasho gw'abashubuzi b'ahanguuto omukugarura busya abantu.

eng_prompt: Despite the challenges they faced during her recovery, she remained hopeful that their love would endure. When she finally emerged from the hospital, she wondered if he would still want her in his life.
lug_prompt: Wadde nga baayolekagana n'okusoomoozebwa ng'awona, yasigala asuubira nti omukwano gwabwe gujja kweyongera. Bwe yava mu ddwaliro yeebuuza oba akyamwagala mu bulamu bwe.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni gukato ki peko mapol I kare ma en tye ka cang, en obedo ki gen ni mar meggi bimedde anyim. I kare ma en okato ki I ot yat, en obedo ki akalakala ka en bimede ki mitte I kwone.
teo_prompt: Karaida apotu kesi odumutu atiokisio kapak na angaleuke, abu ngesi komuno ebe ebuni aminakec angetakin. Nealacakinia ngesi adekis, abu ngesi koomoom arai ekoto ngesi bobo aijarake.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru eyini esu erini atita esuria 'diyi ma talasi, eri awi asi'baza be kini eyi ma leta ni mu aa drile. Erini asizu fuzu arojoarisi amve 'bori ma vutia, eri osu e'yo erini nga kiri eri lezu idri eriniri ma alia ra ya ri ma dria.

eng_prompt: As the darkness began to lift, he watched me struggle to catch my breath, panic etched across my face. In that moment, a flicker of hope sparked within him, and he understood the truth of my resilience.
lug_prompt: Enzikiza bwe yatandika okukendeera, yandaba nga nfuba nnyo okussa, nga ntya nnyo. Mu kaseera ako, essuubi lyasituka mu ye, era n'ategeera amazima g'obuvumu bwange.

eng_prompt: After a long discussion about our relationship, he suggested we give it another try. Despite the changes, I felt a sense of comfort in being close to him again.

nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okuhanuura obwire buraingwa aha nkoragana yaitu, akatuha ekiteiso ngu tugyezeho ogundi murundi. Oihireho empindahinduka, nkaruhuuka ahabw'okugaruka kumuba haihi.

eng_prompt: Many individuals in the community are struggling to make ends meet, facing mounting debts and limited job opportunities. As a result, their ability to advocate for themselves and seek justice is severely compromised.

eng_prompt: In her role as a counselor, she is dedicated to supporting individuals in crisis. Her work focuses on empowering those who have experienced trauma and helping them navigate their healing journey.

ach_prompt: I ticce macalo lami tam, en oketo cwinye me konyo dano matye I peko. Ticce tye tutwalle me tyelo kor jo ma gudeno can ki konyogi me nongo yot kom.
teo_prompt: Kotoma aswamuke kwape ecoran, epodokinit ngesi aigang itunga luejaasi toma ationis. Isingarenit ngesi aswamuke aitigogong ngul lu etereikina keda ationis ka aingarakin kes aitodolikin epone lo angaleun.

eng_prompt: It's important to keep the child's health a top priority. Please schedule an appointment with the pediatrician soon.
lug_prompt: Kikulu okukulembeza obulamu bw'omwana. Nsaba mukwate akadde n'omusawo w'abaana mu bwangu.

eng_prompt: Many people believe that a leader's experience and presence are invaluable to an organization. However, some question the necessity of extending their tenure when fresh perspectives could invigorate the team.

ach_prompt: Dano mapol tye ki niyee ni ngec ki bedo tye pa latela pire tek tutwal I dul mo. Kadi bed kumeno, jo mukene tye ki akala-kala I kom miti me medo kare gi kace tam manyen twero jingo dul tuku eni.
teo_prompt: Iyuunitos itunga luipu ebe amisiarit keda ajaut naka engarenon erai ibore yenepol noi kanuka atukot. Konye, icetunga mam ejenete ajokis naka aiyatakin aswamukec konye epedorete aomisio nuitetiak aitogogong etimu.
lgg_prompt: Ba karakara eyi ai ra kini drice'ba eyi ma nita azini aa'ta eyi ma alea 'diyi orodriru amuti eyini. Kani si, 'ba azi 'diyi si e'yo 'bani lezu yi ma sawa idrizu 'diyi ma dria e'yo 'bani egata o'diru 'diyi ecozu okpo fezu amuti 'da dri ri ma dria ku.

eng_prompt: In recent years, many countries have experienced significant political changes. As a result, the concept of democracy has come under scrutiny and sparked lively debates among citizens and scholars alike.
lug_prompt: Mu myaka egiyise, ensi nnyingi zibaddemu enkyukakyuka ez'amaanyi mu byobufuzi. N'ekivuddemu, endowooza ya demokulasiya ezze mu kwekenneenyezebwa n'okuleetawo okukubaganya ebirowoozo okw'amaanyi mu bannansi ne bannassaayansi.

teo_prompt: Kokaru lu atuboros, ewanyunitos akwapin nuipu aijulanakineta nuka epolitikis. Kanuka ngun, ejai aomisioit naka aseo naka itunga keda esisiak epeget loepol noi.

eng_prompt: After a thorough examination, the doctor determined that the patient needed immediate treatment. To ensure the best care, the medicine was provided by one of our sisters.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okukebera obulungi omusawo yakizuula nti omulwadde yeetaaga obujjanjabi obw'amangu. Okukakasa obujjanjabi obulungi, eddagala lyaweebwa omu ku bannyinaffe.
ach_prompt: Ingee pime maber, daktar oniang ni latwo ne mito kony me yot kom oyot-oyot tutwal. Me neno ni dano tye ka nongo kony maber loyo, lamera acel aye omiya yat ne.

eng_prompt: In recent years, the way people communicate and connect with one another has undergone a significant transformation. As technology continues to advance, more individuals are turning to online platforms to maintain relationships and share their lives.
lug_prompt: Mu myaka egiyise, engeri abantu gye boogeramu n'okukwatagana n'abalala ebaddemu enkyukakyuka ey'amaanyi. Nga tekinologiya agenda mu maaso n'okukulaakulana, abantu bangi badda ku mikutu gya yintaneeti okukuuma enkolagana n'okugabana obulamu bwabwe.

teo_prompt: Kokaru lu atuboros, ejulakin epone lo inerakina itunga keda luce. Kwape iyatakini etatai loakwana, eutasi itunga luipu aijulakin aiboisio nuka elago kanu ajaut keda eidicane loajokan keda aimor aijarakec.
lgg_prompt: Eli agapi 'diyi ma alea, geri 'ba eyini e'yo nzezu azini eyi ecizu eyi ma eselea ri oja i ra. E'yo tekenologianiri ni mu drile muzu drile, 'ba karakara yi yi oja pari olia aliasi 'diyi ma alia yi ma eselea 'diyi ma tambazu azini yi ma idri awazu.

eng_prompt: The well-being of mothers is crucial for the health of families and communities. It's essential to raise awareness and foster discussions surrounding the challenges they face.

ach_prompt: Inge mwaki mapol me kano peko ne, en dong otyeko moko tamme me tito lok ada bot cware. Ki gum marac, lok ne obalo gen ikin gi.

eng_prompt: After a heated argument that shattered their once-happy home, she made the difficult decision to leave. In a moment of anger, he declared that she was no longer welcome.

ach_prompt: Inge laro lok matek ma obalo gang gi ma onongo gubedo iye ki yomcwiny, en omoko tam matek tutwal me aa woko. I kare ma en tye ki akemo, en owaco ni pe dong kimito jolo nyakoni.

eng_prompt: As she sat alone in the dim light of her living room, memories of happier times flooded her mind. The echoes of laughter and shared dreams now felt like distant ghosts, leaving her to confront the painful reality of her new life.
lug_prompt: Nga bw'atudde yekka mu kasana akatono mu ddiiro lye, ebijjukizo by'ebiseera eby'essanyu byajjula ebirowoozo bye. Okuwuuma kw'enseko n'ebirooto bye baagabana kati byawulikika ng'emizimu egiri ewala, ekyamusigadde okwolekera obulamu bwe obupya obw'obulumi.

teo_prompt: Neabwouna ngesi bon kotoma aica naka agolake, apotu akiro nuka aiyalama kilelebunos kotoma aomisioke. Apotu akiro nuka aikwenyar keda airujasia nuka aimor apupiata kwape aijar naelwana, kojalakisi ngesi aitepeg aijar naetiono noi naka aijarake naitetet.
lgg_prompt: Erini rizu eri vile jo ale alizaruri ma alia a'dulesi, e'yo egaza sawa ayikoru 'diyi ma dria 'diyi ga eri ma omi ma alia. O'duko o'duko nyazani azini orobi yini o'bazu yi ma eselea 'diyi curu'do e'da ekile ori aliaru 'diyi le, erini eri kuzu e'yo ewaru idri erini o'di 'diyiniri ma dria.

eng_prompt: In the aftermath of a collision, emergency responders often encounter a range of injuries among those involved. One of the most common injuries reported is damage to the lower extremities.
lug_prompt: Oluvanyuma lw'okutomeragana, abakola ku by'amangu batera okufuna obuvune bungi mu abo abakwatibwako. Emu ku buvune obusinga okuloopebwa kwe kwonoonebwa kw'ebitundu by'omubiri ebya wansi.

teo_prompt: Akaulo naka akangas, etapit itunga lu engeso adumunun amusungun nuipu noi kanejaas ngul luejaasi toma akangas kangin. Adiopet kotoma aimusungeta nuetapit duc alimor ngesi aimusungeta nuka atutubena nu okwap.
lgg_prompt: Drileonzi ma vutia, 'ba e'yo mbeleru 'diyi ma aza kopi 'diyi sawa driasi nya'biliko karakara eyi esu 'ba e'yo nde 'yepi 'diyi ma eselea. Nya'biliko alu 'bani olu tu 'diyi ma azi eri nya'biliko yi ma woko ele 'diyi ni.

eng_prompt: In today's fast-paced world, maintaining a healthy lifestyle is crucial for everyone. For women, prioritizing health can lead to better overall well-being and resilience against various challenges.
lug_prompt: Mu nsi ya leero ey'amangu, okukuuma obulamu obulungi kya mugaso nnyo eri buli omu. Eri abakyala, okukulembeza ebyobulamu kisobola okubaleetera okubeera obulungi n'okugumira okusoomoozebwa okutali kumu.
ach_prompt: I kare man ma jami tye ka time oyot-oyot tutwal, gwoko yot-kom obedo gin ma pire tek tutwal pi dano weng. Pi mon, keto yot kom obed gin ma pire tek twero weko gibedo maber dok bene giloyo peko mapat-pat.
teo_prompt: Kotoma akwap naka lolo, aidar aijar najokan erai ibore yenepol noi kanuka nginitunganan. Kanu angor, aisingarenit nuka angaleu epedori ayangaun aijar najokan ka aitikitik atiokisio nuegelegela.
lgg_prompt: Wudrikuru andruri ma alia, aa'zu rua ala be ri eri orodriru 'ba dria ni. Oku eyini, e'yo rua ala niri 'duzu okporu ri eco fe eyini aa'zu muke dika eyi eco e'yo ewaru ndundu eyi ma aza ko ra.

eng_prompt: In my role as a community liaison, I focus on enhancing public safety and addressing crime in our neighborhoods. To achieve this, I collaborate closely with local council leaders and police to follow up on the criminals.
lug_prompt: Mu mulimu gwange ng'omukwanaganya w'ekitundu, essira nditadde ku kutumbula obukuumi bw'abantu n'okukola ku buzzi bw'emisango mu bitundu byaffe. Okutuukiriza kino, nkolera wamu n'abakulembeze b'ebyalo ne poliisi okulondoola abamenyi b'amateeka.
ach_prompt: I ticca macalo ngat ma kubu lwak, aketo cwinya tutwalle I kom ilo malo rwom me ber bedo pa lwak ki lweny i kom timo bal I kabedo wa. Me cobo man, atiyo kacelo ki lutela me tedero kacel ki abili me lubu kor lutim bal.
teo_prompt: Kotoma aswamuka kwape arucokinitere itunga, apodokinit eong aitogogong ayuwara keda aitemokin abilibilio naka ikisila kaiboisio wok. Kanu aitodolikin ngun, eswamanara eong keda engarenok luka ekansulo keda ipolisin kanu atupakinit abilak ikisila.
lgg_prompt: Azi ma vile 'ba ongulumu eyi ma eselea ri ma alea, ma asi 'ba e'yo o'bi eyini aa'zu muke ri ma omgbo otuzu azini e'yo onzi 'yepi amavile angu ama agei 'diyi ma alea 'diyi ma aza kozu. E'yo 'di 'yezu, ma azi nga drice'ba kanisulu ni 'diyi pie tualu polisi eyi pie 'ba e'yo onzi 'yepi 'diyi ma vuti obizu.

eng_prompt: A stable democracy relies on the integrity of its electoral process. Ensuring that citizens can vote without fear or intimidation is essential for fostering trust in governance.
lug_prompt: Demokulasiya omutebenkevu yeesigamye ku bwesimbu bw'enkola ye ey'okulonda. Okukakasa nti bannansi basobola okulonda awatali kutya oba okutiisibwatiisibwa kya mugaso mu kutumbula obwesige mu bukulembeze.
ach_prompt: Loc alwak ma ocung matek jenge I kom yoo me yer matir. Neno ni anywali twero bolo kwir labongo lworo onyo lworo pire tek tutwal pi kelo gen i kom tela.
teo_prompt: Ainapeta nuka aseo nuejokuka kes itodunit ebe ejai aseo najokan. Aanyun ebe epedorete itunga aise komam ekuriaka arai aitukurian erai ibore yenepol noi kanu aitopolor amunokina kotoma apugan.

eng_prompt: Despite the numerous political issues affecting daily life, conversations often steer clear of contentious topics. Many citizens prefer to focus on community events and personal interests instead.
lug_prompt: Newankubadde ensonga z'ebyobufuzi nnyingi zikosa obulamu obwa bulijjo, emboozi zitera okwewala ensonga ezirimu enkaayana. Bannansi bangi baagala okussa essira ku bibaddewo mu kitundu n'ebigendererwa byabwe mu kifo ky'ekyo.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni lok me cungu iwi bye mapol tye ka yelo kwo me nino ducu, nywako lok ipol kare pe bedo I kom lok makelo apoka-poka. Lutedero mapol maro keto cwiny gi i kom jami ma time ikabedo gi ki miti gi.
teo_prompt: Karaida ipu akiro nuikamunitos politiks nuetiroritos aijar naka nginiparan, mam ineresinei etapit ajaut keda akiro nuetioko. Ekotosi itunga luipu apodokinit akiro nuka atutubet keda ipudesia kec.
lgg_prompt: E'yo politiki ni 'diyi ma kalafe ni ta tro aa'zu o'du driasi 'diyi ma alea ra ti, e'yo nzeza ni 'diyi tutuni e'yo agata ga'baa 'diyi ma dria ku. Kari anzi karakara eyi le asi e'yo ongulumu eyini 'diyi ma dria tualu e'yo eyi ma ngulupi ni 'diyi pie.

eng_prompt: As the sun rose on a crisp morning, excitement filled the air as citizens prepared to make their voices heard. Community leaders had rallied support, emphasizing the importance of participation in the democratic process.
lug_prompt: Enjuba bwe yavaayo ku makya amayonjo, essanyu lyajjula mu bbanga nga bannansi beetegekera okuleeta amaloboozi gaabwe okuwulirwa. Abakulembeze b'ekitundu baali bakungaanye obuwagizi, nga bakikkaatiriza obukulu bw'okwenyigira mu nkola ya demokulasiya.
ach_prompt: I kare ma ceng tye ka ryeny I odiko maleng, yomcwiny opong I yamo I kare ma anywali tye ka yubbe me winyo dwon gi. Lutela me kabedo gulego cwak, kun giwaco ni pire tek me bedo tye I yub me tela pa lwak.
teo_prompt: Kwape ebunit akolong tupuruc, apotu aiyalama kilelebunos kwape itunga lu ekapakina aitodiar iporotoikec. Apotu engarenok lu atutubet otukutu agangat, itogogongitos ajokis naka ajaut toma aseo naka itunga.
lgg_prompt: Etuka ni ecaria o'bitisi, ayiko ga angu ma alea kari anzi eyini oturia o'duko eyivile 'diyi erizu. Drice'ba ongulumu eyini 'diyi tra atita eyini e'yo orodriru fizu e'yo democracia ni 'diyi ma alea ri ecezu.

eng_prompt: Despite concerns about potential unrest, the community prepared for the upcoming election with a focus on peaceful dialogue and engagement. As the day approached, many residents expressed optimism about a smooth electoral process.
lug_prompt: Ng'oggyeko okweraliikirira ku butabanguko obuyinza okubaawo, abantu beetegekera okulonda okujja nga essira balitadde ku kuteesa okw'emirembe n'okukolagana. Olunaku bwe lwasembera, abatuuze bangi baalaga essuubi ku nkola y'okulonda ennungi.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni gubedo ki lworo I kom lweny matwero bedo tye, lwak guyube pi yer matye kabino ni kun giketo cwinygi I lok me kuc ki ribbe. I kare ma nino ne cok, lutedero mapol gubedo ki gen ni yer bibedo maber.
teo_prompt: Karaida ekuriaka nuikamunitos amumu, apotu itunga itemonokinos kanuka aseo naebunit kowai lo aineranara ka aineranara. Neyapiete apaaran ngin, apotu itunga luipu itodutu amuno naka aitolot aseo ejok.
lgg_prompt: E'yo asi otiza ni e'yo ngiringiri ni 'diyi ma dria ra ti, ongulumu eyi otu eyi opeta emupi 'diyi ni asi 'bazu e'yo nzezu asianzu si azini eyi ma eselea. O'du 'da ni ecazu ogogo risi, 'ba karakara angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ece asi'baza eyini e'yo opetaa ni 'diyi 'yezu kililiru ri ma dria.

eng_prompt: After months of intense campaigning and heated debates, the community was exhausted and eager for a resolution. As the final votes were tallied, anticipation hung in the air, marking the end of a long and tumultuous electoral season.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'emyezi gya kakuyege ow'amaanyi n'okukubaganya ebirowoozo okw'amaanyi, abantu baali bakooye era nga baagala nnyo okufuna eky'okugonjoola. Nga obululu obusembayo bubalibwa, okusuubira kwali mu bbanga, nga kino kyalaga enkomerero y'ekiseera ky'okulonda ekiwanvu era eky'akajagalalo.
ach_prompt: Ingee dwe mapol me bito kwir ki laro lok matek tutwal, lwak onongo ool dok gitye ki miti matek me nongo yoo me cobo peko ne. Ikare ma ki kwano kwir me agiki, byek obedo tye I yamo, man onyuto agiki pa kare me bolo kwir ma obedo kare malac dok ma opong ki kuku kuku kuku.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ilapio luka aisup aseeta keda epeget loepol noi, apasit itunga noi ido ekotosi aitemokin ationis. Neautar aimar abootin nuka awasia, apol noi aomisio nuka aseo naepol noi.
lgg_prompt: Mba ti odaza okporu azini agbatara okporu 'diyi ma vutia, ongulumu 'da ande 'bo dika eyi ava be e'yo 'da ma aza kozu. Bani voti asizu 'diyi lazu 'boria, asi 'baza ovu oli alia, ecepi sawa opetaa ezu azini e'yo ewaru 'diyiniri ni i deria.

eng_prompt: As the election approached, volunteers and staff worked tirelessly to ensure every detail was meticulously planned. Voter outreach efforts and logistical arrangements were executed with precision, setting the stage for a smooth electoral process.
lug_prompt: Okulonda bwe kwasembera, bannakyewa n'abakozi baakola butaweera okulaba nga buli kimu kitegekeddwa bulungi. Kaweefube w'okutuuka eri abalonzi n'enteekateeka zaakolebwa bulungi, ekyasobozesa okulonda okutambula obulungi.
ach_prompt: Ikare ma yer tye cok, joo ma odyere kacel ki lutic gutiyo matek tutwal me neno ni jami weng kiyubu maber tutwal. Yub me rweyo lok ki lubol kwir ki yub mapat-pat otime maber tutwal ma oweko yub me bolo kwir owoto maber tutwal.
teo_prompt: Neyapiete aseo, apotu itunga keda eswamak iswamata agogongu kanu awanyun ebe itemonokino akiro kere ejok. Aponi kitolosai akiro nuka aisisianakin aseak keda aitemonokineta nuka aitolot aseo ejok.
lgg_prompt: Opetaa ni ecazu ogogo, 'ba owi'ba azini azi'ba 'diyi nga azi ande kokoru nezu ra kini 'ba otu e'yo dria 'diyi kililiru. êž‹Ba êžŒye eêžŒyo êžŒbani êžŒba voti êžŒbepi êžŒdiyi ma ti ojizu azini otuta êžŒbani êžŒba voti êžŒbepi êžŒdiyi ma ti ojizu êžŒdiyi kililiru, yini fezu eêžŒyo êžŒyezu kililiru.

eng_prompt: Voter turnout was higher than expected, and the polling stations were efficiently managed. Many citizens praised the efforts of the local election officials.
lug_prompt: Abalonzi baali bangi nnyo okusinga bwe kyali kisuubirwa era ebifo ebironderwamu byaddukanyizibwa bulungi. Bannansi bangi baatenderezza kaweefube w'abakungu b'ebyokulonda mu byalo.

teo_prompt: Apolor noi enaaba loka aseak adepar lu eomitai, ido aponi kitolosai aiboisio nuka aicak abootin ejok. Apotu itunga luipu ituroto aswam naka eswamak lu aseo.
lgg_prompt: O'bi voti 'be'baa 'diyi ma kalafe angiri ndeni aga 'bani ega ri ra, dika pari voti 'bezuri ma ta mbaza kililiru. Kari anzi karakara eyi ecu okpo azi'ba angu 'da ma alea e'yo opetaa ni 'diyini 'diyi ra.

eng_prompt: In an effort to enhance learning and engagement, the school implemented a comprehensive digital strategy. Classrooms were equipped with interactive whiteboards, tablets, and online resources to support both teachers and students.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'okutumbula okusoma n'okwenyigiramu, essomero lyassa mu nkola enkola ya digito enzijuvu. Ebibiina byateekebwako ebipande ebirongoofu, tabuleti n'ebikozesebwa ku mutimbagano okuyamba abasomesa n'abayizi.
ach_prompt: I tute me medo rwom me kwan ki bedo tye pa lutino, gang kwan oketo yub me tic ki nyonyo pa munu I tic. Kiyubu ot kwan ki kom me coc, tabulet ki intanet me konyo lupwonye ki lutino kwan.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitogogong aisisia keda aineranara, abu esomero kitegear ainapeta nuka elago. Aponi ibwaikinai atukot naka aisisianakin itunga keda abawoi, ikee ludidik, keda iboro luka elago kanu aingarakin isisianakinak keda esisiak.

eng_prompt: As the election date approaches, officials are finalizing the details of the electoral process. One crucial aspect is ensuring the accuracy of the Votersâ€™ Register, which plays a vital role in the upcoming elections.
lug_prompt: Ng'olunaku lw'okulonda lusembera, abakungu bamaliriza byonna ebikwata ku kulonda. Ekimu ku bintu ebikulu kwe kukakasa nti enkalala z'abalonzi ntuufu, nga kino kikulu nnyo mu kulonda okujja.
ach_prompt: I kare ma nino me yer tye cok, lutic tye ka tyeko lok matut I kom yub me yer. Gin acel ma pire tek tutwal obedo neno ni nying lubol kwir tye kakare, ma man obedo gin ma pire tek tutwal I yer matye kabino ni.
teo_prompt: Neyapiete apaarasia nuka aseo, eutasi eswamak angetakin akiro nuikamunitos ainapeta nuka aseo. Adiopebore naepol noi ngesi awanyun ebe ejokuna aiwadikaeta nuka aseak, nuepolok noi kotoma aseo naebunit.
lgg_prompt: O'du opetaa ni ecazu ogogo, azi'ba eyi e'yo dria e'yo opetaa ni 'diyi ma dria 'diyi asizu. E'yo azi okporu ni ri lezu nezu ra kini buku 'ba voti 'be'baa 'diyi ma ru osizuri ma e'yo adaru, dika eri azi okporu ni nga opeta emupi 'diyi ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Eizooba ry'okuteera akaruuru ku ririkuhika haihi, abakungu bariyo nibahendera ebirikukwata aha by'okuteera akaruuru. Ekikuru munonga n'okureeba ngu orukarara rw'abateezi b'akaruuru rukorwa kurungi, ekirikukora omurimo gw'amaani omu karuuru akarikwija.

eng_prompt: The election commission has finalized the schedule for the upcoming elections. In an effort to increase voter participation, they have decided to include weekends in the appointed dates.

lug_prompt: Okusobola okukakasa obutuufu bw'enkola y'okuwandiisa abalonzi, kyetaagisa okukakasa obulungi ebiwandiiko ebiweereddwayo. Nga ekitundu ku nkola eno, tujja kugaba kkopi z'ebiwandiiko okwekenneenya.
ach_prompt: Me neno ni yub me coyo nying lubol kwir tye kakare, omyero kikwed lok weng ma kicwalo. Macalo but yoo me tic man, wabi poko kopi me coc ne pi ngiyo.
teo_prompt: Kanu awanyun abeit naka aiwadikao naka aseak, ibusakinit airereonor akiro nu ijaikitai. Kwape ediope kotoma ainapeta nu, ibuni sio aikor aiwadikaeta kanu airereonor.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ru siza 'ba voti 'bepi 'diyiniri ni aa'zu kililiru, le 'ba ma andri e'yo dria 'bani fele 'diyi ma dria kililiru. E'yo 'di ma azi ru, ama nga kokobi e'yo 'da ma dria 'diyi awa 'bani ani eyi ma ale andrizu.
nyn_prompt: Okureeba ngu enkora y'okuhandiikisa abateezi b'akaruuru neekora gye, nikyetengyesa okushwijuma kurungi ebihandiiko ebirikuheebwayo. Nk'ekicweka ky'enkora egi, nitwija kugaba kopi z'ebihandiiko by'okushwijuma.

eng_prompt: In an effort to promote democratic engagement and representation, local officials have organized a community voting initiative. As part of this initiative, four political parties are encouraged to participate in this voting exercise.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'okutumbula demokulasiya n'okukiikirira, abakungu b'ebyalo bategese enteekateeka y'okulonda mu kitundu. Ng'omu ku kaweefube ono, ebibiina by'obufuzi bina bikubirizibwa okwetaba mu kulonda kuno.
ach_prompt: I tute me tyelo kor tela pa lwak, lutela me tedero guyubu yub me bolo kwir I kin lwak. Macalo but yub man, kicuku cwiny dul me cungu iwi bye angwen me bedo tye I yub me bolo kwir man.
teo_prompt: Kotoma agogongu na aitopoloria aseo keda abwoikinitok, etemokisi eswamak luka atutubet ainapeta nuka aseo. Kwape ediopet koboro kalu, isinyikokitai ipatei iwongon ajaikin toma aseo kana.
lgg_prompt: Okpo 'bazu e'yo democracia ni 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu, azi'ba angu 'da ma alea 'diyi otu e'yo voti 'bezuri o'bi eyini. E'yo 'di ma azi ru, 'ba eka amuti politiki ni su yi fizu e'yo voti 'bezuri ma alia indi.
nyn_prompt: Omu kaweefube w'okureetaho oburingaaniza n'obujwekyerwa, abakuru b'ebyaro batebekaniise enteekateeka y'okuteera akaruuru omu byaro. Nk'emwe aha nteekateeka egi,ebibiina bina by'obutegyeki nibihigwa kwejumba omu kuteera akaruuru.

eng_prompt: During the campaign, the candidate emphasized the importance of a healthy political discourse. He recognized that differing viewpoints play a crucial role in shaping public opinion.
lug_prompt: Mu kakuyege, eyeesimbyewo yakkaatirizza obukulu bw'okwogera obulungi mu byobufuzi. Yakitegeera nti endowooza ez'enjawulo zikola kinene nnyo mu kubumba endowooza z'abantu.
ach_prompt: Ikare me bito kwi, lacungu ne oketo cwinye tutwal I kom ber pa lok me cung iwibye. En oniang ni tam mapatpat konyo tutwal I yubu tam pa lwak.
teo_prompt: Kotoma apakio nuka ikampeins, abu abwoan kitogogong ajokis naka einer loajokan. Abu ngesi kojen ebe aomisio nuegelegela iswamaete ejok noi kotoma aitolomun aomisio nuka itunga.
lgg_prompt: Sawa agbatara ti odazanirisi, agu pa tupi 'da 'ba asi orodri e'yo nzeza kililiru politiki ni 'diyi niri ma dria. Eri ai ra kini egata ndu ndu 'diyi azi okporu nga e'yo o'bi eyini ega 'diyi ma edeta ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Omubwiire bw'ehururu, oyesimbireho akahamya omugasho gw'okugamba kurungi omu by'obutegyeki. Akamanya ngu enteekateeka ezitari zimwe nizikora omurimo gw'amaani omukukora enteekateeka y'abantu.

eng_prompt: In a democratic system, it is essential for political parties to engage in constructive debate. To hold the government accountable, the opposition must present viable solutions to current issues.
lug_prompt: Mu nkola ya demokulasiya, kya mugaso ebibiina by'ebyobufuzi okwenyigira mu kukubaganya ebirowoozo okuzimba. Okuvunaana gavumenti, ab'oludda oluvuganya balina okuleeta eby'okugonjoola ebizibu ebiriwo.
ach_prompt: I te loc alwak, pire tek tutwal pi dul me cungu iwi bye mapat-pat me nywako lok maber. Me keto adot i kom gamente, dul pa jo ma pe yee ki lok pa gamente omyero gumi yoo me cobo peko matye kombedi.
teo_prompt: Kotoma apugan naeyait ainapeta, ejokuna noi ipatei luka politikis ajaut toma opeget loejok. Kanu aitepesen apugan, ekot etepegak aitolomun iwaitin lu itemokinet atiokisio nu ejaas.
lgg_prompt: E'yo democracia niri ma alea, eri orodriru amuti politiki ni 'diyi ni e'yo agbatara 'yezu e'yo orodriru 'diyi ma dria. Gamete 'bazu e'yo 'yezu, le 'ba ageti otiza ni 'diyi ma e'da geri 'bani ecozu e'yo eyi ma aza kozu ra 'diyi.
nyn_prompt: Omu demokurasiya, ni kikuru ebibiina by'obutegyeki kwejumba omu kuhanuura okw'omugasho. Gavumenti okubaasa kujunanizibwa, ab'orubaju orurikuhakanisa gavumenti bashemereire kureeta oburyo bw'okutereeza eshonga eziriho obwahati.

eng_prompt: In a healthy democracy, the focus should be on policies and ideas rather than the private lives of candidates. Engaging in personal attacks detracts from meaningful discourse and undermines the integrity of the political process.
lug_prompt: Mu demokulasiya omulungi, essira liteekeddwa kuteekebwa ku nkola n'ebirowoozo okusinga obulamu obw'obwannannyini obw'abeesimbyewo. Okwenyigira mu kulumbagana kw'abantu kinyiiza enteeseganya ezirina amakulu era kityoboola obwesimbu bw'enkola y'ebyobufuzi.
ach_prompt: I loc alwak maber, keto cwiny omyero obed I kom cik ki tam me kaka kwo pa lucungu. Donyo I lok me lweny I kom ngat acel acel balo lok matye ki tyen lok dok balo ber bedo pa yub me cung iwibye.
teo_prompt: Kotoma apugan naejok, ibusakinit apodokinit ainapeta keda aomisio itia aijar naka itunga luebwoitos. Alomar toma asurokinio naka itunga isimikini einer loajokan ido itolitoli ainapeta nuka epolitikis.
lgg_prompt: Democracia muke ri ma alea, le 'ba ma 'ba asi e'yo azita ni azini egata ni 'diyi ma dria aga 'ba pa tupi 'diyi ma idri ngulupisi 'diyi ma dria. E'yo 'bani 'ba eyi ma ngulupi a'di 'dizu ri ni e'yo nzeza kililiru ri atri dika eri e'yo politiki ni 'diyi eza eza.
nyn_prompt: Omu by'obutegyeki ebihikire, ekishemereire kuta amaani omu biragiro n'ebiteekateeko, okukira amagara g'omuntu weena ag'abeesimbireho. Okwejumba omu kutahirira omuntu weena, nikimaraho okuganiira kw'omugasho kandi kikashiisha enkora y'eby'obutegyeki.

eng_prompt: In order to foster a more dynamic and effective political landscape, it's essential to move beyond traditional rivalries and focus on innovation. Emphasizing fresh perspectives will encourage constructive dialogue and better serve the needs of our constituents.
lug_prompt: Okusobola okuleetawo embeera y'ebyobufuzi ennungi era ennungi, kya mugaso okusukkuluma ku kuvuganya okw'ennono n'okussa essira ku kuyiiya. Okussa essira ku ndowooza empya kijja kukubiriza okuteesa okuzimba n'okutuukiriza obulungi ebyetaago by'abalonzi baffe.
ach_prompt: Me kelo yub me cungu iwi bye maber, pire tek tutwal me weko pyem macon me keto cwiny I kom diro manyen. Keto cwiny I kom tam manyen obi weko nywako lok bedo tye dok bene obi konyo lutedero wa.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitopolor aiboisit naepol noi naka epolitikis, ejokuna aijulakin abolobol naka einono kosodete apodokinit aitolomunun iboro luitetiak. Aitogogong aomisio nuitetiak isinyikokini aineranara najokan ka aitodolikin ipudesia luka itunga luka atutubenakosi.
lgg_prompt: Lezu e'yo politiki ni okporu azini azi ngapi muke 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu, eri orodriru muzu drile a'bala a'di ni 'diyi ma dria azini asi 'bazu e'yo o'diru 'diyi ma dria. Asi 'bazu egata o'diru 'diyi ma dria ri ni nga e'yo nzeza kililiru 'diyi ma ava enga dika eri nga azi nga kililiru 'ba angu amani opi nyazu 'diyi ma alia 'diyi dri.
nyn_prompt: Kubaasa kureetaho eby'obutegyeki ebirikugyenda omu maisho kandi ebirikukora kurungi, niky'omugasho okureka okuhayahayana kw'obuhangwa, reero tute omutima aha kuhinguza. Okuta amaani aha nteekateeka nsya, nikiija kureetaho okuganiira okw'omugasho, n'okuhikiiriza kurungi ebyetengo by'abantu abu turikujwekyera.

eng_prompt: In a recent debate over proposed policy changes, tensions rose between the ruling party and the opposition. After extensive discussions, the opposition put forth a new suggestion aimed at fostering bipartisan cooperation.
lug_prompt: Mu kukubaganya ebirowoozo okwakolebwa gyebuvuddeko ku nkyukakyuka mu nkola, okusika omuguwa kwabalukawo wakati w'ekibiina ekiri mu buyinza n'abooludda oluvuganya. Oluvannyuma lw'okukubaganya ebirowoozo okw'amaanyi, ab'oludda oluvuganya baaleeta ekiteeso ekipya ekigendereddwamu okutumbula enkolagana wakati w'ebibiina.
ach_prompt: I kare me laro lok ma otime cokcok-ki I kom aloka-loka matye I cik, telle omede I kin dul me cungu iwi-bye matye I loc ki dul me cungu iwi-bye ma pe yee ki lok pa gamente. Ingee nywako lok mapol, dul pa jo ma pe yee ki lok pa gamente gukati ki tam manyen me kelo winye ikin dul me cungu iwi bye mapat-pat.
teo_prompt: Kotoma opeget loakwana loikamunit aijulanakineta nuka ainapeta, apotu ingungeta kolomutu kiding epate loipugai keda etepegak. Akaulo naka aineranara noi, apotu etepegak kitolomutu aomisioit naitetet kanu aitopoloria aimorikikina naka ipatei kere.
lgg_prompt: Agbatara o'diru 'diyi ma alia e'yo 'bani lezu ojata politiki ni 'diyi ma dria, asi otiza tu amuti politiki ni kari 'di ma dri cepiri ma eselea 'ba ageti otiza ni 'diyi pie. E'yo onzeza angiri ma vutia, 'ba ageti otiza ni 'diyi eji egata o'dini lezu ti ecita amuti politiki ni 'diyi ma eselea ri ma omgbo otuzu.
nyn_prompt: Omu kuhanuura okwabaireho ebiro ebi, aha bikwatiraine n'empindahinduka omu by'obutegyeki, obunkenke bukarugaho ahagati y'ekibiina ekiri omu butegyeki hamwe n'ab'orubaju orurikuhakanisa gavumenti. Bwanyima y'okuhanuura munonga, ab'orubaju orurikuhakanisa gavumenti bakareeta ekiteiso ekisya ekyabaire kigyendereire kureetaho okukwatanisa omu bibiina by'obutegyeki.

eng_prompt: Recent reports of widespread irregularities during the last election have raised serious concerns among citizens and watchdog organizations. As a result, many are calling for immediate action to address these issues.
lug_prompt: Amawulire agafulumizibwa gye buvuddeko ku butali bwenkanya obwaliwo mu kulonda okuwedde galeeseewo okweraliikirira okw'amaanyi mu bannansi n'ebitongole ebirondoola. N'ekivuddemu, bangi basaba wabeewo ekikolebwa mu bwangu okugonjoola ensonga zino.
ach_prompt: Lok ma obedo katimme cokcok-ki I kom tim maraco mapol I kare me yer ma okato ni okelo lworo madit tutwal I kin anywali kacel ki dule ma neno lok kom yer. Macalo adwogi ne, dano mapol tye ka lego ni myero kitim gin mo oyot-oyot me tyeko peko magi.
teo_prompt: Akiro nuitodunitos amumu naepol noi kotoma aseo natubor eyangaunit aiyalongong kanejaas itunga keda iriongeta lu engicete. Kanuka ngun, ekotosi itunga aswam katipet kanu aitemokin akiro nu.
lgg_prompt: O'duko efupi o'diru e'yo onzi opeta agapi 'diyi ma alea 'diyi fe asi otiza kari anzi eyi ma eselea tualu amuti angu onepi 'diyi pie. E'yo 'disi, 'ba karakara eyi ai 'yeta mbeleru e'yo 'diyi ma aza kozu.
nyn_prompt: Ripoota z'obushomankuzi omu karuuru akahweire, zireesireho okwerarikirira kw'amaani omu bantu n'ebitongore ebirikutegyeka akaruuru. N'ekyarugiremu, baingi nibashaba okukora ahonaaho kukora aha nshonga ezi.

eng_prompt: Many customers have reported positive experiences with the commission's responsiveness. Their track record suggests they effectively address issues raised by the public.
lug_prompt: Bakasitoma bangi boogedde ebirungi ku ngeri akakiiko gye kaakwatamu ensonga. Ebyafaayo byabwe biraga nti bakola bulungi ku nsonga ezireetebwa abantu.
ach_prompt: Lukastoma mapol guwaco ni ginongo ber pa dul enoni. Gin ma gutimo nyutu ni gitiyo maber tutwal I kom peko ma lwak okelo.
teo_prompt: Apotu agwelak luipu olimosi akiro nuajokak nuikamunitos eswamae loajokan loka ekomision. Akiro nueswamauna kesi itodunit ebe itemonokinete kesi atiokisio nu itunga.
lgg_prompt: Aje'ba karakara eyi ece e'yo onyiru eyini esu e'yo amuti 'da ni 'diyi ma aza kozu risi. E'yo eyini 'ye 'diyi ece kini eyi e'yo o'bi eyini 'diyi ma aza ko kililiru.
nyn_prompt: Bakasitoma baingi bagambire ebirikubashemeza ahabw'okugarukamu kw'ekitongore. Ebyarugiremu nibyoreka ngu nibakora kurungi aha nshonga ezirikugambwa abantu.

eng_prompt: Debates surrounding the integrity of the electoral process have intensified in recent months. Central to these discussions is the method by which the electoral commission members are selected.
lug_prompt: Okukubaganya ebirowoozo ku bwesimbu bw'enkola y'okulonda kweyongedde mu myezi egiyise. Ekikulu mu kukubaganya ebirowoozo kuno y'engeri bammemba b'akakiiko k'ebyokulonda gye balondebwamu.
ach_prompt: Laro lok I kom ber bedo pa yub me bolo kwir omedde tutwal I dwe ma okato ni. Gin ma pire tek tutwal I nyamo lok man obedo yoo ma kiyero kwede lumemba me dul ma doro yer.
teo_prompt: Apotu ipegeta luikamunitos ainapakina naka ainapeta nuka aseo kiyatakinos ilapio lu atuboros. Akirot naepol noi naka aitemitem akiro nuikamunitos epone loeseunere imeeban luka ekomision loka aseo.
lgg_prompt: Agbatara e'yo opetaa ni aa'zu e'yo ada be ri ma dria ri ma omgbo tu imba agapi 'diyi ma alea tutu. E'yo 'bani agbatara gbazu 'diyi ma dria ri geri 'bani memba amuti e'yo opetaa ni ondrepi 'diyi opezuri'i.
nyn_prompt: Okuhanuura aha nshonga y'oburingaaniza omu by'oburuuru kweyongyeire omu myezi ehwaire. Ekikuru omu kuhanuura oku n'omuringo ogu akakiiko k'eby'oburuuru karikutooranwamu.

eng_prompt: In recent years, the country has experienced significant political changes, leading to a more diverse electoral landscape. As a result, various governance models were tested during the electoral process.
lug_prompt: Mu myaka egiyise, eggwanga libaddemu enkyukakyuka ez'amaanyi mu byobufuzi, ekiviiriddeko okulonda okw'enjawulo. N'ekyavaamu, enkola z'obukulembeze ez'enjawulo zaagezesebwa mu kiseera ky'okulonda.
ach_prompt: I mwaki ma okato cokcok-ki, lobo man okato ki aloka-loka madit tutwal I lok me cungu iwi-bye, ma okelo aloka-loka I lok me yer mapat-pat. Macalo adwogi ne, kit tela mapat-pat kipimo ikare me yer.
teo_prompt: Kokaru lu atuboros, ewanyunitos akwapuwok aijulanakineta nuipu noi nuka epolitikis, eyangaunit aiboisio nuegelegela nuka aseo. Kanuka ngun, aponi inwakii iponesio luegelegela luka epugae kapak naka aseo.
lgg_prompt: Eli agapi 'bo 'diyi ma alea, kari 'di esu ojata politiki ni okporu 'diyi fe angu e'yo opetaa ni ndundu 'diyi ni ecazu. E'yo 'disi, 'ba obi geri driceza ni ndundu 'diyi sa'wa opetaa ni ri si.
nyn_prompt: Omu myaka egi, eihanga ryaboneire empindahinduka y'amaani omu by'obutegyeki, ekyarugiremu oburingaaniza omu by'oburuuru. N'ekyarugiremu, emiringo y'obwebembezi etarikushushana ekakyeberwa omu bwire bw'oburuuru.

eng_prompt: In light of recent controversies surrounding leadership appointments, many political analysts have noted a growing discontent among the opposition. As a result, the opposition parties have been calling for a change in the procedure of appointing their leaders.
lug_prompt: Okusinziira ku butakkaanya obwaliwo gye buvuddeko awo ku kulondebwa kw'abakulembeze, abeekenneenyi b'ebyobufuzi bangi balabye obutali bumativu obweyongera mu ludda oluvuganya. N'ekyavaamu, ebibiina by'oludda oluvuganya bibadde bisaba wabeewo enkyukakyuka mu ngeri abakulembeze baabyo gye balondebwamu.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki telle matye cokcok-ki ma lubbe ki yer pa lutela, lucungu iwi bye mapol guneno cwer cwiny matye kamede I kin dul pa jo ma pe yee ki lok pa gamente. Macalo adwogi ne, dul me cungu iwi bye ma pe yee ki lok pa gamente gubedo ka lego ni myero kilok yoo me cimo lutela gi.
teo_prompt: Katupitos ingungeta lu atuboros nuikamunitos aseuno naka engarenok, apotu angicak nuka epolitikis kowanyutu amamut aiyalama kanejaas etepegak. Kanuka ngun, ekotosi ipatei luka etepegak aijulakin epone loeseunere engarenok kec.
lgg_prompt: E'yo erita ako ni o'diru drice'ba eyi opezu 'diyi ma dria, 'ba karakara e'yo politiki ni 'diyi ma eti ondapi 'diyi ndre kini e'yo 'ba ageti otiza ni 'diyi ma eselea ri ma omgbo ni tu ra. E'yo 'disi, amuti ageti otiza ni 'diyi ebi a'i ojata geri yini drice'ba yini 'diyi opezuri ma alia.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'obutaikirizana oburiho obwahati omu kutoorana abebembezi, abacencuzi b'eby'obutegyeki baingi bareebire obutetegyerezana obweyongyeire omu b'orubaju orurikuhakanisa gavumenti. N'ekyarugiremu,ebibiina by'obutegyeki ebirikuhakanisa gavumenti bitwire nibishaba empindahinduka omu mihanda y'okutoorana abebembezi baabo.

eng_prompt: In response to growing concerns about inequality in the industry, policymakers have been working diligently to address the disparities that exist among various stakeholders. By implementing these changes, they aim to create a more equitable environment for everyone involved.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula okweraliikirira okweyongera ku butakkaanya mu mulimu, abakola amateeka babadde bakola n'obunyiikivu okumalawo enjawulo eriwo mu bakwatibwako ab'enjawulo. Nga bassa mu nkola enkyukakyuka zino, baluubirira kutondawo embeera ey'obwenkanya eri buli muntu akwatibwako.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me lworo ma tye kamedde I kom apoka-poka matye I tenge enoni, luyub cik gubedo katic matek tutwal me tyeko apoka-poka matye I kin joo ma timo tic mapat-pat. I keto aloka-loka magi itic, miti gi tye me kelo rwom me kwo maber pi dano weng.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin aiyalongongo naepol noi naikamunit amamus airiamara kotoma okampuni, eswamata itunga luka ikisila kagogong aitemokin atiokisio nu ejaas kanejaas itunga luegelegela. Kowai lo aitegear aijulanakineta nu, ekotosi kesi aitolomun ejautene loajokan kanuka itunga kere.
lgg_prompt: E'yo asi otiza tupi e'yo esele coza okalamvu 'da ma alea ri ma dria, 'ba e'yo otupi 'diyi ebi azi nga okporu e'yo esele coza 'ba ambo ndundu 'diyi ma eselea 'diyi ma aza kozu. Eyini ojata 'diyi 'bazu azi ngazu risi, eyi le geri kililiru 'ba dria e'yo nde ma alea 'diyini.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okweyongyera kw'okwerarikirira aha butaingana omu by'obushubuzi, ab'eby'obutegyeki batwire nibakora n'amaani kumaraho obutaingana oburi omu bantu b'emiringo etari emwe. Okuta empindahinduka ezi omu nkora, nikigyenderera kureetaho oburinganiza omu bantu boona.

eng_prompt: The process of forming the commission involves several key steps to ensure transparency and accountability. First, candidates are nominated based on their expertise and experience in relevant fields.
lug_prompt: Enkola y'okutondawo akakiiko erimu emitendera emikulu egiwerako okukakasa obwerufu n'embalirira. Ekisooka, abesimbyewo basunsulwa okusinziira ku bukugu bwabwe n'obumanyirivu mu bintu ebikwatagana.
ach_prompt: Yub me cako dul enoni tye ki yoo mapol mapigi tego me neno ni jami weng tye atir. Me acel, kiyero lutino kwan malubbe ki ngec gi ki diro gi.
teo_prompt: Ewai lo aitolomun ekomision ngol imoriarit ainapeta nuipu nuepolok kanu awanyun ebe ejai aica ka aitodun eipone lo itwasamatere ikapun. Nasodit, eseunono abwaak kotupitete acoa kec keda amisiarit kec.
lgg_prompt: Geri 'bani amuti 'da e'dozu ri ma alea e'yo ada azini geri 'bani e'yo nde 'yezu 'diyi ma dria. Okorisi, 'ba 'ba pa so'baa 'diyi ope geri yini e'yo onizu azini e'yo yini 'ye 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Enkora y'okutandikaho akakiiko, eine emitendera mingi y'okureeba ngu hariho amazima n'embaririra. Eky'okubanza, abesimbireho nibatooranwa kurugirira aha bukugu bwabo n'obumanyirizi bwabo omu myanya erikukwataho.

eng_prompt: In light of the recent developments affecting the nation, a meeting was convened to address the growing concerns among party members. As tensions rose, it became imperative for the leaders to come together and find a resolution.
lug_prompt: Okusinziira ku bintu ebibaddewo mu ggwanga gye buvuddeko awo, olukiiko lwayitiddwa okukola ku nsonga ezaali zeeyongera mu bammemba b'ekibiina. Obunkenke bwe bwagenda bweyongera, kyafuuka kikulu nnyo abakulembeze okukungaana n'okunoonya eky'okugonjoola.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki jami ma otimme cokcok-ki ma tye ka yelo lobo, kilwongo kacoke me lok I kom peko matye kamedde I kin lumemba me dul me cungu iwi bye ne. I kare ma telle omedde, obedo gin ma pire tek tutwal pi lutela me ribbe kacel me nongo yoo me tyeko lokke.
teo_prompt: Katupitos nueswamauna pac kotoma akwapuwok, aponi konyaraunai airiamunet kanu aitemokin atiokisio nuepolok noi nuka imeban luka epate. Neapolor atiokisio, apolor eipud loka engarenok aimorikikin kosodete aitemokin ationis.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru kari 'di bipi o'diru 'diyi ma e'yosi, 'ba omve mitingi azi e'yo 'ba amuti politiki ni 'diyi ma alia 'diyi ma dria. Erita ako ni turia, eri eca orodriru 'ba drice'ba ru 'diyi ni emuzu tualu azini e'yo nde ma aza kozu.
