teo_prompt: Kwape ekotosi agwelak aitwasam iponesio luajokak, eutasi icuman luipu aimo iponesio luitetiak. Epone ediope loejok noi loelomunit ngesi ajenara naka ebia loemamei esukali.
lgg_prompt: Ekile 'ba afa je'ba 'diyi ma leta ni i ojazu geri muke ndeni 'diyi vu, okalamvu ewa edepi karakara 'diyi geri ndundu o'diru 'diyi onda. E'yo azi e'dapi saaru efu'ba ri eri 'bani ewa cupaa cupaa cupaa cupaa cupaa cupaa cupaa cupaa cupaa cupaa cupaa cupaa cupaa cupaa cupaa cupaa cupaa cupaa cupaa cupaa cupaa cupaa cupaa cupaa cupaa cupaa cupaa cupaa cupaa cupaa cupaa cupaa cupaa cupaa cupaa cupaa cupaa cupaa cupaa cupaa
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okugira ngu abarikugura amaarwa nibagyenda omu maisho g'eby'amagara marungi, amakorero maingi g'amaarwa gariyo nigasherura oburyo burungi. Omuringo gumwe ogurikutangaaza ogureesirweho n'okweyendeza kw'amaarwa agatarimu shukaari.

eng_prompt: As Uganda's economy continues to grow, there is an increasing demand for diverse consumer products. This shift has opened up opportunities for international brands to enter the market.
lug_prompt: Ng'ebyenfuna bya Uganda byeyongera okukula, waliwo obwetaavu bw'ebintu ebikozesebwa eby'enjawulo obweyongera. Enkyukakyuka eno egguddewo emikisa eri amakolero g'ensi yonna okuyingira akatale.
ach_prompt: Kit ma biacara me lobo Uganda tye ka dongo kwede, miti me jami mapat-pat tye ka mede. Alokaloka man oyabo gum ki jami mapatpat me donyo I cuk.
teo_prompt: Kwape inyikokini apol naka edumune loka ikapun koUganda, ejai eipuda lo iboro luegelegela lu itwasamao. Apotu aijulanakineta ngun opukosi arerengusio nuka iboro luka akwapin ace alomar osokoni.
lgg_prompt: E'yo lonyi ni kari Uganda niri ma alea ri ni zozu drile, afa 'bani ayu 'diyi ma aje ni tu ra. Ojata 'diri fe drileba amuti kari eselia 'diyi dri fizu cuu ma alia ra.
nyn_prompt: Ebyentatsya ya Uganda ku erikugumizamu neekura, hariho okwetenga kw'ebintu ebitarikushushana. Empindahinduka egi, egwireho emigisha y'ebintu by'amahanga goona okutaaha omu katare.

eng_prompt: As health-conscious choices continue to gain popularity, many breweries are exploring innovative options to cater to this growing market. One such option that has emerged is sugar-free beer, appealing to those looking to enjoy a beverage without the added calories.
lug_prompt: Nga ebyokulonda eby'obulamu bwe bikyagenda mu maaso n'okufuna obuganzi, amakolero g'omwenge mangi ganoonyereza ku ngeri ez'obuyiiya okukola ku katale kano akagenda mu maaso. Ekimu ku ebyo ebivuddeyo ye bbiya atalina sukaali, asikiriza abo abanoonya okunyumirwa ekyokunywa ekitaliimu kalori.
ach_prompt: Kit ma yero jami ma gwoko yot kom tye kamede ki nongo yweka, dul mapat-pat me yubu kongo tye ka yenyo yoo manyen me cobo miti pa lucat man matye ka dongo. Yo acel macalo man ma obino obedo kongo biya ma peke ki cukari, ma yomo cwiny jo ma tye ka mito mato kongo labongo medo calories.
teo_prompt: Kwape inyikokinitos aseununeta nuikamunitos angaleu adumun ajenara, eutasi itunga luipu luiswamaete imaten aimo iponesio luitetiak luka aitodolikin esokoni lo epoloi. Adiopet epone loelomunit ngesi ebia loemamei esukali, loeminakinit ngul luekotosi aimat ajon komamei iboro luipu.
lgg_prompt: Ekile e'yo rua ala ma dria 'diyi ni mu drile e'doria, okalamvu ewa edepi karakara 'diyi geri o'diru 'diyi onda ecozu e'yo 'yezu cu 'di ma dria. E'yo azi alu 'dile efu'ba ri ewa cupaa sukari kokoru ri'I, 'ba lepi afa mvuza omvele calories ru 'diyi ma ayiko isu'ba 'diyi dri.
nyn_prompt: Nk'oku eby'okurya ebirikukwata aha magara g'abantu birikuguma nibyeyongyera kumanywa, abarikukora amaarwa baingi bariyo nibasherura oburyo bw'okutunga akatare akarikweyongyera. Omuringo gumwe oguretsirweho n'amaarwa agatarimu shukaari, nigashemeza abo abarikwenda kunywa amaarwa agatarimu kalori ezongyeirweho.

eng_prompt: After careful consideration and analysis of the current market trends, we decided it was time to make a strategic move. The decision to exit was not easy, but ultimately, it aligns with our long-term goals.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okwetegereza n'okwekenneenya embeera eriwo mu katale, twasalawo nti kye kiseera okukola enteekateeka. Okusalawo okuvaamu tekwali kwangu, naye mu nkomerero, kikwatagana n'ebiruubirirwa byaffe eby'ekiseera ekiwanvu.
ach_prompt: Ingee tam matut ki ngiyo kit ma jami tye ka wot kwede I cuk, wamoko ni kare dong oromo me timo gin mo maber. Moko tam me weko tic pe obedo yot, ento I agiki ne, man rwatte ki miti wa me kare malac.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka aomoom ka airereonor akiro nuka esokoni, apotu sio aseutu ebe erai apak naka aitodolikin akiro ngun. Mam aseunet naka anyoun arai na epatana, konye epatana keda apeleikinatawok nuka apak naepol.
lgg_prompt: E'yo egazu kililiru azini e'yo eti ondazu e'yo cuu ni sawa 'disi 'diyi ma dria 'bori ma vutia, ama 'du e'yo kini sa'wa ca 'di 'bani e'yo 'yezu kililiru. E'yo 'duzu amve ri ovuni ewakokoru ku, te asizu, eri ti eci ama vile otita ewu ezu 'diyi pie.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okushwijuma n'obwegyendesereza eby'obushuubuzi oburiho hati, tukasharamu ngu n'obwire bw'okukora ekintu ky'amaani. Okusharamu kuruga omu kibiina kikaba kitari kyorobi, kwonka nikikwatagana n'ebigyendererwa byaitu eby'obwire bureingwa.

eng_prompt: Our commitment to excellence drives every aspect of our production process. We understand the importance of delivering products that meet the highest standards.
lug_prompt: Obumalirivu bwaffe obw'okusukkuluma ku balala buviirako buli kimu mu nkola yaffe ey'okufulumya ebintu. Tutegeera obukulu bw'okutuusa ebintu ebituukana n'omutindo ogw'oku ntikko.
ach_prompt: Cwiny ma watye kwede me timo jami maber aye doro jami weng ma watimo. Wangeo ber pa kelo jami ma rwom gi malo.
teo_prompt: Apodokinit kosi aitodolikin iboro lu itopolooritai kotoma aitolomukosi. Ijeni sio ajokis naka aitolomun iboro luepedorete aitodolikin adoketait naepol noi.
lgg_prompt: Asi feza amani e'yo onyiru 'diyi 'yezu ri ni e'yo dria ama vile afa edeza ma dria 'diyi ma ti oji. Ama va orodri afa ndundu wura muke ndeni 'diyi ma esuza ma dria ra.
nyn_prompt: Okwehayo kwaitu kuhikaana n'omutindo gw'ahaiguru nikyo kirikureetaho buri nshonga y'okukora ebintu byaitu. Nitwetegyereza omugasho gw'okureeta ebintu ebirikuhikaana n'omutindo gw'ahaiguru.

eng_prompt: In a competitive market, we understand that maintaining customer trust is essential. Therefore, we prioritize excellence in every aspect of our production process.
lug_prompt: Mu katale akavuganya, tukitegedde nti okukuuma obwesige bwa bakasitoma kya mugaso. N'olw'ekyo, tukulembeza okukola obulungi mu buli kimu kye tukola.
ach_prompt: I cuk matye ki pyem matek tutwal, waniang ni gwoko gen pa luwil pire tek tutwal. Pi meno, waketo rwom me timo jami maber ikare weng ma watye ka yubu jami.
teo_prompt: Kosokoni lo ejai abolobol, ijeni sio ebe ejokuna noi aidar amunokina naka agwelak. Kanuka ngun, isingarenit sio aitodolikin iboro luejokuka kotoma aswam wok.
lgg_prompt: Cu a'bala ru 'di ma alea, ama vaa ra kini asi'baza 'ba afa je'baa 'diyi niri ma tambazu ri eri orodriru. Ka'dini, ama e'yo onyiru 'diyi 'ba okporu e'yo dria ama vile afa edezu 'diyi ma alia.
nyn_prompt: Omu katare k'okuhayahayana, nitwetegyereza ngu okurinda obwesigye bw'abaguzi n'eky'omugasho. N'ahabw'ekyo, nitwebembeza okukora gye omuri buri nshonga y'okukora ebintu byaitu.

eng_prompt: In a strategic move to expand its market presence, East African Breweries Limited has been actively seeking opportunities for growth in the region. As part of this initiative, the company has successfully completed a significant acquisition.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'okugaziya akatale kaayo, East African Breweries Limited ebadde enoonya nnyo emikisa gy'okukula mu kitundu. Ng'omu ku kaweefube ono, kampuni emalirizza bulungi okugula ebintu eby'omugaso.
ach_prompt: I yub me medo rwom me cat meggi, dul makilwongo East African Breweries Limited obedo ka yenyo gum me dongo I but lobo man. Macalo but yub man, dul ne dong otyeko wilo jami mapol.
teo_prompt: Kotoma aswamisioit naka aitanyanyar esokoni ke, euta East African Breweries Limited aimo arerengesio nuka apol kotoma aiboisit. Kwape ediopet koboro kalu, adau ekampuni aitodolikin agwel iboro luitegelikina.
lgg_prompt: E'yo azi okporu 'yezu tujari 'yezuri ma omgbo otuzu, amuti East African Breweries Limited ebi drileba zota ni angu 'di ma alea 'diyi nda okporu. E'yo 'di ma azi ru, amuti 'di de e'yo azi orodriruni 'bo.
nyn_prompt: Omu nteekateeka y'okwongyera akatare, kampuni ya East African Breweries Limited etwire neronda emigisha y'okutunguuka omu kicweka ekyo. Nk'emwe aha nteekateeka egi, kampuni eherize kugura ebintu bingi.

eng_prompt: As international investors increasingly turn their attention to emerging economies, Uganda has become a focal point for potential growth and development. The influx of capital and interest in various sectors is reshaping the landscape of business opportunities in the region.
lug_prompt: Nga bamusigansimbi ab'ensi yonna beeyongera okussa essira ku nsi ezikyakula, Uganda efuuse ekifo ekikulu eky'okukulaakulana n'enkulaakulana. Okuyingira kwa kapito n'obwagazi mu bitongole eby'enjawulo bikyusizza embeera y'emirimu mu kitundu.
ach_prompt: Kit ma lutim biacara ma aa ki woko tye ka loko tamgi i kom lobe matye ka dongo, Uganda dong odoko kabedo ma dongo ki dongo lobo twero bedo iye. Cato wil ki miti matye I tenge mapat-pat tye ka loko yoo me timo biacara I twok piny eni.
teo_prompt: Kwape ekotosi agwelanarak luka akwapin ace apodokinit akiro kec mama ejaasi akwapin nukokinga, erai Uganda aiboisit naepol noi naka apol keda apol. Alomun na ikapun keda eipud loka aiboisio nuegelegela euta aijulakin ejautene loka agwelanar kotoma aiboisit.
lgg_prompt: Ekile 'ba lonyi vuti ale'ba enga'ba kari amve 'diyi ma alea 'diyi ni asi 'bazu kari ezo'baa 'diyi ma dria, Uganda eca angu e'yo zota ni azini angu ezoma ni 'diyi ma dria. E'yo 'ba angu ndundu eyi ma alea tujari 'yezu 'diyi ma omgbo ma omgbo ni tujari 'yezu angu 'di ma alea ri oja.
nyn_prompt: Obu abashubuzi kuruga omu mahanga agandi barikweyongyera kuta amaani gaabo omu by'entaasya ebiriyo nibikura, Uganda ehindukire omwanya murungi gw'entunguuka n'entunguuka. Okweyongyera kw'entatsya n'okwenda kw'abantu omu bitongore ebitarikushushana, nikihindura emyanya y'eby'obushubuzi omu kyanga.

eng_prompt: The marketing team implemented a new strategy to enhance brand visibility. As a result, the advertisements are bearing positive returns for the company.
lug_prompt: Ttiimu y'abasuubuzi yassa mu nkola enkola empya okutumbula okumanyika kw'akatale. N'ekivuddemu, ebirango bivaamu amagoba amalungi eri kkampuni.
ach_prompt: Dul ma neno lok kom cat gukati ki yoo manyen me medo rwom me ngec I kom jami gi. Macalo adwogi ne, cato wil ne tye ka kelo magoba madit tutwal bot dul ne.
teo_prompt: Apotu etimu loka agwelanarak itodolikisi iponesio luitetiak kanu aitojokar ajenara naka agwelanar. Kanuka ngun, eutasi alimonoreta ngun ayangaun ameda nejai ekampuni.
lgg_prompt: Amuti e'yo cuu ndazani 'diyi 'ye geri azi o'diruni e'yo 'bani afa ozizaru 'diyi ma e'dazu 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu. E'yo 'disi, e'yo 'bani 'ba ozizaru 'diyi orodri eji amuti nde dri.
nyn_prompt: Tiimu y'abashuubuzi ekata omu nkora enkora nsya y'okureetaho okumanywa. N'ekyarugiremu, okuranga kuriyo nikureeta amagoba marungi omu kampuni.

eng_prompt: As the market continues to evolve, new trends are emerging that present unique advantages. Entrepreneurs should be on the lookout for ways to leverage these changes for growth.
lug_prompt: Ng'akatale kagenda mu maaso okukulaakulana, emisono emipya givaayo egirina emigaso egy'enjawulo. Abasuubuzi balina okunoonya engeri y'okukozesaamu enkyukakyuka zino okukulaakulana.
ach_prompt: Ka cuk tye kamede ki dongo, jami mapat-pat manyen tye kabino ma kelo ber pa jami mapat-pat. Lutim biacara omyero guyeny yoo me tic ki aloka-loka magi pi dongo lobo.
teo_prompt: Kwape inyikokinit esokoni aijulanakin, eutasi iponesio luitetiak alomun luejaasi keda ajokisio nuegelegela. Ekot agwelanarak aimo iwaitin lu itwasamaete aijulanakineta nu kanu apol.
lgg_prompt: Cu ni mu drile e'doria, wura o'diru 'diyi efu e'yo orodriruni ejipi. Le 'ba tujari 'yepi 'diyi ma aa mile be geri eyini ecozu ojata 'diyi ayuzu zota ejizu.
nyn_prompt: Obutare ku burikugumizamu nibuhinduka, emiringo misya eriho erikureeta emigasho y'omutaano. Abashuubuzi bashemereire kuronda oburyo bw'okukoresa empindahinduka ezi, kugira ngu batunguuke.

eng_prompt: In a surprising turn of events, industry analysts are reevaluating their predictions for market trends. It seems that despite the odds, a small player has managed to outshine the competition.
lug_prompt: Mu nkyukakyuka eyeewuunyisa, abakugu mu by'amakolero baddamu okwekenneenya okuteebereza kwabwe ku ntambula y'akatale. Kirabika nti newankubadde waliwo emikisa, omuzannyi omutono asobodde okuwangula okuvuganya.
ach_prompt: I aloka-loka ma obedo me ngeng tutwal, ludiro me biacara gitye ka ngiyo kit ma biacara tye ka wot kwede. Nen calo kadi bed ni peko tye, latuku matidi acel oloyo pyem ne.
teo_prompt: Kotoma aijulakinio naka iboro, eutasi itunga airereonor aomisio kec nuikamunitos epone loebeitor esokoni aswam. Esubit bala karaida ejaas atiokisio, abu abolian lodidi kopedo aitelekaar abolobol.
lgg_prompt: E'yo yi ojazu osuta si, 'ba e'yo ama'baa okalamvu ma alia 'diyi yi ma egata e'yo cuu ni 'diyi ma dria 'diyi ma ale andri o'diru. Eri ena kile e'yo ewaru 'diyi ma talasi, 'ba avita avipi werea ni o'bi abala 'yepi 'diyi aga ra.
nyn_prompt: Abacencuzi b'eby'obushubuzi bariyo nibagaruka bashwijume oku eby'obushubuzi birikuza kubaho. Nikireebeka ngu n'obu haraabe hariho oburemeezi, omuzaani mukye asingire ab'empaka.

eng_prompt: The atmosphere in the arena is electric, filled with anticipation and excitement. Fans from all over have gathered to witness this historic showdown.
lug_prompt: Embeera mu kisaawe ya masannyalaze, ejjudde okusuubira n'okucamuka. Abawagizi okuva mu buli wamu bakungaanidde okulaba empaka zino ez'ebyafaayo.
ach_prompt: Kwo I bar tuku ne obedo mac, dano tye ki miti madit tutwal dok cwiny gi yom totwal. Lucwak tuku ma aa ki I kabedo mapatpat gugure me neno pyem man ma pire tek tutwal-li.
teo_prompt: Ejaasi ejautene loka aiboisit naka abolia keda akim, ido eleleba keda aiyalama keda aiyalama. Apotu egangitok luka akwapin kere kotukokinos kanu asesen epeget lo lo akiro nukakolo.
lgg_prompt: Angu pari avitaniri ma alia ri aci be, asi 'baza be azini ayiko feza be tre. Ba atita fepi engazu pari dria ma alea 'diyi tra eyi ndrezu e'yo a'di 'diza 'di ni.
nyn_prompt: Embeera omu kishayi n'ey'amashanyarazi, eijwire amatsiko n'okushemererwa. Abahagizi kuruga omu myanya yoona, baketeeranira hamwe okureeba empaka ezi ez'ebyafaayo.

eng_prompt: Officials have been reviewing the existing regulations to improve traffic flow and safety. As a result, significant updates are set to be implemented soon.
lug_prompt: Abakungu babadde beekenneenya amateeka agaliwo okutumbula entambula y'ebidduka n'obukuumi. N'ekyavaamu, enkyukakyuka ez'omugaso zijja kuteekebwa mu nkola mu bbanga ttono.
ach_prompt: Lutela gubedo ka ngiyo cik matye me ilo malo rwom me wot pa motoka ki ber bedo. Macalo adwogi ne, yub me kelo aloka-loka mapire tek obi katic cokcok-ki.
teo_prompt: Eutasi eswamak airereor ikisila lu ejaas kanu aitojokar elose keda ayuwara naka amotokan. Kanuka ngun, eponio aitolomun aijulanakineta nuepolok katipet.
lgg_prompt: Azi'ba eyi e'bi azita aa'pi sa'wa 'disi 'diyi ma ale andri geri nzila eyini acizu ri ma omgbo otuzu azini e'yo onzi 'yezu 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu. E'yo 'disi, 'ba nga ojata okporu 'diyi 'ye mbeleru.
nyn_prompt: Abakuru batwire nibashwijuma ebiragiro ebiriho okutunguura entambura y'ebiiruka hamwe n'oburinzi. N'ekyarugiremu, empindahinduka ez'omugasho niziija kuta omu nkora omu bwire butari bwa hare.

eng_prompt: Recent studies have shown that changes in traffic regulations can significantly influence rider behavior and safety. In particular, the implementation of the earlier protocol aimed to address the unique challenges faced by Boda Boda riders on the roads.
lug_prompt: Okunoonyereza okwakakolebwa kulaga nti enkyukakyuka mu mateeka g'ebidduka zisobola okukyusa enneeyisa y'abavuzi n'obukuumi. Okusingira ddala, okuteekebwa mu nkola kw'enkola eyasooka kwalina ekigendererwa eky'okugonjoola okusoomoozebwa okw'enjawulo abavuzi ba boodabooda kwe basanga ku nguudo.
ach_prompt: Kwed ma otime cokcok-ki onyuto ni aloka-loka I cik me gudu twero kelo aloka-loka I kom kit pa ludwo mutoka ki ber bedo gi. Makato weng, keto cik macon itic obedo ki miti me tyeko peko mapat-pat ma ludwo boda nongo I gudu.
teo_prompt: Itodunitos aisisiaeta nuitetiak ebe aijulanakineta kotoma okisila luka erot epedorete aijulakin iponesio luka iderepan keda ayuwara kec. Kacut, alosikinet naka aitegeario naka ainapeta ngun erai kanu aitemokin atiokisio nuetereikina keda ibodabodan korotin.
lgg_prompt: E'yo eti ondaza o'diru 'diyi ece kini ojata azita nzila dria 'diyi ma alia 'diyi eco 'ba mutukari onzupi 'diyi ma adriza oja ra. E'yo 'bani e'yo otuta ni oko 'diyi 'bazu azi ngazu ri lezu e'yo ewaru 'ba Boda Boda onzupi 'diyini dri fuzu nzila dria 'diyi ma aza kozu.
nyn_prompt: Okucondooza okuhweireho kworeka ngu empindahinduka omu biragiro by'ebiiruka, nizibaasa kuhindura emicwe y'abavugi b'ebiiruka hamwe n'okwerinda kwabo. Okukira munonga, okuta ebiragiro omu nkora kikaba kigyendereire kumaraho oburemeezi bw'omutaano obu abavugi ba Boda Boda barikutunga aha nguuto.

eng_prompt: In light of the recent market fluctuations and declining demand, it has become clear that we need to take decisive action. To mitigate potential losses, certain goods should immediately be sold off.
lug_prompt: Okusinziira ku nkyukakyuka mu katale gye buvuddeko n'okukendeera kw'obwetaavu, kyeyoleka bulungi nti twetaaga okubaako kye tukolawo. Okusobola okukendeeza ku kufiirwa, ebintu ebimu birina okutundibwa amangu ddala.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki aloka-loka me cuk ma otime cokcok-ki ki wel jami ma mite me acata matye kadok piny, nen atyer kamaleng ni omyero watim gin mo. Me dwoko piny rwom me rweny pa lim, jami mukene omyero kicat cut.
teo_prompt: Katupitos aijulanakineta nuka esokoni keda aibiror naka eipuda, ecai cut ebe ibusakinit oni aswam kagogongu. Kanu aitidisiar atwaniar, ibusakinit agwelar iboro ice katipet.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ojata cuu ni 'diyi ma dria azini afa 'bani le 'diyi ma omgbo esizu ri ma e'yo si, eri eca e'da kililiru kini le ama ma 'ye e'yo azi okporu ni. E'yo afa avizu 'diyi ma omgbo esizu, le 'ba ma ozi afa azi 'diyi indikindi.
nyn_prompt: Kurugirira aha mpindahinduka y'akatare n'okutuubya kw'ebyetaago, nikyoreka butunu ngu twine kukora eky'amaani. Okuzibira okufeerwa, ebintu ebimwe bishemereire kuguzibwa ahonaaho.

eng_prompt: A significant increase in population and consumer demand has transformed the region into a bustling hub of activity. As businesses expand and new opportunities arise, the potential for economic growth becomes increasingly evident.
lug_prompt: Okweyongera kw'omuwendo gw'abantu n'obwetaavu bw'abaguzi mu kitundu kifuuse ekifo eky'emirimu. Bizinensi bwe zeeyongera era n'emikisa emipya bwe gijjawo, obusobozi bw'okukulaakulana mu byenfuna bweyongera okweyoleka.
ach_prompt: Medde pa wel dano kacel ki miti pa luwil oweko kabedo eni odoko kabedo ma dano dwong iye. Ka biacara tye ka dongo ki gum manyen tye kabino, kero me dongo lobo bene tye ka nen.
teo_prompt: Aiyatakinio na itunga keda eipud loka agwelak ijaikit aiboisit ngin araun aiboisit naepol noi naka aswamisio. Kwape iyatakinos ibiasaran keda arerengesio nuitetiak, epol apedor naka apol naka ikapun.
lgg_prompt: O'bi ma kalafe tupi tualu 'ba afa je'baa 'diyi pie ri oja angu 'di angu 'yeta ni okporu ni ru. Tujura eyini zoria azini drileba o'diru eyini efuzu 'boria, e'yo zota e'yo robiani 'diyiniri ni eca e'da drile.
nyn_prompt: Okweyongyera kw'omuhendo gw'abantu hamwe n'ebyetaago by'abaguzi, kihindwire ekyanga nk'omwanya gw'emirimo. Eby'obushubuzi ku birikugyenda nibikura kandi n'emirimo misya neetandika, entunguuka omu by'entaasya neeyeyongyera kureebeka.

eng_prompt: After years of negotiations and collaboration among member states, a consensus has been reached on the necessary adjustments. This pivotal agreement marks a significant step towards economic integration and trade facilitation.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okuteesa n'okukolagana mu mawanga agali mu mukago okumala emyaka, bakkiriziganyizza ku nkyukakyuka ezeetaagisa. Endagaano eno enkulu eraga omutendera ogw'amaanyi mu kwegatta mu by'enfuna ne mu by'obusuubuzi.
ach_prompt: Ingee mwaki mapol me winye ki winye ikin lobe ma tye I dul enoni, winye obedo tye I kom aloka-loka ma mite. Winye ma pire tek man obedo yoo acel me kelo ribbe I tenge me lim ki cato wil.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ikar luipu luka ipegeta keda aiswamanara kiding akwapin, adolokin acamanara kanu aijulanakineta nu ekotoi. Acamanar na naepol noi erai adoketait naepol noi naka aimorikikina keda agwelanar.
lgg_prompt: Eli karakara e'yo otuza ni azini ti icita kari memba ru 'diyi ma eselea ri ma vutia, 'ba isu ti ecita ojata lele 'diyi ma dria ra. E'yo otuza okporu 'diri pa so okporu tualu e'yo tujarani 'diyi ma otuza ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'emyaka mingi y'okuteisa hamwe n'okukwatanisa, amahanga agari omu mukago gakahika aha kwikirizana aha mpindahinduka ezirikwetengwa. Endagaano egi ey'omugasho n'omutendera gw'amaani omu by'entaasya n'obushuubuzi.

eng_prompt: After analyzing the proposed economic policies and their potential effects on businesses and consumers, it seems clear that significant changes are on the horizon. Many experts believe that these changes will ultimately lead to a more favorable financial environment for individuals and corporations alike.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okwekenneenya enkola z'ebyenfuna eziteeseddwa n'engeri gye ziyinza okukosaamu bizinensi n'abaguzi, kirabika nga kyeyoleka bulungi nti enkyukakyuka ez'amaanyi ziri mu maaso. Abakugu bangi bakkiriza nti enkyukakyuka zino mu nkomerero zijja kuleeta embeera y'ebyensimbi ennungi eri abantu ssekinnoomu n'ebitongole.
ach_prompt: Ingee ngiyo cik mapat-pat makwako lok kom lim ki adwogi ne I kom biacara ki luwil, nen atyer kamaleng ni aloka-loka madit tye kabino. Ludiro mapol tye ki niyee ni aloka-loka magi bikelo ber pa lim pi dano ki dul mapat-pat.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka airereonor ainapeta nuka ikapun keda epone loepedoriata kesi aitolitol ibiasaran keda agwelak, esubit bala ejai aijulanakineta nuepolok. Iyuunitos ipirioitin luipu ebe epote aijulanakineta nu ayangaun ejautene loajokan noi loka ikapun mama ejaasi itunga keda ikampunin.
lgg_prompt: Azita e'yo robiani 'diyi ma ale andrizu 'bori ma vutia azini e'yo yini eco 'ye tujari yi ma dria azini 'ba afa je'baa 'diyi ma dria 'diyi, eri e'da kililiru kini ojata okporu 'diyi e'do ewu drialeri ma alia. Ba e'yo nipi saaru 'diyi a'i ra kini ojata 'diyi nga asizu fe angu e'yo robia ni 'diyi ni aa'zu muke 'diyi ejizu 'ba yi ma ngulupi ni azini amuti yi dria.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okushwijuma ebiteiso by'eby'entatsya hamwe n'ebirikubaasa kukwata aha bizinesi n'abaguzi, nikyoreka butunu ngu empindahinduka y'amaani eri haihi kubaho. Abakugu abaingi nibaikiriza ngu empindahinduka ezi niziija kureetaho embeera nungi y'eby'empiiha ahabantu n'ebitongore.

eng_prompt: As the beverage industry continues to evolve, companies are constantly seeking ways to enhance their products and processes. Nile Breweries has been at the forefront of this movement, pushing the boundaries of brewing technology and sustainability.
lug_prompt: Nga amakolero g'ebyokunywa gakyagenda mu maaso okukulaakulana, amakampuni buli kaseera ganoonya engeri y'okutumbula ebintu n'enkola zaago. Nile Breweries ebadde ku mwanjo mu kaweefube ono, okusindiikiriza ensalo za tekinologiya w'okukola omwenge n'okuyimirizaawo.
ach_prompt: I kare ma biacara me mato kongo tye kamede ki dongo, dul mapat-pat tye ka yenyo yoo me ilo malo rwom me jami gi. Gang yubu kongo biya Nile Breweries obedo I nyim yub man, kun kelo diro manyen me yubu kongo biya ki dongo lobo.
teo_prompt: Kwape inyikokini aswam naka aimat imaten, eutasi ikampunin aimo iwaitin lu itojokaret iboro kec. Arai erionget loka Nile Breweries loingarenikinit kotoma aswamisioit kangin, aitodolikin ewai loka etatai loakwana keda aijar naejok.
lgg_prompt: Okalamvu afa mvuzani 'diyiniri ni mu drile zoria, amuti yi sawa driasi geri nda afa yini edele 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu. Okalamvu ewa edepi Nile Breweries niri ebi ovu e'yo 'di ma drile ru, geri afa ewa edezu 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu azini afa ewa edezu 'diyi ma tambazu.
nyn_prompt: Nk'oku amakorero g'ebyokunywa garikugumizamu nigakura, amakampuni nigasherura oburyo bw'okutunguura ebintu byago. Ekitongore ky'amaarwa ekya Nile Breweries kitwire nikyebembera omurimo ogu, kirikureetaho tekinorogye y'amaarwa n'obuhangwa.

eng_prompt: In our ongoing commitment to sustainability and community support, we have been exploring innovative ways to enhance our product offerings. As a result, we have introduced new brands which are made using local raw materials.
lug_prompt: Mu kwewaayo kwaffe okugenda mu maaso eri obuwangaazi n'obuyambi bw'ekitundu, tubadde tunoonyereza ku ngeri ez'obuyiiya ez'okutumbula ebintu byaffe. N'ekivuddemu, tutongozza ebika ebipya ebikolebwa mu bintu ebikozesebwa mu kuno.
ach_prompt: I keto cwiny wa I kom dongo lobo ki kony pa lwak, wabedo ka yenyo yoo manyen me medo rwom me jami ma watye kwede. Macalo adwogi ne, wakelo jami mapat-pat manyen ma kiyubu ki jami ma kiyubu ki I tedero.
teo_prompt: Kotoma ainakinawok naka aidar aijar keda agangat kama ejaasi itunga, iuta sio aingic iwaitin luitetiak lu itojokaret iboro wok. Kanuka ngun, itolomutu sio iponesio luitetiak lu iswamao keda iboro lu itwasamao ore.
lgg_prompt: Asi feza amani muzu drile ewu drile ri ma alea azini atita ongulumu eyini ri ma alea, ama ebi geri o'diru 'diyi onda afa amavile 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu. E'yo 'disi, ama e'do afa wura o'diru 'bani edele afa ayuzaru ogogo 'diyi si 'diyi.
nyn_prompt: Omu kwehayo kwaitu okurikugyenda omu maisho ahaby'obuhangwa n'obuhwezi bw'abantu, tutwire nitucondooza emiringo y'okutunguura ebintu byaitu. N'ekyarugiremu, tutandikireho ebika bisya ebirikukorwa n'ebintu ebirikukoresibwa omwihanga.

eng_prompt: In our latest marketing strategy, we aim to expand our reach and cater to a wider audience. We recognize the need to provide more accessible options for budget-conscious shoppers.
lug_prompt: Mu bukodyo bwaffe obusembyeyo obw'okutunda, tugenderera okugaziya okutuuka kwaffe n'okutuuka ku bantu abangi. Tukirabye obwetaavu bw'okuwa eby'okulonda ebyangu eri abaguzi abafaayo ku mbalirira.
ach_prompt: I yub me cat manyen ma watye kwede, watye ki miti me cwalo lok angeya bot dano mapol. Wangeo ni omyero wamii yoo mapat-pat ma yot tutwal ki luwil ma cente gi nok.
teo_prompt: Kotoma ainapeta wok nuitetiak nuka agwelanar, ikoto oni aitanyanyar aiboisio wok kanu adolonokin itunga luipu. Ijeni sio eipud loka aijaikin iboro lu epatana adumun mama ejaasi agwelak lu ejenete nuka ebajet.
lgg_prompt: Otita amavile o'diru e'yo cuu ndazaniri ma alia, ama asi 'ba angu amani cazu 'diyi ma ongmbo otuzu azini cazu 'ba kalafe angiri 'diyi vu. Ama ega e'yo lezu geri 'bani ecozu afa jezu 'diyi fezu 'ba robia ayupi 'diyi dri ra.
nyn_prompt: Omu nkora yaitu y'obushuubuzi, nituteekateeka kuhika abantu baingi. Nitureeba ekyetengo ky'okureetaho oburyo oburikwetengwa ahabw'abaguzi abarikufayo aha mbaririra yaabo.

eng_prompt: After extensive market research and customer feedback, the development team set out to create a solution that meets the needs of our target audience. Every detail was considered to ensure optimal functionality and user experience.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okunoonyereza ennyo ku katale n'ebiteeso bya bakasitoma, ttiimu y'abakugu yatandika okutondawo eky'okugonjoola ekizibu ekituukana n'ebyetaago by'abantu be tugenderera. Buli kimu kyalowoozebwako okulaba nga kikola bulungi n'okukozesa obulungi.
ach_prompt: Ingee kwedo lok matut I kom cat ki tam pa luwil, dul ma yubu jami ocako yubu yoo me tic ma cobo miti pa dano ma wamito tic kwedgi. Ki tamo matut I kom jami weng me neno ni tic tye maber ki kit ma lutic tiyo kwede.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka aingic esokoni keda aomisio nuka agwelak, apotu etimu kiswamautu aitolomun iboro lu itodolikinete ipudesia luka itunga. Aponi koomoomak akiro kere kanu awanyun ebe iswamai ejok ka aitwasam ejok.
lgg_prompt: E'yo vuti ondaza cuu ma dria 'diyi ma vutia azini o'duko aje'ba yini 'diyi ma tia 'bori ma vutia, amuti e'yo otupi 'diyi e'do e'yo azi ngapi 'ba amani le 'diyi ma aza kopi ra 'diyi edezu. Ba ega e'yo dria eyi ma dria kililiru eyini ani azi ngazu kililiru dika eyini ani ayuzaru kililiru beni.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okucondooza munonga aha katare hamwe n'okugarukwamu kw'abaguzi, tiimu y'abakugu omu by'entunguuka ekataho eky'okukora ekirikubaasa kuhikiiriza ebyetengo by'abantu abu turikwenda. Buri kintu kyona kikateekwateekwaho kureeba ngu nikikora kurungi n'okukoresa kurungi.

eng_prompt: In our efforts to make the product accessible, we conducted extensive market research to understand the needs of our target audience. As a result, we have tailored our pricing strategy accordingly.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube waffe okufuula ebintu ebyangu, twakola okunoonyereza okw'amaanyi ku katale okutegeera ebyetaago by'abantu be tugenderera. N'ekivuddemu, tukyusizza emiwendo gyaffe okusinziira ku ekyo.
ach_prompt: I tutewa me weko jami ne obed yot, watimo kwed matut tutwal me niang miti pa dano ma wamito cato botgi. Macalo adwogi ne, waloko yoo me cato jamiwa malubbe ki welgi.
teo_prompt: Kotoma aswam wok naka aitodolikin ibore, apotu sio angicata esokoni noi kanu amisiikin ipudesia luka itunga luekotosi sio aitodolikin. Kanuka ngun, apotu sio ejulakisi ainapetawok nuka itiaisinei.

eng_prompt: In order to better understand how you lead your team, could you share some insights about your approach to management? I'm curious about the strategies you employ to motivate and guide your employees.
lug_prompt: Okusobola okutegeera obulungi engeri gy'okwatamu ttiimu yo, oyinza okugabana amagezi ku ngeri gy'okwatamu obukulembeze? Njagala okumanya obukodyo bw'okozesa okukubiriza n'okulungamya abakozi bo.
ach_prompt: Me niang maber kit ma itelo kwede ticci, itwero nywako tam ma megi i kom kit me tela? Amito ngeyo diro ma itiyo kwede me cuku cwiny ki doro lutic mamegi.

eng_prompt: The anticipation is building as industry leaders gather for the annual awards ceremony. This year promises to showcase innovative talent and groundbreaking achievements.
lug_prompt: Obwagazi bweyongedde ng'abakulembeze b'amakolero bakungaana ku mukolo gw'okugaba awaadi buli mwaka. Omwaka guno gusuubiza okulaga ebitone by'okuyiiya n'ebituukiddwaako eby'enjawulo.

teo_prompt: Ejai eipud loepol noi ne atukonokinor engarenok luka ikampunin luka aitolomun ainanakineta nuka ekaru. Isumunit ekaru kalo aitodiar atalanta keda aitodolinikineta nuitegelikina.
lgg_prompt: Asi 'baza ma omgbo ni tu drice'ba okalamvu ni 'diyi ni oku tualu omu dria dria feza ni eli vusi ri ma alia. Eli 'disi owi i feta Munguni fe 'diyi e'dazu tualu e'yo onyiru 'diyi pie.
nyn_prompt: Okutegyereza kuriyo nikweyongyera ahabw'abebembezi b'eby'obushubuzi kwegaita aha mukoro gw'okuheereza ebirabo buri mwaka. Omwaka ogu niguraganisa kworeka emyoga y'okujumbura hamwe n'ebintu ebikuru ebikozirwe.

eng_prompt: After reviewing the financial records, the auditors raised concerns about the valuation of the assets. Consequently, the bank objected to the assessment under the Income-tax Act.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okwekenneenya ebiwandiiko by'ebyensimbi, ababalirizi b'ebitabo baalaga obweraliikirivu ku muwendo gw'ebintu. N'ekyavaamu, bbanka yagaana okusasula omusolo okusinziira ku tteeka erifuga omusolo ku nfuna.
ach_prompt: Ingee ngiyo rekod me lim, joo ma ngiyo kor tic ki lim gukelo lworo I kom wel lim ma jami ne tye kwede. Macalo adwogi ne, bang okwero wel mucoro malube ki cik makwako mucoro iwi lim.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka airereor aiwadikaeta nuka ikapun, apotu engican itodutu aiyalongongo kanuikamunitos etiai loka iboro. Kanuka ngun, abu aingadis naka ikapun konger aanyanario naka ikapun kotupitete ekisil loka isolosinei luka ikapun.
lgg_prompt: Ba e'yo robia ni 'diyi ma ale andrizu 'bori ma vutia, 'ba e'yo robia ni 'diyi ma ale andri'baa 'diyi ece asi otiza e'yo lonyi ma ongmbo ma dria ra. E'yo 'disi, erojo 'da ga agata e'yo 'bani musoro 'bazu musoro ofeza ma dria ri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okushwijuma ebihandiiko by'esente, ababazi b'ebitabo bakahayo okwerarikirira aha muhendo gw'ebintu. N'ekyarugiremu, banka ekahakanisa enteekateeka y'okushorooza omushoro gw'entaasya.

eng_prompt: Farmers often rely on loans to finance their operations and invest in new equipment. Understanding the tax implications of these loans is crucial for effective financial planning.
lug_prompt: Abalimi batera okwesigama ku kwewola okusasula emirimu gyabwe n'okusiga ensimbi mu kugula ebyuma ebipya. Okutegeera ebiva mu misolo ku kwewola kuno kya mugaso nnyo mu kukola enteekateeka ennungi ey'ebyensimbi.
ach_prompt: Lupur ipol kare gijenge I kom lim den me culu pi tic gi ki wilo jami tic manyen. Niang adwoki me culu mucoro I kom lim den eni pire tek tutwal pi yub me lim maber.
teo_prompt: Itwasamaete akoriok ilonin kanu agwel iboro lu akoru luitetiak. Amisikin nuikamunitos isolosinei luka ilonin lu epol ajokis kanu aitemonokin nuka ikapun.
lgg_prompt: êž‹Ba amvu êžŒyaêžŒba êžŒdiyi yi ati mari ma dria tualu afa ayuzaru oêžŒdiru êžŒdiyi jezu. E'yo musoro ofeza mari 'diyi ma dria 'diyi ma vata eri orodriru otita robia ni kililiru 'diyi 'yezu.

teo_prompt: Akaulo na adumun alimoret naka aiyatakinio naka isolosinei, abu aingadis naka ikapun irereonor akiro nuka ikapun ke. Apotu kesi odumutu amamut acamanar kotoma aingic naka erionget loka isolosinei kanuikamunitos ilonin kec luka akor.
lgg_prompt: Bani o'duko esuzu e'yo musoro ma omgbo ni tuzu ri ma dria 'bori ma vutia, ero robia ta mbazuri 'ye e'yo robia ni 'diyi ma ale andri kililiru. Eyi esu e'yo eyi ma esele coza amuti musoro trapi 'diyi ma alea e'yo loni eyini 'du agirikica ma dria 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okutunga okumanyisibwa kw'emishoro eyeyongyeire, banka ekakora okushwijuma kurungi ebihandiiko byayo eby'esente. Bakashanga obutaikirizana omu kushwijuma kw'ebitongore ebirikushorooza omushoro, ebirikukwata aha rooni zaabo z'eby'obuhingi n'oburiisa.

eng_prompt: In a recent case concerning tax exemptions for agricultural exports, the legal team presented arguments regarding the treatment of interest on loans. The judge carefully considered the implications of the tax code as it relates to financial support for coffee exporters.
lug_prompt: Mu musango ogwaliwo gye buvuddeko awo ogukwata ku kusonyiyibwa emisolo ku by'obulimi ebifulumizibwa ebweru w'eggwanga, ttiimu y'abalamuzi yaleeta ensonga ezikwata ku ngeri amagoba gye gatwalibwamu ku looni. Omulamuzi yalowooza nnyo ku ngeri etteeka ly'omusolo gye likwataganamu n'obuyambi bw'ensimbi eri abakugu mu kutunda emmwanyi ebweru w'eggwanga.
ach_prompt: I lok ma otime cokcok-ki ma lubbe ki kwanyo mucoro iwi jami acata ma aa ki ilobo ma woko, lupilida gumiyo lok ma lubbe ki kit ma ki tero kwede magoba me lim den. Langol kop ne otamo matut I kom adwoki pa cik me mucoro I kom kony me lim ma kimiyo ki jo ma cato mwanyi ilobo ma woko.
teo_prompt: Kotoma omusago loikamunit ailem esolo kanu agwelanar iboro luka akoru kinga, apotu ipulidan itodutu akiro nuikamunitos ameda naka ilonin. Abu ekatubon koomoom ejok nuikamunitos esolo loikamunit agangat naka ikapun mama ejaasi agwelanarak nuka emwanyi.
lgg_prompt: EêžŒyo êžŒbani êžŒye oêžŒdi êžŒdiyi ma alia eêžŒyo êžŒbani lezu êžŒba ma li musoro afa êžŒbani ozi engazu amve êžŒdiyi ma dria êžŒdiyi ma dria êžŒdiyi ma dria, êžŒba eêžŒyo lipi êžŒdiyi ece eêžŒyo êžŒbani lezu êžŒba ma êžŒdu orodri mari dria êžŒdiyi ma dria. Ba e'yo lipiri ega e'yo 'bani eco 'ye musoro ofeza ma dria ri ma dria geri erini ecozu atita robia niri fezu 'ba kawa ozipi kari amve 'diyi ma alea 'diyi dri ri ma dria.

Omuramuzi akashwijuma n'obwegyendesereza ebirikubaasa kuruga omu biragiro by'emishoro, nk'oku kirikukwata aha buhwezi bw'esente oburikuhebwa abarikuguza omwani aheeru y'eihanga.

eng_prompt: In order to support agricultural development, certain financial incentives are provided by the government. One such incentive is a tax exemption for specific activities related to farming.
lug_prompt: Okusobola okuwagira enkulaakulana y'ebyobulimi, gavumenti egaba ebintu ebimu ebisikiriza mu by'ensimbi. Ekimu ku bintu ng'ebyo kwe kusonyiyibwa emisolo ku mirimu egimu egyekuusa ku bulimi n'obulunzi.

nyn_prompt: Gavumenti, okubaasa kushagika entunguuka y'eby'obuhingi n'oburiisa, neeha abantu obuhwezi bw'esente. Kimwe ahari ebyo n'okusharwaho emishoro aha mirimo y'obuhingi n'oburiisa.

eng_prompt: The company's marketing strategy proved effective in attracting new customers. As a result, domestic sales went up six by percent last year.
lug_prompt: Enkola ya kkampuni ey'okutunda yalaga nti ya mugaso mu kusikiriza bakasitoma abapya. N'ekyavaamu, omuwendo gw'ebintu ebyatundibwa mu ggwanga gwalinnya ebitundu mukaaga ku buli kikumi omwaka oguwedde.
ach_prompt: Yub me cat pa dul ne okelo adwogi maber tutwal I nongo luwil manyen. Macalo adwogi ne, cat I lobo Uganda omede I rwom me abicel iwi miya I mwaka ma okato.
teo_prompt: Apotu iwaitin lu agwelanar luka ekampuni kiswamata ejok kanu ayangaun agwelak luitetiak. Kanuka ngun, abu agwelanar kotoma akwapuwok kiyatakin keda ikanyape kotoma ngolikwatat okaru je.

eng_prompt: After analyzing the current market trends and consumer behavior, the executives expressed optimism about future growth. They believe that recent changes in the economy will create new opportunities for their products.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okwekenneenya embeera eriwo mu katale n'enneeyisa y'abaguzi, abakulu baalaga essuubi ku nkulaakulana mu biseera eby'omu maaso. Balowooza nti enkyukakyuka ezaakagwawo mu by'enfuna zijja kutondawo emikisa emipya mu bintu byabwe.
ach_prompt: Ingee ngiyo kit ma cat tye kawot kwede ki kit ma luwil timo kwede, ludito guwaco ni gitye ki gen I kom dongo lobo matye anyim. Gitye ki niyee ni alokaloka matye katime I tenge me lim obi kelo gum manyen pi jami gi.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka airereonor ejautene loka esokoni keda iponesio luka agwelak, apotu lukapolok itodutu amuno naka apol koingaren. Iyuunitos kesi ebe aijulanakineta nuitetiak nuka ikapun epote aitolomun arerengesio nuitetiak kanuka iborokec.

eng_prompt: In response to increasing demand from international markets, the company announced its plans for expansion. Executives revealed their strategy to diversify revenue streams by tapping into global sales.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula obwetaavu obweyongera okuva mu butale bw'ensi yonna, kampuni yalangiridde enteekateeka zaayo ez'okugaziwa. Abakulu baayogedde ku ngeri gye bayinza okwongera ku nsimbi ze bafuna nga beenyigira mu kutunda ebintu mu nsi yonna.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me mede pa miti pa cuk me lobo mawoko, dul ne owaco ni tye ki yub me dongo. Lutela guwaco yoo gi me medo cente gi kun gitiyo ki cato wil I wilobo lung.

lgg_prompt: E'yo 'bani 'ba eyi ma cu kari amve 'diyi ma alea ri ma omgbo ni tuzu risi, amuti 'da azi otita erini 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu. Drice'ba eyi e'da geri eyini ecozu geri eyini robia esuzu 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu geri eyini afa ozizu wudrikurusi ndulu 'diyi ayuzu risi.

eng_prompt: Many people are unaware of the long-term effects of their habits on respiratory health. Research has consistently shown a strong link between smoking and various lung diseases.

ach_prompt: Dano mapol pe gingeyo adwoki marac ma timgi tye kwede i kom yotkom me yweyo. Kwed nyutu ni mato taa tye ki kubbe matek tutwal I kin dano ki two ma mako adunu.

lgg_prompt: Ba karakara eyi nini e'yo eyi ma adriza eyini 'ye sa'wa ezu ri ma dria ri ma dria ku. E'yo eti ondaza eyi e'da sa'wa driasi aa'ta okporu taba seza niri ma eselea azo furufuru eyi ma eselea 'diyi pie.

eng_prompt: In an effort to recognize excellence in the field of communications, industry leaders gathered to celebrate innovative achievements. Excitement filled the air as the announcement of the inaugural event was made.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'okusiima abakugu mu by'empuliziganya, abakulembeze b'amakolero baakuÅ‹Å‹aanye okujaguza obuyiiya obukoleddwa. Essanyu lyajjula mu bbanga ng'okulangirira kw'omukolo gw'okutongoza kukolebwa.
ach_prompt: I tute matek me miyo pwoc pi jami mabeco ma otimme I tenge me kubbe, lutela me dul enoni gugure me kwero jami mabeco ma otimme. Cwiny dano obedo yom totwal I kare ma kicwalo lok angeya I kom yub me kwero tyeko tic pa ladit lobo.

lgg_prompt: Okpo 'bazu 'ba e'yo nzepi muke ndeni 'diyi ma e'yo egazu, drice'ba okalamvu ni 'diyi tra eyi ayiko zu e'yo 'bani 'ye o'diru 'diyi ma dria. Ayiko fu oli ma alia 'bani e'yo ecezu omu 'bani 'ba e'dozu ri ma dria.

eng_prompt: In recognition of the various contributions made by professionals in the industry, the organizing committee has decided to implement a new awards system. This initiative aims to celebrate excellence and innovation across different areas of expertise.
lug_prompt: Mu kusiima obuyambi obw'enjawulo obukoleddwa abakugu mu mulimu guno, akakiiko akategesi kasazeewo okussaawo enkola empya ey'okugaba awaadi. Enteekateeka eno eruubirira kujaguza busukkulumu n'obuyiiya mu bitundu eby'enjawulo eby'obukugu.
ach_prompt: Me pwoyo tic mapat-pat ma ludiro me tenge eni gutimo, dul ma doro yub ne gumoko tamgi me keto yub manyen me miyo mic itic. Yub man tye ki miti me pwoyo rwom me tic ki diro manyen I kabedo mapat-pat ma ludiro tye iye.

lgg_prompt: E'yo 'ba e'yo nipi saaru okalamvu 'di ma alea 'diyini azi ngazu 'diyi ma e'yo egazu, komiti otupi 'diyi asi e'yo 'du geri dria dria fezu o'diru ni e'dozu. Otita 'di ma asisile lezu ava fezu e'yo onyiru 'diyi ma dria azini e'yo o'diru 'diyi ma dria pari onita ni ndundu 'diyi ma alia.

eng_prompt: The event celebrated outstanding contributions to community development and innovation. A diverse group of individuals and organizations gathered to recognize excellence in various fields.
lug_prompt: Omukolo gwajaguzza emirimu egy'enjawulo mu nkulaakulana y'ekitundu n'obuyiiya. Ekibinja ky'abantu n'ebitongole ebyenjawulo byakungaanidde okusiima ebirungi mu bintu eby'enjawulo.
ach_prompt: Yub eni obedo me kwero tic maber tutwal ma dano tye katimo me dongo kabedo gi ki yubu jami manyen. Dano ki dule mapol gugure kacel me miyo pwoc pi tic mabeco ma gutimo.
teo_prompt: Abu epucit inumunum aswamisio nuejokuka nuka apol keda aitolomunun iboro luitetiak kotoma atutubet. Apotu igurupun luegelegela luka itunga keda iriongeta kotukokinos kanu ajenun eswamae loajokan kotoma aiboisio nuegelegela.

nyn_prompt: Omukoro gukajaguza ebikorwa by'omutaano omu by'entunguuka hamwe n'okujumbura. Guruupu y'abantu hamwe n'ebitongore ebitarikushushana, baketeeranira hamwe okusiima abakozire kurungi omu myoga etari emwe.

eng_prompt: In a competitive industry where excellence is highly valued, companies strive to distinguish themselves through superior performance. Achieving recognition for quality can significantly enhance a firm's reputation and market position.
lug_prompt: Mu makolero agalimu okuvuganya okungi, amakampuni gagezaako okweyawula ku balala nga gakola emirimu emirungi. Okufuna okusiimibwa olw'omutindo kiyinza okutumbula ennyo erinnya lya kkampuni n'ekifo kyayo mu katale.
ach_prompt: I kabedo ma pyem tye matek tutwal, ka ma rwom me timo tic maber obedo gin ma pire tek tutwal, dul mapat-pat tute matek me bedo pat ki luwotgi kun gitiyo ki rwom ma lamal. Nongo pwoc pi rwom me tic maber twero medo rwom ki rwom me cat pa dul mo.
teo_prompt: Kotoma abolobol naepol noi naejokuna noi, ekotosi ikampunin ajenun nuegelegela kotoma aswamukec. Adumunun aijen kanu adoketait naejok epedori aikeun ekiror loka ekampuni keda adoketait naka esokoni.
lgg_prompt: Okalamvu a'bala 'yepi 'di ma alea 'bani e'yo onyiru 'yezu ri 'du uru, amuti eyi okpo 'ba eyini eyi ma esele cozu geri eyini azi ngazu muke risi. êž‹Bani êžŒba yi ma eêžŒyo egazu kililiru êžŒdiyi ma dria êžŒdiyi eco êžŒba yi ma ru azini pari yini cuu ma alia êžŒdiyi ma omgbo otu ra.

eng_prompt: In response to the growing demand for enhanced connectivity and collaboration in the telecommunications sector, a new partnership was formed. This initiative aims to leverage the collective resources and expertise of key industry players.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula obwetaavu obweyongera obw'okwongera okuyungibwa n'okukolagana mu kitongole ky'ebyempuliziganya, omukago omupya gwateekebwawo. Enteekateeka eno egendereddwamu okukozesa eby'obugagga eby'awamu n'obukugu bw'abazannyi abakulu mu mulimu.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me mede pa miti me kube ki ribbe I tenge me cim, dul manyen kicako. Yub man tye ki miti me tic ki kero ki ngec pa lutic mapigi tego.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin eipuda lo iyatakina lo arucokina keda aiswamanara kotoma orionget loka isimun, aponi kitolomunai aimorikikina naitetet. Alosikinet naka ainapeta ngun erai aitwasam iboro keda acoa naka itunga luepolok luiswamaete kotoma okampuni.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'bani lezu e'yo yi ecizu azini ti icita ma omgbo otuzu okalamvu o'dukoti edrizu ri ma alea ri ma omgbo otuzu risi, 'ba e'do amuti azi o'diru ni. Asisile e'yo 'di niri lezu 'ba okporu okalamvu 'da ma alea 'diyi ma okpo tualu ondua eyini 'diyi pie ri ayuzu.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okweyongyera kw'eby'empurizagana n'okukwatanisa omu by'empurizagana, ekibiina kisya kikatebwaho. Enteekateeka egi negyenderera okukoresa eby'obugaiga hamwe n'obukugu bw'abantu abakuru omu by'obushubuzi.

eng_prompt: After extensive negotiations and careful consideration of market trends, the board approved a significant financial commitment. This decision was aimed at expanding our operations and enhancing our competitive edge.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okuteesa ennyo n'okulowooza n'obwegendereza ku bigenda mu maaso mu katale, olukiiko lwakkiriza okwewaayo okw'amaanyi mu by'ensimbi. Okusalawo kuno kwabadde kugendererwamu kugaziya mirimu gyaffe n'okutumbula obusobozi bwaffe mu kuvuganya.
ach_prompt: Ingee winye mapol ki tam matut I kom jami matye katime I cuk, dul madoro dul enoni omoko yub me miyo cente madit tutwal. Miti me moko tam man obedo me medo tic wa ki medo rwom me pyem ma watye kwede.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ipegeta luipu keda airereonor akiro nuka esokoni, apotu lukapolok kocamutu ainakina naka ikapun. Alosikinet naka aseunet kana arai kanu aitanyanyar aswamisiowok ka aitogogong adoketait wok kotoma abolobol.
lgg_prompt: E'yo otuza angiri 'diyi ma vutia azini e'yo cuu ni 'diyi ma ale andrizu kililiru 'bori ma vutia, drice'ba amuti 'da ni 'diyi ai e'yo robia ni okporu 'diyi. Asisile e'yo 'duza 'di niri lezu azi ngaza amavile ri ma omgbo otuzu dika ama ma okpo abala 'yezu ri ma omgbo otuzu.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okuteesa munonga n'okushwijuma n'obwegyendesereza eby'obushuubuzi, akakiiko kakaikiriza okuraganisa kw'esente. Encwamu egi ekaba egyendereire kushanjuura emirimo yaitu n'okutunguura obusinguzi bwaitu omu by'empaka.

eng_prompt: After a successful fundraising campaign, the organization was able to secure significant financial support. As a result, the Super League received fifty-three million shillings.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okukungaanya ensimbi obulungi, ekitongole kyasobola okufuna obuyambi bw'ensimbi obw'amaanyi. N'ekyavaamu, Super League yafuna obukadde bwa siringi ataano mu busatu.
ach_prompt: Ingee yub me jogo cente maber tutwal, dul ne onongo kony me cente madit tutwal. Macalo adwogi, Super League onongo ciling milyon pyer abic wiye adek.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka aituk ikapun, abu erionget opedo adumun agangat naepol noi. Kanuka ngun, abu Super League kodum imilionin akaisakany iuni.
lgg_prompt: E'yo robia trazu drile suzaru 'bori ma vutia, amuti 'da esu atita robia niri angiri. E'yo 'disi, amuti Super League niri esu silingi milioni kali towi drini na.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okurundaana kurungi esente,ekitongore kikabaasa kutunga obuhwezi bw'esente bw'amaani. Ekyarugiremu, Super League ekatunga obukaikuru makumi ataano na bushatu.

eng_prompt: As the season progressed, the financial demands of maintaining operations became increasingly apparent. The league's management faced mounting expenses that required substantial funding to ensure its sustainability.
lug_prompt: Nga sizoni egenda mu maaso, ebyetaago by'ensimbi mu kulabirira emirimu byeyongera okweyoleka. Abaddukanya liigi baayolekagana n'okusaasaanya okw'amaanyi okwali kwetaaga ensimbi nnyingi okusobola okugiyimirizaawo.
ach_prompt: Ikare ma kare me pur tye ka mede anyim, miti me lim me gwoko tic omede ki nen atyer kamaleng. Lutela me dul tuku eni gubedo ka nongo cente madwong tutwal me neno ni dul tuku eni omedde anyim.

lgg_prompt: Ayi ti ni muzu drile, e'yo robia ni 'bani lezu azi ngazu 'diyi ma ta mbazu ri e'da i drile. Driceza amuti avita ni 'da niri esu e'yo robia ayuzu 'diyi ma omgbo ni tu ra erini ani ecozu eyi ma edri ta mbazu.
nyn_prompt: Obwire ku bwagyendeire omu maisho, ebyetaago by'esente by'okureeberera emirimo, bikyeyongyera kureebeka. Abeebembezi b'empaka bakareeba enshohoza erikweyongyera eyabaire neeyetenga esente nyingi, okureeba ngu nizigumizamu.

eng_prompt: In order to ensure a successful season, the league organizers calculated the financial requirements for each team. They determined that substantial funding would be necessary to cover operational costs and player salaries.
lug_prompt: Okusobola okukakasa sizoni ennungi, abategesi ba liigi babala ebisaanyizo by'ensimbi ebya buli ttiimu. Baasalawo nti ensimbi nnyingi zaali zeetaagibwa okusasula ssente z'okuddukanya emirimu n'emisaala gy'abazannyi.
ach_prompt: Me neno ni pyem tuku owoto maber, luyub tuku gucoyo wel lim ma mite pi tim acel-acel. Guwaco ni cente madit tutwal mite me culu pi tic ki mucara pa lutuku.
teo_prompt: Kanu awanyun ebe ejokuna apak naka abolia, apotu etemonokinak luka etimu kitetemoto ikapun lu ekotoi kangin etimu. Apotu kesi kotemasi ebe ibusakinit aijaikin ikapun luipu noi kanu aitac ikapun luka aswam keda eropit loka aboliak.
lgg_prompt: Ayi ti drile suzaru, 'ba avita otupi 'diyi e'yo robia ni amuti alu alu ni le 'diyi ma ongmbo la ra. Eyi esu ra kini robia angiri ni nga ovu orodriru aje azi ngazu 'diyi ma dria tualu musara 'ba avitani 'diyiniri ma dria.

eng_prompt: In the world of competitive sports, various leagues have their own unique rules and structures. One such league is the Super League, which features a distinct format for its matches.
lug_prompt: Mu nsi y'emizannyo egy'okuvuganya, liigi ez'enjawulo zirina amateeka gaazo ag'enjawulo n'enkola. Limu ku liigi ng'ezo ye Super League, erina enkola ey'enjawulo mu mipiira gyayo.
ach_prompt: I lobo me pyem tuku mapat-pat, pyem tuku mapat-pat tye ki cik ki yub mapat-pat meggi. Pyem tuku acel ma kit meno obedo Super League, matye ki yoo mapat tutwal me tuku.
teo_prompt: Kotoma akwap naka abolobol naka aboliasio, ejaasi aboliasio nuegelegela keda ikisilakec luitegelikina. Adiopet kotoma aboliasio ngun ngesi Super League, loejaasi keda epone loegelegela loka abolia.
lgg_prompt: Wudrikuru avita a'bala ni 'diyi ma alia, avita ndundu yi ma azita yi ma ngulupi ni azini yi ma esele ndu ndu 'diyi ci. Abala 'dile 'diyi ma azi Super league ni, geri avita eyini avizu 'diyi ndu ndu.
nyn_prompt: Omu nsi y'emizaano y'okuhayahayana, emizaano etari emwe n'emwe eine ebiragiro byayo n'emitendera yaayo. Emwe aha liigi nk'ezo ni Super League, erikworeka emizaano yaayo omu muringo gw'omutaano.

eng_prompt: To ensure the success of local youth soccer programs, various fundraising efforts have been initiated. Among these, the support from passionate individual soccer lovers has proven to be the most significant source of financial backing.
lug_prompt: Okukakasa obuwanguzi bwa pulogulaamu z'abavubuka ez'omupiira mu kitundu, enkola ez'enjawulo ez'okusonda ssente zitandikiddwawo. Mu bino, obuwagizi okuva mu baagalana b'omupiira gw'ebigere abanyiikivu bwe businga okuba ensibuko y'obuyambi bw'ensimbi.
ach_prompt: Me neno ni yub me tuku odilo pa bulu otimme maber, kicako yub mapat-pat me jogo cente. I kin magi, kony ma aa ki bot dano ma maro tuko odilo tutwal obedo yoo me nongo lim madit loyo weng.
teo_prompt: Kanu awanyun ebe epote ainapeta nuka emopira luka atumunak lukatutubet akerianar, aitolomun ikapun luegelegela. Kotoma ngun, agangat kama ejaasi itunga lueminasi noi abolia naka emopira ngesi ewai loajokan kakere loka agangat naka ikapun.
lgg_prompt: Otita 'ba ode eyini mupira avizu angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ma agata nezu, 'ba e'do e'yo ndundu robia trazu 'diyi 'bo. Diyi ma eselea, atita engazu 'ba avita mupira tuza lepi avasi 'diyi vu ri e'da kini eri geri orodriru ndeni atita robia niri esuzu ri'I.
nyn_prompt: Okureeba ngu puroguraamu z'eminyeeto ez'omupiira gw'ebigyere nizikora kurungi, hatandikirweho emiringo mingi y'okurundaana esente. Omuri ebi, obuhwezi kuruga omu bantu abarikukunda munonga omupiira, nibwo burikukirayo kuba oburugo bw'esente.

eng_prompt: Before making any commitments, it's crucial to assess the organization's current financial health. Understanding their budget and funding sources will provide insight into their capacity for new projects.
lug_prompt: Nga tonnaba kweyama, kikulu nnyo okwekenneenya embeera y'ebyensimbi y'ekitongole eriwo kati. Okutegeera embalirira yaabwe n'ensibuko y'ensimbi kijja kuwa amagezi ku busobozi bwabwe ku pulojekiti empya.
ach_prompt: Mapwod pe icikke me timo gin mo, pire tek tutwal me niang kit ma dul ne tye kwede. Niang byek me lim gi kacel ki kama cente gi aa ki iye bimiyo niang matut I kom kero gi me timo tic mapat-pat manyen.
teo_prompt: Erongo iswamaun aisumuneta, ejokuna aanyanar ejautene loka ikapun loka atukot. Ajenun ebajet kec keda aiboisio nu igangakinio kes ijaikini oni acoa na ipurojektin luitetiak.
lgg_prompt: De nga po'di mi owi mi e'yo azi 'yezu ku, eri orodriru mini amuti 'di ma geri robia esuzu sawa 'disi ri ma ale andrizu. Otita aje robia niri ma vata azini geri eyini robia esuzu 'diyi ma vata ni nga eyi ma okpo otita o'diru 'diyi 'yezu ri ma dria ri fe.
nyn_prompt: Otakaheireyo kukora ekintu kyona, n'eky'omugasho okushwijuma esente z'ekitongore. Okwetegyereza embaririra yaabo hamwe n'oburugo bw'esente, nikiija kubahwera kumanya oku barikubaasa kukora purogyekiti ensya.

eng_prompt: As the season progressed, various teams faced unexpected challenges both on and off the field. The growing concerns among players and fans alike have raised questions about the future of the sport.
lug_prompt: Sizoni bwe yagenda mu maaso, ttiimu ez'enjawulo zaayolekaganye n'okusoomoozebwa okwabadde tekusuubirwa mu kisaawe n'ebweru waakyo. Obweraliikirivu obweyongera mu bazannyi n'abawagizi buleeseewo ebibuuzo ku biseera by'omuzannyo eby'omu maaso.

lgg_prompt: Ayi ti ni muzu drile, amuti karakara eyi fu dri e'yo ewaru 'bani ega ku 'diyi be pari avita ni 'diyi ma alea azini pari avita ni 'diyi ma alea amve. Asi otiza tupi anzi mupira avipi 'diyi ma eselea 'ba atita fepi 'diyi pie ri eji e'yo eyi ewu drialeri ma dria.

eng_prompt: As the sport has evolved, the level of competition has intensified significantly. Many players now dedicate their lives to training and honing their skills, transforming the landscape of football.
lug_prompt: Ng'omuzannyo gukulaakulanye, omutindo gw'okuvuganya gweyongedde nnyo. Abazannyi bangi kati bawaayo obulamu bwabwe okutendekebwa n'okulongoosa obukugu bwabwe, okukyusa embeera y'omupiira.
ach_prompt: Kit ma tuku ne odongo kwede, rwom me pyem bene omedde tutwal. Lutuk odilo mapol dong gicwalo kwo gi me pwonye ki yubu diro gi, ma man okelo aloka loka I kom tuku odilo.

lgg_prompt: E'yo avita 'da ni zoria, abala eyi ma omgbo tu ra. Anzi mupira avipi karakara eyi sa'wa 'disi eyi ma edri fe imbata ma dria azini ondua eyini 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu, e'yo mupira tuza niri ojazu.

eng_prompt: As the sports industry continues to evolve, many analysts are predicting significant changes in how teams are managed and funded. With rising revenues and global fan engagement, the landscape of professional sports is shifting towards a more commercialized model.
lug_prompt: Ng'ebyemizannyo bikyagenda mu maaso n'okukulaakulana, abeekenneenya bangi bateebereza enkyukakyuka ez'amaanyi mu ngeri ttiimu gye ziddukanyizibwamu n'okuvujjirirwa. Olw'ensimbi eziyingira mu nsi yonna n'abawagizi okwetooloola ensi yonna, omuzannyo gw'ekikugu gugenda mu maaso n'okutumbula eby'obusuubuzi.
ach_prompt: Kit ma tic me tuku tye kamede ki dongo, ludiro mapol tye ka byeko aloka-loka madongo I kit ma dul tuku gi tiyo kwede ki cente gi. Ki mede pa cente ki bedo tye pa lucwak I wilobo lung, kabedo me tuku ma ludiro tye ka loke I yoo me timo biacara.

Robia ma omgbo tuzu tualu 'ba atita fepi wudrikurusi ndulu 'diyi pie, e'yo avita ni 'diyi ma wura oja'i e'yo tujari ni 'diyi vu.

Ahabw'entasya eyeyongyeire hamwe n'okushemererwa kw'abahagizi omu nsi yoona, emizaano y'abakugu eriyo neehindukira omu muringo gw'eby'obushubuzi.

eng_prompt: After years of planning and negotiations, the ambitious project finally came to fruition. Fans and players alike were excited to see the formation of a new competitive league.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okuteekateeka n'okuteesa okumala emyaka, pulojekiti ey'amaanyi yasembyeyo okutuuka ku buwanguzi. Abawagizi n'abazannyi bombi baali basanyufu okulaba okutondebwawo kwa liigi empya ey'okuvuganya.
ach_prompt: Ingee mwaki mapol me yube ki winye, yub man madit tutwal-li dong otum. Lucwak tuku kacel ki lutuku cwinygi obedo yom me neno yub me pyem manyen.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ikar luipu luka aitemonokin ka ipegeta, abu epurojekt loapolon kitodolik. Apotu egangitok keda aboliak iyalamasi noi kanu asesen aitolomunio naka etimu loitetet loka abolobol.

eng_prompt: In preparation for the upcoming match, the team is finalizing their logistics and resources. They are currently assessing what tools and gear will be essential for optimal performance.
lug_prompt: Mu kwetegekera omuzannyo ogujja, ttiimu emaliriza ebintu byayo n'ebikozesebwa. Kati bali mu kwekenneenya ebikozesebwa n'ebikozesebwa ebinaaba eby'omugaso mu kukola obulungi.
ach_prompt: I yubbe pi tuku matye kabino ni, dul tuku ne tye ka tyeko tic ki jami gi. Kombedi gitye ka neno jami tic ango ma mite pi tic maber.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemonokin kanuka abolia na ebunit, euta etimu aitemonokin iboro lu itwasamao. Eutasi kwana kesi airereonor iboro ka iboro lu ebeit aitwasam kanu aswam ejok.
lgg_prompt: Otuta avita emupi ri ni, amuti mupira avipi 'da ni e'yo eyini 'ye 'diyi 'yezu azini afa eyini ayuzaru 'diyi ma dria. Eyi curu'do afa ayuzaru azini afa ayuzaru 'diyi ma eti onda eyini ani azi ngazu kililiru beni.

eng_prompt: After careful consideration of the membership structure, it was decided that a select group of shareholders would have exclusive access to the premium benefits. Consequently, the other sixteen ordinary shareholders will be part of the main club.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okwetegereza obulungi enkola y'obwammemba, kyasalibwawo nti ekibinja ky'abalina emigabo abatono bajja kufuna ensimbi eza premium. N'olw'ekyo, bannannyini migabo abalala kkumi na mukaaga bajja kuba kitundu ku kibiina ekikulu.
ach_prompt: Ingee tam matut I kom dul pa lumemba, kimoko ni dul pa lumemba manok keken aye gubi nongo kony me lim. Macalo adwogi ne, joo mukene apar wie abicel ma gitye ki butgi bibedo ikin joo matye ki butgi madongo.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka aomoom ejok nuikamunitos imeeban, aponi koseunai ebe egurupu lo eseunitai luka itunga kes bon ebeit adumun ameda naka atitai. Kanuka ngun, itunga ice itomonakanyape luejaasi keda iborokec kes ebeit ajaut toma okilab loapolon.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'bani 'ba memba ru 'diyi ma dria ri ma ale andrizu 'bori ma vutia, 'ba 'du e'yo kini ongulumu 'ba esele be 'diyi ma azi yi ma ngulupi ni nga isu orodri 'bani fele memba ru 'diyi ma dria. Ka'dini, 'ba azi mudri drini azia 'diyi nga ovu amuti amburi ma azi.

eng_prompt: In response to ongoing criticism and financial challenges, league officials have decided to restructure the competition. As part of this overhaul, the number of teams in the Super League has been cut by half beginning next season.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula okuvumirira okugenda mu maaso n'okusoomoozebwa mu byensimbi, abakungu ba liigi basazeewo okuddamu okutegeka empaka. Ng'ekimu ku bigenda okukolebwa, omuwendo gwa ttiimu mu Super League gukendeezeddwa ekitundu kimu kya kubiri okutandika ne sizoni ejja.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me koko matye kamedde ki peko me lim, ludito me league gumoko tamgi me yubu pyem ne odoco. Macalo but aloka-loka man, kimedo nucu pa wel tim matye I Super League cako I kare me tuku mabino.
teo_prompt: Kanu abongokin aitoroneta keda atiokisio nuka ikapun, aseutu eswamak luka league aitemokin bobo abolobol ngin. Kwape ediope kotoma aijulanakineta, ekidiokoto inaabai luka itimun luka Super League ageun apak naetupakini.
lgg_prompt: Erita ako azini e'yo ewaru robia ni 'diyi ma e'yosi, azi'ba league ni 'diyi asi e'yo 'du e'yo abala ni 'diyi otuzu o'diru. Ojata 'di ma azi ru, 'ba li kalafe amuti avita Super League ni 'diyi ma nusu e'dozu ayi ti drusirisi.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okwetomboitwa n'oburemeezi bw'esente oburikugyenda omu maisho, abakuru omu riigi bashaziremu kutereeza empaka. Nk'ekicweka ky'empindahinduka egi, omuhendo gwa tiimu eziri omu riigi y'amaani, niguza kusharwamu kimwe kya kabiri, okurugiirira aha sizooni erikwija.

eng_prompt: As discussions about the league's structure continue, officials are considering potential changes to enhance competition. Stakeholders are particularly focused on the impact of team participation on overall performance and fan engagement.
lug_prompt: Nga okukubaganya ebirowoozo ku nsengeka ya liigi kugenda mu maaso, abakungu balowooza ku nkyukakyuka eziyinza okukolebwa okutumbula okuvuganya. Abakwatibwako essira balitadde nnyo ku ngeri okwetaba kwa ttiimu gye kukosaamu omutindo gwa ttiimu n'engeri abawagizi gye bakwataganamu.
ach_prompt: I kare ma nywako lok I kom kit ma pyem tuku eni obi time kwede tye kamedde anyim, lutic tye ka tamo I kom aloka-loka ma twero kelo pi medo pyem I kin gi. Lutela tye ka keto cwiny gi tutwalle I kom adwoki me bedo tye pa dul tuku I kom kit ma dul tuku tiyo kwede ki kit ma lucwak tuku tiyo kwede.

lgg_prompt: E'yo onzeza e'yo otuta avita ni 'diyi ma dria ri ni mu drile, azi'ba eyi ojata ecopi e'yo abala ni 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu 'diyi ma dria. êž‹Ba ambo êžŒdiyi asi êžŒba eêžŒyo êžŒbani êžŒba amuti êžŒdiyi ma alia êžŒdiyi ma dria eêžŒyo êžŒbani êžŒba amuti êžŒdiyi ma alia êžŒdiyi êžŒyezu êžŒdiyi ma dria tualu êžŒba atita fepi êžŒdiyi ma alia êžŒdiyi ma dria.

eng_prompt: In order to ensure a fair and competitive environment, it is essential for clubs to adhere to specific standards. Consequently, the club licensing process shall consider several important factors.
lug_prompt: Okusobola okukakasa embeera ey'obwenkanya n'okuvuganya, kya mugaso ttiimu okugoberera emitendera egy'enjawulo. N'olw'ekyo, enkola y'okuwa kiraabu layisinsi ejja kutunuulira ensonga ez'omugaso eziwerako.
ach_prompt: Me neno ni pyem tye maber, pire tek tutwal ki dul tuku mapat-pat me lubu cik mapat-pat. Pi meno, yub me miyo lancic bot dul tuku mapat-pat omyero otam I kom jami mapigi tego mapol.

lgg_prompt: Aa'zu angu a'bala ni kililiru ri ma ta mbazu, eri orodriru amuti mupira avizu 'diyi ni azita azi 'diyi ma vuti obizu. Ka'dini, e'yo 'bani amuti mupira avizu 'diyi dri kokobi fezu ri ma dria ri ni nga e'yo orodriru karakara eyi 'du e'yo eyi ma dria.

eng_prompt: In recent years, there has been a growing recognition of the importance of effective management in sports organizations. To achieve sustainable success and foster community engagement, it is essential to establish a framework for developing well-structured football clubs.
lug_prompt: Mu myaka egiyise, wabaddewo okweyongera okutegeera obukulu bw'obukulembeze obulungi mu bibiina by'ebyemizannyo. Okusobola okutuuka ku buwanguzi obw'olubeerera n'okutumbula okukwatagana kw'ekitundu, kya mugaso okuteekawo enkola y'okukulaakulanya ttiimu z'omupiira ezitegekeddwa obulungi.
ach_prompt: I mwaki ma okato cokcok-ki, dano mapol dong guniang ber pa tela maber I dul mapat-pat me tuku. Pi nongo loc matwal ki medo rwom me tic pa lwak, pire tek tutwal me yubu yoo me dongo dul tuku odilo ma kiyubu maber.

lgg_prompt: Eli agapi 'bo 'diyi ma alea, 'ba eyi esu e'yo orodriru driceza kililiru ni ma orodri amuti avita ni 'diyi ma alea ri ra. Aa'zu drile suza ewu drile ri ma alea dika lezu ongulumu eyini aa'zu eyi ma eselea, eri orodriru 'bani amuti mupira avizu 'diyi ezozu geri kililiru 'diyisi.

eng_prompt: In his analysis of potential funding sources, he explores various strategies that organizations can employ to enhance their financial support. Among these strategies, he emphasizes the importance of leveraging partnerships and collaborations.
lug_prompt: Mu kwekenneenya ensibuko z'ensimbi ezisoboka, anoonyereza ku bukodyo obw'enjawulo ebitongole bwe bisobola okukozesa okutumbula obuyambi bwabyo obw'ensimbi. Mu bukodyo buno, assa essira ku bukulu bw'okukozesa enkolagana n'okukolagana.
ach_prompt: I kwed mege I kom yoo mapat-pat ma dul mapat-pat twero tic kwede me medo kony me lim. I kin yoo magi, en oloko tutwalle I kom ber pa winye ki ribbe.
teo_prompt: Kotoma aingic ke naka aiboisio nuepedorete aigang ikapun, engicete ngesi iwaitin luegelegela lu epedorete iriongeta aitwasam kanu aitogogong agangat kec naka ikapun. Kotoma iwaitin lu, abu ngesi kitogogong ajokis naka aimorikikina keda aiswamanara.
lgg_prompt: Erini geri ecozu robia esuzu 'diyi ma ale andriria, eri geri ndundu amuti eyini eco ayu atita robia niri ma omgbo otuzu 'diyi ma ale andri. Otita 'diyi ma eselea, eri okpo fe orodri aa'ta tualu azini ti icita ni 'diyi ayuzu ri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Omu kushwijuma oburugo bw'esente oburikubaasa kubaho, naashwijuma oburyo butari bumwe na bumwe obu ebitongore birikubaasa kukoresa okwongyera obuhwezi bwabyo. Omubikwatiraine n'enkora egi, nahamya omugasho gw'okukoresa enkoragana n'okukwatanisa.

eng_prompt: In today's competitive landscape, organizations must leverage every opportunity to enhance their growth and sustainability. One effective strategy to achieve this is through collaboration with corporate entities.
lug_prompt: Mu mbeera ya leero ey'okuvuganya, ebitongole birina okukozesa buli mukisa okutumbula enkulaakulana yaabyo n'okuyimirizaawo. Engeri emu ennungi ey'okutuukiriza kino kwe kukolagana n'ebitongole ebinene.
ach_prompt: I kare man ma pyem tye matek tutwal, dul mapat-pat omyero gutii ki gum weng matye me dongo ki dongo. Yoo acel maber me cobo man obedo tic kacel ki dul mapat-pat madongo.

lgg_prompt: E'yo a'bala ni ewu andruri ma alea, le amuti eyi ma ayu drileba dria eyini ecozu eyi ma zota ma omgbo otuzu. Otita azi orodriru 'bani ecozu e'yo 'di 'yezu ri geri ti icita tualu amuti amboru 'diyi pie ri'I.

eng_prompt: Regular communication and collaboration are essential for academic success. To facilitate this, the university has encouraged direct interactions between students and their supervisors.
lug_prompt: Okuwuliziganya n'okukolagana bulijjo bikulu nnyo okusobola okutuuka ku buwanguzi mu by'ensoma. Okusobozesa kino, yunivasite ekubirizza okwogerezeganya butereevu wakati w'abayizi n'abakulira emirimu gyabwe.
ach_prompt: Lok ki winye ikin lutino obedo gin ma pire tek pi lutino me cobo miti gi i gang kwan. Me tyelo kor man, gang kwan me yunibaciti ocuku cwiny lutino kwan me lok ki ludor ticgi.

lgg_prompt: E'yo nzeza azini ti icita sa'wa driasi ri eri orodriru drile suza onita ma alea ri ni. E'yo 'di ma aza kozu, university eka e'yo nzeza sukulu anzi eyi ma eselea 'ba eyi ma dricepi 'diyi pie.
nyn_prompt: Okuhurizagana n'okukwatanisa buri kaire, n'eby'omugasho ahabw'obusinguzi omu by'obwegyese. Okuhwera eki, Yunivasite eretsireho okukorengana ahagati y'abeegi n'abarikubareeberera.

eng_prompt: In light of the ongoing challenges facing the company, he has been contemplating various strategies for improvement. One approach he is considering involves restructuring the leadership team to enhance efficiency and communication.
lug_prompt: Olw'okusoomoozebwa kampuni kw'eyo kw'eyolekaganye nakwo, abadde alowooza ku ngeri ez'enjawulo z'eyinza okulongoosaamu. Engeri emu gy'alowoozaako kwe kuddamu okutegeka ttiimu y'obukulembeze okutumbula obulungi n'empuliziganya.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki peko matye katimme I dul ne, en obedo katamo I kom yoo mapat-pat me dongo dul ne. Yo acel ma en tye ka tamo I kome aye me yubu dul pa lutela wek gutii maber dok gubed ki kubbe maber.
teo_prompt: Katupitos atiokisio nu ejaas ekampuni, euta ngesi aomoom iwaitin lu itojokarere. Adiopepone lo euta ngesi aomoom ngesi aijulakin etimu lo engarenone kanu aitojokar eswamae loajokan keda einer.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru amuti nde ni dri fuzu yi be 'diyi ma e'yosi, ebi geri ndundu otuzu 'diyi ma dria. Geri azi alu erini ega e'yo ma dria ri eri amuti driceza ni 'diyi ma esele ojazu azi ngazu kililiru azini e'yo nzeza ma omgbo otuzu.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'oburemeezi oburiyo nibugyenda omu maisho omu kampuni, atwire nateekateeka aha mihanda mingi y'okutunguuka. Omuringo gumwe ogu arikuteekateekaho n'okutereeza tiimu y'obwebembezi kwenda kwongyera amaani n'empurizagana.

eng_prompt: In today's competitive sports landscape, teams are constantly seeking innovative ways to secure funding. One of the most effective strategies they employ is forming partnerships with corporate sponsors.
lug_prompt: Mu mizannyo gya leero egy'okuvuganya, ttiimu buli kaseera zinoonya engeri ez'obuyiiya ez'okufunamu ensimbi. Emu ku ngeri ezisinga obulungi ze bakozesa kwe kukola enkolagana n'ebitongole ebivujjirira.
ach_prompt: I kabedo me pyem tuku ma ite kare ni, team tye ka yenyo yoo manyen me nongo lim. Yo acel ma gitiyo kwede maber loyo aye me winye ki dul mapat-pat ma culu cente.
teo_prompt: Kotoma abolobol naka aboliasio luka lolo, eutasi itimun aimo iwaitin luitetiak luka adumun ikapun. Adiopet kotoma iwaitin lu iswamaete kesi nes aiswamanar keda ikampunin lu igangakitos kesi.
lgg_prompt: E'yo avita ni andru 'diyi ma alea, amuti avita ni 'diyi sa'wa driasi geri o'diru 'diyi nda robia esuzu. Geri azi alu eyini ecozu azi ngazu kililiru ndeni ri eri ti ecita e'dozu amuti atita robia niri fepi 'diyi pie.

eng_prompt: In recent years, there has been a significant increase in investment and sponsorship within Ugandan football. This influx of resources has allowed local leagues to flourish and attract more talent.
lug_prompt: Mu myaka egiyise wabaddewo okweyongerayongera okw'amaanyi mu kusiga ensimbi n'okuvujjirira mu mupiira gw'ebigere mu Uganda. Okuyingira kuno okw'ebikozesebwa kisobozesezza liigi z'ebitundu okukulaakulana n'okusikiriza ebitone ebirala.
ach_prompt: I mwaki ma okato cokcok-ki, rwom me keto lim I tuku odilo me lobo Uganda omede tutwal. Cwalo lim eni okonyo dul tuku me tedero me dongo dok bene okelo lutino ma gitye ki diro.
teo_prompt: Kokaru lu atuboros, epuakata noi nuka agwelanar keda agangat naka ikapun kotoma abolia naka emopira koUganda. Apotu iboro lu eyaunitos koinakisi aboliasio nuka atutubet apol ka ayangaun atalanta nuipu.

nyn_prompt: Omu myaka egi, habaireho okweyongyera kw'amaani omu by'obushubuzi n'okushashurira omupiira gw'ebigyere omu Uganda. Okugarukaho kw'eby'obugaiga, kihwereire emizaano y'omubyaro kutunguuka n'okureeta abantu baingi abaine etaraanta.

eng_prompt: After extensive negotiations and sponsorship deals, the financial value of the league has been officially assessed. This significant investment highlights the growing popularity and commercial potential of the sport.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'enteeseganya ez'amaanyi n'okukola ddiiru z'okuvujjirira, omuwendo gw'ensimbi mu liigi gukeberebwa mu butongole. Okusiga ensimbi kuno okw'amaanyi kulaga okweyongera kw'ettutumu n'obusobozi bw'eby'obusuubuzi bw'omuzannyo guno.
ach_prompt: Ingee winye mapol ki winye me nongo kony me lim, wel lim pa pyem tuku eni dong kimoko. Keto lim madit tutwal eni nyutu dongo pa yweka ki biacara pa tuku eni.

lgg_prompt: E'yo otuza angiri 'diyi ma vutia azini otuta atita robia niri ma dria 'diyi ma vutia, 'ba e'bi curu'do orodri robia ni abala 'diyiniri ma ale andri ra. Lonyi vuti aleza okporu 'diri ece e'yo 'bani avita 'di ni tuzu tualu e'yo tujari ni 'diyi pie ri ma dria.

eng_prompt: After months of intense negotiations and strategic maneuvering, the global market was abuzz with anticipation. Key stakeholders gathered to finalize an agreement that would reshape the economic landscape.

ach_prompt: Ingee dwe mapol me winye ki yub mapat-pat, cuk me wilobo obedo ki byek madit tutwal. Lwak mapigi tego gugure kacel me tyeko winye ma obi kelo aloka loka I tenge me lim.

eng_prompt: In response to the growing need for innovative research funding, the organization has decided to restructure its grant application process. This strategic shift is designed to enhance collaboration and streamline submissions.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula obwetaavu obweyongera obw'obuyambi bw'okunoonyereza, ekitongole kisazeewo okuddamu okutereeza enkola yaakyo ey'okusaba obuyambi. Enkyukakyuka eno ey'obukodyo ekoleddwa okutumbula enkolagana n'okutumbula ebiweebwayo.

eng_prompt: Despite numerous warnings and escalating tensions, the authorities have consistently downplayed the severity of the situation. As public outcry grew louder, many expected a decisive response from the government.
lug_prompt: Wadde nga waliwo okulabula kungi n'obunkenke obweyongera, ab'obuyinza bakendeezezza ku buzibu obuli mu mbeera. Obwegugungo bw'abantu bwe bweyongera, bangi baali basuubira eky'okuddamu eky'amaanyi okuva mu gavumenti.

Ngiringiri ngiringiri 'da ma alea ri ma alea, e'yo 'bani 'ba eyi ma eselea 'diyi ma eselea 'ba eyi ma eselea 'ba eyi ma eselea 'diyi ma eselea okpo okporu be.

eng_prompt: The atmosphere leading up to the elections was tense, with numerous reports of intimidation and unrest. Many citizens expressed their concerns about the integrity of the electoral process.
lug_prompt: Embeera eyaliwo ng'okulonda tekunnabaawo yali ya bunkenke, nga waliwo amawulire mangi agakwata ku kutiisibwatiisibwa n'obutabanguko. Bannansi bangi baalaga okweraliikirira kwabwe ku bwenkanya bw'enkola y'okulonda.

lgg_prompt: Angu opeta eyi ma drilea ri ndra asi otiza ru, e'yo ori gbaza ni azini e'yo ngiringiri ni 'diyi pie karakara. Kari anzi karakara eyi e'da asi otiza eyini e'yo opetaa ni aa'zu e'yo ada be ri ma dria.

eng_prompt: Tensions had been escalating within the party for weeks, fueled by conflicting agendas and power struggles. As the stakes grew higher, the atmosphere became increasingly hostile, leading to open confrontations among the leadership.
lug_prompt: Obunkenke bubadde bweyongera mu kibiina okumala wiiki eziwera, nga buva ku nteekateeka ezikontana n'okulwanirira obuyinza. Emikutu bwe gyagenda girinnya, embeera yeeyongera okuba ey'obulabe, ekyaviirako okulwanagana okw'olwatu mu bukulembeze.
ach_prompt: Lworo obedo ka mede I dul me cungu iwi bye ne pi cabit ma okato angec, malubbe ki yub mapat-pat ki lweny me tela. I kare ma jami ne omedde malo, jami ne odoko marac tutwal, ma oweko lweny obedo tye ikin lutela.
teo_prompt: Apolor akiro nuka ingungeta kotoma opate kanu isabitin luipu, kanuka ipudesia luegelegela keda ingungeta luka apugan. Neyatakinor akiro ngun, abu ejautene koraun loetiono noi, ido abu koyangau ingungeta kiding engarenok.

eng_prompt: Candidates are preparing for the upcoming election cycle, strategizing their campaigns and reaching out to voters. As the political landscape shifts, they know that they go through the party primary elections.
lug_prompt: Abeesimbyewo beetegekera okulonda okujja, okuteekateeka kampeyini zaabwe n'okutuuka ku balonzi. Ng'embeera y'ebyobufuzi ekyukakyuka, bakimanyi nti bagenda kuyita mu kulonda kw'ekibiina okw'okusunsulamu.
ach_prompt: Lucungu gitye ka yubbe pi yer matye kabino ni, yub yub me bito kwir gi ki cwalo lok bot lubol kwir. Kit ma lok me cungu iwi bye tye ka loke kwede, gin gingeo ni gubi kato ki I yer pa dul me cungu iwi bye mapat-pat.
