eng_prompt: In this harsh environment, resources are dwindling and competition is fierce. Only those who can adapt and overcome will make it through these challenging times.
lug_prompt: Mu mbeera eno embi, eby'obugagga bikendeera n'okuvuganya kwa maanyi. Abo bokka abasobola okukyusakyusa n'okuwangula be bajja okuyita mu biseera bino ebizibu.
ach_prompt: I kare man marac-ci, lim tye ka dwogo piny dok pyem tye matek tutwal. Jo ma twero ngiyo ki kwo gi keken aye gi bi kato I kare man me peko.
teo_prompt: Kotoma ojautene lo loetiono noi, ikidioko iboro ido epol abolobol. Ngul lu epedorete acamanar kosodete aitelekaar kes bon kes epote aitodolikin apakio nu nuetioko.
lgg_prompt: Angu e'yo ewaru 'di ma alea, afa ayuzaru 'diyi ma omgbo esi dika baka seza eri okporu. Lu 'ba ecopi e'yo yi 'yepi ra azini agapi ra 'diyi nga aga sa'wa ewaru 'diyi ma alea ra.
nyn_prompt: Omu bwire bubi obu, eby'obugaiga biriyo nibikyendeera kandi n'okuhayahayana kuri kw'amaani. Abo bonka abarikubaasa kuhikaana n'embeera kandi bakasingura, nibo barikubaasa kurabira omu bwire obu obw'oburemeezi.

eng_prompt: Many people are searching for answers to the ongoing unrest in our communities. However, focusing solely on political party structures may not address the root causes of the violence.
lug_prompt: Abantu bangi banoonya eby'okuddamu ku butabanguko obugenda mu maaso mu bitundu byaffe. Kyokka okussa essira ku nsengeka y'ebibiina by'obufuzi byokka kiyinza obutakola ku nsibuko y'obutabanguko.
ach_prompt: Dano mapol tye ka yenyo lagam pi kuku kuku matye I kabedo wa. Kadi bed kumeno, keto cwiny I kom dul me cungu iwi bye mapat-pat keken pe romo cobo peko ma kelo tim gero.
teo_prompt: Eutasi itunga luipu aimo abongokineta nuikamunitos amumu na elosi akonye kotoma atutubenakosi. Konye, apodokinit nuka ipatei bon mam epedori aitemokin atiokisio nu eyangaununei amumu.
lgg_prompt: Ba karakara eyi omvita eyi nda e'yo ngiringiri ni mupi drile angu amavile 'diyi ma alea 'diyi ma dria. Kani si, asi 'bazu lu amuti politiki ni 'diyi ma e'yo ma dria ri econi e'yo e'yo ngiringiri ni 'diyi ma e'yo otu ku.
nyn_prompt: Abantu baingi nibaronda eby'okugarukamu aha butabanguko oburiho omu byanga byaitu. Kwonka, okuta amaani aha nkora y'ebibiina by'obutegyeki tikirikubaasa kumaraho ebirikureetaho obwimukiriro.

eng_prompt: Despite the team's impressive talent and potential, their off-field behavior has raised concerns among fans and management alike. Many believe that their focus on personal gain has overshadowed their commitment to the game.
lug_prompt: Newankubadde ttiimu erina ebitone n'obusobozi, enneeyisa yabwe ebweru w'ekisaawe ereeseewo okweraliikirira mu bawagizi n'abaddukanya ttiimu. Bangi balowooza nti okussa essira ku byetaago byabwe kibuutikidde obumalirivu bwabwe mu muzannyo.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni team ne tye ki talanta ki kero me timo jami, timgi I kabedo mapat-pat okelo lworo ikin lucwak ki ludor dul tuku. Dano mapol gitye ki niyee ni keto cwinygi tutwalle I kom nongo magoba me komgi oketo cwinygi I kom tuku.
teo_prompt: Karaida ejaasi etimu keda atalanta keda apedor, iponesiokec kokinga na abolia eyangaunit aiyalongong kanejaas egangitok keda eyaitene. Iyuunitos itunga luipu ebe epodokinitos kesi ameda naka itunga adepar ainakina kec mama ejai abolia.
lgg_prompt: Amuti avita ni 'diyi ma ta tro ovuzu talanta onyiru tu azini okpo be ra ti, adriza yini pari avita ni amve 'diyi ma alia ri eji asi otiza 'ba atita fepi 'diyi ma eselea azini driceza amuti avita ni 'diyi ma eselea indi. Ba karakara eyi ai ra kini asi 'baza eyini orodri eyi ma ngulupi ni 'diyi ma dria ri eza ava eyini fe avita 'da ni ri ra.
nyn_prompt: Oihireho etaraanta n'obushoboorozi bwa tiimu, emicwe yaabo aheeru y'omuzaano ereesire okwerarikirira omu bahagizi hamwe n'abebembezi. Baingi nibateekateeka ngu okuta omutima aha byetengo by'abantu kikarugaho okwehayo kwabo omu muzaano.

eng_prompt: During the meeting, several team members expressed their concerns about the project's timeline. He acknowledged their worries and explained the challenges they were facing.
lug_prompt: Mu lukiiko, bammemba ba ttiimu abawerako baalaga obweraliikirivu bwabwe ku bikwata ku biseera bya pulojekiti. Yakkiriza okweraliikirira kwabwe era n'annyonnyola ebisoomooza bye baali boolekaganye nabyo.
ach_prompt: Ikare me kacoke, lumemba mapol gunyutu lworo gi i kom kare me tic. En owaco lworo ma gitye kwede dok otito peko ma gitye ka kato ki iye.
teo_prompt: Kotoma airiamunet, apotu imeeban luka etimu itodutu aiyalongongokec kanuikamunitos apak naka epurojekt. Abu ngesi kocam aiyalongongokec kosodi aitetem atiokisio nuetereikina keda kesi.
lgg_prompt: Mitingi 'da ma alea, 'ba karakara amuti 'da ma alea 'diyi ece asi otiza eyini sa'wa 'bani otita 'da 'yezu ri ma dria. Eri ai e'yo asi otiza yini 'diyi azini ece e'yo ewaru yini isule 'diyi ra.
nyn_prompt: Omu rukiiko, ba memba baingi bakoreka okwerarikirira kwabo aha bwire bwa purogyekiti. Akamanya okwerarikirira kwabo kandi yaashoborora oburemeezi obu baabaire baine.

eng_prompt: After extensive discussions and debates among lawmakers, the committee presented a series of recommendations aimed at improving the electoral process. However, despite the urgency for change, the government has rejected all the proposed electoral reforms.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okukubaganya ebirowoozo okw'amaanyi n'okukubaganya ebirowoozo mu babaka ba palamenti, akakiiko kaayanjudde ebiteeso ebigendereddwamu okutumbula enkola y'okulonda. Kyokka, wadde ng'enkyukakyuka zeetaaga okukolebwa mu bwangu, gavumenti egaanye enkyukakyuka zonna eziteeseddwa mu by'okulonda.
ach_prompt: Ingee nywako lok ki laro lok mapol ikin luwang lwak I ot moko cik, dul ne gumiyo tam mapol ma obedo ki miti me yubu yub me bolo kwir. Ento, kadi bed ni aloka-loka omyero otimme oyot, gamente okwero yub weng me kelo aloka-loka I yer.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka aineranara keda ipegeta luipu kanejaas imeeban luka ikisila, abu ekomiti ijaik aomisio nuepedorete aitojokar ainapeta nuka aseo. Konye, karaida ekoto apugan aijulanakineta katipet, mam apugan ecamunit aijulanakineta kere nuka aseo.
lgg_prompt: E'yo onzeza azini agbatara angiri 'ba azita si'ba 'diyi ma eselea 'bori ma vutia, committee 'da fe egata karakara eyini ani ecozu e'yo opetaa ni 'diyi otuzu. Kani si, e'yo ojataa ni mbeleru ri ma talasi, gamete ga e'yo dria 'bani lezu ojata e'yo opetaa ni 'diyi ma dria 'diyi si.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okuhanuura munonga n'okuhanuura omu babaka, akakiiko kakareeta ebiteiso bingi ebirikugyenderera okutunguura eby'oburuuru. Kwonka, oihireho empindahinduka y'amaani, gavumenti eyangire enteekateeka y'okuhindura omu by'oburuuru.

eng_prompt: Recent investigations into the party's financial activities have raised serious concerns. As evidence began to surface, it became clear that unethical practices were at play.
lug_prompt: Okunoonyereza okwakakolebwa ku mirimu gy'ebyensimbi egy'ekibiina kuleeseewo okweraliikirira okw'amaanyi. Obujulizi bwe bwatandika okulabika, kyalabika bulungi nti ebikolwa ebitali bya mpisa byali bikolebwa.
ach_prompt: Kwed ma okato cokcok-ki I kom tic me lim pa dul me cungu iwi bye ne okelo lworo madit tutwal. Ikare ma caden ocako katti, nen atyer kamaleng ni tim maraco obedo tye.
teo_prompt: Aingic napac kanuikamunitos aswamisinei nuka ikapun luka epate ayangau aiyalongong naepol noi. Neageuna aitodun ajenanut, apotu kojenutu ebe emamei iponesio luajokak.
lgg_prompt: E'yo vuti ondaza o'diru 'diyi e'yo robia ni amuti politiki ni 'diyiniri ma dria ri eji asi otiza okporu. Afa e'dapi kini e'yo onzi 'yepi 'diyi e'doria, eca e'da kililiru kini e'yo onzi 'ye'ba 'diyi ci.
nyn_prompt: Okucondooza okuhweireho aha mirimo y'eby'empiiha y'ekibiina kireesireho okwerarikirira kw'amaani. Obujurizi ku bwatandikire kwija, kikarebeka butunu ngu ebikorwa ebitahikire bikaba biriho.

eng_prompt: As the election date approaches, analysts are closely monitoring various regions for signs of unrest. Recent reports indicate a troubling trend in certain communities that raises concerns about potential conflicts.
lug_prompt: Ng'olunaku lw'okulonda lusembera, abeekenneenya beetegereza nnyo ebitundu eby'enjawulo okulaba obubonero bw'obutabanguko. Lipoota ezifulumizibwa gye buvuddeko ziraga ekintu ekitabula mu bitundu ebimu ekireetawo okweraliikirira ku butakkaanya obuyinza okubaawo.
ach_prompt: I kare ma nino me yer tye cok, ludiro tye ka ngiyo kabedo mapat-pat pi lanyut me lweny. Adwogi tic ma otime cokcok-ki nyutu gin ma tye ka timme I kabedo mukene ma kelo lworo I kom lweny matwero bedo tye.
teo_prompt: Neyapiete apaarasia nuka aseo, eutasi angicak aingic aiboisio nuegelegela kanu aanyunet naka amumu. Itodunitos iripotan luitetiak epone loetiono noi kotoma atutubena ace lo eyangauni aiyalongong kanu ingungeta lu epedorete atakanun.
lgg_prompt: O'du opetaa ni ecazu ogogo risi, 'ba e'yo eti ondapi 'diyi angu ndundu eyi ma pamvu one e'yo ngiringiri ni 'diyi ma dria. O'duko efupi o'diru 'diyi ece e'yo azi asi otizani ongulumu azi 'diyi ma alia asi otiza ejipi ngiringiri ecopi i 'yepi ra 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Eizooba ry'okuteera akaruuru ku ririkuhika haihi, ab'eby'obutegyeki bariyo nibareebuuza ebicweka bitari bimwe na bimwe okureeba obumanyiso bw'obutabanguko. Ripoota eziherize kukorwa nizooreka enkora y'oburemeezi omu byanga ebimwe erikureetaho okwerarikirira aha ntaro ezirikubaasa kubaho.

eng_prompt: In the lead-up to the election, it became clear that the influence of local power brokers would play a crucial role in determining the outcome. Voter sentiment was heavily swayed by the presence of well-connected officials in key regions.
lug_prompt: Nga beetegekera okulonda, kyalabika bulungi nti obuyinza bw'abakozi b'amasannyalaze mu kitundu bwandibadde na kinene kye bujja okukola mu kusalawo ebinaavaamu. Endowooza y'abalonzi yakyusibwa nnyo olw'okubeerawo kw'abakungu abalina enkolagana ennungi mu bitundu ebikulu.
ach_prompt: Ikare me yer, nen atyer kamaleng ni tela pa lutela me tedero bibedo gin ma pire tek tutwal I moko adwogi yer ne. Cwiny lubol kwir olokke tutwalle pi bedo tye pa lutic matye ki kubbe maber I but lobo mapat-pat mapigi tego.
teo_prompt: Kapak naka aitodolikin aseo, aponi kojenunai ebe epone loepedoriata itunga lukatutubet ajaut toma akiro nuelomunete kotoma aseo. Apotu eswamak luejaasi keda arucokina kotoma aiboisio nuapolok itolitolutu aomisio nuka aseak.
lgg_prompt: E'yo opetaa ni 'diyi ma drilia, eri eca e'da kililiru kini 'ba okpo fepi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ma okpo ni nga azi okporu 'ye e'yo opetaa ni efuzu ri ma dria. Egata 'ba voti 'bepi 'diyiniri oja'i tu e'yo azi'ba yi ma eselea 'diyi ni ovuzu angu okporu 'diyi ma alia ci risi.
nyn_prompt: Omu bwire bw'okutebeekanisa akaruuru, kikarebeka butunu ngu abarikukoresa amaani omu byaro nibaza kukora omurimo gw'amaani omu kumanya ebireije kuruga omu karuuru. Emiteekateekyere y'abateezi b'akaruuru ekahindahindurwa munonga ahabw'okubaho kw'abakungu abaine enkoragana nungi omu byanga ebikuru.

eng_prompt: Despite facing criticism and challenges, the National Resistance Movement has maintained a strong grip on power. Their influence is particularly evident in regions where local leaders are deeply entrenched in the party's structure.
lug_prompt: Wadde nga National Resistance Movement eyolekaganye n'okuvumirira n'okusoomoozebwa, ekuumye obuyinza. Obuyinza bwabwe bweyolekera nnyo mu bitundu abakulembeze b'ebyalo gye banyweredde ennyo mu nkola y'ekibiina.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni National Resistance Movement tye ka nongo koko ki peko mapol, ento pud tye ka mako loc matek adada. Tela gi nen tutwalle ikabedo kama lutela me tedero gucung matek I dul me cungu iwi bye ne.
teo_prompt: Karaida etereikina keda aitoroneta keda atiokisio, epedorit epate loka Museveni ajaut toma apugan. Erai apedor kec naepol noi kotoma aiboisio nuejaasi engarenok luka atutubet keda atutubet naepol noi naka epate.
lgg_prompt: Erita ako azini e'yo ewaru 'diyi ma talasi, amuti National Resistance Movement niri ebi okpo 'du opi nyaza ma dria ra. Yi ma okpo e'da kililiru tuni angu 'ba drice'ba angu ma alia 'diyi ma ti icipi amuti politiki ni 'diyi ma alia 'diyi ma alia.
nyn_prompt: Oihireho okujumirirwa n'oburemeezi, ekibiina kya National Resistance Movement kigumire kiine obushoborozi. Obujunaanizibwa bwabo nibweyoreka munonga omu byanga ahu abebembezi b'ebyaro barikukorera omu bibiina by'obutegyeki.

eng_prompt: After years of dedicated service and numerous challenges, he faced a difficult decision regarding his political future. Many believed that his time in office had come to an end, making reelection seem unlikely.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'emyaka mingi ng'aweereza n'obunyiikivu era ng'ayolekaganye n'okusoomoozebwa kungi, yayolekagana n'okusalawo okukaluba ku bikwata ku biseera bye eby'omu maaso eby'ebyobufuzi. Bangi baalowooza nti ekiseera kye mu woofiisi kyali kituuse ku nkomerero, ekyaleetera okuddamu okulondebwa okulabika ng'ekitasoboka.
ach_prompt: Ingee mwaki mapol me tic matek ki peko mapol, en obedo ki tam matek tutwal I kom anyim me cung iwibye. Dano mapol onongo gitye ki niyee ni kare mege I opic dong otum, ma oweko yer odoco nen calo pe twero time.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ikar luipu luka aijanakin keda ainingosia nuipu, abu ngesi kodum aseunet naetiono noi naikamunit ngarenike naka epolitikis. Iyuunitos itunga luipu ebe angetakin apak ke kotoma oyapesi, ido mam ajenun ebe ebuni ngesi aibwo bobo.
lgg_prompt: Eli 'bani azi ngazu asi driasi azini e'yo ewaru karakara 'diyi ma vutia, eri fu dri e'yo ewaru 'duzu ewu drusiri ma dria. Ba karakara eyi a'i ra kini sa'wa erini azi ngazu ri i de 'bo, e'yo erini ani ecozu opeta eyi 'yezu dika ri ma omgbo esizu ku.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okumara emyaka mingi omu buheereza hamwe n'oburemeezi bwingi, akatunga okusharamu kugumire aha bikwatiraine n'ebiro bye eby'omumaisho omu by'obutegyeki. Baingi bakaba nibateekateeka ngu obwire bwe omu ofiisi bukaba bwahwaire, ekyareteire okugaruka kuteerwa akaruuru kureebeka nk'ekitarikubaasika.

eng_prompt: As the pandemic continues to evolve, many are left wondering about the leadership decisions that will be made. Speculation surrounds his approach to managing the ongoing health crisis.
lug_prompt: Ng'ekirwadde bbunansi kigenda mu maaso, bangi basigadde beebuuza ku kusalawo kw'obukulembeze okujja okukolebwa. Waliwo okuteebereza ku ngeri gy'akwatamu ekizibu ky'ebyobulamu ekigenda mu maaso.
ach_prompt: I kare ma two korona tye ka medde anyim, dano mapol pud tye ki ngeng I kom tam ma lutela bimoko. Tye byek mapat-pat I kom yoo mege me lweny I kom peko me yot-kom matye kawot anyim.
teo_prompt: Kwape inyikokinit adeka naka ekorona aijulanakin, ipu itunga luisiete nuikamunitos aseununeta nu engarenok nu ebeit aswam. Ejaas aomisio nuikamunitos epone loebeitor ngesi aitemokin ationis naka angaleu na elosi akonye.
lgg_prompt: E'yo azo 'dezaniri ni mu drile, 'ba karakara eyi asi e'yo ega e'yo driceza ni 'diyi ma dria. Egata eri ma geri e'yo ewaru e'yo rua alanisi mupi drile 'diyi ma aza kozu ri ma dria 'diyi tre.
nyn_prompt: Oburwaire bwa korona ku burikugumizamu nibugyenda omu maisho, baingi nibasigara nibeebuuza ebiteiso by'obwebembezi ebireije kukorwa. Hariho okuteebereza okurikukwata aha muringo ogu arikukoramu ahaburwaire oburikugyenda omu maisho.

eng_prompt: The driver lost control of the vehicle while speeding through the intersection. In a tragic turn of events, the chaos unfolded in mere seconds.
lug_prompt: Ddereeva yabulwa obuyinza ku mmotoka bwe yali avuga sipiidi mu nkulungo. Mu ngeri ey'ekikangabwa, akavuyo kaaliwo mu sikonda ntono.
ach_prompt: Ladwoc orwenyo twero me doro motoka I kare ma tye ka ngwec I cipid I kare ma tye ka ngwec ki gudu. I alokaloka marac tutwal, kuku kuku obedo tye I nge cekon manok keken.
teo_prompt: Abu ederepa komamei apedor naka airenge amotoka nautar ngesi airenge keda esipidi kotoma atutubet. Kotoma aijulakineta nuarokok, abu amumu ngin kotakanu kotoma atikatikan idis.
lgg_prompt: Dereva nderi avi okpo motokari ma dria erini nzuzu okposiri ma aliarisi ra. E'yo onzi 'yepi 'diyi ma alea, ngiringiri 'da 'ye i sekendi were ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Dereva akafeerwa obushoborozi bw'emotoka obuyabiire navuga aha sipiidi aha nsharo. Omu nshonga y'akabi munonga, akavuyo kakabaho omu sikonda nkye.

eng_prompt: After a lengthy investigation, the police arrested him for his involvement in a string of thefts. The evidence against him was overwhelming, leading to a swift conviction.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okunoonyereza okumala ebbanga eddene, poliisi yamukwata olw'okwenyigira mu bubbi obw'enjawulo. Obujulizi obwali bumulumiriza bwali bungi nnyo ne kiba nti yasingisibwa mangu emisango.
ach_prompt: Ingee timo kwed pi kare malac, abili omake pi tim me kwo mapol. Caden ma obedo tye i kome obedo dwong tutwal ma oweko kimoko ni en labal.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka aingic apak naepol noi, apotu ipolisin ikamasi ngesi kanu ajaut toma akoko naepol noi. Arai aitogogongoret naepol noi na itoroniarit ngesi, ido abu koyangau aitepesenio katipet.
lgg_prompt: E'yo vuti ondaza ezu 'bori ma vutia, polisi obi eri e'yo erini i suzu ogu karakara 'diyi ma alia ri ma e'yosi. E'yo ecepi kini eri eza e'yo ri ga tre erini ani fezu 'bani eri ombezu mbeleru.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okucondooza kumara obwire buraingwa, poriisi ekamukwata ahabw'okwejumba omu bushuma bwingi. Obujurizi obwamuhakanisa bukaba bwingi munonga, ekyaretsire okucwa orubanja ahonaaho.

eng_prompt: After months of investigation, the case against him finally reached the courtroom. Despite his hopes for a fair trial, the prosecution struggled to present a strong case.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okumala emyezi egiwerako ng'anoonyereza, omusango ogwali gumuvunaanibwa gwatuuka mu kkooti. Wadde nga yali asuubira okuwozesebwa mu bwenkanya, oludda oluwaabi lwasoomoozebwa okuwaayo omusango ogw'amaanyi.
ach_prompt: Ingee kwedo lok pi dwe mapol, lok ma kimoro i kome ni dong oo I nyim kot. Kadi bed ni en onongo tye ki gen me winyo pido ne i yo maber, adot ne obedo tek tutwal me kelo adot matego.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ilapio luka aingic, abu emusago lo iwosatai ngesi kodolok adieket. Karaida ejaasi ngesi keda amuno naka aipup emusago ngol koipone kalo ajokis, abu emusago ngol kopedo aitodun emusago loegogong.
lgg_prompt: Mba vuti ondaza ma vutia, kesi 'bani to eri ma rua ri ca asizu dwania ra. Erini tro ovuzu asi 'baza be e'yo liza kililiru ma dria ra ti, 'ba e'yo lipi 'diyi dri ci e'yo okporu ecezu.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'ameezi mingi y'okucondooza, omushango gwe gukaheza kuhika omu kooti. N'obu yaabaire aine amatsiko g'okuhurira orubanja rwe omu buringaaniza, orubanja rukaba nirurwana kureetaho omushango gw'amaani.

eng_prompt: In recent years, the political landscape has become increasingly tumultuous, with rising tensions among various factions. As a result, the atmosphere surrounding elections has deteriorated significantly, leading to alarming incidents.
lug_prompt: Mu myaka egiyise, embeera y'ebyobufuzi yeeyongedde okuba ey'akavuyo, n'obunkenke obweyongera mu bibiina eby'enjawulo. N'ekivuddemu, embeera eyeetoolodde okulonda eyonoonese nnyo, ekiviiriddeko ebikolwa ebyeraliikiriza.
ach_prompt: I mwaki ma okato cokcok-ki, lok me cungu iwi-bye omede ki lweny, ki telle matye kamedde I kin dul me cungu iwi-bye mapat-pat. Macalo adwogi ne, rwom me bolo kwir oballe tutwal ma oweko jami mapol otimme.
teo_prompt: Kokaru lu atuboros, ejai amumu naepol noi kotoma politikis, keda aiyalongong naepol noi kiding ipatei luegelegela. Kanuka ngun, amunar noi ejautene loka aseo, ido eyangauni ationis naepol noi.
lgg_prompt: Eli agapi 'diyi ma alea, e'yo politiki ni 'diyi eca curu'do e'yo ewaru ru, e'yo asi omiza ni 'diyi tuzu kala ndundu eyi ma eselea. E'yo 'disi, e'yo opetaa ma ageia 'diyi eza eyi saaru, dika e'yo onzi 'diyi ma omgbo ni tu ra.
nyn_prompt: Omu myaka egi, eby'obutegyeki byeyongyeire kuba eby'akaimukiriro, n'obutaikirizana ahagati y'ebibiina ebitarikushushana. N'ekyarugiremu, embeera y'oburuuru esiisire munonga, ekirikureetaho oburemeezi bw'amaani.

eng_prompt: After a thorough investigation, the authorities determined that there was insufficient evidence to proceed with legal action. As a result, the individuals involved were not brought to court.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okunoonyereza mu bujjuvu, ab'obuyinza baakizuula nti tewaali bujulizi bumala kugenda mu maaso na misango. N'ekyavaamu, abantu abeenyigiddemu tebaaleetebwa mu kkooti.
ach_prompt: Ingee timo kwed matut, lutela gumoko ni caden peke ma oromo me cako timo bal. Macalo adwogi ne, pe kikelo joo ma otimo bal eni I nyim kot.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka aingic ejok, apotu apedorosio kodumutu ebe emamei aitogogongoret naedolit kanu ainyikokin toma okisila. Kanuka ngun, mam aponi koyangarai itunga lu emusago ngol adieket.
lgg_prompt: E'yo vuti ondaza kililiru ma vutia, drice'ba eyi esu kini e'yo azi ecopi e'dapi kini e'yo azita palaa 'diyi cani ku. E'yo 'disi, 'ba awini 'ba e'yo nde ma alea 'diyi ji kotia ku.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okucondooza munonga, ab'obushoborozi bakashanga ngu hakaba hatariho bujurizi burikumara, kugira ngu bagume omu biragiro. N'ekyarugiremu, abantu abaabaire bejumbiremu tibarareesirwe omu kooti.

eng_prompt: Despite overwhelming evidence and numerous eyewitness accounts, the authorities chose to remain silent on the matter. The community was left in shock as the investigation seemed to stall without explanation.
lug_prompt: Newankubadde waliwo obujulizi bungi n'ebiwandiiko by'abajulizi abangi, ab'obuyinza baasalawo okusirika ku nsonga. Ekitundu kyalekeddwa mu kutya ng'okunoonyereza kulabika ng'okuyimirira awatali kunnyonnyolwa.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni caden tye mapol tutwal ki lok pa lucaden mapol, lutela omoko tamgi me bedo ling I kom lok ne. Lwak gubedo ki ngeng tutwal I kare ma kwed ocung labongo tito gin mo.
teo_prompt: Karaida ipu ajenanut keda ajenanut nuipu, apotu apedorosio koseutu aililing nuikamunitos akirot ngin. Apotu itunga kojalakisi toma aumokin naarai abu aingic kobwoun komamei aitetem.
lgg_prompt: Afa e'dapi kini e'yo 'ye ra azini e'yo 'ba ndre'baa 'diyi ni 'diyi ma kalafe ni tro ovuzu tre ra ti, drice'ba eyi pe e'yo 'da ma dria ci. Ongulumu eyi awi osuta ma alea e'yo eti ondaza ni e'dazu eyini pa sozu e'yo eceza kokoru risi.
nyn_prompt: N'obu haraabe hariho obujurizi bwingi n'abajurizi baingi, ab'obushoborozi bakasharamu kusirika aha nshonga egyo. Abantu bakasigara bakangire ahabwokuba okucondooza kukagumaho hatariho kushoboororwa.

eng_prompt: Recent protests and widespread discontent among the populace have raised concerns about the government's ability to maintain order. As tensions escalate, many fear that the fragile political landscape is on the brink of collapse.
lug_prompt: Obwegugungo obwaliwo gye buvuddeko n'obutali bumativu mu bantu bireeseewo okweraliikirira ku busobozi bwa gavumenti okukuuma emirembe. Ng'obunkenke bweyongera, bangi batya nti embeera y'ebyobufuzi etali nnungi eri ku bunkenke bw'okugwa.
ach_prompt: Jemo ma otime cokcok-ki kacel ki cwer cwiny I kin lwak okelo lworo I kom twero pa gamente me gwoko kuc. Kit ma telle tye kamede kwede, dano mapol tye ki lworo ni lok me cungu iwi bye matye ma goro tye ka poto.
teo_prompt: Aidiya keda amamut aiyalama kanejaas itunga eyangaunit aiyalongong kanu apedor apugan aidar ainapakina. Kwape iyata aiyalongong, ekuriaka itunga luipu ebe ejai aibiror naka epolitikis.
lgg_prompt: Ngiringiri o'diru 'diyi azini e'yo 'ba eyini aa'zu ayikosi ku 'diyi eji asi otiza gamete ma okpo ma dria. Erita ako ni tuzu uru, 'ba karakara eyi 'ye orisi kini e'yo politiki ni okpo kokoru 'diyi nga e'de ra.
nyn_prompt: Okwesharinga okwabaireho obwahati hamwe n'okwetomboita kw'abantu, bireesireho okwerarikirira aha bushoboorozi bwa gavumenti okureetaho obusingye. Obunkenke ku burikweyongyera, baingi nibatiina ngu eby'obutegyeki ebitaine maani biri aha muheru gw'okugwa.

eng_prompt: Tensions escalated in the region following a controversial election, leading to widespread protests and unrest. As the situation deteriorated, various political figures began to take sides, further inflaming the conflict.
lug_prompt: Obunkenke bweyongedde mu kitundu oluvannyuma lw'akalulu akaabaddemu enkaayana, ekyaviirako okwekalakaasa n'obutabanguko. Embeera bwe yagenda yeeyongera okwonooneka, bannabyabufuzi bangi baatandika okubaako oludda lwe bawagira, ekyayongera okukuma omuliro mu lutalo.
ach_prompt: Lworo omedde I but piny eni inge yer ma obedo ki apoka-poka, ma okelo jemo ki jemo mapol. Ikare ma peko ne omedde, lucungu iwi bye mapol gucako cwako tung botgi, ma oweko lweny ne omedde anyim.
teo_prompt: Apotu ingungeta kiyatakinos kotoma aiboisit kangin akaulo naka aseo naejaasi keda epeget, ido abu koyangau aidiya keda amumu. Neautar ejautene aibiror, apotu itunga luka politikis luegelegela kogeutu ajaut toma atutubet adiope, ido abu kitogogong ingungeta.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ngiringiri ni 'diyi ma omgbo tu angu 'da ma alea e'yo opetaa ni ngiringiri ru 'diyi ma vutia, eyini ani e'dazu e'yo ngiringiri ni 'diyi ma omgbo tuzu tualu e'yo ngiringiri ni 'diyi pie. E'yo ni ecazu ewaru, 'ba karakara politiki ni 'diyi e'do yi ma kala 'du e'yo a'di 'diza niri ma omgbo otuzu.
nyn_prompt: Obunkenke bukweyongyera omu kyanga ahanyima y'akaruuru k'obutaikirizana, ekyarugiremu okwesharinga n'obutabanguko. Embeera kuyabiire neyeyongyera, ab'eby'obutegyeki baingi bakatandika kwejumba omu by'obutegyeki, ekyayongyeire kureetaho entaro.

eng_prompt: Tensions had been escalating in the region for weeks, with protests turning increasingly hostile. Authorities struggled to maintain order as clashes broke out between rival groups.
lug_prompt: Obunkenke bubadde bweyongera mu kitundu okumala wiiki, nga okwekalakaasa kweyongedde okuba okw'obulabe. Ab'obuyinza baalwana okukuuma emirembe ng'okulwanagana kwabalukawo wakati w'ebibinja ebivuganya.
ach_prompt: Lworo obedo ka mede I but lobo ne pi cabit mapol, ki jemo ma odoko gero. Lutela gubedo ki peko me gwoko kuc I kare ma lweny ocake ikin dul mapat-pat matye ka pyem I kingi.
teo_prompt: Apolor noi ingungeta kotoma aiboisit kangin adaun isabitin luipu, ido apotu aidiya kibiroros. Apotu apedorosio ojioto aidar ainapakina naarai apotu ingungeta kobwangunos kiding igurupun lueboloboloete.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ngiringiri ni 'diyi e'bi tu angu 'da ma alea sabiti eyi ma alea, e'yo ngiringiri ni 'diyi ecazu e'yo onzi ru. Ba okpo e'ipi ru 'diyi e'bi dri ci e'yo otuza ni 'diyi ma ta mbazu a'disiku e'yo aco coza ni 'diyi e'do amuti a'di 'dipi 'diyi ma eselea.
nyn_prompt: Obunkenke butwire nibweyongyera omu kyanga kumara esande, obwesharingo bwayeyongyera kuba obw'obwinazi. Ab'obushoborozi bakarwana kurinda obusingye ahabw'okurwanagana okwabaireho ahagati y'ebibiina ebyabaire nibihakanisa.

eng_prompt: Tensions had been rising for weeks, and the atmosphere in the neighborhood was thick with animosity. As the disputes escalated, he felt compelled to intervene before things got out of hand.
lug_prompt: Obunkenke bwali bubaluseewo okumala wiiki, era embeera mu kitundu yali ejjudde obukyayi. Enkaayana bwe zaagenda zeeyongera, yawulira ng'alina okubaako ky'akolawo ng'ebintu tebinnava ku mulamwa.
ach_prompt: Lworo obedo ka medde pi cabit mapol, ki cwiny me gero obedo tye I kabedo ne. I kare ma telle ne omedde, en owinyo ni myero odony iye ma peya jami okato.
teo_prompt: Apolor noi ingungeta kanu isabitin luipu, ido ajai angurian noi kotoma atutubet kangin. Neapolor ingungeta, abu ngesi kopup ebe ibusakinit ngesi alomun erongo iboro elomanar.
lgg_prompt: E'yo asi otiza ni 'diyi ebi tu sabiti eyi ma alea, dika e'yo angu ama agei 'diyi ma alea 'diyi ma alea ri ma omgbo ni tu ra. Erita ako eyini tuzu uru risi, eri ega kini eri ma fi e'yo eyi ma alea rakaka de nga po'di e'yo eyi ma aza ko ku.
nyn_prompt: Obunkenke bukaba butwire nibweyongyera kumara esande, kandi embeera omu kicweka ekaba eri ey'obwinazi. Entongane ku zaayeyongyeire, akareeba ngu aine kugira eki yaakora ebintu bitakatandikire.

eng_prompt: Tensions have been escalating, and he feels cornered by those who challenge his authority. In a recent statement, he made it clear that he will not back down.
lug_prompt: Obunkenke bubadde bweyongera era awulira ng'azingiddwa abo abawakanya obuyinza bwe. Mu sitatimenti gye yafulumizza gye buvuddeko, yakiraga bulungi nti tajja kuddirira.
ach_prompt: Lworo obedo ka mede, dok en winyo ni jo ma kwero twero ne gitye ka lweny i kome. I lok ma en ocoyo cokcok-ki, en owaco ka maleng ni pe ebidok cen.
teo_prompt: Apolor atiokisio, ido epupi ngesi ebe ejai ngul luetepegitos apedorosioke. Kotoma akirokec napac, abu ngesi kitodu ebe mam ngesi ebuni aiyengun.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru 'diyi e'bi tu uru, dika eri ega kini 'ba eri ma okpo a'di'di'ba 'diyi e'bi eri ma agei te. E'yo erini nze o'diru ri ma alea, ece kililiru kini i ngani mu drile ku.
nyn_prompt: Obunkenke butwire nibweyongyera, kandi nayetegyereza ngu abarikuhakanisa obushoborozi bwe nibamuteganisa. Omu kihandiiko eki yaakozire juba, akyoreka butunu ngu tarikwija kugaruka enyima.

eng_prompt: Tensions had been building in the country for weeks as allegations of electoral fraud surfaced. When the results were announced, the anger of the populace erupted into chaos.
lug_prompt: Obunkenke bubadde bweyongera mu ggwanga okumala wiiki eziwera ng'ebigambibwa nti waliwo okubba obululu bifulumye. Ebyava mu bigezo bwe byalangirirwa, obusungu bw'abantu bwavaamu akavuyo.
ach_prompt: Lworo obedo ka dongo I lobo Uganda pi cabit mapol I kare ma byek me kwalo kwir obino. I kare ma kicwalo adwogi yer ne, akemo pa lwak okelo kuku kuku.
teo_prompt: Apolor aiyalongong kotoma akwapuwok adaun isabitin luipu naarai aponi kitodiarai ebe ejai akoko naka aseo. Nealimorere akiro ngun, abu anyunyura naka itunga kibiroros.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru ebi ovu kari ma alia sabiti ma alia e'yo 'bani 'yozu kini e'yo opetaa ni onyazu 'diyi efu 'bori ma vutia. Ba ka o'duko agata ni 'diyi azi, ooko o'bi eyini ri efu ngiringiri ru.
nyn_prompt: Obunkenke bukaba butwire nibweyongyera omu ihanga kumara esande nyingi, ahabw'okuteekateekwaho kw'obushomankuzi omu by'oburuuru. Ebyarugire omu bigyezo ku byarangirwe, ekiniga ky'abantu kikarugamu akaimukiriro.

eng_prompt: In a troubling turn of events, the community witnessed a rise in hate crimes that left many feeling unsafe. Authorities reported that individuals were being singled out for harassment and violence.
lug_prompt: Mu nkyukakyuka etaataaganya, ekitundu kyalabye okweyongera mu bikolwa eby'obumenyi bw'amateeka eby'obukyayi ekyaleka bangi nga bawulira nga tebalina bukuumi. Ab'obuyinza baategeezezza nti abantu baali basunsuddwa olw'okutulugunyizibwa n'effujjo.
ach_prompt: I kare ma jami olokke matek tutwal, lwak guneno medde pa tim aranyi ma oweko dano mapol pe gubedo agwoka. Lutela guwaco ni kitye ka yero dano acel acel pi tim gero.
teo_prompt: Kotoma ojautene loetiono noi, apotu itunga kowanyutu aiyatakin naka imusagon luka angurian luapotu kojalakisi itunga luipu amamut ayuwara. Apotu apedorosio kolimokisi ebe eutasi itunga luitegelikina aitelekaar ka amumu.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru 'diyi ma alea, ongulumu nderi ndre e'yo onzi 'bani 'ye 'ba eyi ma eselea 'diyi ma omgbo tu ra erini fezu 'ba karakara eyini aa'zu ageitema koko. Okpo e'ipi eyi 'yo kini 'ba eyi 'ba e'yo candi feza ni azini ngiringiri ni 'diyisi.
nyn_prompt: Omu mpindahinduka y'eby'oburemeezi, abantu bakareeba okweyongyera kw'ebihagaro by'obwanga ekyarekire baingi bateine burinzi. Ab'obushoborozi bakagira ngu abantu bakaba nibashoroorwa ahabw'okutuntuzibwa n'obutabanguko.

eng_prompt: In a time of great uncertainty and change, the public sought guidance and inspiration from those in power. As leaders navigated complex issues, their influence shaped the values and aspirations of the community.
lug_prompt: Mu kaseera k'obutali bukakafu obw'amaanyi n'enkyukakyuka, abantu baanoonya obulagirizi n'okubudaabudibwa okuva mu abo abali mu buyinza. Ng'abakulembeze batambuza ensonga enzibu, obuyinza bwabwe bwakola ku mpisa n'ebiruubirirwa by'ekitundu.
ach_prompt: Ikare me peko ki aloka-loka madit tutwal, lwak guyenyo tira ki cuku cwiny ki bot joo matye I loc. I kare ma lutela gubedo ka tic i kom lok matego tutwal, adwogi ticgi obedo I kom jami mabeco ki miti pa lwak.
teo_prompt: Kotoma apakio nuka amamus aijen keda aijulanakineta, apotu itunga odumutu aicoreta keda aisinyikokinit kanejaas ngul luejaasi toma apugan. Neautatar engarenok aitemokin akiro nuetioko, apotu kesi itolomutu iponesio keda apeleikinata nuka itunga.
lgg_prompt: Sa'wa e'yo ewaru azini ojata ni 'diyi ma alea, o'bi eyi nda imbata azini ava engazu 'ba opi dria 'diyi vu. Drice'ba eyini e'yo kongolokoru 'diyi ma aza kozu 'boria, eyi ma okpo 'ba ongulumu eyi ma egata eyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Omu bwire bw'obutetegyerezibwa n'empindahinduka, abantu bakasherura obuhabuzi n'okugarurwamu amaani kuruga omu b'obushoborozi. Abeebembezi kubarikukora aha nshonga ezigumire, ebiteekateeko byabo bikakora aha migasho n'ebigyendererwa by'abantu.

eng_prompt: In the wake of recent discussions about governance, many communities have begun to organize themselves. As a result, a few other tribes have also picked their leaders.
lug_prompt: Olw'okukubaganya ebirowoozo okwaliwo gye buvuddeko ku bukulembeze, ebitundu bingi bitandise okwetegeka. N'ekivuddemu, amawanga amalala matono nago galonze abakulembeze baago.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki nywako lok ma otime cokcok-ki I kom tela, kabedo mapol dong gucako yube. Macalo adwogi ne, kaki mukene bene oyero lutela gi.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemitem akiro nuikamunitos epugae, ageutu itunga luipu aitemonokin. Kanuka ngun, aseutu bobo atekerin acie engarenok kec.
lgg_prompt: E'yo agbatara ni o'diru driceza ma dria 'diyi ma vutia, ongulumu karakara eyi e'do eyi otu eyi ma ngulupi si. E'yo 'disi, suru azi were 'diyi pe vini drice'ba yini 'diyi indi.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okuhanuura ahaby'obwebembezi, abantu baingi batandikire kwetebekanisa. N'ekyarugiremu, enganda ezindi nkye nazo zitooraine abebembezi baazo.

eng_prompt: After months of campaigning and community engagement, he had built a strong rapport with voters. His policies resonated well with the electorate, leading to widespread support.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'emyezi gy'okunoonya akalulu n'okukunga abantu, yali azimbye enkolagana ey'amaanyi n'abalonzi. Enkola ze zaawuniikiriza nnyo abalonzi, ekyaviirako obuwagizi obw'amaanyi.
ach_prompt: Inge dwe mapol me bito kwi ki miyo ngec bot lwak, en onongo dong odongo wat matek ki lubol kwir. Cik mege oyomo cwiny lubol kwir ma oweko dano mapol gucwake.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ilapio luka aisup aseeta keda aisup itunga, abu ngesi koduk eidicane loajokan keda aseak. Apotu aseak kocamutu ainapeta ke, ido abu koyangau agangat kama ejaasi itunga luipu.
lgg_prompt: Mba 'bani ti odaza 'yezu azini ongulumu eyi ma ti ojizu 'bori ma vutia, eri si aa'ta okporu 'ba voti 'bepi 'diyi pie 'bo. E'yo erini 'ye 'diyi 'ba voti 'be'baa 'diyi ma asi ra erini ani atita esuzu 'ba karakara yi vu.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'emyezi mingi y'okuronda akaruuru hamwe n'okugarukanisa abantu, akombeka enkoragana nungi n'abateezi b'akaruuru. Ebiragiro bye bikashemererwa abateezi b'akaruuru, ekyarugiremu obushagiki bwingi.

eng_prompt: After a rigorous selection process and numerous nominations from his peers, the team gathered to vote for their new leader. The excitement in the air was palpable as everyone awaited the announcement of the chosen candidate.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okusunsulwamu okw'amaanyi n'okusunsulwamu okungi okuva mu banne, ttiimu yakungaana okulonda omukulembeze waabwe omuggya. Essanyu mu bbanga lyali lirabika nga buli omu alindirira okulangirirwa kw'oyo eyalondeddwa okwesimbawo.
ach_prompt: Ingee yub me yer matek tutwal ki coyo dano mapol ki bot luwote, dul pa dano gucokke me bolo kwir pi latela gi manyen. Cwiny dano obedo yom tutwal I kare ma gitye kakuru ngat ma kiyero me cung.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka aseo naepol noi keda aseo naepol kanejaas ipaupakec, apotu itunga luka etimu kimorikikinos aseun engarenonikec loitetet. Apol noi aiyalama kotoma okwam najaar itunga kere aidarit alimoret naka abwoan loeseunitai.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'bani 'ba eyi opezu okporu 'bori ma vutia azini 'ba karakara eyini eyi opezu 'bori ma vutia, amuti 'da tra eyi voti 'bezu drice'ba eyivile o'diru ri ni. Ayiko fu oli alia 'ba dria ni tezu 'bani 'ba opepiri ma e'yo oluzu.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okuronda kurungi hamwe n'okushaba kwingi kuruga omu bagyenzi be, tiimu ekateerana kuteera akaruuru k'omwebembezi waabo omusya. Okushemererwa kukarebeka omu mwanya, buri omwe arikutegyereza okurangirira owabaire ayesimbireho.

eng_prompt: Despite the overwhelming opposition from his advisors, he felt a strong urge to take decisive action. Fueled by a sense of urgency, he believed that bold leadership was necessary in these challenging times.
lug_prompt: Wadde ng'abawabuzi be baali bamuwakanya nnyo, yali ayagala nnyo okubaako ky'akolawo. Olw'okuba yali amanyi obwetaavu bw'ebiseera, yali mukakafu nti obukulembeze obw'obuvumu bwetaagisa mu biseera bino ebizibu.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni lumii tam mege gubedo ka jemo matek tutwal I kome, en obedo ki miti matek me timo gin mo. Pien en onongo ngeyo ni kare dong odic woko, en obedo ki niyee ni tela ma tek cwiny obedo gin ma mite I kare man me peko.
teo_prompt: Karaida apotu ecorak ke itepegitos ngesi noi, apupi ngesi ekot aswam kagogong. Keda eipud loka atipet, aomit ngesi ebe ejokuna engarenone loetiting kotoma apakio kanu nuetioko.
lgg_prompt: Erita ako okporu engazu 'ba eri ma embata fe'baa 'diyi vurisi ra ti, eri etumu ava okporu e'yo 'yezu okporu. Erini e'yo 'yezu mbeleru risi, eri a'i ra kini driceza okporu ri eri orodriru sa'wa e'yo ewaru 'diyi ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Oihireho okuhakanisibwa kw'amaani kuruga omu bawabuzi be, akagira ekyetengo ky'amaani ky'okukora ekirikubaasika. Ahabw'obwegyendesereza, akaikiriza ngu obwebembezi bw'amaani nibwetaagwa omu bwire obu obw'oburemeezi.

eng_prompt: After a series of community meetings, the local council proposed a new park to enhance the neighborhood's green spaces. This idea was welcomed by the residents.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'enkiiko z'ekitundu eziwerako, akakiiko k'ekyalo kaateesa ku ppaaka empya okutumbula ebifo ebirabika obulungi mu kitundu. Ekirowoozo kino kyakkiriziddwa abatuuze.
ach_prompt: Ingee kacokke pa lwak mapol, lutela me tedero gumiyo tam me yubu park manyen me medo rwom me kabedo enoni. Lwak ogamo tam man ki yomcwiny.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka airiamununeta nuipu nuka itunga, abu ekansulo loka atutubet kitutub aiboisit naidarere itiang kanu aitojokar aiboisio nuka idunyeta. Apotu itunga luka atutubet kocamutu aomisioit ngin.
lgg_prompt: Mitingi ongulumu eyini 'diyi ma vutia, kanisulu angu 'da ma alea ri fe egata angu anyapa asea 'diyi ma tambazu o'diru ni. Ba aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ai egata 'di ra.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'enkiiko z'ekyaro,akakiiko k'ekyaro kakataho enteekateeka y'okwombeka paaka nsya, okutunguura emyanya y'obuhangwa omu byaro. Ekiteekateeko eki kikashemererwa abatuuragye.

eng_prompt: Amid growing public discontent and calls for change, several prominent figures in the political landscape gathered to discuss their future plans. They expressed a strong commitment to representing their constituents and addressing pressing issues.
lug_prompt: Wakati mu butakkaanya bw'abantu obweyongera n'okusaba enkyukakyuka, abantu ab'amaanyi mu byobufuzi baakuÅ‹Å‹aana okukubaganya ebirowoozo ku nteekateeka zaabwe ez'omu maaso. Baalaga obumalirivu obw'amaanyi mu kukiikirira abantu baabwe n'okukola ku nsonga ez'amangu.
ach_prompt: I kare ma lwak tye kamedde ki bedo ma cwinygi pe yom ki lego pi aloka-loka, dano mapol ma oywek i lok me cungu iwi-bye gugure me nywako lok I kom yubgi pi anyim. Gin gunyutu miti matek me cung pi lubol kwir gi ki cobo peko mapigi tego.
teo_prompt: Keda amamut aiyalama naka itunga keda ailipasinei nuka aijulakin akiro, apotu itunga luipu luka politikis kotukokinos kanu aitemitem nu ekotos kesi aswam koingaren. Apotu kesi itodutu ainakina naepol noi naka abwoikin itunga luka atutubenakec keda aitemokin atiokisio nuepolok noi.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'ba eyini aa'zu ayikosi ku 'diyi ma eselea azini e'yo 'ba eyini lezu ojata ejizu 'diyi ma eselea, 'ba karakara e'yo politiki ni 'diyi oku eyi agbatara gbazu otita eyini ewu drialeri ni 'diyi ma dria. Eyi e'da ava okporu eyini eyi ma pari 'bazu angu eyini opi nyazu 'diyi ma paria azini e'yo okporu 'diyi ma aza kozu.

teo_prompt: Karaida ejaas emotoka keda atiokisio nu ikidioko, ejokuna noi aitwasam. Aticepak ipedori ijo aanyun atiokisio ace, konye mam eraasi nuepolok noi nuepedorete aitikitik airenge kon.

nyn_prompt: N'obu ekiiruka kirikuba kiine oburemeezi bukye, nikiba kiri kirungi kukoresibwa. Noobaasa kureeba oburemeezi bukye, kwonka tibukuru ekirikumara kuremesa okuvuga kwawe.

eng_prompt: Proper vehicle maintenance is essential for ensuring optimal performance and safety. One crucial aspect that often gets overlooked is the alignment of the wheels.
lug_prompt: Okulabirira obulungi emmotoka kya nkizo mu kukola obulungi n'obukuumi. Ekimu ku bintu ebikulu ennyo ebitera okubuusibwa amaaso kwe kutereeza emipiira.
ach_prompt: Gedo mutoka maber pire tek tutwal me neno ni tye ka tic maber dok maber. Gin acel ma pire tek tutwal ma ipol kare ki cayo ne obedo kit ma cuma tyen motoka tye kwede.
teo_prompt: Aidar amotoka ejok ejok erai ibore yenepol noi kanu awanyun ebe iswamai ejok keda ayuwara. Adiopebore naepol noi naepalunitai ngesi aitirian naka amopiran nuka emotoka.
lgg_prompt: Mutukari ma tambaza kililiru ri eri orodriru azi ngazu kililiru azini ageitema be. E'yo azi orodriru 'bani sawa driasi adizu ri eri wura motokari ma whili yini yi otuzuri'i.
nyn_prompt: Okugarura busya emotoka n'eky'omugasho kureeba ngu ekora kurungi n'okwerinda. Ekintu kimwe ekikuru ekirikukira kwebwa n'okushoroora emipiira.

eng_prompt: Constructive criticism is essential for personal and professional growth. Embracing different perspectives can lead to valuable insights and improvements.
lug_prompt: Okuvumirira okuzimba kwa mugaso mu kukulaakulana kw'obuntu n'obw'ekikugu. Okukkiriza endowooza ez'enjawulo kiyinza okuvaamu amagezi ag'omugaso n'enkulaakulana.
ach_prompt: Loko lok matye ki tyen lok mabeco pire tek tutwal pi dongo pa ngat moni. Jolo tam mapat pat twero kelo ngec ki dongo lobo mapol.
teo_prompt: Aitoroneta nuajokak ejokuka kanu apolo ka aswam. Aingarakin aomisio nuegelegela epedori ayangaun acoa naejok ka aitojokaario.
lgg_prompt: E'yo nzeza kililiru ri eri orodriru zota 'ba ma ngulupi ni azini azi ngazu kililiru ri ni. Egata ndundu eyi ai'zu ri eco fe 'ba eyini e'yo onizu orodriru azini eyi ma edri otuzu ra.
nyn_prompt: Okuhakanisa kurungi n'eky'omugasho omu kutunguuka kw'omuntu n'omumyoga ye. Okukoresa emiteekateekyere etarikushushana nikibaasa kureetaho okwetegyereza n'okutunguuka.

eng_prompt: In any collaborative project, it's essential to recognize the contributions of all parties involved. This not only fosters goodwill but also encourages future support and partnership.
lug_prompt: Mu pulojekiti yonna ey'obwegassi, kya mugaso okusiima obuyambi bw'abantu bonna abakwatibwako. Kino tekikoma ku kutumbula nkolagana nnungi naye era kikubiriza obuwagizi n'enkolagana mu biseera eby'omu maaso.
ach_prompt: I yub mo keken ma ribe tye iye, pire tek tutwal me pwoyo jami ma dano weng otimo. Man pe kelo ber bedo keken ento bene cuku cwiny dano me miyo kony ki winye ikare me anyim.
teo_prompt: Kotoma opurojekt ediokere loimorikikina, ejokuna ajenun aswamisinei nuka itunga kere. Mam ngin eyangauni ainapakina bon konye isinyikokini agangat keda aiswamanara koingaren.
lgg_prompt: Otita dria ti icita niri ma alea, eri orodriru 'ba dria e'yo nde 'yepi 'diyi ma e'yo egazu. Diri ngani lu asi ndriza ma omgbo otu ku te eri vini atita azini ti icita ewu drialeri ma alia 'diyi ma ava enga indi.
nyn_prompt: Omu purogyekiti yoona ey'okukorera hamwe, n'eky'omugasho kumanya obuhwezi bw'abantu boona. Eki tikirikureetaho rukundo yonka, kureka n'obuhwezi n'okukwatanisa omu biro by'omumaisho.

eng_prompt: In light of recent financial audits and investigations, several key stakeholders have expressed their concerns. As a result, donors give warning remarks over corruption.
lug_prompt: Okusinziira ku kubala ebitabo n'okunoonyereza okwakolebwa gye buvuddeko, abakwatibwako ab'enjawulo balaze okweraliikirira kwabwe. N'ekivuddemu, abagabi b'obuyambi balabula ku buli bw'enguzi.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki ngiyo kor tic ki lim ki kwed ma otime cokcok-ki, joo mapigi tego mapol gunyutu lworo gi. Macalo adwogi ne, lumii kony me lim gi ciko dano i kom tim me camcana.
teo_prompt: Katupitos nuikamunitos aingic keda aingic naka ikapun, apotu itunga luipu itodutu aiyalongongokec. Kanuka ngun, ekwenenete lukojokotau aikwenyar nuikamunitos amidicio naka apiyai.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'bani robia ma ale andrizu azini e'yo vuti ondaza ma dria, 'ba karakara eyi ece asi otiza eyi ma dria. E'yo 'disi, 'ba afa fepi 'diyi bile ndu li e'yo anyamgbolo ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Kurugirira aha kucondooza n'okushwijuma eby'empiiha okwabaireho obwahati, abantu baingi boorekire okwerarikirira kwabo. N'ekyarugiremu, abagabi b'obuyambi nibarabura abantu ahabw'obushomankuzi.

eng_prompt: The community has been eagerly anticipating the upcoming event that promises to bring everyone together. Organizers have been working tirelessly to ensure that the gathering will be both memorable and impactful.
lug_prompt: Abantu babadde beesunga omukolo ogujja ogusuubiza okugatta buli omu. Abategesi babadde bakola butaweera okukakasa nti olukungaana lujja kujjukirwa era lukwate ku bantu.
ach_prompt: Lwak gubedo kakuru yub matye kabino ni ma obi ribo dano weng. Luyub gubedo katic matek tutwal me neno ni kacoke ne obedo ber dok wigi poo I komgi.
teo_prompt: Etapit itunga aidar epucit lo ebunit lo isumunit aimorikikin itunga kere. Iswamaete lu itemonokinete ngun kagogongu kanu awanyun ebe ebuni airiamunet ngin aiitun ido kojaasi keda apolou naepol noi.

eng_prompt: As the sun began to set, the community gathered in the town square to discuss the upcoming festival. They noticed the large infrastructure improvements that had been made recently to ensure everyone had access to clean water.
lug_prompt: Enjuba bwe yatandika okugwa, abantu baakuÅ‹Å‹aanira mu kibangirizi ky'ekibuga okukubaganya ebirowoozo ku kivvulu ekigenda okubaawo. Baalabye ennongoosereza ennene mu bizimbe ezaakolebwa gyebuvuddeko okulaba nga buli omu afuna amazzi amayonjo.
ach_prompt: Ikare ma ceng ocako poto, lwak gugure i town square me nywako lok I kom kwer matye kabino ni. Guneno aloka-loka madongo ma otimme cokcok-ki me neno ni dano weng tye ki yoo me nongo pii maleng.
teo_prompt: Neageuna akolong aibiror, apotu itunga kotukokinos aiboisit naka aiboisit naka aiboisit naka aiboisit naka aiboisit naka aiboisit naka aiboisit naka aiboisit naka aiboisit naka aiboisit naka aiboisit naka aiboisit naka aiboisit naka aiboisit naka aiboisit naka aiboisit naka aiboisit naka aiboisit naka aiboisit naka aiboisit naka ai Apotu kesi kowanyutu aitojokareta nuapolok nuiswamatai pac kanu awanyun ebe epedorete itunga kere adumunun akipi nu elaete.
lgg_prompt: Etuka ni e'doria 'boria, ongulumu eyi tra eyi aku ambu tawuni niri ma alea agbatara gbazu omu emupi 'diyi ma dria. Eyi ndre e'yo otuta okporu 'bani 'ye o'diru 'diyi nezu ra kini 'ba dria eco yi ala esu ra.

eng_prompt: Given the increasing number of participants at the event, it has become clear that our current first aid facilities are insufficient. We need to ensure that everyone has access to medical assistance in case of emergencies.
lug_prompt: Okusinziira ku kweyongera kw'omuwendo gw'abantu abeetabye ku mukolo guno, kyeyoleka bulungi nti ebikozesebwa mu bujjanjabi obusookerwako ebiriwo kati tebimala. Twetaaga okukakasa nti buli omu afuna obujjanjabi mu mbeera ez'amangu.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki wel dano matye I yub eni matye kamede, nen atyer kamaleng ni jami me miyo kony me oyot-oyot ma watye kwede kombedi pe tye ma oromo. Omyero wanen ni dano weng gunongo kony me yot kom ikare me peko ma opoto atura.
teo_prompt: Koipone kalo iyatakinor enaaba loka itunga luejaasi toma opucit kangol, ecai cut ebe mam iswamasiawok luka amukian nasodit edoli. Ekot oni awanyun ebe epedori nginitunganan adumunun amukian kotoma ojautene lo engeso.
lgg_prompt: Kalafe 'ba fi'ba e'yo nde ma alia 'diyi ni tuzu ri ma e'yo si, eca e'da kililiru kini afa amani fele azakoma fele e'yo ewaru 'diyi ma aza kozu 'diyi cani ku. Le ama ma ne ra kini 'ba dria ma esu azakoma arojoni e'yo mbeleru 'diyi ma alia ra.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'omuhendo gw'abantu abarikwejumba omu mukoro ogweyongyeire, nikyoreka butunu ngu obuheereza bwaitu obwahati tiburikumara. Twine kureeba ngu buri omwe yaatunga obuhwezi bw'eby'amagara omu bwire bw'ebihikiirizi.

eng_prompt: As the event unfolded, the organizers recognized the need for additional support to ensure everyone's comfort and safety. They quickly mobilized a team of youth volunteers to assist those who might struggle to navigate the bustling environment.
lug_prompt: Omukolo bwe gwali gugenda mu maaso, abategesi baalaba obwetaavu bw'obuyambi obulala okulaba nga buli omu awulira bulungi n'obukuumi. Banguwa okukunga ttiimu y'abavubuka abeewaayo okuyamba abo abayinza okuzibuwalirwa okutambula mu bifo ebirimu abantu abangi.
ach_prompt: Ikare ma yub ne tye kawot anyim, luyub ne gunongo ni mite ni omyero kimed kony wek dano weng gubed agonya. Cutcut gu rweyo dul pa bulu ma gudyere me konyo joo ma nongo tek tutwal me wot I kabedo ma dano dwong iye tutwal.
teo_prompt: Kwape elosi epucit ngol, apotu luitemonokinak kojenutu eipud loka agangat kanu awanyun ebe eyuwara itunga kere. Apotu kesi kiswamata katipet etimu loka atumunak kanu aingarakin ngul luetioko kotoma aiboisio nuegelegela.
lgg_prompt: Omu 'da ni mu drile, 'ba e'yo otupi 'diyi esu e'yo lezu atita fezu 'ba dria eyini ani aa'zu muke azini ageitema be. Eyi tra ongmbo mbeleru amuti 'ba ode owitaru 'diyi ni eyi ma aza kozu 'ba ecopi candi fepi angu 'ba eyini aa'zu 'diyi ma alea ra 'diyi ma aza kozu.
nyn_prompt: Omurimo ku gwagumire nigugyenda omu maisho, abatebekanisa bakareeba ekyetengo ky'okwongyera obuhwezi okureeba ngu buri omwe yaaba aine obusingye n'oburinzi. Bakatandikaho tiimu y'eminyeeto ey'okwehayo kuhwera abo abaabaire nibabaasa kurwana kurabira omu myanya erimu abantu baingi.

eng_prompt: Your performances have brought so much joy to the White House gatherings. It's clear that your talent resonates with everyone, especially our President.
lug_prompt: Enkola yo ereese essanyu lingi mu nkungaana za White House. Kyeyoleka bulungi nti ekitone kyo kisikiriza buli omu naddala Pulezidenti waffe.
ach_prompt: Yub meggi okelo yomcwiny madit tutwal I kacokke me White House. Nen atyer kamaleng ni mic ma itye kwede yomo cwiny dano weng tutwalle ladit lobo wa.
teo_prompt: Eyangaunit aswam kon aiyalama naepol noi kotoma airiamununeta nuka White House. Ecai cut ebe isiyalamikit nginitunganan atalanta kon, kacut lokapolon akwap wok.
lgg_prompt: E'yo mini 'ye 'diyi eji ayiko angiri okuta White House ni 'diyi ma alia. Eri e'da kililiru kini feta munguni fe mi dri 'ba dria dri, tutuni ama vile prisdentni.
nyn_prompt: Okukora kwawe kureesire okushemererwa omu nteerane za White House. Nikyoreka butunu ngu entaranta yaawe neehuumuriza buri omwe namunonga omwebembezi weihanga.

eng_prompt: In the ongoing political struggle, various factions are vying for support and resources. As a result, the opposition has strategically aligned itself with western donors to secure financial backing.
lug_prompt: Mu lutalo lw'ebyobufuzi olugenda mu maaso, ebiwayi eby'enjawulo bivuganya ku buyambi n'ebikozesebwa. N'ekivuddemu, ab'oludda oluvuganya bakolagana n'abagabi b'obuyambi okuva mu mawanga g'obugwanjuba okufuna obuyambi bw'ensimbi.
ach_prompt: I lweny me cungu iwi-bye matye kawot anyim, dul me cungu iwi-bye mapat-pat tye ka pyem me nongo cwak ki lim. Macalo adwogi ne, dul pa jo ma pe yee ki lok pa gamente guribbe ki jo ma miyo kony me lim ki lobe ma woko me nongo kony me lim.
teo_prompt: Kotoma ojie lo elosi akonye, eutasi atukona nuegelegela abolobol kanu agangat keda iboro. Kanuka ngun, emorikikinos etepegak keda luko akwapin nuka imusugun kanu adumun agangat naka ikapun.
lgg_prompt: A'di politiki ni mupi drile ri ma alea, amuti ndundu eyi a'bala 'ye atita azini afa ayuzaru 'diyi esuzu. E'yo 'disi, 'ba ageti otiza ni 'diyi e'do ti eci yi ma eselea 'ba atita fe'baa engazu kala etuni 'deria 'diyi pie atita robia niri esuzu.
nyn_prompt: Omu rutaro rw'eby'obutegyeki orurikugyenda omu maisho, ebibiina bitari bimwe na bimwe biriyo nibihakanira obushagiki n'ebintu. N'ekyarugiremu,ab'orubaju orurikuhabura gavumenti, bakakorengana n'abagabi b'obuyambi kuruga omu mahanga g'oburengyerwa-izooba, kugira ngu batungye obuhwezi bw'esente.

eng_prompt: In the current political landscape, securing funding from various sources has become increasingly competitive. To remain viable, the opposition must adapt their strategies to capitalize on every opportunity presented by potential supporters.
lug_prompt: Mu mbeera y'ebyobufuzi eriwo kati, okufuna ensimbi okuva mu nsibuko ez'enjawulo kweyongedde okuvuganya. Okusobola okusigala nga balamu, ab'oludda oluvuganya balina okukyusa obukodyo bwabwe bakozese buli mukisa oguba guweereddwa abawagizi baabwe.
ach_prompt: I lok me cungu iwi bye matye kombedi, nongo lim ki bot dul mapat-pat dong odoko tek tutwal. Me cung matek, dul pa jo ma pe yee ki lok pa gamente omyero gulok yoo gi me tic ki gum mo keken ma lucwak gi kelo.
teo_prompt: Kotoma ojautene loka epolitikis loakwana, ejai abolobol naepol noi naka adumun ikapun kama ejaasi iponesio luegelegela. Kanu asalakin egogong, ekot etepegak aijulakin iwaitin kec kanu aitwasam arerengesio nu ijaikitos kesi egangitok.
lgg_prompt: E'yo politiki ni curu'do ri ma alea, robia esuzu engazu angu ndundu eyi ma alea ri eca abala ru. Aa'zu okporu, le 'ba ageti otiza ni 'diyi ma oja geri eyini 'diyi eyini ani drileba dria 'ba ecopi eyi atipi ra 'diyi ni ejile 'diyi ayuzu.
nyn_prompt: Omu by'obutegyeki ebiriho hati, okuronda esente kuruga omu myanya etari emwe n'emwe kweyongyeire. Okugumizamu n'amaani, ab'orubaju orurikuhakanisa gavumenti bashemereire kuhindura emiringo yaabo, kugira ngu bakozese omugisha gwona ogurikubaheebwa abahagizi.

eng_prompt: Even though the challenges seem overwhelming, it's important to maintain communication. Remember, building connections can lead to unexpected opportunities.
lug_prompt: Wadde ng'okusoomoozebwa kulabika ng'okusukkiridde, kikulu okukuuma empuliziganya. Jjukira nti okukolagana n'abalala kisobola okuleetawo emikisa gy'otosuubira.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni peko tye mapol tutwal, pire tek me bedo ki lok I kinwu. Wii myero opo ni bedo ki lurem twero kelo gum ma pe byek tye I komgi.
teo_prompt: Karaida esubit bala epol atiokisio, erai ibore yenepol noi aidar einer. Kiituni ebe aiduk arucokina epedori ayangaun arerengesio nu mam iwomit ijo.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru 'diyi ka tro e'da kililiru ra ti, eri orodriru e'yo nzeza ma tambazu. E'yo ega, e'yo 'ba eyi ma eselea 'diyi sizu ri eco drileba 'bani ega ku 'diyi eji ra.
nyn_prompt: N'obu oburemeezi burikureebeka nk'oburengyesereize, n'eky'omugasho kugumizamu n'empurizagana. Ijuka, okwombeka enkoragana nikibaasa kureeta emigisha etarikuteekateekwaho.

eng_prompt: In preparation for the upcoming elections, it's crucial to ensure that all candidates are thoroughly vetted. We need to implement a comprehensive review process to maintain the integrity of our electoral system.
lug_prompt: Mu kwetegekera okulonda okujja, kikulu nnyo okukakasa nti abeesimbyewo bonna bakeberebwa bulungi. Twetaaga okuteekawo enkola ey'okwetegereza mu bujjuvu okukuuma obulungi bw'enkola yaffe ey'ebyokulonda.
ach_prompt: Ikare me yubbe pi yer matye kabino ni, pire tek tutwal me neno ni lucungu weng ki kwedo gi maber tutwal. Omyero waket yub me ngiyo kit ma tic me bolo kwir tye kawot kwede pi gwoko ber bedo pa yub me bolo kwir ma watye kwede.
teo_prompt: Kotoma aitemonokin kanuka aseo naebunit, ejokuna awanyun ebe inwakio itunga kere luebwoitos. Ekot oni aitegear ainapeta nu airereonor kanu aidar ailajara naka aseo wok.
lgg_prompt: Otuta opeta emupi 'diyi ni ri ma alea, eri orodriru nezu ra kini 'ba dria pa tupi 'diyi ma ale andri kililiru. Le ama ma o'ba geri 'bani e'yo opetaa ni 'diyi ma ale andrizu kililiru 'diyi geri ama vile e'yo opetaa ni 'diyi ma ta mbazu.
nyn_prompt: Omu kweteekateekyera akaruuru akarikwiija, n'eky'omugasho kureeba ngu boona abesimbireho bashwijumwa kurungi. Twine kutaho enkora y'okushwijuma eby'oburuuru kwenda kurinda oburingaaniza omu by'oburuuru byaitu.

eng_prompt: As the nation grapples with unprecedented turmoil, many are left wondering about the fate of our elected officials. Rumors swirl about their whereabouts and the challenges they face in these trying times.
lug_prompt: Nga eggwanga lirwanagana n'obutabanguko obutabangawo, bangi basigadde beebuuza ku nkomerero y'abakungu baffe abalonde. Olugambo luwuuma ku gye bali n'okusoomoozebwa kwe basanga mu biseera bino ebizibu.
ach_prompt: I kare ma lobo ne tye ka lweny ki lweny ma pud pe obedo tye, dano mapol pud tye ka tamo I kom agiki pa lutic ma kiyero gi. Lok angea tye I kom kabedo gi ki peko ma ginongo I kare man me peko.
teo_prompt: Kwape etereikina akwap keda amumu naepol noi, ipu itunga lu ejenete nuikamunitos eswamak lu eseunitai. Ileleba akiro nuikamunitos aiboisio kec keda atiokisio nuetereikina keda kesi kotoma apakio nu nuetioko.
lgg_prompt: Kari ni dri ciria e'yo ewaru 'diyi be, 'ba karakara eyi asi e'yo ega e'yo drileba 'ba azi ngapi amavile 'diyi ni ri ma dria. E'yo nzeza yi ma dria pari yini aa'zu 'diyi ma dria azini e'yo ewaru yini isule sawa ewaru 'diyi ma alia 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Obu eihanga ririkurwanagana n'obutabanguko obutabaireho, baingi nibasigara nibeebuuza aha nkomerero y'abakungu baitu abatoorainwe. Orugambo nirugyenda omu maisho aharibo hamwe n'oburemeezi obubarikubugana omu bwire obu obw'oburemeezi.

eng_prompt: Recent reports have raised concerns about the integrity of our government institutions. Investigations have revealed troubling instances of misconduct among certain lawmakers.
lug_prompt: Lipoota ezifulumiziddwa gye buvuddeko zireeseewo okweraliikirira ku bwesimbu bw'ebitongole bya gavumenti zaffe. Okunoonyereza kuzudde ebyokulabirako ebyeraliikiriza eby'empisa embi mu babaka ba palamenti abamu.
ach_prompt: Adwogi tic ma otime cokcok-ki okelo lworo I kom ber bedo pa gangi tic pa gamente. Kwed onyutu ni luwang lwak I ot moko cik mukene gubedo ki tim maraco.
teo_prompt: Apotu iripotan lu atuboros itolomutu aiyalongongo kanuikamunitos aiyuwara naka iriongeta luka apugan wok. Apotu aingic itodutu iponesio luarokok luka itunga ice luka airabet.
lgg_prompt: O'duko efupi o'diru 'diyi eji asi otiza e'yo amuti gameteni 'diyi ma e'yo ada ma dria. E'yo eti ondaza ece e'yo adriza onzi 'ba azita si'ba 'diyi ma eselea 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Ripoota eziherize kukorwa zireesire okwerarikirira ahabw'oburingaaniza bw'ebitongore bya gavumenti. Okucondooza kworeka emicwe mibi omu bany'eishengyero.

eng_prompt: As I watch the debates unfold on television, I can't help but feel concerned about the messages being conveyed. It's disheartening to see such divisive rhetoric coming from those in power.
lug_prompt: Nga ndaba okukubaganya ebirowoozo ku terefayina, siyinza butalowooza ku bubaka obutuusibwa. Kimalamu amaanyi okulaba ebigambo eby'enjawukana ng'ebyo nga biva mu abo abali mu buyinza.
ach_prompt: I kare ma atye ka neno kit ma laro lok tye kawot kwede I telebijon, pe atwero weko bedo ki lworo I kom kwena ma kitye ka cwalo. Tye me cwer cwiny tutwal me neno lok ma kelo apoka-poka ma aa ki bot jo matye I loc.
teo_prompt: Neasesenenei eong epeget kotelebision, mam eong apedori aiyalongong nuikamunitos akiro nuelimoritai. Itakadikit noi asesen akiro nuka atiakatiaka kama ejaasi ngul luejaasi toma apugan.
lgg_prompt: Mani e'yo agbatara ni 'diyi ndreria afa ondredrea ni television ru 'diyi ma alia, ma econi asi ku e'yo 'bani 'yole 'diyi ma dria. Eri candiru e'yo esele cozani 'dile 'diyi ndrezu engazu 'ba opi dria 'diyi vu.
nyn_prompt: Ku ndikureeba okuhanuura aha terevijoni, tindikubaasa kureka kufayo aha bubaka oburikugambwaho. Nikimaramu amaani okureeba ebigambo ebirikureetaho okwebaganisamu kuruga omu b'obushoborozi.

eng_prompt: We have finalized all necessary approvals and completed the required documentation. As a result, there will be no delay in funds disbursement.
lug_prompt: Tumalirizza okukkiriza kwonna okwetaagisa n'ebiwandiiko ebyetaagisa. N'ekinaavaamu, tewajja kubaawo kulwawo mu kugaba ssente.
ach_prompt: Dong watyeko miyo twero ki coc weng mamitte. Macalo adwogi ne, pe kibi galle ki poko lim.
teo_prompt: Idau sio aitodolikin apapulai kere nu ekotoi. Kanuka ngun, emamei aiyap naka aikor ikapun.
lgg_prompt: Ama de e'yo dria 'bani le 'diyi 'bo dika ama de e'yo kokobi 'bani le 'diyi ma dria 'bo. E'yo 'disi, sawa ezaza robia awazuri ngani ovu ku.
nyn_prompt: Twamazire kwikiriza byona ebirikwetengwa n'ebihandiiko ebirikwetengwa. Ekyarugiremu, tihariho kukyerererwa omu kuheereza esente.

eng_prompt: In any society, maintaining a standard of conduct is essential for the well-being of its members. When individuals violate these standards, it is crucial to address their behavior appropriately.
lug_prompt: Mu kitundu kyonna, okukuuma omutindo gw'empisa kya mugaso eri obulungi bw'abantu baakyo. Abantu bwe bamenya emitendera gino, kikulu nnyo okukola ku nneeyisa yaabwe mu ngeri esaanira.
ach_prompt: I kabedo mo keken, gwoko rwom me kwo pire tek pi ber bedo pa dano. Kace dano acel acel oturu cik magi, pire tek tutwal me tic i kom timgi.
teo_prompt: Kotoma atutubet adio, aidar iponesio luajokak ejok kanu aijar najokan naka itunga. Arai itolitol itunga ainapeta nu, ibusakinit aitemokin iponesiokec ejok.
lgg_prompt: Ongulumu ciria, adriza ma tambaza eri orodriru 'ba eri ma eselea 'diyi ma aa'ta muke ni. Ba ka wura 'diyi nyo, eri orodriru e'yo yi 'yepi 'diyi ma aza kozu kililiru.
nyn_prompt: Omu kicweka kyona, okurinda omutindo gw'emitwarize n'eky'omugasho ahabw'oburungi bw'abantu baayo. Abantu ku barikuhenda ebiragiro ebi, ni kikuru kukora aha mitwarize yaabo omu muringo oguhikire.

eng_prompt: As citizens, we have watched in dismay as our leaders engage in petty squabbles and aggressive tactics instead of focusing on the issues that truly matter. The ongoing turmoil has reached a point where we can no longer remain silent.
lug_prompt: Ng'abatuuze, tutunuulidde n'obweraliikirivu ng'abakulembeze baffe beenyigira mu bukuubagano obutonotono n'obukodyo obw'obukambwe mu kifo ky'okussa essira ku nsonga ezisinga obukulu. Obutabanguko obugenda mu maaso butuuse we tutakyasobola kusirika.
ach_prompt: Macalo anywali, waneno ki cwer cwiny ni lutela wa tye ka donyo I daa matino-tino ki diro me gero me kaka keto cwinygi I kom jami ma pigi tego. Lweny matye ni dong oo kama pe watwero ling iye.
teo_prompt: Kwape itunga luka akwapuwok, iwanyunit sio keda anyunyura kwape engarenok wok elomanarete toma ongungeta ludidik keda acoasinei nuarokok itia apodokinit akiro nuepolok. Adolu amumu na elosi akonye adoketait na mam oni ipedori aililing.
lgg_prompt: Kari anzi ru, ama ndre candi be drice'ba amavile 'diyini e'yo onzi 'yezu azini e'yo onzi 'yezu asi 'bazu e'yo orodriru 'diyi ma dria ri ma paria. Ngiringiri mupi drile 'diyi ca angu amani ecozu ovuzu ciri ma alia 'bo.
nyn_prompt: Nk'abatuuragye, twareebire n'obusaasi abebembezi baitu barikwejumba omu ntongane n'emitwarize y'obwinazi, omu mwanya gw'okuta amaani aha nshonga nkuru. Akaimukiriro akarikugyenda omu maisho, kahikire ahu tutarikubasa kuguma tuhunamiire.

eng_prompt: As the crowd gathered in desperation, their voices echoed with fear and uncertainty about their future. They turned to their leader, hoping for a glimmer of hope amidst the looming threat of displacement.
lug_prompt: Abantu bwe baakuÅ‹Å‹aanye nga baweddemu essuubi, amaloboozi gaabwe gaawuniikirira olw'okutya n'obutali bukakafu ku biseera byabwe eby'omu maaso. Baakyuka eri omukulembeze waabwe nga basuubira okufuna essuubi wakati mu bulabe bw'okusengulwa.
ach_prompt: I kare ma lwak gugure ma cwinygi otur, dwon gi obedo ka winyo ki lworo ki bedo ki akala-kala I kom anyimgi. Gulokke bot latela gi, ki gen me nongo gen ikare me lworo me aa ki I kabedogi.
teo_prompt: Neautar itunga atukonokin kotoma aiyalongong, apotu iporotoi kec kiswamata keda akuriau keda amamus aijen nuikamunitos ingarenikec. Apotu kesi olototo mama ejai engarenon kec, aomit ebe ejai amuno kotoma aitukurianeta nuka aibwot.
lgg_prompt: Ongulumu eyini trazu e'yo ewaru ma alea, o'duko eyivile 'diyi e'da orisi azini e'yo eyi ma ewu drialeri ma dria ku. Eyi oja eyi drice'ba eyivile 'diyi vu asi 'baza be e'yo ori gbaza eyini eyi ofuzu angu eyivile 'diyi ma alea ri ma talasi.
nyn_prompt: Abantu ku barikuteeranira hamwe, amahurire gaabo gakaba garimu okutiina n'okwerarikirira aha biro byabo by'omumaisho. Bakagaruka aha mwebembezi waabo, barikuteekateeka ngu nibaija kutunga amatsiko omu kabi k'okuruga omu maka gaabo.

eng_prompt: After reviewing the recent project deliverables, we noticed several discrepancies and inconsistencies in the implementation. This has raised concerns about the adherence to established guidelines and protocols.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okwekenneenya ebituukiddwaako pulojekiti gye buvuddeko, twalabye obutakkaanya bungi n'obutakwatagana mu kussa mu nkola. Kino kireeseewo okweraliikirira ku kugoberera ebiragiro n'emitendera egyateekebwawo.
ach_prompt: Ingee ngiyo kit ma tic otime kwede cokcok-ki, waneno apoka-poka mapol I yoo me keto yub eni itic. Man okelo lworo I kom lubu cik ma kiketo.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka airereor iboro lu itodolikinitai kapakio nu, apotu sio awanyutu iboro luipu lumam itodolikinitai. Eyangaunit ngin aiyalongongo kanuikamunitos aitup aicoreta keda ainapeta nuitolomunitai.
lgg_prompt: E'yo otita 'da ni o'diru 'diyi ma ale andrizu 'bori ma vutia, ama esu e'yo ndu ndu azini e'yo 'bani 'ba eyi 'yezu 'diyi ma eselea. E'yo 'di eji asi otiza e'yo 'bani azita o'bale 'diyi ma vuti obizu ri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okushwijuma ebikozirwe omu purogyekiti, tukareeba obutaikirizana omu nkora yaayo. Eki kireesireho okwerarikirira aha kukuratira ebiragiro ebiteirweho.

eng_prompt: The local authorities have announced plans to clear the area for new development, leaving many families vulnerable. As a result, your people are at risk of forced eviction without another shelter.
lug_prompt: Ab'obuyinza mu byalo balangiridde enteekateeka z'okugogola ekitundu ku lw'enkulaakulana empya, ekirese amaka mangi mu bulabe. N'ekivuddemu, abantu bo bali mu katyabaga k'okugobwa awaka awatali kifo kirala.
ach_prompt: Lutela me tedero guwaco ni gitye ki yub me yabo kabedo eni pi dongo lobo manyen, ma oweko gangi mapol tye ki peko. Macalo adwogi ne, dano ni gitye I peko me ryemo gi tektek labongo kabedo mukene.
teo_prompt: Alimo apedorosio nuka atutubet ainapeta nuka aitemokin aiboisit kanu apol naitetet, ijalakini ikalia luipu ican. Kanuka ngun, ejaas itunga kon ationis na airutario komam ejaasi keda neperot.
lgg_prompt: Okpo e'ipi angu ndundu eyi ma alea 'diyi azi otita eyi angu 'da ma alea angu ezoza o'diru 'diyi sizu, dika eyi fe familia karakara eyini aa'zu e'yo ewaru ma alea. E'yo 'disi, 'ba mivile 'diyi e'yo ewaru ma alia 'bani yi ofuzu okposi aku azini kokoru.
nyn_prompt: Ab'obushoborozi ahabyaro, barangirire enteekateeka y'okutereeza omwanya, kugira ngu habeho entunguuka ensya, ekirikureetera amaka maingi kutabaasa. N'ekyarugiremu, abantu baawe bari omu kabi k'okubingwa bataine butaaho obundi.

eng_prompt: In light of the recent changes in policy, it is crucial for our team to gather and discuss the implications. We have scheduled a meeting with the relevant stakeholders to address these concerns.
lug_prompt: Okusinziira ku nkyukakyuka ezaakaggwa mu nkola, kya mugaso nnyo eri ttiimu yaffe okukungaana n'okuteesa ku biyinza okuvaamu. Tutegese olukungaana n'abakwatibwako okukola ku nsonga zino.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki aloka-loka ma otime cokcok-ki I cik, pire tek tutwal pi tim megwa me cokke ka nywako tam I kom adwogi ne. Wayubu kacoke ki joo ma lok tye I komgi me cobo peko magi.
teo_prompt: Katupitos aijulanakineta nueyapiete pac kotoma ainapeta, ejokuna noi etimu wok atukonokin kosodete aitemitem nuepedorete atakanun. Apotu sio etemokisi airiamunet keda itunga lu epodokinito aitemokin atiokisio nu.
lgg_prompt: Ojata o'diru azita ma alia 'diyi ma e'yosi, eri orodriru ama vile amuti yi okuzu azini agbatara gbazu e'yo yi 'yepi 'diyi ma dria. Ama otu dri fuza 'ba e'yo 'yepi 'diyi pie e'yo ewaru 'diyi ma aza kozu.
nyn_prompt: Kurugirira aha mpindahinduka ezibaireho omu biragiro, ni kikuru tiimu yaitu kwegaita n'okuhanuura aha birikukwataho. Tutebekaniise orukiiko n'abu kirikukwataho kukora aha nshonga ezi.

eng_prompt: When critical questions are met with hostility and dismissal, it creates an environment of fear and conformity. As a result, individuals may feel compelled to abandon their inquiries and accept the status quo.
lug_prompt: Ebibuuzo ebikulu bwe bisisinkana obulabe n'okugobwa, kireetawo embeera y'okutya n'okugoberera. N'ekivuddemu, abantu bayinza okuwulira nga bawaliriziddwa okulekawo okubuuliriza kwabwe n'okukkiriza embeera eriwo.
ach_prompt: Kace kipenyo lapeny mapigi tego ki gero ki ryemo gi, man kelo lworo ki winyo lok pa dano. Macalo adwogi ne, dano twero winyo ni omyero guwek lapeny gi dok guyee kit ma jami tye kwede.
teo_prompt: Arai itodolikinio aingiseta nuepolok keda amumu ka aibiror, itolomuni akwap na akurianu ka acamanar. Kanuka ngun, epedorete itunga ajalakin aingiseta kec kosodete acamun ejautene loejai.
lgg_prompt: Ba ka zita e'yo onzi 'yepi 'diyi esu aokosi azini 'ba ka yi dro ra, eri angu orisi azini e'yo 'yezu 'diyi eji. E'yo 'disi, 'ba yi ma ngulupisi 'diyi eco ovu asi omiza be e'yo yini 'diyi kuzu va azini yi a'i e'yo yi 'yepi sawa 'disi 'diyi ra.
nyn_prompt: Ebibuuzo ebirikukwata aha nshonga zikuru ku birikushangwa n'obwinazi n'okubingwa, nikireetaho okutiina n'okwikiriza. N'ekyarugiremu, abantu nibabaasa kwehurira nibagyemeserezibwa kureka ebi barikwenda kandi baikirize embeera eriho obwahati.

eng_prompt: As the sun began to set, the quiet streets of Masaka were suddenly disrupted by the sound of screeching tires. A group of masked men emerged from the shadows, ready to execute their daring plan.
lug_prompt: Enjuba bwe yatandika okugwa, enguudo z'e Masaka ezaali zisirifu zaataataaganyizibwa olw'amaloboozi g'emipiira. Ekibinja ky'abasajja abaali bambadde masiki kyava mu kizikiza nga beetegefu okutuukiriza enteekateeka yaabwe.
ach_prompt: I kare ma ceng ocako poto, dwan mupira tyen motoka ma obedo kaling alinga obalo gudu me Masaka. Dul pa coo ma oruko labo dog ki um gua ki I col piny, ma oyubbe me cobo miti gi.
teo_prompt: Neageuna akolong aibiror, apotu irotin luililingi luko Masaka itolitolunos keda iporotoi luka amopiran nuka emotoka. Abu egurupu loka ikiliok luejaasi keda aitabala naka ekume keda aituk kolom, ekapakina aitodolikin ainapeta kec.
lgg_prompt: Etuka ni e'doria 'boria, o'duko mupira ma o'duko si ri eza nzila Masaka ni 'diyi ra. Ongulumu agupi afa andreti a'buzuri be 'diyi efu engazu angu aliru 'diyi ma alia ngonde otita yini asi driasi 'diyi 'yezu.
nyn_prompt: Eizooba ku ryatandikire kurenga, enguuto za Masaka ezirikwetuura zikateganisibwa orwari rw'emipiira. Guruupu y'abashaija abarikujwara za masiki bakaruga omu bicuucu, beteekateekire kukora enteekateeka yaabo.

eng_prompt: As the new manager, he faces the daunting task of rebuilding trust within the team. The recent changes in leadership have left many employees feeling uncertain about their future.
lug_prompt: Ng'omutendesi omuggya, ayolekedde omulimu omuzibu ogw'okuzzaawo obwesige mu ttiimu. Enkyukakyuka ezaakakolebwa mu bukulembeze zirese abakozi bangi nga tebalina bukakafu ku biseera byabwe eby'omu maaso.
ach_prompt: Macalo lador tic manyen, en tye ki tic matek tutwal me roco gen ikin luticce. Aloka-loka ma otime cokcok-ki I tela oweko lutic mapol tye ki lworo I kom anyimgi.
teo_prompt: Kwape eyaiton loitetet, etereikina ngesi keda aswam na etiono noi naka aiduk amunokina kotoma otimu. Aijulanakineta nuka engarenok pac ajalakisi eswamak luipu mam ejenete nuikamunitos oingaren kec.
lgg_prompt: Ekile 'ba ocepiri ru, eri dri fu e'yo ewaru asi'baza sizu amuti nde ma eselea ri be. Ojata driceza ni o'diru 'diyi fe azi'ba karakara eyini aa'zu asi otiza be ewu ewu drialeri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Nk'omwebembezi omusya, aine omurimo gw'amaani gw'okugaruka kugaruraho obwesigye omu tiimu. Empindahinduka z'obwebembezi ezibaireho obwahati, zisigaire abakozi baingi bateine buhame aha biro byabo by'omumaisho.

eng_prompt: After a lengthy trial filled with unexpected twists, the judge delivered the verdict. The gravity of the situation hit me when I heard the amount I was required to pay.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okuwulira omusango okumala ebbanga eddene nga mulimu ebintu bingi ebyewuunyisa, omulamuzi yawa ensala ye. Obuzibu bw'embeera bwannuma bwe nnawulira ssente ze nnali nnina okusasula.
ach_prompt: Ingee winyo pido pi kare malac ma opong ki aloka-loka ma pe byek tye I komgi, langol kop ongolo kop. Peko madit tutwal omako wiya I kare ma awinyo wel cente ma omyero acul.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka apak naepol noi naka aipup emusago ngol, abu ekatubon koinak etube. Apotu eong ajenutu ationis naepol noi naarai apupunit eong etiai lo ebeit eong aitac.
lgg_prompt: E'yo liza 'bori ma vutia, e'yo 'bani ega kokoru 'diyi pie, 'ba e'yo lipiri fe e'yo liza ra. E'yo ewaru e'yo 'di ma dria ri gba ma ma dria mani sende 'bani le ma ofe ri erizu 'bori ma vutia.
nyn_prompt: Ahanyima y'okuhurira orubanja rwabo kumara obwire buraingwa, omuramuzi akaha encwa. Oburemeezi bw'embeera bukankwataho ku naahuriire esente ezi naabaire nyine kushashura.

eng_prompt: To ensure that the project stays on track and meets its objectives, it is essential to establish clear benchmarks. These benchmarks will serve as critical points of reference throughout the project's lifecycle.
lug_prompt: Okukakasa nti pulojekiti esigala ku mulamwa n'etuukiriza ebigendererwa byayo, kyetaagisa okuteekawo emitendera emituufu. Ebipimo bino bijja kukozesebwa ng'ebifo ebikulu eby'okukozesa mu bulamu bwa pulojekiti yonna.
ach_prompt: Me neno ni yub eni tye kawot maber dok ocobo miti ne, pire tek tutwal me keto jami ma mite pi yub eni. Yub eni obi tiyo macalo yoo me tic ma pire tek tutwal I kare weng me kwo pa yub eni.
teo_prompt: Kanu awanyun ebe ebuni epurojekt aitodolikin apeleikinata ke, ibusakinit aitolomun nutupitono. Epote aanyuneta nu aswam kwape aanyunet naepol noi kotoma apak naka epurojekt.
lgg_prompt: Otita 'da ni aa'zu geri kililiru 'diyisi azini ecozu e'yo erini lele 'diyi 'yezu, eri orodriru e'yo 'bani ecozu eyi 'yezu 'diyi 'bazu kililiru. E'yo 'diyi nga azi nga ekile e'yo orodriru 'bani ecozu eyi 'yezu sa'wa dria otita 'da ni i'yezu ri le.
nyn_prompt: Okureeba ngu purogyekiti eguma omu muhanda n'okuhikiiriza ebigyendererwa byayo, n'eky'omugasho okutaho engyenderwaho nungi. Eby'okureeberaho ebi nibiija kukora nk'oburugo bw'amaani obw'okureeberaho omubwire bwa purogyekiti yoona.

eng_prompt: Each educational institution has unique needs and circumstances that may require different approaches to policy implementation. Therefore, it is essential to recognize the importance of tailoring guidelines to fit individual contexts.
lug_prompt: Buli ttendekero ly'ebyenjigiriza lirina ebyetaago eby'enjawulo n'embeera eziyinza okwetaagisa enkola ez'enjawulo okussa mu nkola amateeka. N'olw'ekyo, kya mugaso okutegeera omugaso gw'okukola ebiragiro okusinziira ku mbeera y'omuntu.
ach_prompt: Gang kwan acel-acel tye ki miti ki jami mapat-pat ma mito yoo mapat-pat me keto cik itic. Pi meno, pire tek tutwal me niang ber pa yubu cik ma lubbe ki ngo matye katimme.
teo_prompt: Kangol esomero ejaasi keda ipudesia luitegelikina keda ejautene lo ekotoi iponesio lu egelegela luka aitodolikin ainapeta. Kanuka ngun, ejokuna noi ajenun ajokis naka aitolomun ainapeta nuka aitodolikin akiro nuegelegela.
lgg_prompt: Pari dria onitani 'diyi ma afa lele azini e'yo yi 'yepi 'diyi ndu ndu ecopi lepi geri ndu ndu 'bani azita eyi 'bazu 'yeta ma alea 'diyi. Ka'dini, eri orodriru e'yo orodri 'bani azita eyi edezu e'yo ndundu eyi 'yezu 'diyi ma dria ri nizu.
nyn_prompt: Buri itendekyero ry'eby'obwegyese riine ebyetaago n'embeera zaaryo ezitarikushushana, ekirikwetengyesa enkora etarikushushana omu kuta ebiragiro omu nkora. N'ahabw'ekyo, n'eky'omugasho kumanya omugasho gw'okukora ebiragiro ebirikuhikaana n'embeera z'abantu.

eng_prompt: Attending academic events provides students with valuable networking opportunities and exposure to new ideas. These gatherings foster collaboration and inspire innovative thinking among peers.
lug_prompt: Okwetaba mu mikolo gy'ebyenjigiriza kiwa abayizi emikisa gy'okukolagana n'okufuna ebirowoozo ebipya. Enkungaana zino zitumbula enkolagana n'ebirowoozo ebipya mu bannaabwe.
ach_prompt: Bedo tye I yub me kwan weko lutino bedo ki gum me kubbe ki luwotgi ki bene nongo ngec manyen. Kacokke magi kelo ribbe ki tam manyen ikin luwot gi.
teo_prompt: Alosenen toma opucit loka asioman einakini esisiak arereng naka arucokina keda luce keda ajenun aomisio nuitetiak. Isinyikokitos airiamununeta nu aiswamanara ka aitolomun aomisio nuitetiak kanejaas ipaup.
lgg_prompt: E'yo onita ni 'diyi ma alia 'diyi fe sukulu anzi eyini drileba orodriru eyi ecizu eyi ma eselea azini e'yo o'diru 'diyi esuzu. Okuta 'diyi ti ecita ma omgbo otu azini egata o'diru 'diyi eji 'ba yi ma eselea.
nyn_prompt: Okuza aha mikoro y'eby'obwegyese, nikiheereza abeegi omugisha gw'okukorengana n'abandi n'okumanya ebiteekateeko ebitsya. Enteerane ezi nizitunguura okukwatanisa n'okujumbura omu bantu.

eng_prompt: I never expected to see her at a political rally; she always seemed more interested in art than in politics. Given her background, it would be quite surprising if she decided to run for office.
lug_prompt: Nnali sisuubira kumulaba ku lukungaana lw'ebyobufuzi; bulijjo yalabika ng'ayagala nnyo eby'emikono okusinga ebyobufuzi. Okusinziira ku byafaayo bye, kyandibadde kyewuunyisa nnyo singa asalawo okwesimbawo.
ach_prompt: Pe abedo ki byek me neno nyakoni I coko me cungu iwi bye mapat-pat; en pol kare nen calo obedo ki miti I kom lok me goyo cal me loyo lok me cungu iwi-bye. Ma lubbe ki kit ma en odongo kwede, bibedo me ur tutwal ka en omoko tamme me cung I yer.
teo_prompt: Mam eong aomit ebe abuni eong aanyun ngesi kotoma aisup aseeta; esubit bala amina ngesi noi akiro nuka aputosia adepar nuka epolitikis. Koipone kalo iswamator ngesi, ebuni aumok arai koseu ngesi aibwo kanu eyapiesi.
lgg_prompt: Ma egani nga eri ndre ongulumu politiki ni 'diyi ma alia ku; eri e'da kile sawa driasi ava e'da gbaza ma dria aga e'yo politiki ni 'diyi ma dria. E'yo erini engazu 'bori ma e'yosi, eri te ovu osutaru ka asi 'du pa sozu ofisi ma alia ra ria.
nyn_prompt: Tinkabaire ninteekateeka kumureeba omu ruteerane rw'eby'obutegyeki, buriijo akaba naakunda eby'emikono kukira eby'obutegyeki. Okurugiirira ahaku yaakuriire, nikibaasa kututangaaza yaasharamu kwesimbaho ahabwa ofiisi.

eng_prompt: As the sun began to rise over the track, the atmosphere buzzed with excitement and anticipation. Among the crowd of competitors, two athletes stood at the starting line, each focused on their own goals.
lug_prompt: Enjuba bwe yatandika okuvaayo ku luguudo lw'eggaali y'omukka, embeera yajjudde essanyu n'okusuubira. Mu kibinja ky'abavuganya, bannabyamizannyo babiri baayimirira ku layini y'okutandika, buli omu ng'assa essira ku biruubirirwa bye.
ach_prompt: I kare ma ceng ocako aa malo iwi gudu, yomcwiny ki byek madit omako dano mapol tutwal. I kin dano ma onongo gitye ka pyem, lungwec aryo gucung I ka cako pyem, ngat acel-acel oketo cwinye I kom yub ma mege.
