ach_prompt: Nicake I kacokke meggi me acel, mar obedo tye ikingi. Gunongo jami ma rom oyot tutwal ma okelogi cok.
teo_prompt: Ageun airiamunet kec nasodit, ajai aimorikikina naepol noi kidingikec. Apotu kesi kodumutu atiokisio nuetapit kesi aimorikikin.
lgg_prompt: E'dozu yi ma dri fuza okori ma alia, yi ma eselea aa'ta onyiru ni ci. Eyi esu mbeleru e'yo eyi ecipi eyi ma eselea tualu e'yo eyini lele tualu 'diyi eyini eyi ejizu eyi ma eselea ogogo.

eng_prompt: I'm curious to know more about you. Can you tell me about your hometown?
lug_prompt: Njagala nnyo okumanya ebisingawo ebikukwatako.
ach_prompt: Amito ngeyo jami mapol I komi.
teo_prompt: Akoto eong ajenun nuipu nuikamunitos jo.
lgg_prompt: Ale saaru e'yo nizu mi ma dria drile.

eng_prompt: After completing her undergraduate degree, she decided to pursue her master's in a city known for its prestigious university. It was a significant move for her career and personal growth.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okumaliriza ddiguli ye eyasooka, yasalawo okusoma eya masita mu kibuga ekimanyiddwa olw'ettutumu lya yunivasite yaakyo. Kyali kya mugaso nnyo eri omulimu gwe n'okukula kwe.
ach_prompt: Ingee tyeko kwane me digiri me acel, en omoko tamme me kwano digiri me aryo I gang kwan me yunibaciti ma oywek tutwal. Man obedo gin ma pire tek tutwal I kwone ki dongo mege.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka angetakin edigurike, abu ngesi koseu aisisia edigurike loiyareit koibuga loejenara kanu eunibasite ke loejok. Arai ngin ibore yenepol noi kanuka aswamuke keda apoloke.
lgg_prompt: Erini i vile diguri okori dezu 'bori ma vutia, eri asi e'yo 'du i vile diguri irizuri 'yezu aku ambori ma alia 'bani nile eri vile university okporu 'diyisi. Eri ndra e'yo azi okporuni eri vile azi ngazuri ma dria tualu zota eri ma ngulupiniri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okuhendera diguri ye y'okubanza, akasharamu kwega diguri ya kabiri omu rurembo orwamanyirwe ahabwa yunivasite yaayo ey'ekitiinisa. Kikaba eky'omugasho aha murimo gwe hamwe n'okutunguuka kwe nk'omuntu.

eng_prompt: We've spent countless hours together over the years, sharing stories and experiences. Our friendship has grown strong through all the ups and downs we've faced.
lug_prompt: Tumaze essaawa nnyingi nga tuli wamu okumala emyaka, nga tugabana ebyafaayo n'ebyo bye tuyiseemu. Omukwano gwaffe gweyongedde okunywera mu biseera byonna ebirungi n'ebibi bye tuyiseemu.
ach_prompt: Wabedo kacel pi cawa mapol tutwal I mwaki ma okato angec, wanywako lok ki jami ma otimme I kwowa. Laremwa odongo matek tutwal I kare ma wakato ki I peko ki peko mapol.
teo_prompt: Idau sio isawan luipu nepepe kokaru lu atuboros, aimor akiro keda akiro nuiswamasi. Apolor epaperone wok kotoma apakio nuarokok keda nuarokok nuetereikina keda sio.
lgg_prompt: Ama eza sa'wa karakara tualu eli agapi 'bo 'diyi ma alea, e'yo ama ni 'diyi awazu tualu e'yo amani esu 'diyi pie. Ama ma agyi eca okporu e'yo muke azini onzi dria amani esu 'diyi ma talasi.

eng_prompt: We've known each other for years and have shared countless memories together. Our kids often play together, and we enjoy spending weekends as a group.
lug_prompt: Tumanyiganye okumala emyaka era tugabana ebintu bingi bye tujjukira nga tuli wamu. Abaana baffe batera okuzannyira awamu era enkomerero ya wiikendi tugibeerako wamu ng'ekibinja.
ach_prompt: Wangeye pi mwaki mapol dok bene watye ki jami mapol ma wigi poo I komwa ka watye kacel. Lutino wa pol kare gituko kacel, dok wanongo mit pa bedo kacel i tum cabit.
teo_prompt: Ijeni sio yenice adaun ikar luipu ido imorata sio akiro nuipu nepepe. Etapit duc idwekosi abolia nepepe, ido imina sio aiboikin angeset naka esabiti kwape egurupu.
lgg_prompt: Ama ebi ni ama ma eselea eli karakara dika ama awa e'yo amani ega 'diyi tualu karakara. Ama vile anzi 'diyi tuni avita avi tualu, azini ama ayiko esu o'du sabiti ni i deria 'diyi ovuzu ongulumu ru.
nyn_prompt: Tutwire nitumanyana okumara emyaka mingi kandi twine ebintu bingi ebi twagiira hamwe. Abaana baitu buriijo nibazaanira hamwe, kandi nitukunda kumara wiikendi nka guruupu.

eng_prompt: I've spent many weekends at their house, sharing meals and stories. They are a wonderful family that I've grown close to over the years.
lug_prompt: Nze mmaze wiikendi nnyingi mu maka gaabwe, nga tugabana emmere n'emboozi. Ba famire ya kitalo gye nfunye enkolagana ey'oku lusegere okumala emyaka.
ach_prompt: Abedo I ganggi I tum cabit mapol, ka camo cam ki nywako lok kwedwa. Gin gubedo jo me ot maber tutwal ma abedo cok kwedgi pi mwaki ma okato angec.
teo_prompt: Adaunit eong isabitin luipu oreriakec, aimor inyamat keda awaragasia. Eraas kesi ekale loejok noi loapotu eong apotu idunyasi keda kes kokaru lu atuboros.
lgg_prompt: A'bi sabiti ni i deria 'diyi yi vile akua tre, nyaka nyazu tualu azini e'yo o'yozu tualu. Yi familia azi onyiru mani zozu yi ma eselea eli agapi 'bo 'diyi'i.
nyn_prompt: Nmazire wiikendi nyingi omuka yaabo, niturya hamwe kandi tukagamba hamwe. N'eka y'omutaano ei ntungire haihi kumara emyaka mingi.

eng_prompt: After all the years we've spent together, sharing both laughter and tears, I can't imagine my life without them. Through thick and thin, they've always been there to support me.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'emyaka gyonna gye tumaze ffembi, nga tuseka era nga tukaaba, sisobola kulowooza ku bulamu bwange nga sirina bo. Mu biseera ebirungi n'ebibi, babaddewo okunnyamba.
ach_prompt: Ingee mwaki mapol ma wabedo kacel, nyero ki koko, pe atwero tamo I kom kwo na labongo gin. I kare maber ki marac, gubedo tye me konya.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ikar luapotu sio adautu nepepe, aimor keda aimony, mam eong apedori aomoom aijaraka komamei kesi. Kotoma ojautene loajokan keda loaronon, ajaasi kesi duc kanu aigang eong.
lgg_prompt: Eli dria amani aa'zu tualu 'bori ma vutia, guzu tualu azini owuzu tualu, ma econi ma idri yi kokoru ma e'da ku. E'yo muke azini onzi ma alea, eyi ebi ma ati sa'wa driasi.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'emyaka yoona ei tumazire hamwe, turikusheka kandi turikurira hamwe, tindikubaasa kuteekateeka aha magara gangye batabaho. Omu bwire burungi n'obubi, bakaba bariho kumpwera.

eng_prompt: As the sun began to set, casting a warm glow over the dusty road, a vehicle approached in the distance. The sound of its engine grew louder, revealing a rugged truck making its way toward the small village.
lug_prompt: Enjuba bwe yatandika okugwa ng'eyaka mu kkubo eririmu enfuufu, emmotoka yasemberera mu bbanga. Oluyoogaano lwa yingini yaayo lwagenda lweyongerayongera mu ddoboozi ery'omwanguka, ekyayongera okulaga loole eyali efuuse enfu ng'eyolekera ekyalo ekitono.
ach_prompt: Ikare ma ceng ocako poto, ma obedo ka ryeny I gudu ma opong ki apwa, motoka mo obino cok ki kama bor. Dwol pa injin odoko lamal tutwal, ma onyuto ni mutoka ma pe ber tye ka cito I caro matidi.
teo_prompt: Neageuna akolong aibiror, aica orot loejaasi keda icuc, abu emotoka kopotu kokinga. Abu eporoto loka eijinike kiyatakin noi, itodunit ebe ejai amotoka naerono elosi ocaalo loedit.
lgg_prompt: Etuka ni e'doria e'dozu 'dezu, aci driza be nzila irifuri ma dria, mutukari azi emu angu zoza ma alia. O'duko inzini ni ri tu uru, erini ani e'dazu mutukari okporu ni muzu angu caluniri vu.

eng_prompt: Traveling by air has become increasingly expensive over the years. Many passengers are shocked by the high ticket prices and additional fees.

lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lwa wiiki eziwera ez'enteeseganya n'okuteekateeka, okutuuka okwali kulindiriddwa okumala ebbanga eddene kwajja. Ttiimu yakungaanidde mu ssanyu ng'omutunzi aleese yintaneeti.
ach_prompt: Ingee cabit mapol me winye ki yube, yub ma dano obedo kakuru pi kare malac dong oo. Dul pa lutic gucokke ki miti madit tutwal I kare ma lacat jami okelo intanet.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka isabitin luipu luka ipegeta keda aitemonokin, abu ainapeta nu idaritai apak naepol noi kodolu. Apotu etimu kimorikikinos keda aiyalama naarai ayangau agwelanaran elago.

eng_prompt: As the entertainment landscape in Uganda evolves, more people are seeking diverse forms of leisure activities. This shift in consumer behavior has led to a surge in investments in the movie theatre sector.

teo_prompt: Kwape ejai aiboisit naka aitelelio ko Uganda, eutasi itunga luipu aimo iponesio luegelegela luka aitelelio. Aijulanakineta kotoma iponesio luka agwelak eyangaunit aiyatakinio naka ikapun kotoma aiboisio nuinwakere ibidion.

eng_prompt: We have made significant strides in developing the new project framework. However, there are still several elements that need refinement and adjustment.
lug_prompt: Tukoze enkulaakulana ey'amaanyi mu kukola enteekateeka ya pulojekiti empya. Newankubadde, wakyaliwo ebintu ebiwerako ebyetaaga okulongoosebwa n'okutereezebwa.

nyn_prompt: Tutungire entunguuka y'amaani omu kukora enteekateeka ya purogyekiti ensya. Kwonka, hakiriho ebintu bingi ebirikwetenga okutereera n'okuhindurwa.

eng_prompt: The medical team has identified a critical turning point in the patient's condition. Immediate monitoring and intervention will be crucial in the coming days.
lug_prompt: Ttiimu y'abasawo ezudde enkyukakyuka ey'amaanyi mu mbeera y'omulwadde. Okulondoola amangu n'okuyingira mu nsonga kijja kuba kya mugaso nnyo mu nnaku ezijja.

teo_prompt: Ajenutu etimu loka imurok aijulakin ejautene loka adekan. Aanyanar ka aingarakin katipet erai ibore yenepol noi kotoma aparasia nu ebunit.

nyn_prompt: Tiimu y'abashaho eshangire empindahinduka y'amaani omu mbeera y'omurwaire. Okucondooza ahonaaho n'okugarukamu nikiija kuba eky'omugasho omu biro ebireije.

eng_prompt: To better understand their unique challenges and aspirations, we must take the time to connect with each student personally. This approach will allow us to tailor our support to meet their specific needs.
lug_prompt: Okusobola okutegeera obulungi ebisoomooza byabwe eby'enjawulo n'ebigendererwa, tulina okutwala obudde okukwatagana ne buli muyizi kinnoomu. Enkola eno ejja kutusobozesa okuwa obuyambi bwaffe okusinziira ku byetaago byabwe.
ach_prompt: Me niang maber peko gi ki miti gi, omyero wanong kare me kube ki lutino kwan ki acel acel. Yoo man bikonyo wa me miyo kony ma rwatte ki miti gi.
teo_prompt: Kanu amisiikin ainingosia kec keda apeleikinata kec, ekot oni aimorikikin keda esisiak. Ebuni epone lo aingarakin oni aitodolikin agangat wok kanu aitodolikin ipudesia kec.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru eyini esu 'diyi vazu kililiru, le ama ma 'du sa'wa eyi ecizu sukulu mva alu alu be. Geri 'di ni nga fe amani atita amani 'diyi 'bazu e'yo eyini le 'diyi ma aza kozu.
nyn_prompt: Okubaasa kwetegyereza gye oburemeezi bwabo n'ebibarikwetenga, twine kutwara obwire kukwatanisa na buri mwegi nk'omuntu. Enkora egi neija kutubaasisa kuhikaanisa obuhwezi bwaitu n'ebyetaago byabo.

eng_prompt: In order to maintain focus and ensure a productive discussion, the organizers established strict guidelines for the meeting. Participants were informed that all questions and feedback would be addressed at the end of the session.
lug_prompt: Okusobola okukuuma essira n'okukakasa okukubaganya ebirowoozo okulungi, abategesi baateekawo ebiragiro ebikakali ku lukungaana. Abeetabye mu lukungaana baategeezebwa nti ebibuuzo byonna n'ebiteeso bijja kuddibwamu ku nkomerero y'olutuula.
ach_prompt: Me keto cwiny I kom lok ki neno ni nywako lok tye maber, luyub oketo cik matek tutwal pi kacokke ne. Ki niango joo ma obedo tye ni kibigamo lapeny gi weng I tum pa kacoke.
teo_prompt: Kanu aidar apodokinit ka aanyun ebe ejai aineranara najokan, apotu lu etemonokinak itolomutu ainapeta nuka airiamunet. Aponi olimokinai itunga ebe aingiseta kere keda aomisio kere eponio aitemokin kangetakinet naka airiamunet.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'ba eyini lezu asi 'bazu e'yo eyi ma dria kililiru, 'ba otupi 'diyi o'ba azita okporu eyi mitingi 'da ni. Ba lu 'ba emu'ba 'diyi dri kini 'ba nga e'yo nze zita dria eyi ma dria azini egata eyini fe 'diyi ma aza ko otita 'da ma vutia.

eng_prompt: To maintain productivity and focus, it's essential to keep discussions concise. Extended meetings can lead to fatigue and decreased engagement among participants.
lug_prompt: Okusobola okukuuma ebivaamu n'okussa essira, kikulu okukubaganya ebirowoozo mu bufunze. Enkiiko ezongezeddwayo ziyinza okuviirako obukoowu n'okukendeera kw'enkolagana mu beetabye.
ach_prompt: Pi weko tic owot maber ki keto cwiny I kom lok, pire tek tutwal me weko lok obed macek. Kacoke ma ki tero kare malac tutwal twero weko dano doko ool dok weko winye ikin gi doko nok.
teo_prompt: Kanu aidar eswamae loajokan ka apodokinit, ejokuna aitolot ineresinei kopone kaloejok. Airiamununeta nu iyatakitai epedorete ayangaun apasit ka aitidisiar aiswamanara kanejaas itunga.
lgg_prompt: Azi ngaza kililiru azini asi feza ma ta mbazu, eri orodriru e'yo nzeza ma ovu ewakokoru. Mitingi eyi ma sa'wa ezazuri eco fe 'ba eyini andezu azini e'yo eyini 'ye 'diyi ma omgbo esizu ra.
nyn_prompt: Okugumizamu n'omugasho, n'eky'omugasho okuhanuura omu bwijwire. Enkiiko ezirikwongyezibwaho, nizibaasa kureetaho oburuhe n'okukyendeeza okukwatanisa kw'abarikukyeejumbamu.

eng_prompt: When faced with unexpected shortages of essential goods, consumers often find themselves in a challenging predicament. Adapting to these changes quickly is crucial for maintaining daily routines and satisfaction.
lug_prompt: Bwe boolekagana n'ebbula ly'ebintu ebikulu, abaguzi batera okwesanga mu mbeera enzibu. Okukwatagana n'enkyukakyuka zino mu bwangu kya mugaso nnyo mu kukuuma emirimu gya buli lunaku n'obumativu.
ach_prompt: Kace ki nongo peko me nok pa jami ma mite pi kwo pa dano, luwil ipol kare nongo gitye I peko madit tutwal. Ngeyo aloka-loka magi oyot oyot obedo gin ma pire tek tutwal me gwoko yub me nino ki nino ki bedo ki yom-cwiny.
teo_prompt: Atereikina keda aikidiokus na iboro lu itwasamao, edumunenete agwelak awate kec ationis naepol noi. Ajenun aijulanakineta nu katipet erai ibore yenepol noi kanu aidar aswamisinei nuka nginiparan keda aiyalama.
lgg_prompt: Ba afa je'ba 'diyi ka e'yo ewaru e'yo afa 'bani ega kokoru 'diyi ma ako isu, eyi esu eyi e'yo ewaru ma alea. E'yo ojaza 'diyi ma ti ojizu mbeleru ri eri orodriru e'yo mini 'ye o'du driasi 'diyi ma tambazu azini ayiko esuzu.
nyn_prompt: Abaguzi ku barikutunga eibura ry'ebintu ebikuru, nibashanga oburemeezi bw'amaani. Okwetegyereza empindahinduka ezi juba n'eky'omugasho ahabw'okurinda emirimo yaawe eya buriizooba n'okumarwa.

eng_prompt: Many businesses were forced to adapt quickly to new market conditions during the pandemic. As a result, companies have re-evaluated their strategies and operations to meet evolving consumer demands.
lug_prompt: Bizineesi nnyingi zaakakibwa okumanyiira amangu embeera y'akatale empya mu kiseera ky'ekirwadde bbunansi. N'ekivuddemu, amakampuni gazzeemu okwekenneenya enkola n'emirimu gyago okusobola okutuukiriza ebyetaago by'abaguzi ebigenda bikyuka.
ach_prompt: Biacara mapol ki diyo gi me ngiyo ki jami matye katime I cuk ikare me poto pa gemo ni. Macalo adwogi ne, dul mapat-pat gityeko ngiyo kit ma tic gi tye ka wot kwede me cobo miti pa luwil matye ka lokke.
teo_prompt: Aponi kobuikinai ibiasaran luipu acamanar katipet keda ejautene loitetet loka esokoni kotoma apakio nuka ekorona. Kanuka ngun, apotu ikampunin iwanyutu iwaitin kec keda aswamisinei kec kanu aitodolikin ipudesia luka agwelak.
lgg_prompt: Tujura karakara eyi esu okpo eyi ojazu mbeleru e'yo cuu ni o'diru 'diyi ma alea sa'wa azo 'dezanirisi. E'yo 'disi, amuti 'diyi ma ale andri geri yini azi ngazu 'diyi dika eyini ani ecozu e'yo aje'ba eyini le 'diyi ma aza kozu.
nyn_prompt: Bizinesi enyingi zikagyemeserezibwa kuhikaana n'embeera y'akatare ensya omu bwire bw'endwara ruranda nsi. N'ekyarugiremu, kampuni zigarukire zaashwijuma oburyo bwazo n'emirimo yaazo kwenda kuhikiiriza ebyetengo by'abaguzi.

eng_prompt: After experiencing mild symptoms for a few days, I decided it was best to get tested for COVID-19. I anxiously awaited the results, hoping for the best.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okufuna obubonero obutono okumala ennaku ntono, nasalawo nti kyandibadde kirungi okwekebeza ekirwadde kya ssenyiga omukambwe. Nnalindirira n'obweraliikirivu ebyavaamu, nga nsuubira ebirungi.
ach_prompt: Inge nongo lanyut matino-tino pi nino manok, amoko tamma me pime pi two korona. Akuro adwogi ne ki miti madit tutwal, ki gen me nongo gin maber loyo weng.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ajaut keda aanyuneta nuepataka kanu apaarasia adis, abu eong aseun ebe ejokuna ainwakio kanuka adeka naka COVID-19. Abu eong aidar akiro ngun, aomit ebe ejokuna.
lgg_prompt: O'du were mani e'da azo COVID-19 niri esuzu 'bori ma vutia, asi 'du kini eri muke ndeni 'ba ma o'bizu azo COVID-19 nirisi. Ma te e'yo efupi 'diyi asi driasi asi 'baza be e'yo muke ndeni 'diyi ma dria.

eng_prompt: In recent weeks, many locals have expressed their growing frustration over disturbances in their neighborhood. The source of the issue has been identified as the nearby quarry operations.
lug_prompt: Mu wiiki eziyise, abatuuze bangi balaze obwennyamivu bwabwe obweyongera olw'obutabanguko mu kitundu kyabwe. Ensibuko y'ekizibu kizuuliddwa nga ebirombe ebiri okumpi.
ach_prompt: I cabit ma okato ni, lutedero mapol gunyutu cwer cwinygi pi tim gero matye I kabedogi. Ki niang ni gin ma okelo peko eni obedo tic me golo kidi ma cok ki kany.
teo_prompt: Kosabitin lu atuboros, apotu itunga luka atutubet kitodu aiyalongongokec kanuka amumu kotoma aiboisio kec. Aponi odumunai ebe alibunet naka ationis erai aibok amoru na idunyare.
lgg_prompt: Sabiti agapi 'bo 'diyi ma alea, 'ba karakara angu ma alea 'diyi e'da candi eyini esu e'yo ngiringiri ejipi angu eyini aa'zu 'diyi ma alea risi. Ba esu e'yo nde ma e'yo engapi angu 'bani oni ogbizuri ma agei tezuri'i.

eng_prompt: In response to growing concerns within the community, various initiatives have been launched to address social challenges. These programs aim to empower residents to take an active role in tackling pressing issues such as early pregnancies and early marriage.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula okweraliikirira okweyongera mu kitundu, enteekateeka ez'enjawulo zitandikiddwawo okukola ku kusoomoozebwa kw'embeera z'abantu. Pulogulaamu zino zigenderera kuwa abatuuze amaanyi okwenyigira ennyo mu kukola ku nsonga ez'amangu ng'okufuna embuto nga bakyali bato n'okufumbirwa nga bakyali bato.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me lworo matye kamede I kin lwak, yub mapat-pat kicako me tyeko peko ma dano tye ka kato ki iye. Yub eni tye ki miti me miyo kero ki lutedero me tic matek me lweny i kom peko mapigi tego macalo yacu con ki nyome con.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin aiyalongongo naka itunga, aponi kitegearai iponesio luegelegela luka aitemokin atiokisio nuka itunga. Alosikinet naka ainapeta ngun ngesi aitigogong itunga luka atutubet aitemokin atiokisio kwape nat alinganakin apotu ka alinganakin edukone.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru tupi ongulumu eyi ma eselea 'diyi ma aza kozu, 'ba e'do e'yo ndundu eyi e'yo ewaru 'ba eyi ma eselea 'diyi ma aza kozu. Otita 'diyi ma asisile okpo fezu 'ba aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyini azi okporu 'yezu e'yo okporu ekile okporovu eyi esuzu drioru azini aje eyi 'duzu drioru 'diyi ma aza kozu.

eng_prompt: In recent years, there has been a noticeable increase in local talent and storytelling in Uganda. As a result, filmmakers are gaining more recognition and support for their creative projects.
lug_prompt: Mu myaka egiyise wabaddewo okweyongerayongera mu bitone n'okunyumya emboozi mu Uganda. N'ekivuddemu, abakola firimu bafuna okusiimibwa n'obuwagizi eri pulojekiti zaabwe ez'obuyiiya.
ach_prompt: I mwaki ma okato cokcok-ki, wel dano ma gitye ki diro me goyo ododo I lobo Uganda omede tutwal. Macalo adwogi ne, joo ma yubu filim tye ka nongo pwoc ki kony pi yub gi.
teo_prompt: Kokaru lu atuboros, ejai apol naka atalanta keda aitetem awaragasia ko Uganda. Kanuka ngun, eutasi itunga luiswamaete ifilimun aijen keda agangat kanu ipurojektin kec luitetiak.

eng_prompt: In a vibrant community, residents gathered to share their stories and experiences, eager to engage in meaningful conversations. As the sun set, the excitement grew for the premiere of a documentary that captured their voices and concerns.
lug_prompt: Mu kitundu ekijjudde essanyu, abatuuze baakuÅ‹Å‹aanye okugabana emboozi zaabwe n'ebyo byebayitamu, nga beesunga okwetaba mu mboozi ez'amakulu. Ng'enjuba egwa, essanyu lyeyongera olw'okwolesebwa kw'ekiwandiiko ekyakwata amaloboozi gaabwe n'ebibaluma.
ach_prompt: I kabedo ma opong ki yomcwiny, lutedero gugure me nywako lok komgi ki jami ma otimme I kwogi, ma cwinygi obedo yom me nywako lok matye ki tyen lok. I kare ma ceng tye ka poto, yom-cwiny omedde pi nyuto vidio manyen ma omako dwon gi ki peko gi.
teo_prompt: Kotoma atutubet naejok noi, apotu itunga kotukokinos kanu aimor akiro kec keda akirokec, ekotosi aitolot ineresinei luejokuka. Neadolio akolong, abu aiyalama kiyatakin kanu aitodiar akiro nuikamunitos akiro kec keda aiyalongongokec.
lgg_prompt: Ongulumu 'da ma alea, 'ba aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi tra eyi e'yo eyi ma dria 'diyi awazu, eyini ava be e'yo nzezu e'yo orodriru 'diyi ma alea. Etuka ni ecaria 'boria, ayiko tu uru e'yo 'bani e'dazu e'yo yi 'yepi 'diyi ma o'duko azini e'yo yi 'yepi 'diyi ma dria.

Eizooba ku ryatandikire kurenga, okushemererwa kweyongyeire ahabw'okworekwa kwa vidiyo eyabaire neekwata eiraka ryabo hamwe n'ebibarikuteekateekaho.

eng_prompt: As the film rolled, the crowd leaned forward in their seats, eager to see familiar faces and places come to life on the big screen. The energy in the room was palpable, a mix of nostalgia and pride that electrified the atmosphere.
lug_prompt: Nga ffirimu egenda mu maaso, abantu beefukamidde mu bifo byabwe, nga beesunga okulaba ffeesi n'ebifo ebimanyiddwa nga bijja mu bulamu ku lutimbe olunene. Amaanyi agaali mu kisenge gaali geeyoleka bulungi, era embeera yali ejjudde okwegomba n'amalala.

lgg_prompt: E'doria senema 'da ri ni muzu drile, 'ba emu'ba 'diyi so pa drile kiti eyivile 'diyi ma alea, ava be ndrezu 'ba eyini nile 'diyi ma andretia azini angu eyini nile 'diyi ecazu idriru afa ondredrea ru 'diyi ma dria. Okpo jo ale aliza ma alia ri ndra e'dazaru, e'yo asi otiza ni 'diyi tualu afusi 'diyi pie angu 'da ma alea.

Participants were encouraged to unleash their creativity and step into the spotlight, ready to engage in spontaneous performances.
lug_prompt: Nga ebitaala bikendeera n'okusanyuka mu kisenge kweyongera okweyoleka, omutegesi yalangirira nti akawungeezi tekujja kuba ka kwolesebwa kwokka wabula n'okukwatagana. Abeetabamu baakubirizibwa okusumulula obuyiiya bwabwe n'okuyingira mu kitangaala, nga beetegefu okwenyigira mu by'okuyimba.
ach_prompt: I kare ma mac obedo ka rweny dok yom-cwiny I ot ne omede ki nen, won gang owaco ni otyeno ne pe bibedo me nyuto jami keken ento bene bibedo jami matye katime ikin dano. Kicuku cwiny joo ma obedo tye i yub eni me cako tic ki diro gi me bedo ki miti me timo jami mapat-pat.
teo_prompt: Neautar akimian aibiror kosodi aiyalama kotoma agola, abu loitolosi alimor ebe mam abong ngin erai aitodiaret bon konye erai aitodiaret naka aineranara. Aponi isinyikokinai itunga aitolomun acoasineikec kosodete alomar toma aijen, ekapakina aitolot aswamisio nuepedorete kesi aswam.

Abaabaire bejumbiremu bakahigwa kutaho oburyo bwabo bw'okujumbura, kugira ngu bagume beeteekateekire kwejumba omu byeshongoro ebitarikushushana.

eng_prompt: In light of the upcoming financial obligations, the management team sought guidance on optimizing cash flow. After reviewing their current payment schedule, the financial advisor recommended a proactive approach.
lug_prompt: Olw'obuvunaanyizibwa bw'ensimbi obujja, abaddukanya emirimu baanoonya okulambikibwa ku ngeri y'okukozesaamu obulungi ensimbi. Oluvannyuma lw'okwekenneenya enteekateeka yaabwe ey'okusasula eriwo kati, omuwabuzi w'ebyensimbi yawa amagezi ku nkola ey'obwegendereza.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki peko me lim matye kabino anyim, ludito tic guyenyo kony me tic ki cente. Ingee ngiyo yub me cul ma gitye kwede, lamii tam i kom lim owaco ni omyero ki tii ki yoo acel.
teo_prompt: Katupitos nuikamunitos ikapun lu ebunit, abu eyaitene kilip aingarenikinio kanu aitodolikin epone loka adumun ikapun. Akaulo naka airereor ainapeta kec nuka aitac, abu ecoran loka ikapun kicorak ebe ibusakinit kesi aswam ngun koipone kaloejok.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru e'yo robia ni 'diyi ma dria 'diyi ma e'yosi, amuti driceza ni 'diyi nda imbata geri ecozu robia ayuza ma omgbo otuzu ri ma dria. eng_prompt: Years of conflict have left deep scars on the nation, impacting every aspect of life for its citizens. As communities struggle to rebuild, the lingering consequences of violence continue to haunt them.

lgg_prompt: E'yo a'di ni eli karakara 'diyi ku wura onzi kari ma dria, e'yo onzi 'yepi e'yo dria kari anzi yini 'diyi ni 'diyi ma dria. Ongulumu eyini dri ciria eyi sizu o'diru, e'yo ngiringiri ni 'diyi nga po'di eyi ma aza ko.

eng_prompt: After careful consideration of the project's needs and potential impact, the committee reached a unanimous decision. They recognized that timely funding was crucial for its success.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okulowooza ennyo ku byetaago bya pulojekiti n'ebiyinza okuvaamu, akakiiko kaatuuka ku kusalawo okw'awamu. Baakitegeera nti okuvujjirira mu budde kyali kikulu nnyo eri obuwanguzi bwakyo.
ach_prompt: Ingee tam matut I kom jami ma mite pi yub eni ki adwogi ma twero bedo tye, dul ne omoko tamgi labongo jemo. Gu niang ni nongo lim ikare ki kome obedo gin ma pire tek pi cobo miti ne.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka aomoom ejok nuikamunitos ipudesia luka epurojekt keda epone loepedoriata kesi aitodolikin, apotu ekomiti kodolokisi aseunet. Apotu kesi kojenutu ebe agangat na ikapun kotoma apak erai ibore yenepol noi kanu akerianut ke.
lgg_prompt: E'yo otita 'da ni 'diyi ma ale andrizu kililiru 'bori ma vutia, komiti 'da esu e'yo 'du ti. Eyi esu ra kini robia esuzu sa'wa dria ri eri orodriru e'yo nde ni ecazu drile suzaru.

eng_prompt: Through targeted training programs and resource allocation, local farmers have gained access to essential knowledge and tools. As a result, the communities have been empowered with agricultural skills.
lug_prompt: Okuyitira mu pulogulaamu z'okutendekebwa n'okugaba ebyetaago, abalimi b'omu kitundu bafunye amagezi n'ebikozesebwa ebikulu. N'ekivuddemu, ebitundu biweereddwa obukugu mu byobulimi n'obulunzi.
ach_prompt: I kare me pwonye ki poko jami, lupur me tedero gunongo ngec ki jami tic mapigi tego. Macalo adwogi ne, lwak gunongo diro me pur.

eng_prompt: To foster creativity and learning, it's essential to provide young children with stimulating activities. Engaging their curiosity helps them develop critical thinking skills from an early age.
lug_prompt: Okutumbula obuyiiya n'okuyiga, kya mugaso okuwa abaana abato emirimu egisikiriza. Okukubiriza okwagala okumanya kwabwe kibayamba okukulaakulanya obusobozi bw'okulowooza okuva mu myaka emito.
ach_prompt: Pi dongo diro ki kwan, pire tek tutwal me miyo jami ma yomo cwiny lutino. Bedo ki miti me ngeyo jami ma gitye kwede konyogi me dongo diro me tam ma beco cako I kare ma pud gitino.

lgg_prompt: Afa edele o'diru azini onita ma omgbo otuzu, eri orodriru anzi nyiri eyini 'yeta ava engapi 'diyi fezu. Yi ma ava engazu e'yo onizu ri ma alia ri ni yi ma aza ko ondua e'yo egazu kililiru 'diyi ezozu e'dozu eli werea 'diyi ma alia.

eng_prompt: By fostering open communication and collaboration among team members, they can better understand the strategies being implemented. This approach ensures that everyone is aligned and ready to engage with the campaign managers effectively.
lug_prompt: Mu kutumbula empuliziganya ennungi n'okukwatagana mu bammemba ba ttiimu, basobola okutegeera obulungi enteekateeka eziteekebwa mu nkola. Enkola eno ekakasa nti buli omu akwatagana era mwetegefu okukolagana n'abaddukanya kampeyini obulungi.
ach_prompt: Ka ki cuku cwiny dano me lok ki winye ikin gi, man weko gi niang maber kit ma tic tye kawot kwede. Yoo man neno ni dano weng tye atera me lok ki ludor yub me bito kwir.
teo_prompt: Kowai lo aitopolor einer loepukora keda aiswamanara kanejaas itunga luka etimu, epedorete kesi amisikin iwaitin lu itwasamao. Iwaitin lu itodunitos ebe ekapakina itunga kere aiswamanar keda eyaitok luka ikampeins.

eng_prompt: Engaging in hands-on activities fosters a deeper understanding of the material. This interactive approach encourages active participation and collaboration among learners.
lug_prompt: Okwenyigira mu bikolwa eby'emikono kiyamba okutegeera ebintu mu bujjuvu. Enkola eno ey'okukolagana ekubiriza okwetaba n'okukolagana mu bayizi.

lgg_prompt: E'yo 'bani 'ba eyi ma dria 'diyi 'yezu ri ni fe 'ba eyini e'yo eyi 'yepi 'diyi vazu kililiru. Geri 'bani e'yo nzezu 'ba eyi ma eselea ri ni ava fe 'ba onita onipi 'diyi ma aa'zu tualu tualu tualu.

eng_prompt: The organization is committed to fostering an inclusive environment that promotes equality and supports the growth of all individuals. As part of this mission, we prioritize initiatives that focus on uplifting women in the workplace.
lug_prompt: Ekitongole kyewaddeyo okutumbula embeera erimu abantu bonna ekitumbula omwenkanonkano n'okutumbula enkulaakulana y'abantu bonna. Ng'ekimu ku bigendererwa bino, tukulembeza enteekateeka ezissa essira ku kutumbula abakyala ku mirimu.
ach_prompt: Dul eni tye ki miti me kelo kabedo ma dano weng tye iye ma weko dano weng bedo marom dok bene konyo dongo pa dano weng. Macalo but yub man, waketo cwiny wa I kom yub ma keto cwiny I kom ilo malo rwom pa mon I gang tic.
teo_prompt: Ekapakina erionget aitopolor aiboisit na imoriarit itunga kere ido igangit apol naka itunga kere. Kwape ediopet koboro kalu, isingarenit sio ainapeta nu isingarenitos angor kotoma aiboisio nuka aswam.
lgg_prompt: Amuti 'di owi i angu 'ba dria ma eselea trotroru azini atita fepi zota 'ba dria ma ngulupi ni 'diyi dri ri ezozu. E'yo 'di ma azi ru, ama e'yo okpo fepi oku eyini okpo fezu pari azi ngazu 'diyi ma alea 'diyi 'ba okporu.
nyn_prompt: Ekitongore kyehaireyo kureetaho embeera erikureetaho oburingaaniza n'entunguuka y'abantu boona. Nk'ekicweka ky'ekigyendererwa eki, nitwebembeza enteekateeka ezirikugyenderera okutunguura abakazi omu myanya y'emirimo.

eng_prompt: In today's competitive market, businesses must adapt to changing consumer preferences and environmental challenges. Embracing eco-friendly practices not only enhances brand reputation but also drives long-term profitability.
lug_prompt: Mu katale ka leero akavuganya, bizinensi zirina okutuukana n'okukyuka kw'ebyetaago by'abaguzi n'okusoomoozebwa kw'obutonde bw'ensi. Okwettanira enkola etali ya bulabe eri obutonde bw'ensi tekikoma ku kutumbula linnya lya kkampuni naye era kireeta amagoba mu bbanga eggwanvu.
ach_prompt: I kare man ma pyem tye matek tutwal I cuk, biacara omyero olokke ki miti pa luwil ki peko me cwec ma orumuwa. Lubo yoo me tic ma pe balo cwec ma orumuwa pe medo nying maber keken ento bene kelo magoba pi kare malac.
teo_prompt: Kotoma abolobol naka esokoni, ibusakinit ibiasaran acamun aijulakin iboro lu ekotosi agwelak keda ainingosia nuka akwap. Aitodolikin iponesio lumam iyuaritere alupok mam itojokari ekiror konye eyangauni ameda naka apak naepol.
lgg_prompt: E'yo a'bala ni ewu andruri ma alea, le tujari eyi ma 'ye e'yo 'ba afa je'baa 'diyi ma egata ojazu azini e'yo angu amani aa'zu alenia 'diyi pie. E'yo 'bani ecozu angu ama agei 'diyi ma ta mbazu kililiru 'diyi 'duzu ri ni lu e'yo 'bani 'ba eyi ma ru si ri ma omgbo otu ku te eri vini orodri eyini esu sa'wa ezu 'diyi ma alea ri ma omgbo otu.
nyn_prompt: Omu kataare k'erizooba akarimu okuhayahayana, bizinesi zishemereire kukorengana n'empindahinduka y'abaguzi hamwe n'oburemeezi bw'obuhangwa bw'ensi. Okukoresa emiringo etarikutokooza eby'obuhangwa tikirikumaraho kutunguura eiziina ry'eky'okureeberaho kyonka, kureka n'okureetaho amagoba omu bwire bureingwa.

eng_prompt: As the demand for local and sustainable food sources continues to rise, communities are looking for ways to become more self-sufficient. One valuable skill that can contribute to this goal is the art of beekeeping and honey production.
lug_prompt: Ng'obwetaavu bw'emmere eya wano era ey'obutonde bweyongera okulinnya, ebitundu binnoonya engeri y'okweyimirizaawo. Obukugu obumu obw'omugaso obusobola okuyamba ku kiruubirirwa kino bwe bukugu bw'okulunda enjuki n'okufulumya omubisi gw'enjuki.
ach_prompt: Kit ma miti me nongo cam ma aa ki icaro tye ka medde, lwak tye ka yenyo yoo me nongo cam ma mite pigi kengi. Diro acel ma pire tek ma twero konyo me cobo miti man obedo gwoko kic ki yubu moo kic.
teo_prompt: Kwape eyatakinor eipuda loka inyamat luka atutubet, eutasi itunga aimo iponesio luka aijar bon. Adiopet acoa naepol noi naepedori aitodolikin alosikinet kana ngesi aipit awo ka aitolom esike.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'ba eyini lezu nyaka engapi angu 'da ma alea sa'wa driasi ri ma omgbo ni tutu risi, ongulumu eyi geri nda eyini ani ecozu eyi ma ngulupi ma ta mbazu ra. Ondua azi orodriru ecopi azakoma fepi e'yo 'di ma dria ri eri e'yo anyu tambazu azini anyu ma edeta niri'I.
nyn_prompt: Nk'oku ebyetaago by'eby'okurya eby'omubyaro kandi ebirikubaasa kuguma nibigyenda nibyeyongyera, abantu nibasherura oburyo bw'okwebaisaho. Omuringo gumwe ogw'omugasho ogurikubaasa kuhwera omukuhikiiriza ekigyendererwa eki n'okuriisa enjoki n'obwoki.

eng_prompt: Planning ahead is essential for a smooth trip. One important aspect to consider is your vehicle's fuel levels.
lug_prompt: Okuteekateeka nga bukyali kya mugaso mu lugendo olulungi. Ekimu ku bintu ebikulu by'olina okulowoozaako ye mafuta g'emmotoka yo.
ach_prompt: Yubbe con pire tek tutwal pi wot maber. Gin acel ma pire tek ma omyero itam I kome en aye moo ma motoka ni tye kwede.
teo_prompt: Aitemonokin ngaren erai ibore yenepol noi kanu alosit ejok. Adiopebore naepol noi naibusakinit ijo aomoom ngesi adoketait na akinyet naka emotoka.

eng_prompt: It's important to monitor your fuel levels while driving. Running out of fuel can lead to unexpected engine issues.

teo_prompt: Erai ibore yenepol noi aanyanar adoketait na akinyet kon kapak kana airenge. Aitodolikin akinyet epedori ayangaun atiokisio nuka einjin.

eng_prompt: During the routine inspection of the heating system, the technician noticed a strange smell in the air. Upon closer examination, he discovered that the tube that connects to the oil tank is leaking.

ach_prompt: Ikare me ngiyo kit ma cuma ma lyeto ot tye ka tic kwede, ladiro ne oneno ngwec mo ma pe ngene I yamo. I kare ma en ongiyo maber, en oniang ni paipo ma kubu oil tank tye ka cwer.
teo_prompt: Kotoma apak naka aanyanar epone loka aicwe akipi, abu epirioit koany akinyet namam ejok kokwam. Kotoma aingic ejok, abu ngesi kodum ebe ejai apaipon naerucokinit akinyet atutubet.
lgg_prompt: Sawa 'bani afa angu drizani 'diyi andriria, 'ba e'yo 'yepi 'diyi ndre oli ma alia ava azi onzi ni. Erini angu andrizu kililiru 'bori ma vutia, esu kini payipu i ecipi tanki odu niri be ri ni tizu ra.

eng_prompt: To ensure optimal performance, it's crucial to maintain a consistent flow of fuel to your engine. Any interruptions in this supply can lead to significant declines in efficiency and power.
lug_prompt: Okukakasa enkola ennungi, kya mugaso okukuuma amafuta nga gakulukuta buli kaseera mu yingini yo. Okutaataaganyizibwa kwonna mu kubunyisa kuno kuyinza okuviirako okukendeera kw'obwangu n'amasannyalaze.
ach_prompt: Me neno ni injin tiyo maber, pire tek tutwal me weko moo omede I injin mamegi kare ki kare. Bal mo keken matye I yub man twero dwoko piny rwom me tic ki mac.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitodolikin eswamae loajokan, ejokuna noi aipikakin akinyet nejai einjin kon. Ationis adio na itolitol akorio na epedori aitodolikin aibiror naka eswamae loajokan keda akim.

ach_prompt: Ka itye ka ngwec ki cipid I gudu, iromo neno kit ma motoka ni tye ka jemo kwede. Jemo man pole tye macalo adwogi me jemo pa yamo, ma doko gin ma pire tek tutwal I dwiro madit tutwal.
teo_prompt: Neisinyikokinia jo esipidi korot loapolon, ipedori ijo aanyun ebe iyatakini emotoka kon. Erai agogongu na naepol noi naelomunit kotoma akerit naepol noi keda esipidi loepol noi.

eng_prompt: To ensure a safe and comfortable driving experience, it's important for drivers to maintain control of their vehicles. Smooth acceleration helps prevent sudden jolts that can affect both the driver and passengers.
lug_prompt: Okukakasa okuvuga obulungi n'obutebenkevu, kya mugaso abavuzi okukuuma obuyinza ku mmotoka zaabwe. Okuvugisa sipiidi obulungi kiyamba okutangira obubenje obuyinza okukosa omuvuzi n'abasaabaze.

lgg_prompt: E'yo mutukari ti ojizu kililiru azini kililiru ri nezu, eri orodriru dereva eyini mutukari eyivile 'diyi ma okpo ma ta mbazu. Motokari ma okpo otuza kililiru ri ni azakoma fe e'yo onzi ecopi 'ba dereva ni azini 'ba aci ni 'diyi biipi 'diyi atrizu.

eng_prompt: As you sit at the traffic light, take a moment to assess the vehicles around you and the potential risks involved. Remember that patience is key in ensuring a safe start when the signal changes.

ach_prompt: Ikare ma itye I mac me traffic, kwan kare mo me neno mutoka matye I nget ni ki peko ma twero bedo tye. Wii myero opo ni diyo cwiny obedo gin ma pire tek tutwal me neno ni icako maber kace alama ne olokke.
teo_prompt: Kwape iboikin jo aiboikin akimian nu orot, oyangarite amotokan nuejaasi jo keda atiokisio nuejaas. Kiituni ebe atitingikinit erai ibore yenepol noi kanu aitegear ageunet najokan arai ijulakin ekwam.

eng_prompt: By optimizing the vehicle's transmission system, we can enhance fuel efficiency during operation. As a result, the engine operates more smoothly and efficiently.
lug_prompt: Bwe tutereeza enkola y'emmotoka, tusobola okwongera ku bungi bw'amafuta ge tukozesa mu kudduka. N'ekivuddemu, yingini ekola bulungi era mu bwangu.

nyn_prompt: Twayongyera amaani omu nkora y'emotoka, nitubaasa kukoresa amajuuta marungi omu bwire bw'okugivuga. N'ekyarugiremu, ingini neekora kurungi.

eng_prompt: Understanding how engine performance varies with speed is crucial for optimizing fuel consumption. Many drivers may not realize that operating their vehicles at lower RPMs can lead to better efficiency.
lug_prompt: Okutegeera engeri yingini gy'ekola ku sipiidi kya mugaso nnyo mu kukendeeza ku mafuta g'okozesa. Abavuzi b'ebidduka bangi bayinza obutamanya nti okuvuga emmotoka zaabwe ku sipiidi eya wansi kisobola okuviirako okukola obulungi.
ach_prompt: Niang kit ma injin tiyo kwede ikare me dwiro obedo gin ma pire tek tutwal me tic ki moo maber. Ludwo mutoka mapol pe gitwero niang ni dwoyo mutokagi I RPM matidi twero weko gi tiyo maber.

lug_prompt: Nga tonnaba kutandika lugendo lwo, kwata akaseera olowooze ku ngeri esinga obulungi ey'okutuuka gy'ogenda. Kikulu okwewala ekintu kyonna ekiyinza okukulemesa mu kkubo.

teo_prompt: Kanu aidar esipidi loajokan ka aswam ejok, ejokuna ajenun ejautene loka amotokan koingaren. Ingarakini ngin jo alosit ejok kosodi aimono akim.

nyn_prompt: Okugumizamu n'okwiruka kurungi, n'eky'omugasho kumanya embeera y'ebiiruka omu maisho. Eki nikiija kukuhwera kugyenda gye kandi okarinda n'amashanyarazi.

eng_prompt: When driving, maintaining a steady pace is crucial for optimizing fuel efficiency. Frequent acceleration and sudden stops can lead to increased fuel consumption.
lug_prompt: Bw'oba ovuga, okukuuma sipiidi ennungi kya mugaso nnyo mu kwongera ku bungi bw'amafuta. Okuvuga sipiidi buli kaseera n'okuyimirira mu bwangu bisobola okwongera okusaasaanya amafuta.
ach_prompt: Ka itye ka dwoyo motoka, mede ki ngwec I dwiro marom pire tek tutwal pi tic ki moo maber. Ngwec ki tyeko ngwec tyen mapol twero balo moo.
teo_prompt: Neirengea jo, aidar esipidi loejok kanu aitwasam akinyet ejok. Aisiyengun noi keda aibwo katipet epedori ayangaun aitosom akinyet naepol noi.
lgg_prompt: Mi vile mutukari ti ojizurisi, muzu okposiri eri orodriru odu ma ayuta ma omgbo otuzu. Nzuta okposiri tualu pa soza mbeleru 'diyi eco fe odu ayuza ma omgbo ni tuzu ra.
nyn_prompt: Waaba novuga, okugyenda omu sipiidi n'eky'omugasho munonga ahabw'okukoresa amajuuta marungi. Okweyongyera kw'okwiruka hamwe n'okuyimirira ahonaaho, nikibaasa kureetaho okukoresa amajuuta maingi.

eng_prompt: To conserve fuel and reduce wear on your brakes, it's important to adjust your driving habits in certain situations. One effective technique is to shift into neutral when approaching stops.
lug_prompt: Okukekkereza amafuta n'okukendeeza ku kukozesa buleeki, kikulu okukyusa engeri gyovuga mu mbeera ezimu. Obukodyo obumu obulungi kwe kukyusa n'ogenda mu neutral nga osemberera okuyimirira.
ach_prompt: Me gwoko moo ki bene dwoko piny rweny pa burek, pire tek tutwal me loko kit ma itye ka ngwec kwede ikare mukene. Diro acel maber tutwal en aye me lokke me donyo I neutral kace itye ka cung.
teo_prompt: Kanu aidar akinyet ka aitidisiar aitosom isisan, ibusakinit jo aijulakin epone loka airenge kotoma ojautene ice. Adiopet ewai lo iswamai ejok ngesi aijulakin toma aiboisit naemamei iboro kapak kana ebwounor jo.
lgg_prompt: Odu ma ta mbazu azini brake ma rua ezaza esizu, eri orodriru mini mutukari ti ojizuri ojazu e'yo azi 'diyi ma alia. E'yo azi orodriru 'diyi ma azi eri mi ojazu e'yo yi 'yepi ku 'diyi ma alia mini ecaria pa sozuria.
nyn_prompt: Okubiika amajuuta hamwe n'okukyendeeza okujwara kwa bureeki zaawe, n'eky'omugasho okuhindura emize yaawe y'okuvuga omu mbeera ezimwe. Omuringo gumwe ogurikubaasa kukora gye n'okuhindura engyenderwaho yaawe ku orikuba ori haihi kwemerera.

eng_prompt: Recent studies have shown that vehicle performance can significantly improve with innovative technologies. One such advancement is the Alternating system, which enhances fuel efficiency and distance coverage.
lug_prompt: Okunoonyereza okwakakolebwa kulaga nti enkola y'emmotoka esobola okulongooka ennyo ne tekinologiya omupya. Emu ku nkulaakulana ng'ezo ye nkola ya Alternating, eyongera ku bungi bw'amafuta n'ebanga ly'olugendo.
ach_prompt: Kwed ma otime cokcok-ki onyuto ni yoo me tic pa mutoka twero yube tutwal ki diro me tet manyen. Alokaloka acel ma kit meno obedo yub me loko moo, ma medo rwom me tic ki moo ki bor piny.
teo_prompt: Itodunit aisisiaeta nuitetiak ebe epedori amotoka aswam ejok keda etatai loakwana. Adiopet kotoma aitopolorio kangin ngesi ainapeta nuka aijulanakineta nuka akinyet keda aiboisio nuegelegela.
lgg_prompt: E'yo eti ondaza o'diru 'diyi ece kini geri mutukari eyini azi ngazu ri eco tu ra e'yo tekenologia ni o'diru 'diyisi. Otuta alu 'dile 'diyi geri 'bani odu ayuzu kililiru azini angu acizu 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu ri'I.
nyn_prompt: Okucondooza okuhweireho kworeka ngu emikorere y'emotoka neebaasa kweyongyera n'ebya tekinorogye. Emwe aha ntunguuka nk'egyo n'enkora ya Alternating system, erikwongyera amajuuta n'orugyendo.

eng_prompt: Many drivers enjoy the feeling of fresh air while cruising on the highway. However, this seemingly harmless choice can have unintended consequences for their vehicle's performance.
lug_prompt: Abavuzi b'ebidduka bangi banyumirwa okuwulira empewo ennungi nga bavuga ku nguudo ennene. Newankubadde, okusalawo kuno okulabika nga okutaliiko bulabe kuyinza okuba n'ebiva mu nkola y'emmotoka yaabwe.
ach_prompt: Ludwo mutoka mapol gimaro winyo yamo maleng ka gitye ka ngwec I gudu madit. Kadi bed kumeno, moko tam man ma nen calo pe rac twero kelo adwogi ma pe kimito i kom tic pa mutokagi.
teo_prompt: Eminas iderepan luipu aipup ekwam loejok neirengeata kesi korot. Konye, aseunet na na esubit bala emamei aimusungeta epedori aitodolikin eswamae loka emotoka.
lgg_prompt: Dereva karakara eyi ayiko esu oli ala erini acizu nzila dria ria. Kani si, e'yo 'duza e'dapi e'yo onzi kokoru 'diri eco e'yo onzi 'ye mutukari ma agata ma dria ra.
nyn_prompt: Abavugi b'ebiiruka abingi nibashemererwa munonga ahabw'okuhurira empewo nungi baaba nibavuga aha nguuto. Kwonka, okusharamu oku okurikureebeka nk'okutari kw'akabi, nikubaasa kurugwamu oburemeezi aha nkora y'emotoka yaabo.

eng_prompt: If you're having trouble with your vehicle's features or maintenance, it's important to consult the appropriate resources. One of the best places to start is by locating your carâ€™s manual.
lug_prompt: Bw'oba olina obuzibu n'ebintu by'emmotoka yo oba okuddaabiriza, kyamugaso okwebuuza ku bantu abatuufu. Ekimu ku bintu ebisinga obulungi by'oyinza okutandikirako kwe kusoma ebitabo by'emmotoka yo.
ach_prompt: Kace itye ki peko ki kit motoka mamegi onyo yubu maber, pire tek me penyo kony ma mite. Kabedo acel maber me acaki kwede en aye me nongo buk ma nyutu kit ma mutoka ni tiyo kwede.
teo_prompt: Arai ijatatar ijo keda ationis keda iboro luka emotoka kon arai bo aitemonokino, ejokuna aingic akiro nuikamunitos iboro luedolitos. Adiopet kotoma aiboisio nuibusakinit jo ageun ngesi aimo eitabo loka emotoka kon.
lgg_prompt: Eka ovu e'yo ewaru be mutukari mivileri ma e'yo 'diyi pie, eri orodriru e'yo nzezu 'ba e'yo 'yepi kililiru 'diyi vu. Pari alu kililiru mini ecozu e'dozu ri buku mutukari mini 'diyi ma dria ri esuzu'i.
nyn_prompt: Ku oraabe oine oburemeezi n'ebintu by'emotoka yaawe, n'eky'omugasho kwebuuza aha bintu ebirikwetengwa. Omwe aha myanya mirungi y'okutandikiramu n'okushoma ebirikukwata aha motoka yaawe.

eng_prompt: When considering fuel efficiency, it's important to understand how speed affects a vehicle's performance. Many drivers may not realize that their car's mileage can vary significantly depending on the speed at which they are traveling.
lug_prompt: Bw'olowooza ku nkola y'amafuta, kikulu okutegeera engeri sipiidi gy'ekosaamu enkola y'emmotoka. Abavuzi b'ebidduka bangi bayinza obutamanya nti mayiro z'emmotoka zaabwe ziyinza okwawukana okusinziira ku sipiidi gyebatambulira.
ach_prompt: Ka itye ka tamo I kom kit ma moo tiyo kwede, pire tek tutwal me niang kit ma dwiro pa motoka balo kwede kit ma motoka tiyo kwede. Ludwo mutoka mapol pe twero niang ni mairo pa mutokagi twero bedo pat-pat malubbe ki dwiro ma gitye ka ngwec kwede.
teo_prompt: Arai iwomomoom nuikamunitos aitwasam akinyet, ejokuna amisiikin epone loetapit esipidi aitodolikin eswamae loka emotoka. Mam iderepan luipu ejenete ebe epedorete amairon nuka emotoka kec atiakatiaka kotupitete esipidi loirengeata kesi.
lgg_prompt: E'yo odu ayuzu kililiru ri ma dria, eri orodriru nizu geri ongu nzuza ni fezu mutukari ma azi ngazuri ma dria. Dereva karakara econi ni kini mailo mutukari yini 'diyi ni acizu 'diyi ma esele co e'yo okposiri vusi ku.
nyn_prompt: Waaba nooteekateeka aha kukoresa amajuuta kurungi, ni kikuru kumanya oku sipiidi erikukwata aha kukora kw'emotoka. Abavugi b'ebiiruka abingi nibabaasa kutamanya ngu orugyendo rw'emotoka yaabo nirutaana kurugirira aha sipiidi ei barikutamburira.

eng_prompt: When designing vehicles, engineers must consider various performance factors. One crucial aspect is the speed capabilities of each model.
lug_prompt: Bwe baba bakola dizayini y'emmotoka, bayinginiya balina okulowooza ku bintu eby'enjawulo ebikwata ku nkola yaayo. Ekimu ku bintu ebikulu kwe kuba nti buli mmotoka esobola okuvuga ku sipiidi.
ach_prompt: I kare me yubu mutoka, engineers omyero gutam I kom jami mapol ma lubbe ki kit ma mutoka tiyo kwede. Gin acel ma pire tek tutwal en aye kit ma motoka acel-acel twero ngwec kwede.
teo_prompt: Kapak kana aitemonokin amotokan, ibusakinit engineers airereor akiro nuegelegela nuka eswamae. Adiopebore naepol noi ngesi esipidi loepedori ngin emotoka aswam.
lgg_prompt: Mutukari eyi edezu 'bori ma alea, le inginiya eyi ma ega e'yo eyini azi ngazu kililiru 'diyi ma dria. E'yo azi okporu 'diyi ma azi eri ongu nzuza wura alu alu 'diyiniri'i.
nyn_prompt: Ba ingyiniya baaba nibakora ebiiruka, bashemereire kuteekateeka aha bintu bitari bimwe na bimwe ebirikubareetera kukora kurungi. Ekintu kimwe ekikuru n'okwiruka kw'ekika ky'emotoka.

eng_prompt: In an effort to enhance security and ensure compliance with regulations, authorities have implemented a new policy. As part of this initiative, all the cars will be inspected at the border.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'okutumbula eby'okwerinda n'okukakasa okugobererwa kw'ebiragiro, ab'obuyinza bataddewo enkola empya. Ng'ekimu ku bigenda okukolebwa, emmotoka zonna zijja kukeberebwa ku nsalo.
ach_prompt: I tute matek me medo rwom me gwoko kuc ki ber bedo ki neno ni lutela tye ka lubu cik, guketo cik manyen itic. Macalo but yub man, kibi ngiyo mutoka weng I wang lobo.

lgg_prompt: Okpo 'bazu e'yo agei temani 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu azini lezu 'ba ma obi azita eyi ma vuti, drice'ba eyi e'do azita o'diru ni eyi 'yeta ma alea. Otita 'di ma azi ru, 'ba nga mutukari dria eyi andri boda milia.
nyn_prompt: Omu kaweefube w'okutunguura eby'okwerinda n'okureeba ngu ebiragiro nibikuratirwa, ab'obushoborozi bateire omu nkora ebiragiro ebisya. Nk'emwe aha nteekateeka egi,emotoka zoona niziija kukyeberwa aha nsharo.

eng_prompt: Many drivers are looking for ways to reduce their fuel expenses and improve their vehicle's efficiency. One effective method to consider is the use of natural oil in your car.
lug_prompt: Abavuzi b'ebidduka bangi banoonya engeri y'okukendeeza ku ssente ze basaasaanya ku mafuta n'okwongera ku buwanguzi bw'ebidduka byabwe. Engeri emu ennungi ey'okulowoozaako kwe kukozesa woyiro ow'obutonde mu mmotoka yo.
ach_prompt: Ludwo mutoka mapol tye ka yenyo yoo me dwoko piny wel moo ma gitiyo kwede ki bene medo rwom me tic pa mutokagi. Yo acel maber tutwal ma omyero itam I kome obedo tic ki moo ma aa ki icwec ma orumuwa I motoka ni.
teo_prompt: Eutasi iderepan luipu aimo iponesio luka aitidisiar etiai loka akinyet kosodete aitojokar eswamae loka amotokan kec. Epone ediopebon loibusakinit jo aomoom ngesi aitwasam akinyet naka akwap komotoka kon.
lgg_prompt: Dereva karakara eyi geri nda eyini ecozu odu ayuzu ri ma omgbo esizu dika eyi ma mutukari eyi ma ayuta otuzu. Geri azi orodriru mini ecozu e'yo egazu ri eri odu nyakuni 'diyi ayuzu mutukari miniri ma alia.
nyn_prompt: Abavugi b'ebiiruka abingi nibaronda oburyo bw'okukyendeeza aha nshohoza yaabo aha majuta n'okwongyera omutindo gw'ebiiruka byabo. Omuringo gumwe murungi gw'okureeberaho n'okukoresa amajuuta g'obuhangwa omu motoka yaawe.

eng_prompt: It's important to maintain your vehicle's performance and longevity. Regularly check your oil levels and quality to ensure optimal engine function.
lug_prompt: Kya mugaso okukuuma emmotoka yo nga ekola bulungi era ng'ewangaala. Kebera buli kaseera omutindo gwa woyiro wo okukakasa nti yingini ekola bulungi.
ach_prompt: Pire tek tutwal me neno ni motoka ni tiyo maber dok rii pi kare malac. Pimme kare ki kare me ngiyo rwom ki rwom me moo mamegi wek injin oti maber.
teo_prompt: Erai ibore yenepol noi aidar ekemotoka kon eswamae loajokan ka aojau naepol. Koanyana duc adoketait naka akinyet kon kanu aanyun ebe iswamai einjin ejok.
lgg_prompt: Eri orodriru mutukari mivileri ma azi ngazu kililiru azini aa'zu ewu ezu. Le mi ma andri odu mivile ri ma omgbo sa'wa driasi nezu ra kini inzini azi nga kililiru.
nyn_prompt: N'eky'omugasho kureebeka ngu emotoka yaawe neekora kurungi kandi etwara obwire buraingwa. Buriijo kebera amajuuta gaawe n'omutindo gwago, okureeba ngu engiini neekora kurungi.

eng_prompt: Many vehicle owners are tempted to save time and money by stretching the time between oil changes. However, this practice can lead to significant long-term damage to your engine.
lug_prompt: Bannannyini mmotoka bangi bakemebwa okukekkereza obudde ne ssente nga bongezaayo obudde wakati w'okukyusa woyiro. Newankubadde, enkola eno esobola okuviirako okwonooneka kwa yingini yo okumala ebbanga eddene.
ach_prompt: Wegi mutoka mapol gitye ki atematema me gwoko cawa ki cente gi kun gimedo cawa ikin loko oil. Kadi bed kumeno, tim man twero balo injin mamegi pi kare malac.
teo_prompt: Ikulepek amotokan luipu ekotosi aimono apak keda ikapun kowai lo aiyatakin apak kiding aijulakin akinyet. Konye, epedori aswamisioit na ayangaun amunar eijin kon adaun apak naepol.
lgg_prompt: Motokari ipika karakara eyi sa'wa azini robia ma tamba eyini sa'wa odu ojazu ri ma eselea ri edrizu. Kani si, 'yeta 'di eco fe mi vile inzini ma eza eza sawa ezu ra.
nyn_prompt: Bakama b'ebiiruka baingi nibakyeberwa kukyendeeza aha bwire n'esente, obwo barikwongyera obwire ahagati y'okuhindura amajuuta g'ebiiruka. Kwonka, enkora egi neebaasa kurugwamu okusisikara kwa ingini yaawe kumara obwire buraingwa.

eng_prompt: When selecting an oil for your recipe, it's important to consider both flavor and health benefits. If you have allergies or dietary restrictions, you may need to avoid certain oils.
lug_prompt: Bw'oba olonda woyiro gw'ogenda okukozesa, kikulu okulowooza ku buwoomi n'emigaso gyayo eri obulamu. Bwoba olina allergy oba okulya okulya okukugirwa, oyinza okwetaaga okwewala amafuta agamu.
ach_prompt: Ka itye ka yero moo me tedo, pire tek tutwal me tamo I kom kit ma mit kwede ki ber pa moo I kom yotkom. Ka itye ki alergy onyo pe imaro cam, omyero igwokke ki moo mukene.
teo_prompt: Kotoma aseun akinyet kanu aitemonokin, ibusakinit ijo aomoom nuikamunitos ajon keda ajokis naka angaleu. Arai ijaasi jo keda ationis naka ationis naka anyama, ekot ijo ainyekikin akinyeta ace.
lgg_prompt: Mi ka odu mi vile geri edezuri pe ria, eri orodriru egazu wura azini orodri rua ala ni 'diyi ma dria. Eka ovu e'yo nyaka nyaza ni 'diyi si kani ku e'yo nyaka nyaza ni 'diyi si ci, le mi ma ku odu azi 'diyi ja.
nyn_prompt: Waaba nootoorana amajuuta g'okukoresa, ni kikuru kuteekateeka aha burungi bwago hamwe n'omugasho gwago aha magara gaawe. Ku oraabe oine oburemeezi omu by'okurya, noobaasa kwetantara amajuuta agamwe.

eng_prompt: To ensure your engine runs smoothly and efficiently, it's important to maintain regular oil changes. One way to enhance the performance of your engine oil is by incorporating a natural oil additive.
lug_prompt: Okukakasa nti yingini yo etambula bulungi, kikulu okukyusa woyiro buli kaseera. Engeri emu ey'okwongera ku nkola y'amafuta ga yingini yo kwe kugattamu ebintu eby'obutonde mu mafuta.
ach_prompt: Me neno ni injin megi tye ka ngwec maber, pire tek tutwal me loko oil kare ki kare. Yo acel me medo rwom pa moo injin en aye me medo jami mukene I iye.

eng_prompt: As the train approached the checkpoint, the atmosphere grew tense with anticipation. Travelers exchanged nervous glances, knowing that security measures were about to be enforced.
lug_prompt: Eggaali y'omukka bwe yasemberera awaakeberebwa, embeera yeeyongera okusika omuguwa olw'okusuubira. Abatambuze baatunudde mu maaso nga beeraliikirivu, nga bakimanyi nti eby'okwerinda byali binaatera okuteekebwa mu nkola.
ach_prompt: I kare ma gar tye ka cok ki kabedo me ngiyo piny, lworo omako dano mapol tutwal. Luwot gubedo ki lworo madit tutwal I kingi, kun gingeyo ni gwok me gwoko kuc ki ber bedo obiketo itic.
teo_prompt: Neyapitor agaali aiboisit na engicere, apotu itunga opotu noi. Apotu itunga lu alotok kogeutu airereonor, naarai ajeni kesi ebe eyapie aitodolikin ainapeta nuka ayuwara.
lgg_prompt: Mutukari garimosi ni ecazu pari 'bani 'ba eyi andrizu 'da ma alea ri ma alea, e'yo 'ba eyini aa'zu angu 'da ma alea ri ma omgbo ni tu ra. Ba aci'ba 'diyi e'da yi ma eselea asi otiza si yini nizu kini 'ba nga e'yo ageyitema ni 'diyi 'ba ra.

eng_prompt: To ensure that the emergency services operate efficiently, the organization implemented a new system for managing fuel expenses. As part of this initiative, fuel cards were provided for the ambulances.
lug_prompt: Okusobola okukakasa nti obuweereza bw'amangu bukola bulungi, ekitongole kyassaawo enkola empya ey'okuddukanya ensaasaanya y'amafuta. Ng'omu ku kaweefube ono, kaadi z'amafuta zaaweebwa emmotoka ezitambuza abalwadde.

teo_prompt: Kanu awanyun ebe iswamaete nuka engeso ejok, abu erionget kitolom ainapeta nuitetiak nuka aitikitik ikapun luka akinyet. Kwape ediopet koboro kalu, aponi ijaikinai akaadin nuka akinyet mama ejaasi amotokan nuadekis.

eng_prompt: After months of waiting and uncertainty, the long-anticipated announcement has finally arrived. Residents can now breathe a sigh of relief as they prepare to renew their passports.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'emyezi mingi nga tulinda era nga tetukakasa, ekirango ekimaze ebbanga nga kisuubirwa kituuse. Abatuuze kati basobola okussa omukka nga beetegekera okuzza obuggya paasipooti zaabwe.

eng_prompt: We need to stay alert and ready to leave at a moment's notice. Just keep the engine running while we wait for the others.

teo_prompt: Ekot oni asalakin ekapakina anyoun katipet. Ibusakinit jo aidar einjin akerit neideuna sio luce.

eng_prompt: When driving on the highway, it's important to maximize fuel efficiency. One effective way to achieve this is by utilizing your vehicle's overdrive feature.

lgg_prompt: Eka mutukari ti oji nzila dria, eri orodriru odu ayuza ma ongmbo otuzu. Geri azi orodriru mini ecozu e'yo 'di 'yezu ri eri mutukari mivileri ma ongmbo onzuzuri ayuzu.

eng_prompt: By optimizing the airflow dynamics within the combustion chamber, we can enhance the overall performance of the engine. This adjustment is crucial for maximizing efficiency and minimizing energy waste.
lug_prompt: Bwe tukyusakyusa empewo mu kyumba ky'omukka, tusobola okwongera ku nkola ya yingini okutwalira awamu. Enkyukakyuka eno ya mugaso nnyo mu kutumbula enkola n'okukendeeza ku kwonoona amasannyalaze.
ach_prompt: I yoo me yubu kit ma yamo woto kwede I ot mac, watwero medo rwom me tic pa injin. Aloka-loka man pire tek tutwal pi medo rwom me tic ki dwoko piny rweny pa mac.
teo_prompt: Kowai lo aitojokar ewai lo ekwam kotoma aiboisit naka aicwe, ipedori oni aitojokar eswamae loka einjin. Erai aijulanakineta ngun nuepolok noi kanu aitodolikin eswamae loajokan ka aitidisiar aitwasam akim.
lgg_prompt: Afa omvele air flow ru ri ma omgbo otuzu, ama eco inzini ma okpo otu ra. Ojata 'di eri orodriru okpo fezu azini aci ezaza ma omgbo esizu.
nyn_prompt: Twakoresa empewo nungi omu kyumba ky'okwokya, nitubaasa kwongyera aha nkora ya ingiini. Enkora egi n'eyomugasho munonga, okubaasa kweyongyera kukoresa kurungi amashanyarazi n'okukyendeeza amaani g'okukoresa.

eng_prompt: Understanding the flow of traffic is essential for safe driving. By developing your observational skills, you can enhance your ability to navigate the roads effectively.
lug_prompt: Okutegeera entambula y'ebidduka kya mugaso nnyo mu kuvuga obulungi. Bw'okulaakulanya obukugu bwo obw'okwetegereza, osobola okwongera ku busobozi bwo obw'okutambulira obulungi ku nguudo.

teo_prompt: Ajenun eipone lo elosiata amotokan erai ibore yenepol noi kanu airenge ejok. Kowai lo aitopolor acoa kon naka airereonor iboro, ipedori ijo aitojokar apedor kon naka alosit korotin ejok.
lgg_prompt: E'yo nzila ni acizu ri ma vata eri orodriru mutukari ti ojizu kililiru. Mi ma ondua e'yo ndrezu ri ma ezoza si, mi eco mi ma okpo acizu nzila dria kililiru ri ma omgbo otu ra.

eng_prompt: Many drivers are unaware of the environmental impact of their daily commutes. Frequent stops and starts not only increase fuel consumption but also contribute to higher emissions.
lug_prompt: Abavuzi b'ebidduka bangi tebamanyi ngeri entambula zaabwe buli lunaku gye zikosaamu obutonde bw'ensi. Okuyimirira n'okutandika entakera tekikoma ku kwongera kukozesa mafuta naye era kiviirako omukka ogufuluma mu mmotoka okweyongera.

nyn_prompt: Abavugi b'ebiiruka abaingi tibarikumanya ebirikukwata aha buhangwa bw'ensi obu barikugyenda buriizooba. Okugaruka kwemerera n'okugaruka kutandika, tikirikumaraho amajuuta gonka, beitu nikireetaho n'omuriro mwingi.

eng_prompt: Maintaining awareness of your surroundings is crucial for safe driving. One important aspect of this is ensuring you have enough space between your vehicle and others on the road.
lug_prompt: Okukuuma okumanyisibwa kw'ebyo ebikwetoolodde kikulu nnyo mu kuvuga obulungi. Ekimu ku bikulu mu kino kwe kukakasa nti olina ekifo ekimala wakati w'emmotoka yo n'abalala ku luguudo.
ach_prompt: Bedo ki ngec i kom kabedo ma itye iye pire tek tutwal pi dwoyo motoka maber. Gin acel ma pire tek me timo man obedo neno ni itye ki kabedo ma oromo ikin mutoka ni ki joo mukene ma itye ka wot kwedgi.
teo_prompt: Ajaut keda acoa na aiboisio nu idunyas ijo erai ibore yenepol noi kanu airenge ejok. Adiopebore naepol noi kanu ngun ngesi awanyun ebe ijaasi jo keda aiboisit naedolit kiding emotoka kon keda luce luejaasi orot.
lgg_prompt: Ovuzu mile be angu mi agei 'diyi ma dria ri eri orodriru mutukari ti ojizu kililiru. E'yo azi orodriru 'di ma azi ri lezu nezu ra kini mivile mutukari ma eselea 'ba azi nzila dria 'diyi pie angu ci.
nyn_prompt: Okumanya ebikwetorwaire n'eky'omugasho munonga omu kuvuga gye. Omuringo gumwe ogw'omugasho, n'okureeba ngu oine omwanya ogurikumara ahagati y'emotoka yaawe n'abandi abari aha ruguuto.

eng_prompt: In high-stakes racing, maintaining control while navigating tight corners is crucial. To stay competitive, you must adapt your driving style to the challenging conditions ahead.
lug_prompt: Mu misinde egy'obunkenke obw'amaanyi, okukuuma obuyinza ng'ovugira mu nsonda ennyimpi kya mugaso nnyo. Okusigala ng'ovuganya, olina okukyusakyusa mu ngeri gy'ovuga mu mbeera ezisoomooza eziri mu maaso.
ach_prompt: I pyem ngwec matye ki peko madit tutwal, bedo ki twero ikare ma itye ka ngwec I gul matego obedo gin ma pire tek tutwal. Me medde ki pyem, omyero I lok kit ma I dwoyo kwede motoka I yoo ma rwatte ki peko matye anyim.

lug_prompt: Nkimanyi ebintu birabika nga bisukkiridde mu kaseera kano, naye funa omukka omungi. Beera n'obwesige nti tujja kufuna ekkubo okuyita mu kino ffenna.

eng_prompt: Due to the recent increase in emergency calls, the local health department has reassessed the coverage area for emergency services. As a result, the ambulances have to serve the entire western region.
lug_prompt: Olw'okweyongera kw'amasimu agakubwa mu bwangu gyebuvuddeko, ekitongole ky'ebyobulamu eky'omu kitundu kyekenneenyezza mu bujjuvu obuweereza bw'amangu. N'ekyavaamu, emmotoka ezitambuza abalwadde zirina okuweereza ekitundu ky'obugwanjuba kyonna.
ach_prompt: Pi mede pa wel dano matye ka goyo cim pi peko ma opoto atura, dul ma loyo lok kom yoto kom I tedero dong otyeko ngiyo kama kony me peko ma opoto atura tye iye. Macalo adwogi ne, ambulance ne omyero gutii I but lobo mapat-pat manonge I kupoto ceng.
teo_prompt: Kanuka aiyatakinio naka ainom isimun lu engeso, abu erionget loka angaleu kitemok aiboisit naka aijaanakinio naka engeso. Kanuka ngun, ibusakinit amotokan nuadekis aijaanakin atutubet naka agolitomei kere.

eng_prompt: After struggling with dry scalp for weeks, I decided to try a new hair oil recommended by a friend. To my surprise, the hair oil has helped to avoid all the itching.

eng_prompt: I'm curious about your hair care routine. Do you incorporate any special products or treatments into it?

eng_prompt: Understanding the unique characteristics of your hair is essential for achieving healthy and beautiful locks. By recognizing the different stages and challenges, you can make informed choices that enhance your hair's natural beauty.
lug_prompt: Okutegeera engeri ez'enjawulo ez'enviiri zo kyetaagisa okusobola okufuna enviiri ennungi. Bw'omanya emitendera egy'enjawulo n'okusoomoozebwa, osobola okukola okusalawo okulungi okwongera ku bulungi bw'enviiri zo obw'obutonde.
ach_prompt: Niang kit yer wii ma pat pat pire tek tutwal pi nongo yer wii ma yot dok maleng. Ka ingeyo jami mapat-pat matye katime ki peko matye, itwero moko tam matye ki ngec ma medo leng pa yer wii.
teo_prompt: Ajenun iponesio luitegelikina luka itim kon erai ibore yenepol noi kanu adumun itim lu engalete ka luibusiak. Kowai lo ajenun adokena nuegelegela keda atiokisio, ipedori ijo aiswamaun aseununeta nuepedorete aitojokar aibuses naka itim kon.
lgg_prompt: Mi dribi ma wura ndu ndu 'diyi ma vata eri orodriru mi dribi ala azini ndrizaru 'diyi esuzu. E'yo esele ndu ndu azini e'yo ewaru 'diyi ma e'yo egazu risi, mi eco peta kililiru 'diyi 'du mi dribi ma onyi nyakuni 'diyi ma omgbo otupi ra.

eng_prompt: Many people enjoy incorporating natural remedies into their daily routines. One popular way to enhance flavor and health benefits is through the use of herbal oils.
lug_prompt: Abantu bangi baagala nnyo okukozesa eddagala ly'obutonde mu bulamu bwabwe obwa bulijjo. Engeri emu emanyiddwa ennyo ey'okwongera ku buwoomi n'emigaso gy'ebyobulamu kwe kuyita mu kukozesa amafuta g'ekinnansi.
ach_prompt: Dano mapol gimaro tic ki yat ma lubanga aye ocweyo ikwo gi me nino ducu. Yo acel ma oywek tutwal me medo mit pa cam ki ber pa yot kom obedo tic ki moo ma aa ki I kom jami apita.
teo_prompt: Eminas itunga luipu aimorikikin ikee luka Edeke toma aswam kec naka nginiparan. Epone ediope loejok noi loka aitojokar ajon keda ameda naka angaleu ngesi aitwasam akinyeta nuka iraan.

eng_prompt: Many people seek natural remedies for relaxation and wellness. One popular option is the use of herbal oils, which offer various therapeutic benefits.
lug_prompt: Abantu bangi banoonya eddagala ly'obutonde okuwummulamu n'okubeera obulungi. Engeri emu emanyiddwa ennyo kwe kukozesa amafuta g'ekinnansi, agagaba emigaso gy'obujjanjabi egy'enjawulo.

teo_prompt: Emoete itunga luipu ikee lu isuban kanu aiyengun ka angaleu. Epone ediope loetapit itunga aswam ngesi aitosom akinyeta nuka iraan, nuejaasi keda ameda naka amukian.
lgg_prompt: Ba karakara eyi aro nyakuni 'diyi nda ava liza azini aa'ta muke ri esuzu. Afa azi 'bani lele tu 'diyi ma azi eri odu nyakuni 'diyi ayuzu, orodri aro fepi 'diyi tre.

eng_prompt: Understanding the diversity of hair can help in choosing the right products and styles. Hair texture and characteristics vary widely among individuals.
lug_prompt: Okutegeera enviiri ez'enjawulo kisobola okuyamba mu kulonda ebintu ebituufu n'emisono. Enkula y'enviiri n'engeri zaayo byawukana nnyo mu buli muntu.

teo_prompt: Ajenun iponesio luegelegela luka itim ingarakini aseun iboro luedolitos keda iponesio luedolitos. Epone loka itim keda iponesio luka itim egelegela kaneejaasi itunga.

nyn_prompt: Okwetegyereza eishokye ry'emiringo mingi nikibaasa kuhwera omu kutoorana eby'okukoresa ebirikwetengwa hamwe n'emitindo y'eishokye ehikire. Enkora y'eishokye hamwe n'emitwarize yaaryo, nibitaana munonga omu bantu.

eng_prompt: Knowing how to care for your hair is essential for maintaining its health and appearance. To achieve the best results, it's important to identify the unique characteristics of your hair.
lug_prompt: Okumanya engeri y'okulabiriramu enviiri zo kya nkizo mu kukuuma obulamu bwazo n'endabika yaabwo. Okutuuka ku buwanguzi obulungi, kya mugaso okuzuula engeri ez'enjawulo ez'enviiri zo.

teo_prompt: Ajenun epone loka aidar itim kon ejok kanu aidar angaleuke keda aibusesike. Kanu adumun akiro nuajokak, ejokuna ajenun iponesio luitegelikina luka itim kon.
lgg_prompt: E'yo mi dribi ma tambazu ri nizu ri eri orodriru eri ma rua ala azini e'data ma tambazu. E'yo onyiru 'diyi esuzu, eri orodriru mi dribi ma wura ndu ndu 'diyi onizu.
nyn_prompt: Okumanya oku orikubaasa kureeberera eishokye ryawe, nikirungi aha magara gaawe n'okureebeka kwaaryo. Okutunga ebirikukirayo oburungi, n'ekyomugasho kumanya emitwarize y'omutaano y'eishokye ryawe.

eng_prompt: Before making any purchases, it's important to assess your financial situation. Setting a clear budget can help guide your spending decisions.
lug_prompt: Nga tonnaba kugula kintu kyonna, kikulu okwekenneenya embeera yo ey'ebyensimbi. Okuteekawo embalirira etegeerekeka bulungi kisobola okukuyamba okusalawo ku nsaasaanya yo.
ach_prompt: Mapwod pe iwilo gin mo, pire tek me niang kit ma cente ni tye kwede. Keto byek lim ma niange maber twero konyo I moko tam me tic ki cente.
teo_prompt: Erongo ijo egwela idiobore, ibusakinit ijo airereor ejautenekon loka ikapun. Aitolomun ebajet lo ecai ingarakini aingarenikin aseunetakon naka aitosom ikapun.

lug_prompt: Ng'ennaku z'omwezi zisemberera mangu, kikulu nnyo okusigala nga tuli bulindaala era nga tuli bateeketeeke. Ka tukulembeze emirimu gyaffe okukakasa nti tutuukiriza ebiruubirirwa byaffe.

lgg_prompt: O'du asizuri ni ecazu mbeleru risi, eri orodriru amani aa'zu asi 'baza be azini otuta be. Le ama ma 'ba azi amani 'diyi okporu ndeni nezu ra kini ama e'yo amani lele 'diyi 'ye ra.

eng_prompt: We had been exploring the cave for hours, and the air was becoming increasingly stale. Suddenly, I checked our supplies and realized the oxygen tanks are all empty.
lug_prompt: Twali tumaze essaawa eziwera nga twekenneenya empuku era empewo yali yeeyongera okukaluba. Amangu ago, nakebera ebintu byaffe ne nkizuula nti ttanka za oxygen zonna njereere.
ach_prompt: Wabedo ka ngiyo kor boro ne pi cawa malac, ki yamo bene obedo ka doko col tutwal. Cutcut, aneno jami ma watye kwede ci aniang ni tanka me yamo ayweya pa dano weng tye nono.

eng_prompt: In emergency medical situations, timely access to essential resources can be critical for patient survival. Therefore, it is vital that ambulances are prepared with the necessary equipment to provide immediate care.
lug_prompt: Mu mbeera z'obujjanjabi ez'amangu, okufuna ebintu ebikulu mu budde kisobola okuba eky'omugaso eri obulamu bw'omulwadde. N'olw'ekyo, kya mugaso nnyo ambyulensi okuba nga zitegekeddwa n'ebikozesebwa ebyetaagisa okusobola okuwa obujjanjabi obw'amangu.
ach_prompt: I kare me peko ma opoto atura, nongo kony ikare ki kome pire tek tutwal pi gwoko kwo pa latwo. Pi meno, pire tek tutwal ni ambulance obed atera ki jami weng ma mite me miyo kony me yot kom.
teo_prompt: Kojautene lo engeso, adumunun iboro lu epol ajokis kotoma apak erai ibore yenepol noi kanu aijar naka adekak. Kanuka ngun, ejokuna noi amotokan nuadekis aitemonokin keda iboro lu itwasamao kanu amukian katipet.
lgg_prompt: E'yo azakoma lepi mbeleru 'diyi ma alea, afa ayuzaru 'diyi esuzu sa'wa dria ri eri orodriru 'ba azoru 'diyi ma idri ta mbazu. Ka'dini, eri orodriru ambulansi eyi ma aa ngonde afa ayuzaru 'diyi pie atita fezu mbeleru.

eng_prompt: When a sudden medical emergency arises in a crowded area, the need for immediate assistance becomes critical. Quick access to emergency services can mean the difference between life and death.
lug_prompt: Obujjanjabi obw'amangu bwe bujja mu kifo ekirimu abantu abangi, obwetaavu bw'obuyambi obw'amangu bufuuka bwa maanyi. Okufuna amangu obujjanjabi obw'amangu kiyinza okutegeeza enjawulo wakati w'obulamu n'okufa.

eng_prompt: After hearing rumors about the company's potential relocation, he decided to investigate further. His goal is to gather accurate information regarding their intentions.

eng_prompt: As the crowd gathered in the square, anticipation filled the air, with everyone wondering how the president would address the nation after the recent turmoil. Suddenly, a figure emerged from the crowd, and all eyes turned to the stage.

eng_prompt: As the debate progressed, tensions rose among the candidates, leading to heated exchanges and pointed accusations. Many observers noted that the front-runner's aggressive strategy seemed to shift the focus onto their rivals.

eng_prompt: In analyzing the complexities of international relations, it is essential to recognize the biases that often color external perspectives. Many observers fail to grasp the nuances of local contexts, leading to misinterpretations and oversimplifications.
lug_prompt: Mu kwekenneenya obuzibu bw'enkolagana y'ensi yonna, kyetaagisa okutegeera obusosoze obuva ebweru w'eggwanga. Abatunuulizi bangi balemererwa okutegeera enjawulo y'embeera y'ekitundu, ekivaako okutaputa obubi n'okwanguya ennyo.
ach_prompt: I ngiyo kit ma wat tye kwede ikin lobe mapat-pat, pire tek tutwal me niang apoka-poka matye I kin lobo mapat-pat manonge I lobo ma woko. Lunyut piny mapol pe gitwero niang jami matye katimme I kabedo gi, man kelo niang marac ki keto jami I yoo mayot tutwal.
teo_prompt: Kotoma aingic atiokisio nuka eidicane loka akwapin nukokinga, ejokuna noi ajenun atiokisio nuepedorete ayangaun aomisio nuka akwapin nukokinga. Mam angicak luipu epedorete amisiikin akiro nuikamunitos akiro nuka atutubet, eyangauni aomisio nuarokok ka aitapatan akiro.

eng_prompt: In recent months, citizens have expressed growing concerns about the direction of the nation. As a result, discussions surrounding the effectiveness of the current administration have intensified.

eng_prompt: With the rise of remote learning, many educators are facing new challenges in keeping students engaged. Distractions at home and the lack of in-person interaction can make it difficult to maintain focus.

eng_prompt: In a surprising turn of events, the government announced a major restructuring of political organizations. As a result, several groups faced dissolution, including one that had been a prominent force in the region.

ach_prompt: I aloka-loka ma obedo me ur tutwal, gamente owaco ni myero kilok dul me cungu iwi-bye mapat-pat. Macalo adwogi ne, gurup mapol oryemogi, ma I kingi obedo dul ma onongo oywek tutwal I twok piny eni.

eng_prompt: In a time of deep division and conflict, the organization recognized the urgent need for collaboration among diverse groups. With a commitment to fostering understanding, it sought to bridge the gaps that had long separated communities.
lug_prompt: Mu kaseera k'enjawukana n'obukuubagano obw'amaanyi, ekibiina kyalabye obwetaavu obw'amangu obw'okukolagana mu bibiina eby'enjawulo. Olw'obumalirivu bw'okutumbula okutegeera, kyagezaako okuggyawo enjawukana ezaali zimaze ebbanga nga zaawula ebitundu.
ach_prompt: Ikare me apoka-poka ki lweny madit tutwal, dul enoni oniang miti matek tutwal me ribe ikin dul mapat-pat. Ki keto cwiny me kelo winye, en oteme me juko apoka-poka ma obedo tye ikin lwak pi kare malac.

lgg_prompt: Sa'wa esele coza azini e'yo ngiringiri ru 'diyi ma alia, amuti 'da esu e'yo lezu ti icita 'yezu ongulumu ndundu eyi ma eselea ri ra. Asi 'baza e'yo vata ma omgbo otuzu ri si, eri le ndra e'yo esele coza ongulumu eyini aa'pi sa'wa ezu 'diyi ma alea 'diyi ma aza ko.

eng_prompt: In response to the growing divisions within society, a comprehensive plan was developed to promote unity and inclusivity. The initiative aimed to address the underlying issues that fostered discord and to create a framework for collaborative governance.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula enjawukana ezigenda zeeyongera mu kitundu, enteekateeka enzijuvu yakolebwa okutumbula obumu n'okuyingiza abantu bonna. Ekigendererwa kyali kya kugonjoola nsonga ezireetawo enjawukana n'okutondawo enkola y'obukulembeze obw'awamu.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me apoka-poka matye kamede I kin lwak, kiyubu yub maber me kelo ribe ki bedo ki dano weng. Yub eni obedo ki miti me cobo peko ma okelo apoka-poka ki yubu yoo me tela ma ribe.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin atiakatiaka kotoma atutubet, aponi kitolomunai ainapeta nuepedorete aitopolor aimorikikina keda aimorikikina. Alosikinet naka ainapeta ngun arai aitemokin atiokisio nu eyangaunitos atiakatiaka ka aitolomun ainapeta nuka aimorikikina kotoma apugan.
lgg_prompt: E'yo esele coza ongulumu eyi ma eselea ri ma omgbo ni tuzu ri ma omgbo otuzu, 'ba e'do otita eyi ti ecita azini 'ba eyi ma eselea 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu. Asisile e'yo nde niri lezu e'yo ewaru esele coza ejipi 'diyi ma aza kozu azini geri 'bani driceza tualuri e'dozu.

lug_prompt: Ekitongole kyassa essira ku kutumbula enteeseganya n'enkolagana mu bibiina eby'enjawulo. Abakulembeze baakyo bakkaatiriza obukulu bw'okuyingiza abantu bonna n'okussa ekitiibwa mu nkola yaabwe ey'okulwanirira eddembe ly'obuntu.
ach_prompt: Dul ne oketo cwinygi tutwalle I kom kelo lok ki winye ikin dul mapat-pat. Lutela ne gucuko cwinygi tutwal I kom ber pa bedo ki woro ikin dano weng I yoo me tic gi.

lug_prompt: Wadde nga waaliwo okwekalakaasa okw'amaanyi n'okusaba enkyukakyuka, abakulembeze baasigala banywevu mu kukola okusalawo kwabwe. Baalowooza nti okwolesebwa kwabwe okw'ebiseera eby'omu maaso kwali kwa mugaso nnyo okusinga ebyo abantu bye baali baagala.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni dano mapol gubedo ka jemo ki lego pi aloka-loka, lutela pud gucung matek I yub me moko tamgi. Gin onongo gitye ki niyee ni neno gi pi anyim obedo gin ma pire tek loyo par pa lwak.
teo_prompt: Karaida epuakata aidiya keda ailipasinei nuka aijulanakineta, apotu engarenok iboyete kagogong kotoma aitolomun aseununeta. Iyuunitos kesi ebe aomisioit kec nuikamunitos oingaren eraasi nuepolok adepar nuikamunitos itunga.

eng_prompt: To foster a vibrant democracy, it is essential to learn from past political structures and their outcomes. By analyzing historical examples, we can identify the key elements necessary for establishing a successful multi-party system.
