ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki jami ma otimme I lok me cungu iwi-bye cokcok-ki, ludiro gubedo ka neno kit ma dul me cungu iwi-bye mapat-pat tye ka wot kwede. Macalo adwogi ne, odi poko ngec ma oywek oyero me coyo nying dul me cungu iwi bye adek egoni.
teo_prompt: Katupitos nuapotu kotakanutu kotoma akiro nuka politikis pac, eutasi itunga airereonor eipone lo itwasamaere ipatei luegelegela. Kanuka ngun, aseutu itunga luka iyemuto aitijenar ipatei lu iuni.
lgg_prompt: E'yo politiki ni i 'yepi o'diru 'diyi ma e'yosi, 'ba e'yo ama'baa 'diyi ebi e'yo 'yepi amuti ndundu eyi ma eselea 'diyi ma pamvu one. E'yo 'disi, 'ba e'yo oyuzani 'diyi asi 'du amuti na 'diyi ma ru si.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'entunguuka y'eby'obutegyeki eriho obwahati, ab'eby'obutegyeki batwire nibareebuuza enkora y'ebibiina by'obutegyeki ebitarikushushana. N'ekyarugiremu, abanyamakuru abarikumanywa munonga bashaziremu kuta ebibiina bishatu ebi eiziina.

eng_prompt: In their rush to implement the new policy, the team overlooked several critical questions. As discussions progressed, it became clear that key stakeholders were not fully informed about the implications of their choices.
lug_prompt: Mu kufubutuka kwabwe okussa mu nkola enkola empya, ttiimu yabuusa amaaso ebibuuzo ebikulu ebiwerako. Nga okukubaganya ebirowoozo kugenda mu maaso, kyafuuka kyeyoleka bulungi nti abakwatibwako abakulu tebaategeezebwa mu bujjuvu ku biva mu kusalawo kwabwe.
ach_prompt: I ngwecgi me keto cik manyen eni itic, dul ne gu cayo lapeny mapigi tego mapol. I kare ma nywako lok omedde, onen atyer kamaleng ni ludito ma onongo gitye ki twero mapol pe ki niango gi i kom adwoki me tam ma gumoko.
teo_prompt: Kotoma atipet kec naka aitegear ainapeta nuitetiak, abu etimu kipalunit aingiseta nuipu. Neautar aitetem akiro ngun, apotu kojenutu ebe mam itunga luapolok aponi olimokinai nuikamunitos nuelomunete kotoma aseununeta kec.
lgg_prompt: E'yo yini arizu azita o'diru 'da 'bazu azi ngazu ri ma alea, amuti 'da adi zita okporu karakara eyi ma dria. E'yo onzeza ni mu drile, eca e'da kililiru kini 'ba e'yo 'yepi okporu 'diyi awini e'yo nze e'yo eyini pe 'diyi ma dria ku.
nyn_prompt: Omu kufubutuka kwabo kuta ebiragiro ebisya omu nkora, tiimu ekafeerwa ebibuuzo bikuru bingi. Okuhanuura kwagyenda nikweyongyera, kikarebeka butunu ngu abakuru tibaramanyirwe kurungi ebirikukwata aha kusharamu kwabo.

eng_prompt: In recent years, the government has made significant strides toward enhancing democratic processes. As a result, political engagement among citizens has increased, leading to the establishment of a platform for diverse political voices.
lug_prompt: Mu myaka egiyise, gavumenti ekoze enkulaakulana ey'amaanyi mu kutumbula enkola za demokulasiya. N'ekivuddemu, okwenyigira mu byobufuzi mu bannansi kweyongedde, ekiviiriddeko okutondawo enkola y'amaloboozi g'ebyobufuzi ag'enjawulo.
ach_prompt: I mwaki ma okato cokcok-ki, gamente otimo jami mapol me ilo malo rwom me loc alwak. Macalo adwogi ne, bedo tye pa lwak I lok me cungu iwi-bye omede, ma oweko yub me cungu iwi-bye mapat-pat obedo tye.
teo_prompt: Kokaru lu atuboros, eswama apugan apol noi kanu aitogogong aseo naka itunga. Kanuka ngun, eyatakinos aitolot akiro nuka politikis kanejaas itunga luegelegela.
lgg_prompt: Eli agapi 'bo 'diyi ma alea, gamete 'ye e'yo okporu e'yo democracia ni 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu. E'yo 'di ma e'yosi, e'yo politiki ni kari anzi eyi ma eselea ri ma omgbo tu ra, dika eri fe 'bani e'yo politiki ni ndundu 'diyi 'yezu.
nyn_prompt: Omu myaka egi, gavumenti ekozire amaani omu kutunguura enkora ya demokurasiya. N'ekyarugiremu, okwejumba omu by'obutegyeki omu bantu kweyongyeire, ekyarugiremu okutandikaho enteekateeka y'amahurire g'eby'obutegyeki agatari gamwe na gamwe.

eng_prompt: In the upcoming election, every political group is encouraged to engage in the democratic process. This ensures that the voices of all citizens are heard, regardless of their party's parliamentary presence.
lug_prompt: Mu kulonda okujja, buli kibiina ky'ebyobufuzi kikubirizibwa okwenyigira mu nkola ya demokulasiya. Kino kikakasa nti amaloboozi ga bannansi bonna gawulirwa, awatali kufaayo ku kibiina kyabwe okubeerawo mu paalamenti.
ach_prompt: I yer matye kabino ni, kicuku cwiny dul me cungu iwi bye weng me donyo I yub me tela pa lwak. Man weko dwon pa anywali weng winyo labongo paro pi dul me cungu iwi bye meggi matye I ot moko cik.
teo_prompt: Kotoma aseo naebunit, isinyikokitai igurupun kere luka politikis ajaut toma ainapeta nuka aseo. Einakini ngin awanyun ebe epupio iporotoi luka itunga kere, araida ejaasi ipatei kec toma airabet.
lgg_prompt: Opetaa emupi ri ma alea, 'ba ai amuti dria politiki ni 'diyi fizu e'yo democracia ni 'diyi ma alea indi. Diri ne ra kini 'ba dria ma o'duko eri ra, amuti yini ovuzu paliamentia ri ma talasi.
nyn_prompt: Omu karuuru akarikwija, buri kibiina ky'obutegyeki nikihigwa kwejumba omu by'obugabe bw'okusharamu. Eki nikihamya ngu eiraka ry'abantu boona nirihurirwa, oihireho ekibiina kyabo omu ishengyero.

eng_prompt: In the pursuit of inclusivity and fairness, the organization recognized the need for a dedicated platform. This initiative was designed to amplify the voices of those often overlooked in discussions.
lug_prompt: Mu kunoonya obwenkanya n'obwenkanya, ekitongole kyalabye obwetaavu bw'omukutu ogwewaddeyo. Enteekateeka eno yakolebwa okutumbula amaloboozi g'abo abatera okubuusibwa amaaso mu kukubaganya ebirowoozo.
ach_prompt: I miti ne me bedo ki dano weng kacel ki bedo ki ber bedo, dul ne oniang ni omyero gubed ki kabedo me lok. Yub man kiyubu me medo dwon pa joo ma ipol kare ki cayo gi ikare me nywako lok.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitodolikin akiro nuikamunitos itunga kere, abu erionget koany eipud loka aitolomun akiro. Aponi kitemokinai aswamisioit ngin kanu aitogogong iporotoi luka ngul lumam epodokinito kotoma oineresinei.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'ba dria trazu azini e'yo ada ma vuti obiza ma alia, amuti 'da esu kililiru kini le 'ba ma e'do e'yo otuta ni 'diyi ma dria. Ba 'ba e'yo 'di 'ba o'duko 'ba 'bani asizu e'yo onzeza ma alia 'diyi ma o'duko otuzu.
nyn_prompt: Omu kuronda oburinganiza n'oburinganiza, ekitongore kikareeba ekyetengo ky'omurimo ogurikwetengwa. Enteekateeka egi ekaba etebekanisiibwe okwongyera amahurire g'abo abarikukira kwehuzya omu kuhanuura.

eng_prompt: The organization aims to empower citizens by providing them with a platform to express their opinions. Through this initiative, they will ensure that diverse perspectives are represented in the legislative process.
lug_prompt: Ekitongole kigenderera okutumbula bannansi nga kibawa ekifo okwogera endowooza zaabwe. Nga bayita mu nteekateeka eno, bajja kukakasa nti endowooza ez'enjawulo zikiikirirwa mu nkola y'amateeka.
ach_prompt: Dul eni tye ki miti me tyelo kor anywali kun minigi gum me miyo tam gi. I yoo me yub man, gubi neno ni dano ma tam gi pat pat tye I yub me moko cik.
teo_prompt: Ekoto atukot ngin aitigogong itunga kowai lo aijaikin kes aiboisit na aitetem aomisiokec. Kotoma ainapeta nu, epote kesi awanyun ebe ebwoikitai iponesio luegelegela kotoma ainapeta nuka ikisila.
lgg_prompt: Amuti 'da le kari anzi eyini okpo fe eyini geri eyini fe eyini geri eyini ecozu eyi ma egata eyi ma dria ri si. Geri e'yo 'di vurisi, eyi nga ne ra kini 'ba pa tu e'yo ndundu eyi ma dria 'diyi ma paria e'yo azita sizu 'diyi ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Ekitongore nikigyenderera okutunguura abatuuragye, obwo kirikubaha omwanya gw'okugamba ebiteekateeko byabo. Barikurabira omu nteekateeka egi, nibeija kureeba ngu enshonga ezitarikushushana nizijwekyerwa omu nkora y'eiteeka.

eng_prompt: For many years, the political landscape in the country was tightly controlled, limiting the influence of various groups. This restriction hindered the growth and organization of political parties across the nation.
lug_prompt: Okumala emyaka mingi, embeera y'ebyobufuzi mu ggwanga yali efugibwa nnyo, ekikomya obuyinza bw'ebibiina eby'enjawulo. Okuwera kuno kwalemesa enkulaakulana n'entegeka y'ebibiina by'ebyobufuzi okwetooloola eggwanga.
ach_prompt: Pi mwaki mapol, yub me cungu iwi-bye I lobo ne obedo ki twero matek tutwal, ma oweko dul mapat-pat pe obedo ki twero. Kigeng man ogengo dongo ki yubbe pa dul me cungu iwi bye mapat-pat ilobo ni.
teo_prompt: Kanu ikar luipu, aponi itikokinai noi akiro nuka politikis kotoma akwapuwok, ido abu kimik apedor naka igurupun luegelegela. Abu aitikitik ngin kimik apol keda aitemonokin ipatei kotoma akwap.
lgg_prompt: Eli karakara eyi ma alea, 'ba e'yo politiki ni kari 'di ma alea 'diyi ma ta mba okporu, e'yo amuti ndundu eyini 'diyi ma okpo atrizu. E'yo 'bani e'yo 'di atrizu ri atri amuti politiki ni kari 'di ma alea ndulu 'diyi ma zota azini otuta ci.
nyn_prompt: Okumara emyaka mingi, eby'obutegyeki omu ihanga bikaba nibireberezibwa munonga, ekyabaire nikizibira guruupu ezitarikushushana. Okuzibirwa oku kukaremesa ekibiina ky'eby'obutegyeki okukura n'okutebekanisibwa omu ihanga ryona.

eng_prompt: Despite the overwhelming evidence presented, many still cling to their misconceptions. They dismiss any information that contradicts their beliefs.
lug_prompt: Newankubadde waliwo obujulizi bungi, bangi bakyanywerera ku ndowooza zaabwe enkyamu. Babuusa amaaso amawulire gonna agakontana n'enzikiriza zaabwe.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni caden tye mapol tutwal, dano mapol pud gitye ki tam ma pe atir. Gikwero lok mo keken ma pe rwatte ki niyee gi.
teo_prompt: Karaida ejaas aitogogongoret naepol noi, eringa itunga luipu ejaas keda aomisio nuarokok. Apotu kesi kongeroto akiro kere nu itepegitos aiyuunikec.
lgg_prompt: Afa ecetaru 'bani e'da 'diyi ma talasi, 'ba karakara eyi nga po'di eyi ma egata onzi 'diyi ma dria. Yi o'duko ci e'yo yini a'ita yini 'diyi ma dria si ri ga.
nyn_prompt: Oihireho obuhame bwingi oburikworekwa, baingi nibagumizamu n'ebiteekateeko byabo ebitahikire. Nibanga amakuru goona agarikuhakanisa ebibarikwikiriza.

eng_prompt: As the election season approaches, the atmosphere in the town has become increasingly vibrant. Local candidates are ramping up their campaigns, eager to connect with the community.
lug_prompt: Ekiseera ky'okulonda bwe kigenda kisembera, embeera mu kibuga yeeyongedde okuba ey'akajagalalo. Abeesimbyewo mu byalo bongedde amaanyi mu kampeyini zaabwe, nga baagala nnyo okukwatagana n'abantu b'omu kitundu.
ach_prompt: Ka kare me bolo kwir tye ka cok, lworo tye ka medde i town. Lucungu me tedero gitye ka medo rwom me bito kwi gi, ki miti me kube ki lwak.
teo_prompt: Neyapiete apak naka aseo, ejai aiyalama noi koibuga. Eutasi abwoak luka atutubet aiyatakin ikampeins kec, ekotosi arucokina keda itunga.
lgg_prompt: Sa'wa opetaa niri ni ecazu ogogo ri si, angu tawuni 'da ma alea ri eca e'yo asi driasi. Ba pa tupi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi e'yo ti odaza ni 'diyi ma omgbo otu asi driasi eyi ecizu o'bi eyi pie.
nyn_prompt: Obwire bw'okuteera akaruuru ku burikuhika haihi, embeera omu tawuni eyeyongyeire kuba nungi. Abeesimbireho ahabyaro, beyongyeire omu kampiini zaabo, baine ekihika ky'okukwatanisa n'abantu.

eng_prompt: As the sun began to set, colorful banners started to appear along the streets, drawing attention from passersby. Local volunteers were busy setting up booths and distributing flyers, creating an atmosphere of excitement and engagement.
lug_prompt: Enjuba bwe yatandika okugwa, ebipande ebya langi ez'enjawulo byatandika okulabika ku nguudo, nga bisikiriza abayitawo. Abakozi b'obwannakyewa b'omu kitundu baabadde bakola nnyo okuteekawo emidaala n'okugaba ebipapula, ekyaleetawo embeera ey'essanyu n'okwenyigiramu.
ach_prompt: Ikare ma ceng ocako poto, bendera me rangi mapat-pat ocako nen I teng gudu, ma okelo tam pa luwot. Lumii kony me tedero gubedo ka tic matek me yubu kabedo ki poko waraga ma nyutu kit ma tic tye kwede, ma man okelo yomcwiny ki ribbe ikin dano.
teo_prompt: Neageuna akolong aibiror, apotu ibandai luegelegela kogeutu asesen korotin, ido apotu itunga luetubete kopodokisi kesi. Apotu itunga luka atutubet ibwaikisi aiboisio nuka aiboisio nuka aiboisio nuka aiboisio nuka aiboisio nuka aiboisio nuka aiboisio nuka aiboisio nuka aiboisio nuka aiboisio nuka aiboisio nuka aiboisio nuka aiboisio nuka aiboisio nuka aiboisio nuka aiboisio nuka aiboisio nuka aiboisio nuka aiboisio nuka aiboisio nuka aiboisio nuka aibo
lgg_prompt: Etuka ni e'doria 'boria, bendere wura be wura be 'diyi e'do e'da nzila dria, e'yo 'ba afa alipi 'diyi ma mile 'bazu. Ba owitaru angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ri 'yeta ma alea 'bani pari 'bazu 'diyi sizu azini karatasi eyi awazu eyini ani ayiko esuzu azini aa'zu eyi ma eselea.
nyn_prompt: Eizooba ku ryatandikire kurenga, ebipande by'erangi nyingi bikatandika kureebeka aha nguuto, bikareetaho amaani kuruga omu bantu abaabaire nibahika. Abarikwehayo omu byaro bakakora munonga kutaho emyanya y'okushutama n'okugabira abantu ebipapura by'empurizana, ekyareteireho okushemererwa n'okukwatanisa.

eng_prompt: Throughout my research journey, I've encountered various scholars and experts from different fields. Their insights and discussions have often led me to connect with them in academic forums, across the globe.
lug_prompt: Mu kunoonyereza kwange kwonna, nsisinkanye abakugu ab'enjawulo okuva mu bitundu eby'enjawulo. Ebirowoozo byabwe n'okukubaganya ebirowoozo emirundi mingi bindeetedde okukwatagana nabo mu nkungaana z'ebyenjigiriza, okwetooloola ensi yonna.
ach_prompt: I kare ma abedo ka kwedo lok, arwatte ki lukwan ki ludiro ma aa ki I kabedo mapatpat. Ngecgi kacel ki nywako lokgi oweko abedo ki kubbe kwedgi I kacokke mapat-pat me kwan I but lobo mapat-pat.
teo_prompt: Kotoma aingic ka kere, eriamuna eong keda esisiak luegelegela keda ipirioitin luegelegela. Apotu aomisiokec keda ipegeta kec ijaikisi eong arucokina keda kesi kotoma atukonokin naka asioman, kotoma akwap kere.
lgg_prompt: Aci ma vile e'yo vuti ondazaniri ma alia, ma fu dri 'ba onita be angiri azini 'ba nita be angiri 'diyi be engazu pari ndu ndu yi ma alia. Egata yini azini e'yo nzeza yini 'diyi fe mani ti ecizu yi be amuti onita ni 'diyi ma alia, wudrikuru ma kalasi dria.
nyn_prompt: Omu rugyendo rwangye rw'okucondooza,ntungire abeegi n'abakugu kuruga omu myanya etari emwe. Ebiteekateeko byabo hamwe n'okuhanuura kwabo bimpwereire kukwatanisa nabo omu nteerane z'eby'obwegyese, okwetoroora ensi yoona.

eng_prompt: As we delve into this topic, it's important to focus on the key points that will guide our understanding. To ensure clarity and retention, there are three things to remember here.
lug_prompt: Nga tweyongerayo mu mulamwa guno, kya mugaso okussa essira ku nsonga enkulu ezigenda okutulungamya mu kutegeera kwaffe. Okukakasa obwerufu n'okukuumibwa, waliwo ebintu bisatu eby'okujjukira wano.
ach_prompt: Ka watye kadonyo matut I wii lok man, pire tek tutwal me keto cwiny I kom jami mapigi tego ma bitelo niango wa. Me neno ni jami weng niange maber, tye jami adek ma omyero wii opo I komgi.
teo_prompt: Kwape inyikokini oni akiro nu, ejokuna noi apodokinit akiro nuapolok nu ingarakinete oni amisiikin. Kanu aanyun ebe ecai ka aiitun, ejaasi iboro iuni luibusakinit aiitun kane.
lgg_prompt: Amani e'yo 'di ma ale andriria, eri orodriru asi 'bazu e'yo okporu ama vile vata ma dri cepi 'diyi ma dria. E'yo 'di ma e'yo egazu kililiru azini 'ba ma ega e'yo nde ma dria ra, afa 'bani egazu 'dia 'diyi na.
nyn_prompt: Ku turikugyenda omu maisho n'omutwe ogu, nikikuru kuta amaani aha nshonga nkuru ezirikwija kutuhabura omu kwetegyereza kwaitu. Okureeba ngu nitwetegyereza gye kandi tukaguma nitwijuka, hariho ebintu bishatu ebi tushemereire kwijuka aha.

eng_prompt: As the government tightened its grip on society, citizens found themselves increasingly monitored and regulated. This pervasive influence extended beyond politics, infiltrating personal relationships and daily routines.
lug_prompt: Gavumenti bwe yeeyongera okukwata abantu, bannansi beeyongera okulondoolebwa n'okufugibwa. Obuyinza buno obw'awamu bwasukka ebyobufuzi, ne buyingira mu nkolagana z'abantu n'emirimu gyabwe egya buli lunaku.
ach_prompt: I kare ma gamente omedo kero ne I kom lwak, anywali ne gunongo ni gitye ka lubu kor tic gi. Telo tol man okato I kom lok me cungu iwi-bye, odonyo I kin dano ki jami ma timme nino ducu.
teo_prompt: Kwape abu apugan kitogogong apedoroke mama ejaasi itunga, apotu itunga kodumutu ebe ewanyanarete kesi noi. Apotu akiro ngun iyatakinos adepar nuka epolitikis, kitoni arucokina keda itunga keda aswamisio nuka nginiparan.
lgg_prompt: Gamete ni okpo 'duzu ongulumu eyi ma dria, kari anzi eyi esu eyi ma pamvu andrita azini azita eyi ma vuti obiza ma omgbo ni tu ra. EêžŒyo êžŒbani êžŒye êžŒdi êžŒi êžŒye drile politiki ma drilea, êžŒba yi ma eselea azini eêžŒyo êžŒbani êžŒye oêžŒdu driasi êžŒdiyi ma alia.
nyn_prompt: Gavumenti ku yaayeyongyeire kutegyeka abantu, abatuuragye beeyongyeire kukyeberwa n'okwetegyerezibwa. Eki kikaruga omu by'obutegyeki, kyaza omu mikago y'abantu hamwe n'emirimo yaabo eya buriizooba.

eng_prompt: After years of relentless battles and strategic alliances, the kingdom finally emerged from the shadows of defeat. The once-dwindling forces rallied under a charismatic leader, igniting hope among the people.
lug_prompt: Oluvanyuma lw'emyaka gy'entalo ezitakoma n'okukolaganira awamu, obwakabaka bwakomekkereza buvuddeyo okuva mu kisiikirize ky'okuwangulwa. Amagye agaali gakendeera gaakungaana wansi w'omukulembeze ow'amaanyi, ekyaleetawo essuubi mu bantu.
ach_prompt: Ingee mwaki mapol me lweny ki ribbe, ker ne dong okato ki I tipo me poto pa loc. Dul pa mony macon ma onongo gitye ka lweny i kom gamente guribbe ite tela pa latela ma kite ber tutwal, man okelo gen ikin lwak.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ikar luipu luka ejie keda aiswamanara, abu ajakanut kogeun kotoma aibiror naka aipikor. Apotu lukasurup luapotu kopedosi aimorikikin kotupitete engarenon loajokan noi, ido abu koyangau amuno kanejaas itunga.
lgg_prompt: A'di eli karakara eyi ma vutia azini ti ecita okporu 'diyi ma vutia, kari opi nyaza niri efu asizu engazu e'yo 'bani eyi ndezu 'diyi ma dria. Okpo andra okpo kokoru 'diyi tra yi ma eselea drice'ba azi onyiru ni ma palaa, erini asi'baza ejizu o'bi yi ma eselea.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'emyaka mingi y'entaro ezitarikuhwaho hamwe n'okukwatanisa,obukama bukaruga omu bicuucu by'okusingwa. Amahe agabaire nigasingurwa gaketeerana ahansi y'omwebembezi w'amaani, ekyaretsireho amatsiko omu bantu.

eng_prompt: As the oppressive regime crumbled under the weight of public dissent, chaos erupted in the streets. The once-feared leaders, realizing their grip on power was slipping, scrambled to escape the growing tide of rebellion.
lug_prompt: Ng'obukulembeze obunyigiriza bugwa wansi olw'obutabanguko bw'abantu, akavuyo kaabalukawo mu nguudo. Abakulembeze abaali batiisibwatiisibwa, bwe baamanya nti obuyinza bwabwe bwali bukendeera, baagezaako okuwona obujeemu obwali bweyongera.
ach_prompt: I kare ma gamente ma onongo diyo dano-ni opoto piny pi peko me jemo pa lwak, kuku kuku obedo tye I teng gudu. Lutela ma ikare macon onongo gilworo gi tutwal, ma guniang ni twero gi me loc tye ka rweny, gulwenyo matek me bwot ki jemo matye kamedde anyim.
teo_prompt: Neautar apugan naetapit itunga aibiror kanuka amamut acamanar, abu amumu kogeun korotin. Apotu engarenok lu ekuriaka sek, apotu kojenutu ebe eutai aibiror apedorosiokec, apotu kopedosi alakun aipues naepol noi naka abenyak.
lgg_prompt: E'yo opi nyaza okporu 'da ni e'dezu e'yo 'ba eyini gazu o'bi eyi ma eselea risi, ngiringiri e'do nzila eyi ma alea. Drice'ba andra 'bani 'ye orisi 'diyi, eyini esuzu kini okpo yini opi dria ri e'de ra, eyi 'ye e'yo eyini ani ecozu apazu e'yo ngiringiri ni tupi tutu 'diyi vurisi.
nyn_prompt: Obutegyeki obwabaire nibutuntuza abantu ku bwabaire nibuhendeka ahabw'oburemeezi bw'abantu, akaimukiriro kakarugaho omu nguuto. Abebembezi abaabaire nibatiinisibwa, ahabw'okumanya ngu obutegyeki bwabo bukaba butandikire kukyendeera, bakateeraho kutoroka omu bwimukiriro obwabaire nibweyongyera.

eng_prompt: In the wake of political turmoil and economic instability, many citizens have grown increasingly anxious about their future. This pervasive atmosphere of uncertainty has shaped public sentiment in profound ways.
lug_prompt: Olw'obutabanguko mu byobufuzi n'obutali butebenkevu mu by'enfuna, bannansi bangi beeyongedde okweraliikirira ebiseera byabwe eby'omu maaso. Embeera eno eya buli wamu ey'obutali bukakafu ekyusizza endowooza z'abantu mu ngeri ez'amaanyi.
ach_prompt: Pi kuku kuku ma tye I lok me cungu iwi bye ki can lim, anywali mapol tye ki lworo I kom anyimgi. Lobo man ma opong ki apoka-poka okelo alokaloka madit tutwal I tam pa lwak.
teo_prompt: Kanuka amumu naka epolitikis keda amamus na ainapakina naka ikapun, ekuriaka itunga luipu noi nuikamunitos oingaren kec. Ejautene lo loepol noi loka amamus ajenanut itopoloorit aomisio nuka itunga koipone kaloejok noi.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru politiki ni azini e'yo ewaru e'yo robiani 'diyi ma alia 'diyi ma e'yosi, kari anzi karakara eyi ma asi otiza ewu drialeri ma dria ri tu ra. E'yo 'bani ega kokoru 'di oja o'bi eyi ma egata geri okporu 'diyisi.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'obutabanguko omu by'obutegyeki hamwe n'obutabanguko omu by'entaasya, abatuuragye baingi beeyongyeire kwerarikirira ebiro byabo by'omumaisho. Embeera y'obutegyendesereza eriho, ehindwire emiteekateekyere y'abantu omu miringo mingi.

eng_prompt: In the wake of a series of unprecedented events, citizens found themselves questioning their safety and security. Rumors of impending threats spread rapidly, leaving communities on edge.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'ebintu eby'enjawulo okubaawo, bannansi beebuuzizza ku bulamu bwabwe n'obukuumi bwabwe. Olugambo lw'okutiisibwatiisibwa okubindabinda lwasaasaana mangu, ne kireka ebitundu ku bunkenke.
ach_prompt: I ngee jami mapol ma otimme, anywali me Uganda onongo gitye ki akala-kala I kom ber bedo gi. Lok angea me byek me bal ma tye kabino tye ka nyaa oyot tutwal ma oweko lwak tye ki lworo.
teo_prompt: Katupitos nuapotu kotakanutu, apotu itunga kongicata ayuwara kec. Apotu akiro nuikamunitos aitukurianeta nu eyapie aisiarakin katipet, ijalakisi itunga aiyalongong.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ndundu eyi 'yepi 'diyi ma vutia, kari anzi eyi esu eyi ma ngulupi eyi ega e'yo eyi ma agei tema ni 'diyi ma dria ku. E'yo nzeza e'yo ori gbaza ma dria 'diyi ere i mbeleru, erini fezu ongulumu eyini aa'zu orisi.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'ebintu bingi ebyabaireho, abatuuragye bakeesherekaho okubuzabuza eby'okwerinda kwabo. Orugambo rw'okutiinatiinisa okurikwija rukajanjaara ahonaaho, ekyarekire abantu baine okwerarikirira.

eng_prompt: As he drove through the winding streets of the neighborhood, he couldn't help but feel a sense of disorientation. The once-familiar landmarks had been replaced by towering structures that obscured his view.
lug_prompt: Bwe yali avuga emmotoka ng'ayita mu nguudo z'oku muliraano, yabulwa eky'okukola. Ebifo bye yali amanyi byali bizze mu kifo ky'ebizimbe ebigulumivu ebyamulemesa okulaba.
ach_prompt: I kare ma en tye ka dwoyo motoka I dye gudu matye I kabedo ne, en onongo pe twero gengo winyo ni tamme orweny woko. Kabedo ma en onongo ngeyo ni dong kiloko gi ki gedo maboco tutwal ma onongo pe twero neno piny maber.
teo_prompt: Neautar ngesi airenge korotin luka idunyet, abu ngesi kopedo aipup aomisioit naka aibiror. Aponi ibwaikinai aiboisio nuajeni ngesi kwape adukena nuapolok nuapotu kimikisi ngesi asesen.
lgg_prompt: Erini mutukari ti ojizu nzila angu ama agei 'diyi ma alia 'diyi ma alea, eri awini e'yo ega ku. Angu ndundu erini nile 'diyi ma paria, 'ba si jo uruleru 'diyi erini angu ndrezu ku 'diyi.
nyn_prompt: Ku yaabaire navuga arikurabira omu nguuto z'omubyaro, akahurira ataine ki arikukora. Eby'okureeberaho ebyabaire bimanyirwe bikasikirwa ebyombeko by'amaani ebyabaire bimuremesa kureeba.

eng_prompt: In Uganda, the aspiration for homeownership is deeply rooted in cultural values and societal expectations. Many individuals view having a house as a symbol of success and stability in their lives.
lug_prompt: Mu Uganda, obwetaavu bw'obwannannyini bw'amayumba businziira nnyo ku mpisa z'obuwangwa n'ebisuubirwa mu bantu. Abantu bangi batwala okubeera n'ennyumba ng'akabonero k'obuwanguzi n'obutebenkevu mu bulamu bwabwe.
ach_prompt: I lobo Uganda, miti me bedo ki gang ma megi ocung tutwalle I kom tekwaro ki miti pa lwak. Dano mapol gineno bedo ki ot macalo lanyut me loc ki kuc I kwo gi.
teo_prompt: Ko Uganda, alosikinet naka ajaut keda itogoi erai naelomunit kotoma inonosio keda aomisio nuka itunga. Eomitos itunga luipu ebe ajaut keda etogo erai aanyunet naka akerianut keda ainapakina kotoma aijar kec.
lgg_prompt: Kari Uganda niri ma alea, asi 'baza aku ma e'ipiru ri enga e'yo suruni 'diyi ma alea tualu egata o'bi eyini 'diyi pie. Ba karakara eyi ega kini ovuzu jo be ri eceta drile suza ni azini asianzu ni idri eyivile 'diyi ma alea ri i.
nyn_prompt: Omu Uganda, ekyetengo ky'okuba n'amaka nikirugirira aha migyenzo y'obuhangwa hamwe n'ebiteekateeko by'abantu. Abantu baingi nibareeba okugira enju nk'akamanyiso k'obusinguzi n'obutebekana omu magara gaabo.

eng_prompt: Many families struggle to afford basic housing, leading to a significant portion of their income being allocated to rent. In fact, recent studies indicate that a large percentage of households are burdened by high rental costs.
lug_prompt: Amaka mangi galwana okufuna amayumba, ekireetera ekitundu ky'ensimbi zaago okutwalibwa mu kupangisa. Mu butuufu, okunoonyereza okwakolebwa gyebuvuddeko awo kulaga nti amaka mangi gali mu buzibu olw'ebisale by'obupangisa ebingi.
ach_prompt: Gangi mapol tye ka tute matek me nongo ot ma mite, ma oweko but limgi mapol ki keto I pango ot. Ki lok ada, kwed ma otime cokcok-ki nyutu ni wel odi mapol tye ki cul me pango ot madit tutwal.
teo_prompt: Etionikinit ikalia luipu adumun itogoi lu itwasamao kanu aipagis itogoi. Kabeit, aitoduneta nuitodunitos ebe itunga luipu ejaasi keda etiai loepol noi loka ikapun luka aipagis.
lgg_prompt: Familia karakara eyi dri ci jo eyini aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa' A'danisi, e'yo eti ondaza ebipi o'diru 'diyi ece kini aku kalafe angiri 'diyi e'yo aje pangisaniri ma ongmbo ururi ma e'yosi.
nyn_prompt: Amaka maingi nigarwana kugura amaju g'okutuuramu, ekirikureetera ekicweka kihango ky'entaasya yaabo kukoresibwa okupangisa. Okucondooza okwakozirwe obwahati nikworeka ngu amaka maingi gaine oburemeezi bw'okushashura esente nyingi z'okupangisa.

eng_prompt: In a recent survey of housing trends, researchers found a significant divide in living arrangements among residents. The data revealed that a majority of individuals prefer alternative housing options over traditional rentals.
lug_prompt: Mu kunoonyereza okwakolebwa gyebuvuddeko ku mbeera y'amayumba, abanoonyereza baasanze enjawukana mu ngeri abatuuze gye babeeramu. Ebiwandiiko byalaga nti abantu abasinga obungi baagala amayumba amalala okusinga ag'obupangisa aga bulijjo.
ach_prompt: I kwed ma otime cokcok-ki I kom kit ma odi tye kwede, lukwed gunongo apoka-poka madit tutwal I yub me kwo I kin lutedero. Lok ne onyuto ni pol pa dano maro gangi mapat-pat me pango odi me kaka gangi macon.
teo_prompt: Kotoma aingic napac naka itogoi, apotu angicak kodumutu atiaketait naepol noi kotoma aiboisio nuka aiboi kanejaas itunga. Apotu akiro itodutu ebe ekotosi itunga luipu aiboisio ace adepar lu ipagisaete.
lgg_prompt: E'yo eti ondaza 'bani 'ye o'diru 'diyi ma alea, 'ba e'yo vuti ondapi 'diyi esu esele coza angiri geri 'ba aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyini aa'zu 'diyi ma eselea. EêžŒyo êžŒbani esu êžŒdiyi ece kini êžŒba yi ma pari le jo êžŒbani êžŒba yi ma eselea êžŒdiyi aga jo êžŒbani êžŒba yi ma eselea êžŒdiyi.
nyn_prompt: Omu kucondooza okwakozirwe aha ntwaza y'amaju, abakyondoozi bakashanga okwebaganisamu kw'amaani omu nteekateeka y'okutuura kw'abatuuragye. Ebihandiiko nibyoreka ngu abantu abarikukira obwingi nibakunda enju ezindi kukira ez'obuhangwa.

eng_prompt: Many people are seeking more affordable housing options as the cost of living continues to rise in urban centers. Consequently, they are exploring neighborhoods that are further from the cityâ€™s core.
lug_prompt: Abantu bangi banoonya amayumba ag'ebbeeyi entono ng'ebbeeyi y'ebintu yeeyongera okulinnya mu bibuga. N'olw'ekyo, banoonyereza mu bitundu ebiri ewala okuva mu kibuga.
ach_prompt: Dano mapol tye ka yenyo odi ma welgi yot pien wel cente me kwo tye ka medde i town. Macalo adwogi ne, gitye ka kwedo kabedo matye kama bor ki boma madit.
teo_prompt: Eutasi itunga luipu aimo itogoi luepataka noi naarai iyata etiai loka aijar koibuga. Kanuka ngun, eutasi kesi aingic aiboisio nuelwaka noi kotoma osite.
lgg_prompt: Ba karakara eyi jo aje kokoru 'diyi nda a'dusikuni aje idri nyazaniri ni mu drile tu aku ambu tawuni ru 'diyi ma alea. E'yo 'disi, yi angu jo ejeleru aku ambu cityniri vurisi 'diyi ma ale andri.
nyn_prompt: Abantu baingi nibaronda oburaaro oburikubaasika ahabwokuba ebbeeyi y'ebintu neeyongyera omu ndembo. N'ahabw'ekyo, bariyo nibacondooza aha myanya eri hare n'omutwe gw'orurembo.

eng_prompt: Despite the recent increase in housing supply, many residents are struggling to find affordable options. Local officials have noted that the demand for rental properties continues to outpace availability.
lug_prompt: Wadde nga wabaddewo okweyongera mu bungi bw'amayumba gyebuvuddeko, abatuuze bangi balwana okufuna ag'ebbeeyi. Abakungu b'ebyalo bakizudde nti obwetaavu bw'amayumba g'okupangisa bweyongedde okusukkuluma ku galiwo.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni odi tye mapol, lutedero mapol tye ka nongo odi ma welgi yot. Lutela me tedero guwaco ni miti pa odi apanga tye kamede ki kato jami ma tye.
teo_prompt: Karaida iyata kwana etosomae loka itogoi, eutasi itunga luipu aimo lu epedorete adumun ikapunukec. Apotu eswamak luka atutubet kojenutu ebe eipuda lo itogoi lu ipagisa ejai noi adepar lu ejaas.
lgg_prompt: E'yo jo ma ongmbo ni tuzu o'diru ri ma talasi, 'ba karakara aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi dri ci geri jo eyini aa'zu aje kokoru 'diyi esuzu. Azi'ba angu ndundu eyi ma alea 'diyi esu e'yo kini jo pangisa ru 'diyi ma leta ni mu drile angu 'bani esu 'diyi ma alea ri ma omgbo aga ra.
nyn_prompt: Oihireho okweyongyera kw'amaju, abatuuragye baingi nibarwana kuronda ag'esente nkye. Abakungu b'ebyaro bareebire ngu ebyombeko by'okupangisa biriyo nibyetengwa munonga kukira ebirikuba biriho.

eng_prompt: Many people dream of stability and a place to call their own. As they navigate through life, the idea of homeownership often begins to take root in their minds.
lug_prompt: Abantu bangi baloota ku butebenkevu n'ekifo kye bayita ekyabwe. Nga bayita mu bulamu, ekirowoozo ky'obwannannyini ku maka kitera okutandika okusimba emirandira mu birowoozo byabwe.
ach_prompt: Dano mapol tye ki lek me bedo ki kuc ki kabedo ma gi lwongo ni meggi. Ka gitye ka wot I kwo, tam me bedo weggi gang ipol kare cako nyaa I wigi.
teo_prompt: Itunga luipu ejaasi keda airujasia nuka ainapakina keda aiboisit naepedori kesi ainer. Neautar kesi alosit kotoma aijar, etapit aomisioit naka ajaut keda itogoi ageun aibwo kotoma aomisiokec.
lgg_prompt: Ba karakara eyi orobi asianzu ni azini angu eyini eyi omvezu eyi ma ngulupi ni 'diyi ma dria. Yi ni acizu idri ma aliarisi, egata jo ma e'iru ri ni e'do yi ma omi ma alia ola.
nyn_prompt: Abantu baingi nibaroota eby'obutebekana hamwe n'omwanya gw'okwetwa ogwabo. Ku barikutambura omu magara, ekiteekateeko ky'okuba n'amaka gaabo nikitandika kusimba emizi omu biteekateeko byabo.

eng_prompt: Many experts in the field have moved on to more innovative techniques. However, some practitioners still cling to traditional approaches.
lug_prompt: Abakugu bangi mu kisaawe kino beeyongedde ku bukodyo obuyiiya. Newankubadde, abasawo abamu bakyagoberera enkola z'ekinnansi.
ach_prompt: Ludiro mapol I tenge eni gutiyo ki diro manyen. Kadi bed kumeno, lutic mukene pud tye ka lubu yoo me tekwaro.
teo_prompt: Ipirioitin luipu kotoma aswam ngun apotu kitolomutu iponesio luitetiak luitetiak. Konye, eringa icie eswamak ekotosi aitwasam iponesio luka einono.
lgg_prompt: Ba onita be angiri e'yo 'di ma alea 'diyi mu drile geri o'diru 'diyi ma dria. Kani si, 'ba azi eyi nga po'di e'yo eyi 'ye geri a'bini 'diyisi.
nyn_prompt: Abakugu baingi omu by'obuhangwa batandikire kukoresa oburyo bw'omutaano. N'obu kiraabe kiri kityo, abarikukoresa emibazi endiijo, nibagyendera aha mihanda y'obuhangwa.

eng_prompt: In a competitive housing market, attracting potential buyers is crucial for success. To stimulate sales, real estate developers are implementing strategies that encourage income earners to secure financing.
lug_prompt: Mu katale k'amayumba akavuganya, okusikiriza abayinza okugula kya mugaso nnyo eri obuwanguzi. Okutumbula eby'okutunda, abazimba amayumba bassa mu nkola enkola ezisikiriza abafuna ssente okufuna ensimbi.
ach_prompt: I kare ma pyem tye matek tutwal I cuk me gedo, nongo luwil obedo gin ma pire tek tutwal pi cobo miti ne. Me medo cat, lugedo tye katic ki yoo mapat-pat ma cuku cwiny lutic me nongo lim.
teo_prompt: Kotoma abolobol naka esokoni loka itogoi, aitelekaar agwelak erai ibore yenepol noi kanu akerianut. Kanu aitopolor agwelanar, eutasi itunga luitolomete itogoi aitegear iwaitin lu isinyikokitos itunga lu edumunenete ikapun adumun ikapun.
lgg_prompt: A'bala cuu jo ni 'di ma alia, 'ba eco'ba je'baa 'diyi ejizu ri eri orodriru drile suza ni. Afa oziza ma omgbo otuzu, 'ba angu si'ba 'diyi geri ndundu eyi 'ye 'ba robia esupi 'diyi eka robia esuzu.
nyn_prompt: Omu katare k'amaju akarimu okuhayahayana, okushendashenda abaguzi n'eky'omugasho munonga aha businguzi. Okureetaho entunguuka omu by'obushubuzi, abarikukora eby'amaju bariyo nibakoresa oburyo oburikuhiga abarikukora esente kutunga esente.

eng_prompt: In this serene community, individuals have the freedom to design their dream homes. Here, the focus is on personal choice and creativity, allowing for a unique living experience.
lug_prompt: Mu kitundu kino eky'emirembe, abantu balina eddembe okuteekateeka amaka gaabwe ag'ebirooto. Wano, essira liri ku kusalawo kw'omuntu n'obuyiiya, okusobozesa okubeera n'obumanyirivu obw'enjawulo.
ach_prompt: I kabedo man ma kuc tye iye, dano acel acel tye agonya me yubu ot ma mitigi mito. Kany, keto cwiny tye I kom moko tam pa ngat acel acel ki diro manyen, ma weko kwo bedo ber tutwal.
teo_prompt: Kotoma atutubet kana naenapakina, ejaasi itunga keda ailajara naka aitemonokin ireria lu ekotos kesi. Kane, isingarenitai aseunet naka itunganan keda acoa na itegelikina, ijaikini itunga aijar na itegelikina.
lgg_prompt: Ongulumu asianzuru 'di ma alea, 'ba alu alu yi ma drilemgbo aku yini orobi yini 'diyi sizu ci. Angu 'di ma alea, asi 'baza 'ba ma ngulupi ma e'yo pezu azini e'yo edeza ma dria, erini fezu 'ba eyini aa'zu e'yo ndu 'diyi ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Omu kicweka eki ekirimu obusingye, abantu baine obugabe kukora enteekateeka y'amaka g'ebirooto byabo. Aha, ekiteekateeko kiri ahakutoorana omuntu weena n'okujumbura, ekirikumwikiriza kugira amagara g'omutaano.

eng_prompt: Building a new home can be an exciting venture, but it often comes with significant financial challenges. Many aspiring homeowners find themselves struggling to secure the necessary funds for construction.
lug_prompt: Okuzimba amaka amapya kisanyusa naye era kijja n'okusoomoozebwa mu by'ensimbi. Bangi abaagala okuba ne bannannyini mayumba beesanga nga balwana okufuna ensimbi ezeetaagisa okuzimba.
ach_prompt: Gedo ot manyen twero bedo tic ma yomo cwiny tutwal, ento pol kare bino ki peko me lim mapol. Dano mapol matye ki miti me bedo ki odi gi nongo tek tutwal me nongo cente ma mite pi gedo.
teo_prompt: Adukio na etogo loitetet erai ibore yenibusakinit aswam, konye epote duc ainingosia nuka ikapun. Itunga luipu lu ekotosi adumun ikulepek itogoi etionikinit adumun ikapun lu ekotoi kanu aiduk.
lgg_prompt: Jo o'diru sizu ri eco ovu e'yo azi ndrizaru ni i, te eri emu e'yo ewaru robia ni 'diyi pie. Ba karakara lepi jo eipika ru 'diyi eyi esu eyi dri ci robia 'bani lele sizu 'diyi esuzu.
nyn_prompt: Okwombeka enju nsya nikibaasa kushemeza munonga, kwonka nikikira kwija n'oburemeezi bw'esente. Baingi abarikwenda kuba bakama b'amaju, nibatunga oburemeezi bw'okutunga esente z'okwombeka.

eng_prompt: In recent years, the demand for new homes has surged due to a combination of low interest rates and a growing population. As a result, developers have ramped up their activities to meet the increasing needs of buyers.
lug_prompt: Mu myaka egiyise, obwetaavu bw'amayumba amapya bweyongedde olw'amagoba amatono n'omuwendo gw'abantu ogweyongera. N'ekivuddemu, abazimbi bongedde amaanyi mu mirimu gyabwe okusobola okutuukiriza obwetaavu bw'abaguzi obweyongera.
ach_prompt: I mwaki ma okato cokcok-ki, miti me gangi manyen omede pi wel magoba matidi ki wel dano matye kamede. Macalo adwogi ne, lugedo omedo rwom me tic gi me cobo miti pa luwil matye kamede.
teo_prompt: Kokaru lu atuboros, apolor eipuda lo itogoi luitetiak kanuka ameda na ikidioko keda enaaba lo itunga. Kanuka ngun, apotu itunga luitolomete iboro kiyatakisi aswamukec kanu aitodolikin ipudesia luka agwelak.
lgg_prompt: Eli agapi 'diyi ma alea, lezu aku o'diru 'diyi ma dria ri tu ra e'yo orodri ongmbo elesi azini kalafe 'ba eyini tupi tutu risi. E'yo 'disi, 'ba angu ezopi 'diyi otu e'yo eyini 'ye 'diyi ma omgbo ra eyini ani ecozu afa 'ba afa je'baa 'diyini lele tupi tutu 'diyi esuzu.
nyn_prompt: Omu myaka egi, obwetago bw'amaju masya bweyongyeire ahabw'amagoba makye n'omuhendo gw'abantu ogweyongyeire. N'ekyarugiremu, abarikukora emirimo y'okutunguura ebyombeko bongyeire amaani omu mirimo yaabo kwenda kuhikiiriza ebyetengo by'abaguzi.

eng_prompt: As demand for the product surged unexpectedly, suppliers struggled to keep up with the market's needs. Consequently, they raised their prices significantly, leading to unforeseen economic consequences.
lug_prompt: Ng'obwetaavu bw'ekintu bweyongedde mu ngeri etasuubirwa, ababitunzi baalwana okutuukana n'obwetaavu bw'akatale. N'ekyavaamu, baalinnyisa nnyo emiwendo gyabwe, ekyaleterawo ebizibu mu by'enfuna.
ach_prompt: I kare ma miti me jami ne omede atura, joo ma cato jami ne gunongo tek tutwal me cobo miti pa lucat. Macalo adwogi ne, gudongo welgi tutwal, ma okelo adwogi marac i kom lim.
teo_prompt: Kwape eyatakinor eipuda lo ibore, apotu agwelanarak kongeroto aitodolikin eipuda lo esokoni. Kanuka ngun, apotu kesi iyatakisi itiaisinei kec noi, ido abu koyangau atiokisio nuka ikapun.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'bani afa 'da lezu ri ni tuzu e'yo 'bani ega kokoru, 'ba afa ozipi 'diyi e'bi dri ci e'yo cuu ni le 'diyi 'yezu. E'yo 'disi, eyi otu aje eyivile 'diyi ma omgbo angiri, eyini ani ecozu e'yo ewaru robia esuzu 'diyi ejizu ra.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okugira ngu ebyetengo by'ebintu byeyongyeire, abarikubitambuza bakateeraho kuhikaana n'ebyetengo by'akatare. N'ekyarugiremu, bakongyera emihendo yaabo munonga, ekyarugiremu oburemeezi omu by'entaasya.

eng_prompt: In recent years, the real estate market has seen a significant shift in how homeowners manage their properties. As financial strategies evolve, innovative methods for transferring ownership have gained traction among buyers and sellers alike.
lug_prompt: Mu myaka egiyise, akatale k'amayumba kalabye enkyukakyuka ey'amaanyi mu ngeri bannannyini mayumba gye bakwatamu ebintu byabwe. Ng'enkola z'ebyensimbi zikyuka, enkola empya ez'okukyusa obwannannyini zifunye obuganzi mu baguzi n'abatunzi.
ach_prompt: I mwaki ma okato cokcok-ki, lucat odi gutimo aloka-loka madit tutwal I kit ma wegi odi tiyo kwede ki odi gi. Kit ma yoo me tic ki lim tye ka loke kwede, yoo manyen me kobo twero pa wegi jami dong oywek tutwal ikin luwil ki lucat.
teo_prompt: Kokaru lu atuboros, ewanyunit esokoni loka itogoi aijulanakineta noi koipone lo eyaitotor ikulepek itogoi iborokec. Kwape eutasi iponesio luka ikapun aijulakin, apotu iponesio luitetiak luka aijulakin ikulepek agwel keda agwelanarak kodumutu eipud kama ejaasi agwelak keda agwelanarak.
lgg_prompt: Eli agapi 'bo 'diyi ma alea, cuu jo ma e'ipi eyini 'diyi oja geri eyini eyi ma jo eyi ma tambazu 'diyi ra. Geri robia esuzu 'diyi ni ecaria, geri o'diru 'bani ecozu e'iru ojazu 'diyi isu e'yo 'ba afa je'baa 'diyi ma eselea 'ba afa ozi'baa 'diyi pie.
nyn_prompt: Omu myaka egi, akatare k'amaju kareebire empindahinduka y'amaani omu muringo ogu bakama b'amaju barikukoresa ebintu byabo. Nk'oku enkora y'eby'empiiha erikugyenda neetunguuka, emiringo y'okuhindura bakama, etungire amaani omu baguzi hamwe n'abaguzi.

eng_prompt: Many potential homebuyers are frustrated with the current mortgage landscape. They often find that the available options do not meet their needs or expectations.
lug_prompt: Abagala okugula amayumba bangi bennyamivu olw'embeera eriwo mu kwewola ennyumba. Batera okukizuula nti enkola eziriwo tezikwatagana na byetaago byabwe oba ebisuubirwa.
ach_prompt: Dano mapol ma gitye ki miti me wilo odi cwinygi pe yom ki lok me deno den matye kombedi. Pol kare ginongo ni jami ma gitye kwede pe cobo miti gi onyo miti gi.
teo_prompt: Itunga luipu lu ekotosi agwel itogoi mam iyalamasi keda epone loejai kwana loka aijaun ikapun luka itogoi. Etapit kesi ajenun ebe aseununeta nu ejaas mam itodolikinete ipudesia kec keda aomisio kec.
lgg_prompt: êž‹Ba karakara lepi jo jeêžŒba êžŒdiyi ma asi êžŒbo eêžŒyo êžŒbani êžŒba êžŒdule mari êžŒbezu êžŒdiyi ma dria. Eyi tutuni esu e'yo eyini eco 'ye 'diyi cani e'yo eyini le 'diyi ku.
nyn_prompt: Abantu baingi abarikwenda kugura amaju, tibashemereirwe ahabw'okuguza amabanja. Nibakira kushanga ngu eby'okukora ebirikubaho tibirikuhikiiriza ebyetengo byabo.

eng_prompt: Many individuals in the community have chosen to pursue their passions independently. As a result, they have established their own businesses and ventures.
lug_prompt: Abantu bangi mu kitundu basazeewo okwekolera ebyo bye baagala. N'ekyavaamu, batandiseewo bizineesi zaabwe.
ach_prompt: Dano mapol I kabedo gi gumoko tam gi me timo jami ma gimaro labongo kony pa ngat mo keken. Macalo adwogi ne, gucako biacara gi.
teo_prompt: Itunga luipu kotoma atutubet aseutu aswam nu ekotos kesi bon. Kanuka ngun, adukutu kesi ibiasaran kec bon.
lgg_prompt: Ba karakara ongulumu eyi ma alea 'diyi pe e'yo eyini le 'diyi 'ye eyi ma ngulupi si. E'yo 'disi, eyi e'do tujari eyi ma ngulupi ni 'diyi tualu 'yeta eyi pie.
nyn_prompt: Abantu baingi omu byaro, bacwiremu kukora ebi barikukunda ahabwaabo. N'ekyarugiremu, batandikireho bizinesi zaabo.

eng_prompt: In an effort to streamline the support for displaced families, the government has decided to allocate funds for resettlement. This initiative aims to ensure that those affected receive timely assistance during their transition.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'okutumbula obuyambi eri amaka agaasengulwa, gavumenti esazeewo okuteekawo ensimbi z'okusengula. Enteekateeka eno egendereddwamu okulaba nti abo abakoseddwa bafuna obuyambi mu budde mu kiseera ky'enkyukakyuka yaabwe.
ach_prompt: I tute me medo kony ma kimiyo ki gangi ma gurwenyo gangi gi, gamente okatti ki cente me miyo kony me kobo lutedero. Yub man tye me neno ni jo ma peko eni otimme I komgi gunongo kony ikare me aloka loka gi.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitojokar agangat na ijaikitai ikalia lu aponi itobwotarai, ecamunit apugan aijaikin ikapun kanu aitobwot. Alosikinet na erai awanyun ebe ngul lu etereikina edumunenete agangat kotoma apak na aijulakinet kec.
lgg_prompt: Okpo 'bazu atita fezu familia 'bani ofu angu eyi ma alea 'diyini ri ma omgbo otuzu, gamete 'du e'yo robia 'bazu angu eyi ma alea. Asisile 'di niri lezu nezu ra kini 'ba e'yo ewaru 'diyi azakoma esu sa'wa dria yini yi ojazurisi.
nyn_prompt: Omu kaweefube w'okwongyera obuhwezi bw'amaka agabingwa, gavumenti eshaziremu kutaho esente z'okubafurura. Ekigyendererwa n'okureeba ngu abo abateganisiibwe batunga obuhwezi omu bwire obuhikire omu bwire bw'empinduka yaabo.

eng_prompt: After weeks of speculation and rumors, the details of the event were finally revealed. The organizers had chosen to announce the arrangements publicly rather than directly informing the participants.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lwa wiiki eziwera nga bateebereza n'olugambo, byonna ebikwata ku mukolo byazuulibwa. Abategesi baali basazeewo okulangirira enteekateeka mu lujjudde mu kifo ky'okutegeeza butereevu abeetabamu.
ach_prompt: Inge cabit mapol me byek ki lok angea, lok matut I kom yub ne dong otyeko katti. Luyub onongo gumoko tamgi me miyo ngec i kom yub eni bot lwak me kaka miyo ngec atir bot joo ma obedo tye.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka isabitin luipu luka aomisio keda einer, aponi kojenunai akiro nuikamunitos akiro ngun. Apotu lu itemonokinak aseutu alimor ainapeta ngun mama ejaasi itunga itia aitijenikin ngul lu ajaas.
lgg_prompt: Sabiti 'bani e'yo egazu azini e'yo nzezu 'bori ma vutia, 'ba ece e'yo dria e'yo nde ma dria 'diyi asizu ra. Ba e'yo otupi 'diyi pe e'yo otita 'da ni 'diyi azi o'bi eyidri aga e'yo nzezu 'ba emu'ba 'diyi ma dria ri ra.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'esande z'okuteebereza hamwe n'orugambo, ebirikukwata aha mukoro bikakorwaho. Abatebekanisa bakaba bacwiremu kurangirira enteekateeka omu bantu boona, omu mwanya gw'okumanyisa abeejumbiremu butunu.

eng_prompt: After enduring months of hardship and loss, the community felt compelled to take action. They gathered their thoughts and experiences, determined to seek help from the highest levels of government.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okugumira emyezi gy'ebizibu n'okufiirwa, ekitundu kyawulira nga kiwaliriziddwa okubaako kye kikola. Baakungaanya ebirowoozo byabwe n'obumanyirivu, nga bamalirivu okufuna obuyambi okuva ku mitendera gya gavumenti egy'oku ntikko.
ach_prompt: Inge tyeko dwe mapol me can ki can, lwak guwinyo ni omyero gutim gin mo. Gu coko tam gi kacel ki ngec gi, kun gumoko tam gi me yenyo kony ki bot gamente ma rwom gi malo.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka angirikin ilapio luka atiokisio keda atwaniar, apotu itunga opupoto ebe ibusakinit kesi aswam ngun. Apotu kesi kimorikikinos aomisiokec keda akiro nuiswamasi kesi, ido apotu kesi ongicata aingarakinio kama ejaasi adokena nuapolok nuka apugan.
lgg_prompt: Mba yini e'yo ewaru azini afa aviza ni 'diyi ma ti ta mbazu 'bori ma vutia, ongulumu 'da ega kini le e'yo 'ye ra. Eyi tra egata eyivile 'diyi tualu e'yo eyini esu eyi ma dria 'diyi pie, eyini asi 'bazu azakoma ndazu engazu gamete uruleru 'diyi vu.
nyn_prompt: Ahanyima y'okugumisiriza emyezi y'oburemeezi n'okufeerwa, abantu bakahurira baine kukora. Bakateerana ebiteekateeko byabo hamwe n'ebyabahikireho, bamariirire kusherura obuhwezi kuruga omu bitongore bya gavumenti eby'ahaiguru.

eng_prompt: The community had long been struggling with the challenges of displacement, and the prospect of moving to a new location raised serious concerns. After reviewing the options, it became clear that the proposed site in Bunambutye posed significant risks to their well-being.
lug_prompt: Ekitundu kyali kimaze ebbanga nga kirwanagana n'okusoomoozebwa kw'okusengulwa, era essuubi ly'okusengukira mu kifo ekipya lyaleetawo okweraliikirira okw'amaanyi. Oluvannyuma lw'okwekenneenya eby'okusalawo, kyazuulibwa nti ekifo ekiteeseddwa e Bunambutye kyali kya bulabe nnyo eri obulamu bwabwe.
ach_prompt: Lwak gubedo ka lweny ki peko me kobo pa dano pi kare malac, dok gen me kobo I kabedo manyen okelo lworo madit tutwal. Ingee ngiyo yoo mapat-pat, onen atyer kamaleng ni kabedo ma kimito yubu I Bunambutye obedo gin marac tutwal pi kwo gi.
teo_prompt: Ajaasi itunga luka atutubet ngin keda atiokisio nuka aibwot, ido aomisioit naka aibwot aiboisit naitetet abu koyangau aiyalongong. Akaulo naka airereor aseununeta ngun, aponi kojenunai ebe ejai aiboisit naka Bunambutye atiokisio nuepolok noi mama ejaasi kesi.
lgg_prompt: Ongulumu 'da ebi dri ciria e'yo ewaru 'bani eyi ofuzu angu ndundu eyi ma alea risi, dika egata eyini muzu angu o'diru 'da ma alea ri eji asi otiza okporu. Bani e'yo ndundu 'diyi ma ale andrizu 'bori ma vutia, eca e'da kini angu 'bani lele Bunambutyea ri ni e'yo onzi eyi eji eyi ma edri ni.
nyn_prompt: Abantu batwire nibarwanagana n'oburemeezi bw'okuruga omu maka gaabo, kandi enteekateeka y'okufuruka kuza omu mwanya ogundi ekareetaho okwerarikirira kw'amaani. Bwanyima y'okushwijuma eby'okukora, kikarebeka butunu ngu omwanya oguri Bunambutye gukaba guri ogw'akabi aha magara gaabo.

eng_prompt: After several meetings, it became clear that their intentions were unclear. Despite our efforts to establish a partnership, there were still many unanswered questions about their commitment.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'enkiiko eziwerako, kyalabika bulungi nti ebigendererwa byabwe byali tebitegeerekeka bulungi. Wadde nga twafuba nnyo okuteekawo enkolagana, wabaddewo ebibuuzo bingi ebitannaba kuddibwamu ebikwata ku kwewaayo kwabwe.
ach_prompt: Ingee kacoke mapol, onen atyer kamaleng ni miti gi pe tye atir. Kadi bed ni watute matek me cako winye, pud tye lapeny mapol ma pe kigamo I kom miti gi.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka airiamununeta nuipu, apotu kojenutu ebe mam alosikinetekec ecaete. Karaida apotu sio aswam agogongu kanu aiswamaun aiswamanara, eringa ejaasi aingiseta nuipu nu mam ebongonokinitai nuikamunitos ainakina kec.
lgg_prompt: Mitingi karakara eyi ma vutia, eca e'da kini eyi ma egata eyi aa'ni kililiru ku. Okpo amani 'ba ti ecita e'dozu ra ti, zita 'bani omvi yi ma asi 'baza ma dria ku 'diyi nga po'di karakara.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'enkiiko nyingi, kikarebeka butunu ngu ebigyendererwa byabo bikaba bitarikwetegyerezibwa. Oihireho okuteeraho kwaitu kutaho enkoragana, hakaba hakiriho ebibuuzo bingi ebitarikugarukwamu ebikwatiraine n'okwehayo kwabo.

eng_prompt: Heavy rains had been falling for weeks, saturating the soil and overwhelming the drainage systems. As a result, the once-thriving farmland was now submerged, threatening the livelihoods of the local farmers.
lug_prompt: Enkuba ebadde etonnya okumala wiiki eziwera, ng'efukirira ettaka n'amazzi agava mu mazzi. N'ekyavaamu, ettaka ly'okulimirako eryali likulaakulana kati lyali lijjudde amazzi, ekitiisa obulamu bw'abalimi b'omu kitundu.
ach_prompt: Kot ma ocwe matek tutwal obedo ka cwer pi cabit mapol, obalo ngom ki pii ma aa ki I pii. Macalo adwogi ne, ngom me poto ma onongo yam ber tutwal-li dong opong ki pii, ma oketo kwo pa lupur me tedero I peko.
teo_prompt: Apolor noi edou adaun isabitin luipu, ido abu itolitol alupok keda aiboisio nuka akipi. Kanuka ngun, alupok nu apol noi nuka amisiri aponi kibirorai, ido abu kitukurian aijar naka akoriok luka atutubet.
lgg_prompt: Ozoo 'dipi okporu 'diyi e'bi e'de sabiti eyi ma alea, nyaku 'da ma alea afa 'bani eyi ofuzu eyi ma alea 'diyi ma omgbo esi. E'yo 'disi, angu amvu 'yapi ndra onyiru 'diyi curu'do yi ma dria, e'yo 'ba amvu 'ya'ba angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ma edri ni ori fezu.
nyn_prompt: Enjura y'amaani etwire neegwa kumara esande nyingi, erikwombeka eitaka kandi erikwombeka emifuregye y'amaizi. N'ekyarugiremu, eitaka ry'okuhingamu eryabaire niryeyongyera kurungi, rikagwa omu maizi, ekirikuteganisa amagara g'abahingi n'abariisa b'omubyaro.

eng_prompt: After months of planning and coordination, the team is finally ready to implement the next phase of the project. Participants have been informed about the timeline and logistics involved in the upcoming activities.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'emyezi egy'okuteekateeka n'okukwasaganya, ttiimu kyaddaaki yeetegefu okussa mu nkola ekitundu kya pulojekiti ekiddako. Abeetabamu bategeezeddwa ku budde n'entambula y'emirimu egijja.
ach_prompt: Ingee dwe mapol me yube ki winye, dul ne dong tye atera me keto but yub man mukene itic. Ki niango joo matye I yub eni I kom kare ki jami ma omyero gutim I yub matye kabino ni.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ilapio lu aitemonokin ka arucokina, ekapakina kwana etimu aitegear atutubet naetupakini naka epurojekt. Aponi olimokinai itunga nuikamunitos ainapeta nuka apak ka iboro lu ebeit aswam.
lgg_prompt: Mba 'bani otita eyi o'bazu azini eyi otuzu 'bori ma vutia, amuti 'da ngonde asizu otita 'da ma esele emupiri 'yezu. Ba lu 'ba emu'ba 'diyi dri e'yo sa'wa azini geri 'bani 'yeta emupi 'diyi 'yezu ri ma dria ra.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'emyezi mingi y'okuteekateekyera hamwe n'okukwatanisa, tiimu ekaba eyeteekateekire kuta omu nkora ekicweka ekindi ekya purogyekiti. Abeejumbiremu bamanyisibwe obwire n'oburugo bw'emirimo erikwija kubaho.

eng_prompt: In the aftermath of the devastating natural disaster, many families have been left homeless and in desperate need of shelter. To address this urgent situation, the government is exploring various housing solutions.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'akatyabaga k'obutonde, amaka mangi gasigadde nga tegalina we babeera era nga geetaaga nnyo aw'okusula. Okukola ku mbeera eno ey'amangu, gavumenti enoonyereza ku ngeri ez'enjawulo ez'okufunamu amayumba.
ach_prompt: Ingee peko ma poto atura man, gangi mapol gudong labongo gangi dok bene gimito kabedo. Me tyeko peko man ma opoto atura, gamente tye ka yenyo yoo mapat-pat me nongo odi.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka atiokisio nuka isuban, aponi kojalakinai ikalia luipu emamete ireria ido ekotosi noi neperot. Kanu aitemokin ejautene lo lo engeso, euta apugan aingic iwaitin lu egwelete itogoi luegelegela.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru nyakuni 'diyi ma e'yosi, familia karakara eyi awi aku koko dika eyi le angu aa'zu sa'wa driasi. E'yo mbeleru 'di ma aza kozu, gamete ni geri jo sizu ndundu 'diyi onda.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'ebihikiirizi by'obuhangwa, amaka maingi gasigaire gataine butaaho kandi nigetenga oburaaro. Gavumenti eriyo necondooza emiringo mingi y'okutungamu amaju, okubaasa kukora aha nshonga egi.

eng_prompt: After months of planning and coordination, the government has finalized the details for the relocation process. Community leaders have been informed, and preparations are underway to ensure a smooth transition for all involved.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'emyezi egy'okuteekateeka n'okukwatagana, gavumenti emalirizza ebikwata ku kusengula abantu. Abakulembeze b'ekitundu bategeezeddwa era enteekateeka zigenda mu maaso okulaba ng'enkyukakyuka egenda bulungi eri abo bonna abakwatibwako.
ach_prompt: Ingee dwe mapol me yube ki winye, gamente dong otyeko tyeko lok matut I kom yub me kobo dano. Lutela me tedero gityeko niango gi, ki yub tye kawot anyim me neno ni aloka loka obedo ber pi dano weng matye iye.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ilapio lu aitemonokin ka arucokina, adau apugan angetakin akiro nuikamunitos aibwot. Aponi olimokinai engarenok lu atutubet, ido eutasi aitemonokineta nuikamunitos aijulakinet naejok kanu itunga kere.
lgg_prompt: Mba 'bani otita eyi o'bazu azini ti ecita ejizu 'bori ma vutia, gamete asi e'yo 'bani 'ba eyi ojazu 'diyi ma dria 'bo. Ba lu e'yo drice'ba ongulumu eyini 'diyi ma dria ra, dika otuta eyi mu drile nezu ra kini e'yo ojata ni 'diyi eca kililiru 'ba dria e'yo nde ma alea 'diyini.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'ameezi mingi y'okuteekateekyera hamwe n'okukwatanisa, gavumenti eherize kuheereza ebirikukwata aha nkora y'okufurura abantu. Abeebembezi b'ebyanga bamanyisibwe, kandi enteekateeka nizigyenda omu maisho, okureeba ngu habaho empindahinduka nungi ahabw'abo boona abakukwatwaho.

eng_prompt: In response to the growing number of displaced families, the government announced a comprehensive plan to address the crisis. As part of this initiative, ten billion shillings were put aside to handle the resettlement.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula omuwendo gw'amaka agaasengulwa ogweyongera, gavumenti yalangiridde enteekateeka enzijuvu ey'okugonjoola ekizibu. Ng'omu ku kaweefube ono, obuwumbi kkumi bwateekebwa ku bbali okukola ku kusengula abantu.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me medde pa wel lugangi ma gurwenyo gangi gi, gamente okati ki yub me lweny i kom peko eni. Macalo but yub man, kiketo ciling bilyon apar me konyo ki yub me kobo dano.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin enaaba loka ikalia lu ekerete, abu apugan kolimo ainapeta nu aitemokin ationis ngin. Kwape ediope kotoma ainapeta ngun, aponi ibwaikinai ibilionin itomon kanu aitemokin aiboisio nuka aibwot.
lgg_prompt: E'yo kalafe familia eyini aa'zu angu ndundu eyi ma alea ri ma omgbo ni tuzu risi, gamete azi otita eyi e'dozu e'yo ewaru 'da ma aza kozu. E'yo 'di ma azi ru, 'ba 'ba silingi bilioni mudri kalaa e'yo 'bani 'ba yi erizu angu ndundu eyi ma alea ri ma aza kozu.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'omuhendo gw'amaka ogweyongyeire, gavumenti ekarangirira enteekateeka y'okukora ahaburemeezi. Nk'emwe aha nteekateeka egi, shiringi obuhumbi ikumi zikateebwaho kukora ahaby'okufurura abantu.

eng_prompt: In today's interconnected world, communication between different telecom networks is essential for seamless connectivity. As a result, these companies have established a system of fees to facilitate calls made across their networks.
lug_prompt: Mu nsi ya leero ekwataganye, empuliziganya wakati w'emikutu gy'ebyempuliziganya egy'enjawulo ya mugaso mu kuyungibwa obulungi. N'ekivuddemu, kampuni zino zitaddewo enkola y'ebisale okukwasaganya amasimu agakubiddwa ku mikutu gyazo.
ach_prompt: I lobo ma ite kare ni kubbe tye, kubbe ikin dul cim mapat-pat obedo gin ma pire tek pi kube maber. Macalo adwogi ne, kampuni magi guketo yub me culu pi goyo cim I kabedo gi mapat-pat.
teo_prompt: Kotoma akwap naka lolo naejaasi keda arucokina, erai einer kiding inetiwaks luka isimun luegelegela ibore yenepol noi kanu arucokina. Kanuka ngun, etolomutu ikampunin lu ikapun kanu ainom isimun kotelebisionikec.
lgg_prompt: Wudrikuru andruri ma alia, e'yo nzeza amuti simu ni ndundu 'diyi ma eselea ri eri orodriru e'yo yi ecizu kililiru. E'yo 'disi, amuti 'diyi o'ba geri aje ofeza ni 'diyi simu gbaza yi vile amuti 'diyi ma alia 'diyi ma aza kozu.
nyn_prompt: Omu nsi y'erizooba erikukwatanisa,empurizagana ahagati y'emikutu y'empurizagana etari emwe n'emwe n'ey'omugasho ahabw'okukwatanisa kurungi. N'ekyarugiremu, kampuni ezi zitandikireho enkora y'okushashura esente z'okuteera esimu aha mikutu yaazo.

eng_prompt: In light of recent discussions regarding telecommunications infrastructure, the Commission has reviewed the current interconnection policies. As a result, they have decided to implement new guidelines for service providers.
lug_prompt: Okusinziira ku kukubaganya ebirowoozo okwakolebwa gye buvuddeko ku by'empuliziganya, akakiiko keetegerezza enkola eriwo ku by'empuliziganya. N'ekivuddemu, basazeewo okussa mu nkola ebiragiro ebipya eri abagaba obuweereza.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki nywako lok ma otime cokcok-ki I kom yub me kubbe I kin dul mapat-pat me cim, dul enoni dong ongiyo cik me kubbe I kin dul mapat-pat matye kombedi. Macalo adwogi ne, gumoko tamgi me keto cik manyen pi joo ma miyo kony.
teo_prompt: Koipone kalo aitemitem akiro nuikamunitos isimun, abu ekomision irereonor ainapeta nuikamunitos arucokina naka isimun. Kanuka ngun, aseutu kesi aitegear aicoreta nuitetiak kanu ijanakino.
lgg_prompt: E'yo agbatara ni o'diru 'diyi ma e'yosi, amuti e'yo oyuza ni 'diyi ondrepi omvele Commission andri azita o'bi yi ecizu yi ma eselea 'diyi ma ale andri ra. E'yo 'disi, eyi 'du e'yo azita o'diru 'diyi 'bazu 'ba azakoma fepi 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okuhanuura okwabaireho ebiro ebi ebikwatireine n'empurizagana y'eby'empurizagana, ekitongore ky'ebyempurizagana kyashwijuma engyenderwaho eriho obwahati. N'ekyarugiremu, bashaziremu kutaho ebiragiro bisya by'abaheereza.

eng_prompt: In recent years, the telecommunications market in the region has seen significant growth and competition. As a result, one network has emerged as the clear leader among consumers.
lug_prompt: Mu myaka egiyise, akatale k'ebyempuliziganya mu kitundu kalabye okukulaakulana okw'amaanyi n'okuvuganya. N'ekivuddemu, omukutu gumu guvuddeyo nga omukulembeze omwerufu mu bakozesa.
ach_prompt: I mwaki ma okato cokcok-ki, cuk me kubu cim I but lobo man dong odongo tutwal ki pyem bene tye matek tutwal. Macalo adwogi ne, dul cim mo acel odoko latela I kin lutic kwede.
teo_prompt: Kokaru lu atuboros, apolor noi esokoni loka isimun kotoma aiboisit kana keda abolobol naepol noi. Kanuka ngun, elomunit ediope loka elago kwape engarenon kama ejaasi agwelak.
