lug_prompt: Ekibuga kyali kijjudde essanyu ng'ekivvulu ekitegekebwa buli mwaka kisikiriza abantu okuva mu bitundu ebiriraanyeewo. Kyokka, embeera y'ebikujjuko yakyuka mangu n'efuuka ey'entiisa amawulire bwe gaafulumye ku bubbi obwabaddewo ekiro kya jjo.
ach_prompt: Obedo yomcwiny madit tutwal I boma ne I kare ma kwer me mwaka ki mwaka obedo kakelo dano mapol tutwal ki I kabedo macok kwede. Kadi bed kumeno, yom cwiny me kwer ne olokke odoko lworo I kare ma lok angea obino I kom yak ma otime laworo I dyewor.
teo_prompt: Ajaasi etaun keda aiyalama naarai apotu itunga luka aiboisio nu idunyare kolomutu kotoma opucit kangol ekaru. Konye, apotu aiboisio nuka epucit kijulakinos atiokisio nalimorere akiro nuikamunitos akoko na ajai akware nabian.
lgg_prompt: O'bi enga angu jo ejele ru 'diyi ma alia 'diyi emu omu eli vusi 'da ma alea eyini aa'zu ayiko si. Kani si, e'yo ayiko zuza niri oja i mbeleru ecazu osuta ru 'bani e'yo ogu ni i 'yepi ini ajerisi ri ma dria 'bori ma vutia.
nyn_prompt: Orurembo rukaba rwijwire okushemererwa ahabw'okujaguza okwabaire kubaho buri mwaka okwaretsire abantu baingi kuruga omu myanya eyabaherereire. Kwonka, embeera y'okujaguza ekahinduka ey'ekikangabwa amakuru g'obushuma obwabaireho nyekiro.

eng_prompt: The tension in the room escalated as the suspect grew increasingly agitated. Despite the officer's attempts to de-escalate the situation, he found himself in a precarious position.
lug_prompt: Obunkenke mu kisenge bweyongera ng'omutemu yeeyongera okutabuka. Wadde ng'omuserikale yagezaako okukkakkanya embeera, yeesanga mu mbeera etali nnungi.
ach_prompt: Lworo omedde tutwal I ot ne I kare ma ngat ma byek me timo bal tye I kome omedde ki bedo ki lworo. Kadi bed ni abili ne oteme me dwoko piny peko ne, en onongo ni en tye I peko matek tutwal.
teo_prompt: Apotu ingungeta kotoma agola kiyatakinos naarai abu loetepesenitai itolitol noi. Karaida abu epolisit kotam aitidisiar ejautene, abu ngesi kodum akekuan toma ojautene loetiono noi.
lgg_prompt: Asi otiza jo ale aliza ma alia ri tu uru 'ba 'bani ega eza e'yo 'da ni ecazu asi driasi. Azi'ba 'da ni tro o'bi e'yo 'da ma omgbo esizu ra ti, esu i e'yo ewaru ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Okwerarikirira omu kishengye kweyongyeire ahabw'okuba owabaire nateekateekwaho akakwatwa ekiniga. Oihireho okuteeraho kw'omuserukare kukyendeeza embeera, akeeshangira ari omu mbeera y'akabi.

eng_prompt: After a lengthy pursuit through the city, the suspects managed to evade capture. In the chaos that ensued, the Joint Anti-Terrorist Task Force car was never recovered.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okuyigga ekibuga okumala ebbanga eddene, abateeberezebwa baalemererwa okukwatibwa. Mu kavuyo akaaddirira, emmotoka y'ekitongole ekirwanyisa obutujju teyazuulibwa.
ach_prompt: I ngee lubo kor lutim bal pi kare malac I boma ne, jo mabyek me bal tye I komgi ni pe kimako gi. I kuku kuku ma obedo tye, pe kinongo motoka pa dul makilwongo Joint Anti-Terrorist Task Force.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ameet naepol noi kotoma oibuga, apotu luitepesenitai kopedosi aisac aikamanario. Kotoma amumu nabu kotakanu, mam aponi kodumunai emotoka loka Atukot naitepegit lukodwaratau.
lgg_prompt: E'yo vuti obiza sawa ezu aku ambu city niri ma alea 'bo ri ma vutia, 'ba 'bani ega eyi eza e'yo 'diyi apa eyi e'yo 'bani eyi obizu risi te. Ngiringiri emupi 'da ma alea, 'ba awini mutukari amuti Joint Anti-Terrorist Task Force niri esu ku.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okubakuratiira obwire buraingwa omu rurembo, abarikuteekateekwaho kukora ebihagaro bakabaasa kwetantara okukwatwa. Omu butabanguko obwarugiremu, emotoka y'ekitongore ekirikurwanisa obutugi ekaburaho.

eng_prompt: Access to clean water remains a significant challenge in many regions of Uganda. Recent studies highlight the alarming number of individuals struggling to meet this basic necessity.
lug_prompt: Okufuna amazzi amayonjo kukyali kusoomooza kwa maanyi mu bitundu bya Uganda bingi. Okunoonyereza okwakakolebwa kulaga omuwendo gw'abantu abafuba okutuukiriza ebyetaago bino ebikulu.
ach_prompt: Nongo pii maleng pud obedo peko madit tutwal I but lobo Uganda mapol. Kwed ma otime cokcok-ki nyutu wel dano mapol tutwal matye ka tute me nongo jami ma mite pi kwo.
teo_prompt: Adumunun akipi nu elaete eringa erai ainingosit naepol noi kotoma aiboisio nuipu ko Uganda. Aingic napac itodunit enaaba loepol noi loka itunga luiticanitos aitodolikin iboro lu itwasamao.
lgg_prompt: Yi ala esuzu ri eri nga po'di e'yo ewaru kari Uganda niri ma woko karakara eyi ma alea. E'yo eti ondaza ebipi o'diru 'diyi ece kalafe 'ba alu alu yini dri ciria afa 'bani lele aa'zu edriru 'diyi esuzu.
nyn_prompt: Okutunga amaizi marungi n'oburemeezi bw'amaani omu bicweka bingi omu Uganda. Okucondooza okwakozirwe obwahati nikworeka omuhendo gw'abantu abarikurwana kuhikiiriza ebyetengo ebi.

eng_prompt: Our team has received several reports about the environmental impact of recent developments. As a result, we are investigating the tree planting project.
lug_prompt: Ttiimu yaffe efunye alipoota nnyingi ezikwata ku ngeri enkulaakulana gye yakosaamu obutonde bw'ensi gye buvuddeko. N'ekyavaamu, tunoonyereza ku pulojekiti y'okusimba emiti.
ach_prompt: Dul pa lutic wa gunongo adwogi tic mapol I kom dongo lobo ma otime cokcok-ki. Macalo adwogi ne, watye ka kwedo yub me pito yadi.
teo_prompt: Adumu etimukosi iripootan luipu nuikamunitos epone loepedoriata apol naka akwap. Kanuka ngun, iuta sio aingic epurojekt lo aira ikito.
lgg_prompt: Amuti amavile ri isu o'duko karakara eyi e'yo angu ama agei 'diyi ma ta mbapi o'diru 'diyi ma dria. E'yo 'disi, ama otita pati sazaniri ma eti ondaria.
nyn_prompt: Tiimu yaitu etungire ripoota nyingi ezirikukwata aha nkoragana y'obuhangwa bw'ensi. N'ekyarugiremu, turiyo nitucondooza aha purogyekiti y'okubyara emiti.

eng_prompt: In our recent budget meeting, we discussed the importance of investing in sustainable agriculture. As a result, we have allocated significant funds to enhance educational programs in coffee production.
lug_prompt: Mu lukiiko lwaffe olw'embalirira gye buvuddeko, twayogedde ku bukulu bw'okusiga ensimbi mu byobulimi n'obulunzi obuwangaazi. N'ekivuddemu, tutaddewo ensimbi nnyingi okutumbula pulogulaamu z'okusomesa mu kulima emmwanyi.
ach_prompt: I kacoke me byek me lim ma okato cokcok-ki, wanywako lok I kom ber pa keto lim I pur ma twero medde anyim. Macalo adwogi ne, wamiyo cente madit tutwal me tyelo kor yub me pwonyo lucat mwanyi.
teo_prompt: Kotoma airiamunetekosi naka ebajet, apotu sio etetemoto ajokis naka aipikakin ikapun toma akoru na ejok. Kanuka ngun, ijaik sio ikapun luipu kanu aitopolor ainapeta nuka aisisianakin nuka akoru emwanyi.
lgg_prompt: Ama vile mitingi otita ajeni o'diruri ma alia, ama nze e'yo orodri 'bani lonyi vuti alezuri 'bazu e'yo agirikica ni ewu drile ri ma alia ri ma dria ra. E'yo 'disi, ama 'ba robia angiri otita onitani kawa ezoza ma dria 'diyi otuzu.
nyn_prompt: Omu rukiiko rwaitu orw'embaririra, tukahanuura aha mugasho gw'okuta esente omu by'obuhingi n'oburiisa. N'ekyarugiremu, tutaireho esente nyingi, okutunguura enteekateeka y'okwegyesa abantu okuhinga omwani.

eng_prompt: In response to the increasing frequency of natural disasters, the government convened an emergency meeting to discuss funding strategies. After extensive deliberation, they agreed on a substantial budget allocation to enhance the nation's resilience.
lug_prompt: Olw'obutyabaga obweyongedde, gavumenti yayita olukiiko olw'amangu okuteesa ku ngeri y'okuvujjiriramu ensimbi. Oluvannyuma lw'okuteesa ennyo, bakkiriziganya ku mbalirira ey'amaanyi ey'okutumbula obugumu bw'eggwanga.
ach_prompt: Pi peko ma poto atura matye kamede, gamente olwongo kacoke me laro lok I kom yoo me nongo lim. Ingee tam matut, guwinye I kom byek lim madit tutwal me medo kero pa lobo.
teo_prompt: Kanu aiyatakin atiokisio nu akwap, abu apugan onyarau airiamun na engeso kanu aitemitem iwaitin lu agangat ikapun. Akaulo naka aomisio nuipu, apotu kesi ocamanaros nuka ebajet loepol kanu aitogogong apedor naka akwap.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru nyakuni 'diyi ma omgbo ni tuzu ri ma e'yosi, gamete omve mitingi e'yo mbeleru ni e'yo nzezu geri robia esuzu 'diyi ma dria. E'yo o'yoza angiri ma vutia, eyi ai otita ajeni okporu kari 'di ma okpo otuzu.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'oburemeezi bw'obuhangwa obweyongyeire,gavumenti eketa orukiiko rw'ahonaaho kuhanuura ahaby'esente. Bwanyima y'okuteesa munonga, bakaikirizana aha mbaririra nungi y'eihanga.

eng_prompt: In the wake of the devastating storm that swept through the region, many families found themselves in peril. As the winds howled and the waters rose, about five hundred left their homes and took refuge in camps.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'omuyaga ogw'amaanyi ogwakulukuta mu kitundu, amaka mangi gaasangibwa mu buzibu. Embuyaga bwe yali ewuluguma n'amazzi bwe gagenda galinnya, abantu nga bitaano baava mu maka gaabwe ne baddukira mu nkambi.
ach_prompt: Ikare ma yamo magwa obalo kabedo wa, gangi mapol onongo peko. Ikare ma yamo tye ka cwer ki pii tye ka cwer, dano maromo miya abic guweko pacigi ka gudok i kem.
teo_prompt: Akaulo na ekwam lo abu onyam aiboisit, apotu ikalia luipu kodumutu ationis. Neautar ekwam aiwe ka aiyatakin akipi, apotu itunga luedolete akwatakany kojalakisi ireriakec kosodete aiboi okabin.
lgg_prompt: Oli okporu angu 'da ma alea ri ma vutia, familia karakara eyi esu eyi e'yo ewaru ma alea. E'yo oli ni olizu azini yi ni tuzurisi, 'ba ogogo turu towi ku aku yini 'diyi azini apa yi kembe yi ma alia.
nyn_prompt: Ahanyima y'eihunga ry'amaani omu kyanga, amaka maingi gakashangwa omu kabi. Omuyaga ku gwatembire kandi amaizi gaayeyongyera, abantu abarikuhika magana ataano bakaruga omu maka gaabo baaza omu kampu.

eng_prompt: As the coffee revival gained momentum, many community members expressed their hopes for economic growth. However, this enthusiasm was soon met with unexpected obstacles that highlighted deeper issues within the local culture.
lug_prompt: Okuzzaawo kw'emmwanyi bwe kweyongera, abantu bangi mu kitundu baalaga essuubi lyabwe mu nkulaakulana y'ebyenfuna. Newankubadde, obwagazi buno bwakwatagana n'ebizibu ebitasuubirwa ebyalaga ensonga ez'omunda mu buwangwa bw'ekitundu.
ach_prompt: I kare ma dongo pa mwanyi ocake, dano mapol ma ikabedo mapatpat gunyuto gen gi pi dongo lobo. Kadi bed kumeno, yom-cwiny man onongo peko ma pe byek tye iye ma onyuto lok matut tutwal I tekwaro me tedero.
teo_prompt: Neyatakinor aijar naka emwanyi, apotu itunga luka atutubet itodutu amuno naka apol naka ikapun. Konye, apotu aiyalama na kodumutu atiokisio nu mam eomitai ebe epedorete aitodun akiro nuepolok nuka inonosio luka atutubet.
lgg_prompt: Kava ma omgbo ni tu uru, 'ba karakara ongulumu eyi ma alea 'diyi ece asi'baza eyini zota e'yo robiani 'diyiniri ma dria. Kani si, ayiko 'diri fu mbeleru e'yo ewaru 'bani ega kokoru e'dapi e'yo onzi 'diyi ma dria e'yo a'bi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okugaruka kw'omwani kweyongyera, abantu baingi omu byaro boorekire amatsiko gaabo g'entunguuka omu by'entaasya. Kwonka, okushemererwa oku kukahikwaho oburemeezi obutarikuteekateekwaho obwaretsireho enshonga z'amaani omu by'obuhangwa.

eng_prompt: In order to enhance our production capabilities and meet the increasing demand, we need to explore options for financial and equipment support. After discussing our current resources, it has become clear that external assistance is necessary.
lug_prompt: Okusobola okwongera ku busobozi bwaffe obw'okufulumya ebintu n'okutuukiriza obwetaavu obweyongera, twetaaga okunoonyereza ku ngeri y'okufunamu obuyambi bw'ensimbi n'ebyuma. Oluvannyuma lw'okukubaganya ebirowoozo ku bintu bye tulina kati, kyeyoleka bulungi nti obuyambi okuva ebweru bwetaagisa.
ach_prompt: Me medo kerowa me yubo jami ki cobo miti ma tye kamede, omyero wanen yoo me nongo kony me lim ki jami tic. Ingee nywako lok I kom jami ma watye kwede kombedi, nen atyer kamaleng ni kony ma aa ki woko mite.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitopolor apedorosiowok nuka aitolomio ka aitodolikin eipuda lo iyatakin, ekot oni aimo iwaitin lu igangitotor oni keda iboro. Akaulo naka aitemitem iboro lu ejaas oni, ecai cut ebe ejokuna noi agangat naka akwapin nukokinga.
lgg_prompt: Ama ecozu afa edeza amavile 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu dika lezu afa 'bani le 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu, le ama ma nda geri ecozu atita robia ni azini afa ayuzaru 'diyi fezu 'diyi ma dria ra. E'yo ama vile lonyi sawa 'disi 'diyi o'yozu 'bori ma vutia, eca e'da kini azakoma engazu amveleru ri eri orodriru.
nyn_prompt: Kubaasa kwongyera ahaby'okukora n'okushemeza ebyetaago, twine kuronda oburyo bw'okutunga esente n'ebikwato. Bwanyima y'okuhanuura aha by'obugaiga ebi twine hati, nikyeyoreka butunu ngu obuhwezi kuruga aheeru n'obw'omugasho.

eng_prompt: As the security personnel prepared for the final screening, they reminded the passengers to remove any metallic items from their pockets. The atmosphere was tense as everyone understood the importance of ensuring safety before boarding the flight.
lug_prompt: Nga ab'eby'okwerinda beetegekera okukeberebwa okusembayo, bajjukiza abasaabaze okuggya ebintu byonna eby'ekyuma mu nsawo zaabwe. Embeera yali ya bunkenke nga buli omu ategeera obukulu bw'okukakasa obukuumi nga tannalinnya nnyonyi.
ach_prompt: I kare ma lugwok kuc tye ka yubbe me pimo dano me agiki, gu poyo wi luwot me kwanyo jami moo weng ki I jeba gi. Lweny obedo tye pien dano weng oniang ber pa gwoko kuc ma peya gudonyo I dege.
teo_prompt: Neautatar itunga luka ayuwara aitemonokin kanuka ainwakio naka awasia, apotu kesi isiitikisi itunga alemun iboro luka acuma kotoma oisawokokec. Ajai aiyalongong naarai apotu itunga kere ojenutu ajokis naka aidar ayuwara eringa eloto odege.
lgg_prompt: Azi'ba ageitema ni 'diyi ni otuta 'yeria eyi ma rua andrita asizu risi, eyi ega 'ba aci ni 'diyi ma e'yo eyi ma jebe eyi ma alea 'diyi nzezu ra. Angu nderi ndra asi otiza ru 'ba dria ni e'yo egazu kini eri orodriru e'yo agei tema ni 'diyi 'yezu rakaka de nga po'di 'ba e'doni ndege ma dria ku.
nyn_prompt: Ab'eby'okwerinda ku barikweteekateekyera okukyeberwa, bakahabura abashabazi kwiha ebintu by'ebyoma omu nshaho zaabo. Embeera ekaba eri ey'obunkenke ahabw'okugira ngu buri omwe akeetegyereza omugasho gw'okureeba ngu habaho oburinzi atakatambwire enyonyi.

eng_prompt: As the train pulled into the station, the conductor raised his voice to announce the arrival. Despite his enthusiasm, the platform seemed unusually empty today.
lug_prompt: Nga eggaali y'omukka eyingira ku siteegi, kondakita yayimusa eddoboozi lye okulangirira okutuuka kwayo. Wadde nga yali musanyufu nnyo, olutuula lwalabika nga njereere leero.
ach_prompt: I kare ma gar ocung I tecen, kondakita oketo dwane malo me waco ni gar dong oo. Kadi bed ni cwinye obedo yom, kabedo ne obedo nono tutwal tin.
teo_prompt: Neadolunia agaali ositeseni, abu ekondakita kitutub eporotoke kanu alimor adolunekec. Karaida eyalama ngesi, esubit bala emamei itunganan lolo.
lgg_prompt: Garimosi ni ecaria pari azia, kondakita 'da otu o'duko erini ecazu ri oluzu. Erini tro ovuzu ava be ra ti, pari e'yo nzeria ri e'da andru pirini.
nyn_prompt: Eggaari y'omwika kuyabaire neeza aha sitesheni, kondakita akatwara eiraka rye ahaiguru kurangirira okuhika kwayo. Oihireho okushemererwa kwe, entebe erizooba ekaba erimu busha.

eng_prompt: The local economy has been struggling lately, leading many residents to seek opportunities elsewhere. As a result, the streets feel emptier than usual, with a noticeable decline in new visitors.
lug_prompt: Eby'enfuna by'omu kitundu bibadde bikaluba ennaku zino, ekiviiriddeko abatuuze bangi okunoonya emikisa awalala. N'ekivuddemu, enguudo ziwulira nga njereere okusinga bulijjo, n'okukendeera kw'abagenyi abapya.
ach_prompt: Biacara me tedero tye ka canne tutwal I kare-ni, ma oweko lutedero mapol gucito ka yenyo gum me tic I kabedo mukene. Macalo adwogi ne, gudu ne winyo calo tye nono maloyo macon, ki wel wele manyen matye ka dwogo piny.
teo_prompt: Ejaasi ikapun luka atutubet keda ationis apakio nu, ido abu ijaik itunga luipu aimo arerengesio aiboisio acie. Kanuka ngun, epupete irotin kwape luemamete itunga, ido ikidioko ipejok luitetiak.
lgg_prompt: E'yo robia esuzu angu 'da ma alea ri ebi e'yo ewaru esu o'du 'diyi ma alea, erini fezu 'ba karakara eyi drileba ndazu pari azi 'diyi ma alea. E'yo 'disi, nzila eyi ma alea 'ba eyi yo aga eyi ma alea ri ra, 'ba emu'ba o'diru 'diyi ma omgbo esi ra.
nyn_prompt: Eby'entatsya y'ekyaro bitwire nibirwanagana ebiro ebi, ekirikureetera abatuuragye baingi kuronda emigisha ahandi. N'ekyarugiremu, enguuto nizihurirwa nk'ezirikye munonga, n'abagyenyi abatsya bakakyendeera munonga.

eng_prompt: Authorities have issued a warning about potential threats in the area. Residents are advised to stay alert and follow safety protocols.
lug_prompt: Ab'obuyinza bafulumizza okulabula ku bulabe obuyinza okubaawo mu kitundu. Abatuuze bakubirizibwa okubeera obulindaala n'okugoberera ebiragiro by'obukuumi.
ach_prompt: Lutela gukati ki lok me ciko dano pi peko ma twero bedo tye ikabedo eni. Ki lego lwak me bedo ma wanggi twolo dok me lubu cik me gwoko kuc.
teo_prompt: Apotu apedorosio ikwenyasi nuikamunitos atiokisio nuepedorete atakanun katutubet. Icorakitai itunga asalakin ekapakina ka aitup ainapeta nuka ayuwara.
lgg_prompt: Ba okpo e'ipi ru 'diyi fe bile ndu liza e'yo ewaru ecopi candi fepi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ma dria. Ba ai 'ba aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi aa'zu mile be dika eyi ma obi azita ageyitema ni 'diyi ma vuti.
nyn_prompt: Ab'obushoborozi barabwire aha bintu ebirikubaasa kutiinisa ekyanga. Abatuuragye nibahaburwa kuguma beteekateekire n'okukuratira ebiragiro by'okwerinda.

eng_prompt: As I strolled through the quaint streets of the town, the vibrant window displays caught my eye. Curiosity piqued, I decided to step inside a local clothing shop.
lug_prompt: Bwe natambulatambula mu nguudo z'ekibuga ez'ebbeeyi, endabirwamu ezaali mu madirisa zankwatako amaaso. Olw'okwagala okumanya, nnasalawo okuyingira mu dduuka ly'engoye ery'omu kitundu.
ach_prompt: I kare ma atye ka wot I teng gudu ma beco tutwal me boma ne, ginanyuta matye I wang dirica omako wanga. Pi miti me ngeyo jami mapol, amoko tamma me donyo I dukan me cato bongi.
teo_prompt: Neautar eong alosit korotin luka etaun, apotu iponesio luajokak luka adirisan ikamasi akonyeka. Kanu akoto ajenun iboro, abu eong alot oiduka loka igoen.
lgg_prompt: Mani aciria nzila tawuni 'da ma alea 'diyi ma alea risi, afa 'bani e'da angu 'da ma dria 'diyi 'du ma mile ra. E'yo mani lezu e'yo onizu 'diyisi, asi 'du e'yo fizu dukani bongo ozizuri ma alia.
nyn_prompt: Ku naabaire nintambura omu nguuto z'ekibuga, ebirikworekwa omu madirisa bikakwata amaisho gangye. Ahabw'okwenda kumanya, nkaza omu duuka ry'emyenda.

eng_prompt: Recent economic downturns and rising inflation have led to a decline in consumer confidence. As a result, many shoppers are hesitant to spend, impacting overall sales.
lug_prompt: Okukendeera kw'ebyenfuna gye buvuddeko n'ebbeeyi y'ebintu okulinnya bireetedde okwekkiririzaamu kw'abaguzi okukendeera. N'ekivuddemu, abaguzi bangi batya okusaasaanya, ekikosa okutunda okutwalira awamu.
ach_prompt: Can lim ma otimme cokcok-ki ki mede pa wel cente oweko luwil pe gubedo ki tek cwiny. Macalo adwogi ne, luwil mapol pe gimito tic ki cente, ma man balo cat gi.
teo_prompt: Akadakada na ikapun keda aiyatakin na etiai loka ikapun eyangaunit aibiror naka amunokina naka agwelak. Kanuka ngun, ekapakina agwelak luipu aitosom ikapun, ido itolitoli agwelanar.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru e'yo robiani 'diyi ma alia azini e'yo aje ma ongmbo tuzaniri fe 'ba afa je'baa 'diyi ma asi'baza esi esi ra. E'yo 'disi, 'ba afa je'ba 'diyi ma pari yi asi otiza be afa ayuza ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Okukyerererwa kw'ebyentatsya hamwe n'okweyongyera kw'ebbeeyi y'ebintu, bireesire abaguzi kukyendeera. N'ekyarugiremu, abaguzi baingi tibarikwenda kukozesa sente, ekirikuteganisa eby'obushuubuzi.

eng_prompt: The current economic climate is becoming increasingly unstable, and our sales have plummeted over the past few months. Without immediate intervention, we risk losing everything we've worked for.
lug_prompt: Embeera y'ebyenfuna eriwo kati yeeyongera okutabanguka, era okutunda kwaffe kukendedde mu myezi egiyise. Awatali kuyingira mu nsonga mu bwangu, tuli mu katyabaga k'okufiirwa buli kimu kye tukoledde.
ach_prompt: Lok me lim matye kombedi tye ka doko peko madit tutwal, dok cat megwa odok piny tutwal I dwe ma okato ni. Labongo timo gin mo oyotoyot, waromo rwenyo jami weng ma watiyo pire.
teo_prompt: Mam ejautene loka ikapun ejokuna noi, ido ekidiokoto agwelanar wok kotoma ilapio lu atuboros. Arai mam itemonokino katipet, ipedori oni atwaniar iboro kere luiswamata oni.
lgg_prompt: E'yo robia ni sawa 'disi ri ni eca e'yo ewaru ru dika afa amani ozile 'diyi e'de mba agapi 'bo 'diyi ma alea ra. Ba ka fi e'yo 'di ma alea mbeleru ku, ama eco afa dria amani nga azi ngazu drinia 'diyi avi ra.
nyn_prompt: Embeera y'eby'entaasya eriho obwahati eyeyongyeire kutabanguka, kandi n'okuguza kwaitu kweyongyeire omu myezi mikye ehwaire. Hatariho okutaahamu ahonaaho,nitubaasa kufeerwa buri kimwe eki twakozire.

eng_prompt: Despite our best efforts to find stable jobs, the financial burden continues to weigh heavily on us. Each day brings new challenges as we navigate our expenses without a steady income.
lug_prompt: Wadde nga tukoze kyonna ekisoboka okufuna emirimu egy'olubeerera, obuzibu bw'ensimbi bukyatuzitowa nnyo. Buli lunaku luleeta okusoomoozebwa okupya nga bwe tutambulira ku nsaasaanya yaffe nga tetulina nnyingiza ya nkalakkalira.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni watye ka tute matek me nongo tic maber, peko me lim pud tye mapek tutwal I komwa. Nino ki nino kelo peko manyen ikare ma watye ka tic ki cente ma pe watye kwede.
teo_prompt: Karaida iswamai oni kagogongu kanu adumun aswamisinei nu eyuara, eringa ationis naka ikapun epol noi. Kanginipaaran eyangaununei ainingosia nuitetiak naarai ipedori oni aitodolikin ikapun wok komam edumunenei ikapun luegelegela.
lgg_prompt: Amani tro okpo 'bazu azi kililiru 'diyi esuzu ra ti, e'yo robia niri ni nga po'di ama ma dria nzizaru. O'du alu alu ni e'yo ewaru eji amani afa amani ayu 'diyi ma aza kozu geri robia esuzu ri kokoru.
nyn_prompt: Oihireho okuteeraho kwaitu kurungi okuronda emirimo, oburemeezi bw'esente nibuturemera munonga. Buri eizooba nirireeta oburemeezi obutsya, nk'oku turikukora aha nshohoza yaitu tutatungire entaasya ya buriijo.

eng_prompt: Due to the recent heavy rainfall and subsequent damage, the government has prioritized infrastructure improvements. As a result, roads are being repaired by the ministry.
lug_prompt: Olw'enkuba ennyingi eyaakavaako n'ebyonoonese oluvannyuma, gavumenti ekulembezza okulongoosa ebizimbe. N'ekyavaamu, enguudo ziddaabirizibwa minisitule.
ach_prompt: Pi kot ma ocwe matek ma okato cokcok-ki, gamente oketo cwinye tutwalle I yubu jami ma mite pi lwak. Macalo adwogi ne, gangkal tye ka yubu gudi.
teo_prompt: Kanuka edou loepol noi loatubor keda atiokisio nuipu, abu apugan isingarenit aitojokar adukena. Kanuka ngun, euta erionget aitemonokino irotin.
lgg_prompt: Ozoo 'dipi o'diru 'diyi ma e'yosi azini e'yo onzi 'diyi ma e'yosi, gamete 'du e'yo okporu afa ayuzaru 'diyi ma otuza ma dria. E'yo 'disi, okalamvu 'da ni nzila eyi ede.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'enjura nyingi eyahweireho obwahati hamwe n'okusisikara kw'ebyombeko, gavumenti eteire amaani omu kutunguura ebyombeko. N'ekyarugiremu, enguuto ziriyo nizikorwaho minisiture.

eng_prompt: The once-bustling marketplace now stands eerily quiet, with vendors struggling to attract customers. Fear and uncertainty have taken hold of the community, drastically affecting their daily lives and spending habits.
lug_prompt: Akatale akaabaddemu abantu abangi kati kasirifu, abatembeeyi balwana okusikiriza bakasitoma. Okutya n'obutali bukakafu bikutte ekitundu, ne bikosa nnyo obulamu bwabwe obwa bulijjo n'enkola y'okusaasaanya ensimbi.
ach_prompt: Cuk ma onongo dano dwong iye ni dong tye laling, lucat tye ka yele me nongo luwil. Lworo ki lworo omako lwak, ma man obalo kwo gi me nino ki nino ki kit ma gitiyo kwede ki cente.
teo_prompt: Esokoni loajaasi keda itunga luipu noi, ejai kwana aililing, ido eutasi agwelanarak aimo agwelak. Ekuriaka keda amamus acamanar ejaas itunga, ido itolitoli aijar kec naka nginiparan keda epone loka aitosom ikapun.
lgg_prompt: Angu cuu ni andra okorisi 'ba eyini aa'zu tu 'diyi sa'wa 'disi pa tu e'yere, 'ba afa ozipi 'diyi dri ci aje'ba eyi ejizu. Uri azini e'yo ewaru 'diyi bi ongulumu eyi ma eselea, e'yo eyi ma edri o'du driasi azini geri eyini robia ayuzu 'diyi ojazu onzi.
nyn_prompt: Obutare obwabaire burimu abantu baingi obwahati nibuhunama, abarikuguza ebintu nibarwana kureeta abaguzi. Okwerarikirira n'okutiina bikwasire abantu, byahindura munonga emituurire yaabo eya buriizooba hamwe n'emitwarize yaabo y'okukozesa sente.

eng_prompt: The current situation has been quite challenging for everyone involved. Despite the difficulties we face, we remain optimistic about the future.
lug_prompt: Embeera eriwo kati ebadde nzibu nnyo eri buli muntu akwatibwako. Wadde nga twolekaganye n'ebizibu, tukyalina essuubi ku biseera eby'omu maaso.
ach_prompt: Ngo matye katimme kombedi obedo peko madit tutwal ki bot dano weng makemme ki lok eni. Kadi bed watye ki peko mapol, pud watye ki gen pi anyim.
teo_prompt: Erai ejautene loejai kopana ainingosit nejaas itunga kere. Karaida ejaasi oni keda atiokisio nuipu, ija oni keda aomisio nuejokuka nuikamunitos oingaren.
lgg_prompt: E'yo sawa 'disi ri ebi ovu ewaru 'ba dria e'yo nde ma alea 'diyi dri. E'yo ewaru amani esu 'diyi ma talasi, ama asi'baza be ewu drialeri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Embeera eriho obwahati egumire munonga buri omwe orikukwatwaho. Oihireho oburemeezi obu turikushanga, nituguma twine amatsiko aha bya nyensya.

eng_prompt: The early morning sun cast a warm glow over the deserted city, highlighting the freshly washed sidewalks. After weeks of construction and chaos, the neighborhood finally felt peaceful again.
lug_prompt: Enjuba y'oku makya ennyo yayaka ku kibuga ekyali kikalu, ng'eraga abantu ku nguudo ezaakayooyootebwa. Oluvannyuma lwa wiiki eziwera ez'okuzimba n'obutabanguko, ekitundu kyaddamu okuwulira emirembe.
ach_prompt: Ceng ma obedo ka ryeny odiko tutwal obedo ka ryeny I kom boma madit ma dano peke iye, kun nyutu yoo ma ki lwoko manyen. Ingee cabit mapol me gedo ki kuku-kuku, kabedo ne dong obedo ki kuc.
teo_prompt: Abu akolong naka tupuruc kicaik esite loemamei itunga, itodunit aica naka irotin luitetiak. Akaulo naka isabitin luka aiduk keda amumu, apotu idunyeta kopuputu ainapakina bobo.
lgg_prompt: Etuka o'bitisi okorisi ri fe acita drizaru aku ambu cityniri ma dria, erini e'dazu angu 'bani oji o'diru 'diyi ma dria. Sabiti 'bani sizu azini ngiringiri ma alia 'bori ma vutia, angu jo ejele ru 'diyi asizu yi ama asi anzuru dika.
nyn_prompt: Omushana gw'akasheeshe gukabiika orurembo orwabaire rutaine bantu, nigureebeka aha nguuto ezaabaire zikye. Bwanyima y'esande z'okwombeka hamwe n'akavuyo, abantu bakahurira obusingye.

eng_prompt: In light of recent incidents in the area, local authorities have issued a warning to residents. They emphasized the importance of staying vigilant and aware of their surroundings.
lug_prompt: Okusinziira ku bibaddewo gyebuvuddeko mu kitundu, ab'obuyinza bafulumizza okulabula eri abatuuze. Baakakasizza obukulu bw'okubeera obulindaala n'okumanya ebibeetoolodde.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki jami ma otimme cokcok-ki I kabedo eni, lutela me tedero guciko lwak. Guwaco ni pire tek tutwal me bedo ma wanggi twolo ki ngeyo kabedo ma orumu gi.
teo_prompt: Katupitos nuiswamasi pac kotoma aiboisit kangin, apotu apedorosio kikwenyasi itunga luka atutubet. Apotu kesi kitogogongoto ajokis naka asalakin epodokinit ka aijen nu iswamasi.
lgg_prompt: E'yo i 'yepi angu 'da ma alea o'diru 'diyi ma e'yosi, drice'ba angu 'da ma alea 'diyi fe bile ndu liza 'ba aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi dri. Eyi fe okpo orodri aa'zu mile be azini aa'zu mile be angu eyini aa'zu 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'ebyabaireho omu kyanga, ab'obushoborozi omu byaro barabwire abatuuragye. Bakashoboorora omugasho gw'okwetegyereza n'okumanya ebibarikwetorwaire.

eng_prompt: In the bustling capital of Uganda, various businesses thrive amidst a vibrant marketplace. To better represent their interests and foster collaboration, local entrepreneurs have come together to form an association.
lug_prompt: Mu kibuga ekikulu ekya Uganda ekirimu abantu abangi, bizinensi ez'enjawulo zikulaakulana mu katale akajjudde abantu. Okukiikirira obulungi ebigendererwa byabwe n'okutumbula enkolagana, abasuubuzi b'omu kitundu bakwataganye ne bakola ekibiina.
ach_prompt: I boma madit me Uganda ma dano dwong iye tutwal, biacara mapat-pat tye ka dongo kadi bed ni cuk tye ma dano dwong iye tutwal. Me cung pi miti gi ki dongo winye, lutim biacara me tedero guribe kacel me cako dulgi.
teo_prompt: Kotoma aiboisit naepol noi naka eibuga loko Uganda, iswamaete ibiasaran luipu noi kotoma osokoni loepol noi. Kanu abwoikin nu ekotos kesi ka aitopolor aiswamanara, apotu agwelanarak luka atutubet kimorikikinos kosodete aiswamaun atukot.
lgg_prompt: Aku ambo kari Uganda niri ma alea, tujari karakara eyi tu uru angu cuu ni aa'zu 'diyi ma eselea. Ba tujari 'yepi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi emu tualu pa tuzu e'yo eyini le 'diyi ma paria kililiru dika eyi ma ti ecita ma omgbo otuzu.
nyn_prompt: Omu kibuga ekikuru ekya Uganda ekirimu abantu baingi, bizinesi nyingi nizikora kurungi omu katare akarimu abantu baingi. Okujwekyera kurungi ebibarikwetenga n'okureetaho okukwatanisa, abashuubuzi b'omubyaro bateireho ekibiina.

eng_prompt: The once-bustling marketplace was filled with the sounds of laughter and chatter, but that all changed in an instant. Fear gripped the community as chaos erupted around them.
lug_prompt: Akatale akaabaddemu abantu abangi kaali kajjude amaloboozi g'okuseka n'okunyumya, naye ebyo byonna byakyuka mu kaseera katono. Okutya kwakwata ekitundu ng'obutabanguko bubalwetoolodde.
ach_prompt: Cuk ma onongo dano dwong iye ni opong ki dwon me nyero ki lok, ento meno weng olokke I ngee kare manok. Lworo omako lwak ikare ma kuku kuku ocake I kabedogi.
teo_prompt: Apotu itunga luipu kilelebunos kosokoni, konye apotu ngun kere ijulakinos katipet. Abu akuriau ikam itunga naarai abu amumu kogeun aiboisio kere.
lgg_prompt: Angu cuu ni okorisi 'ba eyini aa'zu tu ri ma alea ri ga tre o'duko nyaza ni azini e'yo nzeza ni 'diyisi, te e'yo 'da eyi oja dria sa'wa were si. Uri bi ongulumu eyi e'yo ngiringiri ni e'doria eyi ma kalasi kuru risi.
nyn_prompt: Akatare akaabaire karimu abantu baingi kakaijuga amahurire g'okusheka n'okugamba, kwonka ebyo byona bikahinduka omu bwire bukye. Abantu bakwatwa okutiina ahabw'obutabanguko obwabaireho.

eng_prompt: Researchers have identified several key factors contributing to the phenomenon. As a result, the consequences of these factors are becoming increasingly evident.
lug_prompt: Abanoonyereza bazudde ensonga enkulu eziwerako eziviirako ekintu kino. N'ekivuddemu, ebiva mu nsonga zino byeyongera okweyoleka.
ach_prompt: Lutim kwed gunongo tyen lok mapigi tego ma oweko man otimme. Macalo adwogi ne, adwogi pa jami magi tye ka nen atyer kamaleng.
teo_prompt: Apotu angicak kodumutu akiro nuipu nu eyangaunitos ngun. Kanuka ngun, eutai aanyun atiokisio nuelomunete kanuka ngun.
lgg_prompt: Ba e'yo ondapi 'diyi esu e'yo okporu fepi e'yo 'di ni i 'yezu 'diyi karakara. E'yo 'disi, e'yo efupi e'yo 'diyi ma dria 'diyi curu'do e'da yi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Abarikucondooza bashangire enshonga nyingi ezirikureetaho oburemeezi obu. N'ekyarugiremu, ebirugire omu bintu ebi biriyo nibyeyongyera kureebeka.

eng_prompt: In the wake of the recent attacks, tensions have escalated among community members. Many residents are now wary of each other, leading to a palpable sense of distrust.
lug_prompt: Olw'obulumbaganyi obwaliwo gye buvuddeko awo, obunkenke bweyongedde mu bantu b'omu kitundu. Abatuuze bangi kati beefaako bokka na bokka, ekiviiriddeko obuteesigangana.
ach_prompt: Ikare me mony ma otimme cokcok-ki, telle omede ikin lwak. Lutedero mapol dong gitye ki lworo I kom luwotgi, ma oweko dano pe geno luwotgi.
teo_prompt: Kanu asurokinio na pac, eyatakinos aiyalongong kanejaas itunga luka atutubet. Ekuriaka kwana itunga luka atutubet nepepe, ido ngin eyangauni amamus amunokina.
lgg_prompt: E'yo amvuta o'diru 'diyiniri ma vutia, asi otiza ma omgbo tu 'ba ongulumu ma alia 'diyi ma eselea. Ba karakara aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi curu'do eyi ma eselea mile be eyi ma eselea, e'yo 'di fe 'ba eyini asi 'bazu eyi ma eselea ku.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'obutabanguko obwabaireho juba, obunkenke bweyongyeire omu bantu b'omukyanga. Abatuuragye abaingi hati niberarikirira bataahi baabo, ekirikureetaho obuteikirizana.

eng_prompt: As a local vendor, I established a strong rapport with the community. My unique selection of products and friendly service kept them coming back for more.
lug_prompt: Ng'omusuubuzi w'omu kitundu, nnakola enkolagana ey'amaanyi n'ekitundu. Ebyamaguzi byange eby'enjawulo n'obuweereza obw'omukwano byabakomyawo okufuna ebisingawo.

lgg_prompt: Ba afa ozipi angu 'da ma alea ri ru, ma e'do aa'ta onyiru ongulumu eyi pie. Afa ma vile 'diyi ma esele ndu azini azi ngaza onyiru 'diyi fe yi dri emvi drile e'yo drile 'diyi esuzu.
nyn_prompt: Nk'omushuubuzi w'omukyanga, nkakora enkoragana nungi n'abantu b'omukyanga. Ebintu byangye eby'omutaano hamwe n'obuheereza bwangye oburungi, bikabareetera kugaruka kutunga ebirikukiraho.

eng_prompt: Before leaving the market, double-check your cart to make sure you have everything you need. Once you're done shopping, remember to pay for all the fruits.
lug_prompt: Nga tonnava mu katale, kebera akagaali ko okukakasa nti olina byonna by'oyagala. Bw'omala okugula ebintu, jjukira okusasula ebibala byonna.
ach_prompt: Mapwod pe iweko cuk, nen ni I tye ki jami weng ma imito. Ka I tyeko wilo jami, wii myero opo ni I culu pi nyig yat weng.

lgg_prompt: De nga po'di ku cu'a ku, mi ma andri mi vile mutukari ri pale iri nezu ra kini afa dria mini leleri mi vu ci. Eka de afa je 'bo, ega mi ma ofe afa pati efi ru 'diyi dria ra.

eng_prompt: As economic pressures mount and consumer preferences shift, many traditional business models are being challenged. Consequently, adapting to these changes has become increasingly complex for entrepreneurs.
lug_prompt: Ng'okunyigirizibwa kw'ebyenfuna kweyongera n'ebyetaago by'abaguzi okukyuka, enkola za bizinensi ez'edda nnyingi zisomoozebwa. N'ekivuddemu, okumanyiira enkyukakyuka zino kyeyongedde okuba ekizibu eri abasuubuzi.

teo_prompt: Kwape iyata ationis naka ikapun keda aijulanakineta nuka agwelak, eutasi iponesio luipu luka agwelanar luitegelikina ainingosit. Kanuka ngun, etiono noi agwelanarak acamanar keda aijulanakineta nu.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru e'yo robia ni ma alia 'diyi ma omgbo ni tuzu tualu e'yo 'ba afa je'baa 'diyi ni le 'diyi ma ojata be, geri tujari 'yezu oku 'diyi e'do ewaru. E'yo 'disi, e'yo ojata 'diyi 'yezu ri eca curu'do ewaru 'ba tujari 'yepi 'diyi dri.

eng_prompt: The farmers gathered in the field, puzzled by the sudden absence of their livestock. Whispers of concern spread through the community as they searched for answers.
lug_prompt: Abalimi baakuÅ‹Å‹aanidde mu nnimiro nga beewuunyizza olw'okubulwa kw'ebisolo byabwe. Okuwuubaala okw'okweraliikirira kwasaasaana mu kitundu nga banoonya eby'okuddamu.

teo_prompt: Apotu akoriok kotukokinos amisiri, mam ejenete iboro luemamete keda ibaren kec. Apotu akiro nuka aiyalongong osiarakisi itunga luipu noi aimo abongokineta.

nyn_prompt: Abahingi baketeeranira omu musiri, barikutangaara ahabw'amatungo gaabo okuburaho. Orugambo rw'okwerarikirira rukajanjaara omu bantu, obwo barikusherura eby'okugarukamu.

eng_prompt: Whispers of betrayal and hidden agendas filled the air, casting a shadow over the once-close-knit community. Trust had eroded over time, leaving a palpable tension that made every interaction feel like a potential confrontation.
lug_prompt: Okuwuubaala okw'okulya mu nsi olukwe n'ebigendererwa ebikwese byajjula empewo, ne bissa ekisiikirize ku bantu abaaliko obumu. Obwesige bwali bukendedde oluvannyuma lw'ebbanga, ne bulekawo okusika omuguwa okwali kuwulikika mu buli nkolagana nga okulwanagana okuyinza okubaawo.
ach_prompt: Lok me kwilo lok me turu gamente kacel ki miti ma mung opong I yamo, ma oketo tipo I kom lwak macon ma onongo gubedo cok. Gen orweny ikare me kare ma okato, kun weko telle ma nen tutwal ma oweko kubbe weng obedo calo lweny matwero time.
teo_prompt: Apotu akiro nuikamunitos amengerikit keda aomisio nu aiyeyea kilelebunos kokwam, ido apotu itunga luajaasi sek kojaasi keda aimorikikina naepol noi. Apotu amunokina kibiroros kotoma apak naepol noi, kojalakisi aiyalongong naepol noi najaikini ngin airiamunet kwape ainingosit naepedori aswam.

Asi êžŒbazu êžŒba yi ma eselea êžŒbo sawa êžŒdisi, asi êžŒbaza fe êžŒbani eêžŒyo dria êžŒyezu êžŒba yi ma eselea êžŒdiyi ma eêžŒyo egazu ekile eêžŒyo êžŒyezu êžŒba yi ma eselea êžŒdiyi le.

eng_prompt: Recent developments in the economy have led to significant changes in various sectors. As a result, the effects of these changes are no longer confined to urban centers.
lug_prompt: Enkulaakulana eyaliwo gye buvuddeko mu by'enfuna ereeseewo enkyukakyuka ez'amaanyi mu bitongole eby'enjawulo. N'ekivuddemu, ebiva mu nkyukakyuka zino tebikyali mu bibuga byokka.
ach_prompt: Alokaloka ma otimme I tenge me lim okelo aloka-loka I tenge mapat-pat. Macalo adwogi ne, adwogi pa aloka-loka magi dong pe tye I boma madongo keken.
teo_prompt: Apol naka ikapun nes ayangau aijulanakineta nuipu kotoma iriongeta luegelegela. Kanuka ngun, mam bobo ationis naka aijulanakineta nu erai aiboisio nuka itaunin bon.
lgg_prompt: E'yo angu ezoma ni curu'do e'yo robiani 'diyi ma alia 'diyi eji ojata okporu esele ndu ndu yi ma alia ra. E'yo 'disi, e'yo ojata 'diyi ni 'diyi ovuni curu'do lu aku ambu tawuni ru 'diyi ma alia ku.
nyn_prompt: Entunguuka omu by'entatsya eherize kubaho, ereesireho empindahinduka y'amaani omu bitongore bitari bimwe na bimwe. N'ekyarugiremu, ebirikuruga omu mpindahinduka ezi tibikiri omu ndembo zonka.

eng_prompt: As businesses struggle to adapt to the new market conditions, many are reporting significant losses. Consequently, communities are bracing for the ripple effects of these changes.
lug_prompt: Nga bizinensi zifuba okumanyiira embeera z'akatale akapya, nnyingi zifiirwa nnyo. N'olw'ekyo, abantu beetegekera ebizibu ebiva mu nkyukakyuka zino.
ach_prompt: I kare ma biacara tye ka tute matek me ngiyo ki jami matye katime I cuk, polgi tye ka rwenyo lim madit tutwal. Macalo adwogi ne, lwak tye ka yubbe pi adwoki pa aloka-loka magi.
teo_prompt: Kwape eutasi ibiasaran ainingosit ajenun ejautene loitetet loka esokoni, eutasi luipu aibiror ikapun luipu. Kanuka ngun, eutasi itunga aitemonokin kanuka atiokisio nuka aijulanakineta nu.
lgg_prompt: Tujura yini dri ciria yi ojazu e'yo cuu ni o'diru 'diyi be, karakara yi e'yo aviza amboru 'diyi ece. Ka'dini, ongulumu eyi eyi otu eyi e'yo ojata 'diyi ni 'diyi esuzu.
nyn_prompt: Eby'obushubuzi ku birikugyezaho kukorengana n'embeera y'akatare ensya, bingi biriyo nibitunga okufeerwa kw'amaani. N'ahabw'ekyo, abantu nibeteekateekyera ebireije kuruga omu mpindahinduka ezi.

eng_prompt: Due to ongoing financial difficulties and a lack of customers, many local establishments have struggled to stay afloat. As a result, these businesses have been closed since last year.
lug_prompt: Olw'ebizibu by'ensimbi ebigenda mu maaso n'ebbula ly'abaguzi, amaduuka mangi mu kitundu galwana okusigala nga galimu. N'ekyavaamu, bizinensi zino zaggalwawo okuva omwaka oguwedde.
ach_prompt: Pi peko me lim matye kawot anyim ki nok pa luwil, odi cat mapol tye ka yele me cung matek. Macalo adwogi ne, biyacara magi kilorogi nicake mwaka ma okato.
teo_prompt: Kanuka atiokisio nu ikapun nu elosi akonye keda amamus na agwelak, etionikinitos aiboisio nuipu nuka agwelanar. Kanuka ngun, egolokinitai ibiasaran lu ageun okaru je.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru robia ni 'diyi ma e'yosi azini aje'ba eyi ma ako si, angu tujari 'yezu karakara angu 'da ma alea 'diyi e'bi dri ci aa'zu tujari 'yezu. E'yo 'disi, tujari 'diyi ebi ovu opizaru e'dozu eli ajerisi.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'oburemeezi bw'esente oburikugyenda omu maisho hamwe n'eibura ry'abaguzi, amatundiro maingi g'omubyaro gatungire oburemeezi bw'okugumizamu. N'ekyarugiremu, bizinesi ezi zikingirwe kuruga omwaka oguhwaire.

eng_prompt: In assessing the impact of the recent conflict, it became clear that the consequences extended far beyond immediate losses. Many lives were affected, and the long-term effects on the community are profound and complex.
lug_prompt: Mu kwekenneenya ebiva mu butakkaanya obwaliwo gye buvuddeko, kyalabika bulungi nti ebyavaamu byali bisingako nnyo ku kufiirwa okw'amangu. Obulamu bungi bwakosebwa, era ebikosa ebitundu mu bbanga eggwanvu bya maanyi era bizibu.
ach_prompt: Ikare me ngiyo adwogi me lweny ma obedo tye cokcok-ki, onen atyer kamaleng ni adwogi ne obedo kama bor tutwal. Kwo pa dano mapol onongo peko, ki adwogi marac ma obedo tye pi kare malac tutwal I kom lwak.
teo_prompt: Kotoma aingic atiokisio nuka ingungeta lupac, apotu kojenutu ebe mam atiokisio nuelomunitos elosete adepar atwaniario. Aponi itolitoli aijar naka itunga luipu, ido epol noi atiokisio nuka apak naepol noi mama ejaasi itunga.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ngiringiri ebipi o'diru 'diyiniri ma e'yo ma ale andrita ma alia, eri eca e'dazaru kini e'yo yi 'yepi 'diyi aga afa avile 'diyi ra. Ba karakara eyi ma edri eyi eza ra, dika e'yo eyi 'yepi ongulumu eyi ma dria sa'wa ezu 'diyi ma alea 'diyi saaru.
nyn_prompt: Omu kushwijuma ebirugire omu butabanguko obwahwaireho, kikarebeka butunu ngu ebirugire omu butabanguko bikaruga aheeru. Amagara maingi gakateganisibwa, kandi ebirikuteganisa abantu obwire buraingwa n'eby'omutaano munonga.

eng_prompt: As the storm swept through the town, it left behind a trail of destruction that was hard to comprehend. Many businesses were left in ruins, their futures uncertain and their owners devastated.
lug_prompt: Ng'omuyaga gukulukuta mu kabuga, gwalekawo akabenje akazibu okutegeera. Bizineesi nnyingi zaalekebwa nga zifuuse matongo, ebiseera byazo eby'omu maaso nga tebikakafu era bannannyini zo nga bafiiriddwa.
ach_prompt: Ikare ma yamo magwar ne obalo boma ne, en oweko jami mapol ma obedo tek tutwal me niang. Biacara mapol odong macalo obur, kwo gi me anyim pe obedo ber ki wegi gi bene gunongo peko.
teo_prompt: Neautar ekwam aibiror otaun, abu kojalak aibiror naetiono amisiikin. Aponi kojalakinai ibiasaran luipu aibiror, mam ejaasi kesi keda aijar naka koingaren, ido apotu ikulepek kec kotwakiasi.
lgg_prompt: E'yo oli okporu 'da ni angu tawuni 'da ma alea ri ma alea risi, eri ku e'yo ezaza ni ewaru 'bani ecozu vazu ra 'diyi ma vutia. Tujura karakara eyi ku eyi e'deta ru, ewu eyivile ewu drialeri ni aa'zu e'yo kokoru dika eyi ma eipika eyi eza eyi ra.
nyn_prompt: Omuyaga ku gwatembire orurembo, gukasigaho akabi k'amaani akarikutangaaza. Bizinesi enyingi zikasigara nk'ebicuucu, ebiro byazo eby'omumaisho tibirikwetegyerezibwa kandi bakama baazo bakacwekyerezibwa.

eng_prompt: The recent changes in local regulations have led to a significant decline in foot traffic. As a result, many establishments are struggling to maintain their customer base.
lug_prompt: Enkyukakyuka ezaakolebwa gye buvuddeko mu mateeka g'ebitundu ziviiriddeko okukendeera kw'entambula y'ebigere. N'ekivuddemu, amaduuka mangi galwana okukuuma abaguzi baago.
ach_prompt: Aloka-loka ma otime cokcok-ki I cik me tedero okelo dwoko piny rwom me wot ki tyen. Macalo adwogi ne, odi cat mapol tye ka tute matek me gwoko luwilgi.
teo_prompt: Aijulanakineta nueyapiete pac kotoma okisila luka atutubet ayangau aitidisiario naka elose loka itunga. Kanuka ngun, eutasi aiboisio nuipu ainingosit aidar agwelak kec.
lgg_prompt: Ojata o'diru azita angu ndundu eyini 'diyi ma alea 'diyi fe 'ba acipi pasi 'diyi ma omgbo esi ra. E'yo 'disi, angu nyaka ozizu karakara 'diyi dri ci aje'ba yini 'diyi ma ta mbazu.
nyn_prompt: Empindahinduka ezabaireho omu biragiro by'ebyaro, zikareetaho okukyendera kw'ebiiruka by'ebigyere. N'ekyarugiremu, amatundiro maingi nigarwana kurinda abaguzi baago.

eng_prompt: After months of isolation and harsh treatment, the conditions in the prison had taken a severe toll on the inmates' mental health. Many of them struggled to cope with the memories of their experiences, leaving them in a state of despair.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'emyezi egy'okweyawula n'okuyisibwa obubi, embeera mu kkomera zaali zikosezza nnyo obulamu bw'abasibe obw'obwongo. Bangi ku bo baalwana okusobola okugumira ebizibu bye baayitamu, ekyabaleetera okuggwaamu essuubi.
ach_prompt: Inge dwe mapol me bedo kengi ki kit marac ma kitero kwede mabuc, kit ma ot buc tye kwede okelo peko madit tutwal I kom adam pa mabuc. Polgi gubedo ki peko me lweny ki jami ma otimme I komgi, man oweko cwinygi otur adada.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ilapio luipu luka atiakar keda amumu, apotu iponesio luka iwenan kotwakiasi aomisio nuka iwenan. Apotu luipu kakesi kongicata aitikitik akiro nuapotu kesi kotakanutu, kojalakisi kesi kotoma aiyalongong.
lgg_prompt: Mba 'bani 'ba aru ru 'diyi ma esele cozu azini yi o'bizu onzi 'bori ma vutia, e'yo arujo 'da ma alea 'diyi eza 'ba aru ru 'diyi ma omi ra. Yi ma karakara eyi 'ye e'yo ewaru e'yo eyini esu 'diyi ma e'yo egazu, eyini ani ava ako kuzu.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'emyezi mingi y'okushoroorwa hamwe n'okutuntuzibwa kubi, embeera omu kihome ekaba eteganiise amagara g'omutwe gw'abasibe. Baingi aharibo bakarwana kurwanisa ebyabaireho, ekyabarekire omu mbeera y'okwerarikirira.

eng_prompt: As the economic downturn deepens, many companies are struggling to stay afloat. Reports of layoffs and closures have become increasingly common, leaving a sense of uncertainty in the air.
lug_prompt: Ng'ebyenfuna byeyongera okusereba, amakampuni mangi galwana okusigala ku mutindo. Amawulire g'okugoba abantu ku mirimu n'okuggalawo amatendekero geeyongedde, ekirese obutali bukakafu mu bbanga.
ach_prompt: Kit ma can lim tye ka medde kwede, kampuni mapol tye ka tute matek me cung matek. Lok me juku tic ki loro tic tye ka nya tutwal, ma oweko lworo tye ikin dano.
teo_prompt: Kwape eyatakinor ejautene loka ikapun, eutasi ikampunin luipu aijar. Akiro nuikamunitos alemario naka itunga keda agolokinio naka itunga epuakata noi, ido ijalakini aiyalongong kokwam.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru e'yo robia ni 'diyi ma alia 'diyi ma omgbo ni tuzurisi, amuti karakara eyi dri ci eyi ma ta mbazu. O'duko e'yo 'bani 'ba eyi ofuzu azi'a azini angu eyi ma ti opizu 'diyi ma dria 'diyi eca curu'do sa'wa driasi e'yo eyi ma aza kozu ku.
nyn_prompt: Okugwa kw'eby'entaasya kwayeyongyera, kampuni nyingi nizirwana kugumaho. Ripoota z'okwiha abantu omu mirimo hamwe n'okukinga emirimo yeyongyeire, ekiretsireho okwerarikirira omu bantu.

eng_prompt: As I reflect on my tenure, I often think about the various obstacles we faced as a leadership team. Can you share some insights into the difficulties you encountered while steering the company?
lug_prompt: Nga bwe ndowooza ku kiseera kye mmaze, ntera okulowooza ku bizibu eby'enjawulo bye twasanga nga ttiimu y'obukulembeze.
ach_prompt: Ka atamo I kom kare na, pol kare atamo I kom peko mapol ma wanongo macalo lutela.
teo_prompt: Neautar eong aomoom nuikamunitos apak ka, etapit eong aomoom nuikamunitos atiokisio nuetereikina keda sio kwape etimu loka engarenok.
lgg_prompt: Mani e'yo egazu ma vile azi ngazuri ma dria, ma e'yo ega e'yo ewaru amani esu amuti driceza niri ru 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Nk'oku ninteekateeka aha bwire bwangye,ninkira kuteekateeka aha buremeezi butari bumwe na bumwe obu twahikwaho nka tiimu y'obwebembezi.

eng_prompt: As the construction project progressed, we faced several obstacles that hindered our productivity. Among these issues, one stood out as particularly problematic.
lug_prompt: Pulojekiti y'okuzimba bwe yagenda mu maaso, twasanga ebizibu bingi ebyatulemesa okukola obulungi emirimu gyaffe. Mu nsonga zino, emu yeeyoleka ng'esinga obuzibu.
ach_prompt: I kare ma yub me gedo tye ka wot anyim, wanongo peko mapol ma ogengo ticwa. I kin lok magi, lok acel obedo peko madit tutwal.
teo_prompt: Neautar epurojekt lo aduko alosit, apotu sio adumutu atiokisio nuipu nu abu kimik aswam wok. Kotoma akiro nu, apotu idiopebore kotakanutu kwape ationis.
lgg_prompt: Otita afa sizu 'da ni muzu drile, ama esu e'yo ewaru karakara eyi amani azi ngazu muke ku 'diyi. E'yo 'diyi ma eselea, alu efu e'yo ewaru ru.
nyn_prompt: Omurimo gw'okwombeka ku gwagumire nigugyenda omu maisho, tukashanga oburemeezi bwingi oburikuturemesa kukora gye. Omu nshonga ezi, emwe ekarebeka nk'ey'oburemeezi.

eng_prompt: As we assessed the delivery capacity of our truck, it became clear that our current resources were limited. Despite our efforts to maximize efficiency, the demand for tiles far exceeded our supply.
lug_prompt: Bwe twekenneenya obusobozi bwa loole yaffe, kyategeerekeka bulungi nti ebyetaago byaffe kati bitono. Newankubadde twafuba okukola obulungi, obwetaavu bwa tile bwali businga nnyo obwaffe.
ach_prompt: I kare ma watye ka neno kit ma mutoka wa twero cwalo kwede jami, nen atyer kamaleng ni jami ma watye kwede kombedi nok tutwal. Kadi bed ni watute matek me tic maber, miti pa tayil obedo lamal tutwal I kom jami ma watye kwede.
teo_prompt: Neautar sio airereor epone loepedoria sio aitodolikin iboro, apotu kojenutu ebe ikidioko iboro lu ipedori oni aitodolikin. Karaida iswamata sio kagogongu kanu aitodolikin eswamae, apolor noi eipuda loka atailis adepar iboro lu ijaikitai sio.
lgg_prompt: Amani e'yo ama vile lorri ri ma okpo 'diyi ma ale andriria, eri eca e'dazaru kini afa amani esu sawa 'disi 'diyi were. Ama ni tro okpo 'ba e'yo ama ni 'diyi 'yezu kililiru ra ti, afa ayule tile ru 'diyi ma dria 'diyi aga ama vile afa ayule tile ru 'diyi ra.
nyn_prompt: Kuturikwetegyereza oku roore yaitu erikubaasa kutwara ebintu, kikarebeka butunu ngu eby'obugaiga ebi twine hati tibirikumara. Oihireho okuteeraho kwaitu kw'okukora kurungi ebintu, ebyetengo bya tayiro bikasinga ebyetengo byaitu.

eng_prompt: After months of searching for a solution, we faced a significant challenge in sourcing the right materials for our project. Fortunately, a recent development in the market has made it much easier for us to find what we need.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'emyezi nga tunoonya eky'okugonjoola, twasanga okusoomoozebwa okw'amaanyi mu kufuna ebikozesebwa ebituufu ku pulojekiti yaffe. Ekirungi, enkulaakulana mu katale gye buvuddeko etuyambye okwanguyirwa ennyo okufuna bye twetaaga.
ach_prompt: Ingee dwee mapol me yenyo yoo me tyeko peko, wanongo peko madit tutwal I nongo jami ma mite pi yub megwa. Ki gum maber, dongo lobo ma otime cokcok-ki I cuk oweko nongo jami ma wamito odoko yot.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ilapio luipu luka aimo epone loka aitemokin ngun, apotu sio adumutu ainingosit naepol noi naka adumun iboro luedolitos kanu epurojekt wok. Arereng najokan, apol naka esokoni nes epatana oni adumun iboro lu ikoto oni.
lgg_prompt: Mba 'bani e'yo nde ma aza kozu 'bori ma vutia, ama fu dri e'yo ewaru amboru be afa 'bani ayu otita ama vileri 'yezu 'diyi esuzu. Drilebaru, angu ezoma cuu ma alia o'diru 'diyi fe ama dri ewakokoru afa amani leleri esuzu.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'ameezi maingi turikuronda eky'okukora, tukashanga oburemeezi bw'amaani omu kutunga eby'okukoresa ebirikwetengwa omu purogyekiti yaitu. Eky'omugisha murungi, entunguuka omu katare ehweire kyanguhiire kutunga ebi turikwetenga.

eng_prompt: In any team setting, I believe that clear roles and responsibilities are essential for success. When faced with a project, I often prioritize assigning tasks to ensure everyone contributes effectively.
lug_prompt: Mu mbeera yonna eya ttiimu, nzikiriza nti emirimu n'obuvunaanyizibwa ebitangaavu bikulu nnyo eri obuwanguzi. Bwe njolekaganye ne pulojekiti, ntera okukulembeza okugaba emirimu okulaba nga buli omu akola bulungi.
ach_prompt: I dul tic mo keken, atye ki niyee ni tic ki tic matye atir obedo gin ma pire tek pi loc. Kace atye ki project, pol kare amiyo tic ki dano me neno ni dano weng gutiyo maber.
teo_prompt: Kotimun kere, aomit eong ebe aswamisinei nu ecaete ka aswam ejok kanu akerianut. Arai etereikina eong keda epurojekt, etapit eong aitolomun aswamisinei kanu awanyun ebe itunga kere iswamaete ejok.
lgg_prompt: Amuti dria ma alea, ma a'i ra kini azi azini azi onyiru 'diyi orodriru drile suza ni. Aka dri fu otita azi be, ma tutuni e'yo 'bazu okporu ndrezu kini 'ba dria ni azi nga kililiru.
nyn_prompt: Omu tiimu yoona, ninyikiriza ngu emirimo n'obujunaanizibwa burungi n'eby'omugasho aha businguzi. Ku ndikuhikwaho purogyekiti, buriijo ninyebembeza okuheereza emirimo kureeba ngu buri omwe yaagiheereza kurungi.

eng_prompt: After months of careful recruitment and training, I finally assembled a group of talented individuals who share my vision. Their enthusiasm and commitment have been instrumental in driving our projects forward.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'emyezi gy'okuwandiika n'okutendekebwa n'obwegendereza, nasembayo okukungaanya ekibinja ky'abantu abalina ebitone abagabana okwolesebwa kwange. Obunyiikivu bwabwe n'obumalirivu bibadde bikulu mu kutwala pulojekiti zaffe mu maaso.
ach_prompt: Ingee dwe mapol me coyo dano ki pwonyo gi, I agiki ne acoko gurup pa dano matye ki talanta ma gitye ki neno marom ki mega. Cwinygi ki mit komgi okonyo tutwal I tyelo kor yub megwa.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ilapio luka aitolomio ka aitutuonoro, abu eong atukun egurupu loka itunga luejaasi keda atalanta kwape ka eong. Akangasia kec keda ainakina kesi engarakisi noi aitolot ipurojektin wok.
lgg_prompt: Mba 'bani 'ba eyi sizu kililiru azini imbata esuzu 'bori ma vutia, ma tra asizu ongulumu 'ba talanta be 'diyi ma eselea egata mani 'diyi pie. Ayiko eyini ri tualu asi feza eyini 'diyi pie ri ebi ovu orodriru otita eyi amavile 'diyi ma ti ojizu drile.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'emyezi mingi y'okutandika n'okutendeka n'obwegyendesereza, nkahendera nashanga guruupu y'abantu abaine etaraanta abarikushushanisa enteekateeka yangye. Okushemererwa kwabo n'okwehayo kwabo bikwasire munonga omu kutwara purogyekiti zaitu omu maisho.

eng_prompt: As I evaluate the leadership team, I notice a trend in their age demographics. It seems that the majority of my top managers have significant experience, as they are primarily in their forties.
lug_prompt: Nga bwe ntunula mu ttiimu y'obukulembeze, ndaba enkyukakyuka mu myaka gyabwe. Kirabika nga ba maneja bange ab'oku ntikko abasinga balina obumanyirivu obw'amaanyi, kubanga basinga bali mu myaka gyabwe egy'obukulu ana.
ach_prompt: I kare ma atye ka ngiyo kit ma lutela tye kwede, aneno alokaloka I kin mwaka gi. Nen calo ludito ticca mapol gitye ki ngec mapol tutwal pien nongo gitye ki mwaka pyer angwen ki wiye.
teo_prompt: Neautar eong airereor etimu loka engarenok, abu eong aany epone loepedoriata itunga luka ikarukec. Esubit bala eyaitok ka luipu ejaasi keda amisiarit naepol noi naarai ejaasi kesi keda ikar luedeparete akaisaongon.
lgg_prompt: Mani amuti driceza ni 'diyi ma ale andriria, ma ndre e'yo eli yini 'diyi ma eselea ci. Eri ena kile 'ba ma vile drice'ba uruleru 'diyi ma pari vu e'yo nita be angiri 'diyi ci a'dusikuni yi tuni eli kali su ma alia.
nyn_prompt: Nk'oku ndikushwijuma tiimu y'obwebembezi, nkareeba enkora omu myaka yaabo. Nikireebeka ba maneja bangye ab'ahaiguru abaingi baine obukugu bw'amaani, ahabw'okuba bari omu myaka makumi ana.

eng_prompt: Throughout my career, I have focused on various aspects of business development. Recently, I have shifted my attention to enhancing our overall approach to strategic planning.
lug_prompt: Mu myaka gyange gyonna egy'omulimu, essira nditadde ku bintu eby'enjawulo eby'okukulaakulanya bizinensi. Gye buvuddeko, essira nditadde ku kutumbula enkola yaffe ey'awamu ey'okuteekateeka.
ach_prompt: I kare me ticca weng, aketo cwinya I kom dongo biacara mapat-pat. Cokcok-ki, aloko tamma I kom medo rwom me yub ma watye kwede.
teo_prompt: Kotoma aswamuka kere, apodokinit eong aiboisio nuegelegela nuka aitopol ebiasara. Apakio nu, ejulakinit eong aomisio nuka aitojokar epone loka aitemonokin.
lgg_prompt: Ma vile azi ngazuri ma alia dria, ma 'ba asi e'yo tujari ezoza ni 'diyi ma dria. O'du 'diyi ma alia, ma oja asi 'baza mavileri geri ama vile e'yo otuta ni 'diyi otuzuri ma omgbo otuzuri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Omu murimo gwangye gwona, ntaire amaani omu bintu bitari bimwe na bimwe ebirikureeta entunguuka omu by'obushubuzi. Obwahati, mpindwire omutima gwangye aha kutunguura enkora yaitu y'okukora enteekateeka.

eng_prompt: After analyzing the market trends and our competitors' weaknesses, we believe we can capitalize on our strengths. With a clear understanding of our goals, we have a very good strategy in defeating this line of business.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okwekenneenya embeera y'akatale n'obunafu bw'abavuganya naffe, tukkiriza nti tusobola okukozesa amaanyi gaffe. Nga tutegedde bulungi ebiruubirirwa byaffe, tulina enkola ennungi ey'okuwangula ekika kya bizinensi kino.
ach_prompt: Ingee ngiyo kit ma jami tye kawot kwede I cuk ki goro pa jo ma pyem kwedwa, watye ki gen ni watwero tic ki kero ma watye kwede. Ki niang maber I kom miti wa, watye ki yoo maber tutwal me loyo biacara man.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka airereonor epone loka esokoni keda aibucanaro naka lueboloboloete keda sio, iyuunit sio ebe ipedori oni aitwasam agogonguwok. Keda amisiikin nuikamunitos alosikinetekosi, ija oni keda ainapeta nuajokak noi nuka aitelekaar ebiasara lo.
lgg_prompt: E'yo cuu ni 'diyi ma ale andrizu 'bori ma vutia azini okpo 'ba baka sepi ama be 'diyiniri ma ale andrizu 'bori ma vutia, ama a'i ra kini ama eco okpo amani 'diyi ayu ra. Asisile amani 'diyi ma vata kililiru risi, ama vu geri azi onyiru tujara 'di ndezu ni ci.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okushwijuma emikorere y'akatare hamwe n'obunafu bw'abarikuhakana naitwe, nitwikiriza ngu nitubaasa kukoresa amaani gaitu. Kutwetegyereza gye ebigyendererwa byaitu, twine enkora nungi y'okusingura eby'obushubuzi ebi.

eng_prompt: Our company specializes in crafting durable materials for construction and industrial use. As a result, we make very heavy clay products.
lug_prompt: Kampuni yaffe ekola nnyo ebintu ebiwangaala eby'okuzimba n'eby'amakolero. N'ekivuddemu, tukola ebintu ebizitowa ennyo mu bbumba.
ach_prompt: Kampuniwa tye ki diro me yubu jami ma rii pi gedo ki tic mapatpat. Macalo adwogi ne, wayubu jami mapek tutwal ki lobo.
teo_prompt: Iswamai ekampunikosi noi kotoma aitolomun iboro luegogong kanu aduko keda acuman. Kanuka ngun, iswamai oni iboro luelangir noi luka alum.
lgg_prompt: Amuti amavileri ni e'yo afa aa'pi sa'wa ezu 'diyi edezu afa jo sizu 'diyi ma dria tualu afa 'bani ayule okalamvu eyi ma alea 'diyi pie. E'yo 'disi, ama afa edele nyaku si 'diyi ede nzizaru tu.
nyn_prompt: Kampuni yaitu neekora ebintu by'okwombeka n'eby'amakorero ebirikumara obwire buraingwa. N'ekyarugiremu, nitukora ebintu by'eibumba bigumire munonga.

eng_prompt: In today's competitive landscape, understanding consumer behavior is more crucial than ever. Companies that prioritize customer insights are better positioned to outperform their rivals.
lug_prompt: Mu mbeera ya leero ey'okuvuganya, okutegeera enneeyisa y'abaguzi kikulu nnyo okusinga bwe kyali kibadde. Kkampuni ezissa essira ku byetaago bya bakasitoma zisobola okukola obulungi okusinga ezo ezivuganya nazo.
ach_prompt: I kare man ma pyem tye matek tutwal, niang kit luwil pire tek tutwal. Kampuni ma keto cwinygi tutwalle I kom lok pa luwil gi tye ki kero me timo tic gi maber loyo jo ma gipyem kwedgi.
teo_prompt: Kotoma abolobol naka lolo, amisiikin iponesio luka agwelak erai ibore yenepol noi adepar kapakio nukokau. Ikampunin lu isingarenitos aomisio nuka agwelak kes epedorete aswam ejok adepar lu eboloboloete keda kes.
lgg_prompt: E'yo a'bala ni ewu andruri ma alea, 'ba afa je'baa 'diyi ma adriza vazu ri eri orodriru ndeni aga oku driorisi. Amuti e'yo 'ba afa je'baa 'diyi ma dria 'diyi 'dupi okporu 'diyi eco ageti oti 'ba yini baka sezu yi be 'diyi aga ra.
nyn_prompt: Omu bwire obu obw'okuhayahayana, okwetegyereza emicwe y'abaguzi n'eky'omugasho munonga. Kampuni ezirikwebembeza okwetegyereza abaguzi baazo, ziine obushoboorozi bw'okukora kurungi kukira abarikuhakana nazo.

eng_prompt: Despite their higher income levels, many Kenyans seem to prioritize different aspects of their living conditions. It's surprising to see that, while they enjoy greater financial resources, their homes often lack quality finishes.
lug_prompt: Wadde nga balina ssente nnyingi, Bannakenya bangi bakulembeza ebintu eby'enjawulo mu bulamu bwabwe. Kyewunyisa okulaba nti, wadde nga banyumirwa ensimbi ennyingi, amaka gaabwe gatera okubulwa ebintu eby'omutindo.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni gitye ki cente madit tutwal, pol pa anywali me lobo Kenya nen calo giketo cwinygi i kom jami mapat-pat makwako kwo gi. Tye me ngeng tutwal me neno ni kadi bed ni gitye ki lim madwong, odi gi ipol kare pe tye ki jami ma mite me tyeko ticgi.
teo_prompt: Karaida edumunenete kesi ikapun luipu, esubit bala isingarenitos itunga luko Kenya iponesio luegelegela luka aijar kec. Erai ibore yenejok noi asesen ebe, karaida ejaasi kesi keda ikapun luipu, mam ireria kec etapit aitodolikin ejok.
lgg_prompt: Yi ma lonyi ma ongmbo ni tro ovuzu uru ra ti, 'ba karakara Kenya ni 'diyi e'da kile e'yo ndu ndu yi ma edri ni 'diyi 'du okporu. Eri osutaru ndrezu kini eyini tro aa'zu lonyi be angiri 'diyi be ra ti, aku eyivile 'diyi ma alea afa edeza kililiru 'diyi yo.
nyn_prompt: Oihireho entaasya yaabo erikukira obwingi, abanyakenya baingi nibakuza eby'emituurire yaabo omu maisho. Nikitangaaza kureeba ngu n'obu baakuba baine esente nyingi, amaka gaabo tigarikumara kurungi.

eng_prompt: Reflecting on my time at Clays, I've had my share of ups and downs. It's hard not to think about the choices that shaped my experience here.
lug_prompt: Bwe ndowooza ku kiseera kye mmaze mu Clays, mbaddemu ebirungi n'ebibi bingi. Kizibu obutafumiitiriza ku bye nnasalawo mu bulamu bwange.
ach_prompt: Ka atamo I kom kare ma abedo I Clays, abedo ki jami mabeco ki maraco mapol. Tek tutwal pe me tamo I kom moko tam ma okelo kwo na kany.
teo_prompt: Aomoom nuikamunitos apak ka ko Clays, ajai eong keda aiboisio nuejokuka keda nuarokok. Etiono mam aomoom nuikamunitos aseununeta nuapotu itolomutu akeswam kane.
lgg_prompt: Mani e'yo egazu sawa mani ovuzu Clays-a ri ma dria, ma isu e'yo onyiru azini onzi 'diyi ma ongmbo ci. Eri mbazaru mani egazu e'yo mani 'dule 'diyi ma dria ku.
nyn_prompt: Okuteekateeka aha bwire bwangye omuri Clays, nyine oburungi n'obubi bwangye. Kigumire obutateekateeka aha kusharamu okwaretsireho oburemeezi bwangye aha.

eng_prompt: After years of focusing on my career and personal growth, I finally felt ready to embrace a new chapter in my life. It was a decision I had pondered for a long time, and I knew it was the right moment.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okumala emyaka mingi nga nneemalira ku mirimu gyange n'okukulaakulana kwange, oluvannyuma nnawulira nga ndi mwetegefu okutandika essuula empya mu bulamu bwange. Kye kintu kye nnali nsazeewo okumala ebbanga ddene, era nnali nkimanyi nti kye kiseera ekituufu.
ach_prompt: Ingee mwaki mapol me keto cwinya I kom ticca ki dongo pa dano, I agiki ne awinyo ni atye atera me cako dul manyen I kwo na. Obedo tam ma abedo ka tam iye pi kare malac, dok angeyo ni man obedo kare ma oporre.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ikar luipu luka aomoom nuikamunitos aswamuka keda apoloka, apotu eong apuputu ekapakina ageun atutubet naitetet kotoma aijaraka. Arai aseunet naewomit eong kanu apak naepol noi, ido ajeni eong ebe arai kwana apak naedolit.
lgg_prompt: Eli 'bani asi 'bazu ma vile azi azini zota ma ngulupiniri ma dria 'bori ma vutia, ma etumu asizu ngonde e'yo o'di ma edri ma alia 'diyi 'duzu. Eri ndra peta mani egaleri sawa ezu, azini ani ra kini eri sawa kililiri'i.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okumara emyaka mingi nyeteekateekire aha mirimo yangye hamwe n'entunguuka yangye, nkahurira nyeteekateekire kutandika eshuura ensya omu magara gangye. Kikaba kiri eky'okusharamu eki naabaire ninteekateekaho kumara obwire buraingwa, kandi nkamanya ngu ekaba eri obwire obuhikire.

eng_prompt: As I stepped down from my position, I sensed a growing discontent among the employees. Little did I know that my departure would trigger a wave of unrest within the company.
lug_prompt: Bwe nnava mu kifo kyange, nnalaba obutali bumativu obweyongera mu bakozi. Nnali simanyi nti okugenda kwange kwandivuddeko obutabanguko mu kampuni.
ach_prompt: Ikare ma aweko ticca, aneno cwer cwiny matye kamede ikin lutic. Onongo pe angeyo ni aa na obi kelo kuku kuku I dul ne.
teo_prompt: Nealakakina eong aiboisit ka, abu eong aany ebe iyata amamut aiyalama kanejaas eswamak. Mam eong ajeni ebe ebuni anyoun ka ayangaun amumu kotoma okampuni.
lgg_prompt: Mani pa sozu engazu pari mavileri ma aliarisi, ma ega kini 'ba azi ngapi 'diyi ma eselea ayiko ako ma omgbo ni tu ra. Ma nini ndra ku kini ma vile acita ni nga e'yo ngiringiri ni 'diyi eji amuti ma alia ra.
nyn_prompt: Ku naaruga omu ntebe yangye, nkareeba obutashemererwa obweyongyeire omu bakozi. Nkaba ntarikumanya ngu okuruga kwangye nikwija kureetaho obutabanguko omu kampuni.

eng_prompt: In the midst of escalating violence and chaos, it has become painfully clear that our adversaries operate without any moral compass. Their actions reveal a complete disregard for the value of human existence.
lug_prompt: Wakati mu butabanguko n'obwegugungo obweyongera, kyeyoleka bulungi nti abalabe baffe bakola nga tebalina mpisa. Ebikolwa byabwe biraga obutafaayo ku mugaso gw'okubeerawo kw'omuntu.
ach_prompt: I kare ma tim gero ki kuku kuku tye ka mede, nen atyer kamaleng ni lumonewa tye ka tic labongo lubu cik. Timgi nyutu ni pe giparo pi ber pa kwo pa dano.
teo_prompt: Kotoma apol naka amumu keda amumu, ecai noi ebe iswamaete lukasurupwok komamei ainapeta nuka ajokis. Itodunitos aswamisiokec ebe mam kesi ejenete ajokis naka aijar naka itunga.
lgg_prompt: Ngiringiri azini e'yo ngiringiri ni tupi 'diyi ma talasi, eca e'da kililiru kini 'ba ama aribo 'diyi azi nga e'yo adriza onyirusi 'diyi kokoru. Yeta yini 'diyi e'da kini yi asini orodri aa'zu 'ba ada eyi be ri ku.
nyn_prompt: Ahagati y'obutabanguko n'obutabanguko obweyongyeire, nikyerekwa butunu ngu abazigu baitu nibakora bataine emicwe mirungi. Ebikorwa byabo nibyoreka ngu tibarikufayo aha mugasho gw'okubaho kw'abantu.

eng_prompt: As the news unfolded, the world watched in disbelief as unprecedented events took place in the capital. The atmosphere was charged with tension, and history was being made right before our eyes.
lug_prompt: Amawulire bwe gaabadde gagenda mu maaso, ensi yatunuulira mu butakkiriza nga ebintu ebitabangawo mu kibuga ekikulu bwe byali bigenda mu maaso. Embeera yalimu okusika omuguwa era ebyafaayo byali bikolebwa mu maaso gaffe.
ach_prompt: I kare ma lok angea ne ocakke, lobo ne obedo ki ngeng tutwal I kom jami ma otimme I boma madit me Uganda. Lobo ne obedo ki lworo madit tutwal, dok bene jami macon obedo katimme I wangwa.
teo_prompt: Neapotu iyemuto kiswamata, apotu itunga luka akwap kowanyutu keda amamut aiyuun ebe iswamasi iboro lumam iswamasi kapolon akwap. Ajaasi itunga keda aiyalongong, ido ajai akiro nukakolo aswam koingarenikosi.
lgg_prompt: O'duko nderi ni e'doria, wudrikuru ri ndre e'yo a'ita kokoru e'yo ndundu yi 'yepi aku ambu kari niri ma alia 'diyi ma dria. Angu 'da ma alea 'ba eyi ndra asi otiza be, dika e'yo ewu drialeri ma alea 'diyi 'ye eyi ama mile dria.
nyn_prompt: Amahurire kukagumizamu, ensi ekaba etarikwikiriza ebyabaireho omu kibuga ekikuru. Embeera ekaba erimu obunkenke, kandi ebyafaayo bikaba nibikorwa omu maisho gaitu.

eng_prompt: As the cold wind howled outside, he shivered uncontrollably in the dimly lit room. The chill seeped through the walls, making him long for the comfort of warmth.
lug_prompt: Empewo ennyogovu bwe yali ewuluguma wabweru, yeekankana mu kisenge omwali ekitangaala ekitono. Obunyogovu bwayita mu bisenge, ne kimuleetera okwegomba ennyo ebbugumu.
ach_prompt: I kare ma yamo ma ngic tye ka mwoc woko, en obedo ka myel ki lworo I ot ma pe tye ki mac maber tutwal. Ngwec ne okato I kor ot, ma oweko en obedo ki miti matek me nongo lyeto.
teo_prompt: Neautar ekwam loelilim kokinga, abu ngesi kokuriaka kotoma agola naejaasi keda aica naedit. Abu akwap kibiror kotoma arwatatin, ido abu koinak ngesi ekot adumun amwanis naka amwanis.
lgg_prompt: Oli ambizaruri ni amve 'yeria, eri ri 'ye asi driasi jo ale aliza ma aliari ma aliarisi. Angu ambiza nderi ali jo ma abi ma aliasi, erini fezu asi 'bazu angu driza ma alia.
nyn_prompt: Omuyaga gw'obufuki ogwabaire niguhuumura aheeru, akeerarikirira munonga omu kishengye ekyabaire kitarikwetegyerezibwa gye. Obunyogovu bukatemba omu bisenge, ekyamureeteire kwetenga obutagasi bw'obutagasi.

eng_prompt: After hours of searching the turbulent waters, the fishermen spotted a distressed vessel struggling against the waves. Realizing the urgency of the situation, they quickly maneuvered their boat closer to offer assistance.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okumala essaawa eziwera nga banoonya mu mazzi, abavubi baalaba eryato eryali mu buzibu nga lirwanagana n'amayengo. Olw'okukitegeera nti embeera yali mbi nnyo, baakyusa mangu eryato lyabwe okusemberera okubawa obuyambi.
ach_prompt: Inge cawa malac me yenyo pii matye ka cwer, lumak rec guneno yeya ma onongo tye ka lweny ki pii. I nge niang kit ma peko ne tye kwede oyot-oyot tutwal, gucwalo yeya gi cok botgi me miyo kony.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka isawan luipu luka aimo akipi nuelangir, apotu ekamak agaria kowanyutu emee loetiono noi keda akailan. Apotu kesi kojenutu eipud loka ejautene, apotu kesi kopedosi aijulakin atakerikec kanu aingarakin.
lgg_prompt: Sawa angu ndundu eyi ma alea 'bori ma vutia, 'ba e'bi 'bepi 'diyi ndre o'bo azi e'yo ewaru ma alea ri ni a'di 'di angu oli aliasi 'diyi be. E'yo 'da nizu mbeleru, eyi oja yi vile o'bo ri mbeleru azakoma fezu.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okumara eshaaha nyingi barikuronda omu maizi, abashohi b'ebyenyanja bakareeba emeeri eyabaire eri omu kabi erikurwana n'ebingonzi. Bwanyima y'okumanya oburemeezi bw'embeera, bakagyenda juba bateera obwato bwabo haihi kuhayo obuhwezi.

eng_prompt: As the sun began to set, the fishermen set out on their small boat, eager to catch dinner. Suddenly, dark clouds rolled in, threatening their peaceful outing.
lug_prompt: Enjuba bwe yatandika okugwa, abavubi baasitula eryato lyabwe nga baagala nnyo okulya ekyeggulo. Amangu ago, ebire ebiddugavu byajja ne bitiisa olugendo lwabwe olw'emirembe.
ach_prompt: Ikare ma ceng ocako poto, lumak rec gucako tic ki yeyagi matidi me camo cam me otyeno. Cutcut, pol macol obino, ma okelo lworo I kom wotgi me kuc.
teo_prompt: Neageuna akolong aibiror, apotu ekamak agaria kogeutu alosit keda atakerikec, ekotosi aikamun inyamat luabong. Apotu akwap kibiroros katipet, ido abu kitukurian alosit kec na inapara.
lgg_prompt: Etuka ni e'doria 'boria, 'ba e'bi 'bepi 'diyi fu yi vile o'bo werea ma dria ava be nyaka ondresi 'diyi obizu. O'duko iniru 'diyi e'do yi ma dria e'yo yini acizu asianzuru 'diyi ma e'yosi.
nyn_prompt: Eizooba ku ryatandikire kurenga, abashohi bakatandikira aha bwato bwabo bukye, barikwetenga munonga kukwata kyakiro. Ahonaaho, ebire ebirikwiragura bikareetwaho, ebyabaire nibiteganisa okurambura kwabo okw'obusingye.

eng_prompt: As the storm intensified, the fishermen found themselves stranded in rough waters, desperately signaling for help. The coast guard received their distress call and quickly dispatched the water patrol to the scene.
lug_prompt: Ng'omuyaga gweyongera, abavubi beesanga nga basibidde mu mazzi amabi, nga baagala nnyo okufuna obuyambi. Abakuumi b'oku lubalama lw'ennyanja baafuna essimu yaabwe era ne batuma mangu abalawuna ku mazzi mu kifo.
ach_prompt: I kare ma yamo magwar ne omedde, lumak rec gunongo ni gitye I pii marac tutwal, kun gi lego pi kony ki cwinygi ducu. Lumony ma gwoko dog nam gunongo lwongo gi pi peko dok gucwalo luwotgi I kabedo ne oyot-oyot tutwal.
teo_prompt: Neapolor ekwam noi, apotu ekamak agaria kodumutu ebe emamiatatar kesi toma akipi nuelangir noi, kosodete ailip aingarakinio. Abu edaran loka edoket loka ekwam kodum aiworot kec kosodete aijukar engarenok luka akipi aiboisit kangin.
lgg_prompt: Ozoo ma okpo ni tuzurisi, 'ba e'bi 'bepi 'diyi isu yi yi ma alia ci, yini asi 'bazu azakoma vu. Ba angu ageyi te'baa yi tia 'diyi esu eyi ma simu e'yo ewaru eyi 'yepi 'diyi ma tia ri ani eyi ma ti pe angu 'da ma alea indikindi.
nyn_prompt: Omuyaga ku gwagumire nigweyongyera, abashohi b'ebyenyanja bakeesherekyerera omu maizi g'akaimukiriro, barikwetenga obuhwezi. Abakuumi b'aha rubaju rw'enyanja bakatunga esimu yaabo y'oburemeezi kandi ahonaaho batuma ab'eby'okwerinda aha maizi omu mwanya.

eng_prompt: After the storm capsized their vessel, chaos erupted as passengers struggled to stay afloat in the turbulent waters. In the midst of the wreckage, hope flickered as a few managed to cling to whatever debris they could find.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'omuyaga okubbira eryato lyabwe, akavuyo kabalukawo nga abasaabaze balwana okusigala ku mazzi. Wakati mu bifunfugu, essuubi lyasanyuka nga abatono basobodde okunywerera ku bifunfugu byonna byebasobodde okusanga.
ach_prompt: Inge yamo magwa obalo yeya gi, kuku kuku obedo tye ikare ma luwot tye ka tute matek me bedo iwi pii. I dyere pa jami ma oballe, gen obedo ka ryeny macalo jo manok ma gumoko I kom jami ma oballe ma gunongo.
teo_prompt: Akaulo na ebulone aibiror emee kec, abu amumu kogeun naarai apotu itunga kongicata asalakin aiboi kotoma akipi nuelangir noi. Kokiding aibiror naka iboro, apotu itunga luikidioko kopedosi aikamanar keda iboro luapotu kodumutu kesi.
lgg_prompt: Ozoo 'da ma vutia eyi ma meli asuzu 'bori ma vutia, ngiringiri e'do 'ba aci'ba 'da eyi dri ci aa'zu yi ma dria. E'yo onzi 'diyi ma talasi, asi'baza e'da kile 'ba were eyi e'bi yi bi e'yo onzi eyini esu 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Ahanyima y'eihunga okuburira emeeri yaabo, hakabaho akavuyo ahabw'abasaabaze kurwana kuguma aha maizi. Ahagati y'ebihiriire, amatsiko gakacwekyerera, nk'oku bakye baabaire nibagumizamu n'ebihiriire ebibarikubaasa kushanga.

eng_prompt: Every year, countless families are affected by preventable tragedies related to water activities. Awareness and safety measures are crucial in reducing the number of these heartbreaking incidents.
lug_prompt: Buli mwaka, amaka mangi gakosebwa ebikangabwa ebiyinza okwewalibwa ebyekuusa ku mirimu gy'amazzi. Okumanyisibwa n'obukuumi bikulu nnyo mu kukendeeza omuwendo gw'ebintu bino ebinyuma.
ach_prompt: Mwaka ki mwaka, gangi mapol nongo peko macalo adwogi me poto pa pii ma onongo twero genge. Miyo ngec ki gwoko ber bedo obedo gin ma pire tek tutwal me dwoko piny rwom me tim maraco eni.
teo_prompt: Kangol ekaru, ikalia luipu etereikina keda atiokisio nuikamunitos akipi nuepedorio aitikitik. Aisisianakino keda ayuwara eraas nuepolok noi kanu aitidisiar inaabai luka akiro nuarokok.
lgg_prompt: Eli alu alu vusi, familia karakara eyi e'yo ewaru ecopi atripi ra 'diyi esu eyini ani ecozu e'yo yi ma dria 'diyi 'yezu ra. E'yo mile oziza ni azini e'yo ageitema ni 'diyi orodriru e'yo asi nyoza ni 'diyi ma kalafe esizu.
nyn_prompt: Buri mwaka, amaka maingi nigateganisibwa oburemeezi oburikubaasa kwetantarwa oburikukwata aha mirimo y'amaizi. Okumanyisibwa hamwe n'ebiragiro by'okwerinda n'eby'omugasho omu kukyendeeza omuhendo gw'ebintu ebi ebirikushaasha omutima.

eng_prompt: There was a recent debate in the community about safety measures for water activities. Many residents were concerned about the effectiveness of the government's regulations regarding life jackets.
lug_prompt: Gye buvuddeko awo wabaddewo okukubaganya ebirowoozo mu kitundu ku ngeri y'okukuumamu emirimu egikolebwa ku mazzi. Abatuuze bangi baali beeraliikirivu ku bukugu bw'amateeka ga gavumenti agakwata ku byambalo ebiwonya obulamu.
ach_prompt: Lok obedo tye cokcok-ki ikin lwak i kom kit me gwoko kwo pa dano i kom pii. Lutedero mapol gubedo ki lworo I kom kit ma cik pa gamente tye ka tic kwede I kom bongi me gwoko kwo pa dano.
teo_prompt: Ajai epeget pac kotoma atutubet kanuikamunitos ayuwara naka aswamisinei nu akipi. Apotu itunga luipu kopodokisi nuikamunitos ainapeta nuka apugan nuikamunitos ijaket luka aijar.
lgg_prompt: Agbatara ndra o'diru ongulumu eyi ma eselea geri 'bani ecozu e'yo yi ma dria 'diyi 'yezu kililiru ri ma dria. Ba karakara angu 'da ma alea 'diyi asi otiza be e'yo azita gamete ni o'bale life jackets eyi ma dria 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Hakabaho okuhanuura omu bantu ebiro ebi, ebirikukwata ahaby'okwerinda omu mirimo y'aha maizi. Abatuuragye abaingi bakaba niberarikirira oku ebiragiro bya gavumenti ebikwatiraine n'obukooti bw'okukiza amagara g'abantu birikubaasa kukora kurungi.

eng_prompt: As the number of boats and vessels on the waterways continues to increase, ensuring safety and efficiency in water transport has become a pressing concern. To address this issue effectively, it is essential to implement a structured system of oversight.
lug_prompt: Nga omuwendo gw'amaato n'amaato ku makubo g'oku mazzi bweyongera, okukakasa obukuumi n'obwangu mu ntambula y'oku mazzi kifuuse eky'okweraliikirira eky'amangu. Okusobola okukola ku nsonga eno obulungi, kyetaagisa okuteekawo enkola entegeke ey'okulondoola.
ach_prompt: Kit ma wel yeya ki yeya matye I yoo me pii tye ka mede, gwoko ber bedo ki tic maber I wot me pii dong odoko gin ma pire tek tutwal. Me tyeko lok man maber, pire tek tutwal me keto yub me neno kit ma tic tye kawot kwede.
teo_prompt: Kwape iyata enaaba loka imaten keda atekerin nuejaasi toma orotin luka akipi, aanyun ebe eyuwara keda epatana alosit toma akipi erai ibore yenepol noi. Kanu aitemokin ationis na ejok, ejokuna aitolomun ainapeta nuka aanyanar.
lgg_prompt: O'bo yi ma dria 'diyi ma kalafe ni tuzu drile, e'yo 'bani lezu acizu yi ma dria kililiru azini kililiru ri eca e'yo azi okporu ni ru. E'yo 'di ma aza kozu kililiru, eri orodriru 'bani e'yo 'di ma pamvu onezu.
nyn_prompt: Omuhendo gw'amaato n'amaato agarikukoresa emihanda y'amaizi nigugumizamu nigweyongyera, okureeba ngu engyenda y'aha maizi neekora kurungi, n'eky'omugasho munonga. Okukora aha nshonga egi kurungi, n'eky'omugasho okutaho enkora y'okureebuuza.

eng_prompt: As we consider the feasibility of implementing new transportation policies, we must evaluate the current safety standards across all modes of travel. Recent statistics have shown a troubling increase in accidents, raising concerns about the overall security of our transport systems.

eng_prompt: The crew had reported unusual noises coming from the engine, raising concerns about its reliability. After a thorough inspection, the technician discovered several critical issues that needed immediate attention.
lug_prompt: Abakozi baali baloopa amaloboozi agatali ga bulijjo okuva mu yingini, ekyaleetawo okweraliikirira ku bwesige bwayo. Oluvannyuma lw'okukebera n'obwegendereza, omukugu yazudde ensonga ez'amaanyi nnyingi ezaali zeetaaga okukolebwako mu bwangu.

eng_prompt: Given the increasing frequency of extreme weather events, it is crucial to assess our current preparedness. Communities must prioritize safety and resilience in the face of potential disasters.
lug_prompt: Okusinziira ku mbeera y'obudde eyeeyongera, kikulu nnyo okwetegekera embeera eriwo. Ebitundu birina okukulembeza obukuumi n'okugumira obutyabaga obuyinza okubaawo.
ach_prompt: Kit ma peko me piny tye ka medde ameda, pire tek tutwal me niang yub ma watye kwede kombedi. Lwak omyero guket rwom me gwoko kuc ki ber bedo ikare me peko ma poto atura.
