eng_prompt: As the company faced unprecedented challenges in the market, the pressure mounted for him to deliver innovative solutions. With stakeholders watching closely, the upcoming project would determine the future direction of the business.
lug_prompt: Kampuni bwe yayolekaganye n'okusoomoozebwa okutali kwa bulijjo mu katale, akazito keeyongedde ku ye okuleeta eby'okugonjoola ebipya. Nga abakwatibwako batunuulira bulungi, pulojekiti ejja yandisazeewo engeri bizinensi gy'egenda okutambulamu mu biseera eby'omu maaso.
ach_prompt: I kare ma dul ne onongo peko mapol tutwal I cuk, lyeto omedde I kome me kelo yoo manyen me cobo peko ne. Kit ma dano weng tye kaneno ki wanggi, yub matye kabino ni bimoko ngo ma biacara ne obitimme I kare me anyim.

eng_prompt: After years of preparation and hard work, he finally received the promotion he had always dreamed of. With great excitement came immense pressure, as he knew the expectations were higher than ever.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okumala emyaka mingi ng'ateekateeka era ng'akola n'obunyiikivu, yasobola okufuna okukuzibwa kwe yali ayagala ennyo. N'okucamuka okunene kwajja n'okunyigirizibwa okunene, kubanga yali akimanyi nti ebisuubirwa byali waggulu okusinga bwe kyali kibadde.
ach_prompt: Ingee yubbe pi mwaki mapol ki tic matek, I agiki ne en onongo rwom ma en obedo ka kurone I kare weng. Ki yom cwiny madit tutwal obino ki lyeto madit tutwal, pien en onongo ngeyo ni byek tye malo tutwal.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ikar luipu luka aitemonokin keda aswam kagogong, abu ngesi kodum aitopolorio naewomitor ngesi. Keda aiyalama naepol abu kobu aiyalongong naepol noi, naarai ajeni ngesi ebe epol noi aomisio nuka itunga.
lgg_prompt: Eli otuza ma vutia azini azi ngaza okporu ma vutia, eri esu asizu otuta erini orobi erini leleri ra. Ayiko esuza amborusi emu asi omiza amborusi, a'disiku eri nii ra kini e'yo 'bani ega 'diyi uru ndeni aga oku driorisi.

eng_prompt: Many people dream of achieving success, believing that the journey to the top is the hardest part. However, the real challenge often lies in maintaining that success once it has been attained.
lug_prompt: Abantu bangi baloota okutuuka ku buwanguzi, nga balowooza nti olugendo okutuuka ku ntikko kye kitundu ekisinga okukaluba. Newankubadde, okusoomoozebwa okwa nnamaddala kutera kubeera mu kukuuma obuwanguzi obwo ng'obutuukiddwako.

teo_prompt: Itunga luipu ejaasi keda airujasia nuka aitodolikin akerianut, eomitos kesi ebe alosit naka adoketait naepol ngesi atutubet naetiono noi. Konye, ainingosit naepol noi erai aidar akerianut ngin arai edolokin.

eng_prompt: Authorities executed a coordinated effort to enforce the eviction order. This involved multiple agencies working together to ensure compliance with the legal mandate.
lug_prompt: Ab'obuyinza baakola enteekateeka okukakasa nti ekiragiro ky'okusengula abantu kikolebwa. Kino kyali kizingiramu ebitongole bingi okukolera awamu okukakasa nti ebiragiro by'amateeka bigobererwa.

eng_prompt: After a lengthy investigation into the recent string of thefts, the police discovered a suspicious vehicle parked near the scene of the latest crime. Upon further inspection, they found that the impounded car belonged to the wife of a city businessman.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okunoonyereza okumala ebbanga eddene ku bubbi obwaliwo gye buvuddeko, poliisi yazuula emmotoka eteeberezebwa nga esimbiddwa okumpi n'ekifo awaali obuzzi bw'emisango obusembyeyo. Bwe beeyongera okukebera, baakizuula nti emmotoka eyawambibwa yali ya mukyala w'omusuubuzi w'omu kibuga.
ach_prompt: Ingee timo kwed pi kare malac I kom kwo ma otimme cokcok-ki, abili gunongo mutoka ma byek tye I kome ma obedo cok ki kama bal otimme iye. Ikare me ngiyo maber, gunongo ni motoka ma kimako ni obedo pa dako pa latim biyacara mo me boma madit.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka aingic akiro nuikamunitos akoko, apotu ipolisin odumutu emotoka lo eomitai ebe ibwaikitai eidunya keda aiboisit naka akoko. Kapak kana aanyanar, apotu kesi odumutu ebe arai emotoka lo ikamaritai loka aberu naka ebiasara lo oibuga.
lgg_prompt: E'yo vuti ondaza ezu e'yo ogu ni 'diyi ma dria 'bori ma vutia, polisi eyi esu mutukari azi 'bani ega eyi ma dria ku ni pa so angu e'yo onzi 'da ni i'yezu ri ma agei. E'yo eti ondaza ma vutia, eyi esu kini mutukari 'bani obi 'da oku agu tujari 'yepi aku ambu cityniri ma alea ri niri'I.

eng_prompt: In an effort to boost urban development and provide affordable housing options, the local government has announced a new initiative. As part of this initiative, Kampala City Council vends plots for shillings one hundred thousand.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'okutumbula enkulaakulana y'ebibuga n'okuteekawo amayumba ag'ebbeeyi eya wansi, gavumenti y'ebitundu erangiridde enteekateeka empya. Ng'omu ku kaweefube ono, akakiiko ka Kampala City Council katunda poloti ku mitwalo kkumi.
ach_prompt: I tute me tyelo kor dongo lobo me boma ki miyo gangi ma wele yot, gamente me tedero otyeko cwalo lok angeya manyen. Macalo but yub man, dul me Kampala City Council cato ngom I wel me ciling alip miya acel.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitogogong apol naka itaunin ka aijaikin itunga itogoi lu epatana adumun, abu apugan naka atutubet kolimo ainapeta nuitetiak. Kwape ediopet koboro kalu, egwelanari ekansulo loka esite loko Kampala ipulotin kanu isirigin ilukumin akwatat.
lgg_prompt: Okpo 'bazu angu tawuni ru 'diyi ma ezota otuzu azini jo aje kokoru 'diyi fezu, gamete angu ndundu eyi ma alea ri azi e'yo azi o'diru ni. Otita 'di ma azi ru, Kampala City Council ni nyaku eyi ozi silingi alifu turu alu si.
nyn_prompt: Omu kaweefube w'okureetaho entunguuka omu ndembo n'okureetaho amaju agatarikutwara esente nyingi, gavumenti y'ebyaro erangirire enteekateeka nsya. Nk'emwe aha nteekateeka egi, Orukiiko orurikwebembera orurembo rwa Kampala niruguza poloti aha shiringi emitwaro igana.

eng_prompt: After conducting a thorough analysis of the market, he narrowed down his options significantly. In the end, he decided to focus on the most promising opportunities available.

ach_prompt: Inge kwedo lok matut I kom cuk, en odwoko piny jami ma en twero yero. I agiki ne, en omoko tamme me keto cwinye I kom gum mabeco ma onongo tye.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka aingic akiro nuka esokoni, abu ngesi kitidisiar aseunetake noi. Kawasia abu ngesi koseu aibwaikin akeswam toma arerengesio nuejokuka.
lgg_prompt: Erini e'yo cuu ma ale andrizu kililiru 'bori ma vutia, eri esi e'yo erini le 'diyi ma ongmbo ra. Asizu, eri 'du e'yo asi 'bazu drileba muke ndeni 'diyi ma dria.

eng_prompt: Recent investigations have revealed a pattern of financial misconduct involving high-profile individuals. As authorities tighten their grip on corruption, several countries have collaborated to recover assets linked to criminal activities.
lug_prompt: Okunoonyereza okwakakolebwa kulaga engeri abantu ab'amaanyi gye bakozesaamu ssente zaabwe mu ngeri embi. Nga ab'obuyinza banyweza enkwata yaabwe ku buli bw'enguzi, amawanga agawerako gakwataganye okuzzaawo eby'obugagga ebikwatagana n'ebikolwa by'obumenyi bw'amateeka.
ach_prompt: Kwed ma otime cokcok-ki onyuto tim maraco me tic ki lim I kin jo ma oywek tutwal. I kare ma gamente tye ka lweny matek i kom camcana, lobe mapol gutiyo kacel me gamo jami ma kubbe ki tim me bal.
teo_prompt: Aingic napac itodunitos iponesio luarokok luka ikapun luejaasi keda itunga luejenara noi. Kwape ekapakina apedorosio aitikitik amidicio naka apiyai, apotu akwapin nuipu kimorikikinos kanu adumun iboro lu ikamanara keda aswamisinei nuarokok.
lgg_prompt: E'yo eti ondaza ebipi o'diru 'diyi e'da geri 'bani e'yo robia ni 'diyi 'yezu geri onzi si 'ba ru ku 'diyi ma eselea. Okpo e'iru 'diyi ni okpo 'ba e'yo anyamgbolo ni 'diyi ma dria, kari karakara eyi nga azi tualu lonyi e'yo azita onyoza ni 'diyi ma alea 'diyi esuzu.
nyn_prompt: Okucondooza okuhweireho kworeka ngu abantu b'amaani nibakoresa kubi esente zaabo. Obu ab'obushoborozi barikwongyera amaani omu kurwanisa obushomankuzi, amahanga maingi gakwatanisa kugaruraho ebintu ebirikukwata aha bikorwa by'obukozi bw'ebibi.

eng_prompt: Corruption has become rampant in various government sectors, leading to significant financial losses. Investigations reveal that a substantial portion of public funds is misappropriated.
lug_prompt: Obuli bw'enguzi buyitiridde mu bitongole bya gavumenti eby'enjawulo, ekiviiriddeko okufiirwa ssente nnyingi. Okunoonyereza kulaga nti ssente za gavumenti nnyingi nnyo zikozesebwa bubi.
ach_prompt: Tim camucana onya tutwal I tenge mapat-pat pa gamente ma oweko dano mapol orwenyo limgi. Kwed nyutu ni but lim pa gamente mapol kitiyo kwede i yo marac.
teo_prompt: Apolor noi amidicio naka apiyai kotoma iriongeta lu apugan, ido eyangauni aibiror naka ikapun. Itodunit aingic ebe ikapun luipu luka apugan itwasamao erono.
lgg_prompt: Anyamgbolo ma omgbo angiri esele gameteni ndundu 'diyi ma alia, erini fezu e'yo robia ni avizu 'diyi ma omgbo angiri. E'yo eti ondaza ece kini 'ba robia o'bi eyini 'diyi ma kalafe angiri ri ayu geri onzi si.
nyn_prompt: Obushomankuzi bweyongyeire omu bitongore bya gavumenti ebitarikushushana, ekirikurugwamu okufeerwa sente nyingi. Okucondooza nikworeka ngu esente nyingi za gavumenti nizikoresibwa kubi.

eng_prompt: To foster economic growth and innovation, it is crucial for policymakers to engage with the business community. By identifying and addressing the obstacles faced by companies, the public sector can create a more conducive environment for success.
lug_prompt: Okutumbula enkulaakulana mu byenfuna n'obuyiiya, kya mugaso nnyo eri abakola amateeka okukolagana n'abasuubuzi. Mu kuzuula n'okukola ku bizibu amakampuni bye gasanga, ekitongole kya gavumenti kisobola okutondawo embeera ennungi ey'obuwanguzi.
ach_prompt: Me kelo dongo lobo I tenge me lim ki diro manyen, pire tek tutwal ni lutela omyero gu tii ki lutim biacara. I yoo me niang ki tyeko peko ma dul mapat-pat tye ka nongo, dul pa gamente twero yubu kabedo maber me cobo miti gi.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitopolor apol keda aitolomunun iboro luitetiak, ejokuna noi itunga luitolomete ikisila aiswamanar keda itunga luitolosete ibiasaran. Kowai lo ajenun ka aitemokin atiokisio nu ejaas ikampunin, epedorete iriongeta luka apugan aitolomun ejautene loejok kanu akerianut.
lgg_prompt: E'yo zota e'yo robia ni 'diyi ma alia azini e'yo o'diru 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu, eri orodriru 'ba azita sipi 'diyi dri ti ecizu ongulumu tujari ni 'diyi pie. E'yo ewaru amuti eyini esu 'diyi ma eti ondazu azini e'yo eyi ma aza kozu risi, okalamvu o'bi eyini 'diyi eco angu drile suza niri ede ra.
nyn_prompt: Okureetaho entunguuka omu by'entaasya hamwe n'okujumbura, nikikuru abarikukora ebiragiro kukorengana n'abashuubuzi. Gavumenti neebaasa kureetaho embeera nungi y'obusinguzi, erikumanya n'okutereeza oburemeezi obu kampuni zirikushanga.

eng_prompt: In recent years, the dominance of African drivers in international car rallies has become increasingly evident. Their exceptional skills and deep understanding of diverse terrains give them a significant edge over competitors.

eng_prompt: After months of negotiations and careful planning, the school board finally reached an agreement with local officials. With the necessary approvals in place, the district funds have been secured.

eng_prompt: After months of negotiations and political maneuvering, the various factions finally reached an agreement to form a coalition. However, tensions simmered beneath the surface, revealing deep-seated divisions among the parties involved.

teo_prompt: Katupitos nuapotu kotakanutu pac keda eipud loka aomisio nuitetiak, abu eyaitene kitutub aijulanakineta nuepolok noi mama ejaasi engarenok ke. Kanuka ngun, aponi kolimorai aiboisio kere nuka iminisitan.
lgg_prompt: E'yo i 'yepi o'diru 'diyi ma dria azini lezu egata o'diru 'diyi ma dria, driceza 'da pe e'yo ojata okporu 'diyi 'yezu amuti driceza ni 'diyi ma alea. E'yo 'disi, 'ba 'ba pari dria minisita ru 'diyi ma alia 'diyi o'diru.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'entunguuka eyabaireho obwahati hamwe n'ekyetengo ky'okutunga enteekateeka nsya, abeebembezi bakasharamu kukora empindahinduka y'amaani omu beebembezi baabo. N'ekyarugiremu, emyanya ya ba minisita yoona ekagaruka yaarangwa.

eng_prompt: As our community continues to grow, the condition of our infrastructure has become increasingly concerning. We must prioritize improvements to our transportation systems to support both safety and accessibility.
lug_prompt: Ekitundu kyaffe bwe kigenda kyeyongera okukula, embeera y'ebizimbe byaffe yeeyongera okweraliikiriza. Tulina okukulembeza okulongoosa enkola zaffe ez'entambula okusobola okuwagira obukuumi n'okutuukirirwa.
ach_prompt: Kit ma kabedo wa tye ka dongo kwede, kit ma jami ma konyo wa tye ka dongo kwede tye ka kelo lworo madit tutwal. Omyero waket yub me yubu yoo me wot obed gin ma pire tek pi gwoko ber bedo ki yot pa wot.
teo_prompt: Kwape inyikokini atutubetekosi apoloun, ejautene loka aduketawok erai lo epodokinit noi. Ibusakinit oni aisingarenit aitojokar elose wok kanu aitigogong ayuwara keda adolere.
lgg_prompt: Ongulumu amavileri ni mu drile zoria, e'yo afa ayuzaru amavile 'diyi ma wura ni eca curu'do asi otiza ru. Le ama ma 'ba e'yo otuta 'yezu geri amavile acizu 'diyi ma dria ri okporu e'yo tambaza ni azini cazu kililiru ri ma aza kozu.
nyn_prompt: Ekyanga kyaitu ku kirikugumizamu nikikura, embeera y'ebyombeko byaitu eyeyongyeire kwerarikirira. Tushemereire kwebembeza okutunguura eby'engyenda byaitu kugira ngu tubangure eby'okwerinda n'okutuura gye.

eng_prompt: As the election approached, analysts began to scrutinize the shifting dynamics within the electorate. Various social, economic, and cultural influences were at play, shaping public opinion in unexpected ways.
lug_prompt: Okulonda bwe kwasembera, abeekenneenya baatandika okwekenneenya enkyukakyuka mu balonzi. Ebintu eby'enjawulo mu mbeera z'abantu, eby'enfuna, n'ebyobuwangwa byali mu muzannyo, nga bifuula endowooza z'abantu mu ngeri ezitasuubirwa.
ach_prompt: Ikare ma yer tye cok, ludiro ocako neno aloka-loka matye I kin lubol kwir. Jami mapol ma lubbe ki kwo pa dano, lim ki tekwaro obedo tye, ma okelo tam pa lwak I yoo ma pe byek tye I komgi.
teo_prompt: Neyapiete aseo, apotu angicak kogeutu airereor aijulanakineta nuka aseo. Apotu iboro luegelegela luka itunga, nuka ikapun, keda inonosio kiswamata, itolomutu aomisio nuka itunga koponesio lumam aomitai.
lgg_prompt: Opetaa ni ecazu ogogo, 'ba e'yo eti ondapi 'diyi e'do e'yo ojata 'ba voti 'bepi 'diyi ma eselea 'diyi ma ale andri. E'yo ndundu ongulumu eyi ma eselea, e'yo robia ni 'diyi pie, tualu e'yo suruni 'diyi pie, 'diyi e'bi o'bi eyi ma egata oja geri 'bani egale ku 'diyisi.
nyn_prompt: Oburuuru ku bwahika haihi, abacencuzi bakatandika kushwijuma empindahinduka y'abateezi b'akaruuru. Eby'obuhangwa, eby'entatsya hamwe n'eby'obuhangwa bikaba biriho, bikakora aha miteekateekyere y'abantu omu miringo etarikuteekateekwaho.

eng_prompt: The community had long suffered from neglect and mismanagement, leading to widespread disillusionment among its residents. As tensions rose, it became clear that the underlying issues were deeply rooted in the political decisions made over the years.
lug_prompt: Ekitundu kyali kimaze ebbanga ddene nga kibonaabona olw'okulagajjalirwa n'okuddukanyizibwa obubi, ekyaviirako abatuuze baayo okuggwaamu essuubi. Obunkenke bwe bwagenda bweyongera, kyategeerekeka bulungi nti ensonga eziri emabega zaali zisimbye emirandira mu kusalawo kw'ebyobufuzi okwakolebwa okumala emyaka.
ach_prompt: Lwak gubedo ka deno can pi kare malac pi tim me cac ki tela marac ma okelo turcwiny ikin lwak. I kare ma telle omedde, nen atyer kamaleng ni lok matye ni ocake tutwal I moko tam me cungu iwi bye ma otime I mwaki ma okato angec.
teo_prompt: Ajaasi itunga luka atutubet ngin keda ationis naka apalunit keda eyaitene loaronon, ido abu koyangau aiyalongong kanejaas itunga. Neapolor atiokisio, apotu kojenutu ebe ejaas akiro ngun toma aseununeta nuka politikis nuiswamatai kokaru lu atuboros.
lgg_prompt: Ongulumu 'da ebi candi esu sa'wa ezu e'yo 'bani 'ba eyi adizu risi azini e'yo 'bani eyi ocezu geri kililiru si risi, e'yo 'di fepi 'ba aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ma alea 'diyi eca asi nyoza ru. Erita ako ni turia, eca e'da kililiru kini e'yo ewaru 'diyi enga e'yo politiki ni 'bani 'dule eli agapi 'bo 'diyi ma alia.
nyn_prompt: Ekyanga kitwire nikibonabona ahabw'okunagaijura hamwe n'obwebembezi bubi, ekyarugiremu okuhwa amaani omu batuuragye. Obunkenke ku bwabaire nibweyongyera, kikarebeka butunu ngu enshonga ezabaire ziriho zikaba ziri omu kucwamu kw'eby'obutegyeki okwabaireho emyaka mingi enyimaho.

eng_prompt: In a world filled with conflict and animosity, it's important to recognize the complexities of human emotions. While anger and resentment can drive individuals to extreme actions, most people ultimately value life and seek resolution over violence.
lug_prompt: Mu nsi ejjudde obukuubagano n'obukyayi, kikulu okumanya enneewulira z'abantu. Newankubadde obusungu n'okunyiiga bisobola okuviirako abantu okweyisa obubi, abantu abasinga obungi obulamu babutwala nga bwa muwendo era banoonya eky'okugonjoola obutabanguko.
ach_prompt: I lobo ma opong ki lweny ki gero, pire tek tutwal me niang kit ma dano winyo kwede. Kadi bed kiniga ki akemo twero weko dano timo jami ma rac tutwal, pol pa dano tero kwo calo gin ma pire tek dok giyenyo yoo me lweny i kom tim gero.
teo_prompt: Kotoma akwap na eleleba keda ingungeta keda amumu, ejokuna noi ajenun epone loepol noi loka aomisio nuka itunga. Karaida epedorete anyunyura keda anyunyura ayangaun itunga toma aswamisio nuarokok, itunga luipu eminasi aijar kosodete aimo aitemokineta nuikamunitos amumu.
lgg_prompt: Wudrikuru 'di ma alea ngiringiri azini a'di 'diza be tre, eri orodriru egazu e'yo ewaru 'ba ada eyini ega 'diyi ma dria. Aoko azini aokosi 'diyi eco 'ba eyi ma ti oji e'yo onzi 'yezu ra ti, 'ba karakara eyi asizu eyi ma edri 'du orodriru azini eyi geri nda e'yo ngiringiri ni 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Omu nsi eijwire entaro n'obwinazi, n'eky'omugasho kumanya oburemeezi bw'enyehurira z'abantu. N'obu ekiniga n'obwinazi birikubaasa kureetera abantu kukora ebitahikire, abantu abarikukira obwingi nibatwara amagara gaabo nk'ag'omugasho, kandi nibasherura oburyo bw'okurwanisa obwimukiriro.

eng_prompt: Many emotions drive human behavior, but few are as compelling as the instinct to avoid danger. Among these, an explanation that seems powerful is FEAR.
lug_prompt: Enneewulira nyingi ezivuga enneeyisa y'omuntu, naye ntono eziwaliriza nga obutonde okwewala akabi. Mu bino, okunnyonnyola okulabika nga okw'amaanyi kwe KUTYA.
ach_prompt: Tam mapol aye doro tim pa dano, ento manok keken aye weko dano bedo ki miti me gwokke ki i peko. I kin magi, tito lok acel ma nen tek tutwal en aye LWORO.
teo_prompt: Ipu aomisio nu isinyikokitos itunga aswam iboro, konye ikidioko lu isinyikokitos itunga aisac atiokisio. Kotoma ngun, aitetem na esubit bala epol noi ngesi AKURIAK.
lgg_prompt: Egata karakara eyi 'ba eyi ma adriza otu, te were eyi okporu ekile e'yo ewaru eyi atrizu ri le. E'yo 'diyi ma eselea, e'yo azi e'dapi okporu ni uri'I.
nyn_prompt: Ebiteekateeko bingi nibireeta emicwe y'abantu, kwonka bikye nibyo birikugyemesereza nk'ekyetengo ky'okwetantara akabi. Omuri ebi,enshonga erikureebeka nk'ey'amaani n'OKUTIINA.

eng_prompt: In a climate of fear and escalating violence, individuals were faced with impossible choices. Many felt compelled to align themselves with the perpetrators to ensure their own survival amidst the chaos.
lug_prompt: Mu mbeera y'okutya n'obutabanguko obweyongera, abantu baasanga okusalawo okuzibu. Bangi baawulira nga bawaliriziddwa okwegatta n'abazzi b'emisango okusobola okuwonawo wakati mu butabanguko.
ach_prompt: I kare ma lworo ki tim gero tye ka mede, dano acel-acel onongo gitye ki tam ma tek tutwal. Dano mapol guwinyo ni omyero guribbe ki joo ma otimo bal enoni wek gubed makwo ikare me kuku kuku enoni.
teo_prompt: Kotoma ojautene loka akuriau keda amumu, apotu itunga itereikina keda aseununeta nuetioko. Apotu itunga luipu opupoto ebe ibusakinit kesi aimorikikin keda ngul lueswamaete ngun kanu awanyun ebe ejarete kesi kotoma amumu kangin.
lgg_prompt: Angu urisi azini e'yo ngiringiri ni tupi 'diyi ma alea, 'ba yi dri fu e'yo 'duza ecopi ku 'diyi be. Ba karakara eyi ega eyi ma ti eci 'ba e'yo 'da 'yepi 'diyi pie eyini ani eyi ma edri ta mbazu ngiringiri 'da ma talasi.
nyn_prompt: Omu bwire bw'okutiina n'obutabanguko obweyongyeire, abantu bakashanga oburemeezi bw'okucwamu. Baingi bakeehurira baine kukwatanisa n'abakozi b'ebihagaro kugira ngu babaase kugumaho omu butabanguko.

eng_prompt: After months of discussions and reflection, they finally reached a decision about their relationship. Recognizing the need for a fresh start, they agreed to part ways amicably.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'emyezi egy'okukubaganya ebirowoozo n'okufumiitiriza, kyaddaaki baatuuka ku kusalawo ku bikwata ku mukwano gwabwe. Bwe baalaba obwetaavu bw'okutandika obuggya, bakkiriziganya okwawukana mu mirembe.
ach_prompt: Ingee nywako lok ki tam pi dwe mapol, lacen gumoko tamgi I kom wat meggi. Pien guniang ni omyero gucak odoco, guwinye me pokke I yo me kuc.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ilapio luka aitemitem keda aomoom, apotu kesi kodolokisi aseunet naikamunit eidicanekec. Apotu kesi kojenutu eipud loka ageunet naitetet, apotu kesi ocamutu atiakatiaka.
lgg_prompt: Mba eyi ma agbatara azini egata ma vutia, eyi esu asizu e'yo eyi ma eselea ri ma dria ra. E'yo lezu e'dozu o'diru ri ma dria, eyi ai geri eyini aa'zu 'diyi ma esele cozu geri kililiru si.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'emyezi mingi y'okuhanuura n'okuteekateeka, baherize kusharamu aha bikwatiraine n'omukago gwabo. Ahabw'okumanya ngu hariho ekyetengo ky'okutandika busya, bakaikirizana okwahukana omu busingye.

eng_prompt: After years of strategic investments and savvy business decisions, her financial portfolio had grown exponentially. As a result, her net worth skyrocketed, placing her among the wealthiest individuals in the industry.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okumala emyaka mingi ng'assa ssente mu bintu eby'enjawulo era ng'asalawo bulungi mu bizineesi, ssente ze zaali zeeyongedde nnyo. N'ekyavaamu, eby'obugagga bye byalinnya nnyo, ne bimufuula omu ku bagagga mu mulimu guno.
ach_prompt: Ingee mwaki mapol me keto lim I biacara ki moko tam mabeco, lim ma en tye kwede odongo tutwal. Macalo adwogi ne, lim ma en tye kwede omede malo tutwal, ma okete I kin lulonyo ma loyo I tenge enoni.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ikar luipu luka aipikakin ikapun keda aseununeta nuka ebiasara, apolor noi aiboisitike naka ikapun. Kanuka ngun, abu ameda ke kiyatakin, ido abu koinak ngesi araun ediope kotunga luebaritos kakere kotoma okampuni kalo.
lgg_prompt: Eli 'bani lonyi vuti alezani 'diyi 'bazu tujari 'yezu kililiru azini e'yo onduaru 'diyi 'duzu 'bori ma vutia, eri ma robia ma ongmbo tu uru tu. E'yo 'disi, eri ma lonyi tu uru, erini eri 'bazu 'ba lonyi be ndeni okalamvu 'di ma alea 'diyi ma eselea.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'emyaka mingi y'okutamu sente n'okusharamu kurungi omu by'obushubuzi, eby'empiiha bye bikaba byeyongyeire munonga. N'ekyarugiremu, obugaiga bwe bukaruga ahaiguru, bwamuta omu bantu abagaiga omu by'obushubuzi.

eng_prompt: After years of constant fighting and unresolved differences, they finally decided to end their tumultuous relationship. Now, the focus has shifted to the most pressing matter at hand: who will take care of their children.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'emyaka mingi nga balwanagana era nga tebakkiriziganya, baasalawo okukomya omukwano gwabwe. Kati essira liri ku nsonga esinga obukulu eriwo: ani anaalabirira abaana baabwe.
ach_prompt: Ingee mwaki mapol me lweny ki telle ma pe kicobo, lacen gumoko tamgi me giko wat meggi. Kombedi, keto cwiny dong olokke odok I kom lok ma pire tek tutwal matye ni: anga ma obi gwoko lutino gi.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ikar luipu luka ejie keda ingungeta lumam itemokitai, apotu kesi kotuboto aitanang eidicanekec. Kwana, ejulakin akiro toma akirot naepol noi: ingai bo epedori aidar idwekec.
lgg_prompt: E'yo aco coza azini erita ako ma vutia, eyi asizu asizu eyi ma eselea e'yo ewaru 'diyi dezu. Sawa 'disi, asi 'baza oja i e'yo okporu tu 'diyi ma dria: a'di ni nga anzi yini 'diyi ma ta mba ni.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'emyaka mingi y'okurwana n'obutakwatanisa, bakacwamu kumaraho enkoragana yaabo. Hati, amaani gahindukire gaza aha nshonga nkuru eriho hati: n'oha orikwija kureeberera abaana baabo.

eng_prompt: Dogs are known for their affectionate behavior towards their owners. When a furry friend seeks your company, it often signifies a strong bond between you two.
lug_prompt: Embwa zimanyiddwa olw'enneeyisa yaago ennungi eri bakama baago. Mukwano gwo alina ebyoya by'enviiri bw'akunoonyaako, kiba kiraga nti mwembi mulina enkolagana ey'amaanyi.
ach_prompt: Ki ngeyo gwok pi kitgi me mar bot wegi gi. Ka laremi ma tye ki yer kom openyo pi bedo kwedi, man nyutu ni wat ikinwu tye matek.
teo_prompt: Ejenara ingwokuo kanu iponesiokec luajokak mama ejaasi ikulepek kec. Arai emina apaperokon naejaasi keda emukule ajaut keda jo, itodunit duc ebe ejai eidicane loegogong kidingikon.
lgg_prompt: Ba ni oco eyi adriza eyini lele tu eyi ma e'ipi eyidri 'diyisi. Agyi mivileri ka mi ma agei te, eri e'da kini e'yo mini yi ma eselea ri okporu.
nyn_prompt: Embwa nizimanywa ahabw'okukunda bakama baazo. Munywani waawe oine ebyoya ku arikukushaba kumuhwera, nikyoreka omukago gw'amaani ahagati yaanyu.

eng_prompt: Cats are known for seeking out warm and cozy spots to rest. When they choose to curl up on you, it's often a sign that they find comfort in your presence.
lug_prompt: Embwa zimanyiddwa olw'okunoonya ebifo ebibuguma okuwummulamu. Bwe basalawo okukusemberera, kabonero akalaga nti bafuna obuweerero mu kubeerawo kwo.
ach_prompt: Dyangi ki ngeyo gi me yenyo kabedo ma lyet dok ma opye mot me yweyo. Kace gumoko tamgi me bedo cok kwedi, man obedo lanyut ni ginongo kwe cwiny ikare ma itye cok kwedgi.
teo_prompt: Ejenara ikapun noi kanu aimo aiboisio nuemwanar akwap kanu aiyengun. Arai eseunete kesi aibwoun nejai jo, erai duc aanyunet ebe edumunenete kesi aiyalama koingaren kon.
lgg_prompt: Ba ni katsi eyi angu driza be 'diyi ndazu ava liza esuzu. Yi ka e'du yi o'ba mi vu, eri sawa driasi eceta kini yi asi anzuru isu mi vu ci.
nyn_prompt: Embwa nizimanywa kuronda emyanya y'okutuuramu erikwotsya. Kubarikucwamu kukwehingamira ahariiwe, nikyoreka ngu nibatunga obuhuumuro omu maisho gaawe.

eng_prompt: In a world where freedom is often taken for granted, the true nature of obedience reveals itself. Those who follow orders without question surrender their autonomy, becoming bound to the will of others.
lug_prompt: Mu nsi eddembe gye litwalibwa ng'ekintu ekitali kikulu, engeri entuufu ey'obuwulize yeeyoleka. Abo abagoberera ebiragiro awatali kubuusabuusa bawaayo obwetwaze bwabwe, ne bafuuka abafugibwa abalala.
ach_prompt: I lobo ma dano pe giparo pi bedo agonya, kit me bedo lawiny nen atyer kamaleng. Jo ma lubu cik labongo lapeny gi weko twero gi me timo gin ma gimito.
teo_prompt: Kotoma akwap na mam eyangaritai ailajara kwape ibore yen epol ajokis, itodunit ajokis naka aipup. Ngul lu etupitos aicoreta komam aingiseta einanakinete aipuga kec bon, araun lu ikamanara keda ipudesia luka luce.
lgg_prompt: Wudrikuru 'bani e'yo driwala niri 'duzu e'yo kokoru ri ma alea, e'yo a'da e'yo azita vuti obiza niri ni i e'da i ma ngulupi si. Ba azita vuti obipi zita kokoru 'diyi e'yo yini yi ma ngulupi si 'diyi fe, yini ecazu 'ba azi 'diyi ma egata ma palaa.
nyn_prompt: Omu nsi ahu obusingye butarikutwarwa nk'ekintu kikuru, omutindo gw'okworobera nigweyoreka. Abo abarikukuratira ebiragiro hatariho kubuuza, nibaheerezayo obugabe bwabo, barikugyendera aha bigyendererwa by'abandi.

eng_prompt: In a world filled with uncertainty and fleeting moments, it's essential to cherish the connections we hold dear. Embrace the depth of your feelings and let them guide your actions.
lug_prompt: Mu nsi ejjudde obutali bukakafu n'ebiseera eby'akaseera obuseera, kya mugaso okutwala enkolagana gye tulina nga ya muwendo. Kkiriza enneewulira zo era zireke zikulembere mu bikolwa byo.
ach_prompt: I lobo ma opong ki peko ki jami ma kato atura, pire tek tutwal me pwoyo kubbe ma watye kwede. Yer kit ma iwinyo kwede dok wek odor tici.
teo_prompt: Kotoma akwap na eleleba keda amamus acamanar keda iboro luegelegela, ejokuna ajenun arereng naka arucokina keda itunganan yenimina oni. Kocam aomisiokon kosodi acamakin kesi aingarenikin aswamisiokon.
lgg_prompt: Wudrikuru 'di ma alea e'yo ewaru azini e'yo agapi ra 'diyi pie, eri orodriru aa'ta amani aa'zu eyi pie ri 'duzu orodriru. Le mi ma ai e'yo mini egale 'diyi azini emi ma fe eyini driceza fe e'yo mini 'ye 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Omu nsi eijwire okubuzabuza hamwe n'obwire oburikutwara obwire bukye, n'eky'omugasho okutwara enkoragana ei twine nk'ey'omugasho. Yikiriza ebiteekateeko byawe kandi obireke bikwebembere ebikorwa byawe.

eng_prompt: It's important to approach each day with a positive mindset and a commitment to excellence. Remember that your contributions can make a significant impact on your team and organization.
lug_prompt: Kikulu okutunuulira buli lunaku n'endowooza ennungi n'obumalirivu okukola obulungi. Jjukira nti ebiweebwayo byo bisobola okukosa ennyo ttiimu yo n'ekitongole kyo.
ach_prompt: Pire tek tutwal me neno nino ki nino ki tam mabeco ki miti me timo jami maber. Wii opo ni jami ma imiyo twero kelo alokaloka madit tutwal I kom dul ma megi.
teo_prompt: Erai ibore yenepol noi aitodolikin nginiparan keda aomisio nuajokak ka ainakina aswam ejok. Kiituni ebe epedori agangat kon aitodolikin etimu kon keda atukot.
lgg_prompt: Eri orodriru e'yo 'duzu o'du vusi egata muke be azini asi 'baza e'yo onyiru 'yezu. Mi ma ega kini afa mini fele 'diyi eco orodri amboru eji amuti mini azini amuti mivileri ma dria ra.
nyn_prompt: N'eky'omugasho okureeba buri eizooba n'omutima murungi n'okwehayo kukora kurungi. Ijuka ngu obuhwezi bwawe nibubaasa kukora kihango aha tiimu yaawe hamwe n'ekitongore kyawe.

eng_prompt: Emotions can be overwhelming, and sometimes we find ourselves consumed by intense feelings toward others. It's easy to let that animosity fester and grow, leading to a point where it becomes almost unbearable.
lug_prompt: Enneewulira zisobola okutulugunya, era ebiseera ebimu twesanga nga tutwaliddwa enneewulira ez'amaanyi eri abalala. Kyangu okuleka obukyayi obwo okusimba amakanda n'okukula, ekiviirako okutuuka ku ddaala nga kumpi tekigumiikiriza.
ach_prompt: Kit ma wawinyo kwede twero bedo tek tutwal, ki ikare mukene wa nongo watye ka winyo marac tutwal I kom jo mukene. Yot tutwal me weko gero enoni odong dok odong, ma weko odoko tek tutwal.
teo_prompt: Epedorete iponesio aipues noi, ido acie apakio idumuni oni iponesio lukajokak mama ejaasi luce. Epatana acamakin angurian ngun apoloun, kitoni ne mam ijo ipedori aitikitik.
lgg_prompt: E'yo egaza ni 'diyi eco ovu okporu tu, dika sa'wa azi 'diyisi ama isu ama ma ngulupi ni e'yo egazu 'ba azi 'diyi ma dria okporu tu 'diyisi. Eri ewakokoru fezu a'di 'di ni zozu azini zozu kpere erini ecazu ewaru.
nyn_prompt: Ebiteekateeko nibibaasa kuturemeera munonga, obumwe n'obumwe nitushanga twine ebiteekateeko by'amaani aha bandi. Kyanguhi kwikiriza obwangani obwo kweyongyera, ekirikureetaho oburemeezi obutarikubaasa kugumisiriza.

eng_prompt: As the sun set over the bustling city, the excitement of the upcoming match filled the air. Fans eagerly debated the differences in play styles and rules that defined the sport they loved.
lug_prompt: Ng'enjuba egwa ku kibuga ekijjudde abantu, essanyu olw'omuzannyo ogubadde gugenda okuzannyibwa lyajjula mu bbanga. Abawagizi bakubaganya ebirowoozo n'obwagazi ku njawulo mu ngeri y'okuzannya n'amateeka agalambika omuzannyo gwe baagala.
ach_prompt: I kare ma ceng tye ka poto i kom citi ma dano dwong iye, yomcwiny pi tuku matye kabino ni opong ki yamo. Lucwak tuku gubedo ki miti me laro lok I kom kit tuku mapat-pat ki cik ma nyutu tuku ma gimaro.
teo_prompt: Nealomuna akolong koibuga loepol itunga, apotu aiyalama naka abolia naebunit kilelebunos kokwam. Apotu egangitok ipegeta noi nuikamunitos iponesio luegelegela luka abolia keda ikisila luitodunitos abolia naeminasi kesi.
lgg_prompt: Etuka ni ecaria aku ambu cityniri ma dria, ayiko abala emupi ri ma dria ri ga angu ma alia tre. Ba atita fepi 'diyi agbatara gba geri avita avizu 'diyi ma esele cozu azini azita avita yini leleri ma e'yo ecepi 'diyi ma dria avasi.
nyn_prompt: Omushana ku gwatandikire kurabira omu rurembo orwabaire rurimu abantu baingi, okushemererwa kw'omupiira ogwabaire guri haihi kwijuza omumwanya. Abahagizi bakahanuura n'ekihika aha ntwaza y'emizaano etarikushushana hamwe n'ebiragiro ebirikushoboorora omuzaano ogu baabaire nibakunda.

eng_prompt: Throughout history, various cultures have developed their own versions of ball games, each with unique rules and styles of play. One of the most intriguing early forms of these games is believed to have originated in ancient civilizations.
lug_prompt: Mu byafaayo byonna, ebyobuwangwa eby'enjawulo bikoze enkola zaabyo ez'omuzannyo gw'omupiira, nga buli kimu kirina amateeka n'enkola yaakyo ey'enjawulo ey'okuzannya. Ekimu ku bika by'okuzannya bino ebyasooka kirowoozebwa nti byasibuka mu byobuwangwa ebyedda.
ach_prompt: I kare macon weng, tekwaro mapat-pat oyubu kit tuku me odilo gi, acel-acel tye ki cik ki yoo mapat-pat me tuku. Acel me kin kit tuku magi macon ma oyomo cwiny tutwal tye ki byek ni ocake ki I tekwaro macon.
teo_prompt: Kotoma akiro nukolo kere, etolomutu inonosio luegelegela iponesiokec luka abolia emopira, kangin idiope ejaasi keda ikisila luegelegela keda iponesio luegelegela luka abolia. Idiopet koboro luegelegela luka aboliasio nu eomitai ebe egeunitos kotoma apakio nukolo.
lgg_prompt: E'yo agapi 'bo 'diyi ma alea, e'yo suruni ndundu 'diyi e'do avita mupira tuzaniri ma wura yi ma ngulupi si, dria yi ma azita ndu ndu azini geri avita avizu 'diyi pie. Ba ega kini avita 'diyi ma esele okori e'do engazu 'ba ewu drio 'diyi ma alia.
nyn_prompt: Omu byafaayo byona, eby'obuhangwa bingi bitandikireho emizaano yaabo y'omupiira, buri kimwe kiine ebiragiro by'omutaano n'emizaano y'omutaano. Emwe aha mizaano y'okubanza erikushemeza munonga neebaasa kuba yaaruga omu bantu aba ira.

eng_prompt: As we prepare for this significant step in our lives, it's essential to consider the various aspects of our relationship. Understanding each other's values and expectations is crucial for a successful marriage.
lug_prompt: Nga twetegekera omutendera guno ogw'omugaso mu bulamu bwaffe, kya mugaso okulowooza ku bintu eby'enjawulo mu mukwano gwaffe. Okutegeeragana ku bintu buli omu by'atwala ng'ebikulu n'ebyo by'asuubira mu munne kikulu nnyo mu bufumbo obulungi.
ach_prompt: Ka watye ka yubbe pi kare man ma pire tek tutwal I kwowa, pire tek tutwal me tamo I kom jami mapat-pat matye I kinwa. Niang kit ma ngat acel acel neno kwede jami ki miti pa lawote pire tek tutwal I nyom ma cwinye yom.
teo_prompt: Kwape iuta sio aitemonokin kanuka adoketait na naepol noi kotoma aijar wok, ejok aomoom nuikamunitos iponesio luegelegela luka eidicanekosi. Amisiikin nu ekoto yenicie ka iboro lu ekoto yenicie erai ibore yenepol noi kanu edukone loejok.
lgg_prompt: Amani ama oturia e'yo orodriru 'di 'yezu ama edri ma alia, eri orodriru ama ma ega e'yo esele ndu ndu ama eselia 'diyi ma dria. Ba eyi ma eselea 'diyi ma vata azini afa eyini lele 'diyi ma vata eri orodriru aje akuni drile suzaru.
nyn_prompt: Ku turikwetebeekanisiza omutendera ogu ogw'omugasho omu magara gaitu, n'eky'omugasho okureeba enshonga z'omukago gwaitu ezitarikushushana. Okwetegyereza emitwarize n'ebi buri omwe arikwenda n'eky'omugasho omu bushwere burungi.

eng_prompt: The circus had become a popular attraction in the town, drawing large crowds eager for a spectacle. Performers showcased their talents, captivating audiences with daring acts and whimsical displays.
lug_prompt: Circus yali efuuse ekintu ekisikiriza mu kibuga, ekyasikiriza abantu abangi nga baagala okulaba ekyewuunyo. Abayimbi baayolesezza ebitone byabwe, nga bakwata abantu n'ebikolwa byabwe eby'obuvumu n'okwolesebwa kw'ennyimba.
ach_prompt: Yub me pyem tuku odoko gin ma oywek tutwal I boma ne, ma oweko dano mapol gubedo ki miti me neno yub eni. Lugoo wee gubedo ka nyuto mot gi, ma oyomo cwiny lwak tutwal.
teo_prompt: Araun acircus ibore yen ejenara noi kotoma otaun, ido abu koyangau itunga luipu luejaasi keda eipuda loka asesen. Apotu ayook itodiasi atalantanakec, aisiyalamikisi itunga keda iponesio lukajokak keda aitodianareta nuka ikososinei.
lgg_prompt: Avita circus niri eca curu'do e'yo 'bani lezu 'ba eyi ma eselea tu tawuni 'da ma alea, erini 'ba karakara eyi ejizu ava be e'yo ndrezaru 'diyi ndrezu. Ba avita 'yepi 'diyi e'da feta Munguni fe eyini 'diyi, eyini 'ba emu'ba 'diyi ma asi 'bazu e'yo 'yezu asi driasi azini e'da ongoni 'diyi pie.
nyn_prompt: Circus ekaba ehindukire eky'okureeberaho ekirikumanywa munonga omu rurembo, ekirikureeta abantu baingi abarikwenda kureeba omworeko. Abeeshongozi boorekire emyoga yaabo, bakashemeza abantu n'ebyeshongoro byabo.

eng_prompt: In an effort to ensure fair legal proceedings, the court has implemented new protocols for evaluating the mental health of individuals facing charges. This measure aims to determine the competency of suspects to stand trial.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'okukakasa emisango egy'obwenkanya, kkooti etaddewo enkola empya ey'okukebera obulamu bw'obwongo bw'abantu abavunaanibwa emisango. Kino kigendererwamu okuzuula obusobozi bw'abateeberezebwa okuwozesebwa.
ach_prompt: I tute matek me neno ni pido tye maber, kot okatti ki yoo manyen me niang kit ma adam pa dano matye ki adot tye kwede. Yub man tye me niang kace ngat ma byek me bal tye I kome twero cito I nyim kot.
teo_prompt: Kotoma agogongu na awanyun ebe ejokuna apupio na ikisila, etolomu ekooti ainapeta nuitetiak nuka airereor angaleu naka adam naka itunga lu iwosatai. Alosikinet na erai ajenun ebe epedorete itunga luitepesenitai aitepesen.
lgg_prompt: Okpo 'bazu e'yo liza kililiru ri ma dria, dwani 'ba geri o'diru 'bani ecozu 'ba e'yo liza be 'diyi ma rua ala ma ale andrizu ra. Asisile e'yo 'di niri lezu 'ba 'bani ega eza e'yo ra ada 'diyi ma okpo esuzu e'yo liza ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Omu kaweefube w'okureeba ngu hariho oburinganiza omu kooti,kooti etandikireho enkora nsya y'okushwijuma amagara g'omutwe gw'abantu abarikujunaanwa. Ekigyendererwa n'okumanya ngu abarikuteekateekwaho kukora ebihagaro nibabaasa kuhurira orubanja.

eng_prompt: The government has approved the budget for the upcoming fiscal year. As part of this financial plan, significant funds will be directed towards various essential services.
lug_prompt: Gavumenti ekkirizza embalirira y'omwaka gw'ebyensimbi ogujja. Ng'ekimu ku nteekateeka eno ey'ebyensimbi, ssente nnyingi zijja kukozesebwa mu buweereza obw'enjawulo.
ach_prompt: Gamente omoko byek lim me mwaka me lim mabino ni. Macalo but yub me lim man, kibiketo lim madit tutwal I kom jami ma mite pi kwo pa dano.
teo_prompt: Abu apugan itigogong ebajet loka ekaru lo ebunit. Kwape ediope kotoma ainapeta nuka ikapun, eponio aitwasam ikapun luipu kanu aijanakin itunga.
lgg_prompt: Gamete ai otita ajeni eli robiani emupi ri ni 'bo. Otita robia niri ma azi ru, 'ba nga robia angiri 'diyi ayu azakoma fele o'bi eyini 'diyi ma aza kozu.
nyn_prompt: Gavumenti eyikiriize embaririra y'omwaka gw'eby'esente ogurikwija. Nk'emwe aha nteekateeka y'esente, esente nyingi niziija kukoresibwa omu mirimo y'omugasho.

eng_prompt: In response to the recent tragic events, the government has decided to provide financial assistance to the victims. As part of this initiative, three million shillings will be allocated for those who were injured.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula ebikangabwa ebibaddewo gyebuvuddeko, gavumenti esazeewo okuwa obuyambi bw'ensimbi eri abakoseddwa. Ng'omu ku kaweefube ono, obukadde busatu bujja kuweebwa abo abaafuna ebisago.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me peko ma otimme cokcok-ki, gamente omiyo kony me lim bot jo ma peko man otimme I komgi. Macalo but yub man, kibiketo ciling milyon adek pi jo ma onongo awano.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin akiro nuarokok nuapotu kotakanutu pac, abu apugan ocam aijaikin agangat na ikapun mama ejaasi ngul luetirorit. Kwape ediopet koboro kalu, eponio aijaikin imilionin iuni mama ejaasi ngul luemusunguna.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru i 'yepi o'diru 'diyi ma e'yosi, gamete 'du e'yo azakoma robia siri fezu 'ba e'yo ewaru isu'baa 'diyi dri ra. Otita 'di ma azi ru, 'ba nga silingi milioni na fe 'ba nya'biliko esupi 'diyi dri.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'ebibi ebyabaireho obwahati,gavumenti eshaziremu kuheereza obuhwezi bw'esente abo ababaire bateganisiibwe. Nk'emwe aha nteekateeka egi, obukaikuru bushatu nibuza kuheebwa abo abahutaziibwe.

eng_prompt: Despite the numerous attempts to address their concerns, many patients felt unheard and neglected. As the hours passed with little communication, their patience began to wear thin.
lug_prompt: Wadde nga baagezaako okukola ku nsonga zaabwe, abalwadde bangi bawulira nga tebawulirizibwa era nga tebafiibwako. Essaawa bwe zaagenda ziyitawo nga tebawuliziganya nnyo, obugumiikiriza bwabwe bwatandika okukendeera.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni kitemo tutwal me tyeko peko gi, lutwo mapol giwinyo calo pe ki winyo lokgi dok pe ki paro pigi. Ka cawa woto ki lok manok, diyo cwinygi ocako rweny.
teo_prompt: Karaida etamitai aitemokin atiokisio kec, apotu adekak luipu opupoto ebe mam epupokinitai kesi. Neatubor isawan komamei einer loepol, abu atitingikec kogeu aibiror.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'bani lezu e'yo eyi ma dria 'diyi ma aza kozu ra ti, 'ba karakara eyi ega kini 'ba eri eyi ku dika eyi adi eyi. Sawa eyini agazu e'yo nzeza were si risi, asi teza eyini ri e'do e'de ra.
nyn_prompt: Oihireho okuteeraho kwingi kukora aha nshonga zaabo, abarwaire baingi tibarikuhurirwa kandi tibarikuhaburwa. Eshaaha ku zaahingwireho tibarikugamba kihango,okugumisiriza kwabo kukatandika kuhwa.

eng_prompt: Frustrated by the long wait times and inadequate service, the community members gathered to voice their concerns. Despite their efforts to seek immediate solutions, they felt their complaints were met with indifference.
lug_prompt: Olw'okuggwaamu amaanyi olw'ebiseera ebiwanvu eby'okulinda n'obuweereza obutamala, abantu b'omu kitundu baakuÅ‹Å‹aanye okwogera ebibaluma. Wadde nga baagezaako okufuna eby'okugonjoola mu bwangu, baawulira okwemulugunya kwabwe nga tekuliimu.
ach_prompt: Pi cwer cwiny pi kare malac me kuro ki tic ma goro, lwak gugure me tito peko gi. Kadi bed ni gutiyo matek me nongo yoo me cobo peko gi oyot oyot, gin onongo giwinyo calo pe giparo pi koko gi.
teo_prompt: Apotu itunga luka atutubet kongurianata kanu apak naewoja noi naka aidar keda aijanakin na mam edolitos, apotu kesi kotukokinos kanu aitijenikin aiyalongongokec. Karaida apotu kesi iswamata kagogongu kanu aitemokin atiokisio, apotu kesi opupoto ebe mam epupokinitai angurian kec.
lgg_prompt: Sa'wa 'bani 'ba eyi tezu sa'wa ezu risi azini azi ngaza kililiru kurisi, 'ba ongulumu 'da ma alea 'diyi tra eyi e'yo eyini ega 'diyi oluzu. E'yo yini lezu e'yo nde ma aza kozu mbeleru 'diyi ma talasi, eyi ega kini 'ba 'duni e'yo eyini onuzu 'diyi ku.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okugwera orubanja obwire buraingwa bw'okurinda hamwe n'obuheereza bubi, abantu b'omukyanga baketeeranira hamwe kworeka enshonga zaabo. Oihireho amaani gaabo okuronda oburyo bw'okutereeza eshonga, bakeehurira ngu okwetomboitwa kwabo tikurashemerereirwe.

eng_prompt: Due to the company's recent financial struggles, management announced a series of cost-cutting measures. As a result, some colleagues received salary cuts.
lug_prompt: Olw'ebizibu by'ensimbi kkampuni bye yafuna gye buvuddeko awo, abaddukanya kampuni baalangirira engeri ez'enjawulo ez'okukendeeza ku nsaasaanya. N'ekyavaamu, bakozi bannange abamu omusaala gwabwe gwasalibwako.
ach_prompt: Pi peko me lim ma dul ne tye kwede cokcok-ki, ludito dul ne gucwalo lok angeya me dwoko piny wel cente ma mite. Macalo adwogi ne, ki ngolo mucara pa lutic luwotgi mukene.
teo_prompt: Kanuka atiokisio nuka ikapun nuka ekampuni, abu eyaitene kolimo iwaitin luipu luka aitidisiar etiai loka ikapun. Kanuka ngun, apotu luiswamaete keda kesi kotuboto eropitikec.
lgg_prompt: E'yo amuti 'da ma e'yo ewaru robia esuzu 'diyi ma e'yosi, driceza amuti 'da niri azi e'yo aje ma omgbo esizu 'diyi karakara. E'yo 'disi, 'ba li azi 'diyi ma musara ra.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'oburemeezi bwa kampuni omu by'empiiha, abarikukurira ekitongore bakarangirira oburyo bw'okukyendeeza aha nshohoza. N'ekyarugiremu,bamwe ahabakozi bagyenzi bangye bakashara emishaara yaabo.

eng_prompt: Investigators have been examining the records for discrepancies. Initial findings suggest irregularities that warrant further scrutiny.
lug_prompt: Bambega babadde beekenneenya ebiwandiiko okuzuula obutakwatagana. Ebizuuliddwa ebisooka biraga obutali bwenkanya obwetaagisa okwongera okwekebejjebwa.
ach_prompt: Lutim kwed gubedo ka ngiyo rekod ne pi gin mo ma pe tye kakare. Adwogi me kwed ma okwongo nyutu ni bal tye ma omyero kimed kwedgi.
teo_prompt: Eutasi angicak airereonor akiro ngun kanu amamus acamanar. Akiro nusodit nuedumunitai itodunit ebe ejaas iboro lumam iswamaete ejok ido ekot airereonor.
lgg_prompt: Ba e'yo eti ondapi 'diyi ebi e'yo siza 'da ma ale andri e'yo azita palaa ku 'diyi esuzu. EêžŒyo êžŒbani esu okorisi êžŒdiyi ece kini eêžŒyo êžŒbani esu okorisi êžŒdiyi eêžŒyo êžŒbani lezu eti ondazu drile êžŒdiyi.
nyn_prompt: Bambega batwire nibashwijuma ebihandiiko, okureeba obutakwatanisa. Ebirikubanza kushangwa nibyoreka oburemeezi oburikwetenga okucondoozibwa.

eng_prompt: In assessing the readiness of the military units deployed in the region, it is crucial to understand their training and operational protocols. This leads us to consider the specific conduct and actions that would be anticipated from these troops in various scenarios.
lug_prompt: Mu kwekenneenya obwetegefu bw'ebitongole by'amagye ebiweerezeddwa mu kitundu, kikulu nnyo okutegeera okutendekebwa kwabwe n'enkola y'emirimu. Kino kituleetera okulowooza ku nneeyisa n'ebikolwa ebisuubirwa mu magye gano mu mbeera ez'enjawulo.
ach_prompt: I kare me niang yubbe pa dul mony ma kicwalo gi I twok piny eni, pire tek tutwal me niang pwonye gi ki yoo me tic gi. Man weko watamo I kom tim ki tim mapat-pat ma byek tye I kom mony magi I kare mapat-pat.
teo_prompt: Kotoma aingic akapakina naka atukona nuka ajore nuejukunitai aiboisit, ejokuna noi amisiikin aitutuoro kec keda ainapeta nuka aswam. Einakini ngin oni aomoom iponesio keda aswamisinei nuewomitai ebe ibusakinit itunga lu aswam kotoma ojautene luegelegela.
lgg_prompt: E'yo otuta amuti asikari eyini 'bani 'ba angu 'da ma alea 'diyiniri ma ale andrita ma alea, eri orodriru eyi ma imbata azini geri eyini azi ngazu 'diyi vazu. E'yo 'di ni fe ama ni e'yo ega adriza azini e'yo 'bani egale asikari 'diyi ma dria e'yo ndundu eyi ma alea 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Omu kushwijuma okweteekateekyera kw'amahe agari omu kicweka, nikikuru kwetegyereza okutendekwa n'emitendera y'okukoramu emirimo yaabo. Eki nikitureetera kuteekateeka aha mitwarize n'ebikorwa ebirikuteekateekwaho kuruga omu mahe aga omu mbeera ezitari zimwe.

eng_prompt: In a system where integrity is compromised, the focus shifts away from ethical standards. As a result, regulations are selectively enforced to favor dishonest practices.
lug_prompt: Mu nkola obugolokofu gye bukendeera, essira lisenguka okuva ku misingi gy'empisa. N'ekivuddemu, amateeka gateekebwa mu nkola okusobozesa ebikolwa ebitali bya bwesimbu.
ach_prompt: Ikare ma kitye ka balo ber bedo pa dano, miti pa dano lokke ki I kom cik ma doro kit me kwo pa dano. Macalo adwogi ne, ki keto cik mapat-pat I tic me tyelo kor tim me camucana.
teo_prompt: Kotoma ainapeta nuemamei ailajaara, ibusakinit itunga aijulakin apodokinitokec kama ejaasi iponesio lukajokak. Kanuka ngun, itwasamao ikisila kanu aitigogong aswamisio nu mam eraas nu abeit.
lgg_prompt: Geri 'bani e'yo ada ma ta mbazuri ma alia, e'yo 'bani asi 'bazu 'diyi oja yi engazu e'yo adriza onyiruri ma dria. E'yo 'disi, 'ba azita eyi o'ba geri ndundu eyini ani e'yo 'yeta e'yo ada kokoru 'diyi 'yezu beni.
nyn_prompt: Omu nkora y'eby'obutegyeki erimu oburingaaniza, ekigyendererwa n'okuruga aha mitindo y'emitwarize. N'ekyarugiremu, ebiragiro nibiteebwa omu nkora okurabira omu bikorwa ebitarikwesigwa.

eng_prompt: In light of recent concerns about electoral integrity, various organizations have put forth a series of proposals. The aim is to ensure that all voices are heard and that the democratic process is upheld.
lug_prompt: Okusinziira ku kweraliikirira okwaliwo gye buvuddeko ku bikwata ku bulungibwansi mu kulonda, ebitongole eby'enjawulo bifulumizza ebiteeso eby'enjawulo. Ekigendererwa kya kukakasa nti amaloboozi gonna gawulirwa era nti enkola ya demokulasiya ekuumibwa.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki lworo ma obedo tye cokcok-ki I kom ber bedo pa yer, dul mapat-pat okatti ki tam mapat-pat. Miti ne tye me neno ni dwon pa dano weng ki winyo dok bene ni loc alwak obedo tye.
teo_prompt: Katupitos nuikamunitos aiyalongongo naka aseo, apotu iriongeta luipu itolomutu aomisio nuipu. Alosikinet erai awanyun ebe epupio iporotoi kere ka aitogogong aseo naka itunga.
lgg_prompt: E'yo asi otiza o'diru e'yo opetaa ma e'yo ada ma dria 'diyisi, amuti ndundu eyi eji egata eyi karakara. Asisile 'di lezu nezu ra kini 'ba eri o'duko dria 'diyi azini kini 'ba ma 'ba e'yo democracia ni 'diyi ci.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okwerarikirira okwabaireho ahabw'oburingaaniza omu by'oburuuru, ebitongore bitari bimwe na bimwe bitongoize ebiteiso bitari bimwe na bimwe. Ekigyendererwa n'okureeba ngu eiraka ry'abantu boona rihurirwa kandi ngu enkora ya demokurasiya egumizemu.

eng_prompt: In many situations, individuals found themselves tested by the actions of others. They learned to navigate these challenges with a calm demeanor, choosing to respond thoughtfully rather than react impulsively.
lug_prompt: Mu mbeera nnyingi, abantu beesanga nga bagezeseddwa ebikolwa by'abalala. Baayiga okwaÅ‹Å‹anga okusoomoozebwa kuno nga bakkakkamu, nga basalawo okuddamu nga balowooza okusinga okweyisa mu bwangu.
ach_prompt: I kare mapol, ngat acel acel nongo ni kitye ka teme ki tim pa jo mukene. Gupwonyo kit me lweny i kom peko magi ki cwiny ma opye mot, kun giyero me timo gin mo ma tamgi tye iye me kaka timo gin mo atura.
teo_prompt: Kojautene loepol, apotu itunga odumutu awanyunet naka aswamisio nuka luce. Apotu kesi isisiautu aitodolikin atiokisio nu keda ainapakina, aseun aomisio itia aomisio.
lgg_prompt: E'yo karakara eyi ma alea, 'ba eyi esu eyi e'yo 'ba azi 'diyini 'ye 'diyisi obita esu. Eyi oni e'yo ewaru 'diyi ma aza ko adriza e'yere si, eyi pe e'yo 'yezu egata si aga e'yo 'yezu e'yo kokoru ri si.
nyn_prompt: Omu mbeera nyingi, abantu bakeesherekaho okukyeberwa ahabw'ebikorwa by'abandi. Bakeega okurwanisa oburemeezi obu n'emitwarize y'obucureera, barikucwamu kugarukamu barikuteekateeka, okukira okugarukamu bataine kiteekateeko.

eng_prompt: In a world filled with constant distractions and instant gratification, many individuals struggle to find the calmness required to navigate life's challenges. Cultivating a sense of understanding and tolerance can lead to more meaningful connections and personal growth.
lug_prompt: Mu nsi ejjudde ebiwugulaza buli kaseera n'okwematiza okw'amangu, abantu bangi balwana okufuna obukkakkamu obwetaagisa okutambuza okusoomoozebwa kw'obulamu. Okukulaakulanya okutegeera n'okugumiikiriza kusobola okuleeta enkolagana ennungi n'okukulaakulana kw'omuntu.
ach_prompt: I lobo ma opong ki jami ma dwoyo tam pa dano kare ki kare ki nongo yomo cwiny oyot oyot, dano mapol gitye ka yele me nongo kuc ma mite me lweny i kom peko me kwo. Dongo kit me niang ki diyo cwiny twero kelo bedo ki wat maber ki dongo pa dano.
teo_prompt: Kotoma akwap naejaasi keda iboro luitegelikina keda aiyalama na atipet, itunga luipu eutasi aimo ainapakina na ekotoi kanu aitodolikin atiokisio nuka aijar. Aitopoloun amisiikin keda atitingikinit epedori ayangaun aiswamanara naejok ka apol.
lgg_prompt: Wudrikuru 'di ma alea afa e'yo onzi 'yepi sa'wa driasi 'diyi pie tualu afa ayiko fepi sa'wa 'disi 'diyi pie, 'ba karakara eyi dri ci asi omiza esuzu e'yo ewaru idri ma alea 'diyi ma aza kozu. E'yo vata azini ti ecita ma ezoza eco fe 'ba eyi ma eselea e'yo orodriru 'diyi pie tualu zota eyi ma ngulupi niri pie ra.
nyn_prompt: Omu nsi eijwire ebirikuturemesa n'okushemererwa ahonaaho, abantu baingi nibarwana kuronda obusingye oburikwetengwa kurwanisa oburemeezi bw'amagara. Okutunga okwetegyerezana n'okugumisiriza nikibaasa kureetaho enkoragana nungi n'okutunguuka.

eng_prompt: In a democratic society, the integrity of the electoral process is crucial for fostering trust among citizens. When people believe their voices are heard, it lays the groundwork for a harmonious and stable community.
lug_prompt: Mu demokulasiya, obwesimbu mu nkola y'okulonda bukulu nnyo mu kutumbula obwesige mu bannansi. Abantu bwe bakkiriza nti amaloboozi gaabwe gawulirwa, kiteekawo omusingi gw'obumu n'obutebenkevu mu kitundu.
ach_prompt: I te loc alwak, ber bedo pa yub me bolo kwir pire tek tutwal pi kelo gen ikin anywali. Ka dano tye ki niyee ni ki winyo dwon gi, man keto guti me kuc ki ber bedo ikabedo gi.
teo_prompt: Kotoma akwap naejaasi keda aseo, ejokuna noi ainapeta nuka aseo kanu aitopolor amunokina kanejaas itunga. Arai iyuunit itunga ebe epupio iporotoikec, itolomunenei ngin atukot na imorikikina ka ainapakina.
lgg_prompt: Ongulumu democracia ni 'diyi ma alea, e'yo opetaa ni aa'zu e'yo ada be ri eri orodriru asi'baza ejizu kari anzi eyi ma eselea. Ba ka a'i ra kini 'ba yi ma o'duko eri ra, eri e'do angu aa'pi tualu azini asianzu be 'diyi ma vuti.
nyn_prompt: Omu by'obutegyeki, oburingaaniza omu by'oburuuru n'obw'omugasho ahabw'okureetaho obwesigye omu bantu. Abantu ku barikwikiriza ngu eiraka ryabo nirihurirwa, nikitandikaho omusingye gw'obumwe n'obutebekana omu bantu.

eng_prompt: Throughout the ages, societies have often found themselves facing similar challenges and dilemmas. This cyclical nature of events raises an important question:
lug_prompt: Emyaka gyonna, ebitundu bibadde bisanga okusoomoozebwa kwe kumu n'ebizibu.
ach_prompt: I kare ma okato angec, kabedo mapat-pat obedo ka nongo peko ki peko marom.
teo_prompt: Apakio nukokau, etereikina itunga keda atiokisio nueputosi.
lgg_prompt: Eli agapi 'bo 'diyi ma alea, ongulumu eyi esu eyi e'yo ewaru azini e'yo ewaru 'dile 'diyi esu.
nyn_prompt: Omu myaka yoona, abantu batwire nibashanga oburemeezi n'oburemeezi nk'obwo.

eng_prompt: The escalating tensions in the community have reached a breaking point, leaving many residents feeling unsafe. As the situation worsens, it becomes increasingly clear that immediate action is necessary.
lug_prompt: Okweyongerayongera kw'obunkenke mu kitundu kutuuse ku ntikko, ne kireka abatuuze bangi nga bawulira nga tebalina bukuumi. Embeera bwe yeeyongera okwonooneka, kyeyoleka bulungi nti kyetaagisa okubaako kye tukolawo mu bwangu.
ach_prompt: Lweny matye kamedde I kin lwak dong oo kama rac tutwal ma oweko lutedero mapol pe tye agwoka. Ka jami tye ka time marac, nen atyer kamaleng ni omyero kitim gin mo oyot oyot.
teo_prompt: Akangasia nu iyatakinete kotoma atutubet adolokin adoketait naepol noi, ijalakini itunga luipu mam eyuwara. Kwape erono ejautene, ejenuna noi ebe ibusakinit aswam katipet.
lgg_prompt: Ngiringiri ongulumu eyi ma eselea ri ma omgbo ni tu ra, fe 'ba aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyini aa'zu ageitema kokoru. E'yo ni ecazu onzi ru, eri eca e'da kini le 'ba ma 'ye e'yo mbeleru.
nyn_prompt: Obunkenke obweyongyeire omu bantu, buhikire aha muheru, abatuuragye baingi tibarikwetegyerezibwa. Embeera ku erikweyongyera kusiisikara, nikyeyoreka butunu ngu hariho ekishemereire kukorwa ahonaaho.

eng_prompt: I had a series of meetings scheduled with different teams. Each visit felt familiar as I navigated through the office halls.
lug_prompt: Nnateekateeka enkiiko eziwerako ne ttiimu ez'enjawulo. Buli lwe nnabakyalira nnawulira nga mbamanyi nga bwe ntambula mu bisenge bya woofiisi.
ach_prompt: Abedo ki kacoke mapol ma kiyubu ki team mapat-pat. Limo acel-acel obedo calo gin ma angeo I kare ma atye ka wot I odi tic mapat-pat.
teo_prompt: Ajaasi eong keda airiamununeta nuipu keda itimun luegelegela. Apotu eong ajenutu aipejonokin kangin nealosia eong kotoma aiboisio nuka eyapiesi.
lgg_prompt: Ma otu mitingi eyi amuti ndundu eyi pie karakara. Omu dria ma alia 'diyi ma e'da kile ma ni ra mani acizu pari ofisia 'diyi ma aliarisi.
nyn_prompt: Nkaba nyine enkiiko nyingi ezitebeekanisiibwe na tiimu ezitari zimwe. Buri kutaayaayira kukaba nikureebeka nk'okw'omutaano obu naabaire nintambura omu bishengye bya ofiisi.

eng_prompt: I have several family members who rely on me for support. Currently, my dependents are pursuing their education, with two of them attending university.
lug_prompt: Nnina ab'enganda zange bangi abannyamba. Mu kiseera kino, ab'enganda zange bali mu kusoma era babiri ku bo bali ku yunivasite.
ach_prompt: Atye ki jo me ot mapol ma gigene me konya. I kare-ni, jo ma agwoko gitye ka kwan, aryo ikingi gitye I univaciti.
teo_prompt: Ajaasi eong keda itunga luipu luka ekale ka luigangitos eong. Kwape kwana, eutasi itunga ka lu ejarete keda eong aswam asioman kec, ido iarei kakesi elosete ounibasite.
lgg_prompt: Ma vu 'ba familia ma alia 'diyi ma kalafesini yi atipi ma dria atita fezu 'diyi tre. Sawa 'disi, 'ba ma vile 'diyi onita oniria, yi ma iri yi onita univasitia.
nyn_prompt: Nyine ab'eka yangye baingi abarikunsherura obuhwezi. Obwahati, abarikundeeberera bariyo nibakora eby'obwegyese bwabo, babiri aharibo bari aha yunivasite.

eng_prompt: The project has faced numerous setbacks over the past few months, leading to growing frustration among team members. As we analyze the situation, it becomes clear that several factors may be contributing to these issues.
lug_prompt: Pulojekiti efunye obuzibu bungi mu myezi egiyise, ekiviiriddeko obwennyamivu obweyongera mu bammemba ba ttiimu. Nga twekenneenya embeera, kyeyoleka bulungi nti ensonga eziwerako ziyinza okuba nga ze zivuddeko ensonga zino.
ach_prompt: Yub eni okato ki peko mapol I dwe ma okato ni, ma oweko cwiny lumemba me dul ne pe obedo yom. Ka watye ka ngiyo ngo matye katimme, nen atyer kamaleng ni jami mapol tye ka kelo peko magi.
teo_prompt: Etereikina epurojekt ngol keda atiokisio nuipu noi kotoma ilapio lu atuboros, eyangaunitos amamus aiyalama kanejaas imeban luka etimu. Kwape sio aanyanar ejautene, ecai cut ebe ipu akiro nu eyangaunitos akiro nu.
lgg_prompt: Otita 'da esu e'yo ewaru karakara eyi mba agapi 'bo 'diyi ma alea eyini ani candi fezu 'ba amuti 'da ma alea 'diyi dri. Amani e'yo 'da ma ale andriria, eri eca e'dazaru kini e'yo karakara eyi eco e'yo 'diyi eji ra.
nyn_prompt: Purogyekiti etungire oburemeezi bwingi omu myezi mikye ehwaire, ekyarugiremu okwetomboita omu ba memba ba tiimu. Ku turikushwijuma embeera, nikyeyoreka butunu ngu enshonga nyingi nizibaasa kuba niziretaho oburemeezi obu.

eng_prompt: After months of investigation and gathering evidence, Egesa finally uncovered the truth. The elaborate scheme had been hidden in plain sight, but now the time had come to reveal the culprits.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'emyezi egy'okunoonyereza n'okukung'aanya obujulizi, Egesa yasembye okuzuula amazima. Akakodyo kaali kakwekeddwa mu lwatu, naye kati ekiseera kyali kituuse okubikkula abazzi b'emisango.
ach_prompt: Ingee kwedo lok ki coko caden pi dwe mapol, Egesa dong otyeko niang lok ada. Yub eni obedo ka kanne I wang dano weng, ento kombedi kare onongo dong oromo me nyutu joo ma otimo bal.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ilapio luka aingic keda aituk ajenanut, abu Egesa kodum abeit. Aponi kongopai akiro ngun koipone kaloejok, konye kwana adolu apak naka aitijenar ngul luiswamaete ngun.
lgg_prompt: Mba 'bani vuti ondazu azini afa ecetaru 'diyi trazu 'bori ma vutia, Egesa esu asizu e'yo adari ra. Otita nderi ebi ovu ozizaru o'bi yi dri, te sawa ca di 'ba e'yo nde 'ye'baa 'diyi e'dazu.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'ameezi mingi y'okucondooza n'okurundaana obujurizi, Egesa akahendera yashanga amazima. Enteekateeka y'amaani ekaba esherekirwe, kwonka obwahati obwire bukaba buhikire kworeka abakozi b'ebihagaro.

eng_prompt: As the days stretch on with no end in sight, many people are feeling the weight of isolation. The uncertainty surrounding the pandemic has taken a toll on mental health and daily routines.
lug_prompt: Ng'ennaku zigenda ziyitawo nga tewali nkomerero, abantu bangi bawulira obuzito bw'okweyawula ku balala. Obutali bukakafu obwetolodde ekirwadde bbunansi bukosezza obulamu bw'obwongo n'emirimu gya buli lunaku.
ach_prompt: I kare ma nino tye ka kato labongo agiki, dano mapol tye ka winyo peko me bedo kengi. Lweny I kom two ma opoto ni obalo yotkom me adam ki tic me nino ducu.
teo_prompt: Kwape elosete apaarasia komam ewanyunitai angetakin, epupete itunga luipu ationis naka aiboisitikec bon. Amamus na acamanar kanu adeka naka ekorona emunarit angaleu naka adam keda aswam naka nginiparan.
lgg_prompt: O'du eyini tuzu asizu kokoru, 'ba karakara eyi e'yo eyi ma esele cozu 'ba azi 'diyi pie ri ma e'yosi. E'yo ewaru azo 'dezaniri ma e'yosi ri eza omi ma rua ala azini 'yeta o'du driasi 'diyi ra.
nyn_prompt: Ebiro ku birikugyenda omu maisho, abantu baingi nibahurira oburemeezi bw'okwetantara abandi. Oburemeezi obwehinguririize oburwaire bwa korona, butwaire amagara g'omutwe n'emirimo y'obutoosha.

eng_prompt: Due to the recent outbreak, strict travel restrictions have been implemented across the region. As a result, we are not allowed to move from one district to another.
lug_prompt: Olw'okubalukawo kw'ekirwadde gyebuvuddeko, envumbo enkakali ku ntambula ziteekeddwawo mu kitundu kyonna. N'ekivuddemu, tetukkirizibwa kuva mu disitulikiti emu okudda mu ndala.
ach_prompt: Pi poto pa two ma otimme cokcok-ki, ki keto kigeng matek tutwal I kom wot I but lobo man weng. Macalo adwogi ne, pe ki yee itwa me aa ki I dicitrwik acel me cito I mukene.
teo_prompt: Kanuka abwangun naka adeka naka ekorona, aponi ibwaikinai ainapeta nuka alosit aiboisio kere. Kanuka ngun, mam ecamakitai sio alosit anyoun kodisitrikt ediope itoni ece.
lgg_prompt: E'yo azo efupi o'diru ri ma e'yosi, 'ba 'ba azita okporu acita ma dria 'diyi angu 'di ma alea dria. E'yo 'disi, 'ba leni ama ma aci engazu distrikit alu ma alia cazu aziria ku.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okubarukaho kw'oburwaire obwahwireho, okuzibirwa kw'okutambura kuteirweho omu kicweka kyona. N'ekyarugiremu, titurikwikirizibwa kuruga omu disiturikiti emwe kuza omu endiijo.

eng_prompt: In an effort to enhance road safety and reduce accidents, new regulations have been implemented for motorcycle taxi services. As part of these measures, Boda Boda riders are not allowed to carry any passengers.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'okutumbula obukuumi ku nguudo n'okukendeeza ku bubenje, amateeka amapya gateekeddwawo ku mpeereza ya takisi za pikipiki. Ng'ekimu ku bisaanyizo bino, abavuzi ba boodabooda tebakkirizibwa kusitula basaabaze.
ach_prompt: I tute me medo ber bedo I gudu ki dwoko piny rwom me peko me gudi, kiketo cik manyen I tic pi taxi me pikipiki. Macalo but cik magi, pe ki yee ki ludwo boda me tingo luwot.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitogogong ayuara na irotin ka aitidisiar akangasia, aponi ibwaikinai ikisila luitetiak kanuka ipikipikin. Kwape ediopet koboro kalu, mam ecamakitai ibodabodan aidak itunga.
lgg_prompt: Okpo 'bazu e'yo nzila ni 'diyi ma tambazu azini drileonzi eyi ma omgbo esizu, 'ba e'do azita o'diru eyi pikipiki taxi eyini. E'yo 'diyi ma azi ru, 'ba leni 'ba Boda Boda onzupi 'diyi ma 'du 'ba azi ku.
nyn_prompt: Omu kaweefube w'okutunguura eby'okwerinda aha nguuto n'okukyendeeza butandu, ebiragiro ebitsya bitandikirweho ahaby'okukoresa takisi za pikipiki. Nk'emwe aha nkora egi, abavugi ba Boda Boda tibarikwikirizibwa kutwara omugyenyi weena.

eng_prompt: Due to the ongoing transportation strike, many public services have been disrupted. As a result, the health workers have to walk to hospitals during this period.
lug_prompt: Olw'akeediimo k'ebyentambula akagenda mu maaso, obuweereza bungi obw'olukale butaataaganyizibwa. N'ekivuddemu, abasawo balina okutambula okugenda mu malwaliro mu kiseera kino.
ach_prompt: Pi jemo pa luwot matye kawot anyim, tic pa lwak mapol pe obedo maber. Macalo adwogi ne, lutic yoto kom omyero guwot ki tyengi me cito I ot yat I kare man.
teo_prompt: Kanuka aidiya naka elose lo elosi akonye, aponi itolitolunai aijaanakinio naka itunga luipu. Kanuka ngun, ibusakinit eswamak lu adekis alosit keda akeje adekisia kapak kana.
lgg_prompt: Ngiringiri acipa ni mupi drile ri ma e'yosi, azi ngaza o'bi eyini 'diyi ma omgbo esi ra. E'yo 'disi, le azi'ba arojo ni 'diyi ma aci pasi arojo eyi ma alea sa'wa 'di ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'akeesharingo k'eby'engyenda akarikugyenda omu maisho, obuheereza bwingi bw'abantu buteganiisibwe. N'ekyarugiremu, abashaho nibagyenda n'ebigyere kuza omu marwariro omu bwire obu.

eng_prompt: Access to healthcare facilities can be a significant challenge for many expectant mothers. In some areas, the distance to the nearest hospital can be daunting, especially for those in their later stages of pregnancy.
lug_prompt: Okufuna obujjanjabi kuyinza okuba okusoomooza okw'amaanyi eri bamaama bangi abali embuto. Mu bitundu ebimu, olugendo okutuuka ku ddwaliro eririraanyeewo luyinza okuba oluzibu naddala eri abo abali mu mitendera gyabwe egy'oluvannyuma egy'embuto.
ach_prompt: Nongo kony me yot kom twero bedo peko madit tutwal ki mon mapol ma oyac. I kabedo mukene, bor piny me cito I ot yat matye cok twero bedo tek tutwalle pi mon ma oyac.
teo_prompt: Adumunun amukian erai ainingosit naepol noi kanejaas angor nu epotiete. Kaiboisio ace, etiono alosit adekis na eyapie, kacut mama ejaasi angor nuejaasi keda apotu.
lgg_prompt: Afa arojo ni 'diyi esuzu ri eco adri e'yo ewaru ayia okporovu karakara eyini. Angu azi 'diyi ma alia, angu cazu arojo inyia ri vu ri eco ovu ewaru tuni 'ba okporovu ru 'diyi dri.
nyn_prompt: Okutunga obuheereza bw'eby'amagara, nikibaasa kuba ekizibu aha bakazi baingi abaine enda. Omu myanya emwe, orugyendo orurikuza aha irwariro eri haihi nirubaasa kugumira munonga abakazi abaine enda abakiri bato.

eng_prompt: As the pandemic continues to affect our daily lives, many parents are concerned about keeping their children safe and healthy. It's crucial to prioritize essential health services, even during these challenging times.
lug_prompt: Ng'ekirwadde bbunansi kyeyongera okukosa obulamu bwaffe obwa bulijjo, abazadde bangi beeraliikirivu ku kukuuma abaana baabwe nga tebalina bulabe era nga balamu bulungi. Kikulu nnyo okukulembeza ebyobulamu ebikulu, ne mu biseera bino ebizibu.
ach_prompt: Kit ma two korona tye ka mede ki balo kwo wa, lunyodo mapol gitye ka paro pi gwoko lutino gi wek gubed ma komgi yot. Pire tek tutwal me miyo kony me yot kom ma pire tek loyo, kadi wa I kare man me peko.
teo_prompt: Kwape inyikokinit adeka aitolitol aijar wok naka nginiparan, epodokitos auriak luipu aidar idwekec ejok ka angaleu. Erai ibore yenepol noi aisingarenit nuka amukian, araida kotoma apakio kanu nuetioko.
lgg_prompt: E'yo azo 'dezaniri ni mu drile ama edri o'du driasi ri ojazu, tipika karakara eyi asi 'ba eyi ma anzi eyi ma tambazu muke azini rua ala be. Eri orodriru tu azakoma fele e'yo rua alanisi orodriru 'diyi 'bazu okporu sa'wa e'yo ewaru 'diyi ma alia indi.
nyn_prompt: Oburwaire burikugumizamu n'okuteganisa amagara gaitu aga buriizooba, abazaire baingi niberarikirira okurinda abaana baabo kugira amagara marungi. N'eky'omugasho kwebembeza obuheereza bw'eby'amagara oburikukirayo obukuru, nobu haakuba hariho oburemeezi obu.

eng_prompt: Health officials have announced the arrival of new vaccines aimed at enhancing public health. Preparations are underway to ensure a smooth distribution process.
lug_prompt: Abakungu b'ebyobulamu balangiridde okutuuka kw'eddagala eppya erigema erigendereddwamu okutumbula ebyobulamu by'abantu. Enteekateeka zigenda mu maaso okulaba ng'okugaba kugenda bulungi.
ach_prompt: Lutic me yot kom guwaco ni yat agwera manyen tye ka bino pi ilo malo rwom me yot kom pa lwak. Yub tye kawot anyim me neno ni yub me poko jami tye maber.
teo_prompt: Alimo eswamak luka angaleu adolonokin naka ikee luikisere ekato luitetiak kanu aitojokar angaleu naka itunga. Ejaas aitemonokineta kanu awanyun ebe ejai aikor ejok.
lgg_prompt: Azi'ba arojo ni 'diyi azi e'yo efizu aro soza o'diru 'bani lezu o'bi eyi ma rua ala otuzu ri ma dria. Otuta eyi mu drile nezu ra kini afa eyi awa kililiru.
nyn_prompt: Abakuru omu by'amagara, barangirire okuhika kw'okugyema okusya, okugyendereire kutunguura eby'amagara g'abantu. Enteekateeka ziriyo nizigyenda omu maisho, okureeba ngu okugaba kukorwa kurungi.

eng_prompt: Due to limited supplies and the higher risk of severe illness, health officials have decided to prioritize certain groups for vaccination. As a result, the vaccines will be given to only elderly people.
lug_prompt: Olw'ebikozesebwa ebitono n'obulabe bw'endwadde ez'amaanyi, abakungu b'ebyobulamu basazeewo okukulembeza ebibinja ebimu okugema. N'ekivuddemu, okugema kujja kuweebwa bakadde bokka.
ach_prompt: Pi nok pa jami ki gum me nongo two marac tutwal, lutic me yot kom gumoko tamgi me miyo yat agwera bot dul mogo. Macalo adwogi ne, kibi gwero jo ma otii keken.
teo_prompt: Kanuka ikidioko iboro keda ationis na adekasinei nu erono, aseutu eswamak luka angaleu aisingarenit igurupun ice kanu aikis ekato. Kanuka ngun, eponio aikis ekato mama ejaasi itunga luemojongito bon.
lgg_prompt: Afa ayuzaru 'diyi ma ongmbo ni ovuzu were azini e'yo azo onzi 'diyi ni ovuzu uru risi, azi'ba arojo ni 'diyi asi 'du e'yo 'bazu okporu ongulumu azi 'diyi osozu aro azo atrizu ri ma dria. E'yo 'disi, 'ba lu aro azo atrizu ri fe 'ba depi 'bo 'diyi dri.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'ebintu bikye n'oburemeezi bw'okurwara munonga, abakuru omu by'amagara bashaziremu kwebembeza guruupu ezimwe z'okugyema. N'ekyarugiremu,okugyema nikwija kuheebwa abantu abakuzire omu myaka bonka.

eng_prompt: In light of the ongoing pandemic, the government has prioritized certain groups for vaccination. As part of the initial rollout plan, essential personnel will be among the first to receive the vaccine.
lug_prompt: Olw'ekirwadde bbunansi ekigenda mu maaso, gavumenti ekulembezza abantu abamu okugemebwa. Ng'ekitundu ku nteekateeka y'okutandika, abakozi abakulu bajja kuba mu abo abasooka okufuna eddagala erigema.
ach_prompt: Pi peko me two korona matye kawot anyim, gamente oketo cwinygi tutwalle I kom dul pa dano mukene me nongo yat agwera. Macalo but yub me cako tic, lutic mapigi tego bibedo ikin jo ma okwongo nongo yat agwera.
teo_prompt: Katupitos adeka naka ekorona na elosi akonye, abu apugan isingarenit igurupun ice kanu aikis ekato. Kwape ediope kotoma aitemonokineta nuka aitwasam ekato, eswamak lu epol ajokis kes ebeit araun lusodit adumun ekato.
lgg_prompt: E'yo azo 'dezaniri ma e'yosi, gamete 'ba asi ongulumu azi yi osozu aro azo atrizu ri ma dria. Otita 'bani e'dozu aro 'da ayuzu ri ma azi ru, azi'ba orodriru 'diyi nga ovu 'ba oko aro 'da esupi 'diyi ma eselea.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'oburwaire oburiho obwahati, gavumenti eteireho guruupu ezimwe z'okugyema. Nk'emwe aha nteekateeka y'okubanza, abakozi abakuru nibaija kuba bamwe ahababandize kutunga omubazi gw'okugyema.

eng_prompt: Arriving at the health center before the crowds ensures a smoother experience. Plus, the early morning hours often have shorter wait times for vaccinations.
lug_prompt: Okutuuka ku ddwaliro ng'abantu tebannatuuka kikuyamba okufuna obujjanjabi obulungi. Okwongerako, obudde bw'oku makya butera okuba obumpi okulinda okugema.
ach_prompt: Oo I ot yat mapud dano dwong pe weko tic bedo yot. Medo i kom meno, cawa me odiko con pol kare bedo ki kare manok me kuro yat agwera.
teo_prompt: Adolonokin adekis eringa itunga luipu eyangauni amukian najokan. Iyatakinitai bobo, etapit duc itunga luetupuruc aidar aikis ekato.
lgg_prompt: Ecazu arojoa de nga po'di o'bi eyi ecani ku ri ni fe e'yo eyi ma aza kozu kililiru. Azi dika, sa'wa drioru o'bitisi 'diyi ma sawa 'bani te aro soza esuzu 'diyi ma alia were.
nyn_prompt: Okuhika aha irwariro, abantu batakahikire, nikibaasisa amagara g'abantu kurungi. Okwongyera ahari ekyo, eshaaha z'akasheeshe nizikira kugira obwire bukye bw'okurinda okugyemetsibwa.

eng_prompt: After careful consideration of the clinical trial results, health officials have determined that the potential risks outweigh the benefits for younger populations. As a result, the vaccine will not be given to children.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okwekenneenya n'obwegendereza ebyava mu kugezesa, abakungu b'ebyobulamu bakizudde nti obuzibu obuyinza okubaawo businga emigaso eri abantu abato. N'ekyavaamu, abaana tebajja kugemebwa.
ach_prompt: Ingee ngiyo ki diro adwoki me pimme, lutic me yot kom gumoko ni peko matwero bedo tye loyo ber pa dano matino. Macalo adwogi ne, pe kibi gwero lutino.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka airereonor akiro nuka ainwakio, apotu eswamak luka angaleu kotemasi ebe atiokisio nuepedorete atakanun adepar ameda naka atumunak. Kanuka ngun, mam eponio aikis idwe ekato.
lgg_prompt: E'yo eti ondaza ma vutia, azi'ba arojo ni 'diyi esu kini e'yo onzi 'diyi aga orodri 'ba oderu 'diyi driri ra. E'yo 'disi, 'ba ngani aro azo atrizu ri fe anzi nyiri eyidri ku.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okushwijuma n'obwegyendesereza ebyarugire omu kugyezibwa, abakuru omu by'amagara bashangire ngu akabi akarikubaasa kubaho, nikakira emigasho y'abantu bato. N'ekyarugiremu, abaana tibarikuza kusirikwa.

eng_prompt: Recent intelligence reports have indicated a troubling pattern of coordinated attacks in the region. Authorities are increasingly concerned about the implications of these events for national security.
lug_prompt: Lipoota z'ekitongole ekikessi ezaakaggwa ziraga nti waliwo obulumbaganyi bungi mu kitundu. Ab'obuyinza beeyongera okweraliikirira ku ngeri ebintu bino gye biyinza okukosaamu eby'okwerinda by'eggwanga.
ach_prompt: Ripot ma okatti cokcok-ki nyutu ni lweny tye ka time I but lobo man. Lutela tye ki lworo madit tutwal I kom adwoki pa jami magi I kom gwoko kuc me lobo.
teo_prompt: Apotu iripotan luka aingic itodutu ebe ejai asurokinio naepol noi kotoma aiboisit kangin. Iyalongongosi apedorosio nuikamunitos epone loepedoriata akiro ngun aitolitol ayuwara naka akwap.
lgg_prompt: O'duko e'yo eti ondapi o'diru 'diyi ece e'yo asi otiza fepi e'yo amvuta ni 'diyi ma dria angu 'di ma alea. Okpo e'ipi eyi curu'do asi otiza be e'yo ewaru e'yo 'dile 'diyini eco 'ye angu agei tema kari niri ma dria ra 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Ripoota z'eby'okwerinda ez'obwahati nizooreka enkora y'obutabanguko omu kyanga. Ab'obushoborozi beeyongyeire kufayo aha bikwatireine n'ebyokwerinda by'eihanga.

eng_prompt: In recent months, tensions between the neighboring countries have escalated, leading to a surge in refugee movements across their borders. As a result, the two governments have adopted increasingly aggressive measures to control the situation.
lug_prompt: Mu myezi egiyise, obunkenke wakati w'amawanga agaliraanyeewo bweyongedde, ekiviiriddeko okutambula kw'abanoonyiboobubudamu okuyita ku nsalo zaago. N'ekivuddemu, gavumenti ebbiri zeeyongedde okukola ebikolwa eby'obukambwe okusobola okufuga embeera.
ach_prompt: I dwe ma okato cokcok-ki, telle I kin lobo matye jirani omede tutwal, ma oweko luring ayela tye ka wot I wang lobo mapat-pat. Macalo adwogi ne, gamente aryo egoni gutiyo ki yoo matek tutwal me gengo peko eni.
teo_prompt: Kolapio lu atuboros, eyatakinos ingungeta kiding akwapin nu idunyare, eyangaunit alosit naka ikerai kotoma oikoruon kec. Kanuka ngun, etojoka apuganisinei ngun aarei aitikitik ejautene ngol.
lgg_prompt: Mba agapi 'bo 'diyi ma alea, e'yo ewaru kari jo ejele ru 'diyi ma eselea ri ma omgbo tu ra, e'yo fe angu emunyale eyini acizu boda eyivile 'diyi ma alea ri ma omgbo ni tu ra. E'yo 'disi, gamete iri 'diyi e'do geri okporu 'diyi 'du e'yo nde ma aza kozu.
nyn_prompt: Omu myezi ehingwireho, obunkenke ahagati y'amahanga agatuherereire bweyongyeire, ekyarugiremu okweyongyera kw'empungi ezirikutamburira aha nsharo zaago. N'ekyarugiremu,gavumenti ibiri zitandikire kukoresa emiringo y'amaani okuzibira embeera.

eng_prompt: In an effort to protect public health and prevent the spread of infectious diseases, health officials have implemented a new vaccination program. As part of this initiative, the youth are allowed to get vaccines.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'okukuuma obulamu bw'abantu n'okutangira okusaasaana kw'endwadde ezisiigibwa, abakungu b'ebyobulamu bataddewo enteekateeka empya ey'okugema. Ng'omu ku kaweefube ono, abavubuka bakkirizibwa okugemebwa.
ach_prompt: I tute me gwoko yot kom pa lwak ki gengo nya pa two ma kobo oyot, lutic me yot kom gukati ki yub manyen me gwero dano. Macalo but yub man, ki yee ki bulu me nongo yat agwera.
teo_prompt: Kanu ayuarite angaleu naka itunga ka aitikitik awea naka adekasinei nu ikopas, etolomutu eswamak luka angaleu ainapeta nuitetiak nuka aikis ekato. Kwape ediopet koboro kalu, ecamakitai atumunak adumun ekato.
lgg_prompt: Okpo 'bazu o'bi eyi ma rua ala ma ta mbazu azini e'yo azo eyi erepi 'diyi ma ereta atrizu, azi'ba arojo ni 'diyi e'do otita aro soza ni o'diru ni 'bo. Otita 'di ma azi ru, 'ba fe 'ba ode eyini aro soza esuzu ra.
nyn_prompt: Omu kaweefube w'okurinda amagara g'abantu n'okuzibira okujanjaara kw'endwara ezirikuturira, abakuru omu by'amagara batandikireho enteekateeka nsya y'okusirika. Nk'emwe aha nteekateeka egi, eminyeeto neyikirizibwa kugyemwa.

eng_prompt: Due to a sudden surge in patient admissions and supply chain disruptions, healthcare facilities are facing unprecedented challenges. As a result, many hospitals have been struggling to maintain adequate stock levels.
lug_prompt: Olw'omuwendo gw'abalwadde ogweyongera mu bwangu mu malwaliro n'obutabanguko mu by'obujjanjabi, amalwaliro gasanga okusoomoozebwa okutabangawo. N'ekivuddemu, amalwaliro mangi gabadde galwana okukuuma omutindo gw'ebyamaguzi ogumala.
ach_prompt: Pi wel lutwoo matye kadonyo I ot yat madwong tutwal ki balo yub me miyo kony me yot kom, odi yadi tye ka nongo peko mapol tutwal. Macalo adwogi ne, odi yadi mapol gubedo ka tute matek me gwoko jami ma oromo.
teo_prompt: Kanuka aiyatakinio naka adekak keda aibiror naka ejanakine, etereikina adekisia keda atiokisio nuepolok noi. Kanuka ngun, etionikinit adekisia nuipu ajaut keda iboro luedolitos.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'bani 'ba azoru 'diyi 'duzu arojo eyi ma alea ri ma omgbo ni tuzu mbeleru risi azini e'yo 'bani 'ba azoru 'diyi ma tambazu ri ma omgbo esizu ra risi, angu arojo eyini 'diyi e'yo ewaru ndundu eyi esu. E'yo 'disi, arojo karakara eyi ebi dri ci afa eyi ma tambazu.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okweyongyera kw'omuhendo gw'abarwaire abarikutwarwa omu irwariro hamwe n'okuteganisibwa kw'eby'amagara, amarwariro gariyo nigatunga oburemeezi obutari bwa buriijo. N'ekyarugiremu, amarwariro maingi gatwire nigateganisibwa kuguma gaine eby'okurya ebirikumara.

eng_prompt: The room was filled with an air of uncertainty as the two friends tried to communicate their thoughts. Each word seemed to hang in the air, heavy with unspoken emotions and misunderstandings.
lug_prompt: Ekisenge kyajjula okubuusabuusa nga mikwano gyabwe ababiri bagezaako okuwuliziganya ebirowoozo byabwe. Buli kigambo kyalabika ng'ekiwanikiddwa mu bbanga, nga kijjudde enneewulira ezitategeerekeka n'obutategeeragana.
ach_prompt: Ot opong ki lworo I kare ma lurem aryo ne gitye ka lok I kom tamgi. Lok acel-acel nen calo obedo I yamo, ma opong ki tam ma pe kiloko ki niang marac.
teo_prompt: Apolor agola ngin keda amamut aijen naarai etamitos ipapero ngun iarei einer aomisiokec. Esubit bala ajai akiro kere kotoma okwam, epol noi aomisio nu mam elimunitai keda amamus acamanar.
lgg_prompt: Jo ale aliza 'da ma alea e'yo 'bani ega kokoru 'diyi ga tre agyipika iri 'diyi ni o'bizu e'yo yi ma eselea 'diyi oluzu. E'yo dria 'diyi e'da kile yi o'be oli alia, e'yo 'bani nze kokoru azini vata ako yi be.
