nyn_prompt: Ekishengye kikaijura okwerarikirira, abanywani babiri barikugyezaho kugamba ebiteekateeko byabo. Buri kigambo kikaba nikireebeka nk'ekirikwemerera omu mwanya, kirimu ebiteekateeko ebitaragambirwe hamwe n'obutetegyerezana.

eng_prompt: As the pressure mounted and the project began to unravel, he felt the weight of responsibility pressing down on him. In a desperate attempt to deflect the growing criticism, he realized that he needed to find someone to blame.
lug_prompt: Obunkenke bweyongera era pulojekiti n'etandika okusajjuka, yawulira obuzito bw'obuvunaanyizibwa obwali bumunyigiriza. Mu kaweefube w'okwewala okunenya, yakizuula nti yeetaaga okuzuula omuntu gw'ayinza okunenya.
ach_prompt: I kare ma lyeto omedde dok yub ne ocako poto, en owinyo peko me tic mapol tutwal I kome. I tute matek tutwal me gengo koko matye kamede, en oniang ni omyero en onong ngat ma omyero okok I kome.
teo_prompt: Neyatakinor aiyalongong keda epurojekt, abu ngesi kopup ebe epol noi aswamuke. Kotoma aitam naepol noi aitikitik aitoroneta, abu ngesi koany ebe ibusakinit ngesi adumun itunganan yenibusakinit ngesi aitoroniar.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru ni tuzu uru azini otita 'da ni e'doria e'doria, eri etumu e'yo ewaru e'yo erini 'ye 'diyi ma e'yosi. E'yo 'bani lezu e'yo 'bani 'ba eyi ma dria 'diyi atrizu, eri esu ra kini le i ma esu 'ba azi 'bani ecozu e'yo 'da 'yezu ra.
nyn_prompt: Oburemeezi ku bwayeyongyeire kandi purogyekiti ekatandika kuhwaho, akahurira oburemeezi bw'obujunaanizibwa obwamuremereire. Omu kugyezaho munonga kwetantara okwetomboita, akeetegyereza ngu akaba nayetenga omuntu w'okujunaana.

eng_prompt: In order to ensure the well-being of the population, it is crucial to address the ongoing shortages in medical supplies. Access to essential medications is vital for the effective functioning of health centers.
lug_prompt: Okusobola okukakasa obulungi bw'abantu, kikulu nnyo okukola ku bbula ly'ebikozesebwa mu bujjanjabi. Okufuna obujjanjabi obwetaagisa kya mugaso eri amalwaliro okukola obulungi.
ach_prompt: Me neno ni kwo pa lwak tye maber, pire tek tutwal me tyeko peko me nok pa jami tic me ot yat matye kawot anyim. Nongo yat ma mite pi kwo pa dano pire tek tutwal pi tic pa odi yadi.
teo_prompt: Kanu awanyun ebe ejokuka aijar naka itunga, ejokuna aitemokin aikidiokus na iboro lu amukian. Adumunun ikee lu itwasamao ejok erai ibore yenepol noi kanu eswamae loajokan loka adekisia.
lgg_prompt: O'bi eyi ma aa'ta muke ri nezu, eri orodriru e'yo afa arojo ni 'diyi ma ako ni 'diyi ma aza kozu. Aro orodriru 'diyi esuzu ri eri orodriru arojo eyi ma azi ngazu kililiru.
nyn_prompt: Okureeba ngu abantu batunga amagara marungi, n'eky'omugasho kumaraho eibura ry'eby'okukoresa omu marwariro. Okutunga emibazi y'omugasho n'eky'omugasho aha mirimo mirungi y'amarwariro.

eng_prompt: To ensure the well-being of patients, it is crucial for health centers to maintain adequate supplies of essential medications. Timely communication about inventory levels is vital for effective resource management.
lug_prompt: Okukakasa obulungi bw'abalwadde, kya mugaso nnyo amalwaliro okukuuma ebikozesebwa by'eddagala ebikulu ebimala. Okuwuliziganya mu budde ku mutindo gw'ebintu kya mugaso mu kuddukanya obulungi eby'obugagga.
ach_prompt: Me neno ni lutwo tye maber, pire tek tutwal pi odi yadi me bedo ki yat ma mite pi kwo gi. Nywako lok ikit ma jami tye kwede ikare ki kome pire tek tutwal pi tic maber ki jami.
teo_prompt: Kanu awanyun ebe ejarete adekak ejok, ejokuna noi adekisia ajaut keda ikee lu itwasamao. Aineranara kotoma apak naikamunit adoketait na iboro erai ibore yenepol noi kanu aidar iboro ejok.
lgg_prompt: Rua alata 'ba azoru 'diyiniri nezu, eri orodriru arojo eyini aro orodriru 'diyi ma tambazu angiri. E'yo nzeza sa'wa dria 'diyi ma dria ri eri orodriru afa ayuzaru 'diyi ma tambazu kililiru.
nyn_prompt: Okureeba ngu abarwaire nibatunga amagara marungi, ni kikuru amarwariro kuguma gaine emibazi y'omugasho erikumara. Okugamba ebirikukwata aha bintu omu bwire n'eky'omugasho omu kureeberera kurungi eby'obugaiga.

eng_prompt: In preparation for the upcoming summit, all government personnel received instructions to ensure their vehicles were ready for transport. As a result, the government drivers have been told to pack the cars at the ministry.
lug_prompt: Mu kwetegekera olukungaana olujja, abakozi ba gavumenti bonna baaweebwa ebiragiro okukakasa nti emmotoka zaabwe zeetegefu okutambuzibwa. N'ekyavaamu, abavuzi ba gavumenti bategeezeddwa okusimba emmotoka ku minisitule.
ach_prompt: Ikare me yubbe pi kacoke matye kabino, lutic pa gamente weng gunongo cik me neno ni mutokagi tye atera me wot. Macalo adwogi ne, kiwaco ki ludwo mutoka pa gamente me gwoko mutoka gi I gang tic pa gamente.
teo_prompt: Kotoma aitemonokin airiamunet naebunit, aponi icorakinai eswamak kere luka apugan awanyun ebe ekapakina amotokan kec alosit. Kanuka ngun, alimokin iderepan luka apugan aipikakin amotokan toma erionget.
lgg_prompt: Otuta dri fuza emupi ri ma alia, 'ba dria azi'ba gameteni 'diyi isu azita nezu ra kini yi vile mutukari 'diyi ngonde acizu. E'yo 'disi, 'ba ai dereva gamete ni 'diyi mutukari eyi 'bazu okalamvu gamete niri ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Omu kweteekateekyera orukungano orurikwija, abakozi ba gavumenti boona bakatunga ebiragiro by'okureeba ngu emotoka zaabo zitebeekanisize kutamburwa. N'ekyarugiremu, abavugi ba gavumenti bagambirwe okupakira emotoka aha minisiture.

eng_prompt: After countless debates and revisions, lawmakers finally reached a consensus on the proposed legislation. Advocates for change have rallied tirelessly, emphasizing the urgent need for reform.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okukubaganya ebirowoozo n'okuddamu okwetegereza enfunda n'enfunda, ababaka baatuuka ku nzikiriziganya ku kiteeso ky'etteeka. Abalwanirira enkyukakyuka bakungaanye awatali kuddirira, nga bakikkaatiriza obwetaavu obw'amangu obw'enkyukakyuka.
ach_prompt: Ingee laro lok ki ngiyo lok mapol, luwang lwak I ot moko cik i agiki ne guwinye I kom cik ma kimito kelo. Jo ma lwenyo pi aloka-loka gubedo kacoke labongo yweyo, kun giwaco ni aloka-loka omyero otimme oyot-oyot tutwal.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ipegeta luipu keda airereonor akiro, apotu imeeban luka airabet opuputu acamanara kanuikamunitos ekisil loitemokinitai. Apotu itunga lu ekotosi aijulanakineta kiswamata keda agogongu kanu aitogogong eipud loka aijulanakineta.
lgg_prompt: Agbatara karakara eyi ma vutia, 'ba legikoni 'diyi esu asizu ti ecita azita 'bani lele 'diyi ma dria ra. Ba a'di 'dipi e'yo ojata niri ma dria 'diyi tra eyi ma ti ande kokoru eyini ani e'yo ojata ni le mbeleru ri ecezu.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okuhanuura munonga n'okugaruka kushwijuma, abanyishengyero bakahendera bahika aha kwikirizana aha kiteiso ky'ebiragiro. Abarikurwanirira empindahinduka bakoresa amaani gaabo, barikworeka ekyetengo ky'amaani ky'empindahinduka.

eng_prompt: Before the team can deploy the vehicles for the upcoming project, they need to ensure everything is in top condition. Regular maintenance is crucial to avoid any issues during operations.
lug_prompt: Nga ttiimu tennatwala mmotoka ku pulojekiti ejja, beetaaga okukakasa nti buli kimu kiri mu mbeera nnungi. Okuddaabiriza buli kaseera kya mugaso okwewala obuzibu bwonna mu mirimu.
ach_prompt: Mapwod dul pa lutic pe gucwalo mutoka pi yub matye kabino ni, omyero gunen ni jami weng tye maber. Roco mutoka kare ki kare pire tek tutwal me gengo peko mo keken ikare me tic.
teo_prompt: Erongo etimu itolomu amotokan kanu epurojekt lo ebunit, ekot kes awanyun ebe ejaasi iboro kere toma adoketait najokan. Erai aitemonokin duc ibore yenepol noi kanu aitikitik atiokisio kotoma apak naka aswam.
lgg_prompt: De nga po'di amuti 'da awini mutukari eyi o'ba otita emupi 'diyi 'yezu ku, le eyi ma ne ra kini afa dria eyi wura muke si. Afa edeza sawa driasi ri eri orodriru e'yo azi 'diyi atrizu sa'wa 'bani azi ngazurisi.
nyn_prompt: Tiimu etakatandikire kutwara ebiiruka omu purogyekiti erikwija, bashemereire kubanza bareeba ngu buri kimwe kiri omu mbeera nungi. Okugarura busya emirimo n'eky'omugasho munonga okwetantara oburemeezi bwona omu bwire bw'okukora.

eng_prompt: Excitement filled the air as fans gathered in cafes and living rooms alike. The atmosphere was electric, with everyone eager to share their predictions and opinions.
lug_prompt: Obunkenke bwajjula empewo ng'abawagizi bakungaanidde mu kafeero ne mu ddiiro. Embeera yabadde ya masannyalaze, nga buli omu ayagala nnyo okugabana okuteebereza kwe n'ebirowoozo bye.
ach_prompt: Cwiny dano obedo yom totwal I kare ma lucwak gucokke I kacato kongo ki I ot butu pa dano. Kwo obedo ma yom-cwiny tutwal, dano weng obedo ki miti me nywako tamgi ki byek gi.
teo_prompt: Apotu aiyalama kilelebunos kokwam ne atukonokinata egangitok kocafe keda aiboisio nuiboiere. Apol noi ejautene, itunga kere ekotosi aimor aomisiokec keda aomisiokec.
lgg_prompt: Ayiko fu oli ma alia 'ba atita fe'baa 'diyi ni okuzu pari ewa mvuzu 'diyi ma alia azini jo ale aliza 'diyi ma alia. Angu nderi ndra aci ru, 'ba dria ava be e'yo eyini ega 'diyi awazu azini egata eyini 'diyi pie.
nyn_prompt: Abantu bakashemererwa munonga ahabwokuba abahagizi baketeeranira omu kafeeri hamwe n'omu bishengye by'okuraaramu. Embeera ekaba erimu amashanyarazi, buri omwe aine ekihika ky'okugamba ebiteekateeko bye n'ebiteekateeko bye.

eng_prompt: A sudden collision occurred at the intersection during rush hour. Emergency services rushed to the scene to assess the situation.
lug_prompt: Akabenje ak'amangu kaaguddewo ku nkulungo mu ssaawa z'omujjuzo. Abakola ku by'amangu baddukidde mu kifo okwetegereza embeera.
ach_prompt: Peko me poto pa motoka otime atura I kare ma dano dwong tutwal. Lutic me ot yat ma gitye ka miyo kony oyot oyot gucito I kabedo ne me niang ngo matye katimme.
teo_prompt: Abu akangas naka emotoka kiswamau kotoma apak naepol noi naka itunga. Apotu lu engeso koloto aiboisit aanyun ejautene.
lgg_prompt: E'yo drileonzi ni 'ye i sa'wa 'ba eyini acizu omgbo angirisi ri ma alea. Ba azakoma mbeleru 'diyi ari pari 'da ma alea e'yo 'da ma ale andrizu.
nyn_prompt: Hakabaho okutomerana kw'ahonaaho aha nsharo omu bwire bw'obwiire bw'abantu baingi. Abakozi b'eby'amagara g'ahaiguru bakahunga aha mwanya okureeba ekyabaireho.

eng_prompt: As we were preparing for the delivery, we received an update from the driver about the traffic situation ahead. Unfortunately, he informed us that the truck was delayed because of a road accident.
lug_prompt: Bwe twali twetegekera okuzaala, twafuna obubaka okuva ew'omuvuzi w'emmotoka ku mbeera y'ebidduka mu maaso. Ebyembi yatugambye nti loole yalwawo olw'akabenje akaaguddewo ku luguudo.
ach_prompt: Ikare ma watye ka yubbe me cwalo mutoka, wanongo ngec manyen kibot ladwoo mutoka i kom kit ma gudu tye kwede anyim. Ki gum marac, en owaco itwa ni lori ne ogalle pi peko me gudi.
teo_prompt: Neautar sio aitemonokin kanu aidoun, apotu sio adumutu akiro nuitetiak kama ejai ederepa loikamunit ejautene loka amotokan. Nukaiturur, abu ngesi kolimok sio ebe abu elore iyap kanu akangas naka erot.
lgg_prompt: Amani ama oturia otuta 'yeria, ama esu o'duko engazu dereva vu e'yo nzila driari ma dria. Drile onziru, lu ama dri kini lorri 'da ma sa'wa eza drileonzi nzila dria ni ma e'yosi.
nyn_prompt: Obu twabaire nitwetebeekanisiza okuzaara, tukatunga amakuru kuruga owa dereva, agarikukwata aha mbeera y'ebiiruka omu maisho. Eky'omugisha mubi, akatugambira ngu roore ekakyerererwa ahabwa butandu y'ahanguuto.

eng_prompt: After a long day at work, he decided to treat himself to a homemade meal. He gathered all the ingredients and started preparing his favorite recipe.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'olunaku oluwanvu ku mulimu, yasalawo okwefunira eky'okulya eky'awaka. Yakungaanya ebirungo byonna n'atandika okufumba emmere gy'ayagala ennyo.
ach_prompt: Inge tic pi nino malac, en omoko tamme me camo cam ma kiyubu ki gang. En ocoko jami weng ma mite me tedo dok ocako yubu jami ma en maro.

lgg_prompt: O'du ezu erini aa'zu azi tia 'bori ma vutia, eri 'du e'yo i ma ngulupi fezu nyaka 'bani ede akua ri nyazu. Eri tra afa dria 'diyi tualu azini e'do geri erini lele tu 'diyi a'di.

eng_prompt: After a long day of waiting, the villagers gathered at the edge of the road, eagerly anticipating the delivery. The aroma of ripe matooke filled the air as they spotted the familiar vehicle in the distance.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'olunaku oluwanvu nga balinda, abantu b'oku kyalo baakuÅ‹Å‹aanira ku mabbali g'ekkubo nga beesunga okuzaala. Akawoowo ka matooke akakuze kajjula empewo bwe baalaba emmotoka gye baali bamanyi mu bbanga.

teo_prompt: Akaulo naka aidar apaaran naepol, apotu itunga luka ecalo kitukokinos orotin, ekotosi aitodolikin. Abu akinyet naka ematooke kileleba kokwam nawanyunia kesi emotoka loejenara kokinga.

ach_prompt: Lyeto tye ka dwogo piny oyot, omyero wayubbe pi koyo ma tye anyim. Me bedo ma komwa lyet, omyero wakur lori oo ki yen.

eng_prompt: Human emotions and behaviors are influenced by a variety of factors, including personal experiences and cultural backgrounds. As a result, individuals often interpret and respond to situations uniquely.
lug_prompt: Enneewulira z'abantu n'enneeyisa bikwatibwako ensonga ez'enjawulo, omuli byebayitamu n'ebyobuwangwa. N'ekivuddemu, abantu batera okutaputa n'okweyisa mu mbeera mu ngeri ey'enjawulo.
ach_prompt: Kit ma dano winyo kwede ki timgi tye malube ki jami mapol, ma I kingi obedo jami ma otimme I kwogi ki tekwaro gi. Macalo adwogi ne, dano ipol kare gonyo ki gamo lok mapat-pat I yoo mapat-pat.
teo_prompt: Aomisio keda iponesio luka itunga itodunitos iboro luegelegela, aimoriarit akiro nuiswamasi keda nuka inonosio. Kanuka ngun, etapit itunga amisiikin ka aswam iboro luegelegela.

eng_prompt: As we prepare for our upcoming trip, it's important to consider everyone's dietary preferences and requirements. Planning ahead will help us avoid any last-minute surprises.

teo_prompt: Kwape iuta sio aitemonokin kanu alositekosi, ejok aomoom nu ekotosi itunga kere keda inyamat lu ekotosi kesi. Aitemonokin sek ingarakini oni aitikitik aumonokineta nuka idakikan luatuboros.

eng_prompt: With rising inflation and supply chain issues, many families are feeling the pinch at the grocery store. It's becoming increasingly difficult to stick to a budget when shopping for essentials.

eng_prompt: In any competitive environment, fostering a positive atmosphere is crucial for success. This includes ensuring that athletes feel valued and encouraged throughout their journey.
lug_prompt: Mu mbeera yonna ey'okuvuganya, okukuuma embeera ennungi kya mugaso nnyo eri obuwanguzi. Kino kizingiramu okukakasa nti bannabyamizannyo bawulira nga ba muwendo era nga bakubirizibwa mu lugendo lwabwe lwonna.

eng_prompt: It is crucial to acknowledge the profound impact of trauma on individuals who have endured such horrific experiences. Providing comprehensive care and resources is essential for their healing and reintegration into society.

eng_prompt: In conflict zones, many journalists find themselves in precarious situations where their safety is at risk. This environment can lead to exploitation, as some individuals may seek to manipulate their circumstances for nefarious purposes.
lug_prompt: Mu bitundu ebirimu entalo, bannamawulire bangi beesanga mu mbeera embi nga obulamu bwabwe buli mu matigga. Embeera eno eyinza okuviirako okutulugunyizibwa, nga abantu abamu bagezaako okukozesa embeera zaabwe ku bigendererwa ebitali birungi.

eng_prompt: Despite facing numerous setbacks and challenges, the team remains optimistic about their abilities. They insist that their past mistakes do not define their potential for success.
lug_prompt: Wadde nga boolekaganye n'ebizibu bingi, ttiimu esigala n'essuubi ku busobozi bwayo. Bakkaatiriza nti ensobi zaabwe ezaayita tezisalawo busobozi bwabwe ku buwanguzi.

eng_prompt: Recent reports have raised concerns among community members about the safety of children. Authorities are urging parents to remain vigilant as they investigate troubling trends in local crime statistics.
lug_prompt: Lipoota ezifulumizibwa gye buvuddeko zireeseewo okweraliikirira mu bantu b'ekitundu ku bikwata ku bukuumi bw'abaana. Ab'obuyinza bakubiriza abazadde okubeera obulindaala nga bwe banoonyereza ku bikolwa ebyeraliikiriza mu bibalo by'obuzzi bw'emisango mu kitundu.
ach_prompt: Adwogi tic ma otime cokcok-ki okelo lworo ikin lwak I kom ber bedo pa lutino. Lutela tye ka lego lunyodo me bedo ma wanggi twolo ka gitye ka kwedo lok me timo bal matye katimme I kabedo gi.
teo_prompt: Apotu iripotan lu atuboros itolomutu aiyalongong kanejaas itunga lu atutubet kanu ayuara na idwe. Isinyikokitos apedorosio auriak asalakin acoikina kapak kana aingic ationis naka abilibilio naka ikisila kotoma atutubet.
lgg_prompt: O'duko efupi o'diru 'diyi eji asi otiza ongulumu eyi ma eselea e'yo anzi nyiri eyini aa'zu muke ri ma dria. Okpo e'ipi eyi ai tipika eyi aa'zu mile be eyini e'yo onzi eyi 'yepi angu eyi ma alea 'diyi ma eti ondazu.
nyn_prompt: Ripoota eziherize kukorwa zireesire okwerarikirira omu bantu b'omukyanga aha bikwatiraine n'okwerinda kw'abaana. Ab'obushoborozi nibashaba abazaire kuguma beteekateekire baaba nibacondooza aha bikwatiraine n'obukozi bw'ebibi omu byaro.

eng_prompt: Safety is a significant concern for young women, especially in urban areas. It's important to consider the potential risks associated with being out alone after dark.
lug_prompt: Obukuumi nsonga nkulu nnyo eri abakyala abato naddala mu bibuga. Kikulu okulowooza ku kabi akali mu kubeera wekka wabweru ekiro.
ach_prompt: Gwoko ber bedo obedo gin ma pire tek tutwal I kin mon matino tutwalle I boma madongo. Pire tek tutwal me tamo I kom peko matwero bino macalo adwogi me bedo keni I dyewor.
teo_prompt: Ayuwara erai ibore yenepol noi lo epodokinit angor nudidika, kacut kaiboisio nu otaun. Erai ibore yenepol noi aomoom atiokisio nuepedorete ajaut kinga bon akaulo naka akwap.
lgg_prompt: Ageitema eri e'yo azi okporu oku oderu 'diyini tuni angu tawuni ru 'diyi ma alia. Eri orodriru e'yo egazu e'yo onzi ecopi i ecipi ovuzu amve a'dule ini ma vutia 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Eby'okwerinda n'eky'omugasho munonga aha bakazi bato, namunonga omu myanya y'endembo. N'eky'omugasho kumanya akabi akarikubaasa kubaho waaba ori aheeru wenka bwanyima y'ekiro.

eng_prompt: In many rural areas of Uganda, socioeconomic challenges disproportionately affect young girls. As a result, they face numerous risks that compromise their safety and well-being.
lug_prompt: Mu byalo bingi mu Uganda, okusoomoozebwa mu by'enfuna n'embeera z'abantu kukosa nnyo abawala abato. N'ekivuddemu, boolekaganye n'obulabe bungi obuteeka obulamu bwabwe mu matigga.
ach_prompt: I caro mapol me lobo Uganda, peko me can lim ki kwo pa dano tye ka yelo lutino anyira. Macalo adwogi ne, ginongo peko mapol ma balo ber bedo gi.
teo_prompt: Kocaaloi luipu ko Uganda, ainingosia nuka ikapun keda aijar emunarit apesur nudidika noi. Kanuka ngun, etereikina kesi keda atiokisio nuipu nu emunarete ayuwara kec keda aijar kec.
lgg_prompt: Kari Uganda niri ma angu caluru karakara eyi ma alea, e'yo ewaru e'yo robia ni 'diyi pie 'diyi ezoanzi nyiri eyi 'ye onzi. E'yo 'disi, eyi e'yo ewaru karakara eyi esu eyini ani aa'zu muke ku 'diyi esuzu.
nyn_prompt: Omu myanya mingi y'ebyaro omu Uganda, oburemeezi omu by'entaasya n'embeera z'abantu, nibuteganisa abaishiki bato munonga. N'ekyarugiremu, nibatunga oburemeezi bwingi oburikuteganisa eby'okwerinda kwabo n'amagara gaabo.

eng_prompt: In today's world, where challenges to safety and well-being are ever-present, it is crucial to prioritize the welfare of vulnerable populations. Among these, girls often face unique risks that require our immediate attention and action.
lug_prompt: Mu nsi ya leero, okusoomoozebwa kw'obukuumi n'obulamu obulungi gye kuli buli kaseera, kikulu nnyo okukulembeza obulungi bw'abantu abateesobola. Mu bino, abawala batera okwolekagana n'obulabe obw'enjawulo obwetaaga okufaayo kwaffe okw'amangu n'okukola.
ach_prompt: I lobo ma ite kare ni, ka ma peko me gwoko kuc ki ber bedo tye I kare weng, pire tek tutwal me keto pi ber bedo pa dano ma goro bedo gin ma pire tek. I kin magi, lutino anyira ipol kare ginongo peko ma mite ni myero waket cwinywa iye oyot.
teo_prompt: Kotoma akwap na ilolo, ne ejaas atiokisio nuka ayuwara keda aijar najokan, ejokuna noi aisingarenit aijar naka itunga lu ican. Kotoma akiro nu, etapit apesur ajaut keda atiokisio nu ekotos apodokinit keda aswam katipet.
lgg_prompt: Wudrikuru andruri ma alia, e'yo ewaru ageitema ni azini aa'ta muke ri be 'diyi ci, eri orodriru 'ba e'yo ewaru ma alea 'diyi ma ta mbazu oko. E'yo 'diyi ma eselea, ezoanzi eyi tutuni e'yo ewaru ndundu eyini esu eyini ani ama ma asi fezu eyidri mbeleru azini e'yo 'yezu eyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Omu nsi y'erizooba, ahu oburemeezi bw'eby'okwerinda n'amagara marungi burikuba buriijo, nikikuru kwebembeza amagara g'abantu abatarikwebaasa. Omuri ebi, abaishiki buriijo nibatunga akabi k'omutaano akarikwetenga okufayo kwaitu n'okukorwaho.

eng_prompt: The bond between a father and daughter plays a crucial role in shaping a young woman's self-esteem and worldview. Active involvement from fathers can provide essential support and guidance during formative years.
lug_prompt: Enkolagana wakati wa taata ne muwala we ekola kinene nnyo mu kubumba ekitiibwa ky'omukazi omuto n'engeri gy'atunuuliramu ensi. Okwenyigiramu kwa bataata kusobola okuwa obuyambi n'obulagirizi obwetaagisa mu myaka gy'okukula.
ach_prompt: Ribbe matye ikin wego ki nyako konyo tutwal I yubu woro ki neno me lobo pa mon matino. Bedo tye pa wege twero miyo kony ki tira mapigi tego ikare me dongo pa lutino.
teo_prompt: Eidicane loejai kiding papa keda akooke iswamai ibore yenepol noi kotoma aitodolikin angor nuikamunitos awate kec keda aomisio nuikamunitos akwap. Aswam naepol noi kama ejaasi luapapa epedori aijaikin agangat keda aicoreta kotoma apakio nu idwe.
lgg_prompt: Aa'ta ata eyi ma eselea zamva eyi pie ri eri orodriru tu oku oderu eyi ma e'yo egazu eyi ma ngulupi si azini eyi ma egata wudrikuru ma dria ri ma omgbo otuzu. E'yo ata eyini aa'zu alenia okporu ri eco atita azini imbata okporu fe eli anzi eyini zozu 'diyi ma alea ra.
nyn_prompt: Enkoragana ahagati ya taata n'omuhara, neekora omurimo gw'amaani omu kutendeka omukazi muto okweha ekitiinisa n'okureeba ensi. Okwejumba kw'abashaija kurungi, nikibaasa kuheereza obuhwezi n'obwegyendesereza omu myaka y'obwegyese.

eng_prompt: Education plays a crucial role in a child's development and future success. It is essential to provide them with the necessary resources and encouragement during their academic journey.
lug_prompt: Ebyenjigiriza bikola kinene nnyo mu nkulaakulana y'omwana n'obuwanguzi bwe mu biseera eby'omu maaso. Kya mugaso okubawa ebyetaago n'okuzzibwamu amaanyi mu lugendo lwabwe olw'okusoma.
ach_prompt: Kwan pire tek tutwal I dongo pa latin ki cobo miti ne I kare me anyim. Pire tek tutwal me minigi kony ki cuku cwiny ikare me kwan gi.
teo_prompt: Erai asioman ibore yenepol noi kotoma apol naka ikoku keda akerianut koingaren. Erai ibore yenepol noi aijaikin kes iboro ka aisinyikokit kapak naka asioman kec.
lgg_prompt: Onita eri orodriru tu mva ma zota ma alia azini drile suza ewu drusiri ma alia. Eri orodriru afa lele 'diyi fezu eyidri tualu ava feza be sa'wa eyini muzu sukulu'a risi.
nyn_prompt: Obwegyese n'obw'omugasho munonga omu kukura kw'omwana n'obusinguzi bwe omu biro by'omumaisho. N'eky'omugasho kubaheereza ebirikwetengwa n'okubagaruramu amaani omu rugyendo rwabo rw'eby'obwegyese.

eng_prompt: The hard work and dedication of these young women have finally paid off. Their achievements are a testament to their perseverance and commitment to education.
lug_prompt: Okukola ennyo n'okwewaayo kw'abakyala bano abato kisasudde. Ebintu bye batuuseeko bukakafu obulaga obugumiikiriza bwabwe n'obumalirivu bwabwe mu by'enjigiriza.
ach_prompt: Tic matek pa mon matino magi dong okelo adwogi maber. Gin ma gutimo obedo lanyut me diyo cwinygi ki keto cwinygi I kom kwan.
teo_prompt: Aswam na aswam kagogong keda ainakina naka angor nu edisiak kes adaun aitac. Aitodolikineta kec kes aitogogongoret naka atitingikit kec keda ainakina kec toma asioman.
lgg_prompt: Azi okporu oku oderu 'diyi ni azini ava feza yini 'diyi asizu yi ofe ra. E'yo eyini 'ye 'diyi eceta e'yo eyini asi driasi azini asi feza eyini onita ma dria ri niri'I.
nyn_prompt: Omurimo gw'amaani hamwe n'okwehayo kw'abakazi aba, byahwaire bishashwire. Obusinguzi bwabo n'obuhame bw'okugumisiriza kwabo n'okwehayo kwabo omu kwega.

eng_prompt: After years of hard work and dedication, she finally reached her academic goals. Her family couldn't be prouder of her achievements.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'emyaka mingi ng'akola n'obunyiikivu, yatuuka ku biruubirirwa bye eby'okusoma. Ab'omu maka ge baali tebasobola kwenyumiriza mu bye yali atuuseeko.
ach_prompt: I ngee mwaki mapol me tic matek ki keto cwiny I kome, en dong ocobo miti ne me kwan. Lugang mege pe gitwero bedo ki awaka I kom jami ma en otimo.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ikar luipu luka aswam kagogong keda ainakina, abu ngesi kodolok alosikineteke nuka asioman. Mam ekaleke epedori aiyalama kanu aitodolikineta ke.
lgg_prompt: Eli 'bani azi ngazu avasi azini asi feza be 'bori ma vutia, eri ca asizu e'yo erini le onita ma alia 'diyi ma alia ra. Familia eriniri econi ovu afusi e'yo erini 'yele 'diyi si ku.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'emyaka mingi y'okukora n'amaani n'okwehayo, akahikiiriza ebigyendererwa bye by'okushoma. Eka ye ekaba etarikubaasa kwetunguura ahabw'ebi yaakozire.

eng_prompt: In today's digital age, the impact of technology on young minds is a growing concern. Many experts argue that early exposure to smartphones can hinder a child's development and social skills.
lug_prompt: Mu mulembe gwa digito ogw'ennaku zino, engeri tekinologiya gy'akwatamu ebirowoozo by'abavubuka yeeyongera okweraliikiriza. Abakugu bangi bagamba nti okukozesa amasimu g'omu ngalo ng'omwana akyali muto kisobola okulemesa omwana okukula n'okukolagana obulungi n'abalala.
ach_prompt: I kare man me tic ki intanet, adwoki pa tet manyen I kom tam pa bulu tye ka kelo lworo madit tutwal. Ludiro mapol giwaco ni tic ki cim cing con twero gengo dongo pa latin ki diro me bedo ki dano.
teo_prompt: Kotoma apakio nu nuka elago, epol noi ationis naka etatai loakwana mama ejaasi atumunak. Ebakasi ipirioitin luipu ebe aitwasam isimun luka esimu sek epedori aitikitik apol naka idwe keda epone loka aiswamanar keda luce.
lgg_prompt: E'yo tekenologia ni curu'do ri ma alea, geri tekenologia ni 'ba ode eyi ma omi eyi 'yezu ri eri asi otiza angiri ni i. Ba e'yo nipi saaru 'diyi 'yo kini simu omvele smartphone ru 'diyi ma ayuza drioru ri eco anzi nyiri eyi ma zota azini ondua aa'zu 'ba eyi pie ri atri ra.
nyn_prompt: Omu bwire bwa digito obwa hati, enkora ya tekinorogye aha mitwe y'eminyeeto eyeyongyeire kureetaho okwerarikirira. Abakugu abaingi nibagira ngu okukoresa esimu z'omungaro bakiri bato, nikibaasa kuremesa abaana okukura n'okukoragana n'abandi.

eng_prompt: We've been reviewing the financial transactions, and it appears that some issues have arisen. As a result, there is a hindrance with the payments.
lug_prompt: Tubadde twekenneenya enzirukanya y'ebyensimbi era kirabika ensonga ezimu zivuddeyo. N'ekivuddemu, waliwo obuzibu mu kusasula.
ach_prompt: Wabedo ka ngiyo kit ma tic me lim tye kawot kwede dok nen calo peko mogo tye. Macalo adwogi ne, gengo cul tye.
teo_prompt: Iuta sio airereor akiro nuka ikapun, ido esubit bala ejaas akiro ace. Kanuka ngun, ejai ainingosit naka aitac ikapun.
lgg_prompt: Ama ebi e'yo robia ni 'diyi ma ale andri dika eri ena kile e'yo azi efu 'bo. E'yo 'disi, e'yo 'bani robia ofezu ri atri ci.
nyn_prompt: Tutwire nitushwijuma enkoragana y'esente, kandi nikireebeka ngu hariho enshonga ezabaireho. N'ekyarugiremu, hariho oburemeezi omu kushashura.

eng_prompt: Establishing a strong work ethic is essential for success in any field. One key aspect of this is the ability to manage time effectively.
lug_prompt: Okuteekawo empisa z'emirimu ez'amaanyi kyetaagisa okusobola okutuuka ku buwanguzi mu mulimu gwonna. Ekimu ku bintu ebikulu mu kino kwe kuba n'obusobozi bw'okukozesa obulungi obudde.
ach_prompt: Bedo ki kit me tic maber pire tek tutwal pi nongo loc I tic mo keken. Gin acel ma pire tek tutwal I lok man obedo kero me tic ki cawa maber.
teo_prompt: Aitolomun iponesio luajokak luka aswam ejok kanu akerianut kotoma aswam kere. Adiopet koboro lu epol ajokis kanu erai apedorit aitosom apak ejok.
lgg_prompt: Adriza azi ngazu okporu ri ma e'dota eri orodriru drile suza ni pari ciria. E'yo azi okporu 'di ma azi eri e'yo mini ecozu sa'wa ayuzu kililiru ri i.
nyn_prompt: Okutandikaho emicwe mirungi aha mirimo n'eky'omugasho aha businguzi omu mirimo yoona. Enshonga enkuru omuri eki n'okubaasa kukoresa kurungi obwire.

eng_prompt: To ensure the project stays on track, it's crucial to monitor our progress regularly. Implementing a system for tracking milestones would help us stay accountable.
lug_prompt: Okukakasa nti pulojekiti esigala ku mulamwa, kya mugaso okulondoola enkulaakulana yaffe buli kaseera. Okuteekawo enkola y'okulondoola ebituukiddwako kyandituyambye okusigala nga tuvunaanyizibwa.
ach_prompt: Me neno ni tic tye kawot maber, pire tek tutwal me neno kit ma tic tye kawot kwede kare ki kare. Keto yub me ngiyo kit ma jami tye kawot kwede bikonyo wa me bedo ki kor tic.
teo_prompt: Kanu awanyun ebe ejai epurojekt toma orot, ejokuna noi aanyanar elosiokosi duc. Aitolomun ainapeta nu aanyanar iboro lu iswamatai ingarakini oni aitodun eipone lo itwasamatere iboro.
lgg_prompt: Otita 'da ni aa'zu kililiru, eri orodriru ama ma muzu drile ri onezu sa'wa driasi. Geri 'bani ecozu e'yo ndundu eyi 'yezu 'diyi ma pamvu 'bazu ri ni nga ama aza ko e'yo nde ma aza kozu.
nyn_prompt: Okureeba ngu purogyekiti eguma omu muhanda, n'eky'omugasho kureebuuza entunguuka yaitu buri kaire. Okutaho enkora y'okurondoora ebibaireho, nikiija kutuhwera kuguma twine embaririra.

eng_prompt: We have set a strict timeline for this project, and it's crucial that we adhere to it. Timely completion is essential for maintaining our client's trust and satisfaction.
lug_prompt: Tutaddewo ebisale by'obudde ebikakali ku pulojekiti eno era kikulu nnyo okubigoberera. Okumaliriza mu budde kikulu nnyo mu kukuuma obwesige n'obumativu bwa bakasitoma baffe.
ach_prompt: Waketo kare me tic matek tutwal pi yub man, dok pire tek tutwal ni omyero walubbe kwede. Tyeko tic ikare ki kome pire tek tutwal pi gwoko gen ki yom cwiny pa luwil.
teo_prompt: Ipikakinit sio apak naepol noi kanu epurojekt kalo, ido ejokuna noi aitup ngun. Angetakin aswam kotoma apak erai ibore yenepol noi kanu aidar amunokina keda aiyalama naka ikasitomas wok.
lgg_prompt: Ama o'ba sa'wa azi okporu ni otita 'di ni, dika eri orodriru amani aa'zu drinia. E'yo dezu sa'wa dria ri eri orodriru ama vile aje'ba 'diyi ma asi'baza azini ayiko esuzu.
nyn_prompt: Tuteireho obwire bukye bwa purogyekiti egi, kandi n'eky'omugasho ngu tubukuratire. Okumaririza emirimo omu bwire n'eky'omugasho ahabw'okurinda obwesigye n'okumarwa kwa bakasitoma baitu.

eng_prompt: After several hours of waiting at the gate, the airline announced that the flight would be delayed indefinitely. Frustration grew among the travelers as they remained seated on the plane with no clear information.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'essaawa eziwera nga balinda ku kikomera, ekitongole ky'enyonyi kyalangirira nti ennyonyi ejja kulwawo ekiseera ekitali kigere. Okwenyamira kweyongera mu batambuze nga bwe basigala nga batudde mu nnyonyi nga tebalina mawulire mategeerekeka.
ach_prompt: Ingee kuro pi cawa mapol I dog cel, dul dege ne owaco ni dege ne bigale pi kare malac. Cwer cwiny omede ikin luwot I kare ma gubedo I dege labongo ngec matut.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka aidar isawan luipu koget, abu ekampuni lo idegei kolimo ebe eponio aiyap idegei ngun. Apotu itunga lu alotok ongurianata noi naarai apotu kesi iboikinos odege komamei akiro nuecaete.
lgg_prompt: Sawa 'bani te angu ti opizaniri ma alia 'bori ma vutia, amuti ndege eyini ri azi kini ndege nde ni nga sa'wa eza sa'wa driasi. E'yo ewaru tu 'ba aci'ba 'diyi ma eselea yini awizu rizu ndege ma dria o'dukoti kililiru kokoru.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okurinda eshaaha nyingi aha geeti,ekitongore ky'enyonyi kikarangirira ngu enyonyi ekaba neija kukyerererwa. Okwerarikirira kweyongyeire omu bagyenyi, ahabw'okugira ngu bakaguma bashutami omu nyonyi bateine makuru garikwetegyerezibwa gye.

eng_prompt: Passengers at the airport were growing increasingly restless as they awaited updates. Reports indicated that severe weather conditions were affecting flights across the region.
lug_prompt: Abasaabaze ku kisaawe ky'ennyonyi beeyongera okweraliikirira nga bwe balindirira amawulire amapya. Lipoota zaalaga nti embeera y'obudde embi yakosa ennyonyi mu kitundu kyonna.
ach_prompt: Luwot ma onongo gitye I bar dege gubedo ki lworo madit tutwal I kare ma gitye kakuru ngec manyen. Lok angeya nyutu ni piny ma pe ber tye ka balo wot pa dege I but lobo enoni weng.
teo_prompt: Apotu itunga luejaasi oisawe loka idegei opotu kisinyikokisi aidar akiro nuitetiak. Apotu iripotan itodutu ebe mam ekuse ka etepe ejokuna noi kotoma aiboisit kangin.
lgg_prompt: Ba aci'ba ndege paria 'diyi e'bi eca ava kokoru eyini e'yo o'diru eyi te ria. O'duko ece kini e'yo angu mile ni onzi 'diyi e'bi e'yo ndege eyini acizu angu 'da ma alea 'diyi eza ra.
nyn_prompt: Abashaabazi aha kishayi ky'enyonyi bakaba beeyongyera kutahuuka, barinzire amakuru ag'omutaano. Ripoota nizooreka ngu embeera y'obwire embi ekaba neetamba enyonyi omu kicweka ekyo.

eng_prompt: Given the recent incidents and safety concerns surrounding the airline, it's important to approach the topic with sensitivity. Making light of the situation could undermine the seriousness of the issues at hand.
lug_prompt: Okusinziira ku bibaddewo gyebuvuddeko n'ebyokwerinda okwetoolodde ekitongole ky'enyonyi, kya mugaso okutuukirira ensonga eno n'obwegendereza. Okubuusa amaaso embeera kiyinza okukendeeza ku bukulu bw'ensonga eziriwo.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki jami ma otimme cokcok-ki ki lok me gwoko kuc ma orumu dege, pire tek tutwal me lok I kom lok man ki diro. Cayo peko matye twero dwoko piny rwom me peko matye.
teo_prompt: Katupitos akiro nuiswamasi pac keda nuikamunitos ayuwara naka idegei, ejokuna aitodolikin akirot ngin kopone loajokan. Aisiyengun ejautene ngol epedori aitidisiar ajokis naka akiro nu ejaas.
lgg_prompt: E'yo i 'yepi o'diru 'diyi ma e'yosi tualu e'yo ewaru ndege ma agei tema ma dria 'diyi pie, eri orodriru e'yo nde ma aza kozu geri kililiru si. E'yo 'di 'duzu ewakokoru ri eco e'yo ewaru 'diyi ma omgbo esi ra.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'ebyabaireho obwahati hamwe n'enshonga z'eby'okwerinda omu kampuni y'enyonyi, n'eky'omugasho okuhika aha nshonga egi n'obwegyendesereza. Okwehuzya embeera nikibaasa kukyendeeza obukuru bw'eshonga eziriho.

eng_prompt: In response to the ongoing pandemic, various organizations and individuals were identified to receive financial support. The government has allocated funds to assist those most affected by the crisis.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula ekirwadde bbunansi ekigenda mu maaso, ebitongole n'abantu ssekinnoomu eby'enjawulo byalondeddwa okufuna obuyambi bw'ensimbi. Gavumenti etaddewo ensimbi okuyamba abo abakoseddwa ennyo ekizibu.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me two korona matye kawot anyim, dul mapat-pat ki dano acel-acel gunongo kony me lim. Gamente omiyo cente me konyo jo ma peko eni okelo peko i komgi.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin adeka naka ekorona, aponi kojenunai iriongeta keda itunga luegelegela kanu adumun agangat na ikapun. Abu apugan ijaik ikapun kanu aingarakin ngul lu etereikina keda ationis na.
lgg_prompt: E'yo azo 'dezaniri ma aza kozu, 'ba isu amuti azini 'ba yi ma ngulupisi 'diyi atita robia niri esuzu. Gamete 'ba robia 'ba e'yo ewaru 'dipi 'diyi ma aza kozu.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'oburwaire oburiho obwahati,ebitongore bingi hamwe n'abantu bakye bakashangwa kutunga obuhwezi bw'esente. Gavumenti ehaireyo esente z'okuhwera abo abateganisiibwe munonga oburemeezi.

eng_prompt: In recent discussions about the motivations behind the recent violence, many have raised questions about the underlying ideologies driving these actions. Some argue that the perpetrators are influenced by extremist beliefs, while others suggest that political or social factors play a more significant role.
lug_prompt: Mu kukubaganya ebirowoozo okwakolebwa gyebuvuddeko ku bigendererwa by'obutabanguko obwaliwo gyebuvuddeko, bangi baleese ebibuuzo ku ndowooza eziviirako ebikolwa bino. Abamu bagamba nti abazzi b'emisango bakubirizibwa enzikiriza ez'enjawulo, ate abalala bagamba nti ensonga z'ebyobufuzi oba ez'embeera z'abantu zikola kinene.
ach_prompt: I nywako lok ma otime cokcok-ki I kom tyen lok ma oweko tim gero otime cokcok-ki, dano mapol gubedo ki lapeny I kom tam mapat-pat matye I kom tim eni. Jo mukene giwaco ni lutim bal ne gitye ki tam mapat-pat, ento jo mukene giwaco ni lok me cungu iwi-bye onyo kit me kwo pa dano obedo gin ma pire tek tutwal.
teo_prompt: Kotoma oineresinei lu atuboros nuikamunitos alosikineta nuka amumu, apotu itunga luipu itodutu aingiseta nuikamunitos aomisio nu itolosete aswamisio nu. Ebakasi ice ebe itunga luiswamaete ngun itodunitos iyuunikec, konye ice itodunit ebe iboro luka politikis keda luka itunga kes iswamaete ngun.
lgg_prompt: E'yo nzeza o'diru 'diyi ma alia e'yo asi omiza fepi e'yo ngiringiri ni 'diyi ma dria 'diyi ma dria, 'ba karakara eyi eji zita e'yo egata e'yo 'yepi 'diyi ma dria 'diyi ma dria. Ba azi 'diyi 'yo kini 'ba e'yo 'ye'ba 'diyi e'yo a'ita onzi 'yepi 'diyisi, te 'ba azi 'diyi 'yo kini e'yo politiki ni azini e'yo o'bi yini 'diyi azi okporu ni nga.
nyn_prompt: Omu kuhanuura okuhweireho aha bikwatiraine n'obutabanguko obwahwaireho, baingi bateireho ebibuuzo ebikwatiraine n'ebiteekateeko ebirikureetaho ebikorwa ebi. Abamwe nibagira ngu abakozi b'ebihagaro nibagyendera aha nyikiriza y'abaheekyera, kandi abandi nibagira ngu enshonga z'eby'obutegyeki n'obuhangwa nizikora omurimo gw'amaani.

eng_prompt: There has been growing public concern about the transparency of the Covid-19 fund distribution. To address these concerns, it is essential to provide visual documentation of the beneficiaries.
lug_prompt: Wabaddewo okweraliikirira mu bantu ku bwerufu mu kugaba ssente za ssenyiga omukambwe. Okukola ku nsonga zino, kyetaagisa okuwa ebiwandiiko ebiraga abaganyulwa.
ach_prompt: Lwak tye ki lworo madit tutwal I kom kit ma ki poko kwede cente me two korona I ada. Me tyeko peko magi, pire tek tutwal me coyo nying joo ma gunongo kony.
teo_prompt: Ejai aiyalongongo naepol noi kama ejaasi itunga kanu aitwasam ikapun luka adeka naka ekorona koipone kalo ecaete. Kanu aitemokin atiokisio nu, ejokuna noi aijaikin aiwadikaeta nuikamunitos lu emedaunak.
lgg_prompt: O'bi eyi ma asi otiza e'yo 'bani robia Covid-19 niri awazu geri kililiru si ri ma dria ri ma dria ri ma omgbo ni tu ra. E'yo 'diyi ma aza kozu, eri orodriru kokobi e'dapi 'ba orodri esupi 'diyi ma dria 'diyi fezu.
nyn_prompt: Abantu beeyongyeire okwerarikirira ahabw'oburingaaniza omu kugaba esente za korona. Okukora aha nshonga ezi, n'eky'omugasho okuheereza ebihandiiko ebirikworeka abarikugasirwa.

eng_prompt: Given the current situation and the challenges we are facing, it's important to remain calm and hopeful. Our community has been assured that assistance is on the way.
lug_prompt: Okusinziira ku mbeera eriwo kati n'okusoomoozebwa kwe twolekaganye nakwo, kikulu okusigala nga tuli bakkakkamu era nga tulina essuubi. Ekitundu kyaffe kikakasiddwa nti obuyambi buli mu kkubo.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki ngo matye katimme kombedi ki peko ma watye ka kato ki iye, pire tek me bedo mot ki gen. Ki niango lwak wa ni kony tye ka bino.
teo_prompt: Kowai kalo ejautene loakwana keda atiokisio nu itereikina oni, ejokuna asalakin inapara ido kojaasi keda amuno. Aponi itijenikinai itunga wok ebe ejai agangat toma orot.
lgg_prompt: E'yo curu'do 'diyi ma e'yo si tualu e'yo ewaru amani esu 'diyi pie, eri orodriru aa'zu e'yere azini asi'baza be. Ba fe asi omiza ongulumu amavileri dri kini azakoma e'do mu drile.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'embeera eriho hati hamwe n'oburemeezi obu turikushanga, n'eky'omugasho kuguma tuhunamiire kandi twine amatsiko. Abantu baitu bahamiibwe ngu obuhwezi buri omu muhanda.

eng_prompt: In response to the recent natural disaster that devastated our community, many residents have been struggling to find enough food and resources. After assessing the situation, local officials reached out to the national government for assistance.
lug_prompt: Olw'obutyabaga obw'obutonde obwaliwo gye buvuddeko obwasaanyaawo ekitundu kyaffe, abatuuze bangi babadde balwana okufuna emmere emala n'ebintu ebirala. Oluvannyuma lw'okwekenneenya embeera, abakungu b'ebyalo baatuukirira gavumenti y'eggwanga okufuna obuyambi.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me peko ma poto atura ma obalo kabedo wa cokcok-ki, lutedero mapol gubedo ka yele me nongo cam ki jami tic ma oromo. Ingee neno ngo matye katimme, lutic me tedero gulego gamente me lobo ni okonygi.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin atiokisio nu akwap nu apotu omunasi atutubetekosi, eutasi itunga luipu adumun inyamat lu edolitos. Akaulo naka airereor ejautene, apotu eswamak luka atutubet odolokisi apugan kanu aingarakinio.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru e'yo nyakuni 'diyi ni angu amavileri ezapi o'diru 'diyi ma e'yosi, 'ba karakara aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ebi dri ci nyaka esuzu azini afa ayuzaru 'diyi pie. E'yo ndrezu 'bori ma vutia, azi'ba angu 'da ma alea 'diyi emu gamete kari 'di ma alea ri vu azakoma esuzu.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'ebihikiirizi by'obuhangwa ebitahirire ekyanga kyaitu, abatuuragye baingi batwire nibarwana kutunga eby'okurya n'ebintu ebirikumara. Bwanyima y'okushwijuma embeera, abakungu b'ebyaro bakahika ahari gavumenti y'eihanga kutunga obuhwezi.

eng_prompt: Despite the ongoing challenges in the healthcare system, many public facilities have found ways to sustain their operations. This is largely due to efficient budgeting and resource management strategies implemented by the administration.
lug_prompt: Newankubadde waliwo okusoomoozebwa mu byobulamu, amalwaliro ga gavumenti mangi gafunye engeri z'okuyimirizaawo emirimu gyago. Kino kisinga kuva ku mbalirira ennungi n'enkola z'okuddukanya eby'obugagga eziteekebwa mu nkola abaddukanya emirimu.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni peko tye I tenge me yot kom, odi yadi mapol gunongo yoo me medde ki ticgi. Man pole tye macalo adwogi me yub me byek lim ki diro me tic ki lim ma ludito tic guketo itic.
teo_prompt: Karaida ejaas atiokisio nuka angaleu, adumutu adekisia nuipu iponesio luka aidar aswamukec. Erai na kanuka ebajet loajokan ka iwaitin lu itwasamaere iboro lu itwasamatere eyaitene.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru mupi drile arojo eyi ma alea 'diyi ma talasi, arojo karakara eyi esu geri eyini ecozu azi eyivile 'diyi ma ta mbazu ra. Diri tutuni e'yo otita ajeni kililiru azini geri e'yo lonyi ayuza ni 'diyi ma tambazu driceza ni 'diyi vurisi.
nyn_prompt: Oihireho oburemeezi oburikugyenda omu maisho omu by'amagara, amarwariro ga gavumenti gatungire oburyo bw'okugumizamu nigakora. Eki nikirugirira aha mbariirira nungi hamwe n'enkora nungi y'okureeberera eby'obugaiga eyateirwe omu nkora abebembezi.

eng_prompt: Despite the numerous policies aimed at improving punctuality, many employees in the public sector struggle to arrive on time. This trend has raised concerns about productivity and accountability within government agencies.
lug_prompt: Newankubadde waliwo enkola nnyingi ezigendereddwamu okutumbula obutuuze mu budde, abakozi bangi mu bitongole bya gavumenti balwana okutuuka mu budde. Enkola eno ereeseewo okweraliikirira ku bbugumu n'embalirira mu bitongole bya gavumenti.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed cik tye mapol ma ki keto pi medo rwom me oo ikare, lutic pa gamente mapol nongo peko me oo ikare. Man okelo lworo I kom tic ki kor tic I dul mapat-pat pa gamente.
teo_prompt: Karaida ejaas ainapeta nuipu nu ekotoi aitojokar ainapakina, eswamak luipu luka apugan etionikinit adolere kotoma apak. Eyangaunit ngin aiyalongongo kanuikamunitos eswamae loajokan keda aitodunit eipone lo itwasamatere ikapun kotoma oriongeta luka apugan.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'bani lezu 'ba eyi ma aa sa'wa dria ri ma omgbo otuzu ra ti, azi'ba karakara esele o'bi eyini 'diyi dri ci ecazu sa'wa dria. E'yo 'di eji asi otiza e'yo azi ngaza ni azini geri 'bani azi ngazu 'diyi ma dria amuti gameteni 'diyi ma eselea.
nyn_prompt: Oihireho ebiragiro bingi ebirikugyenderera okutunguura obwire, abakozi baingi omu bitongore bya gavumenti nibarwana kuhika omu bwire. Enkora egi ereesire okwerarikirira aha mirimo n'embaririra omu bitongore bya gavumenti.

eng_prompt: In order to meet the needs of their customers and ensure public health, pharmacies must be prepared for any potential shortages. This preparation includes maintaining an adequate inventory of essential medications.
lug_prompt: Okusobola okutuukiriza ebyetaago bya bakasitoma baabwe n'okukakasa obulamu bw'abantu, amaduuka g'eddagala galina okwetegekera ebbula. Okwetegeka kuno kuzingiramu okukuuma enkalala ezimala ez'eddagala ery'omugaso.
ach_prompt: Me cobo miti pa luwilgi ki neno ni dano tye ki yot kom, dukan me cato yadi omyero oyubbe pi peko mo keken ma twero bedo tye. Yub eni obedo gwoko jami weng ma mite pi nongo yat ma mite pi kwo pa dano.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitodolikin ipudesia luka agwelak kec ka awanyun angaleu naka itunga, ekot agwelanarak ikee akapakina kanu ikidioko. Aitemonokin na imoriarit aidar iboro lu itwasamao kanu ikee lu itwasamao.
lgg_prompt: Lezu e'yo aje'ba eyini le 'diyi ma aza kozu tualu alata o'bi eyini ri pie, le dukani aro ozipi 'diyi ma aa ngonde e'yo dria ecopi i 'yepi ra 'diyi ma dria. Otuta 'di ma alia, le 'ba ma 'ba aro orodriru 'diyi ma kalafe angiri.
nyn_prompt: Okuhikiiriza ebyetengo by'abaguzi baabo n'okurinda amagara g'abantu, amaduuka g'emibazi gashemereire kweteekateekyera eibura ry'emibazi erikubaasa kubaho. Entebekanisa egi neetwariramu okurinda obuheereza bw'emibazi y'omugasho.

eng_prompt: Due to a hazardous chemical spill, the entire stock of pharmaceuticals was deemed unsafe for use. As a result, the decision was made to eliminate the contaminated supplies.
lug_prompt: Olw'okuyiwa eddagala ery'obulabe, eddagala lyonna eryaliwo lyatwalibwa ng'eritali ddungi kukozesebwa. N'ekyavaamu, okusalawo kwakolebwa okumalawo ebintu ebyayonoonebwa.

teo_prompt: Kanuka akinyeta nuka ikee nuarokok, aponi kowanyunai ebe mam ikee kere ejokuka kanu aitwasam. Kanuka ngun, aponi itolomunai aseunet naka alemar iboro lu emunaritai.
lgg_prompt: Aro onzikanyaru 'diyi ma ereta ma e'yosi, 'ba 'du aro 'da eyi ma tambaza dria ayuzaru muke ku. E'yo 'disi, 'ba 'du e'yo afa ondiru 'diyi atrizu.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okujanjaara kw'emibazi, emibazi yoona ekaba etarikwetengwa kukoresibwa. N'ekyarugiremu,bakasharamu kwihaho ebintu ebyabaire biine oburofa.

eng_prompt: A devastating blaze broke out late last night, engulfing one of the university's most iconic structures. Emergency services rushed to the scene, but the flames spread rapidly, making it difficult to contain the fire.
lug_prompt: Omuliro ogw'amaanyi gwakutte ekiro ekikeesezza olwaleero ne gwokya ekimu ku bizimbe bya ssetendekero ebimanyiddwa ennyo. Ab'eby'amangu baddukidde mu kifo, naye omuliro gwasaasaana mangu, ekyaletera obuzibu okuziyiza omuliro.

teo_prompt: Abu akim naepol noi kogeu akware nabian, abu komudia ediope kotoma adukena nuapolok noi nuka eunibasite. Apotu lu engeso koloto aiboisit, konye abu akim isiarakin atipet, ido etiono aitikitik akim.
lgg_prompt: Aci okporu ni e'do ini ajerisi, eri eza jo azi alu university ni 'diyi ma azi. Ba azakoma lepi mbeleru 'diyi ari yi pari 'da ma alea, te aci nderi ere i mbeleru, erini fezu aci nde ma okpo atrizu ewaru.
nyn_prompt: Omuriro gukacwekyereza munonga ekiro kya nyomwebazyo, gukacwekyereza kimwe ahabyombeko bya Yunivasite ebirikumanywa munonga. Ab'eby'amagara g'ahaiguru bakahunga aha mwanya, kwonka omuriro gukajanjaara juba, ekyabaire kigumire kugurwanisa.

eng_prompt: To create a delicious dessert that everyone will love, it's important to understand the baking process. First, gather all the necessary ingredients and tools for the task at hand.
