teo_prompt: Kanu aiswamaun inyamat luitemonokinitai lueminasi itunga kere, ejokuna noi amisiikin epone loka ainom emugati. Kogeu ber aituk iboro kere ka iboro lu ekotoi kanu aswam.
lgg_prompt: Afa nyazaru nyazaru 'ba dria yini leleri edezu, eri orodriru e'yo mukati a'dizaniri vazu. Okorisi, tra afa dria lele 'diyi tualu afa ayuzaru 'diyi pie.
nyn_prompt: Okukora eky'okurya ky'omutaano eki buri omwe arikwenda, n'eky'omugasho kwetegyereza omuringo gw'okuteeka emigaati. Eky'okubanza, rundaana ebintu byona ebirikwetengwa kukora omurimo oguriho.

eng_prompt: Tensions had been building between the two teams for weeks, and when they finally met to discuss their project, tempers flared. As disagreements escalated, it became clear that collaboration was impossible.
lug_prompt: Obunkenke bwali butandise wakati wa ttiimu ebbiri okumala wiiki, era bwebaasembayo okusisinkana okuteesa ku pulojekiti yabwe, obusungu bwabalukawo. Obutakkaanya bwe bwagenda bweyongera, kyalabika bulungi nti okukolera awamu kwali tekusoboka.
ach_prompt: Lworo obedo ka dongo ikin dul tuku aryo ne pi cabit mapol, ki dong ikare ma gurwate me nywako lok I kom yub meggi, kiniga omako gi. I kare ma telle omedde, nen atyer kamaleng ni winye pe twero bedo tye.
teo_prompt: Ajaas ingungeta kiding itimun iarei ngun adaun isabitin, ido ne apotu kesi iriamunos aitetem nuikamunitos epurojekt kec, apotu ingungeta kibiroros. Neapolor amamus acamanar, apotu kojenutu ebe mam aimorikikina epedori.
lgg_prompt: Erita ako ebi ovu amuti iri 'diyi ma eselea sabiti eyi ma alea, azini yini dri fuzu asizu e'yo onzezu otita eyivile 'diyi ma dria, e'yo eyi 'ye i ra. Erita ako eyini tuzu 'bori ma vutia, eca e'da kililiru kini ti ecita 'ba eyi ma eselea ri econi ku.
nyn_prompt: Obunkenke bukaba butwire nibweyongyera ahagati ya tiimu ibiri kumara esande, kandi ku baaherize kubugana kuhanuura aha purogyekiti yaabo, ekiniga kikarugaho. Obutaikirizana ku bwayeyongyeire, kikarebeka butunu ngu okukwatanisa tikurikubaasika.

eng_prompt: After months of protests and political maneuvering, the opposition coalition finally gained enough support to challenge the ruling party. In a dramatic turn of events, they executed their plan to seize control of the government.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'emyezi egy'okwekalakaasa n'okwekyusakyusa mu byobufuzi, omukago gw'oludda oluvuganya gavumenti gwafuna obuwagizi obumala okuvuganya ekibiina ekiri mu buyinza. Mu ngeri ey'ekitalo, baakola enteekateeka yaabwe ey'okuwamba gavumenti.
ach_prompt: Ingee dwe mapol me jemo ki diro me cung iwibye, dul pa jo ma pe yee ki lok pa gamente gunongo cwak ma oromo me pyem ki dul me cungu iwi bye matye iwi ker. I aloka-loka ma otimme atura, gutimo yubgi me mako loc pa gamente.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ilapio luka aidiya keda aitemonokineta nuka politikis, abu epate loka etepegak kodum egangitok luedolitos kanu aitepeg epate loipugai. Apotu kesi kopedosi aitodolikin ainapeta kec nuka aipuga apugan.
lgg_prompt: Mba yini ngiringiri 'yezu azini otuta politiki ni 'diyi ma alia 'bori ma vutia, amuti ageti otiza ni 'diyi isu asizu atita capirisi ecozu a'di 'dizu amuti opi driari be ra. E'yo yi ojazu okposiri ma alia, yi 'ye otuta yini lezu opi nyazu gamete ma dria ri ra.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'emyezi mingi y'okwesharinga hamwe n'okukoresa oburyo bw'eby'obutegyeki, ekibiina ky'obutegyeki ekirikuhakanisa gavumenti kikahendera kyabona obushagiki oburikumara kuhakanisa ekibiina ekiri omu butegyeki. Omu mpindahinduka y'amaani, bakakora enteekateeka yaabo y'okutwara obutegyeki.

eng_prompt: After a long day in court, I anxiously awaited the verdict. Finally, the moment arrived, and the judge addressed me directly.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'olunaku oluwanvu mu kkooti, nnalindirira n'obweraliikirivu ensala. Ekiseera kyatuuka omulamuzi n'ayogera nange butereevu.
ach_prompt: I ngee nino malac tutwal I kot, abedo kakuru ngolo kop ki mit kom. I agiki ne, kare oo, langolkop oloko bota atir.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka apak naepol noi adieket, abu eong aidar etube. Kawasia, abu apak kodolu, kosodi ekatubon einer keda eong.
lgg_prompt: O'du ezu koti'a 'bori ma vutia, ma te asi driasi e'yo liza ma driari. Asizu, sawa ca, 'ba e'yo lipiri nze e'yo ma be trotro.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okumara eizooba riringwa omu kooti, nkategyereza okusharaho. Ekyarugiremu,obwire bukahika, kandi omuramuzi akagamba nanye butunu.

eng_prompt: Despite their persistent requests for a resolution, he remained hesitant to take action. Eventually, the mounting pressure from his team led him to reconsider his stance.
lug_prompt: Wadde nga baasaba okugonjoolwa, yasigala alonzalonza okubaako ky'akolawo. Mu nkomerero, okunyigirizibwa okuva mu ttiimu ye kwamuleetera okukyusa endowooza ye.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni gubedo ka lego ni omyero kityek lok eni, en pud obedo ki lworo me timo gin mo. I agiki ne, lyeto ma dul tuku mege obedo kwede oweko en oloko tamme.
teo_prompt: Karaida ekotosi kesi aitemokin ationis, abu ngesi kopala aswam ngun. Kawasia abu ainingosit naka etimu ke ijaik ngesi airereor akeswam bobo.
lgg_prompt: Yi ni tro a'i e'yo nde ma aza kozu ra ti, eri awi asi otiza be e'yo 'yezu. Asizu, okpo tupi engazu amuti erivileri vu ri fe erini e'yo erini 'yeleri ma ale andrizu o'diru.
nyn_prompt: Oihireho okushaba kwabo okugumizemu, akaguma atarikwenda kugira eki yaakora. Ekyarugiremu, okugyenda kweyongyera kwa tiimu ye kikamureetera kushwijuma enteekateeka ye.

eng_prompt: As we continue to navigate the ongoing pandemic, it's crucial to stay informed about the risks associated with the virus. Health experts emphasize the importance of understanding the severity of Covid-19 and its potential impact on individuals and communities.
lug_prompt: Nga tweyongerayo okutambuza ekirwadde bbunansi ekigenda mu maaso, kikulu nnyo okusigala nga tumanyi akabi akali mu kawuka. Abakugu mu byobulamu bassa essira ku bukulu bw'okutegeera obubi bwa ssenyiga omukambwe n'engeri gy'ayinza okukosaamu abantu ssekinnoomu n'ebitundu.
ach_prompt: Ka wamede ki wot I kare me two ma opoto ni, pire tek tutwal me bedo ki ngec I kom peko ma twero bino macalo adwogi me kwidi. Ludiro me yot kom giwaco ni pire tek tutwal me niang kit ma two korona rac kwede ki adwoki ne i kom dano ki kabedo mapatpat.
teo_prompt: Kwape inyikokini oni alosit kotoma adeka naka ekorona, ejokuna noi aijen atiokisio nu ikamanara keda ekorona. Apotu ipirioitin luka angeleu kitogogongoto ajokis naka amisiikin atiokisio nuka adeka naka ekorona keda epone loepedoria ngesi aitolitol itunga keda atutubena.
lgg_prompt: Amani muzu drile e'yo azo 'dezaniri ma aliarisi, eri orodriru aa'zu o'dukoti be e'yo onzi yi ecipi azo 'dezaniri be 'diyi ma dria. Ba nita be e'yo alata ma dria angiri 'diyi 'ba asi orodri e'yo onzi azo Covid-19 niri ni 'diyi vazu tualu e'yo erini eco 'ye 'ba yi ma ngulupi ma dria azini ongulumu yi ma eselea 'diyi pie ri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Twagyenda omu maisho n'oburwaire oburiho obwahati, ni kikuru kuguma nitumanya akabi akarikuruga omu akakooko ka korona. Abakugu omu by'amagara nibaha amaani omugasho gw'okwetegyereza oburemeezi bwa Covid-19 hamwe n'ebirikubaasa kukwata abantu hamwe n'ebyanga.

eng_prompt: In an effort to streamline local governance and ensure accountability, the council proposed a new fee structure for its members. As part of this initiative, those on district council positions would pay two hundred thousand shillings.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'okutereeza enfuga y'ebitundu n'okukakasa embalirira, akakiiko kaateesa ku nsengeka y'ebisale empya eri bammemba baakyo. Ng'omu ku nteekateeka eno, abo abali ku bukiiko bwa disitulikiti bajja kusasula emitwalo abiri.
ach_prompt: I tute me yubu tela me tedero ki miyo kor tic, kancil omiyo tam me keto wel cul manyen pi lumemba gi. Macalo but yub man, joo matye I kom gamente me district gubi culu ciling alip miya aryo.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitojokar epugae lo ocaalo ka aanyun eipone lo itwasamatere ikapun, abu ekansulo kitemok ainapeta nuitetiak nuka isirigin mama ejaasi imeebanakec. Kwape ediopet koboro kalu, ngul luejaasi toma okasulo luka edisitrikt epote aitac isirigin ilukumin akwatarei.
lgg_prompt: Okpo 'bazu e'yo driceza angu ndundu eyi ma alea ri ma omgbo otuzu azini e'yo ndundu eyini 'ye 'diyi ma dria, kanisulu 'da fe egata geri musara ofezu o'diru 'diyi ma dria memba eyivile 'diyini. Otita 'di ma azi ru, 'ba distrikiti ma drice'ba ru 'diyi nga silingi ofe alifu turu iri.
nyn_prompt: Omu kaweefube w'okutereeza obwebembezi bw'ebyaro n'okureeba ngu hariho embaririra,akakiiko kakataho enkora ensya y'okushashurira ba memba baako. Nk'emwe aha nteekateeka egi, abo abari aha kakiiko ka disiturikiti, nibaza kushashura shiringi emitwaro abiri.

eng_prompt: The local government has been exploring various ways to increase its funding sources. One of the most effective strategies identified is the optimization of street parking regulations.
lug_prompt: Gavumenti y'ebitundu ebadde enoonya engeri ez'enjawulo okwongera ku nsibuko zaayo ez'obuyambi. Obumu ku bukodyo obusinga okukola obulungi obuzuuliddwa kwe kutumbula amateeka agakwata ku kusimba mmotoka ku nguudo.
ach_prompt: Gamente me tedero obedo ka yenyo yoo mapat-pat me medo lim. Yo acel maber loyo weng ma kinongo obedo yubu cik me gwoko mutoka I gudu.
teo_prompt: Euta apugan na okwap aingic iwaitin luegelegela lu iyatakina ikapun. Adiopet kotoma iwaitin lu iswamaete ejok kes aitojokar ainapeta nuka ipikipikin korotin.
lgg_prompt: Gamete angu ndundu eyini 'diyi ebi geri ndundu eyi onda geri eyini ecozu robia esuzu 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu. Otita azi alu 'bani esu orodriru ndeni ri azita nzila dria mutukari eyi o'bazu 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu ri'I.
nyn_prompt: Gavumenti z'ebyanga zitwire nizironda oburyo bw'okwongyera aha sente zaayo. Omwe aha mihanda erikukirayo kukora kurungi, n'okutereeza ebiragiro by'okusimba emotoka aha nguuto.

eng_prompt: After years of bitter rivalry and misunderstandings, both families realized that their ongoing feud was causing more harm than good. In a bid to mend their fractured relationship, they decided to reach out to one another.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'emyaka mingi egy'okuvuganya n'obutategeeragana, amaka gombi gakizuula nti obukuubagano bwago obwali bugenda mu maaso bwali bukosa nnyo okusinga ebirungi. Mu kaweefube w'okutereeza enkolagana yaabwe, baasalawo okutuukirira buli omu.
ach_prompt: Inge mwaki mapol me pyem matek tutwal ki telle, gangi aryo weng oniang ni lweny meggi matye kawot anyim tye ka kelo peko madit loyo ber. I tute gi me yubu wat meggi, gumoko tamgi me lok ki luwotgi.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ikar luipu luka abolobol keda amamus acamanar, apotu ikalia ngun kere kojenutu ebe ajai ingungeta kec aronis adepar ajokis. Kanu aitemokin eidicanekec, apotu kesi kopedosi adolokin yenice.
lgg_prompt: Eli a'bala okporu azini erita ako ni 'diyi ma vutia, familia iri 'diyi esu ra kini a'di yini mupi drile ri ni e'yo onzi eji aga muke ri ra. E'yo lezu yi ma eseliari otuzu, yi asi e'yo 'du yi ma eselea.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'emyaka mingi y'okuhayahayana hamwe n'obutetegyerezana, amaka gombi gakareeba ngu entaro zaabo ezabaire nizigyenda omu maisho zikaba nizikora akabi kukira oburungi. Omu kaweefube w'okutereeza enkoragana yaabo, bakasharamu kuhikaana.

eng_prompt: Despite his long-standing involvement in the party, he had been preoccupied with other commitments. As a result, he missed several important announcements regarding upcoming events.
lug_prompt: Wadde nga yali amaze ebbanga ddene ng'ali mu kibiina, yali yeemalidde ku bintu ebirala. N'ekyavaamu, yasubwa ebirango ebikulu bingi ebikwata ku bintu ebyali bigenda okubaawo.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni en dong orii I dul me cungu iwi-bye ne pi kare malac, en obedo ka timo jami mukene. Macalo adwogi ne, en okeng winyo lok angeya mapigi tego mapol makwako jami matye kabino anyim.
teo_prompt: Karaida adaun ngesi apak naepol noi kotoma opate, ajai ngesi keda aswamisinei ace. Kanuka ngun abu ngesi kotwania alimoret nuepolok nuikamunitos nu ebeit atakanun.
lgg_prompt: Erini tro aa'zu amuti politiki ni 'da ma alea sa'wa ezu ra ti, eri ndra asi 'ba e'yo azi 'diyi ma dria. E'yo 'disi, eri ece e'yo azi orodriru 'diyi e'yo emu'ba 'diyi ma dria ra.
nyn_prompt: N'obu araabe yaamazire obwire bwingi ari omu kibiina, akaba aine bingi by'okukora. N'ekyarugiremu, akafeerwa okurangirira kwingi okw'omugasho okurikukwata aha bintu ebyabaire nibiza kubaho.

eng_prompt: Effective decision-making and accountability are essential for the success of any political organization. To achieve this, political parties should establish well-defined roles and responsibilities within their leadership.
lug_prompt: Okusalawo obulungi n'embalirira bikulu nnyo eri obuwanguzi bw'ekibiina ky'ebyobufuzi kyonna. Kino okusobola okukituukako, ebibiina by'ebyobufuzi birina okuteekawo emirimu n'obuvunaanyizibwa mu bukulembeze bwaabyo.
ach_prompt: Moko tam maber ki miyo kor tic pire tek tutwal pi cobo miti pa dul me cungu iwi bye mo keken. Me cobo man, dul me cungu iwi-bye omyero gunyut ticgi maber I tela gi.
teo_prompt: Aitolomun aseununeta ka aitodun eipone lo itwasamatere ikapun ejok kanu akerianut naka edio erionget loka politikis. Kanu aitodolikin ngun, ekot ipatei aitolomun aswamisinei nuecaete ka aswamisinei nuka engarenok kec.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'duza kililiru azini geri 'bani e'yo 'yezu kililiru 'diyi orodriru amuti politiki ni 'diyi ma drile suza ni. E'yo 'di 'yezu, le amuti politiki ni 'diyi ma e'do azi eyi ma drileru 'diyi kililiru.
nyn_prompt: Okukora ebiteiso kurungi n'okuha embaririra n'eby'omugasho aha businguzi bw'ekitongore ky'eby'obutegyeki kyona. Okuhikiiriza eki,ebibiina by'obutegyeki bishemereire kutaho emirimo n'obujunaanizibwa omu bwebembezi bwabyo.

eng_prompt: After a thorough evaluation of their qualifications, the selection committee made their final decisions. Those who were not chosen were given clear instructions on the next steps.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okwekenneenya ebisaanyizo byabwe, akakiiko akalonda kaakola okusalawo kwabwe okusembayo. Abo abataalondebwa baaweebwa ebiragiro ebitegeerekeka obulungi ku mitendera egiddako.
ach_prompt: Ingee ngiyo jami weng ma mite pigi, dul ma oyero lutino gumoko tamgi me agiki. Dano ma pe kiyero gi, kimiyo it gi cik ma niange maber i kom ngo ma omyero gutim.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka airereor iboro lu ebeit kesi aswam, apotu ekomiti lo eseunete itolomutu aseununeta nuka awasia. Ngul lu mam eseunitai aponi ijaikinai aicoreta nuecaete nu ebeit aswam.
lgg_prompt: E'yo yini lele 'diyi ma ale andrizu kililiru 'bori ma vutia, komiti 'ba ope'baa 'diyi 'du e'yo yini asizuri ra. Ba fe 'ba 'bani pe ku 'diyi dri azita kililiru e'yo drile 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okushwijuma kurungi ebirikwetengyesa, akakiiko akarikutoorana, kakakora okusharamu kwabo okw'ahamuheru. Abo abataratoorainwe, bakaheebwa ebiragiro ebirikwetegyerezibwa kurungi ebirikukuratiraho.

eng_prompt: In today's rapidly evolving world, organizations must adapt to new challenges and perspectives. Embracing diverse leadership styles can foster innovation and resilience within our teams.
lug_prompt: Mu nsi ya leero ekyukakyuka amangu, ebitongole birina okutuukana n'okusoomoozebwa okupya n'endowooza. Okukkiriza enkola z'obukulembeze ez'enjawulo kisobola okutumbula obuyiiya n'obuvumu mu ttiimu zaffe.
ach_prompt: I lobo ma lokke oyot-oyot tutwal I kare-ni, dul mapat-pat omyero otii ki peko ki tam manyen. Jolo yoo me tela mapat-pat twero kelo diro manyen I kin lutic wa.
teo_prompt: Kotoma akwap naka lolo na ijulakina katipet, ekot iriongeta acamanar keda atiokisio nuitetiak keda aomisio nuitetiak. Aicam iponesio luegelegela luka eingarenone epedori aitopolor acoasinei nuitetiak kotoma itimun wok.
lgg_prompt: Wudrikuru curu'do i ojapi mbeleru ri ma alea, le amuti eyi ma aa e'yo ewaru o'diru 'diyi be. Geri driceza ni ndundu 'diyi atizu ri eco e'yo o'diru 'diyi eji amuti amavile 'diyi ma eselea ra.
nyn_prompt: Omu nsi y'erizooba erikuhinduka juba, ebitongore bishemereire kukorengana n'oburemeezi n'emiteekateekyere misya. Okukoresa emiringo y'obwebembezi etarikushushana, nikibaasa kureetaho okujumbura omu tiimu zaitu.

eng_prompt: To improve urban organization and ensure better access to goods, it's essential to find a designated space for local sellers. One effective solution would be to relocate street vendors to a market.
lug_prompt: Okutumbula entegeka y'ekibuga n'okukakasa okufuna obulungi ebyamaguzi, kya mugaso okufuna ekifo ekiteekeddwateekeddwa abasuubuzi b'omu kitundu. Ekimu ku biyinza okugonjoolwa kwe kusengula abasuubuzi b'oku nguudo okubatwala mu butale.
ach_prompt: Me yubu yub me boma ki nongo yoo maber me nongo jami acata, pire tek tutwal me nongo kabedo ma kiyubu pi lucat me tedero. Yo acel maber me tyeko peko en aye me kobo lucat iteng gudi I cuk.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitojokar aitemonokineta nuka itaunin ka awanyun ebe epatana adolokin iboro, ejokuna noi adumun aiboisit naitemokinitai kanuka agwelanarak luka atutubet. Adiopebon lo iswama ejok ngesi aitobwot agwelanarak lu orotin osokoni.
lgg_prompt: Aku ambo eyi otuzu kililiru azini afa ozizaru 'diyi esuzu kililiru, eri orodriru angu 'ba afa ozipi angu 'da ma alea 'diyini 'diyi esuzu. E'yo azi ecopi azi ngapi muke ndeni ri eri 'ba afa ozipi nzila tia 'diyi ojazu angu cu ni ma alia.
nyn_prompt: Okutunguura entebekanisa y'endembo n'okureeba ngu eby'obushubuzi byahika gye, n'eky'omugasho okuronda emyanya y'abashubuzi b'omubyaro. Ekintu kimwe ekirikubaasika n'okutwara abashubuzi b'ahanguuto omu butare.

eng_prompt: A well-maintained environment not only attracts more customers but also ensures the safety and quality of the products being sold. Therefore, maintaining high standards of hygiene should be a top priority for all vendors.
lug_prompt: Embeera ennungi tekoma ku kusikiriza bakasitoma bangi naye era ekakasa obukuumi n'omutindo gw'ebintu ebitundibwa. N'olw'ekyo, okukuuma omutindo gw'obuyonjo gulina okubeera ekintu ekikulu eri abasuubuzi bonna.
ach_prompt: Kabedo ma ki gwoko maber pe kelo luwil mapol keken ento bene weko jami ma ki cato bedo ber dok tye ki rwom mamalo. Pi meno, gwoko lengo omyero obed gin ma pire tek bot lucat weng.
teo_prompt: Aiboisio nu idaritai ejok mam ingalauni agwelak luipu bon konye itigogongori ayuwara keda adoketait na iboro lu egwelanario. Kanuka ngun, ibusakinit agwelanarak kere aisingarenit aidar aila.
lgg_prompt: Angu ama agei ri ma ta mbaza kililiru ri ni lu aje'ba eyi eji ku te eri vini afa ozile 'diyi ma tambaza azini wura kililiru ri ma omgbo otu. Ka'dini, le 'ba dria afa ozipi 'diyi ma 'du e'yo alata ma tambazu ri okporu.
nyn_prompt: Eby'obuhangwa ebitebeekanisiibwe kurungi, tibirikureetaho bakasitoma baingi, kureka nibyongyera aha mutindo n'oburinzi bw'ebintu ebirikuguzibwa. N'ahabw'ekyo, abarikuguza ebintu boona bashemereire kwebembeza okurinda obuyonjo.

eng_prompt: It's important to stand up for yourself and set boundaries in any situation. Remember, no one has the right to intimidate you with violence.
lug_prompt: Kya mugaso okwesimbawo n'okussaawo ensalo mu mbeera yonna. Jjukira nti tewali n'omu alina buyinza kukutiisatiisa na ffujjo.
ach_prompt: Pire tek tutwal me cung pi kwoni ki keto wang coo I kare mo keken. Wii opo ni, pe tye ngat mo matye ki twero me bwuri ki tim gero.
teo_prompt: Erai ibore yenepol noi aibwo kanukon bon kosodi aipikakin ikoruo kotoma ojautene ediokere. Kiituni ebe emamei idiotunganan apedor aitukurian ijo keda amumu.
lgg_prompt: Eri orodriru pa tuzu mi ngulupi ma e'yosi azini mi o'ba boda e'yo ciria. Mi ma ega kini 'ba azini ma drilemgbo mi ori fezu ngiringiri si yo.
nyn_prompt: N'eky'omugasho kwemerera n'okutaho ensharo omu mbeera yoona. Ijuka, tihaine omuntu weena oine obugabe kukutiinatiinisa n'obutabanguko.

eng_prompt: As citizens of this nation, we possess the knowledge and skills necessary for effective leadership. It is our responsibility to take charge and shape the future of our society.
lug_prompt: Ng'abatuuze b'eggwanga lino, tulina amagezi n'obukugu obwetaagisa mu bukulembeze obulungi. Buvunaanyizibwa bwaffe okutwala obuvunaanyizibwa n'okutondawo ebiseera by'ekitundu kyaffe eby'omu maaso.
ach_prompt: Macalo anywali me lobo man, watye ki ngec ki diro ma mite pi tela maber. Obedo tic wa me doro ki yubu anyim pa kabedo wa.
teo_prompt: Kwape itunga luka akwap kana, ijaasi oni keda acoa na ekotoi kanu aingarenikin ejok. Erai aswam wok aiting keda aitolomun ingaren naka itunga wok.
lgg_prompt: Kari anzi kari 'di ma alea 'diyi ru, ama vu ondua azini ondua 'bani lele driceza kililiru niri ci. Eri azi amani e'yo 'duzu ewu drialeri ama vile ongulumu 'diyiniri edezu.
nyn_prompt: Nk'abatuuragye b'eihanga eri, twine obwengye n'emyoga y'obwebembezi burungi. N'obujunanizibwa bwaitu okureeberera n'okukora aha nyensya y'abantu baitu.

eng_prompt: In a world where kindness and respect should prevail, it's essential to consider the impact of our actions on others. Everyone deserves to feel comfortable and valued in their interactions.
lug_prompt: Mu nsi omuli ekisa n'ekitiibwa, kikulu okulowooza ku ngeri ebikolwa byaffe gye bikwata ku balala. Buli omu agwanidde okuwulira ng'ali bulungi era nga wa muwendo mu nkolagana ye.
ach_prompt: I lobo ma kica ki woro omyero obed tye, pire tek tutwal me tamo I kom adwoki pa jami ma watimo I kom jo mukene. Dano weng omyero gubed agonya dok gubed ki woro ikare me tic kwedgi.
teo_prompt: Kotoma akwap naibusakinit asianut keda ayongit aipuga, ejokuna aomoom nuepedorete aswamisiowok aswam nejaas luce. Ibusakinit nginitunganan apupun ebe ejokuna ido ejokuna kotoma aiswamanara keda luce.
lgg_prompt: Wudrikuru ma alia asi ndriza azini inzita ma ovu okporu, eri orodriru ama ma ega e'yo amani 'ye 'diyi 'yepi 'ba azi 'diyi ma dria ri ma dria. Le 'ba dria ma ama yi kililiru azini eyi ma aa orodriru e'yo eyini 'ye eyi ma eselea 'diyi ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Omu nsi ei embabazi n'ekitiinisa bishemereire kwebembera, n'eky'omugasho okureeba oku ebikorwa byaitu birikukwata aha bandi. Buri omwe ashemereire kwehurira aine obusingye kandi aine omugasho omu kukorengana kwe.

eng_prompt: His repeated offenses have left us with no choice but to consider serious consequences. If he continues down this path, we must take action to protect the community.
lug_prompt: Emisango gye egy'enfunda n'enfunda gitusigadde nga tetulina kyakukola okuggyako okulowooza ku biyinza okuvaamu. Bw'agenda mu maaso mu kkubo lino, tulina okubaako kye tukolawo okukuuma ekitundu.
ach_prompt: Bal ma en otimo tyen mapol oweko wa peke ki gin atima mapat ki tam I kom adwogi ne. Ka en omede I yoo man, omyero watim gin mo me gwoko lwak.
teo_prompt: Apotu imusagon ke luipu kojalakisi oni emamei aseunet kilema aomoom nuepedorete atakanun. Arai kinyikokit ngesi aswam ngun, ibusakinit oni aswam kanu ayuarite itunga.
lgg_prompt: E'yo erini 'ye 'diyi fe ama dri e'yo azi 'yezu ku aga e'yo onzi 'diyi ma dria egazu. Ka mu drile geri 'di ma alia, le ama ma 'ye e'yo azi ongulumu 'da ma ta mbazu.
nyn_prompt: Enkozi z'ebibi nz'emirundi mingi, ziturekire tutaine ky'okukora, okwihaho okuteekateeka aha birikubaasa kurugamu. Ku araagumizemu omu muringo ogu, twine kugira eki twakora okurinda abantu.

eng_prompt: We believe in the transformative power of education rooted in faith. By establishing institutions that reflect our values, we aim to nurture both the mind and spirit of the next generation.
lug_prompt: Tukkiririza mu maanyi g'ebyenjigiriza agava mu kukkiriza. Nga tutandikawo ebitongole ebiraga empisa zaffe, tugenderera okukuza ebirowoozo n'omwoyo gw'omulembe oguddako.
ach_prompt: Watye ki niyee I kom kero pa kwan ma jenge I kom niyee me kelo aloka loka. Ka waketo gangi kwan ma nyutu ber bedo wa, watye ki miti me pwonyo tam ki cwiny pa anyim.
teo_prompt: Iyuunit sio ebe epedori aisisia aijulakin itunga. Kowai lo aitolomun iriongeta lu itodunitos iponesio wok, ikoto oni aitopolor aomisio keda etau loka ateker na etupakini.
lgg_prompt: Ama a'ita be okpo onita ni ojata ejipi a'ita ma alea ri ma dria. E'yo amuti amani 'diyi e'dapi 'diyi sizu risi, ama asi 'baza 'ba ewu drusiri ma alia 'diyi ma omi azini ava ezozu.
nyn_prompt: Nitwikiriza omu maani g'eby'obwegyese agarikureetaho empindahinduka ahabw'okwikiriza. Okutandikaho ebitongore ebirikworeka emicwe yaitu, nikigyenderera okutunguura ebiteekateeko n'emyoyo y'ab'omurembe ogurikukurataho.

eng_prompt: Established in the late 19th century, Gayaza High School has a rich history of providing education to young women. Over the years, it has become a cornerstone of academic excellence in the country.
lug_prompt: Essomero lya Gayaza High School eryatandikibwawo ku nkomerero y'ekyasa ky'ekkumi n'omwenda lirina ebyafaayo bingi mu kusomesa abawala abato. Emyaka bwe gizze giyitawo, efuuse ejjinja ery'oku nsonda mu by'enjigiriza mu ggwanga.
ach_prompt: Gang kwan me Gayaza High School ma kicako I tum pa cencwari me apar wiye 19, tye ki tekwaro me pwonyo lutino anyira. Pi mwaki ma okato angec, man odoko guti me dongo rwom me kwan I lobo man.
teo_prompt: Egeunitai Gayaza High School kokaru ilukumin itomonakanyaongon, ejaasi keda akiro nukolo nuka aisisianakin apesur nudidika. Kokaru lu atuboros, erai ngin epone loka aitodolikin asioman kotoma akwapuwok.
lgg_prompt: Sukulu Gayaza High School ni e'dole eli alifu 19 ni i deria, e'yo agapi 'bo 'diyi fe oku oderu 'diyi dri onita ra. Eli agapi 'bo 'diyi ma alea, eca curu'do afa okporu e'yo onita ni kari 'di ma alea ri i.
nyn_prompt: Eishomero rya Gayaza High School eryatandikirwe omu kyasha ky'ekumi na mwenda, riine ebyafaayo bingi by'okwegyesa abaishiki bato. Okumara emyaka mingi, kihindukire eibaare ry'oburugo bw'eby'obwegyese omu ihanga.

eng_prompt: As the polls closed last night, anticipation filled the air. Voters eagerly awaited the outcome of a closely contested race.
lug_prompt: Okulonda bwe kwaggalwawo ekiro ekikeesezza olwaleero, ebisuubirwa byajjula empewo. Abalonzi balindirira n'essanyu ebyava mu kuvuganya okw'amaanyi.
ach_prompt: I kare ma ki loro bolo kwir laworo dyewor, dano mapol gubedo ki gen. Lubol kwir gubedo kakuru adwogi me pyem matek tutwal.
teo_prompt: Neagolokinere aseo akware nabian, apotu itunga luipu opotu. Apotu aseak idaritoto akiro nuelomunete kotoma abolobol naepol noi.
lgg_prompt: Voti 'beza ni opizu aje inisi, asi 'baza ga angu ma alea tre. Ba voti 'bepi 'diyi te agata a'bala okporu 'diyiniri avasi.
nyn_prompt: Okuteera akaruuru kwahwaire nyekiro, abantu bakaba baine amatsiko maingi. Abateezi b'akaruuru bakategyereza n'ekihika ebyarugire omu kwiruka kw'amaani.

eng_prompt: After a long and contentious campaign season, voters anxiously awaited the outcome. As the clock ticked past midnight, anticipation turned to frustration.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okunoonya akalulu okumala ebbanga eddene era nga waliwo enkaayana, abalonzi balindirira n'obweraliikirivu ebyava mu kulonda. Essaawa bwe yayitako ekiro mu ttumbi, okusuubira kwafuuka okuggwaamu essuubi.
ach_prompt: I ngee kare malac me bito kwir ma opong ki apoka-poka, lubol kwir gubedo kakuru adwogi yer. Ikare ma cawa okato cawa abicel me dyewor, bedo ki gen odoko turcwiny.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka apak naepol noi naka ikampeins, apotu aseak idarit akiro nuelomunete. Neadolio esawa kiding kware, apotu aiyalongongo kijulakinos aiyalongong.
lgg_prompt: Sa'wa 'bani ti odaza 'yezuri ma vutia, 'ba voti 'bepi 'diyi te e'yo agata ni 'diyi avasi. Sawa ni tuzu agapi sawa azia inisi 'boria, asi 'baza oja'i asi nyoza ru.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'obwire bureingwa bw'ehururu, abateezi b'akaruuru bakategyereza ebyarugyemu. Eshaaha ku yaahikire aha shaaha mukaaga z'ekiro, okutegyereza kukahinduka okwerarikirira.

eng_prompt: In a democratic society, the integrity of the electoral process is paramount. Voters must have confidence that their voices are heard and counted accurately.
lug_prompt: Mu demokulasiya, obwesimbu mu nkola y'okulonda bwe businga obukulu. Abalonzi balina okuba n'obwesige nti amaloboozi gaabwe gawulirwa era gabalibwa bulungi.
ach_prompt: I te loc alwak, ber bedo pa yub me bolo kwir pire tek tutwal. Lubol kwir omyero gubed ki tek cwiny ni dwon gi ki kwano maber.
teo_prompt: Kotoma akwap naejaasi keda aseo, ejokuna noi ainapakina naka ainapeta nuka aseo. Ekot aseak ajaut keda amuno ebe epupio ka aimar iporotokec ejok.
lgg_prompt: Ongulumu democracia ni 'diyi ma alea, e'yo opetaa ni aa'zu e'yo ada be ri eri orodriru ndeni. Le 'ba voti 'bepi 'diyi ma aa asi'baza be kini 'ba o'duko eyivile 'diyi eri azini eyi la kililiru.
nyn_prompt: Omu demokurasiya, oburingaaniza omu by'oburuuru n'obw'omugasho munonga. Abateezi b'akaruuru bashemereire kugira obwesigye ngu oburuuru bwabo nibuhurirwa kandi bubarwa kurungi.

eng_prompt: In a democratic society, maintaining a positive relationship between law enforcement and the community is essential. This requires understanding and patience from police officers when interacting with citizens.
lug_prompt: Mu demokulasiya, okukuuma enkolagana ennungi wakati w'abakuumaddembe n'ekitundu kya mugaso. Kino kyetaagisa okutegeera n'obugumiikiriza okuva mu basirikale ba poliisi nga bakolagana ne bannansi.
ach_prompt: I te loc alwak, bedo ki wat maber ikin dul ma gwoko cik ki lwak obedo gin ma pire tek tutwal. Man mito ni abili gubed ki niango ki diyo cwiny ka gitye ka lok ki anywali.
teo_prompt: Kotoma akwap naejaasi keda apedorosio nuka itunga, ejok aidar eidicane loajokan kiding ipolisin keda itunga. Ekoto ngin amisiikin keda atitingikinit kama ejaasi ipolisin neiswamanara keda itunga.
lgg_prompt: Ongulumu democracia ni ma alea, aa'ta muke 'ba azita ma ta mbapi 'diyi ma eselea ongulumu eyi pie ri eri orodriru. Diri le vata azini asi teza engazu azi'ba polisi ni 'diyi vu yini aa'ria kari anzi eyi pie.
nyn_prompt: Omu demokurasiya, okurinda enkoragana nungi ahagati y'abarikukwatisa ebiragiro hamwe n'abantu b'omubyaro n'eky'omugasho. Eki nikyetenga okwetegyereza n'okugumisiriza kuruga omu ba ofiisa ba poriisi baaba nibakorengana n'abatuuragye.

eng_prompt: In recent months, tensions between the government and opposition groups have escalated dramatically. Many activists have reported facing increasing harassment and intimidation from law enforcement.
lug_prompt: Mu myezi egiyise, obunkenke wakati wa gavumenti n'ebibiina ebivuganya gavumenti bweyongedde nnyo. Abalwanirizi b'eddembe bangi bagamba nti batulugunyizibwa n'okutiisibwatiisibwa abakuumaddembe.
ach_prompt: I dwe ma okato, telle ikin gamente ki dul pa jo ma pe yee ki lok pa gamente omede tutwal. Lweny I kom gamente mapol guwaco ni gitye ka nongo auna ki lworo ma aa ki bot abili.
teo_prompt: Kolapio luatuboros, apolor noi ingungeta kiding apugan keda igurupun luka etepegak. Ebakasi itunga luipu ebe etereikina keda aitisiliario keda aitukurianeta kama ejaasi ipolisin.
lgg_prompt: Mba agapi 'bo 'diyi ma alea, ori gamete ma eselea amuti ageti otiza ni 'diyi pie ri tu ra. Ba e'yo a'di 'dipi 'diyi ma karakara eyi esu candi tualu ori feza be engazu 'ba azita ma ta mbapi 'diyi vu.
nyn_prompt: Omu myezi ehingwireho, obunkenke ahagati ya gavumenti n'ebibiina by'obutegyeki ebirikuhakanisa gavumenti bweyongyeire munonga. Abarwanirizi b'obuhangwa baingi bagambire ngu nibatuntuzibwa n'okutiinisibwa ab'eby'obutegyeki.

eng_prompt: Tensions escalated during the protest as demonstrators clashed with law enforcement. In response to the growing unrest, the police have hit the opposition and their supporters.
lug_prompt: Obunkenke bweyongedde mu kwekalakaasa ng'abeekalakaasi balwanagana n'abakuumaddembe. Olw'obutabanguko obweyongera, poliisi ekubye ab'oludda oluvuganya n'abawagizi baabwe.
ach_prompt: Lworo omedde ikare me jemo pien lujemo gubedo ka lweny ki abili. Macalo adwogi me jemo matye kamede, abili ogoyo dul pa jo ma pe yee ki lok pa gamente kacel ki lucwakgi.
teo_prompt: Apotu ingungeta kiyatakinos kapak naka aidiya naarai apotu ediyak ogiroto keda ipolisin. Kanu aitemokin amumu na iyata, apotu ipolisin ibungata etepegak keda egangitokokec.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ngiringiri ni 'diyi ma omgbo tu sa'wa yini ngiringiri 'yezu ri si 'ba ngiringiri 'yepi 'diyi ni aco cozu 'ba azita ma ta mbapi 'diyi pie. E'yo ngiringiri ni tupi 'diyi ma aza kozu, polisi eyi gba 'ba ageti otiza ni 'diyi tualu 'ba atita fepi eyidri 'diyi pie.
nyn_prompt: Obunkenke bukweyongyera omu bwire bw'okwesharinga ahabw'abeshaaringi kurwanagana n'abarikukwatisa ebiragiro. Ahabw'obutabanguko obweyongyeire, poriisi ekateera ab'orubaju orurikuhakanisa hamwe n'abashagiki baabo.

eng_prompt: The integrity of the electoral process relies on impartiality and transparency. Involving law enforcement in elections can lead to intimidation and undermine public trust.
lug_prompt: Obwesimbu bw'enkola y'okulonda bwesigamye ku bwenkanya n'obwerufu. Okwetaba kw'abakuumaddembe mu kulonda kuyinza okuviirako okutiisatiisa n'okutyoboola obwesige bw'abantu.
ach_prompt: Bedo ki adaa I yub me bolo kwir jenge I kom bedo labongo apokapoka ki ada. Keto abili ikare me yer twero kelo lworo ki balo gen pa lwak.
teo_prompt: Acoa naka ainapeta nuka aseo esipokinitai toma ailajaara keda ailajaara. Aibwaikin ipolisin toma aseo epedori aitukurian itunga ka aibiror amuno naka itunga.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ada e'yo opetaa ni 'diyi ma dria ri ati e'yo opendu kokoru azini e'yo ada ma dria. Ba azita ma ta mbapi 'diyi suzu e'yo opetaa ni ma alia ri eco fe 'ba eyini ori fezu dika eri eco fe 'ba eyini asi 'bazu eyi ma dria ku.
nyn_prompt: Obucureera omu by'oburuuru nibwegamira aha buringaaniza n'oburingaaniza. Okutwarira ebiragiro omu karuuru, nikibaasa kureetaho okutiinatiinisa n'okuremesa abantu kwesiga abantu.

eng_prompt: Arua city has become a focal point for development initiatives in the region. As a result, various organizations have established their presence to address local needs.
lug_prompt: Ekibuga kya Arua kifuuse ekifo ekikulu eky'enkulaakulana mu kitundu. N'ekivuddemu, ebitongole eby'enjawulo bitaddewo okubeerawo kwabyo okukola ku byetaago by'ekitundu.
ach_prompt: Arua city dong odoko kama yub me dongo lobo I but piny eni tye iye. Macalo adwogi ne, dule ma padi padi gucako tic gi me cobo miti pa lutedero.
teo_prompt: Erai eibuga loka Arua aiboisit naepol noi naka apol kotoma aiboisit. Kanuka ngun, etolomutu iriongeta luipu aiboisio kec kanu aitemokin ipudesia luka atutubet.
lgg_prompt: Aku ambo Arua niri eca angu okporu e'yo angu ezoma ni angu 'di ma alea 'diyini. E'yo 'disi, amuti ndundu eyi e'do eyi ma pa tu e'yo angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ma aza kozu.
nyn_prompt: Orurembo rwa Arua ruhindukire omwanya gw'entunguuka omu kyanga. N'ekyarugiremu,ebitongore bingi bitandikire kukora ahabyetaago by'abantu b'omubyaro.

eng_prompt: Arua city has been experiencing significant growth in recent years. New infrastructure projects and investments are transforming the urban landscape.
lug_prompt: Ekibuga kya Arua kibadde kikulaakulana mu myaka egiyise. Pulojekiti z'ebizimbe empya n'okusiga ensimbi bikyusa embeera y'ekibuga.
ach_prompt: Boma madit me Arua obedo ka dongo tutwal I mwaki ma okato ni. Yub manyen me gedo ki keto lim I tic tye ka loko kit ma boma tye kwede.
teo_prompt: Apolor noi esite loka Arua kokaru lu atuboros. Ipurojektin luitetiak lu aduko ka aipikakin ikapun kes ijulakinete aiboisio nuka itaunin.
lgg_prompt: Aku ambo Arua niri ebi zota amboru isu eli agapi 'diyi ma alea. Otita afa ayuzaru o'diru azini lonyi vuti aleza ni 'diyi angu tawuni eyini aa'zu ri oja.
nyn_prompt: Orurembo rwa Arua rutungire entunguuka y'amaani omu myaka egi. Purogyekiti z'okwombeka ebintu ebisya hamwe n'okutamu sente omu by'obushubuzi, biriyo nibihindura embeera y'endembo.

eng_prompt: In response to the government's recent actions, the opposition has united to demand a change in the electoral process. They believe that ensuring transparency and fairness is crucial for restoring public trust in the democratic system.
lug_prompt: Olw'ebyo gavumenti by'ekoze gye buvuddeko awo, ab'oludda oluvuganya beegatta wamu okusaba wabeewo enkyukakyuka mu nkola y'okulonda. Balowooza nti okukakasa obwerufu n'obwenkanya kikulu nnyo mu kuzzaawo obwesige bw'abantu mu nkola ya demokulasiya.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki tim pa gamente ma otime cokcok-ki, dul pa jo ma pe yee ki lok pa gamente guribbe kacel me mito aloka loka I yub me yer. Gitye ki niyee ni neno ni ada ki ber bedo tye pi dwoko gen pa lwak I kom loc alwak.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin nu iswamat apugan pac, emorikikinos etepegak kanu aijulakin ainapeta nuka aseo. Iyuunitos kesi ebe aanyun ebe ejai aica ka asipokina ejok erai ibore yenepol noi kanu ainyakun amunokina naka itunga mama ejaasi apugan naka itunga.
lgg_prompt: E'yo gamete ni 'ye o'diru 'diyi ma e'yosi, 'ba ageti otiza ni 'diyi ti eci ti e'yo lezu ojata e'yo opetaa ni 'diyi ma alia. Yi a'i ra kini e'yo ada azini e'yo ada ma ta mbazuri eri orodriru asi'baza o'bi yini geri o'bi yini 'diyi ma dria ri ogozu.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'ebikorwa bya gavumenti ebyabaireho juba, ab'orubaju orurikuhakanisa gavumenti bakwatanisa kwenda ngu habeho empindahinduka omu by'oburuuru. Nibateekateeka ngu okureeba ngu hariho amazima n'oburinganiza n'eky'omugasho omu kugaruraho obwesigye bw'abantu omu by'obutegyeki.

eng_prompt: In recent weeks, various organizations have rallied around the cause, recognizing its importance for social change. As a result, the call has gained more supporters with other pressure groups.
lug_prompt: Mu wiiki eziyise, ebitongole eby'enjawulo bikungaanye okwetoloola ensonga eno, nga bakitegeera obukulu bwayo mu nkyukakyuka y'embeera z'abantu. N'ekivuddemu, omulanga guno gufunye abawagizi bangi n'ebibiina ebirala ebirwanirira eddembe ly'obuntu.
ach_prompt: I cabit ma okato ni, dul mapat-pat guribbe I kom lok man, kun gingeyo ber pa aloka loka I kabedo wa. Macalo adwogi ne, lwongo ne onongo lucwak mapol ki dul mapat-pat me diyo dano.
teo_prompt: Kosabitin lu atuboros, apotu iriongeta luipu kimorikikinos kanu akiro ngun, ajenete ajokis naka aijulakin ejautene loka itunga. Kanuka ngun, adumutu aiwororio ngin egangitok luipu keda igurupun ice.
lgg_prompt: Sabiti agapi 'bo 'diyi ma alea, amuti karakara eyi tra eyi e'yo 'di ma dria eyini e'yo erini orodriru ojata ejizu o'bi eyi ma eselea ri ma e'yo egazu. E'yo 'disi, omveta 'da esu 'ba atita fepi 'diyi kalafe angiri amuti okpo 'bazu 'diyi pie.
nyn_prompt: Omu sabiiti ezihweireho,ebitongore bitari bimwe na bimwe bikwatanisize aha nshonga egi, ahabw'okumanya omugasho gwayo omukureetaho empindahinduka omu bantu. N'ekyarugiremu, okushaba kwe kutungire abashagiki baingi n'ebibiina ebindi.

eng_prompt: In a democratic society, it is essential to uphold the principles of peace and respect among all participants. Ensuring a fair electoral process relies on maintaining a calm and civil environment.
lug_prompt: Mu demokulasiya, kikulu nnyo okukuuma emirembe n'okussa ekitiibwa mu bonna abakwatibwako. Okukakasa enkola y'okulonda ey'obwenkanya kwesigama ku kukuuma embeera ey'obukkakkamu era ey'obuntubulamu.
ach_prompt: I te loc alwak, pire tek tutwal me gwoko cik me kuc ki woro ikin dano weng matye iye. Neno ni yer owoto maber jenge I kom bedo ki kuc ki ber bedo.
teo_prompt: Kotoma akwap naejaasi keda aseo naka itunga, ejok aidar ainapakin keda ayongit kanejaas itunga kere. Kanu awanyun ebe ejai aseo najokan, ekot aidar ainapakina keda ainapakina.
lgg_prompt: Ongulumu democracia ni ma alea, eri orodriru e'yo asianzuru ni azini inzita ni 'diyi ma ta mbazu 'ba dria 'diyi ma eselea. E'yo opetaa ni aa'zu kililiru ri ma ta mbazu ri le angu aa'zu e'yere azini o'bi eyi ma eselea ri ma ta mbazu.
nyn_prompt: Omu by'obutegyeki, n'eky'omugasho okugumizamu n'emitindo y'obusingye n'ekitiinisa omu bantu boona. Okureeba ngu akaruuru kakabaho omu buringaaniza, nikigyendera aha kugira obusingye n'obutereera.

eng_prompt: After reviewing the contract details, the project manager reached out to the finance department for an update. He says the payment is in the final stages.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okwekenneenya ebikwata ku ndagaano, maneja wa pulojekiti yatuukirira ekitongole ky'ebyensimbi okumutegeeza ebisingawo. Agamba nti okusasula kuli mu mitendera egisembayo.
ach_prompt: Ingee ngiyo lok matut I kom winye me tic, lador yub ne owinye ki dul ma loyo lok kom lim pi ngec manyen. En owaco ni cul ne dong cok tum.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka airereor akiro nuka ekonturakit, abu eyaiton epurojekt kodolok edipatiment loka ikapun kanu aitodun akiro nuitetiak. Ebala ngesi ebe ejai aitac ikapun toma adoketait nawasia.
lgg_prompt: E'yo otita 'da ma dria 'diyi ma ale andrizu 'bori ma vutia, 'ba otita 'da ma drilea ri eyi esu arakala robia niri vu e'yo o'diru 'diyi esuzu. Eri 'yo kini ofeta eri pari asizuri ma alia.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okushwijuma ebirikukwata aha ndagaano, manegya wa purogyekiti akahika aha kitongore ky'eby'esente kumubuuza. Naagira ngu okushashurwa kuri omu mitendera y'ahamuheru.

eng_prompt: The ongoing delays in salary disbursement have caused significant unrest among employees. To maintain morale and ensure productivity, it is crucial that payment for KCCA workers should be enforced.
lug_prompt: Okulwawo okugenda mu maaso mu kusasulwa kw'emisaala kuleeseewo obutali butebenkevu mu bakozi. Okusobola okukuuma empisa n'okukakasa nti abakozi bakola bulungi, kikulu nnyo okusasula abakozi ba KCCA.
ach_prompt: Galle pa culu mucara pa lutic okelo lworo madit tutwal ikin lutic. Me gwoko cwiny dano ki neno ni tic tye maber, pire tek tutwal ni kicul lutic me KCCA.
teo_prompt: Aiyap na etapit kotoma aitac iropito eyangaunit aiyalongong kanejaas eswamak. Kanu aidar eswamae loajokan ka aswam ejok, ejokuna noi aitac eswamak luka Atukot naeyait ainapeta ko Kampala.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'bani 'ba eyi ma musara eyi ma sa'wa ezazu ri fe ngiringiri 'ba azi 'diyi ma eselea. Lezu 'ba eyi ma adriza ma ta mbazu azini eyini ani azi ngazu kililiru, eri orodriru 'bani musara ofezu azi'ba KCCA ni 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Okukyerererwa kw'okushashura emishaara kureesireho obutabanguko omu bakozi. Okukuuma emicwe mirungi n'okukora kurungi, n'eky'omugasho munonga okureeba ngu abakozi ba KCCA bashashurwa.

eng_prompt: Effective governance requires a deep understanding of local needs and conditions. By implementing policies at the district level, we can ensure that they are tailored to the unique challenges faced by each community.
lug_prompt: Enfuga ennungi yeetaaga okutegeera mu bujjuvu ebyetaago by'ekitundu n'embeera. Bwe tussa mu nkola amateeka ku mutendera gwa disitulikiti, tusobola okukakasa nti gakwatagana n'okusoomoozebwa okw'enjawulo buli kitundu kwe kisanga.
ach_prompt: Tela maber mito niang matut I kom miti ki kwo pa lwak. Ka waketo cik itic I rwom me dicitrwik, watwero neno ni kiyubu gi malube ki peko mapat-pat ma kabedo acel-acel nongo.
teo_prompt: Epugae loajokan ekoto amisiikin noi ipudesia keda ejautene loka itunga. Kowai lo aitegear ainapeta ko disitrikt, ipedori oni awanyun ebe itodolikinete kesi atiokisio nuetereikina keda itunga.
lgg_prompt: Driceza kililiru ri le 'ba ma va e'yo angu 'ba eyini aa'zu 'diyi ma dria kililiru. Geri 'bani azita eyi 'bazu distrikiti eyi ma alea risi, ama eco ne ra kini eyi 'ye e'yo ewaru ongulumu alu alu eyini esu 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Obwebembezi burungi nibwetaga okwetegyereza gye ebyetaago n'embeera y'abantu. Kurabira omu kuta ebiragiro omu nkora aha rurengo rwa disiturikiti, nitubaasa kureeba ngu nibigyendera aha buremeezi obu buri kyanga kirikushanga.

eng_prompt: In a tragic turn of events, multiple explosions rocked the city during a busy afternoon. Emergency services rushed to the scene as chaos unfolded, leaving many in shock.
lug_prompt: Mu nkyukakyuka ey'ekikangabwa, okubwatuka okungi kwakankanya ekibuga mu kawungeezi akaabaddemu abantu abangi. Ab'eby'amangu baddukidde mu kifo akavuyo we kaabadde, ne baleka bangi mu kutya.
ach_prompt: I kare ma jami otimme marac tutwal, muk pa muduku mapol oyelo boma madit I dyeceng ma dano dwong iye tutwal. Lutic me ot yat ma gitye ka miyo kony oyot oyot gucito I kabedo ne I kare ma kuku kuku obedo tye, ma oweko dano mapol gubedo ki ngeng tutwal.
teo_prompt: Kotoma ojautene loerono noi, apotu aibiror naka iboro koinakisi eibuga atibong naejaasi keda itunga luipu noi. Apotu lu engeso koloto aiboisit na abu amumu kotakanu, kojalakisi itunga luipu akuriaka.
lgg_prompt: E'yo onzi 'yepi 'diyi ma alea, e'yo 'bani eyi ogbizu 'diyi 'ye aku ambu city niri ma alea sa'wa 'bani 'ba eyi trazu tu ri ma alea. Ba azakoma lepi mbeleru 'diyi ari pari 'da ma alea ngiringiri ni e'doria, 'ba karakara eyi ku osuta ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Omu muringo gw'ekikangabwa, okubwatuka kwingi kukateganisa orurembo omu mwebazyo ogwabaire gurimu abantu baingi. Abakozi b'eby'amagara g'ahaiguru bakahunga aha mwanya obu akavuyo kaabaire kariho, ekyarekire abantu baingi bari omu bwire bw'okwerarikirira.

eng_prompt: In an effort to promote public health and safety, the government has enacted a new regulation. This legislation applies to various establishments, including churches and supermarkets.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'okutumbula ebyobulamu n'obukuumi bw'abantu, gavumenti etaddewo amateeka amapya. Etteeka lino likwata ku bifo eby'enjawulo omuli amakanisa ne supamaketi.
ach_prompt: I tute me ilo malo rwom me yot kom pa lwak, gamente okatti ki cik manyen. Cik man tiyo i kom gangi tic mapatpat, ma I kingi obedo odi lega ki dukan madongo.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitogogong angaleu keda ayuwara naka itunga, etolomu apugan ikisila luitetiak. Iswamaete ikisila lu aiboisio nuegelegela, aimoriarit ikanisan keda idukai luapolok.
lgg_prompt: Okpo 'bazu o'bi eyi ma rua ala ma omgbo otuzu, gamete 'ba azita o'diru ni eyi. Azita 'diri azi nga angu ndundu eyi ma dria, kanisa eyi pie azini dukani ambu supermarket ru 'diyi pie.
nyn_prompt: Omu kaweefube w'okutunguura eby'amagara n'oburinzi omu bantu, gavumenti eteireho ebiragiro bisya. Ebiragiro ebi nibikwata aha myanya etari emwe, otwariiremu amakanisa hamwe na supamaketi.

eng_prompt: In light of recent developments and community feedback, the city council has implemented a new policy aimed at improving service efficiency. All transportation providers are required to comply with these updated regulations.
lug_prompt: Okusinziira ku bibaddewo gyebuvuddeko n'ebiteeso by'abantu, akakiiko k'ekibuga kataddewo enkola empya egendereddwamu okutumbula obuweereza. Ebitongole by'entambula byonna birina okugoberera amateeka gano amapya.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki jami ma otimme cokcok-ki ki tam pa lwak, kancil me boma madit okatti ki cik manyen ma tye ki miti me ilo malo rwom me miyo kony. Lutic me wot weng omyero gulub cik manyen magi.
teo_prompt: Katupitos nuiswamasi pac keda aomisio nuka itunga, etolomu ekansulo loka esite ainapeta nuitetiak nu ekotosi aitojokar ejanakine. Ibusakinit itunga kere luitolosete elose aitup ikisila luitetiak.
lgg_prompt: E'yo angu ezoma o'diru 'diyi ma dria azini o'duko ongulumu eyini fe 'diyisi, kanisulu aku ambu city niri 'ba azita o'diru 'bani lezu azakoma fele o'bi eyidri ri ma omgbo otuzu. Ba le 'ba dria acipa fe'baa 'diyi ma obi azita o'diru 'diyi ma vuti.
nyn_prompt: Kurugirira aha ntunguuka eyabaireho obwahati hamwe n'okugarukwamu kw'abantu,akakiiko k'orurembo kateire omu nkora ekiragiro ekisya ekirikugyenderera okutunguura obuheereza. Abarikukora eby'engyenda boona bashemereire kukuratira ebiragiro ebi ebisya.

eng_prompt: After a chaotic altercation during the protest, witnesses reported seeing him lash out at law enforcement officers. Authorities have since gathered evidence linking him to the violent incident.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okusika omuguwa mu kwekalakaasa, abaabaddewo baagamba nti baamulaba ng'alumba abakwasisa amateeka. Okuva olwo ab'obuyinza baakuÅ‹Å‹aanyizza obujulizi obumukwataganya n'obutabanguko obwaliwo.
ach_prompt: Inge lweny ma obedo tye ikare me jemo, lucaden guwaco ni gunene ka lweny i kom abili. Luloc gucoko caden ma kubu en ki tim gero ne.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka engunget loepol noi kotoma aidiya, apotu ajenak kotemasi ebe apotu kesi kowanyutu ngesi eporoto mama ejaasi ipolisin. Apotu apedorosio odumutu aitogogongoret na arucokinit ngesi toma akangas kangin.
lgg_prompt: Erita ako ngiringiri 'yezu 'bori ma vutia, 'ba sadiniru 'diyi ece kini yi eri ndre 'ba azita ma ta mbapi 'diyi ma dria. Okpo e'ipi eyi tra e'yo azi ecopi e'dapi kini eri e'yo ngiringiri ni 'da ma alea ci.

eng_prompt: The government's recent report highlighted the stagnation of economic growth across various industries. Analysts pointed out that the lack of accountability and transparency had severely hindered development efforts.

eng_prompt: Despite numerous warnings from law enforcement, he continues to evade their attempts to bring him in. His defiance has raised concerns among the authorities about his willingness to comply with the law.
lug_prompt: Wadde ng'abakuumaddembe bamulabudde enfunda n'enfunda, yeeyongera okwewala okumukwata. Okujeemera kwe kuleeseewo okweraliikirira mu b'obuyinza ku bwetegefu bwe okugondera amateeka.

eng_prompt: The pandemic has drastically altered daily life, forcing many institutions to adapt to unprecedented challenges. As a result, educational facilities have struggled to maintain a safe environment for students and staff.
lug_prompt: Ekirwadde bbunansi kikyusizza nnyo obulamu obwa bulijjo, ne kiwaliriza ebitongole bingi okutuukana n'okusoomoozebwa okutabangawo. N'ekivuddemu, amatendekero g'ebyenjigiriza galwana okukuuma embeera ey'obukuumi eri abayizi n'abakozi.

eng_prompt: As the pandemic continues to surge, healthcare facilities are struggling to keep up with the increasing demand for medical care. Many emergency rooms are filled to capacity, leaving little room for new arrivals.
lug_prompt: Ng'ekirwadde bbunansi kyeyongera okusajjuka, amalwaliro galwana okutuukana n'obwetaavu bw'obujjanjabi obweyongera. Ebisenge by'abalwadde ab'amangu bingi bijjudde nnyo, ekireka ekifo kitono eri abapya abajja.
ach_prompt: Kit ma two korona tye ka nya kwede, odi yadi tye ka tute matek me lubu miti me nongo kony me yot kom matye kamede. Kabedo mapol me gwoko lutwo ma gitye ka poto atura opong tutwal, ma oweko kabedo manok pi jo ma obino manyen.

eng_prompt: If you have any questions or need assistance, please feel free to reach out. For detailed inquiries, all the information is available at the office of the mayor.
lug_prompt: Bwoba olina ekibuuzo kyonna oba nga weetaaga obuyambi, tukusaba otuukirire. Okubuuza mu bujjuvu, obubaka bwonna webuli mu woofiisi ya loodi meeya.

eng_prompt: Effective communication is essential for fostering understanding and collaboration among diverse communities. By sharing knowledge within their language groups, individuals can ensure that information is accessible and meaningful to everyone involved.
lug_prompt: Empuliziganya ennungi ya mugaso mu kutumbula okutegeera n'okukolagana mu bitundu eby'enjawulo. Mu kugabana amagezi mu bibiina by'ennimi zaabwe, abantu basobola okukakasa nti obubaka butuukirirwa era nga bwa makulu eri buli muntu akwatibwako.
ach_prompt: Lok maber pire tek tutwal me kelo winye ki winye ikin lwak ma padi padi. I nywako ngec ikin dul me leb gi, dano acel acel twero neno ni ngec tye yot dok tye ki tyen lok bot dano weng matye iye.
teo_prompt: Einer loajokan nes erai ibore yenepol noi kanu aitopoloria apuponoro keda aiswamanara kanejaas itunga luegelegela. Kowai lo aimor acoa kotoma ogurupun lu angajep kec, epedorete itunga awanyun ebe edumunete akiro ngun ido ejaasi keda apolou nejaas itunga kere.
lgg_prompt: E'yo nzeza kililiru ri eri orodriru vata azini ti icita ma omgbo otuzu ongulumu ndundu eyi ma eselea. E'yo onita awazu ongulumu ti eyini 'diyi ma alea risi, 'ba alu alu eco ne ra kini o'dukoti eyi ma esuta eri ewakokoru azini orodriru 'ba dria e'yo nde ma alea 'diyini.

eng_prompt: As we navigated through various challenges and setbacks, it became clear that our focus needed to shift. Despite the obstacles we faced, our ultimate goal remained in sight.

ach_prompt: I kare ma watye ka kato ki I peko mapol, nen atyer kamaleng ni miti wa omyero olokke. Kadi bed ni watye ka nongo peko mapol, mitiwa pud tye I wangwa.

nyn_prompt: Kuturabire omu buremeezi n'oburemeezi butari bumwe na bumwe, kikarebeka butunu ngu ebyetengo byaitu bishemereire kuhinduka. Oihireho oburemeezi obu twatungire, ekigyendererwa kyaitu kikaguma omu maisho.

eng_prompt: If you're looking for a travel destination that offers stunning landscapes and rich cultural experiences, Uganda should be at the top of your list. From breathtaking national parks to vibrant cities, the country is full of diverse attractions waiting to be explored.
lug_prompt: Bw'oba onoonya ekifo eky'okutambulirako ekirimu ebifo ebirabika obulungi n'ebyobuwangwa eby'enjawulo, Uganda erina okubeera ku ntikko y'olukalala lwo. Okuva ku makuumiro g'ebisolo agawuniikiriza okutuuka ku bibuga ebirimu abantu abangi, eggwanga lino lijjudde ebintu eby'enjawulo ebirindiridde okunoonyezebwa.
ach_prompt: Kace itye ka yenyo kabedo me wot matye ki kabedo mamwonya tutwal ki tekwaro ma beco, Uganda omyero obed I wi nying ma imito. Nicake ki I kabedo me gwoko lee ma beco tutwal me oo I citi ma beco tutwal, lobo man opong ki jami mapol ma yomo cwiny dano.
teo_prompt: Arai iuta jo aimo aiboisit naejaasi keda aiboisio nuibusiak keda inonosio luibusiak, ibusakinit Uganda araun naepol noi kotoma aiboisit kon. Ageun aiboisio nuibusiak nuka aiboisio nuka aiboisio nuka aiboisio nuka aiboisio nuka aiboisio nuka aiboisio nuka aiboisio nuka aiboisio nuka aiboisio nuka aiboisio nuka aiboisio nuka aiboisio nuka aiboisio nuka aiboisio nuka aiboisio nuka aiboisio nuka aiboisio nuka aiboisio nuka aiboisio nuka aiboisio nuka aiboisio nuka aiboisio nuka
lgg_prompt: Eka pari acizuri nda angu ndrizaru tu azini e'yo suruni 'diyi pie, Uganda ma ovu mi vile otita ma drilea. Engazu angu anyapa asea 'diyi ma ta mbazuri ma alia kpere aku ambu city ru 'diyi ma alia, kari 'di ga e'yo ndundu 'bani ecozu angu ndrezu 'diyi be tre.
nyn_prompt: Ku oraabe nooronda omwanya gw'okurambura ogurikworeka ebishushani ebirikutangaaza hamwe n'eby'obuhangwa eby'omutaano, Uganda eshemereire kwebembera orukarara rwawe. Kuruga aha marindiro g'enyamiishwa agarikureebeka gye kuhisya aha ndembo ezirimu amaani, eihanga riijwire ebintu ebirikureetaho amaani ebirikutegyereza okucondoozibwa.

eng_prompt: Known for its stunning landscapes and diverse wildlife, Uganda has become a popular destination for travelers seeking adventure. From the breathtaking views of the Rwenzori Mountains to the vibrant culture of its people, there is much to explore in this East African gem.
lug_prompt: Uganda emanyiddwa nnyo olw'ebifo byayo ebirabika obulungi n'ebisolo byayo eby'omu nsiko eby'enjawulo. Okuva ku bifo ebyewuunyisa eby'ensozi z'e Rwenzori okutuuka ku buwangwa bw'abantu baayo, waliwo bingi eby'okunoonyerezaako mu nsi eno ey'omu buvanjuba bwa Afirika.
ach_prompt: Lobo Uganda ma oywek pi kabedo mamwonya tutwal ki lee tim mapat-pat, dong odoko kabedo ma oywek pi lulim piny ma tye ka yenyo kabedo mapat-pat. Nicake ki neno got me Rwenzori ma mwonya tutwal me oo I tekwaro pa dano ne, tye jami mapol tutwal ma omyero inen I lobo man me Afrika kunyango.
teo_prompt: Ejenara Uganda kanu aiboisio nuibusiak noi keda itiang lukokutwi luegelegela, erai aiboisit naejok noi kanejaas itunga luekotosi alosit aiboisio nuegelegela. Anyoun kotoma aiboisio nuibusiak nuka imoru luka Rwenzori kitoni inonosio luka itunga, ipu iboro luibusakinit aingic kotoma aiboisit kana naka East Africa.
lgg_prompt: Kari Uganda niri ni e'yo angu ndrizaru tu 'diyi ma dria tualu anyapa asea 'diyi pie, kari Uganda niri eca angu 'ba aci'ba angu ndundu eyi onepi 'diyini lele tu ni ru. E'dozu angu ndrizaru 'be Rwenzori ni 'diyi ma dria kpere e'yo suruni 'ba erini 'diyi ni 'diyi ma dria, e'yo angiri 'bani eco onda angu 'di ma alia.
nyn_prompt: Okumanywa ahabw'oburungi bw'ensi hamwe n'enyamaishwa nyingi, Uganda ehindukire omwanya murungi gw'abarambuzi abarikwenda kurambura. Kuruga aha bishushani birungi by'enshozi za Rwenzori kuhisya aha buhangwa bw'abantu baayo, hariho bingi by'okucondooza omuri burugwa izooba bwa Afirika.

eng_prompt: After years of dreaming about it, I finally decided to embark on an adventure. With a map in hand and a sense of excitement, I set out to explore new places.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okumala emyaka mingi nga nkiroota, nnasalawo okutandika olugendo. Nga nnina mmaapu mu ngalo era nga ndi musanyufu, nnatandika okulambula ebifo ebipya.
ach_prompt: Inge kare ma abedo ka lek I kome pi mwaki mapol, dong amoko tamma me cako wot me cito ka limo piny. Ki karatac map I cinga ki yomcwiny madit tutwal, acako wot me neno kabedo manyen.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ikar luipu luka airujasia nuikamunitos ngun, abu eong aseun ageun aswam ngun. Keda amapu akan keda aiyalama, abu eong alosit airereonor aiboisio nuitetiak.
lgg_prompt: Eli ma alia orobi 'bezu drinia 'bori ma vutia, asizu asizu asi 'du e'yo e'dozu e'yo ewaru 'diyi ma dria. Ma vile mapu dria azini ayiko be, ma e'do angu o'diru 'diyi onda.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okumara emyaka mingi ndikukiroota, nkahendera nasharamu kutandika omurimo gw'okutambura. Nkatandika kurambura emyanya misya nyine maapu omu ngaro hamwe n'okushemererwa.

eng_prompt: In a democratic society, freedom of expression is a fundamental right that empowers individuals to share their perspectives. This principle is especially crucial for those in the media, as their insights can foster informed public discourse.
lug_prompt: Mu demokulasiya, eddembe ly'okwogera ddembe lya musingi erisobozesa abantu okugabana endowooza zaabwe. Omusingi guno gwa mugaso nnyo naddala eri abo abali mu mawulire, kubanga amagezi gaabwe gasobola okutumbula okwogera mu lujjudde.
ach_prompt: I te loc alwak, bedo agonya me lok obedo twero ma pire tek ma weko dano acel acel nywako tamgi. Cik man pire tek tutwalle pi joo matye I odi poko ngec, pien niang gi twero kelo lok maber bot lwak.
teo_prompt: Kotoma akwap naejaasi keda aseo naka itunga, ailajara naka einer erai apedor naka itunga aimor aomisiokec. Epolok noi ainapeta ngun kanejaas lu iyemuto, naarai epedorete aomisio kec aitopolor akiro nuka itunga.
lgg_prompt: Ongulumu democracia ni 'diyi ma alea, driwala e'yo nzezu ri eri drilemgbo okporu fepi 'ba yi dri okpo fezu egata yini 'diyi awazu. E'yo 'di orodriru tuni 'ba e'yo oyu'ba 'diyi dri, a'disikuni yi ma egata eco e'yo nzeza o'bi yi ma eselea kililiru ri ma omgbo otu ra.
nyn_prompt: Omu demokurasiya,obugabe bw'okugamba n'obugabe bw'omugasho oburikuha abantu obushoborozi bw'okugamba ebiteekateeko byabo. Omusingye ogu n'ogw'omugasho munonga ahari abo abari omu by'amahurire, ahabw'okuba ebiteiso byabo nibibaasa kureetaho okuganiira kurungi omu bantu.

eng_prompt: In discussions about complex issues, it's essential to remain receptive to new ideas and perspectives. Embracing a mindset of curiosity fosters deeper understanding and collaboration.
lug_prompt: Mu kukubaganya ebirowoozo ku nsonga enzibu, kya mugaso okusigala ng'okkiriza ebirowoozo ebipya n'endowooza. Okukkiriza endowooza y'okwagala okumanya kireetawo okutegeera n'okukolagana okw'amaanyi.
ach_prompt: I kare me nywako lok I kom lok matego tutwal, pire tek tutwal me jolo tam ki tam manyen. Bedo ki miti me ngeyo jami kelo niang matut ki winye ikin dano.
teo_prompt: Kotoma oineresinei nuikamunitos akiro nuetioko, ejokuna noi aijaun aomisio nuitetiak ka aomisio nuitetiak. Aimorikikin aomisio nu ekotosi ijo ajenun eyangauni amisiikin keda aiswamanara.
lgg_prompt: E'yo onzeza e'yo kongolokoru 'diyi ma dria ri ma alea, eri orodriru aa'zu egata o'diru 'diyi ai'zu. E'yo 'bani lezu e'yo onizu 'diyi ma ta mbazuri ni e'yo vata azini ti icita ma omgbo otu.
nyn_prompt: Omu kuhanuura aha nshonga ezigumire, n'eky'omugasho kuguma noikirizana n'ebiteekateeko ebitsya. Okwenda kumanya ebirikugyenda omu maisho nikureetaho okwetegyerezana n'okukwatanisa.

eng_prompt: After months of intense campaigning and political debates, the nation held its breath in anticipation. Voter turnout was high, and citizens were eager to make their voices heard.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'emyezi gy'okunoonya akalulu n'okukubaganya ebirowoozo okw'amaanyi mu byobufuzi, eggwanga lyasibye omukka mu kusuubira. Abalonzi baali bangi era bannansi baali baagala nnyo amaloboozi gaabwe okuwulirwa.
ach_prompt: Ingee dwe mapol me bito kwir ki laro lok me cungu iwi-bye, lobo ne obedo ki miti madit tutwal. Wel lubol kwir obedo lamal tutwal dok anywali obedo ki miti matek me winyo dwon gi.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ilapio luka aisup aseeta keda ipegeta luka politikis, apotu itunga luka akwap kongeroto. Apolor noi aseo, ido ekotosi itunga aitodiar iporotoikec.
lgg_prompt: Mba ti odaza okporu azini agbatara politiki ni 'diyi ma vutia, kari 'di 'bi ava asi driasi. Ba emu'ba voti 'be'baa 'diyi ma kalafe angiri, dika kari anzi eyi le saaru o'duko eyivile 'diyi erizu.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'ameezi mingi y'okuronda akaruuru n'okuhanuura omu by'obutegyeki, eihanga rikaguma niriteekateeka. Obwingi bw'abateezi b'akaruuru bukaba buri ahaiguru kandi abantu bakaba nibenda munonga ngu eiraka ryabo rihurikwe.

eng_prompt: In a show of solidarity and determination, communities across the region mobilized for the upcoming protest. Many chose to forgo transportation, opting instead for a long trek to demonstrate their commitment to the cause.
lug_prompt: Mu kwolesa obumu n'obumalirivu, ebitundu okwetooloola ekitundu byekunga ku kwekalakaasa okubindabinda. Bangi baasalawo okulekawo entambula, mu kifo ky'ekyo ne basalawo okutambula olugendo oluwanvu okulaga obumalirivu bwabwe eri ensonga.
ach_prompt: I nyutu ribe ki tek cwiny, lwak ma ikabedo mapatpat guribbe pi jemo matye kabino ni. Dano mapol oyero me weko wot, kun gi yero me wot pi kare malac me nyutu cwinygi I kom yub eni.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitodun aimorikikina keda apodokinit, apotu itunga luka atutubet itukokinos kanu aidiya na ebunit. Apotu luipu koseutu apalar alosit, apotu koseutu alosit apak naepol kanu aitodun ebe ekapakina kesi aswam ngun.
lgg_prompt: Ti ecita azini asi 'baza e'dazu, ongulumu angu 'da ma alea ndulu 'diyi tra eyi ngiringiri emupi 'diyi 'yezu. Ba karakara eyi pe e'yo acizu ri kuzu ja eyini ani acizu angu ezuru 'diyi ma alea eyini ani eyi ma ava e'dazu e'yo 'da ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Omu kworeka okukwatanisa n'obwegyendesereza, abantu kuruga omu kicweka kyona bakeetaba omu kwesharinga okurikwija. Baingi bakasharamu okureka eby'engyenda, omu mwanya gw'ekyo bakatambura orugyendo ruraingwa kworeka okwehayo kwabo ahabw'ekigyendererwa.

eng_prompt: The community center was bustling with activity as preparations were underway for the annual festival. Colorful tents were being set up, and volunteers were arranging seating for the anticipated crowds.
lug_prompt: Ekifo ky'ekitundu kyali kijjudde emirimu ng'enteekateeka z'ekivvulu ekitegekebwa buli mwaka zigenda mu maaso. Tenti ez'enjawulo zaali ziteekebwawo, era bannakyewa baali bategeka ebifo eby'okutuulako eri abantu abaali basuubirwa.
ach_prompt: Gangi pa lwak gubedo ki tic mapol tutwal I kare ma yub tye kawot anyim pi kwer ma bedo mwaka ki mwaka. Gitye ka keto kema mabeco tutwal, ki joo ma odyere me yubu kabedo pi dano ma byek tye I komgi.
teo_prompt: Ajai aswam naepol noi kotoma atutubet naarai alosi aitemonokineta nuka epucit kangol ekaru. Aponi ibwaikinai itaagin luibusiak noi, ido apotu itunga luka atitai itemonokinos aiboisio nuka aiboikin itunga lu eomitai ebe epote aiboikin.
lgg_prompt: Pari ongulumu eyini aa'zu ri ndra 'yeta be tre otuta omu eli vusi ri ni 'diyi ni mu drile. Ba o'ba ndra tenti wura ndu ndu 'diyi, azini 'ba owi'ba 'diyi ri o'ba angu rizu 'ba 'bani ega 'diyi dri.
nyn_prompt: Omwanya gw'ekyanga gukaba gurimu emirimo mingi ahabw'entebekanisa y'omukoro ogurikubaho buri mwaka. Eihema eririmu erangi nyingi rikaba niriteebwaho, kandi abarikwehayo bakatebeekanisa entebe z'abantu abaabaire nibateekateekwaho.

eng_prompt: As the festival grew in popularity, organizers realized the need for better crowd management. They designed a series of pathways to facilitate smoother navigation for attendees.
lug_prompt: Okujaguza bwe kweyongera okumanyika, abategesi baalaba obwetaavu bw'okuddukanya obulungi abantu. Baayiiya amakubo agawerako okusobola okwanguya entambula y'abaabaddewo.
ach_prompt: I kare ma yweka pa yub eni omedde, luyub ne oniang ni omyero ki bed ki yoo maber me doro wel dano. Guyubu yoo mapat-pat ma weko wot bedo yot ki joo ma obedo tye.
teo_prompt: Neapolor epucit ngol noi, apotu luitemonokinak kojenutu eipud loka aitikitik itunga. Aponi kitemokinai irotin luegelegela kanu aitapatan alotok lu ajaas.
lgg_prompt: Omu 'da ni tuzu 'ba eyini 'diyi ma eselea, 'ba otupi 'diyi esu e'yo lezu 'ba eyi ma ta mbazu kililiru ri ra. Eyi ede geri karakara eyi 'ba emu'ba 'diyi ni acizu ewakokoru.
nyn_prompt: Nk'oku omukoro gwayeyongyeire kumanywa, abatebekanisa bakareeba ekyetengo ky'okureeberera gye abantu. Bakakora emihanda mingi y'okutamburira gye abaabaire bariho.

eng_prompt: In the bustling city, ensuring access to clean water is a top priority for the local government. To address this need, they have installed large drinking water tanks on all corners.
lug_prompt: Mu kibuga ekijjudde abantu, okukakasa nti abantu bafuna amazzi amayonjo kye kintu gavumenti z'ebitundu kye zikulembeza. Okusobola okukola ku bwetaavu buno, batadde ttanka ennene ez'amazzi g'okunywa ku buli nsonda.
ach_prompt: I citi matye ki dano mapol tutwal, nongo pii maleng obedo gin ma pire tek bot gamente me tedero. Me tyeko peko man, guketo tanka madongo me pii amata I gul weng.
teo_prompt: Kotoma oibuga loepol noi, aanyun ebe epedori apugan na okwap adumun akipi nu elaete. Kanu aitemokin ationis na, apotu kesi ibwaikisi ataagin nu akipi nu aimat aiboisio kere.
lgg_prompt: Aku ambu cityniri ma alia, geri 'bani ecozu yi ala esuzu ri eri e'yo okporu gamete angu ndundu eyini ri'I. Lezu e'yo 'di ma aza kozu, eyi osu tanki ambo yi mvuza ni 'diyi kona dria eyi ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Omu rurembo rurimu abantu baingi, okureeba ngu habaho amaizi marungi, nikyo kintu kikuru munonga omu gavumenti z'ebyaro. Okuhikiiriza ekyetengo eki, bateire tanka empango z'amaizi g'okunywa aha shonda zoona.

eng_prompt: As the community event kicked off, the youth volunteers gathered at the entrance, ready to assist those in need. They were tasked with ensuring that the elderly attendees felt welcomed and supported throughout the day.
lug_prompt: Omukolo gw'ekitundu bwe gwatandika, abavubuka bannakyewa baakuÅ‹Å‹aanidde ku mulyango nga beetegefu okuyamba abo abali mu bwetaavu. Baaweereddwa omulimu okulaba nti abakadde abaaliwo bawulira nga baanirizibwa era nga bawagirwa olunaku lwonna.
ach_prompt: Ikare ma yub me kabedo ne ocake, bulu ma odyere gucokke I dogola ma donyo, ma oyubbe me konyo joo ma peko tye I komgi. Kimiinigi tic me neno ni joo ma otii ma gubedo tye i kacokke guwinyo maber dok bene kicwako gi nino ducu.
teo_prompt: Neageunor epucit loka atutubet, apotu atumunak lu ekotosi aingarakin itunga lu ican. Aponi koinakinai kes aswam na awanyun ebe ijaunitos itunga lu emojongitos ido igangitai kesi apaaran kere.
lgg_prompt: Omu ongulumu eyini ri ni e'doria, 'ba ode owitaru 'diyi tra eyi jotile alia ngonde 'ba azakoma lepi 'diyi ma aza kozu. Ba fe eyini azi nezu ra kini 'ba depi 'bo emu'ba 'diyi ma aa ayikosi azini atita esu o'du 'da ma alea dria.
nyn_prompt: Omukoro gw'ekyanga ku gwatandikire, eminyeeto eyehaireyo, ekateeranira aha muryango, eyeteekateekire kuhwera abatarikwebaasa. Bakaheebwa omurimo gw'okureeba ngu abakuzire omu myaka abaizire aha ruteerane, bahurira bashemereirwe kandi bahairwe obuhwezi eizooba ryona.

eng_prompt: In the midst of the celebration, the crowd surged forward, eager to join the festivities. However, safety protocols must be respected to ensure everyone's well-being.
lug_prompt: Wakati mu kujaguza, abantu baayitiridde mu maaso nga baagala nnyo okwenyigira mu bikujjuko. Newankubadde, ebiragiro by'obukuumi birina okussibwamu ekitiibwa okulaba nga buli omu abeera bulungi.
ach_prompt: Ikare me kwer ne, dano mapol gubino anyim ki miti matek me bedo tye I kwer ne. Kadi bed kumeno, cik me gwoko kuc omyero ki wor wek dano weng gubed maber.
teo_prompt: Kokiding na ainumunum, apotu itunga kisinyikokisi alomar toma ainumunum. Konye ibusakinit atupakinit ainapeta nuka ayuwara kanu awanyun ebe ejai nginitunganan aijar najokan.
lgg_prompt: Omu 'da ma agandua, o'bi emu drile ava be emuzu omu 'da ma alea indi. Kani si, le 'ba ma inzi azita e'yo agei tema ni 'diyi ma vuti nezu ra kini 'ba dria ma aa muke.
nyn_prompt: Ahagati y'okujaguza, abantu baingi bakaza omu maisho, baine ekihika ky'okwejumba omu kujaguza. Kwonka, ebiragiro by'okwerinda, bishemereire kuheebwa ekitiinisa, okureeba ngu buri omwe aba gye.

eng_prompt: Due to the upcoming construction of a new highway, the wildlife management team has decided to take action. As a result, the animals in the game park will be relocated.
lug_prompt: Olw'okuzimbibwa kw'oluguudo oluggya olugenda okuzimbibwa, abaddukanya ebisolo by'omu nsiko basazeewo okubaako kye bakolawo. N'ekinaavaamu, ebisolo ebiri mu kkuumiro ly'ebisolo bijja kusengulwa.
ach_prompt: Pi yub me yubu gudi manyen matye kabino anyim, dul ma doro lok kom lee tim omoko tamgi me timo gin mo. Macalo adwogi ne, kibi kobo lee matye I kabedo ma kigwoko iye lee.
teo_prompt: Kanuka aduko na erot loitetet lo ebeit adukun, abu erionget loka itiang lukokutwi koseu aswam ngun. Kanuka ngun, eponio aijulakin itiang luka aiboisit naidarere itiang.
lgg_prompt: E'yo nzila o'diru ni sizu ri ma e'yosi, amuti afa asea 'diyi ma tambapi 'diyi ma ta mbapi 'diyi asi e'yo 'du e'yo 'yezu ra. E'yo 'disi, 'ba nga anyapa angu anyapa asea 'diyi ma ta mbazuri ma alia 'diyi oja ra.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'oruguuto orusya orurikwija kwombekwa, tiimu y'abarikureeberera enyamaishwa z'omwishwa eshaziremu kukoraho. Ekyarugiremu, enyamaishwa eziri omu irindiro ry'enyamiishwa niziija kufururwa.

eng_prompt: In response to the escalating tensions in the city, authorities decided to take immediate action. As a precautionary measure, they increased security presence throughout the area.
lug_prompt: Olw'obunkenke obweyongera mu kibuga, ab'obuyinza baasalawo okubaako kye bakolawo mu bwangu. Ng'ekyokwegendereza, baayongera obukuumi mu kitundu kyonna.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me telle matye kamedde I boma ne, lutela gumoko tamgi me timo gin mo oyot oyot. Macalo yoo me gwoke, gumedo rwom me gwoko kuc I kabedo weng.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin atiokisio nu iyata noi koibuga, apotu apedorosio koseutu aswam katipet. Kwape epone loka ayuwar, apotu kesi iyatakisi ayuwara kotoma aiboisit.
lgg_prompt: Erita ako ma omgbo tupi aku ambu city niri ma alea ri ma e'yosi, drice'ba eyi 'du e'yo 'ye indikindi. Ekile e'yo eyi ma tambazu, eyi otu e'yo ageyitema ni 'diyi angu 'da ma alea ndulu.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'obutabanguko obweyongyeire omu rurembo, ab'obushoborozi bakasharamu kukora ahonaaho. Nk'omuringo gw'okwerinda, bakongyera eby'okwerinda omu mwanya gwona.

eng_prompt: In many societies, adherence to guidelines and regulations is seen as a fundamental aspect of maintaining order. This respect for structure fosters a sense of community and cooperation among individuals.
lug_prompt: Mu bitundu bingi, okugoberera ebiragiro n'ebiragiro kitwalibwa ng'ekintu ekikulu mu kukuuma obutebenkevu. Okussa ekitiibwa mu nteekateeka kireetawo enkolagana n'obwegassi mu bantu.
ach_prompt: I kabedo mapol, lubu cik nen calo gin ma pire tek me gwoko kuc. Woro man pi yub eni weko dano bedo ma guribe dok giwinye ikin gi.
teo_prompt: Kotoma atutubena nuipu, eyangaritai aitup ikisila kwape ibore yenepol noi kanu aidar ainapakina. Ayongit ngin naka ainapeta eyangauni aimorikikina keda aimorikikina kanejaas itunga.
lgg_prompt: Ongulumu karakara eyi ma alea, 'ba e'yo azita eyi ma vuti obizu ri ndre ekile e'yo okporu azita eyi ma tambazu ri le. Asi feza 'diri ongulumu eyi ma eselea azini ti ecita 'ba eyi ma eselea ri ma omgbo otu.
nyn_prompt: Omu bicweka bingi, okukuratira ebiragiro n'ebiragiro nikureebwa nk'ekintu kikuru omu kurinda obusingye. Okuheereza ekitiinisa ebyombeko nikureetaho okukwatanisa n'okukwatanisa omu bantu.

eng_prompt: In a climate of rising tensions and deep-seated grievances, he exploited existing divisions to incite fear and hatred. His rhetoric painted a vivid picture of an impending threat, urging the community to take drastic action against those they once considered friends.
lug_prompt: Mu mbeera y'obunkenke obweyongera n'okwemulugunya okusimbye emirandira, yakozesa enjawukana ezaaliwo okukuma omuliro mu bantu okutya n'obukyayi. Enjogera ye yalaga ekifaananyi ekitangaavu eky'obulabe obwali bujja, ng'akubiriza abantu okubaako kye bakolawo ku abo be baali batwala okuba mikwano gyabwe.
ach_prompt: En otiyo ki apoka-poka matye ni me kelo lworo ki gero ikin dano. Lok mege onyuto cal maber tutwal I kom peko matye kabino anyim, kun lego lwak me timo gin mo matek I kom jo ma yam onongo gitamo ni gubedo luremgi.
teo_prompt: Kotoma ojautene loepol noi loka ingungeta, abu ngesi itwasam atiakatiaka kanu aitopolor akurianu keda angurian. Abu akekiro kitodu aputo naka aitukurianeta nueyapiete, isinyikokit itunga aswam kagogong mama ejaasi ngul luesesenete kesi kwape ipaperokec.
lgg_prompt: E'yo erita ako ni tuzu tualuri ma alia, eri ayu e'yo esele coza ni 'diyi ori fezu azini awata ejizu. E'yo erini nze 'diyi e'da e'yo ewaru ecapi ewu drialeri ma alea 'diyi ma dria, erini o'bi eyi ai 'yeta okporu 'diyi 'yezu 'ba eyini aa'zu eyi ma agyi ru 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Omu bwire bw'obutaikirizana obweyongyeire hamwe n'okwetomboitwa okw'amaani, akakoresa okwebaganisamu okwabaireho kureetaho okutiina n'obwangane. Ebigambo bye bikoreka ekishushani ky'akabi akarikwija, arikushaba abantu kukora ekikorwa ky'amaani ahari abo abu baabaire nibatwara nk'abanywani baabo.

eng_prompt: In the years leading up to the conflict, deep-seated ethnic tensions were exacerbated by government propaganda and systematic discrimination. As a result, the state was able to rally support for its violent agenda, leading to devastating consequences.
lug_prompt: Mu myaka egyaddirira olutalo, obunkenke mu mawanga obwali busimbye emirandira byayongera olw'okusaasaanya amawulire ga gavumenti n'okusosola mu bantu. N'ekyavaamu, gavumenti yasobola okukungaanya obuwagizi ku bigendererwa byayo eby'effujjo, ekyavaamu ebizibu eby'amaanyi.
ach_prompt: I mwaki ma okelo lweny enoni, telle me kin kaki ma obedo tye tutwal ni omede tutwal ki lok goba pa gamente ki apoka-poka ma obedo tye. Macalo adwogi ne, gamente onongo twero nongo cwak pi yubgi me tim gero, ma okelo adwogi marac tutwal.
teo_prompt: Kokaru luapotu koyangautu ejie, apotu ingungeta luka atekerin kiyatakinos kanuka akiro nuka apugan keda atiakatiaka. Kanuka ngun abu apugan opedo adumun agangat kanuka ainapeta ke nuka amumu, ido abu koyangau atiokisio nuarokok.
lgg_prompt: Eli andra dricepi e'yo a'di 'dizu ri ma alea, e'yo adra suru suru ni 'diyi ma alia 'diyi ma omgbo tu gamete ma e'yo nzeza azini e'yo opendu ni 'diyi si. E'yo 'disi, kari 'di esu atita e'yo erini 'ye ngiringiri ru 'diyi ma dria, dika e'yo 'dayi eca onzi onzi.
nyn_prompt: Omu myaka y'obutabanguko, obunkenke bw'enganda bukongyera ahabw'oburyarya bwa gavumenti hamwe n'okushoroora omu bantu. N'ekyarugiremu, eihanga rikabaasa kurundaana obushagiki ahabw'ebigyendererwa byaryo eby'obwinazi, ekyarugiremu ebihikiirizi.

eng_prompt: As I reflected on the complexities of human relationships, I began to understand how our perceptions shape our experiences. This realization opened my eyes to the dual nature of our interactions.
lug_prompt: Nga bwe nfumiitiriza ku buzibu bw'enkolagana y'abantu, natandika okutegeera engeri endowooza zaffe gye zikolamu bye tuyitamu. Ekyo kyandeetera okukiraba nti tulina ebintu bibiri bye tukolagana nabyo.
ach_prompt: I kare ma abedo ka tam I kom kit ma wat ikin dano tek kwede, acako niang kit ma tam wa yubu kwede jami ma wakato ki iye. Niang man oyabo wanga me neno jami aryo mapat-pat matye I kinwa.
teo_prompt: Neautar eong aomoom nuikamunitos atiokisio nuka eidicane lo itunga, abu eong ageu amisiikin epone loepedoriata aomisiowok aitodolikin akiro nuiswamasi oni. Abu ajenunet ngin koinak eong ajenun iponesio iarei luka aiswamanara kosi.
lgg_prompt: Mani e'yo egazu e'yo ewaru aa'pi 'ba eyi ma eselea 'diyi ma dria, ma e'do va geri amani egata amani 'diyi e'dazu e'yo amani esu 'diyi ma dria. E'yo 'di ma mile nzi e'yo amani aa'zu ama eselea 'diyi ma esele iri 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Ku naabaire ninteekateeka ahaburemeezi oburi omu kukwatanisa kw'abantu, nkatandika kwetegyereza oku ebiteekateeko byaitu birikukora aha bi turikuhurira. Okwetegyereza eki kikaigura amaisho gangye okureeba ebintu bibiri ebirikukwata aha kukorengana kwaitu.

eng_prompt: As the news broadcast detailed the urgent call for volunteers, he felt a surge of determination. The weight of the situation pressed on him, and he knew he had to take action.
lug_prompt: Ng'amawulire galaga nti waaliwo okusaba okw'amangu okw'abakozi ab'obwannakyewa, yawulira nga yeeyongedde okuba omumalirivu. Obuzito bw'embeera bwamunyigiriza era n'amanya nti alina okubaako ky'akolawo.
ach_prompt: I kare ma lok angea okatti ki lok matut I kom lwongo pa dano ma gudyere, en obedo ki miti matek adada. Pek pa peko ne oketo lyeto I kome, en oniang ni myero en otim gin mo.
teo_prompt: Neautar iyemuto aitodiar akiro nuikamunitos aiwororio naka itunga luekotosi aijaikin aswam, abu ngesi kopup aomisioit naepol noi. Abu ationis naka ejautene itolitol ngesi, ido ajeni ngesi ebe ibusakinit ngesi aswam ibore.
lgg_prompt: E'yo efupi o'dukoti edrizu ri ni e'yo 'bani 'ba owi'ba 'diyi omvezu mbeleru 'diyi ma dria, eri ma asi 'baza tu ra. E'yo ewaru e'yo 'da ma dria ri fe eri dri okpo, dika eri nii ra kini le ma 'ye e'yo azi ra.
nyn_prompt: Obu amahurire garikworeka okwetwa kw'abantu b'okwehayo ahonaaho, akeehurira amaririzo mingi. Oburemeezi bw'embeera bukamugumira, yaamanya ngu aine kugira eki yaakora.

eng_prompt: It's important to understand the dynamics of communication in this situation. If you approach them with your concerns, you might find that they are dismissive.
lug_prompt: Kikulu okutegeera engeri y'okuwuliziganya mu mbeera eno. Bw'obatuukirira n'ebikweraliikiriza, oyinza okusanga nga tebakussaamu kitiibwa.
ach_prompt: Pire tek tutwal me niang kit ma lok tye kwede I kare man. Ka I lok kwedgi ki peko ma itye kwede, iromo nongo ni pe giworo.
teo_prompt: Erai ibore yenepol noi amisiikin epone loka einer kotoma ojautene kalo. Arai inyikokinit jo kesi nuikamunitos atiokisio kon, ipedori ijo aanyun ebe mam kesi epodokinitos.
lgg_prompt: Eri orodriru geri 'bani e'yo nzezu 'diyi vazu e'yo 'di ma alea. Eka emu yi vu e'yo ewaru mini 'diyi be, mi eco esu kini yi mi ede ra.

eng_prompt: The government implemented various social programs aimed at improving the quality of life for its citizens. These initiatives focused on ensuring access to essential resources and support systems.
lug_prompt: Gavumenti yassa mu nkola pulogulaamu z'embeera z'abantu ez'enjawulo ezigendereddwamu okutumbula omutindo gw'obulamu bwa bannansi baayo. Enteekateeka zino zaali zeesigamye ku kufuna ebintu ebikulu n'enkola z'obuyambi.
ach_prompt: Gamente oketo yub mapat-pat me konyo lwak ma obedo ki miti me ilo malo rwom me kwo pa anywali ne. Yub eni oketo cwinygi tutwalle I kom nongo jami ma mite pi kwo ki yub me miyo kony.
