eng_prompt: Witnesses reported a chaotic scene as the armed group stormed the building. Many were left feeling abandoned and vulnerable, especially when he mentioned that the authorities did not help during the raid.
lug_prompt: Abaabaddewo baategeezezza nti waaliwo akavuyo ng'ekibinja ky'abamenyi b'amateeka balumba ekizimbe. Bangi baalekebwa nga bawulira nga basuuliddwa era nga tebalina mwasirizi naddala bwe yayogedde nti ab'obuyinza tebaayamba mu kiseera ky'ekikwekweto.
ach_prompt: Lucaden guwaco ni kuku kuku obedo tye ikare ma lumuku muduku gumonyo ot ne. Dano mapol guwinyo calo ki kwero gi dok gipe ki gwok tutwalle ikare ma en owaco ni lutela pe gukonyo I kare me mony ne.
teo_prompt: Apotu ajenak olimosi ebe ajai amumu naarai apotu itunga luka imudun kolukutu aduketait. Aponi kojalakinai itunga luipu epupete ebe aponi olakakinai kes ido mam epedorete aingarakin kes, kacut nalimuna ngesi ebe mam apedorosio apotu ingarakisi kapak naka asurokinio kangin.

eng_prompt: In a healthy democracy, it is essential to respect diverse opinions and foster an inclusive environment. Any form of bias or prejudice undermines the principles of fairness and equality.
lug_prompt: Mu demokulasiya omulungi, kya mugaso okussa ekitiibwa mu ndowooza ez'enjawulo n'okutumbula embeera erimu abantu bonna. Okusosola kwonna kutyoboola emisingi gy'obwenkanya n'okwenkanankana.

EêžŒyo êžŒbani êžŒba ma esele cozu êžŒdiyi azini eêžŒyo êžŒbani êžŒba ma esele cozu êžŒdiyi êžŒba yi ma eselea êžŒdiyi ma eselea êžŒba yi ma eselea êžŒba yi ma eselea êžŒba yi ma eselea êžŒba yi ma eselea êžŒba yi ma eselea êžŒba yi ma eselea êžŒba yi ma eselea
nyn_prompt: Omu demokurasiya nungi, n'eky'omugasho okuheereza ekitiinisa ebiteekateeko ebitarikushushana n'okureetaho embeera erimu abantu boona. Okushoroora kw'omuringo gwona, nikushiisha engyenderwaho y'oburinganiza n'oburingaaniza.

eng_prompt: As the growing season progressed, many farmers noticed a troubling trend in their fields. Reports of increased pest activity began to circulate among the agricultural community.
lug_prompt: Ekiseera ky'okulima bwe kyagenda kiyitawo, abalimi bangi baalaba ekintu ekitaali kirungi mu nnimiro zaabwe. Amawulire g'okweyongera kw'obukozi bw'ebiwuka gaatandika okusaasaana mu bantu b'ebyobulimi.
ach_prompt: Ikare me puru cam omedde anyim, lupur mapol guneno gin marac ma tye ka time I poto gi. Adwogi tic pa jami ma balo jami acata omede I kin lupur.
teo_prompt: Neautar apak naka akoru alosit, apotu akoriok luipu kowanyutu ibore yenetiono noi kotoma amisirin kec. Apotu iripotan luka aiyatakinio naka ikur kogeutu aipuakata kotunga luka akor.
lgg_prompt: Sa'wa ori ezozaniri ni muzu drile, 'ba ori ezo'ba 'diyi ndre e'yo azi onzi ni yi ma amvu yi ma alia ra. O'duko afa ori eza'ba 'diyi ma ongmbo tupi 'diyi e'do aci 'ba amvu 'ya'ba 'diyi ma eselea.
nyn_prompt: Obwire bw'okuhinga ku bwagyendeire omu maisho, abahingi baingi bakareeba engyesho mbi omu misiri yaabo. Ripoota ezirikworeka okweyongyera kw'obukooko zikatandika kujanjaara omu bantu b'eby'obuhingi n'oburiisa.

eng_prompt: After a long week of school, the little boys were eager to spend their Saturday outdoors. They gathered their toys and headed to the park, ready for an adventure.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lwa wiiki empanvu ey'essomero, abalenzi abato baali beesunga okumala Olwomukaaga lwabwe wabweru. Baakungaanya eby'okuzannyisa byabwe ne boolekera paaka nga beetegefu okugenda okulambula.
ach_prompt: Ingee cabit malac me kwan, lutino awobe ne gubedo ki miti matek me cwalo ceng abicelgi woko. Gujogo jami me tuku gi ka gucito I park ma oyubbe me cito ka limo piny.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka esabiti loewoja noi loka esomero, ekotosi isap luidisiak noi aitosom Naemukaga kinga. Apotu kesi otukutu aboliakakec kosodete alosit aiboisit naidarere itiang, ekapakina alosit aiboisit ngin.
lgg_prompt: Sabiti izu sukulua 'bori ma vutia, agupianzi nyiri 'diyi le ndra o'du aziasi amve. Eyi tra eyi ma afa avita avizu 'diyi azini eyi mu angu anyapa asea 'diyi ma ta mbazu ri ma alea, eyi ngonde e'yo ndundu eyi 'yezu.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'esande ndaingwa y'eishomero, aboojo bakaba baine ekihika ky'okumara orwamukaaga rwabo aheeru. Bakarundaana eby'okuzaanisa byabo baagyenda omu paaka, beeteekateekire okurambura.

eng_prompt: In times of crisis, it becomes essential for political factions to set aside their differences. This collaborative approach fosters stability and progress for the nation.
lug_prompt: Mu biseera by'obunkenke, kifuuka kyetaagisa ebiwayi by'ebyobufuzi okulekawo enjawukana zabyo. Enkola eno ey'awamu ereetawo obutebenkevu n'enkulaakulana mu ggwanga.

teo_prompt: Kapak naka atiokisio, erai ibore yenepol noi itunga luka ipatei ailem atiokisio kec. Ewai lo lo aiswamanara eyangauni ainapakina keda apol naka akwap.

nyn_prompt: Omu bwire bw'oburemeezi, nikiba kiri eky'omugasho amahanga g'eby'obutegyeki okureka entaaniso zaago aha rubaju. Enkora egi ey'okukorera hamwe, nereetaho obutebekana n'entunguuka omu ihanga.

eng_prompt: Many individuals feel disconnected from the support systems in place. As a result, they often perceive themselves as excluded from the benefits provided by government initiatives.
lug_prompt: Abantu bangi bawulira nga tebakyalina nkolagana n'obuyambi obuliwo. N'ekivuddemu, batera okuwulira nga baggyibwako ku miganyulo egibaweebwa gavumenti.
ach_prompt: Dano mapol giwinyo calo gipe ki kubbe ki yub me miyo kony matye. Macalo adwogi ne, pol kare giwinyo calo pe gitwero nongo ber pa yub pa gamente.
teo_prompt: Eomitos itunga luipu ebe emamei kesi arucokina keda lu igangakitai. Kanuka ngun, etapit kesi aanyun ebe mam kesi edumunenete ameda na ijaikitai apugan.
lgg_prompt: Ba karakara eyi ama eyi ma eselea geri atita fezu 'diyi ma eselea ci. E'yo 'di ma e'yosi, eyi ega eyi ma orodri gamete ni 'diyi ma alea ku.
nyn_prompt: Abantu baingi nibahurira batarikukwatanisa n'obuhwezi oburiho. N'ekyarugiremu, nibakira kwehurira ngu tibarikubaasa kuhikwaho emigasho erikuruga omu nteekateeka za gavumenti.

eng_prompt: In a competitive electoral landscape, candidates must find ways to engage and motivate their constituents. To secure votes, political parties often develop strategies that appeal to the interests and needs of the electorate.
lug_prompt: Mu by'okulonda ebirimu okuvuganya okw'amaanyi, abeesimbyewo balina okunoonya engeri y'okusikiriza n'okukubiriza abantu baabwe. Okusobola okufuna obululu, ebibiina by'obufuzi bitera okukola enteekateeka ezisikiriza ebyetaago n'ebyetaago by'abalonzi.
ach_prompt: I kare me pyem I yer mapat-pat, lucungu omyero gunong yoo me kelo miti ki cuku cwiny I kom lubol kwir gi. Me nongo kwir, dul me cungu iwi-bye ipol kare giyubu yoo me tic ma lubbe ki miti ki miti pa lubol kwir.
teo_prompt: Kotoma abolobol naka aseo, ibusakinit abwoak adumun iwaitin lu aisinyikokin ka aisinyikokin itunga luka atutubenakec. Kanu adumun abootin, etapit ipatei aitolomun iwaitin lu itodolikinete ipudesia luka aseak.
lgg_prompt: E'yo a'bala opetaa ni 'diyi ma alea, le 'ba pa tupi 'diyi ma esu geri eyini ecozu 'ba eyini opi nyaza ni 'diyi 'bazu eyi ma eselea ra. Voti eyi esuzu, amuti politiki ni 'diyi sa'wa driasi otita eyi e'do eyini ani e'yo 'ba voti 'bepi 'diyini lele 'diyi 'yezu.
nyn_prompt: Omu bwire bw'okuhayahayana omu by'oburuuru, abesimbireho bashemereire kuronda oburyo bw'okureetaho amaani n'okugaruramu amaani abantu abu barikujwekyera. Okubona oburuuru,ebibiina by'obutegyeki nibikora emiringo erikuhikaana n'ebyetengo n'ebyetengo by'abateezi b'akaruuru.

eng_prompt: Many community members have expressed their concerns about various topics. To address these concerns, we have forums where these issues are raised.
lug_prompt: Abantu bangi mu kitundu balaze okweraliikirira kwabwe ku nsonga ez'enjawulo. Okusobola okukola ku nsonga ezo, tulina enkiiko ensonga ezo mwe zoogerwa.

lgg_prompt: Ba ongulumu karakara eyi ece asi otiza eyini e'yo ndundu eyi ma dria. E'yo 'diyi ma aza kozu, ama ovu ongulumu 'bani e'yo 'diyi nzezu 'diyi be ci.
nyn_prompt: Abantu baingi omu byaro boorekire okwerarikirira kwabo aha nshonga nyingi. Okukora aha nshonga ezi, twine enteerane ahu enshonga ezi zirikugambwaho.

eng_prompt: After extensive discussions and negotiations, the stakeholders reached a consensus on the issue at hand. As a result, the other parties have presented this matter to the forum.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okukubaganya ebirowoozo okw'amaanyi n'enteeseganya, abakwatibwako baatuuka ku nzikiriziganya ku nsonga eriwo. N'ekyavaamu, ebibiina ebirala bireese ensonga eno mu lukiiko.
ach_prompt: Ingee nywako lok ki winye madit tutwal, joo matye ki twero guwinye I kom lok eni. Macalo adwogi ne, dul me cungu iwi bye mukene gumiyo lok eni bot dul enoni.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ipegeta luipu keda ipegeta, apotu itunga luka atutubet kopedosi acamanar kanuikamunitos akirot ngin. Kanuka ngun, apotu ipatei ice ijukasi akiro nu atukot ngin.
lgg_prompt: E'yo onzeza angiri azini otuta ma vutia, 'ba ambo ndundu 'diyi esu ti ecita e'yo 'da ma dria ra. E'yo 'disi, amuti azi 'diyi 'ba e'yo 'di amuti nde ma drilea.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okuhanuura n'okuteesa munonga, abu kirikukwataho bakaikirizana aha nshonga eriho. N'ekyarugiremu,ebibiina ebindi bitwaire enshonga egi omu kakiiko.

eng_prompt: Following a thorough review of the financial records, the team prepared for the upcoming evaluation. As part of the compliance process, the organization has been assessed by the auditors.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okwekenneenya obulungi ebiwandiiko by'ebyensimbi, ttiimu yeetegekera okwekenneenya okujja. Ng'omu ku mitendera gy'okugoberera amateeka, ekitongole kyekenneenyezeddwa ababalirizi b'ebitabo.
ach_prompt: Ingee ngiyo rekod me lim maber tutwal, dul ne oyubbe pi ngiyo kor tic matye kabino anyim. Macalo yoo acel me lubu cik, joo ma ngiyo kor tic ki lim I dul enoni gutimo kwed I kom dul enoni.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka airereonor akiro nuka ikapun, apotu etimu itemonokinos kanu airereonor nu ebeit aswam. Kwape ediope kotoma ainapeta nuka aitup ikisila, engicete engican ikapun luka atukot ngin.
lgg_prompt: E'yo robia ni 'diyi ma ale andrizu kililiru 'bori ma vutia, amuti 'da otu i e'yo emupi 'diyi ma ale andrizu. E'yo azita vuti obiza niri ma azi ru, 'ba e'yo robia ayupi 'diyi ma pamvu onepi 'diyi ebi amuti nde ma pamvu andri ra.

eng_prompt: During the press conference, I had the opportunity to engage with various leaders. As the discussion turned to the upcoming election, I seized the moment to inquire about the President's opinion on the candidate.
lug_prompt: Mu lukungaana lwa bannamawulire, nnafuna omukisa okwogera n'abakulembeze ab'enjawulo. Okukubaganya ebirowoozo bwe kwali ku kulonda okubindabinda, nakozesa akaseera kano okubuuza ku ndowooza ya Pulezidenti ku yeesimbyewo.
ach_prompt: Ikare me lok ki luco lok angeya, anongo gum me lok ki lutela ma padi padi. I kare ma lok odok I kom yer matye kabino, amako kare ne me penyo tam pa ladit lobo I kom lacungu enoni.
teo_prompt: Kotoma apak naka einer keda lu iyemuto, abu eong adum arerengu na einer keda engarenok luegelegela. Kwape apotu ineresinei kiswamaunos nuikamunitos aseo naebunit, abu eong abu kodum apak ngin aingitingit nuikamunitos aomisioit naka lokapolon akwap kanuikamunitos abwoan kangin.
lgg_prompt: Sawa 'bani e'yo nzezu 'ba osisia ni 'diyi pie risi, ma isu drileba e'yo nzezu drice'ba ndundu eyi pie. E'yo onzeza ni i ojazu opeta emupi 'diyi ma dria, ma 'du sawa 'di ozizu egata purezidenti ni 'ba pa tupi 'diyi ma dria ri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Omu ruteerane rw'abanyamakuru, nkabona omugisha gw'okugamba n'abebembezi batari bamwe. Okuhanuura ku kwahindukire aha buruuru oburikwija, nkakoresa obwire kubuuza ebiteekateeko bya mukuru w'eihanga aha muntu oyesimbireho.

eng_prompt: During a recent rally, the candidate expressed confidence in his team's abilities. He emphasized the support they have received from the community and their commitment to addressing key issues.
lug_prompt: Mu lukungaana olwaliwo gye buvuddeko awo, eyeesimbyewo yalaga obwesige mu busobozi bwa ttiimu ye. Yakikkaatirizza obuwagizi bwe bafunye okuva mu kitundu n'obumalirivu bwabwe mu kukola ku nsonga enkulu.
ach_prompt: I kare me coko ma okato cokcok-ki, lacungu ne onyuto tek cwiny I kom kero pa tim mege. En oloko tutwal I kom kony ma gunongo kibot lwak kacel ki keto cwiny gi me cobo peko mapigi tego.
teo_prompt: Kotoma aisup aseeta napac, abu abwoan itodu amuno naka etimu ke. Abu ngesi kitogogong agangat na adumutu kesi kanejaas itunga keda ainakina kec aitemokin atiokisio nuepolok.
lgg_prompt: Sawa ti odazaniri ma alia, 'ba pa sopi 'da ece asi'baza okpo amuti ivile 'diyiniri ma dria ra. Eri 'ba asi atita eyini esu engazu ongulumu eyivu ri ma dria tualu asi 'baza eyini e'yo okporu 'diyi ma aza kozu ri be.
nyn_prompt: Omu hururu y'obwahati, oyesimbireho, akooreka obwesigye omu maani ga tiimu ye. Akashoboorora obushagiki obubatungire kuruga omu bantu n'okwehayo kwabo kukora aha nshonga nkuru.

eng_prompt: As the pandemic continues to evolve, researchers and healthcare professionals are exploring various methods to combat the virus. Understanding the available therapies is crucial for effective patient care and recovery.
lug_prompt: Ng'ekirwadde bbunansi kigenda mu maaso, abanoonyereza n'abakugu mu byobulamu banoonyereza ku ngeri ez'enjawulo ez'okulwanyisa akawuka. Okutegeera obujjanjabi obuliwo kya mugaso nnyo mu kulabirira omulwadde obulungi n'okuwona.
ach_prompt: I kare ma two korona tye kamedde anyim, lukwed ki ludiro me yot kom tye ka yenyo yoo mapat-pat me lweny i kom two eni. Niang yoo me cango two matye pire tek tutwal pi kony ki cang pa lutwo.
teo_prompt: Kwape inyikokinit adeka naka ekorona aijulanakin, eutasi angicak keda ipirioitin luka angaleu aingic iwaitin luegelegela lu itikitikere ekorona. Amisikin amukian nu ejaas erai ibore yenepol noi kanu aidar adekak ejok ka angaleun.
lgg_prompt: Azo ongulumu karakara eyi ezapiri ni mu drile, 'ba e'yo ondapi 'diyi tualu 'ba azi ngapi arojoa 'diyi pie geri ndundu eyini ecozu a'di 'dizu azo 'da be 'diyi onda. Geri aro esuzu 'diyi ma vata eri orodriru 'ba azoru 'diyi ma tambazu kililiru azini atita esuzu.
nyn_prompt: Oburwaire burikugyenda omu maisho, abakyondoozi hamwe n'abakugu omu by'amagara bariyo nibasherura oburyo bw'okurwanisa akakooko. Okwetegyereza emibazi eriho n'eky'omugasho ahabw'okureeberera kurungi abarwaire n'okukira.

eng_prompt: Access to healthcare is a fundamental right that impacts the well-being of every citizen. Ensuring that all individuals receive adequate medical care is essential for a thriving society.
lug_prompt: Okufuna obujjanjabi ddembe lya musingi erikwata ku mbeera ya buli munnansi. Okukakasa nti abantu bonna bafuna obujjanjabi obumala kya mugaso eri ekitundu okukulaakulana.
ach_prompt: Nongo kony me yot kom obedo twero ma pire tek tutwal ma gudo kwo pa anywali acel-acel. Neno ni dano weng gunongo kony me yot kom maber obedo gin ma pire tek pi dongo lobo.
teo_prompt: Adumunun amukian erai apedor na itunga kere. Aanyun ebe edumunenete itunga kere amukian naedolit erai ibore yenepol noi kanu apol.
lgg_prompt: E'yo aro esuzu ri eri drilemgbo azi orodriru kari mva dria eyini aa'zu muke ri i. E'yo nezu ra kini 'ba dria eyi aro esu kililiru ri eri orodriru ongulumu eyini zozu.
nyn_prompt: Okutunga obuheereza bw'eby'amagara, n'obugabe bw'omutaano oburikukwata ahamagara ga buri muntu. Okureeba ngu abantu boona batunga obujanjabi burikumara, n'eky'omugasho ahabw'obuhangwa kutunguuka.

eng_prompt: In today's society, there are many risks associated with social interactions. For various reasons, some people believe it's safer to limit contact with others, especially women.
lug_prompt: Mu bantu b'ennaku zino, waliwo obuzibu bungi obukwatagana n'okukolagana n'abantu. Olw'ensonga ez'enjawulo, abantu abamu balowooza nti kirungi okukomya okukwatagana n'abalala naddala abakyala.
ach_prompt: I kabedo me kwo me kare-ni, peko mapol tye ma kubbe ki kubbe ikin dano. Pi tyen lok mapol, jo mukene gitye ki tam ni ber tutwal me gengo kube ki dano mukene tutwalle mon.
teo_prompt: Kotoma atutubet naka lolo, ipu atiokisio nu ikamanara keda aineranara keda itunga. Kanuka akiro nuegelegela, eomitos icetunga ebe ejokuna aitidisiar arucokina keda luce kacut angor.
lgg_prompt: Ongulumu ewu andruri ma alea 'diyi ma alea, e'yo onzi eyi ecipi 'ba eyi ma eselea 'diyi pie 'diyi karakara. E'yo ndundu eyi si, 'ba azi 'diyi ega kini eri muke ndeni eyi ma aa'ta 'ba azi 'diyi pie ri ma omgbo esizu, tutuni oku eyi pie ri ma omgbo esizu.
nyn_prompt: Omu bantu b'erizooba, hariho oburemeezi bwingi oburikukwata aha kukorengana n'abantu. Ahabw'eshonga nyingi, abantu abamwe nibateekateeka ngu nikirungi okukyendeeza okuhikaana n'abandi, namunonga abakazi.

eng_prompt: Ensuring equal access to essential resources is a fundamental principle of a just society. It is crucial that all individuals, regardless of their background, can benefit from the services provided by the government.
lug_prompt: Okukakasa obwenkanya mu kufuna ebintu ebikulu gwe musingi omukulu ogw'ekitundu ekirimu obwenkanya. Kya mugaso nnyo abantu bonna, awatali kufaayo ku nsibuko yaabwe, okuganyulwa mu buweereza obuweebwa gavumenti.
ach_prompt: Neno ni dano weng nongo jami ma mite pi kwo gi obedo gin ma pire tek I kabedo ma dano tye iye. Pire tek tutwal ni dano weng, labongo paro pi kama gi aa ki iye, omyero gunong ber pa kony ma gamente miyo.
teo_prompt: Aitogogong adumunun iboro lu itwasamao ejok erai ainapeta nu ekotoi kotoma atutubet. Erai ibore yenepol noi itunga kere, araida eponitos kesi, aimedaun kotoma aijanakino nu ijaikini apugan.
lgg_prompt: Geri 'bani ecozu afa orodriru 'diyi esuzu trotro ri eri e'yo okporu ongulumu kililiru 'diyiniri'i. Eri orodriru 'ba dria eyini aa'zu engazu angu ndundu eyi ma alea ra 'diyi ecozu orodri esuzu engazu azakoma gamete ni 'diyi vu ra.
nyn_prompt: Okureeba ngu abantu boona batunga ebintu by'omugasho, n'omusingye gw'oburingaaniza omu bantu. N'eky'omugasho kureeba ngu abantu boona, oihiremu oburugo bwabo, nibagasirwa omu buheereza bwa gavumenti.

eng_prompt: In a climate where misinformation spreads rapidly and trust in institutions is waning, political discourse often becomes polarized. As a result, genuine debate and constructive criticism are frequently overshadowed by partisanship and personal attacks.
lug_prompt: Mu mbeera nga obubaka obukyamu busaasaana mangu ate nga n'obwesige mu bitongole bukendedde, emboozi z'ebyobufuzi zitera okubaamu enjawukana. N'ekivuddemu, okukubaganya ebirowoozo okwa nnamaddala n'okunenya ebizimba bitera okubuutikirwa obusosoze mu bibiina n'okulumbagana okw'obuntu.
ach_prompt: I kare ma lok angea ma pe atir tye ka nyaa oyot-oyot tutwal ki gen i kom dul mapat-pat tye ka rweny, lok me cungu iwi-bye ipol kare kelo apoka-poka. Macalo adwogi ne, laro lok matir ki kwero lok matye ki tyen lok mabeco ipol kare bedo macalo adwogi me bedo ki dul me cungu iwi-bye mapat-pat kacel ki lweny i kom ngat acel acel.
teo_prompt: Kotoma ojautene loekorete akiro nuarokok katipet ido mam itunga emunokina iriongeta, epedorete akiro nuka politikis aimorikikin. Kanuka ngun, epeget loajokan keda aitoroneta nuejokuka etapit duc aibiror kanuka atiakatiaka keda asurokinio naka itunga.
lgg_prompt: Angu 'bani e'yo onzi eyi erezu mbeleru dika asi'baza amuti politiki ni 'diyi ma alea ri ma omgbo esi ra, e'yo nzeza politiki ni 'diyi ma esele co eyi sa'wa driasi. E'yo 'disi, agbatara kililiru azini e'yo nzeza kililiru 'diyi e'yo opendu ni azini e'yo 'ba yi ma ngulupi ni 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Omu bwire obu amakuru g'ebishobobo garikujanjaara ahonaaho kandi obwesigye omu bitongore nibuhwaho, orubazo rw'eby'obutegyeki nirukizayo okwebaganisamu. N'ekyarugiremu, okuhanuura okw'amazima n'okuhakanisa okw'omugasho, buriijo nibisherekyerera ahabw'okushoroora omu bibiina hamwe n'okurumba omuntu weena.

eng_prompt: As he prepared for the challenging course, he reflected on his past experiences and the lessons they had taught him. With a calm demeanor and a thoughtful approach, he approached the training with a sense of purpose.
lug_prompt: Nga yeetegekera omusomo ogusoomooza, yafumiitiriza ku bye yayitamu emabega n'eby'okuyiga bye byamuyigiriza. Olw'okuba yali mukkakkamu era ng'afumiitiriza, yatendekebwa n'ekigendererwa.
ach_prompt: I kare ma en tye ka yubbe pi kwan matek tutwal, en otamo I kom jami ma okato ki iye ki pwony ma en onongo. Ki cwiny ma opye mot ki tam matut, en ocako pwonye ne ki cwiny me bedo ki tyen lok.
teo_prompt: Neautar ngesi aitemonokin kanuka ekoosi loetiono noi, abu ngesi koomoom nueswamauna ngesi kapakio nukokau keda aisisiaeta nuesisianakinete kesi ngesi. Keda iponesio luajokak ka aomisio, abu ngesi kopedo aituutoorio ngin keda apeleikinet.
lgg_prompt: Erini i oturia kosi ewaru 'da ni, eri ega e'yo erini ebi 'ye drio 'diyi ma dria azini e'yo erini oni 'diyi ma dria. Adriza e'yere azini geri egata be, eri e'do embata 'da asi driasi.
nyn_prompt: Obu yaabaire nayetebeekanisiza omushomo ogurimu oburemeezi, akateekateeka aha bi yaarabiremu enyima hamwe n'ebyegyese. N'emitwarize y'obucureera hamwe n'omuringo gw'okuteekateeka, akatandika okutendekwa n'ekigyendererwa.

eng_prompt: After weeks of planning and preparation, the villagers gathered in the town square, excited for the festivities to begin. With colorful decorations and delicious food set up, the atmosphere was filled with anticipation and joy.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lwa wiiki eziwera nga bategese n'okwetegeka, abantu b'oku kyalo baakuÅ‹Å‹aanidde mu kibangirizi ky'ekibuga nga beesunga nnyo ebikujjuko okutandika. Embeera yabadde ejjudde okweraliikirira n'essanyu olw'okusiimibwa kwa langi ez'enjawulo n'emmere ewooma eyali eteekeddwawo.
ach_prompt: Ingee cabit mapol me yube ki yubbe, lutedero gugure i town square, cwinygi obedo yom pi yub me cako. Ki deyo me rangi mapat-pat ki cam mamit tutwal ma kiketo I kabedo ne, dano gubedo ki miti ki yom-cwiny madit tutwal.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka isabitin lu aitemonokin ka aitemonokin, apotu itunga luka atutubet kotukokinos kotoma aiboisit naka etaun, iyalamasi noi kanu epucit ageun. Keda aiboisio nuibusiak nuibusiak ka inyamat luajokak, apol noi aiyalama keda aiyalama.
lgg_prompt: Sabiti 'bani otita eyi o'bazu azini eyi otuzu 'bori ma vutia, 'ba calo'a 'diyi tra eyi aku ambu tawuni niri ma alea ayiko be ayiko si omu 'da ni e'dozu. Afa edeza wura ndu ndu 'diyisi azini nyaka ndrizaru 'bani o'ba 'diyi pie, angu nderi ga asi 'baza azini ayiko si tre.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'esande z'okuteekateekyera hamwe n'okweteekateekyera, abantu b'omubyaro baketeeranira omu kibangirizi ky'orurembo, bashemereirwe ahabw'okujaguza kutandika. Ahabw'okushemeza kw'erangi nungi hamwe n'eby'okurya birungi, embeera ekaba eijwire amatsiko n'okushemererwa.

eng_prompt: After a busy week of work, he finally gathered all the invoices that had piled up. Now, he has a lot of people to pay today.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lwa wiiki empanvu ey'emirimu, yasembyeyo okukung'aanya invoice zonna ezaali zikung'aanyiziddwa. Alina abantu bangi leero b'alina okusasula.
ach_prompt: Ingee tic matek tutwal I cabit acel, en ocoko invoice weng ma onongo gugure. En tye ki dano mapol ma omyero oculgi tin.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka esabiti loepol noi loka aswam, abu ngesi kodum invoices kere luetukunitai. Kwana, ejaasi ngesi keda itunga luipu luibusakinit ngesi aitac ilolo.
lgg_prompt: Sabiti azi ngazuri ma vutia, eri tra asizu invoice dria 'bani tra 'bo 'diyi ra. Sawa 'disi, eri vu 'ba 'bani ofezaru andru 'diyi karakara.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'esande y'emirimo mingi, ahamuheru akarundaana za invoice zoona ezabaire zitungire. Hati, aine abantu baingi b'okushashura erizooba.

eng_prompt: During his visit to the community, Kagame praised the residents for their dedication and commitment to improving their surroundings. He emphasized the importance of their efforts in fostering development and unity within the region.
lug_prompt: Mu kukyala kwe mu kitundu, Kagame yatendereza abatuuze olw'obumalirivu n'obumalirivu bwabwe mu kutumbula ebitundu ebibeetoolodde. Yakikkaatirizza obukulu bw'okufuba kwabwe mu kutumbula enkulaakulana n'obumu mu kitundu.
ach_prompt: I kare ma en olimo kabedo enuni, Kagame opwoyo lutedero pi tic matek ma gutimo me yubu kabedo gi. En oketo cwinye tutwal I kom ber pa tute gi me kelo dongo lobo ki ribe I but lobo eni.
teo_prompt: Kotoma aipejokin ngesi itunga, abu Kagame itur itunga kanu ainakina kec keda ainakina kec kanu aitojokar aiboisio kec. Abu ngesi kitogogong ajokis naka aswam kec kanu aitopoloria apol keda aimorikikina kotoma aiboisit.
lgg_prompt: Sawa erini muzu omuru ongulumu 'da ma alea risi, Kagame fe awa'difo 'ba aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi dri eyini asi 'bazu e'yo angu eyini aa'zu 'diyi ma alea ri ma omgbo otuzu risi. Eri 'ba asi orodri okpo eyini 'ba angu ezoma ni azini ti ecita angu 'da ma alea ri ma omgbo otuzu ri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Omu kutaayaaya kwe omu kyanga, Kagame akasiima abatuuragye ahabw'okwehayo n'okwehayo kutunguura ebyetorwaire. Akashoboorora omugasho gw'amaani gaabo omu kutunguura entunguuka n'okukwatanisa omu kyanga.

eng_prompt: As the discussion reached a critical point, he sensed the need for clarity and direction. With a firm yet encouraging tone, he addressed the crowd.
lug_prompt: Ng'okukubaganya ebirowoozo kutuuse ku ssa ery'amaanyi, yawulira obwetaavu bw'okutangaaza n'obulagirizi. Mu ddoboozi erinywevu naye nga lizzaamu amaanyi, yayogeddeko eri abantu.
ach_prompt: I kare ma nywako lok ne oo kama tek tutwal, en oniang ni mite ni omyero gunyut niango ki yoo maber. En oloko ki lwak ki dwan matek dok ma cuku cwiny dano.
teo_prompt: Neadolunia airiamunet ngin aiboisit naepol noi, abu ngesi koany ebe ibusakinit ngesi aitetem akiro ngun. Keda eporoto loegogong konye lo isinyikokit, abu ngesi iner nejaas itunga.
lgg_prompt: E'yo onzeza 'da ni cazu e'yo azi okporu ni ma alea risi, eri esu e'yo 'bani lezu e'yo nzezu kililiru azini driceza fezu 'diyi ma dria ra. Eri nze e'yo 'ba emu'ba 'diyi pie o'duko okporu te ava feza be.
nyn_prompt: Okuhanuura ku kwahikire aha muheru, akareeba ekyetengo ky'okutangaaza n'obwebembezi. N'eiraka ry'amaani kandi eririkugaruramu amaani, akagambira abantu.

eng_prompt: The audience was captivated from the moment he stepped onto the stage. With a commanding presence and a wealth of knowledge, he effortlessly engaged everyone in the room.
lug_prompt: Abantu baakwatibwako okuva lwe yalinnya ku siteegi. Olw'okubeerawo kwe okw'amaanyi n'obumanyirivu bwe, yasikiriza buli omu mu kisenge awatali kufuba kwonna.
ach_prompt: Lwak gubedo ki miti madit tutwal I kare ma en odonyo I wi abam. Ki bedo tye mege madit tutwal ki ngec ma en tye kwede, en okelo miti pa dano weng I ot ne labongo tute.
teo_prompt: Apotu itunga ikamunitos akaulo na abwounor ngesi toma ositesen. Keda ajaut ke naepol noi keda acoa naepol noi, abu ngesi kisinyikok itunga kere luejaas agola ngin.
lgg_prompt: Ba emu'ba 'diyi ovu ndra ayikosi e'dozu sawa erini pa sozu pari avitaniri ma dria 'bori ma vutia. Aa'ta erini okporu azini ondua be angiri risi, eri 'du e'yo 'ba dria jo ale aliza ma alia 'diyi ma dria ewakokoru.
nyn_prompt: Abantu bakashemezibwa kuruga obu yaahika aha sitegi. Ahabw'okugira ngu akaba ariho kandi aine n'obwengye bwingi, akareetera buri omwe omu kishengye kwejumba.

eng_prompt: After reviewing the financial situation, the school administration decided to issue refunds. Parents had expressed concerns about the unexpected increase in fees earlier this year.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okwekenneenya embeera y'ensimbi, abakulembeze b'essomero baasalawo okuzzaayo ssente. Abazadde baali balaze obweraliikirivu olw'okulinnyisibwa kw'ebisale by'essomero okwali tekusuubirwa ku ntandikwa y'omwaka guno.
ach_prompt: Ingee ngiyo kit ma lim tye kwede, ludito me gang kwan gumoko tamgi me dwoko cente. Lunyodo gubedo ki lworo I kom medo wel cul me univaciti I acaki me mwaka ni.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka airereor ejautene loka ikapun, abu eyaitene lo esomero koseu aitac ikapun. Apotu auriak itodutu aiyalongongokec kanuka aiyatakinio naka isirigin luka esomero ageunet naka ekaru kalo.
lgg_prompt: E'yo robia ni 'diyi ma ale andrizu 'bori ma vutia, driceza sukulu niri asi e'yo 'du robia ofezu ra. Tipika eyi ece asi otiza eyini e'yo sukulu fizi otuza 'bani ega kokoru eli 'di ni e'doria risi.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okushwijuma embeera y'esente, abebembezi b'eishomero bakasharamu kugarurayo esente. Abazaire bakaba boorekire okwerarikirira kwabo ahabw'okwongyeza ebishare by'eishomero omu ntandikwa y'omwaka ogu.

eng_prompt: After the devastating natural disaster, many families lost their homes and livelihoods. In response to the widespread suffering, the government paid money to compensate the victims.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'akatyabaga k'obutonde, amaka mangi gaafiirwa amaka gaabwe n'eby'okweyimirizaawo. Olw'okubonaabona okwaliwo, gavumenti yasasula ssente okuliyirira abo abaakosebwa.
ach_prompt: Ingee peko ma poto atura man, lugangi mapol orwenyo gangi gi ki jami ma mite pi kwo gi. Macalo adwogi me deno can ma onyaa tutwal, gamente oculu cente me culu jo ma onongo peko.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka atiokisio nu akwap, apotu ikalia luipu kotwakiasi ireriakec keda aijarakec. Kanu aitemokin atiokisio nuipu, abu apugan kotac ikapun kanu atacakin ngul luetirorit.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru nyakuni 'da ma vutia, familia karakara eyi avi aku eyivile 'diyi tualu geri eyini aa'zu edriru 'diyi pie. E'yo candi esuzuri ma e'yosi, gamete ofe robia 'ba e'yo ewaru isu'baa 'diyi ma arioti ofezu.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'ebihikiirizi by'obuhangwa, amaka maingi gakaferwa amaka gaago hamwe n'eby'okwebeisaho. Gavumenti, ahabw'okubonabona kw'abantu baingi, ekashashura esente z'okurihirira abo abateganisiibwe.

eng_prompt: The economic challenges facing the country have led to a significant decline in job opportunities. As a result, many individuals are struggling to find stable employment.
lug_prompt: Okusoomoozebwa kw'ebyenfuna eggwanga kwe lyolekaganye nakwo kuleetedde okukendeera kw'emirimu. N'ekivuddemu, abantu bangi bafuba okufuna emirimu egy'olubeerera.
ach_prompt: Peko me can lim ma lobo man tye ka kato ki iye oweko tic odok piny tutwal. Macalo adwogi ne, dano mapol tye ka tute matek me nongo tic ma rii.
teo_prompt: Atiokisio nuka ikapun nuetereikina keda akwapuwok eyangautu aibiror naka aswamisinei. Kanuka ngun, eutasi itunga luipu ainingosit adumun aswamisinei nuegogong.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru e'yo robia ni ma alia kari ni esu 'diyi fe drileba azi ni 'diyi ma omgbo esi ra. E'yo 'disi, 'ba karakara eyi dri ci azi aa'pi ewu drialeri ma alea 'diyi esuzu.
nyn_prompt: Oburemeezi bw'eby'entaasya obu eihanga ririkushanga, bureteire emirimo kukyendeera munonga. N'ekyarugiremu, abantu baingi nibarwana kuronda emirimo y'obutuura.

eng_prompt: During the event, the audience eagerly awaited the speaker's arrival, hoping for words of wisdom and encouragement. As the lights dimmed, the atmosphere buzzed with anticipation for the incumbent's address.
lug_prompt: Mu kiseera ky'omukolo, abawuliriza balindirira n'essanyu okutuuka kw'omwogezi, nga basuubira ebigambo eby'amagezi n'okuzzaamu amaanyi. Ebitaala bwe byagenda bikendeera, abantu baali beesunga okwogera kw'omukulembeze aliko mu buyinza.
ach_prompt: Ikare me yub eni, lwak obedo kakuru oo pa lalok, kun gigeno lok me ryeko ki cuku cwiny. I kare ma mac obedo ka rweny, dano gubedo ki miti me winyo lok pa ladit lobo matye I ker kombedi.
teo_prompt: Kotoma opucit kangol, apotu itunga idarakisi adolun naka eraban, aomitos ebe epote kesi einer akiro nuka acoa ka aisinyikokinit. Neautar akimian aibiror, apotu itunga kojaikinos keda eipud loka einer loka lokapolon akwap.

eng_prompt: After years of reflection and self-discovery, I've finally found my true passions. With newfound clarity and determination, I am ready to embark on an exciting journey.

eng_prompt: After months of legal battles and public outcry, the advocates gathered outside the courthouse, holding signs and chanting for justice. Their determination was fueled by the belief that he had been wrongfully convicted.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'emyezi gy'entalo z'amateeka n'okukaaba kw'abantu, abawolereza baakuÅ‹Å‹aanidde wabweru wa kkooti nga bakutte ebipande era nga bakuba enduulu nga baagala obwenkanya. Okumalirira kwabwe kwava ku ndowooza nti yali asaliddwa omusango mu bukyamu.
ach_prompt: Ingee dwe mapol me lweny i kom cik ki koko pa lwak, lupilida gucokke woko ki iot kot kun gitye ka mako lanyut ma nyutu ni gimito ngolo kop atir. Gin gumoko tamgi pien onongo gitye ki tam ni ki ngolo kop i kome labongo bal.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ilapio luka ijiisio luka ikisila keda aimony naka itunga, apotu ipulidan kotukokinos kokinga naka adieket, itingata apapulai kosodete aikwenyar ebe ekotosi kesi etube loajokan. Apotu kesi kopedosi aswam ngun naarai aomitos kesi ebe aponi otubokinai ngesi kotoma aibucaret.

E'yo 'bani egazu kini 'ba ombe eri e'yo onzi si ri fe eyini asi 'bazu e'yo 'yezu drile.

eng_prompt: In preparation for the upcoming road safety campaign, officials have announced new measures to ensure compliance. As part of these measures, all driving permits will be inspected.
lug_prompt: Mu kwetegekera kakuyege w'obukuumi bw'enguudo ogujja, abakungu balangiridde enkola empya okukakasa okugobererwa. Ng'ekimu ku bigenda okukolebwa, pamiti z'abavuzi b'ebidduka zonna zijja kukeberebwa.

eng_prompt: In an effort to enhance road safety and reduce accidents, new regulations have been implemented. These measures aim to ensure that all individuals operating vehicles meet specific training and licensing standards.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'okutumbula obukuumi ku nguudo n'okukendeeza ku bubenje, amateeka amapya gateekeddwa mu nkola. Enkola zino zigendereddwamu okukakasa nti abantu bonna abaddukanya emmotoka batuukiriza emitendera egy'okutendekebwa n'okuweebwa layisinsi.
ach_prompt: I tute me medo rwom me gwoko ber bedo I gudu ki dwoko piny rwom me peko me gudi, kiketo cik manyen I tic. Yub eni tye me neno ni dano weng matye ka dwoyo mutoka tye ka nongo pwony ki lancic ma mite.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitogogong ayuara na irotin ka aitidisiar akangasia, aponi ibwaikinai ikisila luitetiak. Alosikinet naka ainapeta ngun ngesi awanyun ebe itunga kere luitolosete amotokan itodolikinete adoketait na etuutoorio ka alasisi.
lgg_prompt: Okpo 'bazu e'yo nzila ni 'diyi ma tambazu azini drileonzi eyi ma omgbo esizu, 'ba e'do azita o'diru eyi 'yeta ma alea. E'yo 'diyi lezu nezu ra kini 'ba dria mutukari onzupi 'diyi ma otita imbatani azini kokobi driwala fezu 'diyi ma dria.

eng_prompt: Despite advancements in safety measures, the number of incidents on the roads continues to rise. Each year, countless families are affected by the tragic consequences of these events.

nyn_prompt: Oihireho entunguuka omu by'okwerinda, omuhendo gwa butandu aha nguuto nigugumizamu kweyongyera. Buri mwaka, amaka maingi nigateganisibwa oburemeezi oburikuruga omu bintu ebi.

eng_prompt: After careful consideration of their qualifications and experience, the selection committee reached a consensus. Each candidate demonstrated exceptional skills and a strong commitment to the role.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okwekenneenya ebisaanyizo byabwe n'obumanyirivu, akakiiko akalonda kaatuuka ku nzikiriziganya. Buli eyeesimbyewo yalaze obukugu obw'enjawulo n'obumalirivu obw'amaanyi eri omulimu.
ach_prompt: Ingee ngiyo ki diro rwom me kwan gi ki ngec gi, dul ma oyero lutino guwinye. Ngat acel-acel ma obedo I peny onyuto diro ki miti matek tutwal I kom tic ne.

eng_prompt: As he stood at the crossroads, uncertainty clouded his mind. The weight of the decision ahead felt heavier than ever.
lug_prompt: Bwe yali ayimiridde ku nkulungo, okubuusabuusa kwamubuutikira. Obuzito bw'okusalawo mu maaso bwawulikika ng'obuzito okusinga bwe kyali kibadde.

eng_prompt: In the heart of East Africa lies Buganda, a kingdom rich in history and tradition. Its leadership is steeped in cultural significance, making the role of the king particularly unique.
lug_prompt: Mu mutima gwa East Africa mulimu Buganda, obwakabaka obugagga mu byafaayo n'ennono. Obukulembeze bwayo bujjudde obuwangwa, ekifuula omulimu gwa kabaka ogw'enjawulo.

teo_prompt: Kotoma atutubet naka East Africa ejai Buganda, ajakanut naejaasi keda akiro nukolosek keda inonosio. Erai engarenonekec lo epol ajokis na einono, ijaikini aswam naka ekabaka na itegelikina.
lgg_prompt: Kari Africa ma kala etuni efurialeru ri ma alea, Buganda, kari opi nyaza ni e'yo a'di ni azini a'bi ni 'diyi be angiri. Driceza erini ri ma orodri e'yo suruni 'diyi ma alia angiri, erini fezu azi opi niri ni aa'zu ndu.
nyn_prompt: Omu mutima gwa Afirika y'oburugwa izooba harimu Buganda, obugabe burimu ebyafaayo n'eby'obuhangwa. Obwebembezi bwabwo nibukwata munonga ahaby'obuhangwa, ekirikureetera omurimo gwa kabaka kuba ogw'omutaano munonga.

eng_prompt: In many cultures, rulers are often bestowed with titles that reflect their lineage, achievements, or the regions they govern. This practice not only honors their legacy but also signifies their multifaceted roles in society.
lug_prompt: Mu buwangwa bungi, abafuzi batera okuweebwa ebitiibwa ebiraga olunyiriri lwabwe, ebituukiddwaako, oba ebitundu bye bafuga. Enkola eno tekoma ku kuwa kitiibwa busika bwabwe naye era era etegeeza emirimu gyabwe egy'enjawulo mu kitundu.
ach_prompt: I tekwaro mapol, luloc ipol kare ki minigi nying ma nyutu kaka gi, jami ma gutimo, onyo kabedo ma giloyo. Tim man pe keto deyo I kom nying gi keken ento bene nyutu tic gi mapat-pat I kabedo wa.
teo_prompt: Kotoma inonosio luipu, einanakinio engarenok apapulai nu itodunitos atekerin kec, aitodolinikineta kec, arai aiboisio nu epugaete kesi. Mam aswamisioit na itodunit arerengu kec bon konye itodunit aswamisinei kec nuegelegela kotoma atutubet.
lgg_prompt: E'yo suruni karakara eyi ma alea, 'ba drice'ba eyi ma dria dria dria eyini e'dazu eyi ma suru eyi ma alea, e'yo eyini 'ye 'diyi ma alea, kani ku angu eyini opi nyazu 'diyi ma alea. Yeta 'diri ngani lu inzita fe e'yo yini 'diyi ma dria ku te ece vini azi yini ndundu ongulumu eyi ma alea 'diyi ma dria indi.
nyn_prompt: Omu buhangwa bwingi, abategyeki nibakira kuhebwa ebitiinisa ebirikworeka enzarwa yaabo, ebibaakozire, nainga ebicweka ebibarikutegyeka. Enkora egi terikuheereza ekitiinisa eby'obuhangwa bwabo kyonka, kureka neeyoreka n'emirimo yaabo etari emwe n'emwe omu bantu.

eng_prompt: During the grand ceremony, the historian recounted the lineage of the royal family. As he spoke, he highlighted the significance of each ruler in shaping the kingdom's history.
lug_prompt: Ku mukolo omukulu, munnabyafaayo yayogedde olunyiriri lw'obuzaale bw'obwakabaka. Ng'ayogera, yalambika obukulu bwa buli mufuzi mu kukola ebyafaayo by'obwakabaka.
ach_prompt: Ikare me yub madit, lacoc ma okwano lok me tekwaro oloko I kom kaka pa rwot. I kare ma en tye ka lok, en onyuto ber pa laloc acel acel I yubu tekwaro me ker ne.
teo_prompt: Kotoma opucit loapolon abu ewadikan akiro nukakolo kitetem akiro nuka ekale loka ekabaka. Kwape abu ngesi iner, abu ngesi kitetem ajokis naka apugan adiope kotoma aitolomun akiro nukolo nuka ajakanut.
lgg_prompt: Omu inzile inzi ri ma alea, 'ba e'yo a'dani 'diyi ece e'yo familia opi ni 'diyiniri ra. Erini e'yo nzeria, ece orodri 'ba dria opi ru 'diyi ni e'yo kari ni 'diyi ma driari ra.
nyn_prompt: Aha mukoro gw'amaani, omuhandiiki w'ebyafaayo akagamba aha rugaro rw'obugabe. Obu yaabaire nagamba, akashoboorora omugasho gwa buri mwebembezi omu kukora ebyafaayo by'obugabe.

eng_prompt: The governor has called for an urgent discussion regarding the new budget proposals. All relevant stakeholders are expected to attend.
lug_prompt: Gavana asabye wabeewo okukubaganya ebirowoozo okw'amangu ku mbalirira empya. Abakwatibwako bonna ab'omugaso basuubirwa okubeerawo.

eng_prompt: After extensive discussions and negotiations, the team has finally reached a consensus on the financial matters at hand. Now, they can focus on addressing the remaining concerns regarding the taxes.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okuteesa ennyo n'okuteesa, ttiimu emalirizza okukkaanya ku nsonga z'ensimbi eziriwo. Kati, basobola okussa essira ku kukola ku nsonga ezisigaddewo ezikwata ku misolo.

eng_prompt: We need to finalize the schedule for our upcoming discussions. Let's confirm the time for the meeting.
lug_prompt: Twetaaga okumaliriza enteekateeka y'okukubaganya ebirowoozo kwaffe okujja. Ka tukakasize obudde bw'olukiiko.

eng_prompt: In a heated debate about women's rights, various opinions emerged among the attendees. While some argued against the proposed legislation, others firmly believed it would benefit their community.
lug_prompt: Mu kukubaganya ebirowoozo okw'amaanyi ku ddembe ly'abakyala, endowooza ez'enjawulo zaavaayo mu abo abaaliwo. Wadde ng'abamu baawakanya etteeka eryo, abalala baali bakakafu nti lyandiganyudde ekitundu kyabwe.
ach_prompt: I kare me laro lok matek tutwal I kom twero pa mon, tam mapat-pat okatti I kin joo ma obedo tye. Kadi bed ni jo mukene gukwero cik man, jo mukene onongo gitye ki gen ni bikonyo kabedo gi.
teo_prompt: Kotoma opeget loepol noi loikamunit apedorosio nuka angor, apotu aomisio nuegelegela kolomutu kanejaas itunga. Karaida apotu ice kongeroto ekisil ngol, ice iyuunitos ebe ebuni aimedaun itunga kec.
lgg_prompt: Agbatara okporu drilemgbo oku yiniri ma dria ri ma alea, egata ndundu efu 'ba emu'ba 'diyi ma eselea. Ba azi 'diyi ka tro agata ga e'yo 'bani lezu azita 'da ma dria ra ti, 'ba azi 'diyi a'ira kini eri nga orodri eji ongulumu eyivile 'diyi dri.

eng_prompt: The community was in turmoil after the recent events, and tensions were running high. Many were questioning the decisions made by the authorities regarding the treatment of certain groups.
lug_prompt: Ekitundu kyali mu butabanguko oluvannyuma lw'ebintu ebyaliwo gye buvuddeko awo, era obunkenke bwali bweyongedde. Bangi baali babuusabuusa okusalawo okwakolebwa aboobuyinza ku bikwata ku ngeri ebibinja ebimu gye biyisibwamu.
ach_prompt: Lwak gubedo ki lworo I ngee jami ma otimme cokcok-ki, ki telle bene obedo tye I kin gi. Dano mapol gubedo ki akala-kala I kom tam ma lutela omoko I kom kit ma ki tero kwede dul mogo pa dano.

nyn_prompt: Abantu bakaba bari omu butabanguko bw'amaani ahanyima y'ebyabaireho obwahati, kandi obunkenke bukaba buri ahaiguru. Baingi bakaba nibabangaanisa oku ab'obushoborozi basharamu aha bikwatiraine n'okutwaza guruupu ezimwe.

eng_prompt: Despite their impressive growth in recent years, many employees have expressed concerns about the direction of the company. This has led to a growing sentiment that they have a history of poor leadership.
lug_prompt: Wadde nga bakulaakulana nnyo mu myaka egiyise, abakozi bangi balaze obweraliikirivu ku ngeri kampuni gy'egenda okutambuzibwamu. Kino kiviiriddeko endowooza eyeeyongera nti balina ebyafaayo by'obukulembeze obubi.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni dongo pa dul ne obedo ber tutwal I mwaki ma okato ni, lutic mapol gunyutu lworo I kom kit ma dul ne tye ka wot kwede. Man okelo tam matye kamede ni gubedo ki tela marac tutwal I kare macon.
teo_prompt: Karaida epoloete kesi noi kokaru lu atuboros, apotu eswamak luipu itodutu aiyalongongokec kanuikamunitos apugan naka ekampuni. Eyangau na aomisioit ebe ejaasi kesi keda akiro nukolo nuka eingarenone loaronon.
lgg_prompt: E'yo yini zozu onyiru eli agapi 'diyi ma alia ra ti, azi'ba karakara eyi ece asi otiza eyi geri amuti 'da ni muzu ri ma dria. E'yo 'di fe egata ni tuzu kini eyi ma driceza ewu driori ma alea ri onzi.
nyn_prompt: N'obu haraabe hariho entunguuka y'amaani omu myaka egi, abakozi baingi boorekire okwerarikirira ahabw'obwebembezi bwa kampuni. Eki kireesireho enteekateeka erikweyongyera ngu baine ebyafaayo by'obwebembezi bubi.

eng_prompt: Despite the government's assurances that the new tax system would benefit the economy, many citizens are expressing their dissatisfaction. Protests have erupted in several cities as individuals voice their concerns over the increased financial burden.
lug_prompt: Wadde nga gavumenti ekakasa nti enkola empya ey'omusolo ejja kuganyula ebyenfuna, bannansi bangi balaze obutali bumativu bwabwe. Obwegugungo bubaluseewo mu bibuga ebiwerako abantu kinnoomu bwe balaga obweraliikirivu bwabwe olw'omugugu gw'ensimbi ogweyongera.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed gamente ocikke ni yub me mucoro manyen ni bikonyo tic me lim ki biyacara, pol pa dano tye ka nyutu cwer cwinygi. Jemo ocake I citi mapol I kare ma dano acel acel tye ka nyutu lworo gi pi peko me lim matye kamede.
teo_prompt: Karaida itigogongorit apugan ebe ebuni esolo loitetet aimedaun nuka ikapun, itunga luipu itodunitos amamut aiyalamakec. Apolor aidiya koibuga luipu naarai itunga itodunitos aiyalongongokec kanuka eipuda lo ikapun lo iyatakinitai.
lgg_prompt: Gamete ni tro asi'baza fezu kini geri musoro ofeza o'diru ri ni nga orodri fe e'yo robiani 'diyi dri ra ti, kari anzi karakara eyi e'da e'yo eyini aa'zu ayikosi ku 'diyi. Ngiringiri e'do aku ambo karakara eyi ma alea 'ba eyini asi omiza e'dazu e'yo robia ma omgbo ni tuzu ri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Oihireho okuhamya kwa gavumenti ngu enkora y'emishoro ensya neija kugasira eby'entaasya, abatuuragye baingi tibarikwesiima. Okwesharinga kweyongyeire omu ndembo nyingi, abantu barikworeka okwerarikirira kwabo ahabw'oburemeezi bw'esente obweyongyeire.

eng_prompt: Many residents are struggling to afford their daily commutes. As a result, there has been growing frustration over the rising costs associated with transportation.
lug_prompt: Abatuuze bangi bazibuwalirwa okufuna ssente z'okutambula buli lunaku. N'ekivuddemu, wabaddewo obwennyamivu obweyongera olw'ebbeeyi y'entambula erinnya.
ach_prompt: Lutedero mapol tye ka yele me nongo cente me wot. Macalo adwogi ne, cwer cwiny tye kamede pi wel cul me wot matye kamede.
teo_prompt: Eutasi itunga luipu ainingosit adumun ikapun lu elosete kesi kangipaaran. Kanuka ngun, ejai aiyalongong naepol noi kanu aiyatakin etiai loka elose.
lgg_prompt: Ba karakara aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi dri ci robia esuzu acizu eyivile o'du driasi ri esuzu. E'yo 'disi, candi e'bi tu e'yo aje tupi acipa ma dria 'diyisi.
nyn_prompt: Abatuuragye baingi nibarwana kugira ngu babaase kwehisyaho entambura zaabo eza buriizooba. N'ekyarugiremu, habaireho okwetomboita ahabw'emihendo y'ebyengyenda eyeyongyeire.

eng_prompt: The crowd gathered in anticipation as the festivities began. Everyone was eager to hear the words of their esteemed leader.
lug_prompt: Abantu baakungaanidde mu ssanyu ng'ebikujjuko bitandise. Buli omu yali yeesunga okuwulira ebigambo by'omukulembeze waabwe ow'ekitiibwa.
ach_prompt: Dano gugure ma cwinygi yom tutwal I kare ma kwer ne ocake. Dano weng obedo ki miti me winyo lok pa latela gi.
teo_prompt: Apotu itunga kotukokinos lu eomitos ebe egeunete ipucito. Akoto nginitunganan apupokin akiro nuka engarenonikec lo angosibib.
lgg_prompt: O'bi eyi tra eyi asi 'baza si omu 'da ni e'doria. Ba dria ndra avaru e'yo drice'ba inzile inzi 'diyi ni 'diyi erizu.
nyn_prompt: Abantu baketeerana bategyereize okujaguza kutandika. Buri omwe akaba aine ekihika ky'okuhurira ebigambo by'omwebembezi waabo.

eng_prompt: After years of fighting for his release, the group finally gathered enough evidence to prove his innocence. Their determination grew stronger as they uncovered the truth behind the wrongful conviction.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'emyaka mingi nga balwanirira okuteebwa kwe, ekibiina kyasembayo okukung'aanya obujulizi obumala okukakasa nti talina musango. Okumalirira kwabwe kweyongera bwe baazudde amazima agali emabega w'okusingisibwa emisango egy'obulimba.
ach_prompt: Ingee lweny pi mwaki mapol pi gonye, dul ne onongo caden ma oromo me nyutu ni en pe labal. Cwiny gi odoko tek ikare ma gunongo lok ada I kom ngolo kop ma pe atir.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ikar luipu luka ejie kanu alacakin ngesi, abu egurupu kodum ajenanut naedolit kanu aitodun ebe mam ngesi ediakarit. Apotu kesi kiyatakinos noi naarai apotu kesi kongicata abeit naka emusago loaronon.
lgg_prompt: Eli karakara a'di 'dizu eri ofuzu 'bori ma vutia, amuti 'da tra asizu afa ecetaru ecepi kini eri e'yo kokoru 'diyi ra. Asi 'baza yiniri eca okporu yini e'yo ada e'yo liza onzi 'da ma dria ri esuzu 'boria.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okumara emyaka mingi barikurwanirira okurekurwa, guruupu ekahendera yaakora obujurizi oburikumara kworeka ngu taine rubanja. Okumariirira kwabo kukongyera ku baamanyire amazima agari enyima y'okucwerwa orubanja orutahikire.

eng_prompt: After reviewing the evidence and witness testimonies, it became clear that there was a lack of substantial proof against him. Many in the community believed he was targeted due to his background rather than any actual wrongdoing.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okwekenneenya obujulizi n'obujulizi bw'abajulizi, kyalabika bulungi nti waaliwo ebbula ly'obujulizi obw'amaanyi ku ye. Bangi mu kitundu baalowooza nti yali alumbibwa olw'ensibuko ye mu kifo ky'okukola ekikyamu kyonna.
ach_prompt: Ingee ngiyo caden ki lok pa caden, onen atyer kamaleng ni caden matye I kome peke. Dano mapol I kabedo ne tye ki niyee ni kimito neke pi kama en aa ki iye me kaka timo bal mo keken.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka airereor ajenanut keda ajenanut, aponi kojenunai ebe emamei aitogogongoret na abeit kanu aitepesen ngesi. Iyuunitos itunga luipu luka atutubet ebe aponi kitemokinai ngesi kanuka aijarake itia aswamisioit naka aibucaret.
lgg_prompt: Afa ecetaru azini e'yo sadiniru 'diyi ma ale andrizu 'bori ma vutia, eca e'da kililiru kini afa ecetaru 'diyi ma ako eri ma rua yo. Ba karakara ongulumu 'da ma alea 'diyi a'i ra kini 'ba 'du eri e'yo erini engazu 'bori ma e'yosi aga e'yo onzi azi erini 'ye 'bori ma e'yosi.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okushwijuma obujurizi n'obujurizi bw'abajurizi, kikarebeka butunu ngu hakaba hatariho bujurizi burikumuhakanisa. Abantu baingi omu kyanga bakaikiriza ngu akatwarwa ahabw'obuhangwa bwe, kutari kukora kibi kyona.

eng_prompt: In order to achieve our goals and make a significant impact, we must expand our reach. Currently, our efforts are falling short due to a lack of engagement from the community.
lug_prompt: Okusobola okutuukiriza ebiruubirirwa byaffe n'okukola enkyukakyuka ey'amaanyi, tulina okugaziya okutuuka kwaffe. Mu kiseera kino, kaweefube waffe akendeera olw'obutaba na kwegatta okuva mu bantu.
ach_prompt: Me cobo miti wa ki kelo adwogi maber, omyero wamed kero wa. I kare-ni, tutewa tye ka poto piny pien lwak pe tye ka miyo kony.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitodolikin alosikinetekosi, ekot oni aisiekikin aiboisio wok. Kwape kwana, euta aswam wok aibiror naarai mam itunga iswamaete ejok.
lgg_prompt: Afa amani lele 'diyi esuzu azini e'yo 'yezu orodriru, le ama ma idri angu amani cazu 'diyi ma ongmbo ra. Sawa 'disi, okpo amani 'diyi e'de e'yo 'ba ongulumu ru 'diyi ni e'yo 'yezu kuri ma e'yosi.
nyn_prompt: Kubaasa kuhikiiriza ebigyendererwa byaitu, twine kwongyera aha buheereza bwaitu. Obwahati, amaani gaitu gariyo nigakyerererwa ahabw'obutakwatanisa kuruga omu bantu.

eng_prompt: Tensions had been rising within the group for weeks, fueled by differing opinions on key issues. As the stakes grew higher, it became clear that not everyone was on the same page.
lug_prompt: Obunkenke bubadde bweyongera mu kibinja okumala wiiki eziwera olw'endowooza ez'enjawulo ku nsonga enkulu. Emikutu bwe gyagenda girinnya, kyeyoleka bulungi nti si buli omu nti yali ku ludda lwe lumu.
ach_prompt: Lworo obedo ka mede I kin dul enoni pi cabit mapol, ma man obedo macalo adwogi me tam mapat-pat I kom lok mapigi tego. I kare ma jami ne omedde malo, nen atyer kamaleng ni dano weng pe gubedo I tam marom.
teo_prompt: Apolor aiyalongong kotoma ogurupu kangol adaun isabitin luipu, kanu aomisio nuegelegela nuikamunitos akiro nuapolok. Neapolor aswamisio, apotu kojenutu ebe mam itunga kere ejaasi toma akiro adiope.
lgg_prompt: E'yo erita ako ni 'diyi ebi tu ongulumu 'da ma alea sabiti eyi ma alea, e'yo ndundu eyi 'yepi e'yo okporu 'diyi ma dria 'diyisi. E'yo ewaru 'diyi ni tuzu uru, eri eca e'dazaru kini 'ba dria ovuni e'yo aluri ma dria ku.
nyn_prompt: Obunkenke butwire nibweyongyera omu guruupu kumara esande nyingi, ahabw'ebiteekateeko ebitarikushushana aha nshonga nkuru. Omugisha ku gwagumire nigweyongyera, kikarebeka butunu ngu buri omwe akaba atarikukwatanisa.

eng_prompt: In an effort to empower and support women in leadership roles, the party organized a special gathering. Attendees were encouraged to share their experiences and strategies for success in a male-dominated environment.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'okutumbula n'okuwagira abakyala mu bifo by'obukulembeze, ekibiina kyategese olukungaana olw'enjawulo. Abaabaddewo baakubiriziddwa okugabana ku bye bayitamu n'obukodyo bw'obuwanguzi mu mbeera ejjudde abasajja.
ach_prompt: I tute me tyelo kor mon I tela, dul me cungu iwi bye ne oyubu kacoke mo ma pire tek. Kicuku cwiny joo ma obedo tye me nywako ngec gi ki yoo gi me cobo miti gi I kabedo ma pol pa dano gubedo coo.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitigogong ka aigang angor kotoma aiboisio nu engarenok, abu epate kitemok airiamun na itegelikina. Aponi isinyikokinai itunga aimor akiro kec keda acoasineikec nuka akerianut kotoma aiboisit naepol noi naka ikiliok.
lgg_prompt: Okpo 'bazu okpo fezu azini atita fezu oku eyini azi driceza ni 'diyi ma alea, amuti 'da otu mitingi azi ndu ni. Ba ai 'ba emu'ba 'diyi e'yo eyini esu 'diyi awazu tualu geri eyini ecozu drile suza esuzu angu agupi eyini opi nyazuri ma alea 'diyi pie.
nyn_prompt: Omu kaweefube w'okutunguura n'okushagika abakazi omu myanya y'obwebembezi, ekibiina kikatebekanisa oruteerane rw'omutaano. Abaabaire bariho bakahigwa okubagana ebyabaireho n'oburyo bw'obusinguzi omu myanya erikwebemberwa abashaija.

eng_prompt: If he doesn't settle his debts soon, the consequences could be severe. The bank has already warned him about the impending foreclosure.
lug_prompt: Singa tasasula mabanja ge mangu, ebivaamu biyinza okuba eby'amaanyi. Bbanka yamulabula dda ku bbanja erigenda okuggibwa mu bbanka.
ach_prompt: Ka pe oculu banya ne oyot, adwogi ne twero bedo rac tutwal. Bang ne dong ocike I kom lok me gamo lim ma tye kabino ni.
teo_prompt: Arai mam ngesi ebuni aitac apesenin ke katipet, epedorete nuelomunete araun nuepolok noi. Apotu aingadis naka ikapun ikwenyasi ngesi nuikamunitos agolokinio naka ikapun.
lgg_prompt: Ka i vile mari yi ofe mbeleru ku, e'yo yi 'yepi 'diyi nga ovu onzi. Ero robia ta mbazuri fe eri dri bile ndu liza e'yo 'bani eri ombezu ri ma dria 'bo.
nyn_prompt: Ku araabe atashashwire amabanja ge juba, ebireije kurugamu nibiija kuba bibi munonga. Banka yamuraburaho oburemeezi oburikwija kubaho.

eng_prompt: After years of hard work and dedication, he had built a thriving farm that provided for his family. However, everything changed when the government declared a state of emergency.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'emyaka mingi ng'akola n'obunyiikivu, yali azimbye ffaamu ekulaakulana era ng'elabirira ab'omu maka ge. Kyokka, buli kimu kyakyuka gavumenti bwe yalangirira embeera ey'akatyabaga.
ach_prompt: Ingee tic matek pi mwaki mapol, en onongo dong ogedo poto maber tutwal me gwoko jo me ode. Ento jami weng olokke I kare ma gamente okatti ki lok me kelo peko ma opoto atura.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ikar luipu luka aswam kagogong keda ainakina, abu ngesi koduk efaamu loajokan noi loapedori aidar ekaleke. Konye, abu iboro kijulakin ne alimoria apugan ejautene lo engeso.
lgg_prompt: Eli 'bani azi ngazu avasi azini asi driasi 'bori ma vutia, eri si angu ori ezozaniri afa fepi familia eriniri dri ra. Kani si, e'yo dria oja yi gamete ni e'yo azakoma lepi mbeleru ri 'yozu 'bori ma vutia.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'emyaka mingi y'okukora n'amaani n'okwehayo, akombeka faamu nungi erikubaasa kureeberera eka ye. Kwonka, buri kimwe kikahinduka obu gavumenti yarangirira obwire bw'akabi.

eng_prompt: After months of investigation, the authorities uncovered a web of deceit surrounding the property. It became clear that the ownership documents had been tampered with.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okumala emyezi egiwerako nga banoonyereza, ab'obuyinza baazudde obulimba bungi obwali ku kizimbe ekyo. Kyategeerekeka bulungi nti ebiwandiiko by'obwannannyini byali bikyusiddwa.
ach_prompt: Ingee kwedo lok pi dwe mapol, lutela gunongo lok goba mapol I kom jami ne. Onen atyer kamaleng ni kikobo ki karatac pa wegge.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ilapio luka aingic, apotu apedorosio odumutu akiro nuka akoko kotoma aiboisit kangin. Aponi kojenunai ebe aponi itolitolunai apapulai nuka apedorosio nuka itunganan.
lgg_prompt: Mba vuti ondaza ma vutia, 'ba okpo e'ipiru 'diyi esu e'yo onzi nyaku 'da ma ageia 'diyi. Eca e'da kililiru kini 'ba oja kokobi e'ipi yini 'diyi ra.

eng_prompt: Tensions had been escalating for weeks as outsiders encroached on their territory, threatening their way of life. In a desperate bid to defend their homes, the residents decided to take a stand against the intruders.
lug_prompt: Obunkenke bwali bweyongedde okumala wiiki ng'abantu b'ebweru bayingirira ekitundu kyabwe, nga bateeka obulamu bwabwe mu matigga. Mu kaweefube w'okukuuma amaka gaabwe, abatuuze baasalawo okulwanyisa abayingirira.
ach_prompt: Lworo obedo ka mede pi cabit mapol tutwal I kare ma dano ma aa ki I lobo ma woko gudonyo I lobogi, ma okelo peko I kwo gi. I tute matek tutwal me gwoko gangi gi, lutedero gumoko tam gi me lweny i kom joo ma donyo I gang gi.

lgg_prompt: E'yo asi omiza ni 'diyi e'bi tu sabiti eyi ma alea 'ba amve 'diyi ni fizu angu eyivile 'diyi ma alea eyini ani geri eyini aa'zu ri ezazu. E'yo asi driasi lezu aku yini 'diyi ma ta mbazu, 'ba aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi asi e'yo 'du 'ba efipi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ma dria.

eng_prompt: The owners had grown increasingly protective of their property, fearing that outsiders would disrupt the tranquility they cherished. As a result, they implemented strict measures to keep trespassers away.
lug_prompt: Bannannyini byo baali beeyongedde okukuuma ebintu byabwe, nga batya nti abantu b'ebweru banditaataaganyizza eddembe lye baali batwala nga lya muwendo. N'ekyavaamu, baateekawo enkola ey'amaanyi okutangira abayingirira.
ach_prompt: Wegi jami ne gubedo ka gwoko jami gi matek tutwal, ki lworo ni dano ma woko bi balo kuc ma gubedo kwede. Macalo adwogi ne, guketo yoo matek tutwal me gengo dano ma donyo iotgi.
teo_prompt: Apotu ikulepek itogoi kiyuwarata iborokec, ekuriaka ebe epedorete itunga luka kinga aitolitol ainapakina naeminasi kesi. Kanuka ngun, apotu kesi ibwaikisi ainapeta nuka aitikitik ngul luepedorete alomar toma.
lgg_prompt: êž‹Ba yi ma eêžŒipiru êžŒdiyi eêžŒbi yi ma lonyi ma ta mba angiri, yini orisi kini êžŒba amveleru êžŒdiyi nga asianzu yini leleri eza ra. E'yo 'disi, eyi 'ba azita okporu eyi 'bapi 'ba efipi eyi ma alea ku 'diyi atrizu.

eng_prompt: After a long and exhausting journey, she decided to take a break from her usual routine. Her friends were starting to worry as the days turned into weeks.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'olugendo oluwanvu era olukooya, yasalawo okuwummulamu. Mikwano gye baali batandise okweraliikirira ng'ennaku zigenda zifuuka wiiki.
ach_prompt: Ingee wot mabor dok ma oloye tutwal, en omoko tamme me yweyo ki jami ma en timo kare ki kare. Lureme gucako bedo ki lworo I kare ma nino odoko cabit.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka alosit apak naepol noi ido naetiono noi, abu ngesi koseu aiyengun kotoma aswamuke. Apotu ipaperoke kogeutu aiyalongong naarai apotu aparasia arautu isabitin.
lgg_prompt: Aci ezu azini andezaru 'bori ma vutia, eri asi e'yo 'du ava liza 'duzu e'yo erini 'ye 'diyi vurisi ra. Eri ma agyipi e'doki asi otiza ma alia o'du yini ecazu sabiti ru.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'orugyendo ruraingwa kandi orurikuhuzya, akasharamu okuhuumura aha mirimo ye eya butoosha. Banywani be bakaba batandikire kwerarikirira ahabwokuba ebiro bikaba nibihinduka esande.

eng_prompt: Authorities are investigating the sudden disappearance of a local resident who was last seen leaving their home late last night. Witnesses reported hearing a struggle nearby just before the individual went missing.
lug_prompt: Ab'obuyinza banoonyereza ku kubula kw'omutuuze w'omu kitundu eyasembyeyo okulabibwa ng'ava mu maka gaabwe ekiro ekikeesezza olwaleero. Abaabaddewo baagamba nti baawulira okulwanagana okumpi awo ng'omuntu tannabula.

teo_prompt: Eutasi apedorosio aingic nuka aibiror naka itunganan yenetapit asesen anyoun korekec kware. Apotu ajenak kolimosi ebe apotu kesi kopuputu ingungeta neyapiete eringa emamei itunganan.
lgg_prompt: Okpo e'ipi eyi e'yo vuti ondaza 'ye e'yo 'bani agu aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'bani ndre asizu aku eyivile ri kuzu ri ma dria. Sadini eyi 'yo kini eyi eri e'yo aco coza ni eyi ma eselea de nga po'di 'ba azi 'da avi ku.

eng_prompt: As the sun set on the seventh day, a sense of worry began to creep into her heart. She had tried calling and texting, but there was still no response from him.
