teo_prompt: Neautar akolong aibiror kotoma apaaran naikanyetarei, abu aiyalongong kogeu alomar toma akekuan. Abu ngesi kotam ainom esimu keda aijukar akiro, konye mam bobo abu kobongok.
lgg_prompt: Etuka ni ecaria o'du aziri ma alia, asi otiza e'do fi eri ma asi ma alia. Eri o'bi ndra simu gbazu azini o'dukoti edrizu o'dukoti edrizu o'dukoti edrizu o'dukoti edrizu o'dukoti edrizu o'dukoti edrizu o'dukoti edrizu o'dukoti edrizu o'dukoti edrizu o'dukoti edrizu o'dukoti edri
nyn_prompt: Eizooba ku ryatandikire kurenga aha eizooba rya mushanju, akatandika kwerarikirira. Akaba agyezaho kumuteerera esimu n'okumuheereza obutumwa, kwonka nabwo akaba atarikumugarukamu.

eng_prompt: After months of negotiations and discussions, the leaders of the two nations have finally reached a mutual understanding. They recognize the importance of collaboration in addressing shared challenges.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'emyezi egy'enteeseganya n'okukubaganya ebirowoozo, abakulembeze b'amawanga gombi baatuuka ku kutegeeragana. Bakimanyi nti kya mugaso okukolera awamu okusobola okuvvuunuka okusoomoozebwa kwe balina.
ach_prompt: Ingee dwe mapol me winye ki nywako lok, lutela me lobo aryo ni dong guwinye. Gin guniang ber pa winye ikare me tyeko peko ma gitye kwede.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ilapio luka ipegeta keda ipegeta, apotu engarenok luka akwapin aarei kodolokisi acamanara. Apotu kesi kojenutu ajokis naka aimorikikina kanu aitemokin atiokisio.
lgg_prompt: Mba 'bani e'yo otuzu azini agbatara gbazu 'bori ma vutia, drice'ba kari iri 'diyi ma eselea 'diyi eca asizu vata ma dria ra. Eyi esu orodri ti ecita niri e'yo ewaru eyini esu 'diyi ma aza kozu.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'emyezi mingi y'okuteisa n'okuhanuura, abebembezi b'amahanga abiri, baherize kuhika aha kwetegyerezana. Nibamanya omugasho gw'okukwatanisa omu kurwanisa oburemeezi.

eng_prompt: As the election date approaches, candidates are ramping up their campaigns and strategies. Voter engagement is at an all-time high, reflecting the importance of this election cycle.
lug_prompt: Ng'olunaku lw'okulonda lusembera, abeesimbyewo bongedde amaanyi mu kakuyege n'obukodyo bwabwe. Okwenyigira kw'abalonzi kuli waggulu nnyo, ekiraga obukulu bw'okulonda kuno.
ach_prompt: I kare ma nino me yer tye cok, lucungu tye ka medo rwom me bito kwir gi. Bedo tye pa lubol kwir tye malo tutwal ma nyutu ber pa yub me yer man.
teo_prompt: Neyapiete apaarasia nuka aseo, eutasi abwoak aiyatakin ikampeins kec keda iwaitin kec. Alosikinet naka aseak erai naepol noi, itodunit ajokis naka ainapeta nuka aseo.
lgg_prompt: O'du opetaa ni ecazu ogogo ri si, 'ba pa tupi 'diyi e'yo ti odaza ni 'diyi ma omgbo otu. E'yo 'ba voti 'be'baa 'diyi ma eselea ri ma omgbo angiri, e'dapi orodri e'yo opetaa ni 'diyiniri'i.
nyn_prompt: Eizooba ry'okuteera akaruuru ku ririkuhika haihi, abesimbireho bariyo nibongyera amaani omu kampeyini zaabo n'emitendera yaabo. Abateezi b'akaruuru beejumbiremu munonga, ekirikworeka obukuru bw'oburuuru obu.

eng_prompt: Tensions have been rising in the legislature as disagreements over key policies continue to escalate. As a result, the political parties are not on good terms.
lug_prompt: Obunkenke bubadde bweyongera mu lukiiko lw'ababaka ba palamenti ng'obutakkaanya ku mateeka amakulu bweyongera. N'ekivuddemu, ebibiina by'ebyobufuzi tebirina nkolagana nnungi.
ach_prompt: Lworo obedo ka mede I ot moko cik pien telle I kom cik mapigi tego tye kamede. Macalo adwogi ne, dul me cungu iwi bye ne pe tye I winye.
teo_prompt: Apolor atiokisio kotoma airabet naarai iyata amamut acamanar kanu ikisila luapolok. Kanuka ngun, mam ipatei ejaasi keda eidicane loajokan.
lgg_prompt: E'yo asi otiza ni 'diyi e'bi tu paliamentia erita ako e'yo azita okporu 'diyi ma dria ri ma omgbo ni tuzu drile. E'yo 'disi, amuti politiki ni 'diyi aa'ni aa'ta muke si ku.
nyn_prompt: Obunkenke butwire nibweyongyera omu ishengyero ahabw'obutakwatanisa aha biragiro ebikuru kweyongyera. N'ekyarugiremu,ebibiina by'obutegyeki tibirikukwatanisa.

eng_prompt: Due to the prolonged drought and lack of rainfall, many local ecosystems are feeling the strain. As a result, the water in the river has reduced.
lug_prompt: Olw'ekyeya ekiwanvu n'obutaba na nkuba, ebitonde bingi mu kitundu biwulira okunyigirizibwa. N'ekivuddemu, amazzi mu mugga gakendedde.
ach_prompt: Pi ceng ma obedo pi kare malac tutwal ki bedo peke pa kot, jami makwo mapol tye ka winyo peko ne. Macalo adwogi ne, pii me nam odok piny.
teo_prompt: Kanuka akamu na apak naepol noi keda amamus na edou, epupete isuban luipu ationis. Kanuka ngun, ekidiokoto akipi nuka ecilet.
lgg_prompt: E'yo a'wiruri ma e'yosi azini ozooniri ma ako ma e'yosi, afa nyakuni angu 'da ma alea 'diyi candi isu. E'yo 'disi, yi ara ma alia 'diyi esi ra.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'ekyanda ky'obwire buraingwa hamwe n'eibura ry'enjura, eby'obuhangwa bingi nibireeba oburemeezi. N'ekyarugiremu, amaizi g'omugyera gakyendeire.

eng_prompt: In response to the ongoing water scarcity issues, officials have been exploring various solutions. After extensive discussions, they have concluded that a new infrastructure project is necessary.
lug_prompt: Olw'ebizibu by'ebbula ly'amazzi ebigenda mu maaso, abakungu babadde banoonya eby'okugonjoola eby'enjawulo. Oluvannyuma lw'okuteesa ennyo, bakakasizza nti pulojekiti y'ebizimbe empya yeetaagibwa.
ach_prompt: Pi peko me nok pa pii matye kawot anyim, lutic gubedo ka yenyo yoo mapat-pat me tyeko peko eni. Ingee nywako lok mapol, gumoko ni yub manyen me gedo mite.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin atiokisio nuka aikidiokus na akipi, eutasi eswamak aingic iwaitin luegelegela. Akaulo naka aineranara noi, apotu kesi ongetakisi ebe ejokuna epurojekt loitetet loka aduketait.
lgg_prompt: E'yo yi ako ni mupi drile ri ma aza kozu, azi'ba eyi ebi geri ndundu eyi nda. E'yo onzeza angiri ma vutia, eyi esu egata kini otita afa ayuzaru o'diru 'diyiniri eri orodriru.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'eshonga y'eibura ry'amaizi erikugyenda omu maisho, abakungu batwire nibaronda oburyo bw'okukora aha nshonga egyo. Bwanyima y'okuhanuura munonga, baherize kuhendera ngu purogyekiti y'okwombeka ebintu ebisya neeyetengwa.

eng_prompt: Due to the recent economic downturn and declining profits, the management held a meeting to discuss potential cost-cutting measures. After careful consideration, they decided to implement salary reductions for all employees.
lug_prompt: Olw'okukendeera kw'ebyenfuna n'okukendeera kw'amagoba, abaddukanya emirimu baatuuza olukiiko okukubaganya ebirowoozo ku ngeri y'okukendeeza ku nsaasaanya. Oluvannyuma lw'okulowooza ennyo, baasalawo okukendeeza ku musaala gw'abakozi bonna.
ach_prompt: Pi peko me lim ma obedo tye cokcok-ki ki wel magoba matye kadok piny, ludito tic gubedo ki kacoke me nywako tam i kom kit me dwoko piny wel cente ma mite. Ingee tam matut, gumoko tamgi me dwoko piny mucara pa lutic weng.
teo_prompt: Kanuka aibiror naka ikapun keda aibiror naka ameda, abu eyaitene kijaik airiamunet kanu aitemitem iwaitin lu itidisiarere ikapun. Akaulo naka aomoom ejok, apotu kesi koseutu aitidisiar iropito luka eswamak kere.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru e'yo robianiri ma alia azini orodri ma omgbo esizuri ma e'yosi, driceza 'da 'ye mitingi agbatara gbazu geri ecozu aje ma omgbo esizu ra 'diyi ma dria. E'yo egazu kililiru 'bori ma vutia, eyi ai 'bani musara omvizu azi'ba dria eyini.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okugwa kw'ebyentatsya hamwe n'okutuubya kw'amagoba, abarikukurira ekitongore bakakora orukiiko kuhanuura oku bashemereire kukyendeeza aha nshohoza. Bwanyima y'okuteekateeka n'obwegyendesereza, bakasharamu kukyendeeza emishaara y'abakozi boona.

eng_prompt: In light of recent legislative changes, it is crucial for all businesses to stay compliant. Failure to adhere to updated regulations could result in significant penalties.
lug_prompt: Okusinziira ku nkyukakyuka ezikoleddwa mu mateeka gye buvuddeko, kikulu nnyo bizinensi zonna okugondera amateeka. Okulemererwa okugoberera amateeka amapya kiyinza okuvaamu ebibonerezo ebinene.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki aloka-loka me cik ma otimme cokcok-ki, pire tek tutwal pi biacara weng me lubu cik. Kwero lubu cik manyen twero kelo pwod madit tutwal.
teo_prompt: Kowai lo aijulanakineta nuka ikisila, ejokuna noi agwelanarak kere aitup ikisila. Amamus aitup ikisila luitetiak epedori ayangaun alecoret naepol noi.
lgg_prompt: Ojata o'diru azita ma alia 'diyi ma e'yosi, eri orodriru tujara dria yini aa'zu azita palaa. E'yo azita o'diru 'diyi ma vuti obizu ku ri eco panga okporu 'diyi eji ra.
nyn_prompt: Kurugirira aha mpindahinduka y'ebiragiro eyabaireho obwahati, n'eky'omugasho buri bizinesi kukuratira ebiragiro. Okuremwa kukuratira ebiragiro ebisya, nikibaasa kurugwamu ebiheneso by'amaani.

eng_prompt: Tensions had been escalating in the city for weeks, fueled by rising discontent over government policies. As protests began to gather momentum, the atmosphere turned volatile.
lug_prompt: Obunkenke bubadde bweyongera mu kibuga okumala wiiki eziwera olw'obutali bumativu obweyongera ku nkola za gavumenti. Obwegugungo bwe bwatandika okufuna amaanyi, embeera yafuuka ya bunkenke.
ach_prompt: Lworo obedo ka mede I boma ne pi cabit ma okato angec, ma okelo cwer cwiny I kom cik pa gamente. I kare ma jemo ocako dongo, lworo omako dano mapol.
teo_prompt: Apolor noi ingungeta koibuga kanu isabitin luipu, ido apolor noi amamut aiyalama kanuka ainapeta nuka apugan. Neageuna aidiya aiyatakin, abu ejautene koraun loetiono noi.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ngiringiri ni 'diyi ebi tu aku ambu city niri ma alea sabiti eyi ma alea, e'yo 'ba eyini aa'zu ayikosi e'yo gamete ni 'diyi ma dria risi. E'yo ngiringiri ni 'diyi ni e'doria okpo esuria, angu 'da eca e'yo ewaru ru.
nyn_prompt: Obunkenke butwire nibweyongyera omu rurembo kumara esande nyingi, ahabw'obutashemererwa obweyongyeire ahabw'ebiragiro bya gavumenti. Obwesharingo ku bwatandikire kweyongyera, embeera ekaba etarikwetegyerezibwa.

eng_prompt: Recent studies have highlighted significant disparities in workplace conditions. Many employees report experiencing bias that affects their job opportunities and advancement.
lug_prompt: Okunoonyereza okwakakolebwa kulaga enjawulo mu mbeera z'emirimu. Abakozi bangi bagamba nti bafuna obusosoze ekikosa emikisa gyabwe egy'emirimu n'okukulaakulana.
ach_prompt: Kwed ma otime cokcok-ki onyuto apoka-poka madit tutwal I kwo pa lutic. Lutic mapol giwaco ni ginongo apoka-poka ma balo gum me tic gi ki dongo gi.
teo_prompt: Aingic napac itodunit atiakatiaka naepol noi kotoma ojautene loka aswam. Ebakasi eswamak luipu ebe ejaas keda atiakatiaka na itolitoli aswamisinei kec ka apol.
lgg_prompt: E'yo eti ondaza o'diru 'diyi ece e'yo esele coza okporu angu azi ngazu 'diyi ma alia 'diyi ra. Azi'ba karakara eyi 'yo kini eyi e'yo opendu ni esu eyi ma drileba azi ni azini zota eyini ri eza ra.
nyn_prompt: Okucondooza okuhweireho kworeka entaaniso y'amaani omumbeera y'emirimo. Abakozi baingi nibagira ngu nibatunga okushoroorwa okurikuteganisa emirimo yaabo hamwe n'okutunguuka.

eng_prompt: As the championship game approached, the atmosphere was charged with excitement and anticipation. Each team gathered for a final pep talk, emphasizing the importance of teamwork and dedication.
lug_prompt: Ng'omuzannyo gwa bannantammegwa gusembera, embeera yabadde ejjudde essanyu n'okusuubira. Buli ttiimu yakungaana mu mboozi esembayo, ng'essa essira ku bukulu bw'okukolera awamu n'okwewaayo.
ach_prompt: I kare ma pyem tuku odoko cok, dano gubedo ki yomcwiny madit tutwal. Dul tuku acel-acel gugure pi lok me agiki, kun gicuko cwinygi I kom ber pa tic kacel ki keto cwiny I tic.
teo_prompt: Neyapiete abolia naka abolobol, apol noi aiyalama keda aiyalama. Apotu itimun kere kotukokinos kanu einer lo awasia, itogogongitos ajokis naka aswam nepepe keda ainakina.
lgg_prompt: A'bala avita championshipniri ni ecazu ogogo 'boria, ayiko azini asi 'baza fe angu 'da ni. Amuti alu alu tra yi e'yo nzeza asizuri ma alia, yini okpo 'bazu azi ngazu tualu azini asi feza ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Omuzaano gw'empaka z'omupiira gw'ebigyere ku gwahikire, abantu bakaba bashemereirwe munonga. Buri tiimu eketeeranira hamwe kugamba aha muheru, erikworeka omugasho gw'okukorera hamwe n'okwehayo.

eng_prompt: After weeks of rigorous training and strategy sessions, the players have honed their skills and built strong teamwork. Their dedication and hard work have instilled a sense of confidence in everyone.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lwa wiiki eziwera nga batendekebwa n'obukodyo, abazannyi bongedde obukugu bwabwe n'okukolagana obulungi. Okwewaayo kwabwe n'okukola ennyo bireeseewo obuvumu mu buli omu.
ach_prompt: Ingee cabit mapol me pwonye ki diro, lutuku gumedo diro gi dok guyubu tic matek ikin gi. Dyeregi kacel ki tic matek ma gutimo okelo tek cwiny bot dano weng.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka isabitin luipu luka aituutoonor keda aitemonokin iwaitin, apotu aboliak itojokisi acoasineikec kosodete adukun aswam nepepe. Ainakina kec keda aswam kagogong einakinit nginitunganan amunokina.
lgg_prompt: Sabiti karakara eyi ma vutia imbata okporu 'diyi ma vutia, 'ba avita avipi 'diyi otu ondua eyivile 'diyi dika eyi si amuti okporu ni eyi. Eyi ma ava azini azi ngaza okporu 'diyi fe 'ba dria eyini asi'baza.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'esande nyingi z'okutendekwa n'okukoresa oburyo, abazaani batungire emyoga n'okukorera hamwe. Okwehayo kwabo n'okukora n'amaani bateire obwesigye omuri buri omwe.

eng_prompt: As the election results came in, the excitement in the air was palpable. With a clear mandate from the voters, it was time for the newly elected officials to take action.
lug_prompt: Ebyava mu kulonda bwe byafuluma, essanyu mu bbanga lyalabika. Olw'obulagirizi obutegeerekeka obulungi okuva mu balonzi, kye kiseera abakungu abaakalondebwa okubaako kye bakolawo.
ach_prompt: I kare ma adwoki me yer obino, yom-cwiny obedo tye. Ki twero maleng ma lubol kwir gumiyo, kare dong oromo pi lutic ma kiyero gi manyen me timo gin mo.
teo_prompt: Neadolunia akiro nuka aseo, apol noi aiyalama kotoma okwam. Keda aicoreta nuecaete kanejaas aseak, arai apak na aseun eswamak luitetiak aswam.
lgg_prompt: O'duko agata opetaa ni efuzu 'boria, ayiko oli alia ri e'da ra. E'yo 'ba voti 'be'baa 'diyi ni lezu 'ba ma 'ye kililiru risi, sa'wa ca azi'ba 'bani pele o'diru 'diyini e'yo 'yezu ra.
nyn_prompt: Ebyarugire omu buruuru ku byaizire, okushemererwa kukarebeka. Ahabw'obujunaanizibwa oburikwetegyerezibwa kurungi kuruga omu babateezi b'akaruuru, ekaba eri obwire bw'abakungu abasya kutooranwa kugira eki bakozire.

eng_prompt: After months of rigorous training and preparation, the athletes are eager to showcase their skills on the international stage. Their hard work has paid off, and now they are ready for the ultimate challenge.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'emyezi gy'okutendekebwa okw'amaanyi n'okwetegekera, bannabyamizannyo beesunga okulaga obukugu bwabwe ku mutendera gw'ensi yonna. Omulimu gwabwe ogw'amaanyi guvuddemu ebirungi era kati beetegefu okwanganga okusoomoozebwa okusembayo.
ach_prompt: Ingee dwe mapol me pwonye ki yub matek tutwal, lungwec tye ki miti me nyuto diro gi I pyem me wilobo. Tic matek ma gutiyo okelo adwogi maber dok kombedi gitye atera me lweny i kom peko madit loyo weng.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ilapio lu aitutuonoro ka aitemonokin, ekotosi akerak aitodiar acoasineikec kotoma akwapin nukokinga. Iswamaete kesi kagogongu, ido kwana ekapakina kesi kanu ainingosit naepol noi.
lgg_prompt: Mba otuta okporu azini otuta ni 'diyi ma vutia, 'ba ongu onzu'ba 'diyi avasi eyi ma ondua e'dazu angu wudrikuru si 'diyi ma alea. Azi okporu eyini nga ri ofe ra, dika eyi sa'wa 'disi ngonde e'yo ewaru ndeni 'diyi esuzu.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'emyezi mingi y'okutendekwa n'okweteekateekyera munonga, abairuki baine ekihika ky'okworeka emyoga yaabo aha rurengo rw'ensi yoona. Omurimo gwabo gw'amaani gureesire ebirungi kandi hati beeteekateekire okurwanisa oburemeezi oburikukirayo oburungi.

eng_prompt: After months of preparation and training, the team is finally ready to showcase their skills. They have been eagerly anticipating this opportunity to compete on a larger stage.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'emyezi egy'okwetegekera n'okutendekebwa, ttiimu kati yeetegefu okulaga obukugu bwayo. Babadde beesunga omukisa guno okuvuganya ku siteegi ennene.
ach_prompt: Ingee dwe mapol me yubbe ki pwonye, dul tuku eni dong tye atera me nyuto diro gi. Gubedo kakuru kare man me pyem I rwom ma lamal tutwal.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ilapio lu aitemonokin ka aitutuonoro, ekapakina kwana etimu aitodiar acoasineikec. Etapit kesi noi aidar arerengu na naka abolobol kotoma adoketait naepol noi.
lgg_prompt: Mba otuta ni azini imbata ni 'diyi ma vutia, amuti 'da nga asizu ngonde eyi ma ondua e'dazu. Eyi ebi ndra drileba 'di te avasi abala 'yezu angu ambu 'da ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'ameezi mingi y'okweteekateekyera n'okutendekwa, tiimu ekaba eyeteekateekire kworeka emyoga yaabo. Batwire nibategyereza omugisha gw'okuhajaana aha rurengo oruhango.

eng_prompt: The vibrant economy of Uganda has attracted a diverse range of entrepreneurs. Among them, the Indian community has established a significant presence in various sectors.
lug_prompt: Eby'enfuna bya Uganda eby'amaanyi bisikiriza abasuubuzi ab'enjawulo. Mu byo, abayindi bataddewo okubeerawo okw'amaanyi mu bitongole eby'enjawulo.
ach_prompt: Lonyo me lobo Uganda ma tye ka dongo oywayo lutim biacara ma pat pat. I kingi, lwak me lobo India guyubu kabedo gi I tenge mapat-pat.
teo_prompt: Apolou na edumune loka ikapun ko Uganda abu ingalau itunga luegelegela lu agwelanar. Kanejaas kesi, adumu itunga luko India aiboisio nuegelegela.
lgg_prompt: E'yo robia esuzu kari Uganda niri ma alea okporu ri eji 'ba tujari 'yepi ndundu 'diyi. Yi ma eselea, 'ba Indian ru 'diyi e'do curu'do e'yo okporu 'ye esele ndundu 'diyi ma alia.
nyn_prompt: Eby'entatsya ya Uganda ebirikugyenda omu maisho, biretsireho abashubuzi b'emiringo mingi. Omuri bo, abahindi batandikire kukora emirimo y'omutaano omu bitongore bitari bimwe na bimwe.

eng_prompt: The preparations for the upcoming conference are in full swing. We have just received confirmation that the minister will arrive in July.
lug_prompt: Enteekateeka z'olukungaana olujja zigenda mu maaso. Twaakafuna okukakasa nti minisita ajja kutuuka mu Gwomusanvu.
ach_prompt: Yubbe pi kacoke matye kabino ni tye kawot anyim. Pud wanongo ngec ni minista obi oo I dwe me abiro.
teo_prompt: Aitemonokineta nuka atukonokin naebunit ejaas noi. Idumunit sio aitigogongoret ebe ebuni eminisita adolun olap lo ikanyetarei.
lgg_prompt: Otuta otita imbatani emupi ri ni 'diyi mu drile. Ama esu nga lu e'yo azi kini minisita 'da ni nga eca imba aziri si.
nyn_prompt: Entebekanisa y'oruteerane orurikwija eri ahaiguru. Twaheza kutunga obuhame ngu minisita naija kuhika omukwezi kwa mushanju.

eng_prompt: During the recent economic forum, several key figures expressed interest in supporting local businesses. Among them, the minister is a potential investor.
lug_prompt: Mu lukungaana lw'ebyenfuna olwaliwo gye buvuddeko, abantu ab'enjawulo baalaga obwagazi okuwagira bizinensi z'omu kitundu. Mu bano, minisita y'omu ku abo abayinza okusiga ensimbi.
ach_prompt: Ikare me kacoke me economic forum ma okato cokcok-ki, dano mapol ma pigi tego gunyutu miti gi me konyo biacara me tedero. I kingi, minista obedo ngat ma twero keto lim I biyacara.
teo_prompt: Kotoma airiamun naka ikapun napac, apotu itunga luapolok itodutu eipud loka aigang ibiasaran luka atutubet. Kotoma kes, erai eminista lo epedori aipikakin ikapun.
lgg_prompt: Sawa ongulumu e'yo robia ni 'diyi ma dria ri ma alea, 'ba okporu karakara eyi ece ava atita fezu tujari ogogo 'diyi dri ra. Yi ma eselea, minisita 'da 'ba lonyi vuti alezani ecopi ra ni'i.
nyn_prompt: Omu rukiiko rw'eby'entatsya orwahwireho, abantu b'amaani baingi boorekire ngu nibenda kuhwera eby'obushubuzi eby'omubyaro. Omuri bo, minisita n'omwebembezi w'eihanga.

eng_prompt: Recent economic reports have highlighted troubling trends in employment and income levels. As a result, many families are struggling to make ends meet.
lug_prompt: Alipoota z'ebyenfuna ezaakafulumizibwa ziraga enkyukakyuka mu mirimu ne mu nnyingiza. N'ekivuddemu, amaka mangi galwana okweyimirizaawo.
ach_prompt: Ripot makwako lok kom lim ma okato cokcok-ki onyuto jami ma kelo lworo i kom rwom me tic ki lim. Macalo adwogi ne, gangi mapol tye ka yele me nongo jami ma mite pi kwo gi.
teo_prompt: Alipoota nuka ikapun lu atuboros itodunitos iponesio luarokok luka aswamisinei keda edumune loka ikapun. Kanuka ngun, eutasi ikalia luipu aijar.
lgg_prompt: O'duko e'yo robia ni 'diyi ma dria o'diru 'diyi ece e'yo azi ako ni azini geri robia esuzu 'diyi ma dria. E'yo 'disi, familia karakara eyi dri ci afa eyini aa'zu 'diyi esuzu.
nyn_prompt: Ripoota z'eby'entaasya eziherize kukorwa, nizooreka entunguuka omu mirimo hamwe n'entaasya. N'ekyarugiremu, amaka maingi nigateganisibwa okureeberera ebyetaago byago.

eng_prompt: In today's rapidly changing economy, innovation and entrepreneurship are more important than ever. To foster a spirit of creativity and self-reliance, communities are focusing on empowering their younger generations.
lug_prompt: Mu by'enfuna by'ennaku zino ebikyuka amangu, obuyiiya n'obusuubuzi bikulu nnyo okusinga bwe kyali kibadde. Okutumbula omwoyo gw'obuyiiya n'okweyimirizaawo, ebitundu bitadde essira ku kuwa abavubuka baabwe amaanyi.
ach_prompt: I kare man ma lim tye ka loke oyot-oyot tutwal, kelo jami manyen ki cako biacara pire tek tutwal. Me tyelo kor cwiny me bedo ki ngec manyen ki bedo agonya, lwak tye ka keto cwiny gi i kom tyelo kor lutino gi.
teo_prompt: Kotoma ojautene loka ikapun loakwana, ibusakinit itunga aitegear iboro luitetiak ka agwelanar. Kanu aisinyikokit itunga aitolomunun acoasinei nuitetiak ka apedor, eutasi itunga aitigogong atumunak kec.
lgg_prompt: E'yo lonyi ni oja'ba mbeleru ewu 'disi ri ma alea, e'yo ndundu eyi edezu tualu e'yo tujari ni 'diyi pie ri eri orodriru ndeni aga oku driorisi. Ongulumu eyi asi 'ba okpo fezu 'ba oderu 'diyi dri e'yo ndundu eyi edezu dika eyi ma ngulupi ma ta mbazu.
nyn_prompt: Omu by'entaasya by'erizooba ebirikuhinduka juba, okujumbura hamwe n'okutandikaho eby'obushubuzi n'eby'omugasho munonga. Okureetaho emyoyo y'okujumbura n'okwetegyeka, ebyanga nibita amaani omu kutunguura eminyeeto yaabo.

eng_prompt: In the recent elections, voter turnout was remarkably high, reflecting the public's engagement with the political process. As the results came in, it became clear that the ruling party had garnered significant support across the nation.
lug_prompt: Mu kulonda okwakaggwa, abalonzi baali bangi nnyo, ekiraga nti abantu baali beenyigidde nnyo mu by'obufuzi. Ebyava mu kunoonyereza bwe byafuluma, kyeyoleka bulungi nti ekibiina ekiri mu buyinza kyali kifunye obuwagizi bungi mu ggwanga lyonna.
ach_prompt: I yer ma okato cokcok-ki, wel lubol kwir obedo lamal tutwal, ma nyutu miti pa lwak I kom yub me cung iwibye. Ikare ma adwogi ne obino, onen atyer kamaleng ni dul me cungu iwi bye matye I loc onongo cwak madit tutwal I lobo man.
teo_prompt: Kotoma aseo napac, apolor noi enaaba loka aseak, itodunit eipud loka itunga keda ainapeta nuka epolitikis. Neadolunia akiro, apotu kojenutu ebe adumu epate lo ipugai egangitok noi kotoma akwap.
lgg_prompt: Opeta ebipi 'bo 'diyi ma alea, 'ba emu'ba voti 'bezu 'diyi ma kalafe angiri, e'dapi kini o'bi eyi 'ye e'yo politiki ni 'diyi saaru. E'yo agata ni efuzu 'boria, eca e'da kini amuti politiki ni kari 'di ma dri cepiri isu atita angiri kari 'di ma alea ndulu.
nyn_prompt: Omu karuuru akahweireho, abateezi b'akaruuru bakaba bari ahaiguru munonga, ekirikworeka ngu abantu bakejumba omu by'obutegyeki. Ebyarugire omu bigyezo ku byaizire, kikarebeka butunu ngu ekibiina ekiri omu butegyeki kitungire obushagiki bwingi omu ihanga ryona.

eng_prompt: The team had been performing exceptionally well throughout the season, but their recent defeat left everyone puzzled. Fans and analysts alike were left wondering about the factors that contributed to such an unexpected outcome.
lug_prompt: Ttiimu ebadde ekola bulungi nnyo sizoni yonna, naye okukubwa gyebuvuddeko kwaleka buli omu nga yeewuunya. Abawagizi n'abekenneenyi bonna baalekebwa nga beebuuza ku nsonga ezaaviirako ebyavaamu ebitasuubirwa.
ach_prompt: Tim ne obedo katimo maber tutwal I kare weng me tuku, ento loc ma guloyo cokcok-ki oweko dano weng obedo ki ngeng tutwal. Lucwak tuku kacel ki lutim kwed mapat-pat gubedo ki ngeng I kom ngo ma okelo adwogi ma pe byek tye I komgi.
teo_prompt: Iswamat etimu ejok noi kapak naka abolia, konye abu aibirorikec koinak itunga kere aumokin. Aponi kojalakinai egangitok keda angicak aomoom nuikamunitos akiro nuapotu koyangautu akiro ngun.
lgg_prompt: Amuti mupira avizu 'da ri ebi avita 'ye onyiru sa'wa driasi, te eyi ma e'yo 'bani eyi ndezu o'diru ri ku 'ba dria osuta si. Ba atita fepi 'diyi tualu 'ba e'yo ama'baa 'diyi pie ri awi yi osu e'yo fepi e'yo yi 'yepi 'dile 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Tiimu ebaire neekora kurungi omu siizoni yoona, kwonka okusingwa kwabo okwabaireho juba kukasiga buri omwe ataine ki arikumanya. Abahagizi hamwe n'abacencuzi, bakasigara nibeebuuza enshonga ezareesireho ebitarikuteekateekwaho.
